quotes.quote: A father is a man who expects his son to be as good a man as he meant to be.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: It's an ongoing joy being a dad.
quotes.author: Liam Neeson

quotes.quote: Parents are the centre of a person's solar system, even as an adult. My dad had a stronger gravitational pull than most, so his absence was bound to leave a deep and lasting void.
quotes.author: Justin Trudeau

quotes.quote: But there's no substitute for a full-time dad. Dads who are fully engaged with their kids overwhelmingly tend to produce children who believe in themselves and live full lives.
quotes.author: Tony Dungy

quotes.quote: That is the thankless position of the father in the family - the provider for all, and the enemy of all.
quotes.author: August Strindberg

quotes.quote: Any man can be a father. It takes someone special to be a dad.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Be a dad. Don’t be "Mom’s Assistant".... Be a man.... Fathers have skills that they never use at home. You run a landscaping business and you can’t dress and feed a four-year-old? Take it on. Spend time with your kids.... It won’t take away your manhood, it will give it to you.
quotes.author: Louis C.K.

quotes.quote: Being a dad has made me more aware of myself. I can see all of my virtues and flaws. They become glaringly clear when my daughter communicates with me in the same ways that I communicate with her. I can really tell where and when I went wrong.
quotes.author: Harold Perrineau

quotes.quote: Why does a dad matter so much to a daughter, in particular? A dad is the one who teaches a daughter what a male is all about. It's the first man in her life--the first man she loves, the first male she tries to please, the first man who says no to her, the first man to discipline her. In effect, he sets her up for success or failure with the opposite sex. Not only that, but she takes cues from how Dad treats Mom as she grows up about what to expect as a woman who is in a relationship with a man. So Dad sets up his daughter's marriage relationship too.
quotes.author: Kevin Leman

quotes.quote: The best fathers have the softest, sweetest hearts. In other words, great dads are real marshmallows.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Dads had favourite armchairs in which they sat like starship captains, issuing orders and receiving cups of tea and shouting at the news without fear of contradiction.
quotes.author: David Nicholls

quotes.quote: When you're a dad, there's no one above you. If I don't do something that has to be done, who is going to do it?
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: If you love your dad, it’s tough when he dies. If you don’t like your dad, it’s tough when he dies. Because you lose that guy. Whatever you didn’t get, you miss. And what you did get, you miss.
quotes.author: Jimmy Iovine

quotes.quote: A father is available to help his daughter balance both her love and her anger toward her mother, to moderate the inevitable emotional extremes in the intense mother-daughter equation. With Daddy's steadying influence daughters can learn to be comfortable with healthy anger, rather than feeling that they must be eternal good girls who must at all costs conceal it.
quotes.author: Victoria Secunda

quotes.quote: A dad stands tallest when he kneels to pray with his children.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Dad - a son's first hero, a daughter's first love.
quotes.author: John Walter Bratton

quotes.quote: Being a Dad is the greatest, except for assembling things.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.quote: Dad told me to stop running in circles, I couldn't, so he nailed down my other foot!
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: Fathers are biological necessities, but social accidents.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: All societies that have survived have survived based on their ability to prepare their sons to be disposable, in war and at work--and therefore as dads.
quotes.author: Warren Farrell

quotes.quote: A sweet thing, for whatever time, to revisit in dreams the dear dad we have lost.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: You can't be two people in your brain, one rock dude and a dad - there's something in the middle of them, and that's really what you are and that's going to make you the best dad - not when you try to be one or the other.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: There should be a children's song: 'If you're happy and you know it, keep it to yourself and let your dad sleep'.
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: Blessed indeed is the man who hears many gentle voices call him father.
quotes.author: Lydia M. Child

quotes.quote: One night a father overheard his son pray: Dear God, Make me the kind of man my Daddy is. Later that night, the Father prayed, Dear God, Make me the kind of man my son wants me to be.
quotes.author: Source Unknown

quotes.quote: The best thing about being a dad? Well, I think it's just the thing that every man wants - to have a son and heir.
quotes.author: George Best

quotes.quote: Young people know how important it is for dads to be involved in their lives. As I travel the country and talk with students, some of them tell me that their lives would be totally different if their father was around.
quotes.author: Arne Duncan

quotes.quote: A dad might give a coupon to drop whatever he's doing and play a game, or to ditch work once in the next 12 months and do whatever the kid wants to do, things like that don't cost anything, and are often incredibly memorable.
quotes.author: Ron Lieber

quotes.quote: There are three stages of man: he believes in Santa Claus; he does not believe in Santa Claus; he is Santa Claus.
quotes.author: Bob Phillips

quotes.quote: A father's job is not to teach his daughter how to be a lady. It's to teach her how a lady should be treated.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: To a father growing old, nothing is dearer than a daughter.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Many a man wishes he were strong enough to tear a telephone book in half, especially if he has a teenage daughter.
quotes.author: Guy Lombardo

quotes.quote: A father is always making his baby into a little woman. And when she is a woman he turns her back again.
quotes.author: Enid Bagnold

quotes.quote: There is this girl who stole my heart and she calls me Daddy.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: No one is able to make the female a queen except her fatherâ€¦
quotes.author: Arab Proverb

quotes.quote: When my father didn't have my hand, he had my back.
quotes.author: Linda Poindexter

quotes.quote: No one in this world can love a girl more that her father.
quotes.author: Michael Ratnadeepak

quotes.quote: It is admirable for a man to take his son fishing, but there is a special place in heaven for the father who takes his daughter shopping.
quotes.author: John Sinor

quotes.quote: Old as she was, she still missed her daddy sometimes.
quotes.author: Gloria Naylor

quotes.quote: A man's daughter is his heart. Just with feet, walking out in the world.
quotes.author: Mat Johnson

quotes.quote: I am not ashamed to say that no man I ever met was my father's equal, and I never loved any other man as much.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: As a daughter of the king of kings, your purpose is not to turn heads but to turn hearts toward our Heavenly Father.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Watching your daughter being collected by her date feels like handing over a million-dollar Stradivarius to a gorilla.
quotes.author: Jim Bishop

quotes.quote: The main reason why a daughter needs a dad is to show her that not all boys are like the ones who hurt her.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A girl's first true love is her father.
quotes.author: Marisol Santiago

quotes.quote: Fathers, be your daughter's 1st love and she'll never settle for anything less.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I may find my prince but my dad will always be my king.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The reason why daughters love their Dad the most isâ€¦that there is at least one man in the world who will never hurt her.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When I come home, my daughter will run to the door and give me a big hug, and everything that's happened that day just melts away.
quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

quotes.quote: I love my daddy. My daddy's everything. I hope I can find a man that will treat me as good as my dad.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: The greatest thing a father can do for his daughter, is to love her mother.
quotes.author: Elaine S. Dalton

quotes.quote: Guns don't kill peopleâ€¦ dads with pretty daughters do.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A good father will leave his imprint on his daughter for the rest of her life.
quotes.author: Dr. James Dobson

quotes.quote: Fathers, be good to your daughters. You are the god and the weight of her world.
quotes.author: John Mayor

quotes.quote: Being a daddy's girl is like having permanent armor for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Marinela Reka

quotes.quote: No matter how old she may be, sometimes a girl just needs her dad.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A daughter needs a dad to be the standard against which she will judge all men.
quotes.author: Gregory E. Lang

quotes.quote: I think my mom put it best. She said, â€˜Little girls soften their daddy's hearts.
quotes.author: Paul Walkertur

quotes.quote: I love my father as the stars - he's a bright shining example and a happy twinkling in my heart.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Behind every great daughter is a truly amazing dad.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: To her the name of father was another name for love.
quotes.author: Fanny Fern

quotes.quote: The father of a daughter is nothing but a high-class hostage. A father turns a stony face to his sons, berates them, shakes his antlers, paws the ground, snorts, runs them off into the underbrush, but when her daughter puts her arm over his shoulder and says,' Daddy, I need to ask you something,' he is a pat of butter in a hot frying pan.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: A wedding is for daughters and fathers. The mothers all dress up, trying to look like young women. But a wedding is for a father and daughter. They stop being married to each other on that day.
quotes.author: Sarah Ruhl

quotes.quote: My dad's contentment is all that matters to me. When he's laughing, I'm laughing. When he's happy, I'm happy. I would give up my soul for him. To me, nothing else but his happiness matters.
quotes.author: Rebecah McManus

quotes.quote: I think a dad has to make his daughter feel that he's genuinely interested in what she's going through.
quotes.author: Harry Conick Jr

quotes.quote: There's something like a line of gold thread running through a man's words when he talks to his daughter, and gradually over the years, it gets to be long enough for you to pick up in your hands and weave into a cloth that feels like love itself.
quotes.author: John Gregory Brown

quotes.quote: You, fathers, will understand. You have a little girl. She looks up to you. You're her oracle. You're her hero. And then the day comes when she gets her permanent wave and goes to her first real party, and from that day on, you're in a constant state of panic.
quotes.author: Stanley T. Banks

quotes.quote: I figure if I kill the first one, words will get out.
quotes.author: Charles Barkley

quotes.quote: I look at my little girl and I wonder at what she's going to be and what she's going to do, and what is it that leads girls in certain directions in life. I think a lot of that goes back to what kind of father they had. And so it makes me want to be the best dad I can possibly be.
quotes.author: Jake Owen

quotes.quote: It's a great joy, but no test of love or commitment to take your son to a ball game. You really prove your credentials as a good dad when you are willing to take your daughter shopping—more than once.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: Nothing is dearer to an old father than a father. Sons have spirits of higher pitch, but they are not given fondness.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: True maturity is only reached when a man realizes he has become a father figure to his daughter's girlfriends— and he accepts it.
quotes.author: Larry McMurtry

quotes.quote: You mustn't get aggravated when your old dad calls you baby because he always will think of you as just that— no matter how old or big you may get.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: When a father gives his daughter an emotional visa to strike out on her own, he is always with her. Such a daughter has her encouraging, understanding daddy in her head, cheering her on— not simply as a woman but as a whole, a unique human being with unlimited possibilities.
quotes.author: Victoria Secunda

quotes.quote: Dads are like chocolate chip cookies; they may have chips or be totally nutty, but they are sweet and make the world a better place, especially for their children.
quotes.author: Hillary Lytle

quotes.quote: When a girl reaches adolescence, she looks to her father for approval and love.
quotes.author: Ian Grant

quotes.quote: She is now only a few mos old and at the beginning of it all rolling her eyes for the first time in the world. A dangerous temptation for any father. New to the charms and vanities of parenthood to use her like a glass in which to adore his own image, to act miracles and be a god again.
quotes.author: Laurie Lee

quotes.quote: Fathering is not something perfect men do, but something that perfects the man.
quotes.author: Frank Pittman

quotes.quote: Old as she was, she still missed her daddy sometimes.
quotes.author: Gloria Naylor

quotes.quote: Daddy, thanks for being my hero, chauffeur, financial support, listener, life mentor, friend, guardian, and simply being there every time I need a hug.
quotes.author: Agatha Stephanie Lin

quotes.quote: When my daughter says ‘Daddy I need you!’ I wonder if she has any idea that I need her a billion times more.
quotes.author: Stanley Behrman

quotes.quote: Certain is it that there is no kind of affection so purely angelic as of a father to a daughter. In love to our wives there is desire; to our sons, ambition; but to our daughters, there is something which there are no words to express.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: She did not stand alone, but what stood behind her, the most potent moral force in her life, was the love of her father.
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.quote: One of the greatest things about daughters is how they adored you when they were little; how they rushed into your arms with electric delight and demanded that you watch everything they do and listen to everything they say.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: Daughters always revel in their mothers’ admiration. And daughters always bask in their fathers’ love.
quotes.author: Hendrith Vanlon Smith Jr

quotes.quote: He loved his daughter better even than his pipe, and, like a reasonable man and an excellent father, let her have her way in everything.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: My dear father; my dear friend; the best and wisest man I ever knew, who taught me many lessons and showed me many things as we went together along with the country by-ways.
quotes.author: Sarah Orne Jewett

quotes.quote: Be kind to thy father, for when thou were young, who loved thee so fondly as he? He caught the first accents that fell from thy tongue and joined in thy innocent glee.
quotes.author: Margaret Courtney

quotes.quote: Any astronomer can predict with absolute accuracy just where every star in the universe will be at 11:30 tonight. He can make no such prediction about his teenage daughter.
quotes.author: James T. Adams

quotes.quote: Dads are most ordinary men turned by love into heroes, adventures, storytellers, and singers of songs.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: When Charles first saw our child Mary, he said all the proper things for a new father. He looked upon the poor little red thing and blurted, ‘She’s more beautiful than the Brooklyn Bridge.’
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.quote: Watching your daughter being collected by her date feels like handing over a million-dollar Stradivarius to a gorilla.
quotes.author: Jim Bishop

quotes.quote: I have never been a material girl. My father always told me never to love anything that cannot love you back.
quotes.author: Imelda Marcos

quotes.quote: There's something like a line of gold thread running through a man's words when he talks to his daughter, and gradually over the years, it gets to be long enough for you to pick up in your hands and weave into a cloth that feels like love itself.
quotes.author: John Gregory Brown

quotes.quote: A wedding is for daughters and fathers. The mothers all dress up, trying to look like young women. But a wedding is for a father and daughter. They stop being married to each other on that day.
quotes.author: Sarah Ruhl

quotes.quote: I cannot think of any need in childhood as strong as the need for a father's protection.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The reason why daughters love their Dad the most is, that there is at least one man in the world who will never hurt her.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Behind every great daughter is a truly amazing dad.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Many a man wishes he were strong enough to tear a telephone book in halfâ€•especially if he has a teenage daughter.
quotes.author: Guy Lombardo

quotes.quote: A father is always making his baby into a little woman. And when she is a woman he turns her back again.
quotes.author: Enid Bagnold

quotes.quote: A daddys little girl is the one who would rather get her hands covered in engine oil with dad, than stay in the house and bake buns with her mother!
quotes.author: Mishelly

quotes.quote: When my father didn't have my hand, he had my back.
quotes.author: Linda Poindexter

quotes.quote: My Daddy was my hero. He was always there for me when I needed him. He listened to me and taught me so many things. But most of all he was fun.
quotes.author: Bindi Irwin

quotes.quote: A man's daughter is his heart. Just with feet, walking out in the world.
quotes.author: Mat Johnson

quotes.quote: It was my father who taught me to value myself. He told me that I was uncommonly beautiful and that I was the most precious thing in his life.
quotes.author: Dawn French

quotes.quote: A father's tears and fears are unseen, his love is unexpressed, but his care and protection remains as a pillar of strength throughout our lives.
quotes.author: Ama H. Vanniarachchy

quotes.quote: Old as she was, she still missed her daddy sometimes.
quotes.author: Gloria Naylor

quotes.quote: A girl's first true love is her father.
quotes.author: Marisol Santiago

quotes.quote: I took my daughter to the father-daughter dance and I cried like a little baby. She's 11 years old, so seeing her get dressed up and pretty made me cry.
quotes.author: Kevin Hart

quotes.quote: A son is a son till he gets a wife; a daughter is a daughter for the rest of her life.
quotes.author: Irish Saying

quotes.quote: Marianne had sharp, cold eyes and she was spiteful but her father loved her.
quotes.author: Angela Carter

quotes.quote: To a father growing old, nothing is dearer than a daughter.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: A daughter is a treasure â€“ and a cause of sleeplessness.
quotes.author: Ben Sirach

quotes.quote: There are so many things left to say. But I guess some things are better left unsaid. No matter what you say, I will always be your daddy's lil girl. And you will always be my hero.
quotes.author: Emmy

quotes.quote: No one is able to make the female a queen except her father.
quotes.author: Arab Proverb

quotes.quote: The main reason why a daughter needs a dad is to show her that not all the boys are like the ones who hurt her.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Fathers, be good to your daughters. You are the god and the weight of her world.
quotes.author: John Mayor

quotes.quote: I love being a girl because I'm my Daddy's little girl and that rocks!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I know that throughout my life I have struggled to forgive my father. Now, as I get older, I wish most of all that he had been able to find a way to forgive himself.
quotes.author: Madeleine Thien

quotes.quote: The greatest thing a father can do for his daughter, is to love her mother.
quotes.author: Elaine S. Dalton

quotes.quote: I am not ashamed to say that no man I ever met was my father's equal, and I never loved any other man as much.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: Father-daughter relationships also merit more attention because they are generally more distant and more fragile than other parent-child relationships.
quotes.author: Linda Nielsen

quotes.quote: Active fathers and active father-daughter relationships are a minority, but they comprise a story worth dwelling on.
quotes.author: Linda Nielsen

quotes.quote: Fathers and daughters process information and create memories in ways that are both advantageous and disadvantageous to their relationship.
quotes.author: Linda Nielsen

quotes.quote: Fathers have a profound, lifelong impact on their daughter's well-being and daughters also have a big impact on their fathers.
quotes.author: Linda Nielsen

quotes.quote: When fathers are not getting along well with their daughters, especially if they are growing apart, fathers are more physically stressed, anxious, unhappy, and depressed.
quotes.author: Linda Nielsen

quotes.quote: Every father can make a huge difference in his daughter's life. A father is the first man his daughter knows.
quotes.author: Joe Kelly

quotes.quote: Fathers influence how daughters see themselves. With a father's positive words and support, a daughter can be safe and healthy, and can thrive no matter where life takes her.
quotes.author: Joe Kelly

quotes.quote: A girl whose father listens to and respects her will expect her life partner to listen to her and treat her well.
quotes.author: Joe Kelly

quotes.quote: Fathering a daughter with love and respect ensures she will choose people and situations that nourish her long after she's left our house. There's no greater legacy for us to leave our daughters.
quotes.author: Joe Kelly

quotes.quote: Perhaps every father should be issued a football mouth guard when his daughter is born, since he's liable to spend the next few decades biting his tongue.
quotes.author: Joe Kelly

quotes.quote: He was her father. He was his soldier, her superhero, her defender. She was his offsider, who would walk up to the school gate clutching his hand. Se would confide in him, race to greet him at the end of the day and laugh at every 'dad joke he told.'
quotes.author: Madonna King

quotes.quote: Fathers and daughters: despite everything, it is a relationship built on a certain strain of magic. Father and daughter's bond can be as captivating as it is challenging - and almost impossible to measure.
quotes.author: Madonna King

quotes.quote: There is something special about a father-daughter relationship. Fathers can raise their daughter's academic performance. They can influence, hugely, who they choose as a future partner.
quotes.author: Madonna King

quotes.quote: A good father-daughter relationship can empower daughters to believe in themselves and to prosecute a case with conviction and confidence.
quotes.author: Madonna King

quotes.quote: The absence of a personal father impacts the way a daughter internalize the collective psychological and social norms influencing her identity.
quotes.author: Susan E. Schwartz

quotes.quote: The father's distance can be measured in the psychic space created by his absence. Facing this, she can no longer deny what it is to be without love, regard and importance.
quotes.author: Susan E. Schwartz

quotes.quote: Fathers have incredible influence (positive or negative) on nearly every aspect of their daughter's life. A father sets a huge role model for his daughter regarding the qualities she looks for in a man and the standards she maintains in her relationships.
quotes.author: Rick Johnson

quotes.quote: A father is the first man in her daughter's life and he models how a man should trea a woman, how a man should act, and how a man shows healthy love and affection to a woman.
quotes.author: Rick Johnson

quotes.quote: Father sets the standard for how a daughter feels she deserves to be treated by men.
quotes.author: Rick Johnson

quotes.quote: If a father shows his daughter love, respect, and appreciation for who she is, she will believe that about herself as a woman, no matter what anyone else thinks.
quotes.author: Rick Johnson

quotes.quote: Girls deprived of this father love and affection make poor choices in an effort to fill that void.
quotes.author: Rick Johnson

quotes.quote: Whether or not a father realizes it, a daughter looks to her dad like a traveler looks for a stream in the desert.
quotes.author: John Trent

quotes.quote: Daughter's thought of the perfect men begin with the images received from their fathers during their childhood.
quotes.author: Tina M. Kelly Ph.D.

quotes.quote: Fathers are very important figures in their daughter's lives and make such a difference for the daughters in regards to how other men should treat them.
quotes.author: Tina M. Kelly Ph.D.

quotes.quote: How daughters see themselves are influenced by their fathers.
quotes.author: Tina M. Kelly Ph.D.

quotes.quote: The fathers that listen and respect their daughters will expect others to listen and treat their daughters well.
quotes.author: Tina M. Kelly Ph.D.

quotes.quote: The roles of fathers have been determined to be exceptionally important in the developments of daughter and are acknowledged as playing an essential role in their lives.
quotes.author: Tina M. Kelly Ph.D.

quotes.quote: The father-daughter relationship is a fundamental relationship yet it is one either not adequately developed or, occasionally, almost neglected.
quotes.author: Keshav Patwardhan

quotes.quote: Being a dad is not rocket science. It's a scary responsibility, but it's not complicated. Kids want to be loved. Daughters want to be cherished and they want their fathers near them and involved in their lives.
quotes.author: Byron Forrest Yawn

quotes.quote: There are so many things daughters--deep in life--wished their fathers had told them. So many lessons. There are so many daughters who wish their father filled this space in their life.
quotes.author: Byron Forrest Yawn

quotes.quote: One daffodil is worth a thousand pleasures, then one is too few.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Daffodils are yellow trumpets of spring.
quotes.author: Richard L. Ratliff

quotes.quote: She turned to the sunlight and shook her yellow head, and whispered to her neighbor. Winter is dead.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: A house with daffodils in it is a house lit up, whether or no the sun be shining outside. Daffodils in a green bowl and let it snow if it will.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: She did not look at the daffodils. They didn't mean anything. She looked at the daffodils. She said, Thank you for the daffodils.
quotes.author: Angela K. Smith

quotes.quote: I wonder what spendthrift chose to spill such a bright gold under my window sill! Is it fairy gold? Does it glitter still? Bless me! It is but a daffodil!
quotes.author: Celia Thaxter

quotes.quote: I never saw daffodils so beautiful. They grew among the mossy stones about and above them, some rested their heads upon these stones, as on a pillow, for weariness.
quotes.author: Dorothy Wordsworth

quotes.quote: O fateful flower beside the rill. The Daffodil, the daffodil!
quotes.author: Jean Ingelow

quotes.quote: Young playmates of the rose and daffodil. Be careful ere ye enter in, to fill your baskets high with fennel green, and balm, and golden pines. Savory latter mint and columbines.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: I have seen the Lady April bringing the daffodils, bringing the springing grass and the soft warm April rain.
quotes.author: John Masefield

quotes.quote: To this day I cannot see a bright daffodil, a proud gladiola or a smooth eggplant without thinking of Papa. Like his plants and trees, I grew up as a part of his garden.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: I could hear you, talking to the daffodils and tulips, whispering to the fairies that lived inside their petals. Each separate flower had a different family inside it.
quotes.author: Lucy Christopher

quotes.quote: Flowers always make people better, happier, and more helpful, they are sunshine, food and medicine for the soul.
quotes.author: Luther Burbank

quotes.quote: Flowers have spoken to me more than I can tell in written words. They are the hieroglyphics of angels, loved by all men for the beauty of their character, though few can decipher even fragments of their meaning.
quotes.author: Lydia M. Child

quotes.quote: A daffodil pushing up through the dark earth to the spring, knowing somehow deep in its roots that spring and light and sunshine will come, has more courage and more knowledge of the value of life than any human being I've met.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to be a poppy in a field of daffodils.
quotes.author: Michaela DePrince

quotes.quote: There is a tiny yellow daffodil, the butterfly can see it from a far. Although one summer evening's dew could fill Its little cup twice over, ere the star had called the lazy shepherd to his fold.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Deprivation is for me what daffodils were for Wordsworth.
quotes.author: Philip Larkin

quotes.quote: What daffodils were to Wordsworth, depression is tome.
quotes.author: Philip Larkin

quotes.quote: When I bought my farm, I did not know what a bargain I had in the bluebirds, daffodils and thrushes; as little did I know what sublime mornings and sunsets I was buying.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: She had a beautiful laugh which was like rain water pouring over daffodils made from silver.
quotes.author: Richard Brautigan

quotes.quote: Fair daffodils, we weep to see you haste away so soon. As yet the early rising sun has not attained his noon.
quotes.author: Robert Herrick

quotes.quote: It isn't rain to me, It's raining daffodils. In every dimpled drop I see Wildflowers on distant hills.
quotes.author: Robert Loveman

quotes.quote: You have to do something. If you do something, you become somebody. Even a daffodil does something, has a profession. It gives off scent, professionally.
quotes.author: Stella Adler

quotes.quote: Like daffodils in the early days of spring, my neurons were resprouting receptors as the winter of the illness ebbed.
quotes.author: Susannah Cahalan

quotes.quote: I myself have noticed my growing resemblance to a daffodil.
quotes.author: Tamora Pierce

quotes.quote: Daffodils, that come before the swallow dares, and take the winds of March with beauty.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Then my heart with pleasure fills and dances with the daffodils.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Beside the lake, beneath the trees, fluttering and dancing in the breeze.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Ten thousand saw I at a glance, tossing their heads in sprightly dance.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: We know from daily life that we exist for other people first of all, for whose smiles and well-being our own happiness depends.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Religion is meant to be bread for daily use, not cake for special occasions.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Our daily objectives should include an honest effort to improve on yesterday.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: We die daily. Happy those who daily come to life as well.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: In every day, there are 1,440 minutes. That means we have 1,440 daily opportunities to make a positive impact.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: By transcending our daily reality and embarking on an alternative journey we create an opportunity to taste the many nitty-gritties of life. Going beyond the day-to-day contingencies and the usual concerns, allows us to recognize ourselves better by figuring out the mystery and the anonymity of our surrounding world.
quotes.author: Erik Pevernagie

quotes.quote: There is no daily chore so trivial that it cannot be made important by skipping it two days running.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: It's not the daily increase but daily decrease. Hack away at the unessential.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: In our daily life, we encounter people who are angry, deceitful, intent only on satisfying their own needs. There is so much anger, distrust, greed, and pettiness that we are losing our capacity to work well together.
quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.quote: Daily life is the enemy of greatness.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: The daily practice of gratitude is one of the conduits by which your wealth will come to you.
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: It is only possible to live happily ever after on a daily basis.
quotes.author: Margaret Bonanno

quotes.quote: If your daily life seems poor, do not blame it; blame yourself that you are not poet enough to call forth its riches; for the Creator, there is no poverty.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: The road to daily happiness is not hard to find, it's what we do for others that brings us peace of mind.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: One who daily puts the finishing touches on his life is never in want of time.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: God gives us the ingredients for our daily bread, but he expects us to do the baking!
quotes.author: Chip Ingram

quotes.quote: Don't forget to tell yourself positive things daily! You must love yourself internally to glow externally.
quotes.author: Hannah Bronfman

quotes.quote: The true harvest of my daily life is somewhat as intangible and indescribably as the tints of morning or evening. It is a little star-dust caught, a segment of the rainbow which I have clutched.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: He whose daily life has been a rounded whole, is easy in his mind.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Work is a search for daily meaning, as well as for daily bread.
quotes.author: Studs Terkel

quotes.quote: Daily ripples of excellence -over time- become a tsunami of success .
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Your daily life is your temple and your religion. When you enter into it take with you your all.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: A small daily task, if it be really daily, will beat the labours of a spasmodic Hercules.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: Self-forgiveness is a daily practice of the humble, strong and mentally sane. It is an intentional preservation of inner-peace and a reflection of a healthy self-concept.
quotes.author: Shannon Tanner

quotes.quote: A daisy blooming in a desert is worth more than a rose blossoming in a rainforest.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Human beings are born solitary, but everywhere they are in chains - daisy chains - of interactivity. Social actions are makeshift forms, often courageous, sometimes ridicilous, always strange.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: You have to decide if you're going to wilt like a daisy or if you're just going to go forward and live the life that you've been granted.
quotes.author: Kevin Costner

quotes.quote: Daisies are like sunshine to the ground.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: The splendor of the rose and the whiteness of the lily do not rob the little violet of it's scent nor the daisy of its simple charm. If every tiny flower wanted to be a rose, spring would lose its loveliness.
quotes.author: Therese of Lisieux

quotes.quote: Stars are the daisies the begem the blue fields of the sky.
quotes.author: David Macbeth Moir

quotes.quote: Those fields of daisies we landed on, and dusty fields and desert stretches. Memories of many skies and earths beneath us - many days, many nights of stars.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Daisies infinite Uplift in praise their little growing hands, O'er every hill that under heaven expands.
quotes.author: Ebenezer Elliott

quotes.quote: Daisies smell-less, yet most quaint, And sweet thyme true, Primrose, first born child of Ver, Merry Spring-time's harbinger.
quotes.author: Francis Beaumont

quotes.quote: Even thou who mournst the daisy's fate, That fate is thine--no distant date; Stern Ruin's ploughshare drives, elate, Full on thy bloom, Till crushed beneath the furrow's weight Shall be thy doom!
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: Be careful of words, they can be both daisies and bruises.
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: The daisy, by the shadow that it casts, Protects the lingering dewdrop from the sun.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Their desire was silent yet magnificent, like a thousand daisies attuning their faces toward the path of the sun.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Eugenides

quotes.quote: The love of God toward you is like the Amazon River flowing down to water a single daisy.
quotes.author: F.B. Meyer

quotes.quote: Never a daisy that grows, but a mystery guideth the growing; Never a river that flows, but a majesty scepters the flowing.
quotes.author: Richard Realf

quotes.quote: You can't be sad when Daisy is around, she won't let you.
quotes.author: Maryam Faresh

quotes.quote: In a world full of daisies dare to be a rose.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Daisies that bring you joy are better than roses that bring you sorrow.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Daisy had no idea how to put herself to rights again. But she thought it would be a good thing to stop thinking about herself and do something for someone else.
quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas

quotes.quote: The brief silence that follows is as tender as a rainstorm of daisies.
quotes.author: Mathias Malzieu

quotes.quote: Behold the azure sea in front of you, the turquoise sky above you, the amber mountain beneath your feet, and the golden daisy in your hands. How are you not the richest person on earth?
quotes.author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.quote: Always have something beautiful in sight, even if it's just a daisy in a jelly glass.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: Tread lightly, she is near under snow, speak gently, she can hear the daisies grow.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Daisy was a consciously happy young woman without any of the usual endowments that make for conscious happiness, money apart. She was not pretty, she was not clever, she had no friends, no talents, nor even an imagination to make her think she was happy when she was really miserable. As she was never miserable, she had no need of an imagination.
quotes.author: Laura Riding

quotes.quote: Regret, Daisy knew, was the only confirmation of a well-lived life. If you didn't occasionally go too far, you weren't going anywhere.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: April brings the primrose sweet, / Scatters daisies at our feet.
quotes.author: Sara Coleridge

quotes.quote: There's no dew left on the daisies and clover; there's no rain left in heaven.
quotes.author: Jean Ingelow

quotes.quote: Daisies in water are the longest lasting flower you can give to someone. Fact. Buy daisies. Not roses.
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: To dance is to be out of yourself. Larger, more beautiful, more powerful.. This is power, it is glory on earth and it is yours for the taking
quotes.author: Agnes De Mille

quotes.quote: Dance is the hidden language of the soul of the body.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: Dance is the only art of which we ourselves are the stuff of which it is made.
quotes.author: Ted Shawn

quotes.quote: Dancing is the loftiest, the most moving, the most beautiful of the arts, because it is not mere translation or abstraction from life; it is life itself.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.quote: Dancing faces you towards Heaven, whichever direction you turn.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: When you dance, your purpose is not to get to a certain place on the floor. It's to enjoy each step along the way.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Dance is the movement of the universe concentrated in an individual.
quotes.author: Isadora Duncan

quotes.quote: Dance, when you're broken open. Dance, if you've torn the bandage off. Dance in the middle of the fighting. Dance in your blood. Dance when you're perfectly free.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Dance is your pulse, your heartbeat, your breathing. It's the rhythm of your life. It's the expression in time and movement, in happiness, joy, sadness and envy.
quotes.author: Jaques D'Ambroise

quotes.quote: Dancing is a vertical expression of a horizontal desire.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Dance for yourself. If someone understands, good. If not, no matter. Go right on doing what interests you, and do it until it stops interesting you.
quotes.author: Louis Horst

quotes.quote: You don't enter a dance studio and say "I can't do that." If you do, then why are you in the studio in the first place?
quotes.author: Judith Jamison

quotes.quote: Dancing is wonderful training for girls, it's the first way you learn to guess what a man is going to do before he does it.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: There are short-cuts to happiness, and dancing is one of them.
quotes.author: Vicki Baum

quotes.quote: Dancing can reveal all the mystery that music conceals.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: Dancing is the poetry of the foot.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Dancing is moving to the music without stepping on anyone's toes, pretty much the same as life.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: The dance is a poem of which each movement is a word.
quotes.author: Mata Hari

quotes.quote: Talk about dance? Dance is not something to talk about. Dance is to dance.
quotes.author: Peter Saint James

quotes.quote: To watch us dance is to hear our hearts speak.
quotes.author: Indian Proverb

quotes.quote: They who love dancing too much seem to have more brains in their feet than in their head.
quotes.author: Terence

quotes.quote: Dance isn't something that can be explained in words. It has to be danced.
quotes.author: Paige Arden

quotes.quote: Dance is like wine; it matures with every performance.
quotes.author: Alarmel Valli

quotes.quote: Dance is a song of the body. Either of joy or pain.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: The dance: a minimum of explanation, a minimum of anecdotes, and a maximum of sensations
quotes.author: Maurice Bjart

quotes.quote: Dance is the poetic baring of the soul through motion.
quotes.author: Scott Nilsson

quotes.quote: Dance is like life, it exists as you're flitting through it, and when it's over, it's done.
quotes.author: Jerome Robbins

quotes.quote: Do it big, do it right, and do it with style.
quotes.author: Fred Astaire

quotes.quote: The only reason for mastering technique is to make sure the body does not prevent the soul from expressing itself.
quotes.author: La Meri

quotes.quote: He who cannot dance puts the blame on the floor.
quotes.author: Hindu Proverb

quotes.quote: Those who dance are considered insane by those who can't hear the music.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: To dance, put your hand on your heart and listen to the sound of your soul.
quotes.author: Eugene Louis Faccuito

quotes.quote: I'm not so interested in how they move as in what moves them.
quotes.author: Pina Bausch

quotes.quote: Someone need not be perfect to be a great dancer? Feeling a soul is more important than what the body can do.
quotes.author: Marcia Hayde

quotes.quote: We dance for laughter, we dance for tears, we dance for madness, we dance for fears, we dance for hopes, we dance for screams, we are the dancers, we create the dreams.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I do not try to dance better than anyone else. I only try to to dance better than myself.
quotes.author: Mikhail Baryshnikov

quotes.quote: Dancing begets warmth, which is the parent of wantonness. It is, Sir, the great grandfather of cuckoldom.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: To be fond of dancing was a certain step towards falling in love.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: There is a bit of insanity in dancing that does everybody a great deal of good.
quotes.author: Edwin Denby

quotes.quote: Dance till the stars come down from the rafters Dance, Dance, Dance till you drop.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: Dance, even if you have nowhere to do it but your living room.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Dancing is like bank robbery. It takes split-second timing.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: Nobody cares if you can't dance well. Just get up and dance.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: How can we know the dancer from the dance?
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Dancing with the feet is one thing, but dancing with the heart is another.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Dancing is the world's favorite metaphor.
quotes.author: Kristy Nilsson

quotes.quote: Dancing is silent poetry.
quotes.author: Simonides

quotes.quote: Dance first. Think later. It's the natural order.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: Dance every performance as if it were your last.
quotes.author: Erik Bruhn

quotes.quote: Hand in hand, on the edge of the sand, they danced by the light of the moon.
quotes.author: Edward Lear

quotes.quote: Consciousness expresses itself through creation. This world we live in is the dance of the creator. Dancers come and go in the twinkling of an eye but the dance lives on. On many an occasion when I am dancing, I have felt touched by something sacred. In those moments, I felt my spirit soar and become one with everything that exists.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: Nobody cares if you can’t dance well. Just get up and dance. Great dancers are not great because of their technique, they are great because of their passion.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: Dancing is a perpendicular expression of a horizontal desire.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: To dance is to be out of yourself. Larger, more beautiful, more powerful. This is power, it is glory on earth and it is yours for the taking.
quotes.author: Agnes De Mille

quotes.quote: Every day brings a chance for you to draw in a breath, kick off your shoes, and dance.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: You have to love dancing to stick to it. It gives you nothing back, no manuscripts to store away, no paintings to show on walls and maybe hang in museums, no poems to be printed and sold, nothing but that single fleeting moment when you feel alive.
quotes.author: Merce Cunningham

quotes.quote: In a society that worships love, freedom, and beauty, dance is sacred. It is a prayer for the future, a remembrance of the past and a joyful exclamation of thanks for the present.
quotes.author: Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

quotes.quote: I feel that the essence of dance is the expression of man the landscape of his soul. I hope that every dance I do reveals something of myself or some wonderful thing a human can be.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: You dance love, and you dance joy, and you dance dreams. And I know if I can make you smile by jumping over a couple of couches or running through a rainstorm, then I’ll be very glad to be a song and dance man.
quotes.author: Gene Kelly

quotes.quote: If you’ve got nothing to dance about, find a reason to sing.
quotes.author: Melody Carstairs

quotes.quote: If you look at a dancer in silence, his or her body will be the music. If you turn the music on, that body will become an extension of what you’re hearing.
quotes.author: Judith Jamison

quotes.quote: To live is to be musical, starting with the blood dancing in your veins. Everything living has a rhythm. Do you feel your music?
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: Our biological rhythms are the symphony of the cosmos, music embedded deep within us to which we dance, even when we can’t name the tune.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: It doesn’t matter if I’m off the beat. It doesn’t matter if I’m snapping to the rhythm. It doesn’t matter if I look like a complete goon when I dance. It is my dance. It is my moment. It is mine. And dance I will. Try and stop me. You’ll probably get kicked in the face.
quotes.author: Dan Pearce

quotes.quote: Where words leave off, music begins.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: For I have trained myself and am training myself always to be able to dance lightly in the service of thought
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Life is the dancer and you are the dance.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Let us dance in the sun, wearing wild flowers in our hair.
quotes.author: Susan Polis Schutz

quotes.quote: Life is a dance. Mindfulness is witnessing that dance.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: It’s the heart afraid of breaking that never learns to dance.
quotes.author: Xiaolu Guo

quotes.quote: We should consider every day lost on which we have not danced at least once.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Dance and sing to your music. Embrace your blessings. Make today worth remembering.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The same stream of life that runs through my veins night and day runs through the world and dances in rhythmic measures. It is the same life that shoots in joy through the dust of the earth in numberless blades of grass and breaks into tumultuous waves of leaves and flowers.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: People have asked me why I chose to be a dancer. I did not choose. I was chosen to be a dancer, and with that, you live all your life.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: Let us read, and let us dance; these two amusements will never do any harm to the world.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
quotes.author: Alan W. Watts

quotes.quote: Music produces a kind of pleasure which human nature cannot do without.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Somebody just gave me a shower radio. Thanks a lot. Do you really want music in the shower? I guess there’s no better place to dance than a slick surface next to a glass door.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Music, once admitted to the soul, becomes a sort of spirit, and never dies.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Work like you don’t need the money. Love like you’ve never been hurt. Dance like nobody’s watching.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.quote: The one thing that can solve most of our problems is dancing.
quotes.author: James Brown

quotes.quote: Dancing implies action marked by skill and grace. You may be feeling bad because of the rain in your life, but you can still take action that makes you come alive.
quotes.author: Jerome T. Murphy

quotes.quote: Dancing in the rain is a way of being, a way of flourishing as a leader— and as a human being— in a world brimming with sunny skies and gloomy storms, a buoyant and constructive way of living and leading, which you can learn and put into practice, at least some of the time.
quotes.author: Jerome T. Murphy

quotes.quote: A recognition that sometimes— often — we'll encounter setbacks because heavy downpours will divert us from our priorities.
quotes.author: Jerome T. Murphy

quotes.quote: Instead of seeking shelter from the cloudbursts of stress and strain, consider an alternative approach that allows you to flourish in a stormy weather— indeed, to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Jerome T. Murphy

quotes.quote: Today I resolve to keep in step with the Lord as He shows me how to still sing and dance in the rain— by eliminating the past baggage of insecurities and to simply love.
quotes.author: Joyce Erwing-Chow

quotes.quote: Life and relationship brings heartache but as long as there is pulse, the eternal beat of love that drives us toward purposeful living, all is well with the world.
quotes.author: Kurt Byron Huggins

quotes.quote: Look forward to when the storm is over. Stay close to God. Find a way to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Kyle Jessen

quotes.quote: I wanted it to be about how to cope with the pink, with depression, with loss or whatever the storm may be. It's just not about the storm, it's about finding your own way of coping.
quotes.author: Kyle Jessen

quotes.quote: Let's all march on and plow through our struggles together. Let's all choose faith and roll with the 'bumps in our road'.
quotes.author: Kyle Jessen

quotes.quote: That's what it's about, finding a way to get through it, finding the good in the bad, finding the light in the dark.
quotes.author: Kyle Jessen

quotes.quote: Like turtles, carrying our homes on our backs / We move through this all-too-short span of life / Burdened by the flotsam and jetsam of our past / Seeing things not as they are but as we are.
quotes.author: Marie Trotignon

quotes.quote: I have not been where you have been / Nor have you walked the paths I've known. / Yet in this special time that is ours / We can learn to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Marie Trotignon

quotes.quote: Being optimistic encourages the fact that I have a clear choice about how to respond to or think about events in my life.
quotes.author: Christola Deloris Witherspoon-Brayboy

quotes.quote: The experiences that inflicted the most pain in turn also brought out the most strength and the most profound life lessons; lessons that could only be taught through the endurance of true pain.
quotes.author: Sierra Rainge

quotes.quote: It wasn't until the rain cleared that I realized that there was a purpose even in my pain, I know now that I had to endure certain things in order to shift my perspective, although painful I have learned to embrace the rain; in its presence parts of me have been nourished and in its passing it has brought growth.
quotes.author: Sierra Rainge

quotes.quote: There are many things evil people can take from you. However, they can never steal your ability to laugh and laugh loud.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Some people dance with singing rain; some people get wet with misery and pain.
quotes.author: Debashis Mridha

quotes.quote: When the rain falls you just let it fall and you grin like a madman and you dance with it, because if you can make yourself happy in the rain then you're doing pretty alright in life.
quotes.author: Nick & Norah’s Infinite Playlist

quotes.quote: Anyone who says sunshine brings happiness has never danced in the rain.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass...It's about learning to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Vivian Greene

quotes.quote: Life isn't how you survive the thunderstorm, but how you dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Adam Young

quotes.quote: You can dance in the storm. Don't wait for the rain to be over before because it might take too long. You can can do it now. Wherever you are, right now, you can start, right now; this very moment.
quotes.author: sraelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Life is just learning to dance in the rain - enjoy every drop and enjoy every pain!
quotes.author: Mary Rose Magnaye

quotes.quote: Learn to dance in the storm so when life hands you a stormy weather, you just glide through it.
quotes.author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

quotes.quote: When the rain falls you just let it fall and you grin like a madman and you dance with it, because if you can make yourself happy in the rain then you're doing pretty alright in life
quotes.author: Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist

quotes.quote: It is better to dance in the rain than to sit under a leaking roof.
quotes.author: Vikrant Parsai

quotes.quote: Individuals who have learned to endure and persevere through the storms of hardships are those who can dance in the rain during a storm.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: You are totally wet because, you are dancing in the rain.
quotes.author: Edward Kofi Louis

quotes.quote: Weather is a great metaphor for life sometimes it's good, sometimes it's bad, and there's nothing much you can do about it but carry an umbrella or choose to dance in the rain!
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Danger was the grindstone on which the swordsman whetted his spirit.
quotes.author: Eiji Yoshikawa

quotes.quote: Considering how dangerous everything is, nothing is really very frightening.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: We hope all danger may be overcome; but to conclude that no danger may ever arise would itself be extremely dangerous.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The great danger for family life, in the midst of any society whose idols are pleasure, comfort and independence, lies in the fact that people close their hearts and become selfish.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Danger came in different packages, at different points in a lifetime.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: For danger levels man and brute And all are fellows in their need.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: In danger there is great power.
quotes.author: Agnes Whistling Elk

quotes.quote: There is danger in everything that we do.
quotes.author: Laura Huxley

quotes.quote: The danger of prosperity is that it encourages a false independence.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.quote: Everything is danger, but we pretend that it's not.
quotes.author: Howard Rheingold

quotes.quote: Our anger could become a force of deliverance.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Danger will chase her and she will always greet it with a smile.
quotes.author: R.M Drake

quotes.quote: Danger gleams like sunshine to a brave man's eyes.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: There is danger when a man throws his tongue into high gear before he gets his brain a-going.
quotes.author: C. C. Phelps

quotes.quote: Danger â€” if you meet it promptly and without flinching â€” you will reduce the danger by half. Never run away from anything. Never!
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The danger of having too close deadlines. It could lead you to just accept an avenue that's not quite good enough.
quotes.author: Judith Weir

quotes.quote: Danger confronted properly is not something a man must fear.
quotes.author: Tom Clancy

quotes.quote: Danger, the spur of all great minds.
quotes.author: George Chapman

quotes.quote: Your most dangerous competitors are those that are most like you.
quotes.author: Bruce Henderson

quotes.quote: Danger is when you are split three ways: Your soul goes one way, your mind goes another way and your body goes yet another way.
quotes.author: Yogi Bhajan

quotes.quote: The danger is, you have a formula and you just repeat it.
quotes.author: Martin Parr

quotes.quote: Danger is a very rare commodity in these times, monopolized by intelligence agencies and stuntmen.
quotes.author: William S Burroughs

quotes.quote: The greatest danger occurs at the moment of victory.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: The dangers of life are infinite, and among them is safety.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than outright exposure. The fearful are caught as often as the bold.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The greatest danger for most of us is not that our aim is too high and we miss it, but that it is too low and we reach it.
quotes.author: Michelangelo Buonarroti

quotes.quote: There is a danger in being persuaded before one understands.
quotes.author: Thomas F. Wilson

quotes.quote: Withough danger you cannot go beyond danger.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: When danger or pain press too nearly, they are incapable of giving any delight, and are simply terrible; but at certain distances and with certain modifications, they may be, and they are delightful.
quotes.author: David Shields

quotes.quote: Be aware of danger-but recognize the opportunity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Everything is dangerous, my dear fellow. If it wasn't so, life wouldn't be worth living.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A common danger unites even the bitterest enemies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Your anger against every form of insult and oppression must be out of love.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The danger is in what we codify, commodify, and exploit.
quotes.author: Terry Tempest Williams

quotes.quote: Danger will wink on opportunity.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Any danger spot is tenable if men, brave men, will make it so
quotes.author: John F Kennedy

quotes.quote: That danger which is despised arrives the soonest.
quotes.author: Decimus Laberius

quotes.quote: Some dangers are to be courted--courted and braved as a coy mistress is to be wooed, with all the more vigor as the day makes against us.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: Nobody heeds danger when they're making money.
quotes.author: James Cook

quotes.quote: Dangers bring fears, and fears more dangers bring.
quotes.author: Richard Baxter

quotes.quote: Danger comes on us more speedily when we treat it with contempt.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: The danger is not lest the soul should doubt whether there is any bread, but lest, by a lie, it should persuade itself that it is not hungry.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: There's danger in glorifying negative emotions as fuel for art.
quotes.author: Tavi Gevinson

quotes.quote: Danger hides in beauty and beauty in danger.
quotes.author: Belva Plain

quotes.quote: There is danger in reckless change, but greater danger in blind conservatism.
quotes.author: Henry George

quotes.quote: It is dangerous to exist in the world. To exist is to be threatened. We must live with threats.
quotes.author: Adam Levin

quotes.quote: Danger, if met head on, can be nearly halved.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Fear of danger is ten thousand times more terrifying than danger itself.
quotes.author: Daniel Defoe

quotes.quote: Danger is ever-present in life, more for some than others.
quotes.author: T.I.

quotes.quote: Danger is like wine, it goes to your head.
quotes.author: Madame De Stael

quotes.quote: Danger is next neighbor to security.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: He that fears danger in time seldom feels it.
quotes.author: Turkish proveb

quotes.quote: Dangers come more quickly when despised.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Nothing is so steadfast as to be free of danger from even the weakest person.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: A common danger produces unity.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: When there is no peril in fight, there is no glory in the triumph.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: In skating over thin ice, our safety is in our speed.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Security is when everything is settled when nothing can happen to you; security is the denial of life.
quotes.author: Germaine Greer

quotes.quote: We took risks, we knew we took them; things have come out against us and therefore we have no cause for complaint
quotes.author: Robert Falcon Scott

quotes.quote: Danger levels man and brute, and all are fellows in their need.
quotes.author: Byron

quotes.quote: A timid person is frightened before a danger; a coward during the time; and a courageous person afterward.
quotes.author: Richter

quotes.quote: We should never so entirely avoid danger as to appear irresolute and cowardly; but at the same time, we should avoid unnecessarily exposing ourselves to danger, than which nothing can be more foolish.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Let the fear of a danger be a spur to prevent it; he that fears do not give advantage to the danger.
quotes.author: Quarles

quotes.quote: It is better to meet danger than to wait for it.—He that is on a lee shore, and foresees a hurricane, stands out to sea and encounters a storm to avoid a shipwreck.
quotes.author: Colton

quotes.quote: A man's opinion of danger varies at different times according to his animal spirits and is actuated by considerations which he dares not avow.
quotes.author: Smollet

quotes.quote: It is stupidity rather than courage to refuse to recognize danger when it is close upon you.
quotes.author: Sherlock Holmes

quotes.quote: When in danger or in doubt, run in circles, scream and shout.
quotes.author: Herman Wouk

quotes.quote: Let me not pray to be sheltered from dangers, but to be fearless in facing them. Let me not beg for the stilling of my pain, but for the heart to conquer it.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: You see, there are no pretty pink flowers in the woods at night.
quotes.author: J.K. Franko

quotes.quote: Still, he figured, sometimes you've got to do what you've got to do, and then sometimes you've just got to run like hell after it's done.
quotes.author: Derek Landy

quotes.quote: If a little knowledge is dangerous, where is the man who has so much as to be out of danger?
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: I've always believed the greater danger is not aiming too high, but too low, settling for a bogey rather than shooting for an eagle.
quotes.author: Peter Scott

quotes.quote: Never was anything great achieved without danger.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: No great art has ever been made without the artist having known danger.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Danger breeds best on too much confidence.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: Wherever there is danger, there lurks opportunity; whenever there is an opportunity, there lurks danger. The two are inseparable. They go together.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: In this world, there is always danger for those who are afraid of it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: And there is nothing more dangerous in this world, in any world, than someone calm, clear, and angry.
quotes.author: Audrey Hart

quotes.quote: One cannot answer for his courage when he has never been in danger.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: The most dangerous enemy is not the one who lingers behind you in the shadows, but the one who walks beside you as a friend.
quotes.author: Bianca Scardoni

quotes.quote: The world is a dangerous place to live; not because of the people who are evil, but because of the people who don't do anything about it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The most dangerous ideas in a society are not the ones being argued, but the ones that are assumed.
quotes.author: C S Lewis

quotes.quote: Most dangerous is that temptation that doth good us on to sin to loving virtue.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: It is dangerous to understand new things too quickly.
quotes.author: Josiah Warren

quotes.quote: A nation without humor is not only sad but dangerous.
quotes.author: Abby Aldrich Rockefeller

quotes.quote: There is nothing so difficult or so dangerous as to undertake to change the order of things.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: It is dangerous to be sincere unless you are also stupid.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: There's nothing more dangerous than someone who wants to make the world a better place.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.quote: It's dangerous to get too far from what they identify you with.
quotes.author: Jimmy Rushing

quotes.quote: The most dangerous silence is the one where the impending danger is more silent than the silence there
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: To be right is dangerous, it has ever been the source of all intolerance.
quotes.author: Paul Tournier

quotes.quote: Theories then are dangerous things.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: The most dangerous creation of any society is the man who has nothing to lose.
quotes.author: James A. Baldwin

quotes.quote: Success is dangerous. One begins to copy oneself, and to copy oneself is more dangerous than to copy others. It leads to sterility.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: There is nobody more dangerous than one who has been humiliated, even when you humiliate him rightly.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The world is too dangerous for anything but truth and too small for anything but love.
quotes.author: William Sloane Coffin

quotes.quote: A gun is no more dangerous than a cricket bat in the hands of a madman.
quotes.author: Prince Philip

quotes.quote: The most dangerous negativity comes from ourselves in the form of doubts, fears and unreasonable self-criticisms.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: The most dangerous enemy is that which no one fears.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: The most dangerous enemy is the one who can easily make friends with his potential victims!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The most dangerous thing in the world is to have no purpose.
quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

quotes.quote: Next to power without honor, the most dangerous thing in the world is power without humor.
quotes.author: Eric Sevareid

quotes.quote: The dangerous thing about hate is that it seems so reasonable.
quotes.author: Enid Bagnold

quotes.quote: It is a dangerous thing to have instant access to your emotions.
quotes.author: Dennis Potter

quotes.quote: You can't take away knowledge, and it's dangerous to pretend you never had it.
quotes.author: Cynthia Heimel

quotes.quote: It is dangerous to know, but it is more dangerous not to know.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: The most dangerous enemy in the world is the one you do not recognize.
quotes.author: Tess Gerritsen

quotes.quote: You fear tomorrow: yet yesterday is just as dangerous.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: It is dangerous to be right in matters on which the established authorities are wrong.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: It's dangerous when people are willing to give up their privacy.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: It is a dangerous thing to reform anyone.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It is dangerous, at any time, to multiply sources of weakness.
quotes.author: Lord Acton

quotes.quote: Nothing is as dangerous as a sure thing.
quotes.author: Stanley Kubrick

quotes.quote: The greater the power, the more dangerous the abuse.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The most dangerous flaws are those which are good in moderation.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: The most dangerous thing about power is to employ it where it is not applicable.
quotes.author: David Halberstam

quotes.quote: It is a very dangerous thing to have an idea that you will not practice.
quotes.author: Phyllis Bottome

quotes.quote: The most dangerous liars are those who think they are telling the truth.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It is dangerous to exist in the world. To exist is to be threatened. We must live with threats.
quotes.author: Adam Levin

quotes.quote: Dangerous objects are glamorous places to be.
quotes.author: Jack Goldstein

quotes.quote: Nothing's dangerous if you know what you're doing.
quotes.author: Johnny Unitas

quotes.quote: So dangerous it is for a man to come into the acquisition of great fortune before he matures in virtues and principles.
quotes.author: Paul Bamikole

quotes.quote: Beware of false knowledge; it is more dangerous than ignorance.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The most dangerous moment comes with victory.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: There's nothing so dangerous for anyone who has something to hide as conversation.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Power is dangerous unless you have humility.
quotes.author: Richard J. Daley

quotes.quote: Most dangerous is that temptation that doth goad us on to sin in loving virtue.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: It is more dangerous that even a guilty person should be punished without the forms of law than that he should escape.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: To Taoism that which is absolutely still or absolutely perfect is absolutely dead, for without the possibility of growth and change there can be no Tao. In reality there is nothing in the universe which is completely perfect or completely still; it is only in the minds of men that such concepts exist.
quotes.author: Alan W. Watts

quotes.quote: The hard and mighty lie beneath the ground while the tender and weak dance on the breeze above.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: He who defines himself can't know who he really is. He who has power over others can't empower himself.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Taoists do not look upon meditation as 'practice,' except in the sense that a doctor 'practices' medicine. They have no design to subjugate or alter the universe by force or willpower, for their art is entirely to go along with the flow of things in an intelligent way.
quotes.author: Alan W. Watts

quotes.quote: Trust in human nature is acceptance of the good-and-bad of it, and it is hard to trust those who do not admit their own weakness.
quotes.author: Alan W. Watts

quotes.quote: Great power is worry, and total power is boredom, such that even God renounces it and pretends, instead, that he is people and fish and insects and plants: the myth of the king who goes wandering among his subjects in disguise.
quotes.author: Alan W. Watts

quotes.quote: Doing nothing is better than being busy doing nothing.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: We may be floating on Tao, but there is nothing wrong with steering. If Tao is like a river, it is certainly good to know where the rocks are.
quotes.author: Ming-Dao Deng

quotes.quote: Taoism extols the virtue of flexibility. What survives on earth is what effortlessly adapts to the changing environment and changing circumstances.
quotes.author: Ernie J Zelinski

quotes.quote: Taoism shows us how to deal with life and death by realizing everything here is transitory but its substance is eternal.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Goodness in words creates trust, goodness in thinking creates depth, goodness in giving creates love.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: When a not-doing comes upon you, and there is no reflection of yourself to be found, many things can and will be related back to you as knowledge, yet you have no way of knowing how you assimilated that wisdom.
quotes.author: Lujan Matus

quotes.quote: Man suffers only because he takes seriously what the gods made for fun.
quotes.author: Alan W. Watts

quotes.quote: Lao-tze's Taoism is the exhibition of a way or method of living which men should cultivate as the highest and purest development of their nature.
quotes.author: James Legge

quotes.quote: Taoism means streching your being, becoming both a man and a woman and joining within yourself, to be the heavens themselves, to stretch your awareness beyond the breaking point until all opposites are reconciled within yourself.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: The Tao is hidden, and has no name; but it is the Tao which is skilful at imparting (to all things what they need) and making them complete.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Some people think Taoism means not doing anything, just going on with your life. That has little or nothing to do with Taoism.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Taoism is the profoundest nonconformism that has ever been evolved anywhere in the world, at any time in history; essentially it is rebellion.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Embrace simplicity. Put others first. Desire little.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: All of Chinese thinking - Confucianism, Taoism, as well as Buddhism - contains the idea that in the course of life, man will shape harmoniously those psychic and physical predispositions that he received as capital assets by unifying them and giving them form from within a center.
quotes.author: Richard Wilhelm

quotes.quote: Lao Tsu found Taoism easy to reconcile withthe world of human beings, which is interesting because with all the nature imagery, one might think it was in some way antithetical to contempory life.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Taoism is the way of water. The most frequent element or symbol refered to in Lao Tzu's wrtings is the symbol of water.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Taoism has no rules. It's a suggestion for preceiving life in its wholeness, without unnessary categorization, yet enjoying the beauty of categorization.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: The essence of Taoism is really expressed by these few words. Taoism is the way of the child, the way of the fool, the way of someone who doesn't need to be noticed.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Taoism is not a religion, although perhaps it has been made into one by some people. Lao Tsu's way of life occurs in any spiritual philosophy.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: But the basic Taoism that we are concerned with here is simply a particular way of appreciating, learning from, and working with whatever happens in everyday life.
quotes.author: Benjamin Hoff

quotes.quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everybody will respect you.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Be Content with what you have; rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: He who is in harmony with the Tao is like a newborn child. Its bones are soft, its muscles are weak, but its grip is powerful.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Taoism is the gentle way. The path of least resistence.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Taoism is simply the complete acceptance of yourself as you are right in this moment.
quotes.author: Sheila M. Burke

quotes.quote: You must let what happens happen. Everything must be equal in your eyes, good and evil, beautiful and ugly, foolish and wise.
quotes.author: Michael Ende

quotes.quote: Taoism is a way of liberation, which never comes by means of revolution, since it is notorious that most revolutions establish worse tyrannies than they destroy.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: People who don't take risks generally make about two big mistakes a year. People who do take risks generally make about two big mistakes a year.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Allow yourself to be inspired. Allow yourself to succeed. Dare to excel.
quotes.author: Vince Dente
