quotes.quote: You may not know where you're going, but so long as you spread your wings the winds will carry you.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: To dare is to lose one's footing momentarily. Not to dare is to lose oneself.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Hope lies in dreams, in imagination, and in the courage of those who dare to make dreams into reality.
quotes.author: Jonas Salk

quotes.quote: He that cannot reason is a fool. He that will not is a bigot. He that dare not is a slave.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: It often requires more courage to dare to do right than to fear to do wrong.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Don't dare to be different, dare to be yourself - if that doesn't make you different then something is wrong.
quotes.author: Laura Baker

quotes.quote: Who dares nothing, need hope for nothing.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: A person needs a little madness, or else they never dare cut the rope and be free.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: Dare to err and to dream. Deep meaning often lies in childish plays.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: Take a chance! All life is a chance. The man who goes farthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Dare to be a fool in the face of impossibilities.
quotes.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quotes.quote: It is impossible to win the race unless you venture to run, impossible to win the victory unless you dare to battle.
quotes.author: Richard M. DeVos

quotes.quote: This is no time for ease and comfort. It is time to dare and endure.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: He who knows how to suffer everything can dare everything.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: Dare to be true. Nothing can need a lie: a fault which needs it most, grows two thereby.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Everything you dare in life reveals the giant in you.
quotes.author: Topsy Gift

quotes.quote: In order to conquer, what we need is to dare, still to dare, and always to dare.
quotes.author: Georges Danton

quotes.quote: What a man dares to do, he should dare to confess- unless he is a coward.
quotes.author: Rafael Sabatini

quotes.quote: One must work and dare if one really wants to live.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

quotes.quote: Dare to wear the foolish clown face.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: We must dare, and dare again, and go on daring.
quotes.author: Georges Jacques Danton

quotes.quote: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare, it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The only dare you ever want to take is the dare to be all that you can be.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: When somebody challenges you, fight back. Be brutal, be tough.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: We become strong by embracing vulnerability, we dare more greatly when we acknowledge our fear.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.quote: You must have long-range goals to keep you from being frustrated by short-range failures.
quotes.author: Charles C. Noble

quotes.quote: We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Trust your own instinct. Your mistakes might as well be your own, instead of someone else's.
quotes.author: Billy Wilder

quotes.quote: To dare to dream in the midst of adversity, in the midst of failure, in the midst of complacency, is to have hope.
quotes.author: Dani Johnson

quotes.quote: We no longer dare to believe in beauty and we make of it a mere appearance in order the more easily to dispose of it.
quotes.author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quotes.quote: Don't dare a person who has nothing else left to lose.
quotes.author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips

quotes.quote: Dare to be the best you can at all times, dare to be!
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: There are many who dare not kill themselves for fear of what the neighbours will say.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: Don't you dare underestimate the power of your own instinct.
quotes.author: Barbara Corcoran

quotes.quote: Dare to be honest and fear no labor.
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: Fortune helps those who dare.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: Admire those who attempt great things—even if they fail.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Who dares nothing, need hope for nothing.
quotes.author: Friedrich von Schiller

quotes.quote: Attacking is the only secret. Dare and the world always yields; or if it beats you sometimes, dare it again, and it will succumb.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: Take a chance! All life is a chance. The man who goes the furthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Far better it is to dare mighty things, to win glorious triumphs, even though checkered by failure...than to rank with those poor spirits who neither enjoy much nor suffer much, because they live in a gray twilight that knows not victory nor defeat.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If you are never scared or embarrassed or hurt, it means you never take chances.
quotes.author: Julia Soul

quotes.quote: I speak the truth, not so much as I would, but as much as I dare; and I dare a little the more, as I grow older
quotes.author: Montaigne

quotes.quote: A person needs a little madness, or else they never dare cut the rope and be free.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: Dare to dream. Dare to fail. dare to make a few mistakes along the way. And most of all, dare to reach out your hand into the darkness, to pull another hand into the light. Because when you do, you'll find that it's your own hand.
quotes.author: Peter J. Smith

quotes.quote: Do that which is assigned to you, and you cannot hope too much or dare too much.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Self-esteem must be earned, When you dare to dream, dare to follow that dream, dare to suffer through the pain, sacrifice, self-doubts, and friction from the world, you will genuinely impress yourself.
quotes.author: Laura Schlessinger

quotes.quote: He most prevails who nobly dares.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: No one reaches a high position without daring.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: I am totally unaware / Not because I can't dare / I am not ignorant too / But not willing to pass through.
quotes.author: Hasmukh Mehta

quotes.quote: Yesterday I dared to struggle. Today I dare to win.
quotes.author: Bernadette Devlin

quotes.quote: Most people live and die with their music still unplayed. They never dare to try.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: That's the key to becoming successful in this industry: to dare and to not be afraid.
quotes.author: Natti Natasha

quotes.quote: If you have a dream, don't just sit there. Gather courage to believe that you can succeed and leave no stone unturned to make it a reality.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: I dare do all that may become a man; / Who dares do more, is none.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The most important thing in life is to dare. The most complicated thing in life is to be afraid. The smartest thing in the world is to try to be a moral person.
quotes.author: Shimon Peres

quotes.quote: If you see yourself as a man, no one will dare to see you as a kid.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: Dare to be yourself. A life that you live as the best version of yourself is the justice done towards your existence.
quotes.author: Purvi Raniga

quotes.quote: To become a better you, hurry up and take risks.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Dare and the world always yields.
quotes.author: Terry O'Reilly

quotes.quote: Our vision is narrowed by the fear of what we might see if we dare to look when what we should fear is what we might miss if we don't.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: If we dare the difficult, we shall find the depth of being.
quotes.author: Laila Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Think about how audacious it is to really believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Debbie Ford

quotes.quote: Daring ideas are like chessmen moved forward. They may be beaten, but they may start a winning game.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Daring greatly is being brave and afraid every minute of the day at the exact same time.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Dare to courageous in life.You have nothing to lose.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Daring to wear something different takes effort.
quotes.author: Miuccia Prada

quotes.quote: A single feat of daring can alter the whole conception of what is possible.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: Daring greatly means the courage to be vulnerable. It means to show up and be seen. To ask for what you need. To talk about how you're feeling. To have the hard conversations
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Dare to make it to heaven and in doing so, carry many people along! Be a soul winner!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: All daring and courage, all iron endurance of misfortune-make for a finer, nobler type of manhood
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Daring is the price of progress. All splendid conquests are the prize of boldness, more or less.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Daring a greater life is a divine act.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Daring to set boundaries is about having the courage to love ourselves, even when we risk disappointing others.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Be daring to push your ideas forward.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Daring also means to act, however, and if you are not willing to act, then you have already lost the game.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Daring soul has five diaries; gratitude, work, inspirational, prayer and language diaries.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Every daring attempt to make a great change in existing conditions, every lofty vision of new possibilities for the human race, has been labeled Utopian.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: If you are daring, no one can stop you.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Keep your heart and mind steady on your dreams. Ask God for guidance and wisdom to help you fulfill your dreams.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The most daring thing is to be yourself and to do exactly what you want to do at that point in time and not to be worried with what other people are doing or what's popular.
quotes.author: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.quote: The power of daring anything their fancy suggest, as always been conceded to the painter and the poet.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: People should always force themselves to do daring things.
quotes.author: Gordon Forbes

quotes.quote: In crises the most daring course is often safest.
quotes.author: Henry Kissinger

quotes.quote: Daring to dream means daring to live.
quotes.author: Robert H Schuller

quotes.quote: Be daring, be different, be impractical, be anything that will assert integrity of purpose and imaginative vision against the play-it-safers, the creatures of the commonplace, the slaves of the ordinary.
quotes.author: Cecil Beaton

quotes.quote: Daring to make a difference in today's youth-one page at a time.
quotes.author: William SawyersW

quotes.quote: Daring enthusiasm And abiding cheerfulness Can accomplish everything on earth Without fail.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: Daring to me is having courage; it's a daily meditation to take breath and find strength.
quotes.author: Uma Thurman

quotes.quote: Be audacious and cunning in your plans, firm and persevering in their execution, determined to find a glorious end.
quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

quotes.quote: Daring to dream what is deepest in our collective longings is what makes us most human and fully alive.
quotes.author: Wendy Wright

quotes.quote: Who has a daring eye tell downright truths and downright lies.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: A show of daring oft conceals great fear.
quotes.author: Lucan

quotes.quote: All glory comes from daring to begin
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Deep into that darkness peering, long I stood there, wondering, fearing, doubting, dreaming dreams no mortal ever dared to dream before.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Someone I loved once gave me a box full of darkness. It took me years to understand that this too, was a gift.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: Look at how a single candle can both defy and define the darkness.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Darkness approaches from outside.I feel no light inside me strong enough to resist it.
quotes.author: Christopher Pike

quotes.quote: There isn't enough darkness in all the world to snuff out the light of one little candle.
quotes.author: Robert Alden

quotes.quote: Darkness of slumber and death, forever sinking and sinking.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Fear grows in darkness; if you think there's a bogeyman around, turn on the light.
quotes.author: Dorothy Thompson

quotes.quote: In darkness one may be ashamed of what one does, without the shame of disgrace
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: You can't study the darkness by flooding it with light.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: In the Darkness, who would answer for the color of a rose, Or the vestments of the May moth and the pilgrimage it goes?
quotes.author: Nathalia Crane

quotes.quote: I wake to a Darkness in which I must follow myself endlessly, hating the I who so eternally pursues and confronts me. If we could rise from our misery, seek each other once more, and find again the solace of each other's lips and eyes.
quotes.author: Malcolm Lowry

quotes.quote: The depth of darkness to which you can descend and still live is an exact measure of the height to which you can aspire to reach.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: If I must die, I will encounter darkness as a bride, And hug it in mine arms.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I have learned things in the dark that I could never have learned in the light, things that have saved my life over and over again, so that there is really only one logical conclusion. I need darkness as much as I need light.
quotes.author: Barbara Brown Taylor

quotes.quote: My darkness has been filled with the light of intelligence, and behold, the outer day-lit world was stumbling and groping in social blindness
quotes.author: Hellen Keller

quotes.quote: Dark, dark! The horror of darkness, like a shroud, wraps me and bears me on through mist and cloud.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Truly, it is in the darkness that one finds the light, so when we are in sorrow, then this light is nearest of all to us
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: From the world of darkness I did loose demons and devils in the power of scorpions to torment.
quotes.author: Charles Manson

quotes.quote: When darkness falls, beauty is lit from within.
quotes.author: Johnathan Jena

quotes.quote: I said to my soul, be still, and wait...So the darkness shall be the light, and the stillness the dancing.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: A stranger's soul is like a dark forest.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: Darkness and night are mothers of thought.
quotes.author: Dutch Proverb

quotes.quote: It was the possibility of darkness that made the day seem so bright.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Only in the darkness can you see the stars.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Darkness is to space what silence is to sound; i.e., the interval.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Monsters are real, and ghosts are real too. They live inside us, and sometimes, they win.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as darkness; only a failure to see.
quotes.author: Malcolm Muggeridge

quotes.quote: Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to suffering
quotes.author: Yoda

quotes.quote: I'll make that darkness show me the way.
quotes.author: Daisuke Watanabe

quotes.quote: What is light without dark?
quotes.author: William Hjortsberg

quotes.quote: I need to figure out a way to lift the darkness and break whatever's binding these people to that planet.
quotes.author: Jerry Siegel

quotes.quote: Only after he found the strength to turn away from the darkness, even though that meant turning away from his father.
quotes.author: Jerry Siegel

quotes.quote: Forsake the darkness you once embraced, or the light will find no hold. Vanquish the dark knight! You and he are one no more!
quotes.author: Yuri Lowenthal

quotes.quote: You don't see it. The darkness is the past. And you hold onto it. You dwell. You punish yourself and everyone around you for past mistakes.
quotes.author: Jerry Siegel

quotes.quote: But Felicity, I'm telling you that the only way I know how to fight the darkness is to be darkness. That is why I left, and I don't wanna be that type of person anymore.
quotes.author: Greg Berlanti

quotes.quote: You must bear your privations and hardships bravely.
quotes.author: Charles Beaumont

quotes.quote: Adventure is just hardship with an inflated sense of self.
quotes.author: Jenji Kohan

quotes.quote: I became a marine for the hardship, to be hammered on the anvil of life. I told myself I can pass any test a man can pass.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.quote: Nobody's really happy. And as soon as society realises that you can't trust anyone and that hardship is a natural part of existence, the sooner the therapists will realise that they are worthless.
quotes.author: Brian Hargrove

quotes.quote: Our membership has its pleasure, its hardship, and sometimes its pain.
quotes.author: John Pogue

quotes.quote: The room is dark, but our eyes gradually adjust to the darkness.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: All you can do is go on living alone down there in the darkness.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Since that is the only Voice Jesus listened to, he was a light into a world where darkness seems to exist.
quotes.author: Gene Skaggs Jr

quotes.quote: You cannot maintain the illusion of loneliness if you are not alone.
quotes.author: Gene Skaggs Jr

quotes.quote: The light becomes ours, and you cannot abide in darkness any more than darkness can abide wherever you go.
quotes.author: Gene Skaggs Jr

quotes.quote: You were in the darkness until God's Will was done completely by any part of the Sonship.
quotes.author: Gene Skaggs Jr

quotes.quote: When God said, 'Let there be light,' there was light. Can you find light by analyzing darkness as the psychotherapist does, or like the theologian, by acknowledging darkness in yourself and looking for a distant light to remove it.
quotes.author: Gene Skaggs Jr

quotes.quote: Darkness succeeds painting the Moon as black for a day but that doesn't stop the Moon to peel of the black paint and glow again.
quotes.author: Sandeep Ravidutt Sharma

quotes.quote: Darkness craves to meet the light and is eager to see wonderful world.
quotes.author: Sandeep Ravidutt Sharma

quotes.quote: Attract light not to thwart the darkness but to illuminate your path.
quotes.author: Sandeep Ravidutt Sharma

quotes.quote: Focus on the cloud of positivity and you can ignore the dark and gloomy nature of mankind.
quotes.author: Sandeep Ravidutt Sharma

quotes.quote: Without struggle, there would be no triumph.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: All those struggles you've been through, those times when everything seemed hopeless, when you didnt know how to continue on. They made you stronger, wiser, and better.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Love the struggle because it makes you appreciate your accomplishments.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Love challenges because they make you stronger.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Don't be negative about negativity. Don't sit in the dark with them. Turn on the light.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Do not be anxious about anything but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving, let your requests be know to God. And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hears and your minds in Christ Jesus.
quotes.author: Porchia Danielle

quotes.quote: The choice is ours. We can either continue to let worry control us or control our worry.
quotes.author: Porchia Danielle

quotes.quote: Some people fear the darkness of night when they should fear the darkness of the human heart.
quotes.author: P.W. Imel

quotes.quote: Tis not the darkness of the night one should fear but the darkness of our minds that should terrify us.
quotes.author: P.W. Imel

quotes.quote: When the darkness of death closes in, then you'll see the light.
quotes.author: P.W. Imel

quotes.quote: Do not fail in life, do not disappoint yourself, seek to know the hidden treasures of life; and you will live longer than your ancestors.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: When the bitterness of life covers a man, his sweet words become very bitter to his people.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: Sometimes life is hard. How do you hang on when things seem hopeless? You can tackle your problems as you would climb a mountain.
quotes.author: Andrew Matthews

quotes.quote: Through hard times. It puts your life into perspective. It will get you back on track.
quotes.author: Andrew Matthews

quotes.quote: Fruitful times are waiting those who are patient in the hard times.
quotes.author: Jonathan H. Wilson

quotes.quote: When things get really hard, people pray.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: Those who do not have worthy struggles in their lives neve enjoy the pleasure of celebrating a hard-won victory.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: Hard times spreading just like the flu / Watch out homeboy, don't let it catch you
quotes.author: Joseph Simmons

quotes.quote: Prices go up, don't let your pocket go down / When you got short money you're stuck on the ground
quotes.author: Joseph Simmons

quotes.quote: Hard times are coming to your town / So stay alert, don't let them get you down.
quotes.author: Joseph Simmons

quotes.quote: They tell you times are tough, you hear that times are hard / But when you work for that ace you know you pulled the right card
quotes.author: Joseph Simmons

quotes.quote: The hard times are dead and gone / But the hard times have made me strong.
quotes.author: Christopher Bridges

quotes.quote: Hard times have made me see / That the hard times ain't where I wanna be
quotes.author: Christopher Bridges

quotes.quote: Well, I recall days in the city / And I think back, 'Oh what a pity' / Remembering how it wasn't pretty / Every day life in the city
quotes.author: Christopher Bridges

quotes.quote: Out in the street we had to take it / With friends around, couldn't it / What wasn't there, we had to make it / Hanging out down in the city
quotes.author: Christopher Bridges

quotes.quote: Hard times / Blue and sad / Don't you cross the line / Run, run make it fun / Freeing up the time
quotes.author: Malcolm Mitchell

quotes.quote: Cause hard times they come and they go / Most of the time they're in the middle of the road / It's the same pain in different ways / Don't your know, Son, when it pours it rains
quotes.author: Ryan Bingham

quotes.quote: Dating is pressure and tension. What is a date, really, but a job interview that lasts all night?
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: The most difficult part of dating is the initial invitation.
quotes.author: Janell Carroll

quotes.quote: Dating is different when you get older. You're not as trusting, or as eager to get back out there and expose yourself to someone.
quotes.author: Toni Braxton

quotes.quote: Dating is a numbers game, and online dating has the best odds.
quotes.author: Judsen Culbreth

quotes.quote: Dating is probably the most important aspect of a single person's life.
quotes.author: Linda Sunshine

quotes.quote: Dating is about finding out who you are and who others are. If you show up in a masquerade outfit, neither is going to happen.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: Dating is a battleground filled with deception and infidelity.
quotes.author: Andrew S. Trees

quotes.quote: Dating is about casting a wide net. It's about having faith that there is someone out there for you and knowing you can help him find you.
quotes.author: Laura Doyle

quotes.quote: Dating is more than a cup of coffee and less than signing a lease.
quotes.author: Sharon Romm

quotes.quote: Dating with no intent to marry is like going to the grocery store with no money. You either leave unhappy or take something that isn't yours.
quotes.author: Jefferson Bethke

quotes.quote: Successful dating is not a destination, but rather it is a journey. This journey can either continue as marriage or friendship.
quotes.author: Noah Mitchell

quotes.quote: Date someone who would still be your favorite person to be around even if there was nothing physical in your relationship.
quotes.author: Soft Grung

quotes.quote: Dating is a give and take. If you only see it as taking, you are not getting it.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: Dating is like searching for the perfect wine. One date is too fruity, another too dry, and still another too much bouquet cologne overdose. But once you find the perfect variety that suits your taste, get drunk.
quotes.author: Katie Kosko

quotes.quote: Dating is like using the treadmill. If you don't do it often enough, you might as well not do it at all.
quotes.author: Beverly Grossman

quotes.quote: Dating is really hard because everyone puts on a front. It's really difficult to see who is who, so it is important to be yourself.
quotes.author: Brooke Burke

quotes.quote: Never let a fool kiss you, or a kiss fool you.
quotes.author: Joey Adams

quotes.quote: Dating is about finding out who you are and who others are. If you show up in a masquerade outfit, neither is going to happen.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: In its purest form, dating is auditioning for mating (and auditioning means we may or may not get the part).
quotes.author: Joy Browne

quotes.quote: Dating is a battleground filled with deception and infidelity.
quotes.author: Andrew S. Trees

quotes.quote: Dating is really all about sex. In the conventional context, this means that the man invites the woman to go through a social encounter, the ultimate purpose of which is sexual engagement.
quotes.author: Alexander Mccall Smith

quotes.quote: Dating is a give and take. If you only see it as "taking," you are not getting it.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: Everybody knows the pressure of a first date: Searching for that perfect outfit. Hunting for ways to be engaging. Dissecting each detail when it's over to check for mistakes. Dating can make even the most confident person lose his cool.
quotes.author: Kelly Starling

quotes.quote: Dating a girl with a guy best friend is never easy.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Internet dating is the fastest, most efficient way to gather a pool of qualified candidates. It could take you a lifetime to do the investigation that the computer comes up with in seconds.
quotes.author: Judsen Culbreth

quotes.quote: Online dating is just as murky and full of lemons as finding a used car in the classifieds. Once you learn the lingo, it's easier to spot the models with high mileage and no warranty.
quotes.author: Laurie Perry

quotes.quote: There is so much hurt in this game of searching for a mate, of testing, trying. And you realize suddenly that you forgot it was a game, and turn away in tears.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: Dating should be less about matching outward circumstances than meeting your inner necessity.
quotes.author: Mark Amend

quotes.quote: Whenever I date a guy, I think, "Is this the man I want my children to spend their weekends with?"
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: Never date a woman you can hear ticking.
quotes.author: Mark Patinkin

quotes.quote: Dating an ex is the equivalent of failing a test you already had the answers to.
quotes.author: Kendrick Cole

quotes.quote: Dating is different when you get older. You're not as trusting, or as eager to get back out there and expose yourself to someone.
quotes.author: Toni Braxton

quotes.quote: Every time you date someone with an issue that you have to work to ignore, you're settling.
quotes.author: Andre Breton

quotes.quote: Employees make the best dates. You don't have to pick them up and they're always tax-deductible.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: Date someone because you already see a future, not because you want to see if you would work out.
quotes.author: Sarah Moores

quotes.quote: A person's readiness to date is largely a matter of maturity and environment.
quotes.author: Dr. Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: Well, dating has become a sport and not about finding the person you love.
quotes.author: Rashida Jones

quotes.quote: Dating is really hard because everyone puts on a front. It's really difficult to see who is who, so it is important to be yourself.
quotes.author: Brooke Burke

quotes.quote: Dating now is a lot like going shopping when you don't have any money. Even if you find the right thing, you can't do anything about it.
quotes.author: Joshua Harris

quotes.quote: People tend to look at dating sort of like a safari - like they're trying to land the trophy.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: Dating is all about the chase. It's fun!
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.quote: Dating someone on the opposite end of the happy spectrum teaches you an incredible amount of patience.
quotes.author: Chris Pine

quotes.quote: Dating someone exclusively for four months in New York is like four years in Anchorage.
quotes.author: Zack Love

quotes.quote: Dating a man is like flying a kite. You only need to know when to wind up the string or let it out.
quotes.author: Jenna Alatari

quotes.quote: You didn't date someone to change him. You dated him because you wanted him for the way he was. Flaws and fears and all.
quotes.author: Jean Oram

quotes.quote: Basically, dating is like climbing a volcano and you never know when it's going to erupt, dumping molten lava and burning you.
quotes.author: Robin Bielman

quotes.quote: To be happy with a man, you must understand him a lot and love him a little. To be happy with a woman you must love her a lot and not try to understand her at all.
quotes.author: Helen Rowlnad

quotes.quote: When you've exhausted the traditional dating channels of casual bar encounters and awkward exchanges at the grocery store, the option of online dating is a ray of hope in an otherwise desolate field of desperation and loneliness.
quotes.author: Alfred Jarry

quotes.quote: Before you enter into the world of online dating, be prepared with what to say in case your date looks less the pictures you saw online and moe like a sunburned walrus.
quotes.author: Alfred Jarry

quotes.quote: It's afterward you realize that the feeling of happiness you had with a man didn't necessarily prove that you loved him.
quotes.author: Marguerite Duras

quotes.quote: And I shall find some girl perhaps, and a better one than you. With eyes as wise, but kindlier, and lips as soft, but true, and I daresay she will do.
quotes.author: Rupert Brooke

quotes.quote: Watching your daughter being collected by her date feels like handing over a $1 million Stradivarius to a gorilla.
quotes.author: Jim Bishop

quotes.quote: Sometimes I wonder if men and women really suit each other. Perhaps they should live next door and just visit now and then.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: Men will sleep with women they wouldn't date, and women will date men they wouldn't sleep with.
quotes.author: Rebecca Christian

quotes.quote: I know we've only just met, but I have the feeling that I've known you all my life because every little thing you do drives me up the wall.
quotes.author: Dan Piraro

quotes.quote: I'm afraid of dating. When the guy shows up at the door, I give him my purse and beg him not to hurt me.
quotes.author: Maria Bamford

quotes.quote: I'm dating a homeless woman. It's easier to get her to stay over.
quotes.author: Gary Shandling

quotes.quote: My biggest problem with dating is that I have no game. Some women can just bat their eyes and men come running. The men just keep popping up one after another. It's like they have a magical man-filled Pez dispenser.
quotes.author: Lori Giarnella

quotes.quote: Opposites attract— and then aggravate.
quotes.author: Joy Browne

quotes.quote: Everyone knows that dating in your thirties is not the happy-go-lucky free-for-all it was when you were twenty-two.
quotes.author: Helen Fielding

quotes.quote: Dating a grad student was like making hurried-up popcorn: lots of butter, high heat, instant noise.
quotes.author: Will Weaver

quotes.quote: Dating, after all is still about two people who are interested in one another and want to get together at a specific time and place.
quotes.author: Joy Browne

quotes.quote: Dating requires a leap of faith that the two of you can have a good time together for an hour or two.
quotes.author: Joy Browne

quotes.quote: Dating is an emotional experience. You're vulnerable. You're letting someone you barely know see the real you.
quotes.author: Joy Browne

quotes.quote: A date may be just a pleasant coming together; a way of saying thank you for a favor, or it may be a delicate step in a courtship and mating dance.
quotes.author: Rebecca Sharp Colmer

quotes.quote: But the one thing that says it all about dating is: it is about communication.
quotes.author: Rebecca Sharp Colmer

quotes.quote: The bottomline is that dating is supposed to be fun and enjoyable. Maybe a few butterflies will flutter in your tummy but that is part of the thrill of dating.
quotes.author: Rebecca Sharp Colmer

quotes.quote: Dating is something you do before making binding choices or exclusive commitments.
quotes.author: Rebecca Sharp Colmer

quotes.quote: “To say that one waits a lifetime for his soulmate to come around is a paradox. People eventually get sick of waiting, take a chance on someone, and by the art of commitment become soulmates, which takes a lifetime to perfect.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: You know, the man of my dreams might walk round the corner tomorrow. I'm older and wiser and I think I'd make a great girlfriend. I live in the realm of romantic possibility.
quotes.author: Stevie Nicks

quotes.quote: “Better to put your heart on the line, risk everything, and walk away with nothing than play it safe. Love is a lot of things, but “safe” isn't one of them.”
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Don't look for a partner who is eye candy. Look for a partner who is soul food.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: Dating is like searching for the perfect wine. One date is too fruity, another too dry, and still another too much bouquet (cologne overdose). But once you find the perfect variety that suits your taste, get drunk.
quotes.author: Katie Kosko

quotes.quote: Everything he does while you're dating is like a crystal ball predicting what he's going to be like after you're married. If you don't like a habit of his, honey, unless you fix it before the altar, it's there to stay.
quotes.author: Bethany Jett

quotes.quote: Dating with no intent to marry is like going to the grocery store with no money. You either leave unhappy or take something that isn't yours.
quotes.author: Jefferson Bethke

quotes.quote: Dating is like trying to make a meal out of leftovers. Some leftovers actually get better when they've had a little time to mature. But others should be thrown out right away, No matter how you try to warm them up, they're never as good as when they were new.
quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas

quotes.quote: A daughter is a bundle of firsts that excite and delight, giggles that come from deep inside and are always contagious, everything wonderful and precious and your love for her knows no bounds.
quotes.author: Barbara Cage

quotes.quote: A daughter is the happy memories of the past, the joyful moments of the present, and the hope and promise of the future.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: No matter how many birthdays come and go, you'll always be my little girl.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote:
For a dear daughter
Here's a wish for happiness
And many dreams come true
Not only on your special day
But always, all life through
Happy Birthday
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: My daughter is my greatest inspiration.
quotes.author: Whitney Houston

quotes.quote: A daughter is a miracle that never ceases to be miraculousâ€¦full of beauty and forever beautifulâ€¦loving and caring and truly amazing.
quotes.author: Deanna Beisser

quotes.quote: Our life's pride and our never-ending happiness is what you are our dear little princess. Happy Birthday.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A daughter is a treasure â€“ and a cause of sleeplessness.
quotes.author: Ben Sirach

quotes.quote: A daughter is one of the most beautiful gifts this world has to give.
quotes.author: Laurel Atherton

quotes.quote: If you remember yourself, you will remember me. I am always a part of you. I am your mother.
quotes.author: Emma Michaels

quotes.quote: A mother's treasure is her daughter.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Daughters are like sugar. Too much of them will make the taste of life even better, but too little of them will make life tasteless. You make our life worth living dear daughter. Happy Birthday.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One of the greatest gifts I've ever gotten is my daughter.
quotes.author: Ace Frehley

quotes.quote: A daughter may outgrow your lap, but she will never outgrow your heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: What I wanted most for my daughter was that she be able to soar confidently in her own sky, whatever that may be.
quotes.author: Helen Claes

quotes.quote: You are like that dewdrop which rests on a green leaf. You are beautiful like a flower. Calmness generates in the heart of those who see you. Happy Birthday sweet daughter.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Our daughters are the most precious of our treasures, the dearest possessions of our homes and the objects of our most watchful love.
quotes.author: Margaret E. Sangster

quotes.quote: A daughter is the happy memories of the past, the joyful moments of the present, and the hope and promise of the future. Happy Birthday to a wonderful Daughter.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A daughter is a little girl who grows up to be a friend.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The happiest moment of my life was probably when my daughter was born.
quotes.author: David Duchovny

quotes.quote: Family life brought me a wonderful daughter and that's you. I wish you every happiness on your birthday and forever.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A daughter will follow in her mom's footsteps so make sure to set a good example.
quotes.author: Elizabeth George

quotes.quote: A daughter is like sunshine, who fills your life with brightness and warmth.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A son is a son till he takes a wife, a daughter is a daughter all of your life.
quotes.author: Irish Saying

quotes.quote: Daughters are angels sent from above to fill our heart with unending love.
quotes.author: J. Lee

quotes.quote: A daughter is a day brightener and a heart warmer.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote:
To my lovely daughter
I just have this to say
Have a very happy birthday
On this your special day.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The births of my two daughters were the two greatest moments of my life.
quotes.author: Alex Rodriguez

quotes.quote: In my life, it would probably be giving birth to my daughter. That probably is the most, the thing that moved me the most, was the most memorable, the most wonderful, the most miraculous. I think a lot of women would probably feel that way, too.
quotes.author: Julie Andrews

quotes.quote: Celebrate the birth of a girl child by planting 5 trees in your village.
quotes.author: Narendra Modi

quotes.quote: At her birthday, my seven-year-old daughter will say that she wants these big cakes and certain expensive toys as presents, and I can’t say no to her. It would just break my heart. But when I was little, for birthdays we just played outside and we were happy if we got any cake.
quotes.author: Goran Ivanisevic

quotes.quote: Anything I've done up till May 27th 1999 was kind of an illusion, existing without living. My daughter, the birth of my daughter, gave me life.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: Your birthdays sweep by making a collage of memories of lost teeth, eager smiles and trembling tears—all glued together by time. Now you are 21 and I am exactly twice as old. Yet I feel less than half as wise as I pretended to be on that birthday when you wailed me into motherhood.
quotes.author: Rita Freedman

quotes.quote: The times we spent together on a special intimacy, a quality that I remember best from the day I woke up and my daughter was brought to me in the hospital. I won't top that feeling in my lifetime.
quotes.author: Tammy Grimes

quotes.quote: I think of my children's births—carry them around with me—every day of my life... Audrey's thick tuft of black hair that I saw and touched before I even knew the sex of the still unborn person it belonged to. Her hands on her cheeks,... as she shot out. The feeling of a newborn's skin. Eyes wide open.
quotes.author: Joyce Maynard

quotes.quote: So I took my daughter in my arms and said, "I love you." I told her that she was precious to me, and I stroked her hair. She sucked her thumb and lay there like a contented cat.
quotes.author: Nikki Gerrard

quotes.quote: No length of time can make you quit, / Honour and virtue, sense and wit, / Thus you may still be young to me, / While I can better hear than see; / Oh, ne'er may fortune show her spite, / To make me deaf, and mend my sight.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Maiden, when such a soul as thine is born, / The morning-stars their ancient music make.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: My daughter's birth was the incomparable gift of seeing the world at quite a different angle than before, and judging it by a standard that would apply far beyond my natural life.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: I stood in the hospital corridor the night after she was born. Through a window I could see all the small, crying infants, and somehow among them slept the one who was mine. I stood there for hours filled with happiness.
quotes.author: Liv Ullmann

quotes.quote: I’ve never looked forward to a birthday like I’m looking forward to my new daughter’s birthday, because two days after that is when I can apply for reinstatement.
quotes.author: Pete Rose

quotes.quote: Baby Girl, you kept your secrets from me! / For in the instant I met you—my wondrous, spirited, enchanting daughter / newly separate from me, you imparted a discovery / which began at your birth, the secrets you always held: / When I was carrying you, you were filling me / with the promise of you, and the extraordinary / baby child woman you would become.
quotes.author: Jane Butkin Wagner

quotes.quote: And your breath upon my skin / is a warm wind rubbing earth; / our edges blur and thin. / Girl, to what binds us, / say yes.
quotes.author: Anita L. Punla

quotes.quote: So I see it's somebody's birthday / My daughter just turned nineteen / Man O man, they grow up so quick / Party people, we are now going to step back into the wonder world of / Dear Annie.
quotes.author: Alexander Anyaegbunam

quotes.quote: Well today is your birthday sweetheart and you would have been sweet sixteen / Sure you were our only daughter you were your mom and your daddy's little queen / See we were gonna give you up party and everything but the Lord called you away / To sleep in his beautiful garden so we brought you this pretty bouquet.
quotes.author: Walter Donovan

quotes.quote: A son is a son till he takes him a wife, a daughter is a daughter all of her life.
quotes.author: Irish Saying

quotes.quote: To a father growing old nothing is dearer than a daughter.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: A daughter may outgrow your lap, but she will never outgrow your heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A mother's treasure is her daughter.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: A daughter is a bundle of firsts that excite and delight, giggles that come from deep inside and are always contagious, everything wonderful and precious and your love for her knows no bounds.
quotes.author: Barbara Cage

quotes.quote: A daughter is a miracle that never ceases to be miraculous...full of beauty and forever beautiful...loving and caring and truly amazing.
quotes.author: Deanna Beisser

quotes.quote: A daughter is a treasure- and a cause of sleeplessness.
quotes.author: Ben Sirach

quotes.quote: Our daughters are the most precious of our treasures, the dearest possessions of our homes and the objects of our most watchful love.
quotes.author: Margaret E. Sangster

quotes.quote: A daughter is one of the most beautiful gifts this world has to give.
quotes.author: LaurelAtherton

quotes.quote: Old as she was, she still missed her daddy sometimes.
quotes.author: Gloria Naylor

quotes.quote: Daughters understand as they grow older, they become good friends.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: A daughter can lead to baldness, but the remainder of the road is just as smooth.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: What the daughter does, the mother did.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: We gotta start teaching our daughters to be somebodies instead of somebody's.
quotes.author: Kifah Shah

quotes.quote: The more a daughter knows about the details of her mother's life - without flinching or whining - the stronger the daughter.
quotes.author: Anita Diamant

quotes.quote: Not every daughter mourns the loss of a mother.
quotes.author: Rasmenia Massoud

quotes.quote: Do not forget to tell your daughters God made them beautiful.
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: Watching your daughter being collected by her date feels like handing over a million dollar Stradivarius to a gorilla.
quotes.author: Jim Bishop

quotes.quote: Generally if you're a daughter in a Mexican family, no one wants to tell you anything; they tell you the healthy lies about your family.
quotes.author: Sandra Cisneros

quotes.quote: Good daughters make good mothers.
quotes.author: Abigail G. Whittlesey

quotes.quote: And thou shalt in thy daughter see, This picture, once, resembled thee.
quotes.author: Ambrose Philips

quotes.quote: Daughters go into analysis hating their fathers and come out hating their mothers. They never come out hating themselves.
quotes.author: Laurie Jo Wojcik

quotes.quote: A daughter is the happy memories of the past, the joyful moments of the present, and the hope and promise of the future.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Daughter are angels sent from above to fill our heart with unending love.
quotes.author: J. Lee

quotes.quote: Maybe it's just a daughter's job to piss off her mother.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: A daughter will follow in her mom's footsteps so make sure to set a good example.
quotes.author: Elizabeth George

quotes.quote: If daughters couldn't soften a man, then nothing would.
quotes.author: Linda Weaver

quotes.quote: An undutiful daughter will prove an unmanageable wife.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A daughter is a day brightener and a heart warmer.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Daughters can sometimes be too serious, teach them to laugh and not take life too seriously.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: A daughter can lead to baldness, but the remainder of the road is just as smooth.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Daughter are angels sent from above to fill our heart with unending love.
quotes.author: J. Lee

quotes.quote: Never grow a wishbone, daughter, where you backbone ought to be.
quotes.author: Clementine Paddleford

quotes.quote: To a father growing old nothing is dearer than a daughter.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: A daughter is the happy memories of the past, the joyful moments of the present, and the hope and promise of the future.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Honor your daughters. They are honorable.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: A daughter is a bundle of firsts that excite and delight, giggles that come from deep inside and are always contagious, everything wonderful and precious and your love for her knows no bounds.
quotes.author: Barbara Cage

quotes.quote: A daughter is a treasure and a cause of sleeplessness.
quotes.author: Ben Sirach

quotes.quote: Having a little girl has been like following an old treasure map with the important paths torn away.
quotes.author: Heather Gudenkauf

quotes.quote: A daughter is the most beautiful gifts this world has to give.
quotes.author: Laurel Atherton

quotes.quote: A daughter will follow in her mom's footsteps so make sure to set a good example.
quotes.author: Elizabeth George

quotes.quote: Daughters can sometimes be too serious, teach them to laugh and not take life too seriously.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The more a daughter knows the details of her mother's life, the stronger the daughter.
quotes.author: Anita Diamant

quotes.quote: A daughter is a mother's gender partner, her closest ally in the family confederacy, an extension of her self. And mothers are their daughters' role model, their biological and emotional road map, the arbiter of all their relationships.
quotes.author: Victoria Secunda

quotes.quote: Our daughters are the most precious of our treasures, the dearest possessions of our homes and the objects of our most watchful love.
quotes.author: Margaret E. Sangster

quotes.quote: Dawn is born at midnight.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Dawn comes slowly but dusk is rapid.
quotes.author: Alice B. Toklas

quotes.quote: Dawn tinted the darkness like water ink.
quotes.author: Janet Fitch

quotes.quote: Every sunset brings the promise of a new dawn.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Dawn seemed to follow midnight with indecent haste.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Our eternal message of hope is that dawn will come.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Dawn has a way of casting a pall on any night magic.
quotes.author: Janet Fitch

quotes.quote: Be patient where you sit in the dark. The dawn is coming.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Dawn has power to fertilise the most matter-of-fact vision.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.quote: Night never had the last word. The dawn is always invincible.
quotes.author: Hugh B. Brown

quotes.quote: The light of the dawn is not so sweet as the first glimpses of fame.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: Winter dawn is the color of metal, The trees stiffen into place like burnt nerves.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: The Dawn is a wild, fair woman, With sunrise in her hair; Look where she stands, with pleading hands, To lure me there.
quotes.author: Robert Loveman

quotes.quote: Dawn came on us like a betrayer; it seemed as though the new sun rose as an ally of our enemies to assist in our destruction.
quotes.author: Primo Levi

quotes.quote: What would dawn have been like, had you awakened? It would have sung through your bones. All I can do this morning is let it sing through mine.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.quote: All humans realize they are loved when witnessing the dawn; early morning is the triumph of good over evil. Absolved by light we decide to go on.
quotes.author: Rufus Wainwright

quotes.quote: We went down into the silent garden. Dawn is the time when nothing breathes, the hour of silence. Everything is transfixed, only the light moves.
quotes.author: Leonora Carrington

quotes.quote: Every dawn renews the Beginning, and to behold the earth struggling out of the formless void, out of the night, is to witness the act of creation.
quotes.author: Sholem Asch

quotes.quote: It's almost dawn. You can feel it coming. The world holds its breath, because there's really no guarantee that the sun will rise. That there was a yesterday doesn't mean there will be a tomorrow.
quotes.author: Rick Yancey

quotes.quote: Each time dawn appears, the mystery is there in its entirety.
quotes.author: Rene Daumal

quotes.quote: Dawn comes before sleep does.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: Dawn: When men of reason go to bed.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: It is always darkest before the dawn.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: Before dawn, the air smelled of lemons.
quotes.author: Luanne Rice

quotes.quote: The nearer the dawn the darker the night.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth

quotes.quote: At dawn of light, all darkness disappears.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Sometimes, the darkest part of the morning is just before dawn.
quotes.author: Janette Oke

quotes.quote: Dawn itself is the most neglected masterpiece of the modern world.
quotes.author: R. Murray Schafer

quotes.quote: The dawn is not distant, nor is the night starless; love is eternal.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The dawn speeds a man on his journey, and speeds him too in his work.
quotes.author: Hesiod

quotes.quote: Let every dawn be to you as the beginning of life, and every setting sun be to you as its close.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: The past is the beginning of the beginning and all that is and has been is but the twilight of the dawn.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: Longing is like the rosy dawn. After the dawn out comes the sun. Longing is followed by the vision of God.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna

quotes.quote: The dawn is overcast, the morning lowers, And heavily in clouds brings on the day, The great, the important day, big with the fate Of Cato and of Rome.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: To watch the dawn emerge from the night undoubtedly gives a heavenly feeling! The fresh sun rays entwine with the dark horizon and peep out of the creek with tranquil grin.
quotes.author: Supriya Kaur Dhaliwal

quotes.quote: In the heartfelt mercy of our God, the dawn from on high will visit us, to shine on those sitting in darkness, in the shadow of death, to guide our feet to the way of peace.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Perhaps the new dawn will come from this horizon, from the East where the sun rises; and then, unvanquished Man will retrace his path of conquest, despite all barriers, to win back his lost heritage.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: One man's daydreaming is another man's day.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: The cost of oblivious daydreaming was always this moment of return, the realignment with what had been before and now seemed a little worse.
quotes.author: Ian McEwan

quotes.quote: A daydream is an evasion.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: The average daydream is about fourteen seconds long and we have about two thousand of them per day. In other words, we spend about half of our waking hours one-third of our lives on earth spinning fantasies.
quotes.author: Jonathan Gottschall

quotes.quote: A dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Daydreaming is one of the key sources of poetry, a poem often starts as a daydream that finds its way into language and walking seems to bring a different sort of alertness, an associative kind of thinking, a drifting state of mind.
quotes.author: Edward Hirsch

quotes.quote: So many of our dreams at first seem impossible, then they seem improbable, and then, when we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: He does not need opium. He has the gift of reverie.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: The difference between a vision and a daydream is the audacity to act.
quotes.author: Steven Furtick

quotes.quote: Daydream, imagine, and reflect. It's the source of infinite creativity.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: You can spend your time daydreaming or make use of it in other ways.
quotes.author: Erik Qualman

quotes.quote: Every Daydream-hope starts with little incentives !
quotes.author: Nikhil Karke

quotes.quote: Daydreaming allows you to play out scenarios where you miraculously save the day. You play out scenarios in your head that are kind of crazy, and then you personally, heroically resolve them.
quotes.author: Mark Waters

quotes.quote: A story in your head isn't a story. It's just a daydream until you actually write it down. So write it down.
quotes.author: Andy Weir

quotes.quote: A vision without action is called a daydream; but then again, action without a vision is called a nightmare.
quotes.author: Jim Sorensen

quotes.quote: Heart of mine, why art thou dreaming! Dreaming through the weary day, While life's precious hours are wasting, Fast, and unimproved, away?
quotes.author: Mary Ann H. Dodd

quotes.quote: A daydream is a meal at which images are eaten. Some of us are gourmets, some gourmands, and a good many take their images precooked out of a can and swallow them down whole, absent-mindedly and with little relish.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.quote: Daydream transports the dreamer outside the immediate world to a world that bears the mark of infinity.
quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

quotes.quote: How many of our daydreams would darken into nightmares, were there a danger of their coming true!
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: Unlike any other form of thought, daydreaming is its own reward.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: Sit in reverie and watch the changing color of the waves that break upon the idle seashore of the mind.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Daydreaming is okay, even better if you can make some lasting memory out of it.
quotes.author: Leslie Dean Brown

quotes.quote: Daydreaming incubates creative discovery.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: Daydreaming subverts the world.
quotes.author: Raoul Vaneigem

quotes.quote: Everything starts as somebody's daydream
quotes.author: Larry Niven

quotes.quote: A daily dose of daydreaming heals the heart, soothes the soul, and strengthens the imagination.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: There are some people who live in a dream world, and there are some who face reality; and then there are those who turn one into the other.
quotes.author: Douglas H. Everett

quotes.quote: Color outside the lines, let yourself daydream, agree with your imagination and laugh at the rules.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Visualization is daydreaming with a purpose.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Everything starts as somebody's daydream.
quotes.author: Larry Niven

quotes.quote: The cost of oblivious daydreaming was always this moment of return, the realignment with what had been before and now seemed a little worse.
quotes.author: Ian McEwan

quotes.quote: She was always daydreaming. She never wanted to live in the real world; she always seemed to be separated from other children her age. They couldn’t understand her or her imagination. She was always thinking outside of the box, breaking rules, and only following what her heart told her was right.
quotes.author: Shannon A. Thompson

quotes.quote: She never felt like she belonged anywhere,except for when she was lying on her bed, pretending to be somewhere else.
quotes.author: Rainbow Rowell Eleanor and Park

quotes.quote: A daydream is a meal at which images are eaten. Some of us are gourmets, some gourmands, and a good many take their images precooked out of a can and swallow them down whole, absent-mindedly and with little relish.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: There are certain half-dreaming moods of mind in which we naturally steal away from noise and glare, and seek some quiet haunt where we may indulge our reveries and build our air castles undisturbed.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Lying in bed and daydreaming was the best thing I did all day.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Is daydreaming a distraction from work, or work a distraction from daydreaming?
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: We seek to escape the dark cave of a despondent mind by either dulling oneself mentally or through imaginative acts. One form of escapism is daydreaming.
quotes.author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.quote: I try to maintain a healthy dose of daydreaming to remain sane.
quotes.author: Florence Welch

quotes.quote: In my head, this world is so much more beautiful. If you ever catch me daydream, please, don’t wake me up.
quotes.author: Mandy K

quotes.quote: Daydreams are cool alright. Daydreams are nice, especially the ones about... food.
quotes.author: Doug Walker

quotes.quote: Do you ever daydream? I do. That's the only time I'm really happy. Dreaming.
quotes.author: Charles Chaplin

quotes.quote: I doze and daydream. I think about my life. I don't know what I did wrong. I'd feel better if I did.
quotes.author: Robert K. Massie

quotes.quote: You're daydreamers instead of go-getters. In a way, you've got to be crazy. You're not satisfied to live with flying - you've got to be in love with it.
quotes.author: Frank Wead

quotes.quote: On a street where reality is not much different from dreams I've had / A dream is all I have / Daydreaming, daydreaming all the time
quotes.author: Y Adman Chris

quotes.quote: Daydreaming, daydreaming into the night / And I'm alright / Daydreaming, daydreaming all the time / Daydreamer, we used to be half alive
quotes.author: Y Adman Chris

quotes.quote: Daydreaming, just daydreaming / Well, it's kind of fun for one who's all alone
quotes.author: Andre G Previn

quotes.quote: Daydreaming, just daydreaming / Helps me find the joy, the boy I call my own / Night comes on, it's true I'm blue / My heart is with the sun
quotes.author: Andre G Previn

quotes.quote: Daydreaming, just daydreaming / Please don't mind if I just sigh and stay / Stay dreaming, daydreaming / Maybe small but it's all I've known
quotes.author: Andre G Previn

quotes.quote: So many times things pass you by / Imagination running wild / You've got to start choosing right from wrong / Instead of daydreaming all day long
quotes.author: Christopher Lowe

quotes.quote: Life's happening now / And there's no time to sleep / Daydreaming, / You're daydreaming, / You dream of the day / When the world's gonna change
quotes.author: Kincaid Alan Smith

quotes.quote: Daydreaming, / You're daydreaming, / You're dreaming your life away / Although the headlines scream at you, / You don't have a clue
quotes.author: Kincaid Alan Smith

quotes.quote: Well I'm floating on air when I'm daydreaming / I quietly observe standing in my space / Well I'm tricky kid don't deal with sadness
quotes.author: Adrian Nicholas Matthew Thaws

quotes.quote: And we're all daydreaming now / Escape to another world / Live for another day / Escape to another world
quotes.author: Elliot Gleave

quotes.quote: Where you been all of my life / I've been daydreaming 'bout you / I cannot deny what feels so true
quotes.author: Brian Thomas Higgins

quotes.quote: But I don't mind if I'm only daydreaming / If dreams can bring so near to me / The things so dear to me
quotes.author: Walter Carl Becker

quotes.quote: Day dream / Don't break my reverie / Until I find that she / Is daydreaming just like me
quotes.author: Billy Strayhorn

quotes.quote: And you can be sure that if you're feeling right / A daydream will last long into the night / Tomorrow at breakfast you may prick up your ears / Or you may be daydreaming for a thousand years
quotes.author: John Sebastian

quotes.quote: What a day for a daydream / Custom made for a daydreaming boy / And I'm lost in a daydream / Dreaming 'bout my bundle of joy
quotes.author: John Sebastian

quotes.quote: Daydreaming / Under crying skies / Everything is better here / When I close my eyes
quotes.author: Jorgen Keill Elofsson

quotes.quote: A world in myself / Daydreaming admiring being / Quietly, open the world / I hear the time of the starry sky / Turning over at midnight
quotes.author: Elizabeth Fraser

quotes.quote: I remember sitting back daydreaming / Bout a better life with finer things / To be honest I would do that a lot / But now our dreams turning into reality.
quotes.author: Reburst

quotes.quote: Your greatness lies in your daydreams. But they are great only to the extent to which they inspire you to work and strive towards them. When they do, you will find that you are wiser and happier than you have ever been.
quotes.author: Robert O'Brien

quotes.quote: Daydream If you have built castles in the air, that is where they should be; now put foundations under them.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: How many of our daydreams would darken into nightmares were there any danger of their coming true.
quotes.author: Logan P. Smith

quotes.quote: Vision without execution is a daydream. Execution without vision is a nightmare.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: I had a daydream about a nightmare. / Today is the only day you can live. / A sort stay leaves a good impression.
quotes.author: Joseph Julius Bonkowski

quotes.quote: Sometimes I daydream. / I dream about life, / Trying to find a purpose. What's the meaning?
quotes.author: Richard Adcock

quotes.quote: I keep looking for a purpose / Like a hungry dog searching for food. / Sometimes I daydream, / Wishing I was someone else.
quotes.author: Richard Adcock

quotes.quote: We are lost in the daydream landscapes we have created in our minds.
quotes.author: David Nichtern

quotes.quote: Daydreaming , our ability to give 'to airy nothing/ A local habitation and a name,' remains one of the most fascinating, if perplexing, phenomena in the vast range of human behavior.
quotes.author: Jerome L. Singer

quotes.quote: Daydreaming or conscious fantasy seems most likely to occur under conditions relatively similar to those of night dreaming.
quotes.author: Jerome L. Singer

quotes.quote: Since daydreams are so often visual, the movies are especially effective in capturing their quality.
quotes.author: Jerome L. Singer

quotes.quote: It is a basic human pastime to daydream, in the sense of entertaining conscious and private fictions.
quotes.author: M. Regis

quotes.quote: Daydreams are private fictions; few are wiling to submit their fantasies.
quotes.author: M. Regis

quotes.quote: Daydreams are very common and yet they remain theoretically elusive.
quotes.author: M. Regis

quotes.quote: One knows that a daydream is not real. It is not confused with present reality.
quotes.author: Teresa Brennan

quotes.quote: Visionaries of every sort credit daydreams for creating conditions ripe for moments of insight to blossom.
quotes.author: Amy Fries

quotes.quote: The beauty of daydreaming is that it's a process available to everyone of us.
quotes.author: Amy Fries

quotes.quote: The uncensored aspect of daydreaming is also priceless in that it gives us both the means and the freedom to explore, without an internal critic hovering over us.
quotes.author: Amy Fries

quotes.quote: What happens in your daydreams, stays in your daydreams, unless you choose to share.
quotes.author: Amy Fries

quotes.quote: Daydreaming does not enjoy tremendous prestige in our culture, which tends to regard it as unproductive thought.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: Daydreaming with pencil and paper is a respectable form of meditation.
quotes.author: John Howe

quotes.quote: A daydream is a meal at which images are eaten. Some of us are gourmets.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: Daydreaming is okay, even better if you can make some lasting memory out of it.
quotes.author: Leslie Dean Brown

quotes.quote: A story in your head isn't a story. It's just a daydream until you actually write it down. So write it down.
quotes.author: Andy Weir

quotes.quote: You can spend your time daydreaming or make use of it in other ways.
quotes.author: Erik Qualman

quotes.quote: I was trying to daydream, but my mind kept wandering.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: They say there's no harm in daydreaming, but there is.
quotes.author: Charlaine Harris

quotes.quote: If you don't daydream your life is a nightmare.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Everything starts as somebody's daydream.
quotes.author: Larry Niven

quotes.quote: Daydreams were dangerous because they made her wish for things she could never have.
quotes.author: Julie Garwood

quotes.quote: We can imprison ourselves with our wants, wishes, and false dreams.
quotes.author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.quote: Day dreaming is actually research for the next book.
quotes.author: Val Richards

quotes.quote: Daydreaming allows you to play out scenarios where you miraculously save the day. You play out scenarios in your head that are kind of crazy, and then you personally, heroically resolve them.
quotes.author: Mark Waters

quotes.quote: Unlike any other form of thought, daydreaming is its own reward.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: A dead end can never be a one way street; you can always turn around and take another road.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: A dead end street is a good place to turn around.
quotes.author: Naomi Judd

quotes.quote: If you start trying to figure out yourself from the image everyone has of you, you run into a dead end.
quotes.author: Sam Shepard

quotes.quote: It is a sure sign that a culture has reached a dead end when it is no longer intrigued by its myths.
quotes.author: Greil Marcus

quotes.quote: People go on exploration; they're trying to find places that weren't known before. But it is an inevitable fact of research, as is in any other form of exploration of the unknown, that some people find they go down a dead end.
quotes.author: Mark Walport

quotes.quote: Worry compounds the futility of being trapped on a dead-end street. Thinking opens new avenues.
quotes.author: Cullen Hightower

quotes.quote: If things go wrong and you hit a dead end-as you will-it's just life's way of saying it's time to change course.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: I think that people who get to a certain position, and then try to ferociously defend it or build on it, it's kind of a dead-end street. You see people becoming miserable that way.
quotes.author: Viggo Mortensen

quotes.quote: The longer a dead-end, the more it looks like a road.
quotes.author: Mikhail Turovsky

quotes.quote: There are no dead ends in life, only dead end thinking.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: People who inspire others are those who see invisible bridges at the end of dead-end streets.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: It is only in God that we discover our origin, our identity, our meaning, our purpose, our significance, and our destiny. Every other path leads to a dead end.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: I'm sure that in the fullness of time we'll learn that one or more of these seemingly promising technologies were dead ends. And that's the nature of innovation, and that's why we should spread our bets; we should not put our eggs in any one basket. Some of these will be grand successes, some of them will be average, and some of them will be abject failures.
quotes.author: Jay Inslee

quotes.quote: There are ends, occasionally, with projects. That happens. But they are natural dead ends. It's usually the outside situation that demands an ending. I never really settle for one.
quotes.author: Aleksandra Mir

quotes.quote: An ordinary mistake is one that leads to a dead end, while a profound mistake is one that leads to progress. Anyone can make an ordinary mistake, but it takes a genius to make a profound mistake.
quotes.author: Frank Wilczek

quotes.quote: Those who deny the change in consciousness that the divine process of creation now brings about-or actually imposes on us-and fail to develop their intuition accordingly will sooner or later find themselves at a dead end.
quotes.author: Carl Johan Calleman

quotes.quote: I suppose it’s easier to see the way out of anything when you’ve found your way out of that maze. When you’re stuck in the middle, in a series of dead-ends making circles, it’s difficult to make any sense of anything.
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: As the rain falls and the sun shines, they grow, grow, grow; minds so open, they go through life aware and accepting, seeing light where there's dark, seeing possibility in dead ends, tasting victory as others spit out failure, questioning where others accept. Just a little less jaded, a little less cynical.
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: There are no dead ends, just detours.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: Arrogance and fanaticism cause the hardening of positions taken and entrenchment can only lead to a dead end.
quotes.author: Ecumenical Patriarch Bartholomew I of Constantinople

quotes.quote: Negative expectations are a quick route to dead-end thinking.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: In science, a path that turns out to be a dead end is very useful because you don't devote resources to focusing on that; you go elsewheres.
quotes.author: Michael Bloomberg

quotes.quote: In our age of nuclear and biological weapons and the ever more efficient exploitation of nature, the mix of high technology and an ethos of domination could take us to an evolutionary dead end.
quotes.author: Riane Eisler

quotes.quote: It may seem like I came out of the blue. But, my road was long, windy, full of hurdles, and even some dead ends. I lost family. I lost friends. I even lost my way. When I reached what felt like rock bottom, I realized I had a responsibility to everyone who believed in me and to kids, like me, who just needed a chance and something to believe in.
quotes.author: Victor Cruz

quotes.quote: When we attempt to find meaning in the pursuit of pleasure, the commitment to a job, or through plumbing intellectual depths, we all eventually find in each of these pursuits a dead end.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Thinking that what you want equals what's best for you is a dead end.
quotes.author: Byron Katie

quotes.quote: Work at what you love the most, even if you're only a two. Trust that your love for what your are doing will see you through. That's not easy, but better to grow into what you love than to pretend you're satisfied with a developmental dead end.
quotes.author: Laurence Boldt

quotes.quote: One of the greatest challenges in collecting child support is that deadbeat dads move from job to job and state to state. It's hard to keep track of them.
quotes.author: Rod Blagojevich

quotes.quote: Deadbeat dads are like magicians, they pull lifetime disappearing acts.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There's really no point in having children if you're not going to be home enough to father them.
quotes.author: Anthony Edwards

quotes.quote: A real man takes care of his kids no matter what the relationship is with the mother of his child.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A greedy father has thieves for children.
quotes.author: Serbian Proverb

quotes.quote: A bad father has never a good son.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: A father is a banker provided by nature.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: A father is a banker provided by nature.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: You wanted to kill your father in order to be your father yourself. Now you are your father, but a dead father.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Be more than a father, be a dad. Be more than a figure, be an example.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter who my father was. It matters who I remember he was.
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: Becoming a father is easy enough, but being one can be very rough.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Busch

quotes.quote: In reality the world is as full of bad mothers as it is of bad fathers, and it is not the motherless children who become delinquent but the fatherless ones.
quotes.author: Louis de Bernieres

quotes.quote: If you have much, give of your wealth; if you have little, give of your heart.
quotes.author: Arabic Proverb

quotes.quote: The surest way to a child's heart is to spend time with them.
quotes.author: Kevin Heath

quotes.quote: Your children will become what you are; so be what you want them to be.
quotes.author: David Bly

quotes.quote: Kids are like a mirror, what they see and hear they do. Be a good reflection for them.
quotes.author: K. Heath

quotes.quote: As your kids grow up they may forget what you said, but they won't forget how you made them feel.
quotes.author: Kevin Heath

quotes.quote: Your children need your presence more than your presents.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: What a child doesn't receive he can seldom later give.
quotes.author: P.D. James

quotes.quote: There are no illegitimate children only illegitimate parents.
quotes.author: Leon R. Yankwich

quotes.quote: Fathers, your are the head and strength of the family unit. If you are not in place, there is a weakness in the link.
quotes.author: Anita R. Sneed Carter

quotes.quote: Fathers in today's modern families can be so many things.
quotes.author: Oliver Hudson

quotes.quote: Any fool can be a Father, but it takes a real man to be a Daddy!
quotes.author: Philip Whitmore

quotes.quote: The father who does not teach his son his duties is equally guilty with the son who neglects them.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Becoming a father is easy enough, but being one can be very rough.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Busch
