quotes.quote: You can try to make the right decision all the time, but it's better to just make a decision. I have done wrong so many times, but nine times out of 10, I have learned from my failure. Don't wait for something; just go for it.
quotes.author: Bobby Bones

quotes.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself in any direction you choose. You’re on your own. And you know what you know. You are the guy who’ll decide where to go.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: It is not your talents that make you great, but your decisions.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Not to decide…is to decide.
quotes.author: Frank Sonnenberg

quotes.quote: You can't make decisions based on fear and the possibility of what might happen.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: The doors we open and close each day decide the lives we live.
quotes.author: Flora Whittemore

quotes.quote: Some persons are very decisive when it comes to avoiding decisions.
quotes.author: Brendan Francis

quotes.quote: Everything is something you decide to do, and there is nothing you have to do.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: In order to decide, judge; in order to judge, reason; in order to reason, decide (what to reason about).
quotes.author: Philip Johnson-Laird

quotes.quote: When there aren’t any smart decisions, I suppose you just have to pick the stupid decision you like best.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: Decision making can sometimes seem like inner civil war.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Balanced emotions are crucial to intuitive decision making.
quotes.author: Michael D. Eisner

quotes.quote: Whenever it comes to decision making, Remember the part about having confidence.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: The key to good decision making is not knowledge... It's whether our work fulfills us.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: Find ways to decentralize. Move decision making authority down and out. Encourage a more entrepreneurial approach.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.quote: The art of good decision making is looking forward to and celebrating the tradeoffs, not pretending they don't exist.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: We unfortunately live in a corporate world where group decision making is made to avoid failure rather than to achieve success.
quotes.author: Bill Cahan

quotes.quote: Most of society's decision making for young people happens without young people, and that could not happen without adultcentrism.
quotes.author: Adam Fletcher

quotes.quote: In part because individual judgement is not accurate enough or consistent enough, cognitive diversity is essential to good decision making.
quotes.author: James Surowiecki

quotes.quote: Without women's full inclusion at the decision making table, we cannot have any healthy decision making that is good for men and women alike.
quotes.author: Zainab Salbi

quotes.quote: Every individual can make a difference ... if we continue to leave decision making to the so-called decision makers, things will never change.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: The key to good decision making is not knowledge. It is understanding. We are swimming in the former. We are desperately lacking in the latter.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: Never bring the problem solving stage into the decision making stage. Otherwise, you surrender yourself to the problem rather than the solution.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: The strength of collective decision making and political responsibility is not only a question of recognizing other people's ability. It is also recognizing one's own limitations.
quotes.author: Aruna Roy

quotes.quote: Obedience brings peace in decision making. If we have firmly made up our minds to follow the commandments, we will not have to redecide which path to take when temptation comes our way.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: The essence of the phenomenon of gambling is decision making. The act of making a decision consists of selecting one course of action, or strategy, from among the set of admissible strategies.
quotes.author: Richard Arnold Epstein

quotes.quote: The major mistake people pursue in decision making is to surround themselves with negatively minded people. People who are going nowhere will never take you anywhere; people who are going everywhere can take you somewhere.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: You can't make decisions based on fear and the possibility of what might happen.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: Effective decision-making can be seen as an optimal link between memory of the past, ground-realities of the present and insights of the future.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Decision making and problem solving are not the same. To solve a problem, one needs to find a solution. To make a decision, one needs to make a choice.
quotes.author: Michael J. Marx

quotes.quote: Always make decisions that prioritize your inner peace.
quotes.author: Izey Victoria Odiase

quotes.quote: Decision making is an art only until the person understands the science.
quotes.author: Pearl Zhu

quotes.quote: Visionary decision-making happens at the intersection of intuition and logic.
quotes.author: Paul O'Brien

quotes.quote: The art of decision making includes the art of questioning.
quotes.author: Pearl Zhu

quotes.quote: The speed of decision making is the essence of good governance.
quotes.author: Piyush Goyal

quotes.quote: Usually, when you make a decision in life, unless you have access to parallel universes, you can't truly judge how right that decision was.
quotes.author: Tibor Fischer

quotes.quote: Design is nothing if not decision making.
quotes.author: Henry Petroski

quotes.quote: Courage and confidence are what decision making is all about.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.quote: A graphic is never an end in itself; it is a moment in the process of decision making.
quotes.author: Jacques Bertin

quotes.quote: One of the major biases in risky decision making is optimism. Optimism is a source of high-risk thinking.
quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.quote: Decision making in a democracy depends above all on knowledge and not just the intel available to presidents and policymakers.
quotes.author: Nancy Gibbs

quotes.quote: Decisions should be based on facts, objectively considered — what I call the fact-founded, thought-through approach to decision making.
quotes.author: Marvin Bower

quotes.quote: Understanding the true nature of instinctive decision making requires us to be forgiving of those people trapped in circumstances where good judgment is imperiled.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: The challenge of life is regretless decision making, relentless pursuit of vision with faith, forgiving others, enduring pain with a smile & achieving goals with an extra MILE
quotes.author: Sujit Lalwani

quotes.quote: Long term thinking and planing enhances short term decision making. Make sure you have a plan of your life in your hand, and that includes the financial plan and your mission.
quotes.author: Manoj Arora

quotes.quote: The key to good decision making is evaluating the available information - the data - and combining it with your own estimates of pluses and minuses. As an economist, I do this every day.
quotes.author: Emily Oster

quotes.quote: I think one of the major results of the psychology of decision making is that people's attitudes and feelings about losses and gains are really not symmetric. So we really feel more pain when we lose $10,000 than we feel pleasure when we get $10,000.
quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.quote: Making good decisions is a crucial skill at every level.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's the smallest decisions that can change your life forever.
quotes.author: Keri Russell

quotes.quote: If you make decisions based upon people's reactions or judgments then you make really boring choices.
quotes.author: Heath Ledger

quotes.quote: The hardest decisions in life are not between good and bad or right and wrong, but between two goods or two rights.
quotes.author: Joe Andrew

quotes.quote: Decision is the spark that ignites action. Until a decision is made, nothing happens.... Decision is the courageous facing of issues, knowing that if they are not faced, problems will remain forever unanswered.
quotes.author: Wilfred A. Peterson

quotes.quote: Shelving hard decisions is the least ethical course.
quotes.author: Adrian Cadbury

quotes.quote: Decision is a risk rooted in the courage of being free.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: You've got to know when to hold 'em, know when to fold 'em, know when to walk away, know when to run.
quotes.author: Kenny Rogers

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter which side of the fence you get off on sometimes. What matters most is getting off. You cannot make progress without making decisions.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: It's not hard to make decisions when you know what your values are.
quotes.author: Roy Disney

quotes.quote: Make decisions from the heart and use your head to make it work out.
quotes.author: Sir Girad

quotes.quote: When possible make the decisions now, even if action is in the future. A reviewed decision usually is better than one reached at the last moment.
quotes.author: William B. Given

quotes.quote: When you have to make a choice and don't make it, that is in itself a choice.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Some persons are very decisive when it comes to avoiding decisions.
quotes.author: Brendan Francis

quotes.quote: The hardest thing to learn in life is which bridge to cross and which to burn.
quotes.author: David Russell

quotes.quote: Using the power of decision gives you the capacity to get past any excuse to change any and every part of your life in an instant.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: Decisions become easier when your will to please God outweighs your will to please the world.
quotes.author: Anso Coetzer

quotes.quote: Once you make a decision, the universe conspires to make it happen.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Making good decisions is a crucial skill at every level.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Ethical decisions ensure that everyone's best interests are protected. When in doubt, don't.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: The decisions you make are a choice of values that reflect your life in every way.
quotes.author: Alice Waters

quotes.quote: Once you have made up your mind, stick to it; there is no longer any 'if' or 'but'.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: A decision without the pressure of consequence is hardly a decision at all.
quotes.author: Eric Langmuir

quotes.quote: All our final decisions are made in a state of mind that is not going to last.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Every decision you make is a mistake.
quotes.author: Edward Dahlberg

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: It is only in our decisions that we are important.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: If you have a decision to make, list down the pain points of doing it and the pleasures of doing it.
quotes.author: Romuald Andrade

quotes.quote: Whenever I make a bum decision, I go out and make another one.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: A real decision is measured by the fact that you've taken a new action. If there's no action, you haven't truly decided.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: When making a decision of minor importance, I have always found it advantageous to consider all the pros and cons.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: We all make decisions, the difference is how and when we make them.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: In any moment of decision the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The quality of decision is like the well-timed swoop of a falcon which enables it to strike and destroy its victim.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: The roads we take are more important than the goals we announce. Decisions determine destiny.
quotes.author: Frederick Speakman

quotes.quote: We can try to avoid making choices by doing nothing, but even that is a decision.
quotes.author: Gary Collins

quotes.quote: Decision: Something a man makes when he cannot get anyone to serve on a committee.
quotes.author: Fletcher Knebel

quotes.quote: The risk of a wrong decision is preferable to the terror of indecision.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: If we don't make tough decisions today our children are going to have to make much, much tougher decisions tomorrow.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.quote: Decisions made in anger can yeild a lifetime of regret.
quotes.author: Mr. Prophet

quotes.quote: Quick decisions are unsafe decisions.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Make decisions while you're up that you can handle while you're down.
quotes.author: Sean Lewis

quotes.quote: The more decisions that you are forced to make alone, the more you are aware of your freedom to choose.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: You're always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or different past.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Consistently wise decisions can only be made by those whose wisdom is constantly challenged.
quotes.author: Theodor Sorenson

quotes.quote: Even a correct decision is wrong when it was taken too late.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: The inability to make a decision has often been passed off as patience.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: For making good decisions, intuition is your best go-to.
quotes.author: Karen Whitaker

quotes.quote: The strongest principle of growth lies in human choice.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: We must make the choices that enable us to fulfill the deepest capacities of our real selves.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: When you're having trouble making a decision you're making it too soon.
quotes.author: Abraham-Hicks

quotes.quote: The decision is your own voice, an opinion is the echo of someone else's voice.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Unsuccessful people make decisions based on their current situation; successful people make decisions based on where they want to be.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Good decisions come from experience, and experience comes from bad decisions.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Crying is all right in its way while it lasts. But you have to stop sooner or later, and then you still have to decide what to do.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: When you decide something's right, there's nothing that can stop you from doing it.
quotes.author: Caragh M. O'Brien

quotes.quote: Always go with the choice that scares you the most, because that’s the one that is going to help you grow.
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.quote: Life is filled with difficult decisions, and winners are those who make them.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: Trust your instincts, and make judgements on what your heart tells you. The heart will not betray you.
quotes.author: David Gemmell

quotes.quote: A major life decision is never a choice but rather a realization that the decision has already been made.
quotes.author: Doug Cooper

quotes.quote: It does not take much strength to do things, but it requires a great deal of strength to decide what to do.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Don't entrust your future on others' hands. Rather make decisions by yourself with the help of God's guidance. Hold your beliefs so tight and never let go of them
quotes.author: Hark Herald Sarmiento

quotes.quote: Oftentimes, the most important decisions are the most difficult to make for your future, and the future of the generations that come after you hinges on the outcome of those decisions.
quotes.author: J.E.B. Spredemann

quotes.quote: So do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
quotes.author: J.R.R Tolkien

quotes.quote: Diversity and independence are important because the best collective decisions are the product of disagreement and contest, not consensus or compromise.
quotes.author: James Surowiecki

quotes.quote: Your statistical track record for decision-making is somewhat concerning.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lynn Barnes

quotes.quote: Whenever you’re making an important decision, first ask if it gets you closer to your goals or farther away. If the answer is closer, pull the trigger. If it’s farther away, make a different choice. Conscious choice making is a critical step in making your dreams a reality.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.quote: You cannot make progress without making decisions.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: It is very important to know who you are. To make decisions. To show who you are.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: Every moment is a moment of decision, and every moment turns us inexorably in the direction of the rest of our lives.
quotes.author: Mary Balogh

quotes.quote: You can't make decisions based on fear and the possibility of what might happen.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: Nothing happens until you decide. Make a decision and watch your life move forward.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: If you always make the right decision, the safe decision, the one most people make, you will be the same as everyone else.
quotes.author: Paul Arden

quotes.quote: When someone makes a decision, he is really diving into a strong current that will carry him to places he had never dreamed of when he first made the decision.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Whenever you see a successful business someone once made a courageous decision.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: You and only you are responsible for your life choices and decisions.
quotes.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: You are not the victim of the world, but rather the master of your own destiny. It is your choices and decisions that determine your destiny.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: At various points in our lives, or on a quest, and for reasons that often remain obscure, we are driven to make decisions which prove with hindsight to be loaded with meaning.
quotes.author: Sri S. Satchidananda

quotes.quote: Success is not determined by the outcome. The outcome is the result of having already decided that you are successful to begin with.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: Stay committed to your decisions, but stay flexible in your approach.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Decorate your home. It gives the illusion that your life is more interesting than it really is.
quotes.author: Charles M. Shulz

quotes.quote: By reshaping or decorating our outer selves, we express our inner sense of self: 'I like that' becomes 'I'm like that.'
quotes.author: Virginia Postrel

quotes.quote: Beauty when unadorned is adorned the most.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: If bad decorating was a hanging offense, there'd be bodies hanging from every tree!
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.quote: Your ultimate reason for staying in this crooked world is not to imitate its devastating physique, but trying do something about its ugly appearance.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Innocence is like polished armor; it adorns and defends.
quotes.author: Bishop Robert South

quotes.quote: Any opportunity to adorn oneself is human, and accessories are an easy way to do it.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: Any halfway clever devil would decorate the highway to hell as beautiful as possible.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Decorating is like music. Harmony is what we constantly strive for. At home, we want a peaceful atmosphere where the objects are the notes and nothing is off-key.
quotes.author: Charlotte Moss

quotes.quote: Your body is a temple, but how long can you live in the same house before you redecorate?
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Images adorn our inner life and carry great power there.
quotes.author: William Shirley

quotes.quote: No matter what our decorating style - realized or aspired to the essential spiritual grace our home should possess is the solace of comfort.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: A designer knows when he has reached perfection not when there is nothing left to add but when there is nothing left to take away.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Know, first, who you are, and then adorn yourself accordingly.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Decorating is not about making stage sets, it's not about making pretty pictures for the magazines, it's really about creating a quality of life, a beauty that nourishes the soul.
quotes.author: Albert Hadley

quotes.quote: Our modern society is engaged in polishing and decorating the cage in which man is kept imprisoned.
quotes.author: Swami Nirmalananda

quotes.quote: The house decorating with the things and yourself with the dress is nothing as long as you do not furnish your language, talk and your character with the role modesty, decency, morals, sincerity and love of humans.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Decorating golden rule: Live with what you love.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: People can see past the decorating a lot of times, but if they see that a house hasn't been taken care of, they wonder what else is wrong that they can't see.
quotes.author: Mary Johnson

quotes.quote: True ornament is not a matter of prettifying externals. It is organic with the structure it adorns, whether a person, a building, or a park.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Art is how we decorate space; Music is how we decorate time.
quotes.author: Alex Clay Hutchings

quotes.quote: Women always show more taste in adorning others than themselves; and the reason is that their persons are like their hearts â€” they read another's better than they can their own.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: Our sins are like a carousel where the same decorated dogs, pigs, and goats, ridden by the foolish, come around again and again until the machine wears out.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: Behind every attractive room there should be a very good reason.
quotes.author: Sister Parish

quotes.quote: It is not your outward appearance that you should beautify, but your soul, adorning it with good works.
quotes.author: Clement of Alexandria

quotes.quote: Plant your own garden and decorate your own soul, instead of waiting for someone to bring you flowers.
quotes.author: Veronica A. Shoffstall

quotes.quote: What could be more serious than the love of man for woman, what more commanding, more impressive, bearing in its bosom the seeds of death; at the same time these lovers, these people entering into illusion glittering eyed, must be danced round with mockery, decorated with garlands.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Manners must adorn knowledge and smooth its way in the world, without them it is like a great rough diamond, very well in a closet by way of curiosity, and also for its intrinsic value; but most prized when polished.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: In religions which have lost their creative spark, the gods eventually become no more than poetic motifs or ornaments for decorating human solitude and walls.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: For a house to be successful, the objects in it must communicate with one another, respond and balance one another.
quotes.author: Andre Putman

quotes.quote: As we become an increasingly urban society with shrinking household sizes, where we build our future homes, and the types of homes that they need to be, will evolve.
quotes.author: Mark Henry

quotes.quote: A room should feel collected, not decorated.
quotes.author: Albert Hadley

quotes.quote: We shape our homes and then our homes shape us.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: A room should never allow the eye to settle in one place. It should smile at you and create fantasy.
quotes.author: Juan Montoya

quotes.quote: Your home should tell the story of who you are, and be a collection of what you love.
quotes.author: Nate Berkus

quotes.quote: Charm, in most men and nearly all women, is a decoration.
quotes.author: E.M. Foster

quotes.quote: I would be most content if my children grew up to be the kind of people who think decorating consists of mostly of building enough bookshelves.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: I love decorating my home. I'm a gardener too, so that's usually something I have to play catch up with.
quotes.author: Suzy Bogguss

quotes.quote: Variety is the spice of a creative life.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: We need some boundaries to define our area of expertise but creativity looks to find ways to push whose boundaries out further.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: A creator is like a native in nature; He finds a use for everything.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: Art expresses a perspective, Creativity first explores the perspective of others.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: People will remember your unique style, even if they don't know your name.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: Have nothing in your home that you don't know to be useful or believe to be beautiful.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: The golden rule in decorating is that if you really love something, you will enjoy living with it for many years.
quotes.author: Anna Starmer

quotes.quote: Choosing the right colors to suit you and your emotional well being can have a positive effect on the way you feel and the way you live at home.
quotes.author: Anna Starmer

quotes.quote: It has been proven that colours really do affect the mood of a space, and every color ignites a unique and emotional response in the viewer.
quotes.author: Anna Starmer

quotes.quote: Bright colors can be like a blast of vitality, a vitamin boost to the senses.
quotes.author: Anna Starmer

quotes.quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Design is knowing which ones to keep.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Any job very well done that has been carried out by a person who is fully dedicated is always a source of inspiration.
quotes.author: Carlos Ghosn

quotes.quote: I'm not looking for someone who has everything, but someone who has time to spend with me more than anything.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Be more dedicated to making solid achievements than in running after swift but synthetic happiness.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Genius is one percent inspiration, ninety-nine percent perspiration.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: If you had started doing anything two weeks ago, by today you would have been two weeks better at it.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.quote: Talent is cheap; dedication is expensive. It will cost you your life.
quotes.author: Irving Stone

quotes.quote: To become a master at any skill, it takes the total effort of your: heart, mind, and soul working together in tandem.
quotes.author: Maurice Young

quotes.quote: A trusting heart will follow, only those who truly follow their heart.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: But still try for who knows what is possible!
quotes.author: Michael Faraday

quotes.quote: You've got to look for tough competition. You've got to want to beat the best.
quotes.author: Grete Waitz

quotes.quote: A life of total dedication to the truth also means a life of willingness to be personally challenged.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self-discipline, and effort.
quotes.author: Jesse Owens

quotes.quote: Most of us serve our ideals by fits and starts. The person who makes a success of living is the one who sees his goal steadily and aims for it unswervingly. That is dedication.
quotes.author: Cecil B. DeMille

quotes.quote: Dedication is not what others expect of you, it is what you can give to others.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Dedicate some of your life to others. Your dedication will not be a sacrifice. It will be an exhilarating experience because it is an intense effort applied toward a meaningful end.
quotes.author: Dr Thomas Dooley

quotes.quote: You'll know you're amazing when you get devoted to making other people amazing.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Your work is to discover your world and then with all your heart give yourself to it.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Find something you love and go for it with all your heart. No excuses, no plan B. Never settle for anything less than you know you can do. It will be hard, but I promise it will be worth it.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.quote: The true wealth of a man is not what's in his pocket, but what's in his heart.
quotes.author: Unarine Ramaru

quotes.quote: Being passionate about something is the most beautiful characteristic you can develop.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.quote: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.
quotes.author: Haroldson Lafayette Hunt, Jr.

quotes.quote: If you really want to do something, you'll find a way. If you don't, you'll find an excuse.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Brick walls are there for a reason. They give us a chance to show how badly we want something
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: Struggle ends where commitment begins.
quotes.author: Sumner Davenport

quotes.quote: There is no substitute for hard work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Your I can is more important than your IQ.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Dedication involves making the space to let young ideas take hold; every tree was once a seed and every company was once an idea.
quotes.author: Zephyr Bloch-Jorgensen

quotes.quote: Those who attain any excellence commonly spend life in one pursuit; for excellence is not often granted upon easier terms.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Dedication means spending whatever time or energy is necessary to accomplish the task at hand.
quotes.author: Anil Sinha

quotes.quote: People begin to become successful the minute they decide to be.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: Individual commitment to a group effort - that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: When you're surrounded by people who share a passionate commitment around a common purpose, anything is possible.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: I don't like to give up on people when they need someone not to give up on them.
quotes.author: Carrol Bryant

quotes.quote: You don't earn loyalty in a day. You earn loyalty day-by-day.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.quote: You need to make a commitment, and once you make it, then life will give you some answers.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Practice as if you are the worst, perform as if you are the best.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: It's not necessarily the amount of time you spend at practice that counts; it's what you put into the practice.
quotes.author: Eric Lindros

quotes.quote: Don't do anything in practice that you wouldn't do in the game.
quotes.author: George Halas

quotes.quote: To succeed in your mission, you must have single-minded devotion to your goal.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Be brave as your fathers before you. Have faith and go forward.
quotes.author: Thomas Alva Edison

quotes.quote: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The results of action depends upon the very quality of the action.
quotes.author: Swami Chimayananda

quotes.quote: Its amazing what you can accomplish when you don't care who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Harry Truman

quotes.quote: Those who can see the invisible can do the impossible.
quotes.author: Rev. Pandurang Shashtri Athavale

quotes.quote: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: If it wasn't hard, everyone would do it. It's the hard that makes it great.
quotes.author: Tom Hanks

quotes.quote: Above all be of single aim; have a legitimate and useful purpose, and devote yourself unreservedly to it.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: It is only our dedication towards our passion that distinguishes a champion from the crowd.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: The only way you really do this is if you love it. It takes dedication.
quotes.author: Andrew Smith

quotes.quote: I have no idols. I admire work, dedication and competence.
quotes.author: Ayrton Senna

quotes.quote: If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.
quotes.author: Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: I know the price of success: dedication, hard work, and an unremitting devotion to the things you want to see happen.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.
quotes.author: Gail Devers

quotes.quote: Holiness consists of three things separation from sin, dedication to God, transformation into Christ’s image. It is in vain that we talk about the last, unless we know something experimentally about the first.
quotes.author: James Aughey

quotes.quote: You can't expect everyone to have the same kind of dedication as you.
quotes.author: Jeff Kinney

quotes.quote: Being inspired is fine for a week, and being motivated might work for a month or so, but to make any lifestyle change last a lifetime, you need dedication.
quotes.author: John Bingham

quotes.quote: We overestimate the event and underestimate the process. Every fulfilled dream occurred because of dedication to a process.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: There is a difference between interest and commitment. When you're interested in doing something, you do it only when it’s convenient. When you're committed to something, you accept no excuses only results.
quotes.author: Kenneth H. Blanchard

quotes.quote: Dedication, determination, and hard work will feed life into your dreams.
quotes.author: LaDonna M. Cook

quotes.quote: Tomorrow, our seeds will grow. All we need is dedication.
quotes.author: Lauryn Hill

quotes.quote: No art, however minor, demands less than total dedication if you want to excel in it.
quotes.author: Leon Battista Alberti

quotes.quote: Success isn't given. It's earned. On the track, on the field, in the gym. With blood, sweat, and the occasional tears.
quotes.author: Mukesh Choudhary

quotes.quote: The speed of your success is limited only by your dedication and what you're willing to sacrifice.
quotes.author: Nathan W. Morris

quotes.quote: What does it take to be a champion? Desire, dedication, determination, concentration and the will to win.
quotes.author: Patty Berg

quotes.quote: If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.
quotes.author: Paul Bryant

quotes.quote: There is nothing wrong with dedication and goals, but if you focus on yourself, all the lights fade away and you become a fleeting moment in life.
quotes.author: Pete Maravich

quotes.quote: Confidence doesn't come out of nowhere, it's a result of something. hours and days and weeks and years of constant work and dedication.
quotes.author: Roger Staubach

quotes.quote: Do the things you like to be happier, stronger & more successful. Only so is hard work replaced by dedication.
quotes.author: Rossana Condoleo

quotes.quote: The power of a movement lies in the fact that it can indeed change the habits of people. This change is not the result of force but of dedication, of moral persuasion.
quotes.author: Stephen Biko

quotes.quote: You express the truth of your character, your dedication to your goals, and your commitment to your relationships with the choice of your actions.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The concentration and dedication the intangibles are the deciding factors between who won and who lost.
quotes.author: Tom Seaver

quotes.quote: Obsessed is just a word the lazy use to describe the dedicated.
quotes.author: Uknown

quotes.quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Football is like life, it requires perseverance, self-denial, hard work sacrifice, dedication and respect for authority.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Dreams and dedication are a powerful combination.
quotes.author: William Longgood

quotes.quote: Without deep reflection one knows from daily life that one exists for other people.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Our lives improve only when we take chances...and the first and most difficult risk we can take is to be honest with ourselves.
quotes.author: Walter Anderson

quotes.quote: To find your own way is to follow your bliss. This involves analysis, watching yourself and seeing where real deep bliss is - not the quick little excitement, but the real deep, life-filling bliss.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: It is one of the most beautiful compensations of this life that no man can sincerely try to help another without helping himself.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: As I look back on my life, I realize that every time I thought I was being rejected from something good, I was actually being re-directed to something better.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: We ask for long life, but 'tis deep life, or noble moments that signify. Let the measure of time be spiritual, not mechanical.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The loneliest moment in someone's life is when they are watching their whole world fall apart, and all they can do is stare blankly.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: We shall see but a little way if we require to understand what we see.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: What matters in life is what you care about and what you will continue to make effort towards caring about it.
quotes.author: Nokwethemba Nkosi

quotes.quote: We are always getting ready to live but never living.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.quote: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Take life one step at a time look forward to your future, stop looking back and regretting the past, the past is the past because it does not last!
quotes.author: Abhishek Tiwari

quotes.quote: Lies hurt people; imagination makes life more fun.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: The fullness of life is only accessible in the present moment.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: This life is like a swimming pool. You dive into the water, but you can't see how deep it is.
quotes.author: Dennis Rodman

quotes.quote: The changes in our life must come from the impossibility to live otherwise than according to the demands of our conscience not from our mental resolution to try a new form of life.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Life is in ourselves and not in the external.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: Our task in life is to find our deep soul work and throw ourselves headlong into it.
quotes.author: Phil Cousineau

quotes.quote: The purpose of morality is to teach you, not to suffer and die, but to enjoy yourself and live.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: In the circle of life there is no top, no corner, and no straight lines.
quotes.author: Mike Dolan

quotes.quote: Our greatest achievement in life is being happy with the little things that probably means nothing to others.
quotes.author: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the importance of having someone in your life who makes you want to be a better person.
quotes.author: Dauvoire

quotes.quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: Your way of thinking affects your life very deeply. So think positive and be positive.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Life is too deep for words, so don't try to describe it, just live it.
quotes.author: C S Lewis

quotes.quote: The more I see the less I know for sure.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: If you ever discover that what you're seeing is a play within a play, just slow down, take a deep breath, and hold on for the ride of your life.
quotes.author: Jack Handey

quotes.quote: By having a reverence for life, we enter into a spiritual relation with the world by practicing reverence for life we become good, deep, and alive.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: We should not moor a ship with one anchor, or our life with one hope.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The pain will not go away by getting angry or bitter, it will go away when you learn to accept life's challenges with grace and ease.
quotes.author: Leon Brown

quotes.quote: Life is savagely unfair. It ignores our deep seated convictions and places a disproportionate emphasis on the decisions we make in split seconds.
quotes.author: Chris Cleave

quotes.quote: Don't try to force anything. Let life be a deep let go.
quotes.author: Eileen Caddy

quotes.quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or objects.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: One day your life will flash before your eyes. Make sure it's worth watching.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: Life is a mystery as deep as ever death can be.
quotes.author: Mary Mapes Dodge

quotes.quote: The meaning of life is found by diving deep, deep within.
quotes.author: Vishnudevananda Saraswati

quotes.quote: Life is the wave's deep whisper on the shore Of a great sea beyond.
quotes.author: Henry Abbey

quotes.quote: Go into yourself and see how deep the place is from which your life flows.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Something deep in the human heart breaks at the thought of a life of mediocrity.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Life is deep and simple, and what our society gives us is shallow and complicated.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: Every life has forks in the road. And sometimes, the tines of that fork stab deep.
quotes.author: Brad Meltzer

quotes.quote: Only as we keep an open communication with our deep inner life will we have the wisdom to make effective choices.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them; that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Life is about not knowing, having to change, taking the moment and making the best of it, without knowing what's going to happen next.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.quote: Life is a perpetual instruction in cause and effect.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Life is a maze in which we take the wrong turning before we have learned to walk.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Those who love deeply never grow old; they may die of old age, but they die young.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Pinero

quotes.quote: You were my first my last.There shall never be another you. You are a lifetime you are my life.
quotes.author: Malika E. Nura

quotes.quote: To love deeply in one direction makes us more loving in all others.
quotes.author: Anne-Sophie Swetchine

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Love grows by giving. The love we give away is the only love we keep. The only way to retain love is to give it away.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The beautiful thing about love is that you just need to plant it once and nurture it and it shall bloom into blossoms that would cover the valleys.
quotes.author: Hermann J. Steinherr

quotes.quote: I love you not because of who you are, but because of who I am when I am with you.
quotes.author: Roy Croft

quotes.quote: True love is eternal, infinite, and always like itself. It is equal and pure, without violent demonstrations: it is seen with white hairs and is always young in the heart.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: We come to love not by finding a perfect person, but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The source of love is deep in us and we can help others realize a lot of happiness. One word, one action, one thought can reduce another person's suffering and bring that person joy.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Love is physiologically a legal battle that lovers fight until death.
quotes.author: Farooq A. Shiekh

quotes.quote: Every true and deep love is a sacrifice.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Love is of all passions the strongest, for it attacks simultaneously the head, the heart and the senses.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Once we recognize what we are feeling, once we recognize we can feel deeply, love deeply, can feel joy, then we will demand that all parts of our lives produce that kind of joy.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: Love deeply and passionately. You might get hurt, but it's the only way to love life completely.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: My bounty is as boundless as the sea. My love as deep; the more I give to thee. The more I have, for both are infinite.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: To say a man is fallen in love--or that he is deeply in love—or up to the ears in love—and sometimes even over head and ears in it--carries an idiomatical kind of implication, that love is a thing below a man.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: Let someone with a deep love to give, give that deep love to you, and what magic you'll see.
quotes.author: Jacques Demy

quotes.quote: You never know how deep love grows till you lose it. And you never, never, never realize it's true for you until it's gone.
quotes.author: Isaac Hayes

quotes.quote: Love asks me no questions, and gives me endless support.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The most important thing in life is to learn how to give out love, and to let it come in.
quotes.author: Morrie Schwartz

quotes.quote: Love is tough. Love survives through the worst of situations, and thrives through hope. Even when things seem hopeless love will find it's way.
quotes.author: Malika E. Nura

quotes.quote: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: If you truly love someone, then the only thing you want for them is to be happy, even if its not with you.
quotes.author: Lauren&L

quotes.quote: When we are in love we seem to ourselves quite different from what we were before.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Love is a garden where you keep sowing seeds and then one day you reap exactly what you have sown. It could be one flower at a time or a thorn at a time. Sow wisely.
quotes.author: John Crows

quotes.quote: One word frees us of all the weight and pain in life. That word is love!
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Love is the voice under all silences, the hope which has no opposite in fear; the strength so strong mere force is feebleness: the truth more first than sun, more last than star.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and in reach of every hand!
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: I smile not for anything else but because there is so much of love and goodness in my life. I have fallen in love with the person I need and love the most. You are the best person I have ever met.
quotes.author: Lawn Treble

quotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it, but you can feel it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: The heart has its reasons which reason knows not.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Hear my soul speak. Of the very instant that I saw you, did my heart fly at your service.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: You must love in such a way that the person you love feels free.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Love is the enchanted dawn of every heart.
quotes.author: Lamartine

quotes.quote: Love means to commit oneself without guarantee, to give oneself completely in the hope that our love will produce love in the loved person. Love is an act of faith, and whoever is of little faith is also of little love.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: Wait if I'm on fire / How am I so deep in love? / When I dream of dying / I never feel so loved
quotes.author: Alex C. Mendoza, Chelsea W. Lee, Maxwell Joseph Ernst, Spencer Thomas Ernst, "Trampoline"

quotes.quote: To be deeply in love is, of course, a great liberating force.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Love is a force more formidable than any other. It is invisible - it cannot be seen or measured, yet it is powerful enough to transform you in a moment, and offer you more joy than any material possession could.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: I rage against the trials of love, I curse the fading of the light / Though she's already flown so far beyond my reach, she's never out of sight / Now I know she'll never leave me, even as she fades from view / She will still inspire me, be a part of everything I do.
quotes.author: Beast, Beauty and the Beast

quotes.quote: I can feel but I can't touch / Can never get too much / I hear you loud and clear / I've got nothing to fear / Your love will be my guide / I've never been this satisfied / Its something deep inside
quotes.author: Billie Piper, Eliot John Kennedy, Timothy Daniel Woodcock, "Something Deep Inside"

quotes.quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: O deep love that inspires me to do anything.
quotes.author: Christian Morgenstern

quotes.quote: Here in the heart of me / That's where you'll always be / Deep as the deep blue sea / Close as the air I breathe
quotes.author: Daniel G. Lavoie, Maribeth Derry, "Here in the Heart"

quotes.quote: So deep, deeper than a river / So high, higher than any mountain / So strong, strong enough to last for all time / This love is running / So deep, deeper than a river / It goes on and on
quotes.author: Diane Eve Warren, "Deeper Than a River"

quotes.quote: Those who love deeply never grow old; they may die of old age, but they die young.
quotes.author: Dorothy Canfield Fisher

quotes.quote: We loved with a love that was more than love.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: I love you more than yesterday, less than tomorrow.
quotes.author: Edmond Rostand

quotes.quote: Yet, love, mere love, is beautiful indeed / And worthy of acceptation. Fire is bright, / Let temple burn, or flax; an equal light / Leaps in the flame from cedar-plank or weed: / And love is fire. And when I say at need / I love thee . . . mark! . . . I love thee—in thy sight.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning, "Sonnet 10 - Yet, love, mere love, is beautiful indeed"

quotes.quote: Love is a deep well from which you may drink often, but into which you may fall but once.
quotes.author: Ellye Howell Glover

quotes.quote: Deep Love is slow of speech and void of art; Silence and timid tears reveal his heart. But shallow Love is ever eloquent to mouth his meagre passion -- and depart.
quotes.author: Elsa Barker

quotes.quote: That Love is all there is, Is all we know of Love; It is enough, the freight should be proportioned to the groove.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: [A] man reserves his true and deepest love not for the species of woman in whose company he finds himself electrified and enkindled, but for that one in whose company he may feel tenderly drowsy.
quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

quotes.quote: She, who set herself with Love’s power / In your heart, gazed so fixedly / Into and through your eyes, that she / Made Love, himself, appear there. / If it’s deeply that you suffer / Turn to Love.
quotes.author: Guido Cavalcanti, "Deep in thoughts of love, I came"

quotes.quote: With the rose the butterfly's deep in love, A thousand times hovering round; But round himself, all tender like gold, The sun's sweet ray is hovering found...
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Some people, right away, do know each other deeply. Love gives them insight into each other. Love makes them pledge themselves to each other. Love makes them inventive. Yes, it also makes them ridiculous. But that's just another of love's glories. It makes being ridiculous permissible.
quotes.author: James Kuzner

quotes.quote: In vain have I struggled. It will not do. My feelings will not be repressed. You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love you
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Come live with me and be my love, and we will some new pleasures prove, of golden sands, and crystal beaches, with silken lines and silver hooks...
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: A virgin purest lipp’d, yet in the lore / Of love deep learned to the red heart’s core.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Loves grown deep, deep into the heart of me / You've become a part of me / Let us plant the seed and watch it grow
quotes.author: Kenny Nolan, "Love's Grown Deep"

quotes.quote: Love is too large, too deep ever to be truly understood or measured or limited within the framework of words.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: You know, once I had a little dog and he always looked sad when I was sad and I loved him so. And when your tears fell on my hand and I loved you too all at once.
quotes.author: Marguerite, Camille

quotes.quote: There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: How does a moment last forever? How can a story never die? / It is love we must hold on to, never easy, but we try / Sometimes our happiness is captured, somehow a time and place stand still, / Love lives on inside our hearts, and always will.
quotes.author: Maurice, Beauty and the Beast

quotes.quote: Kiss with your soul, where lips can never reach. Touch with your eyes, penetrate deep. Love every part, fully complete.
quotes.author: Melody Lee

quotes.quote: Do not think that love in order to be genuine has to be extraordinary. What we need is to love without getting tired. Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: But there was only one virtue which I could do non stop; and which not only I; but every entity with a throbbing heart has been doing since centuries immemorial; a virtue which even the greatest of God's have bowed down too; a virtue which has its immoral essence dissipated in every nook and cranny of this boundless planet; O! yes I feel the richest man on this earth to proclaim it as LOVE; LOVE AND SIMPLY LOVE.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh, "Love; Love And Simply Love"

quotes.quote: You don't love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or for their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Love,' she said, 'seems to pump me full of vitamins. It makes me feel as if the sun were shining and my hat was right and my shoes were right and my frock was right and my stockings were right, and somebody had just left me ten thousand a year.'
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you straightforwardly, without complexities or pride: so I love you because I know no other way than this: where I does not exist nor you, so close that your hand on my chest is my hand, so close that your eyes close as I fall asleep.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: Deep love creates deep fear. It looks like death because the I disappears, the you disappears - and it is a sort of death. And when you die, only then do you enter into the divine.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Unconditional love really exists in each of us. It is part of our deep inner being. It is not so much an active emotion as a state of being. It's not 'I love you' for this or that reason, not 'I love you if you love me.' It's love for no reason, love without an object.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: There is always that one person in our lives who we deeply love, and that person can also destroy us.
quotes.author: Ranbir Kapoor

quotes.quote: But to see her was to love her; Love but her, and love forever. Had we never lov'd sae kindly, Had we never lov'd sae blindly, Never met—or never parted— We had ne'er been broken-hearted.
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: O Love, O pure deep Love, be here, be now, Be all "worlds dissolve into your stainless endless radiance, Frail living leaves burn with your brighter than cold stares "Make me your servant, your breath, your core.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: If you wish to be loved; Love.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Where love is deep, much can be accomplished.
quotes.author: Shinichi Suzuki

quotes.quote: I loved not yet, yet I loved to love, and out of a deep-seated want, I hated myself for wanting not. I sought what I might love, in love with loving, and safety I hated, and a way without snares.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: I believe in the compelling power of love. I do not understand it. I believe it to be the most fragrant blossom of all this thorny existence.
quotes.author: Theodore Dreiser

quotes.quote: Love conquers all; let us surrender to love.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: My love is deep; the more I give to thee, the more I have, both are infinite.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
quotes.author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Deerstalking would be a very fine sport if only the deer had guns.
quotes.author: W. S. Gilbert

quotes.quote: An army of deer would be more formidable commanded by a lion, than a an army of lions commanded by a stag.
quotes.author: Traditional Proverb

quotes.quote: How can a deer tell when a leaf falls silent in the forest? She hears it breathing differently.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: An army of lions commanded by a deer will never be an army of lions.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: I felt like a deer with a hundred hunters after me.
quotes.author: Deion Sanders

quotes.quote: The fabled musk deer searches the world over for the source of the scent which comes from itself.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna

quotes.quote: Deer are like dogs. Except for Bambi, they're pretty personality-less.
quotes.author: Judd Apatow

quotes.quote: I ask people why they have deer heads on their walls. They always say because it's such a beautiful animal. There you go. I think my mother is attractive, but I have photographs of her.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Everything pales in comparison to deer.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: You can learn more about hunting deer with a bow and arrow in a week than a gun hunter will learn in his entire life.
quotes.author: Fred Bear

quotes.quote: They run like deer, jump like deer and think like deer.
quotes.author: Charles Barkley

quotes.quote: Deer hunting would be fine sport, if only the deer had guns.
quotes.author: W. S. Gilbert

quotes.quote: A wounded deer leaps the highest.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: People think of deer as Bambi, cute and cuddly, but they can be extremely dangerous in certain circumstances.
quotes.author: Steve Martarano

quotes.quote:
The musk is inside the deer, but the deer does not
look for it, it wander around looking for grass.
quotes.author: Kabir

quotes.quote: A deer that knows all the hunting techniques of a lion will never fall prey to a lion!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The man who hunts a deer does not gaze at the mountains.
quotes.author: Takeda Nobushige

quotes.quote: When defeat comes, accept it as a signal that your plans are not sound, rebuild those plans, and set sail once more toward your coveted goal.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Defeat should never be a source of discouragement but rather a fresh stimulus.
quotes.author: Robert South

quotes.quote: Defeat never comes to any man until he admits it.
quotes.author: Josephus Daniels

quotes.quote: Anyone can deal with victory. Only the mighty can bear defeat.
quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

quotes.quote: Defeat is not the worst of failures. Not to have tried is the true failure.
quotes.author: George Edward

quotes.quote: Never confuse a single defeat with a final defeat.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The art of victory is learned in defeat.
quotes.author: Simon Bolivar

quotes.quote: You've got to learn to survive a defeat. That's when you develop character.
quotes.author: Richard Nixon

quotes.quote: It is very easy to defeat someone, but it is very hard to win someone.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Life is truly known only to those who suffer, lose, endure adversity and stumble from defeat to defeat.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Defeat is only a word. Defeat was the beginning of a victory.
quotes.author: Launa Rissadia

quotes.quote: An honorable defeat is better than a dishonorable victory.
quotes.author: Millard Fillmore

quotes.quote: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated. In fact, it may be necessary to encounter the defeats, so you can know who you are, what you can rise from, how you can still come out of it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Defeat is not bitter unless you swallow it.
quotes.author: Joe Clark

quotes.quote: It is defeat that lives on and takes the years to smother.
quotes.author: Ben Robertson

quotes.quote: A man can be destroyed but not defeated.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: You cannot expect victory and plan for defeat.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Defeat is a state of mind; no one is ever defeated until defeat has been accepted as a reality.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Defeat may serve as well as victory to shake the soul and let the glory out.
quotes.author: Edwin Markham

quotes.quote: Defeat is in your mind. Resilience is in your soul.
quotes.author: Keri Murphy

quotes.quote: If you live long enough, you'll see that every victory turns into a defeat.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: The taste of defeat has a richness of experience all its own.
quotes.author: Bill Bradley

quotes.quote: There are some defeats more triumphant than victories.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: It is not defeat that destroys you,it is being demoralized by defeat that destroy you.
quotes.author: Imran Khan

quotes.quote: Defeat doesn't finish a man, quit does. A man is not finished when he's defeated. He's finished when he quits.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: Nothing but education. Nothing but the first step to something better.
quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

quotes.quote: If you learn from defeat, you haven't really lost.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: There is no defeat except for those who give up.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Being defeated is often a temporary condition. Giving up is what makes it permanent.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: Failure, loss and defeat are just mile markers on the road to success.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Fry

quotes.quote: Defeat is not worth thinking about.
quotes.author: Alan Shearer

quotes.quote: When defeat is inevitable, it is wisest to yield.
quotes.author: Quintilian

quotes.quote: Defeat brings a lesson, it gives a chance to rebuild, a chance to start again, with the knowledge of what does not work.
quotes.author: Leon Brown

quotes.quote: Once you hear the details of victory, it is hard to distinguish it from a defeat.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: He who fears being conquered is sure of defeat.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Being challenged in life is inevitable, being defeated is optional.
quotes.author: Roger Crawford

quotes.quote: Defeat is a state of mind. You are defeated only when you accept defeat, and assume the hopeless mindset of a defeated person.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: A good man would prefer to be defeated than to defeat injustice by evil means.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: Do not be afraid of defeat. You are never so near victory as when defeated in a good cause.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Life is to be lived, not controlled; and humanity is won by continuing to play in face of certain defeat.
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: Falling down is not defeat. Defeat is, when you refuse to get up.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: I contend that not only can you laugh at adversity, but it is essential to do so if you are to deal with setbacks without defeat.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.quote: When we pray we admit defeat.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: History has demonstrated that the most notable winners usually encountered heartbreaking obstacles before they triumphed. They won because they refused to become discouraged by their defeats.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.quote: If the new American father feels bewildered and even defeated, let him take comfort from the fact that whatever he does in any fathering situation has a fifty percent chance of being right.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: To be overcome by the fragrance of flowers is a delectable form of defeat.
quotes.author: Beverley Nichols

quotes.quote: Take a good look at your failure, and then say with gritty determination, You're not going to keep me down! I may be defeated, but I'm not giving up!
quotes.author: Carl Sommer

quotes.quote: Courage is more important than to be deceived by shallow victory waiting for a delayed defeat.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: To give up is to invite complete defeat. Giving up contributes to an ultimate defeat of the personality. It tends to develop a defeat psychology.
quotes.author: Dr. Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: But man is not made for defeat, he said. A man can be destroyed but not defeated.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: It’s easy to do anything in victory. It’s in defeat that a man reveals himself.
quotes.author: Floyd Patterson

quotes.quote: Defeat is not the worst of failures. Not to have tried is the true failure.
quotes.author: George E. Woodberry

quotes.quote: Every war when it comes, or before it comes, is represented not as a war but as an act of self defense against a homicidal maniac.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: While they were saying among themselves it cannot be done, it was done.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Hope is the last thing a person does before they are defeated.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: A lost battle is a battle one thinks one has lost.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: When we allow bad times to linger too long in our minds, they become more than just a feeling of defeat. They become a season of discouragement.
quotes.author: Jerry Grillo

quotes.quote: The more you talk about negative things in your life, the more you call them in. Speak victory not defeat.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Victory has a thousand fathers, but defeat is an orphan.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Beauty deprived of its proper foils and adjuncts ceases to be enjoyed as beauty, just as light deprived of all shadows ceases to be enjoyed as light.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Somewhere in the world there is a defeat for everyone. Some are destroyed by defeat, and some made small and mean by victory. Greatness lives in one who triumphs equally over defeat and victory.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Learn a word from a win, but learn a whole book from a defeat.
quotes.author: M.K. Soni

quotes.quote: Victory attained by violence is tantamount to a defeat for it is momentary.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Every witness will rejoice at the work God did. This is God's goal for you. This is your inheritance: more victory than defeat, more joy than sadness, more hope than despair.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: While one may encounter many defeats, one must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Only a man who knows what it is like to be defeated can reach down to the bottom of his soul and come up with the extra ounce of power it takes to win when the match is even.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: When defeat overtakes a man, the easiest and most logical thing to do is to QUIT. That is exactly what the majority of men do.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Time is a master worker that heals the wounds of temporary defeat, and equalizes the inequalities and rights the wrongs of the world.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Defeat happens only to those who refuse to try again.
quotes.author: Nick Vujicic

quotes.quote: As soon as questions of will or decision or reason or choice of action arise, human science is at a loss.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Never talk defeat. Use words like hope, belief, faith, victory.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: There is no better than adversity. Every defeat, every heartbreak, every loss, contains its own seed, its own lesson on how to improve your performance the next time.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Beware how you take away hope from any human being.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Fear makes us look for someone to blame, throw up our hands in defeat, and give in to a victim mentality. Faith chooses to face the challenge with hope in a brighter tomorrow.
quotes.author: Penny Hunt

quotes.quote: We are never defeated unless we give up on God.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Never stop just because you feel defeated. The journey to the other side is attainable only after great suffering.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: Learn to celebrate your successes and acknowledge your defeats, but then move on to the next opportunity and challenge.
quotes.author: Stedman Graham

quotes.quote: If you can accept losing, you can’t win.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: To courageously straighten up again after our heads have been bowed by defeat, disappointment and suffering is a supreme test of character.
quotes.author: Wilferd Peterson

quotes.quote: The light, that lies In woman's eyes, Has been my heart's undoing.
quotes.author: Thomas More

quotes.quote: See that any time you feel pained or defeated, it is only because you insist on clinging to what doesn't work. Dare to let go and you won't lose a thing except for a punishing idea.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: A defeated argument that refuses to be obliterated can remain very alive.
quotes.author: Amartya Sen

quotes.quote: Defeat teach us us life's most valuable lessons.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Defeat is not the worst of failures. Not to have tried is the true failure.
quotes.author: George E. Woodberry

quotes.quote: Defeat isn't bitter if you don't swallow it.
quotes.author: Grenville Kleiser

quotes.quote: Being defeated is often a temporary condition. Giving up is what makes it permanent.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: Defeat should never be a source of discouragement but rather a fresh stimulus.
quotes.author: Rober South

quotes.quote: Do not let defeat be a failure, let defeat be a means of moving on to better things with new knowledge if you take that type of attitude you will find success even in defeat!
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: To be defeated and yet not surrender, this is victory.
quotes.author: Jozef Pilsudski

quotes.quote: My past has not defined me, destroyed me, deterred me, or defeated me; it has only strengthened me.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: We are never defeated unless we give up on God.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Failure, loss and defeat are just mile markers on the road to success.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Fry

quotes.quote: Right defeated is stronger than evil triumphant.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Defeat is a school in which truth always grows strong.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Believe you are defeated, believe it long enough, and it is likely to become a fact.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Prefer to be defeated in the presence of the wise than to excel among fools.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.quote: A man may be defeated by his own secondary successes.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: You are a failure not the time when you are defeated.. but when you give up fighting
quotes.author: Vikrmn

quotes.quote: It is better to be defeated standing for a high principle than to run by committing subterfuge.
quotes.author: Grover Cleveland

quotes.quote: Defeat is a state of mind. You are defeated only when you accept defeat, and assume the hopeless mindset of a defeated person.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Defeat begins with the fear that one has lost.
quotes.author: KÅbÅ Abe

quotes.quote: When defeat comes, accept it as a signal that your plans are not sound, rebuild those plans, and set sail once more toward your coveted goal.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: You're not defeated when you lose a battle. You are defeated when you give up the struggle.
quotes.author: Mouloud Benzadi

quotes.quote: You are not defeated when you lose. You are defeated when you quit.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Defeat is only a word defeat was the beginning of a victory.
quotes.author: Launa Rissadia

quotes.quote: No man is defeated without until he has first been defeated within.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Anyone can deal with victory. Only the mighty can bear defeat.
quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

quotes.quote: Falling down isnt defeat is when you refuse to get up.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: One is defeated only when one accepts defeat.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Foch

quotes.quote: Every defeat every heartbreak every loss contains its own seed, Its own lesson on how to improve your performance the next time.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Defeat is a state of mind; no one is ever defeated until defeat has been accepted as a reality.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Defeat never comes to any man until he admits it.
quotes.author: Josephus Doniels

quotes.quote: You can be defeated by life's unavoidable disappointments, or you can become stronger because of them.
quotes.author: Kay Arthur

quotes.quote: Failure is a temporary defeat, while success is everlasting victory.
quotes.author: Muhamad khalouf

quotes.quote: Defeat doesn't finish a man, quit does. A man is not finished when he's defeated. He's finished when he quits.
quotes.author: Richard Nixon

quotes.quote: Defense is the first act of war.
quotes.author: Byron Katie

quotes.quote: The best defense is a good offense.
quotes.author: Jack Dempsey

quotes.quote: The best defense is a confusing offense.
quotes.author: Kimberly Pauley

quotes.quote: A stronger defense is an investment in peace.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Art is our defense against hysteria and death.
quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

quotes.quote: The best defense against partisanship is expertise.
quotes.author: Roger Angell

quotes.quote: The best defense of democracy is an informed electorate.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The best defense against democracy is to distract people.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Defense involves three things: courage, energy, intelligence.
quotes.author: Don Meyer

quotes.quote: The purpose of education is to teach a defense against eloquence.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The only defense against the world is a thorough knowledge of it.
