quotes.quote: Democrats were simply hoping to win some political points by getting their outlandish rhetoric published in the newspapers and heard on the talk shows.
quotes.author: John Doolittle

quotes.quote: Democrats are fighting for a new direction that includes protecting Social Security as well as making healthcare affordable, bringing down the high cost of gasoline, and making higher education more accessible for all Americans.
quotes.author: Jim Clyburn

quotes.quote: Democratic socialism means, that in a democratic, civilized society, the wealthiest people and the largest corporations must pay their fair share of taxes.
quotes.author: Bernie Sanders

quotes.quote: The democratic process is only as great as the people who participate in it.
quotes.author: Jeff Miller

quotes.quote: Democratic accountability means that governments must be popularly accepted, with citizens empowered to replace corrupt or incompetent rulers.
quotes.author: Raghuram Rajan

quotes.quote: Democracy is about voting and it's about a majority vote. And it's time that we started exercising the Democratic process.
quotes.author: Debbie Stabenow

quotes.quote: Democratic man can understand the aims and aspirations of capitalism; they are, greatly magnified, simply his own aims and aspirations.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Democratic principles are the result of equality of condition.
quotes.author: Mercy Otis Warren

quotes.quote: When it comes to free speech and participation in the democratic process, our laws should reflect the goal of making it easier for more citizens to engage.
quotes.author: Doug Ducey

quotes.quote: Democratic institutions are based on a reality of human nature: that those with power, however benign or even noble their intentions, will do what they can to keep it.
quotes.author: Rebecca MacKinnon

quotes.quote: The greatest blessing of our democracy is freedom. But in the last analysis, our only freedom is the freedom to discipline ourselves.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: Democracy is not just the right to vote, it is the right to live in dignity.
quotes.author: Naomi Klein

quotes.quote: The strength of the Constitution lies entirely in the determination of each citizen to defend it. Only if every single citizen feels duty bound to do his share in this defense are the constitutional rights secure.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Democracy is probably the only discovery by mankind which mostly brought it only happiness.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Democracy is eternal and human. It dignifies the human being; it respects humanity.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.quote: Democracy is the common pursuit of mankind, and all countries must earnestly protect the democratic rights of the people.
quotes.author: Hu Jintao

quotes.quote: Democracy needs support and the best support for democracy comes from other democracies. Democratic nations should come together in an association designed to help each other and promote what is a universal value democracy.
quotes.author: Benazir Bhutto

quotes.quote: A democratic government is the only one in which those who vote for a tax can escape the obligation to pay it.
quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.quote: The respect for human rights is one of the most significant advantages of a free and democratic nation in the peaceful struggle for influence, and we should use this good weapon as effectively as possible.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: The virtue of a democratic system with a constitutionally guaranteed right to free speech is that it readily enables the people, over time, to be persuaded that what they took for granted is not so, and to change their laws accordingly.
quotes.author: Antonin Scalia

quotes.quote: In a democratic nation, power must be linked with responsibility, and obliged to defend and justify itself within the framework of the general good.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A democratic state will protect the freedom to hold any beliefs other than those that harm others, such as racism. In particular, it will see to it that no one is harmed just because of her beliefs.
quotes.author: Mario Bunge

quotes.quote: The Democratic Party is now a political mechanism having a genuine political principle national socialism.
quotes.author: Rose Wilder Lane

quotes.quote: One of the challenges of a democratic government is making sure that even in the midst of emergencies and passions, we make sure that rule of law and the basic precepts of justice and liberty prevail.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Democratic institutions, even in the oldest operating democracy in the world, are anything but perfect.
quotes.author: David Remnick

quotes.quote: The basis of a democratic state is liberty.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The basis of democratic freedom is freedom of speech.
quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.quote: A democratic organization has to dare to do the right at all costs.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: A democratic society depends upon an informed and educated citizenry.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Democratic nation states remain far more capable of managing the circuit of coercion, taxation and legitimation than any transnational bodies.
quotes.author: Geoff Mulgan

quotes.quote: The merit of a democratic regime rests on one's continual willingness to exchange views, and to compete on the basis of individual merit and capacities.
quotes.author: Jose Eduardo Dos Santos

quotes.quote: We hide our demons so good, that the angels we show, bare the shame on their faces.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Demons are former celebrities who prey on their own insecurities.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Our demons are our own limitations, which shut us off from the realization of the ubiquity of the spirit, each of these demons is conquered in a vision quest.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Demons run when a good man goes to war.
quotes.author: Steven Moffat

quotes.quote: Demons are like obedient dogs; they come when they are called.
quotes.author: Remy de Gourmont

quotes.quote: Demons may be either good or bad, like any other class of beings.
quotes.author: L Frank Baum

quotes.quote: Demons wait at crossroads attempting to influence our decisions.
quotes.author: April Smith

quotes.quote: Sometimes you control your demons and sometimes it controls you.
quotes.author: J. Limbu

quotes.quote: Demons manifest themselves in people in different ways. For instance, out of nowhere, somebody can become very angry for no reason. That's not just an emotion. That's a demon.
quotes.author: Stephen Baldwin

quotes.quote: Demons don't play by the rules. They lie and they cheat and they stab in the back.
quotes.author: Alan Grant

quotes.quote: Demons were like genies or philosophy professors if you didn't word things exactly right, they delighted in giving you absolutely accurate and completely misleading answers.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: The demons that make a person afraid are the hardest to cast out.
quotes.author: Elizabeth George Speare

quotes.quote: Everywhere I looked, demons of the future were on the battlegrounds of one's emotional plane.
quotes.author: David Bowie

quotes.quote: When the Devil is not fishing he is mending his nets.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: Demons are demons, and if you have them, you can either put them away, exorcize them, or carry them with you.
quotes.author: Jill Flint

quotes.quote: The treachery of demons is nothing compared to the betrayal of an angel.
quotes.author: Brenna Yovanoff

quotes.quote: My whole life, I've made it a point never to trust demons.
quotes.author: Brenna Yovanoff

quotes.quote: A pair of demons with a rare and quite appalling gift would cut themselves in half.
quotes.author: Brenna Yovanoff

quotes.quote: Some demons find that they can escape through tiny cracks or vanish in a flurry shadows, and others have skin that can't and bones that can't be broken.
quotes.author: Brenna Yovanoff

quotes.quote: Be careful when you cast out your demons that you don’t throw away the best of yourself.
quotes.author: Daniel Coenn

quotes.quote: A demon were to steal after you into your loneliest loneliness time.
quotes.author: Daniel Coenn

quotes.quote: Demons are like obedient dogs, they come when they are called.
quotes.author: Remy de Gourmont

quotes.quote: If I got rid of my demons, I’d lose my angels.
quotes.author: Karin Slaughter

quotes.quote: Demons run when a good man goes to war.
quotes.author: KyL Cobb

quotes.quote: Demons run, but count the cost.
quotes.author: KyL Cobb

quotes.quote: Demons love pain and other people’s misery.
quotes.author: Brenna Yovanoff

quotes.quote: Demons lie when it suits them and don’t see anything wrong with it.
quotes.author: Brenna Yovanoff

quotes.quote: Demons corrupt and kill and destroy, all without conscience.
quotes.author: Brenna Yovanoff

quotes.quote: Demons always inhabit desolate places.
quotes.author: Klaus K. Klostermaier

quotes.quote: Demons do not have fixed abodes.
quotes.author: Klaus K. Klostermaier

quotes.quote: Demons inhabit caves and crossroads.
quotes.author: Klaus K. Klostermaier

quotes.quote: Demons are spirits which possess men.
quotes.author: Klaus K. Klostermaier

quotes.quote: Demons were just fallen angels who, booted out of heaven and bored with hell.
quotes.author: Richard Kadrey

quotes.quote: Demons never die quietly
quotes.author: Caitlin R. Kieman

quotes.quote: Demons exist, they are many and they infest people.
quotes.author: Sari Katajala-Peltomaa

quotes.quote: Perhaps you notice how the denial is so often the preface to the justification.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: Delay is the deadliest form of denial.
quotes.author: C. Northcote Parkinson

quotes.quote: The thing about denial is that it doesn't feel like denial when it's going on.
quotes.author: Georgina Kleege

quotes.quote: When denial is in play, a person simply refuses to recognize the truth, no matter how apparent.
quotes.author: Taite Adams

quotes.quote: Denial is the lid on our emotional pressure cooker: the longer we leave it on, the more pressure we build up. Sooner or later, that pressure is bound to pop the lid, and we have an emotional crisis.
quotes.author: Susan Forward

quotes.quote: Denial exists when three beliefs intersect:1. It cannot happen. 2. It cannot happen to you.3. It cannot happen to you now.
quotes.author: Johnnie Dent Jr.

quotes.quote: Denial is a common tactic that substitutes deliberate ignorance for thoughtful planning.
quotes.author: CHARLES TREMPER

quotes.quote: Clouds cannot cover secret places, nor denials conceal truth.
quotes.author: Demosthenes

quotes.quote: Denial does not solve the problem. Denial does not make the problem go away. Denial does not give us peace of mind, which is what we are really seeking when we engage in it. Denial is a liar. It compounds the problem, because it keeps us from seeing a solution, and taking action to resolve it.
quotes.author: BILL KORTENBACH

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of denial.
quotes.author: Wes Bently

quotes.quote: The abuse dies in a day, but the denial slays the life of the people, and entombs the hope of the race.
quotes.author: Charles Bradlaugh

quotes.quote: Denial is the number one aspect of medicine. That's why people don't get check-ups.
quotes.author: Larry L. King

quotes.quote: That which is denied cannot be healed.
quotes.author: Brennan Manning

quotes.quote: God's delay is not God's denial.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: The greatest barrier to someone achieving their potential is their denial of it.
quotes.author: Simon Travaglia

quotes.quote: Denial of one appetite sharpens the others.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: It takes a lot of courage to face up to things you can't do because we feed ourselves so much denial.
quotes.author: Zoe Saldana

quotes.quote: Denial is a very powerful thing.
quotes.author: Jane Velez-Mitchell

quotes.quote: Remember to be honest with yourself. Denial is how we often get stuck in the same place in life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Denial is the way we handle what we cannot handle.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I think denial's fascinating. It's a jokey word, but it really happens, and sometimes in enormous ways.
quotes.author: Marian Keyes

quotes.quote: The greatest barrier to someone achieving their potential is their denial of it.
quotes.author: Antje Traue

quotes.quote: More people would learn from their mistakes if they weren't so busy denying them.
quotes.author: Harold J. Smith

quotes.quote: Denial is the worst form of truth.
quotes.author: Ella The Wise and powerful

quotes.quote: Denial is useful defense mechanism until it's not.
quotes.author: Rosalind Kaplan

quotes.quote: Denial does not change reality for everyone else. Only for the one denying and those who are foolish enough to believe the fantasy.
quotes.author: Elle Casey

quotes.quote: Being in denial never resolved any problem for anyone, anywhere.
quotes.author: Muhammed Haider

quotes.quote: No denial of the truth will ever invalidate it.
quotes.author: Nikki Rosen

quotes.quote: At first, they'll only dislike what you say, but the more correct you start sounding the more they'll dislike you.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Denial is the worst kind of lie...because it is the lie you tell yourself.
quotes.author: Michelle A. Homme

quotes.quote: Denial and inactivity prepare people well for the roles of victim and corpse.
quotes.author: John Leach

quotes.quote: Living in denial only makes accepting the truth that much harder.
quotes.author: Jules F.

quotes.quote: As the fear of God is the beginning of wisdom, so the denial of God is the height of foolisnes.
quotes.author: R.C. Sproul

quotes.quote: Refusal to believe until proof is given is a rational position; denial of all outside of our own limited experience is absurd.
quotes.author: Annie Besant

quotes.quote: The speed of the human mind is remarkable. So is its inability to face the obvious.
quotes.author: SIMON MAWER

quotes.quote: The worst lies are the lies we tell ourselves. We live in denial of what we do, even what we think. We do this because we're afraid.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Denial ain't just a river in Egypt.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Most men would rather deny a hard truth than face it.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: The easiest way to solve a problem is to deny it exists.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Better a friendly denial than unwilling compliance.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: It is not necessary to deny another's reality in order to affirm your own.
quotes.author: Anne Wilson Schaef

quotes.quote: One picture is worth 1,000 denials.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Denial, perhaps, is a necessary human mechanism to cope with the heartaches of life.
quotes.author: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.quote: The road of denial leads to the precipice of destruction.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.quote: What state do you live in? Denial.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Underneath all that denial, you're someone who's deeply, deeply nice.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: Denial is an ugly thing.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Denial, they say, stands for Don't even notice I am lying. Human beings are the only animals who are happily lied to by our own minds about what is actually happening around us.
quotes.author: Cesar Millan

quotes.quote: I would rather have regrets of excess than regrets of denial.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: Denial is a wall in which love hides behind.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Self-denial is indulgence of a propensity to forego.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The denial of our duty to act in this case is a denial of our right to act; and if we have no right to act, then may we well be termed the white slaves of the North, for like our brethren in bonds, we must seal our lips in silence and despair.
quotes.author: Angelina Grimke

quotes.quote: Those who deny the existence of the truth postulate the truth of their denial and plainly contradict themselves.
quotes.author: Antonio Machado

quotes.quote: The only atheism is the denial of truth.
quotes.author: Arthur Lynch

quotes.quote: I find I am constantly being encouraged to pluck out some one aspect of myself and present this as the meaningful whole, eclipsing or denying the other parts of self.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: It's not denial. I'm just selective about the reality I accept.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Denial helps us to pace our feelings of grief. There is a grace in denial. It is nature's way of letting in only as much as we can handle.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: Deny any part of Reality, and you will lose your awareness of all of It.
quotes.author: ELIZABETH A. CRONKHITE

quotes.quote: You can't get away from yourself by moving from one place to another.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Where justice is denied, where poverty is enforced, where ignorance prevails, and where any one class is made to feel that society is an organized conspiracy to oppress, rob and degrade them, neither persons nor property will be safe.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: Denial was a weapon; it killed truth, numbed the mind, and I was a junkie.
quotes.author: John Hart

quotes.quote: The conflict between the will to deny horrible events and the will to proclaim them aloud is the central dialectic of psychological trauma.
quotes.author: Judith Lewis Herman

quotes.quote: Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life. It turns what we have into enough, and more. It turns denial into acceptance, chaos to order, confusion to clarity. It can turn a meal into a feast, a house into a home, a stranger into a friend.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: Dreams of innocence are just that; they usually depend on a denial of reality that can be its own form of hubris.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: The trouble with denial is that when the truth comes, you aren't ready.
quotes.author: Nina LaCour

quotes.quote: To regret one’s own experiences is to arrest one’s own development. To deny one’s own experiences is to put a lie into the lips of one’s own life. It is no less than a denial of the soul.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I could deny it if I liked. I could deny anything if I liked.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Even as your body betrays you, your mind denies it.
quotes.author: Sara Gruen

quotes.quote: Denial is like an old blanket. I loved to get on under that thing and curl up and sleep.
quotes.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid

quotes.quote: A man who denies his past is a man who truly denies himself a future, for he refuses to know himself, and to deny knowledge of oneself is to stumble through life as handicapped as the blind mute.
quotes.author: Tobsha Learner

quotes.quote: Most people find facts irritating. Facts interfere with their systems of denial.
quotes.author: Walter Darby Bannard

quotes.quote: Faced with the choice of enduring a bad toothache or going to the dentist, we generally tried to ride out the bad tooth.
quotes.author: Joseph Barbera

quotes.quote: Happiness is your dentist telling you it won't hurt and then having him catch his hand in the drill.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: Some tortures are physical And some are mental, But the one that is both Is dental.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Dentist: a prestidigitator who, putting metal into your mouth, pulls coin out of your pocket.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: If suffering brought wisdom, the dentist's office would be full of luminous ideas.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: It was a sweet smile, but it hid menace, like the kind dentists gave.
quotes.author: Andy Paine

quotes.quote: My dental hygienist is cute. Every time I visit, I eat a whole package of Oreo cookies while waiting in the lobby. Sometimes she has to cancel the rest of the afternoon's appointments.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I told my dentist my teeth are going yellow. He told me to wear a brown tie.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: An aching tooth is better out than in. To lose a rotting member is a gain.
quotes.author: Richard Baxter

quotes.quote: I wonder if there's such a thing as a spiritual dentist? I think my whole personality is full of cavities!
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Blessed are they who hold lively conversations with the helplessly mute, for they shall be called dentists.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: I was never afraid of anything in the world except the dentist.
quotes.author: Taylor Caldwell

quotes.quote: I won't have to brush my teeth or floss tonight. Any food trapped in my teeth got knocked out.
quotes.author: Charles Thomas

quotes.quote: Good dental care doesn't make you a good student, but if your tooth hurts, it's hard to be a good student.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Canada

quotes.quote: When life is kicking others in the teeth, Become a dentist.
quotes.author: Kevin Myers

quotes.quote: Be true to your teeth and they won't be false to you.
quotes.author: Soupy Sales

quotes.quote: A dentist at work in his vocation always looks down in the mouth.
quotes.author: George D. Prentice

quotes.quote: If a patient cannot clean his teeth, no dentist can clean them for him.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: Brush your teeth everyday, To keep dentist away.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A dentist gets to the root of the problem.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I was a left-handed dentist who made people cry.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: My dentist is actually a highly technical specialist, constantly experimenting with the latest dental research. The equipment he has makes my old dentist look prehistoric.
quotes.author: Joelle Carter

quotes.quote: Smile, it lets your teeth breathe.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Trips to the dentist I like to postpone that kind of thing.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: No, my friend, I am not drunk. I have just been to the dentist, and need not return for another six months! Is it not the most beautiful thought?
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: You mean people pay you to do this to them? I thought you had captured these people and brought them here against their will! How do I become a dentist?
quotes.author: Michael Buckley

quotes.quote: It seemed far more reasonable to belong to a species that had evolved natural tooth replacement than to belong to one that had developed the dental profession.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Tova Bailey

quotes.quote: My father told me what it used to feel like, waiting in the dentist's office. Every time the nurse opened the door you thought, It's happening. The thing I've been afraid of all my life.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: A gold tooth is to some blacks, what braces are to all whites.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Men often think submission indicates weakness, that letting someone else take charge betrays a character deficit. But we all submit to strangers who drill into our teeth as long as we can see the parchment on their wall which reads 'Dentist.'
quotes.author: Edmond Manning

quotes.quote: Eyes are the windows to the soul. A smile is the mirror of the heart.
quotes.author: Janna Cachola

quotes.quote: Math anxiety is worst than a regular check up at the dentist.
quotes.author: Charmaine J. Forde

quotes.quote: Smiling is fun with healthy teeth & gums.
quotes.author: Prof. Dr. Ninad Moon

quotes.quote: No one can take our smiles away when dental decay is kept miles away.
quotes.author: Prof. Dr. Ninad Moon

quotes.quote: It's actually harder to get into dental school than medical school.
quotes.author: Dan Goor

quotes.quote: Poor dental hygiene can be fatal.
quotes.author: Rand C. Capp

quotes.quote: Love conquests aren't dental check-ups.
quotes.author: Sasha Valenti

quotes.quote: Meth addicts are known for their good dental hygiene.
quotes.author: Ryan George

quotes.quote: I always notice a person's smile. I'm a dental hygienist.
quotes.author: Winifred Hervey

quotes.quote: Roses are red, Violets are Blue, They'll need dental records to identify you.
quotes.author: Tom Savage

quotes.quote: You realize that tampering with your kids dental records is against the law.
quotes.author: Sheldon Krasner

quotes.quote: Smart decision. You should avoid sweets. After all, you just signed away your dental insurance.
quotes.author: Tony Kushner

quotes.quote: When she got done with my father, he could only be identified by his dental records.
quotes.author: J.J. Abrams

quotes.quote: Roses are red, violets are blue. It's time for your dental cleaning and maybe a checkup, too.
quotes.author: Greg Daniels

quotes.quote: You wait for me enough times out on the street though, you might owe me some dental work.
quotes.author: Mike Binder

quotes.quote: I've got a dentist who's over seven feet tall / Yes I've got a dentist who's over seven feet tall / Long John they call him, and he answers every call
quotes.author: Tommy George

quotes.quote: Say you're supposed to see your dentist / About twice a year, that's right / But I think I feel it bobbing / Yes I'll go back there tonight
quotes.author: Tommy George

quotes.quote: I'd rather pick flowers instead of fights / And rather than flaunt my style / I'd flash you a smile / Of clean pearly whites.
quotes.author: Adam R. Young

quotes.quote: I've been to the dentist a thousand times so I know the drill / I smooth my hair / Sit back in the chair / But somehow I still get the chills
quotes.author: Adam R. Young

quotes.quote: When hygienists / Leave on long vacations / That's when dentists scream and / Lose their patience
quotes.author: Adam R. Young

quotes.quote: Talking only brings the toothaches on because / I say the stupidest things / So if my results go south, I swallow my pride with an aspirin and shut my mouth
quotes.author: Adam R. Young

quotes.quote: I'm always amazed to hear of air crash victim so badly mutilated that they have to be identified by their dental records. What I can't understand is, if they don't know who you are, how do they know who your dentist is?
quotes.author: Geoff Tibbals

quotes.quote: I'm always amazed to hear of air crash victim so badly mutilated that they have to be identified by their dental records. What I can't understand is, if they don't know who you are, how do they know who your dentist is?
quotes.author: Paul Merton

quotes.quote: I go to a woman dentist. It's a relief to be told to open my mouth instead of shut it.
quotes.author: Bob Monkhouse

quotes.quote: Sitting in the dentist's chair / Wishing that I wasn't there / To forget and pass the time / I have made this bit of rhyme.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: My dentist had a powerful wrist / He tries and tries in vain / To make me grunt or groan or squeal / With probe or rasp or drill.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: Sitting in the dental chair / Don't you wish you weren't there / Well, your cup of woe to fill / Just think of his infernal bill.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: Beyond brushing, the internal factors that nourish the teeth are so important: eating real foods, hormonal balanced, minerals, fat-soluble vitamins, and healthy fluid exchange through the teeth.
quotes.author: Nadine Artemis

quotes.quote: Stress, processed foods, and inadequate nutrition negatively affect dental fluid flow.
quotes.author: Nadine Artemis

quotes.quote: Nutrition is also a significant factor that influences the development of the entire mouth, not just the teeth, and it should include a healthy prenatal diet, breast-feeding, and raising children on real, unprocessed food.
quotes.author: Nadine Artemis

quotes.quote: Babies are generally born without teeth, yet their teeth are already forming.
quotes.author: Nadine Artemis

quotes.quote: In ancient times, cavities in children were a rare occurrence. Today, one of the biggest health concerns in North America and Europe affecting little ones more than any other age group is dental decay, or early childhood caries.
quotes.author: Nadine Artemis

quotes.quote: The role of a dentist is to preserve and prevent oral diseases of teeth, hum and jaws and supporting structures.
quotes.author: Vijay Tare

quotes.quote: Dentistry is the science and art of preventing and controlling the dental disease.
quotes.author: Vijay Tare

quotes.quote: The teeth give a sound support with the help of jaw bones to facial structures.
quotes.author: Vijay Tare

quotes.quote: The teeth protect the dust, germs and any foreign objects entering in the mouth with the help of lips.
quotes.author: Vijay Tare

quotes.quote: The teeth give a sound support with the help of jaw bones to facial structures.
quotes.author: Vijay Tare

quotes.quote: Dental hygiene is the study of preventive oral healthcare including the management of behaviors to prevent oral disease and promote health.
quotes.author: Michele Leonardi Darby

quotes.quote: Some people who can skirt precipices without a tremor have a strong dread of the dentist's chair.
quotes.author: C.C. Gaither

quotes.quote: All dentists talk while they work. They have inherited this from their professional ancestors, the barbers.
quotes.author: C.C. Gaither

quotes.quote: Dentist, A man with more pull than a politician.
quotes.author: C.C. Gaither

quotes.quote: Dentist, A man who always tries not to get on your nerves.
quotes.author: C.C. Gaither

quotes.quote: Her snow-white teeth are, not a little, tinged with the jet; To the dentist she must go, And repair the upper row, Then haply she may run a chance of marriage yet.
quotes.author: William Watt

quotes.quote: No one would disagree that it would be better to maintain oral health throughout life, never to have had any kind of dental disease.
quotes.author: Wiley-Blackwell

quotes.quote: Cultivate dependability and you will always have responsibilities.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.quote: Gain a modest reputation for being unreliable and you will never be asked to do a thing.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: Dependability is more important than talent. Dependability is a talent, and it is a talent all can have. It makes no difference how much ability we possess if we are not responsible and dependable.
quotes.author: Floy L. Bennett

quotes.quote: We are sure to get opportunities as we show ourselves capable of being trusted.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.quote: Don't make any promises that you can't keep.
quotes.author: Ann Marie Aguilar

quotes.quote: It is OK to say 'no'. It is OK to say 'I will think about it'. It is OK to say 'I will try'. It is not OK to make promises you cannot keep.
quotes.author: Izey 'Victoria' Odiase

quotes.quote: It's so simple really:Â  If you say you're going to do something, do it.Â  If you start something, finish it.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Action springs not from thought, but from a readiness for responsibility.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: Ability is a wonderful thing, but its value is greatly enhanced byÂ dependability. Ability implies repeatability and accountability.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Ability is important in our quest for success, butÂ dependabilityÂ is critical.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: When you start lying, you stop building trust. When you stop lying, you start building trust.
quotes.author: Saji Ijiyemi

quotes.quote: If you are a man of dependability, you are worth more than if you were clever.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.quote: And the strongest trust is built by the smallest actions, the keeping of the little promises. It is the constant truthfulness, the continuedÂ dependability, the remembrance of minor things, which most inspire confidence and faith.
quotes.author: Walter Wangerin Jr.

quotes.quote: Consistently delivering on your promise value reinforces trust.
quotes.author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quotes.quote: Dependability, integrity, the characteristic of never knowingly doing anything wrong, that you would never cheat anyone, that you would give everybody a fair deal. Character is a sort of an all-inclusive thing. If a man has character, everyone has confidence in him.
quotes.author: Omar N. Bradley

quotes.quote: Ability is important in our quest for success, but dependability is critical.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: When friendships are real, they are not glass threads or frost work, but the solidest things we can know.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: When faced with a challenge, look for a way, not a way out.
quotes.author: D.L. Weatherford

quotes.quote: If your actions don't live up to your words, you have nothing to say.
quotes.author: DaShanne Stokes

quotes.quote: There is nothing dependable that is not backed by character.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.quote: One does not need to be brilliant to be dependable.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.quote: If you tell the truth you don't have to remember anything.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Reliability is a most wonderful virtue. We should cultivate it. We should be consistent about the things we do, so that others will know they can count on us. But more important, we want to be able to count on ourselves. The greatest pain is to have to disappoint one's self.
quotes.author: Sterling W. Sill

quotes.quote: God does not begin by asking us about our ability, but only about our availability, and if we then prove our dependability, he will increase our capability.
quotes.author: Neal A Maxwell

quotes.quote: A person who inspires confidence is one who carries a fine attitude. Wholesome attitude radiates trust, and trust is that quality of life that is fundamental in dependability, and dependability is more to be desired than a brilliant mind.
quotes.author: Joseph Quinney, Jr.

quotes.quote: The greatest ability is dependability.
quotes.author: Bob Jones, Sr.

quotes.quote: Reliability is the precondition for trust.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Schauble

quotes.quote: The only people who count are those who can be counted on.
quotes.author: Henry F. Cope

quotes.quote: The man of dependability is never a drug on the market.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.quote: When you blame others, you give up your power to change.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The ability in greatest demand is reliability.
quotes.author: Lehi Sun

quotes.quote: No man can be truly great who is not absolutely honest and sincere. He may be brilliant, but brilliancy will not of itself bring greatness. Men may admire him, but they will not trust him. Whatever endowments or qualifications a man may have, he must also possess the crowning one of integrity if he becomes actually great.
quotes.author: J. Benjamin Lawrence

quotes.quote: Dependability is sincerity plus will power. Dependability is merely an outcropping of character.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.quote: Dependability is the base upon which all confidence rests in full security. Confidence may be termed the active result of basic dependability.
quotes.author: Robert E. Hicks

quotes.quote: Reliability is a quality that one holds for the convenience of other men. Reliability is that in you which lends you worth in the lives of others. It is important that men should know just what to expect of you. Life is fluid and uncertain. The sun and moon and the stars go His appointed way. We learn to live by knowing that at given times the earth turns its cheek to the sun and swings evenly on its axis. So it is with character; there is no peace, no progress, where there is unreliability. It makes a chaotic world in which each man checks the other instead of helping him.
quotes.author: Louise Collier Willcox

quotes.quote: A man who lacks reliability is utterly useless.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Whoever is careless with the truth in small matters cannot be trusted with important matters.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If a man is not faithful in minor matters, he is not to be trusted in major matters.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.quote: You must take personal responsibility. You cannot change the circumstances, the seasons, or the wind, but you can change yourself.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Reliability is the greatest greatness.
quotes.author: Clarksville Leaf-Chronicle

quotes.quote: The best years of your life are the ones in which you decide your problems are your own. You do not blame them on your mother, the ecology, or the president. You realize that you control your own destiny.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.quote: Dependability is that quality of sureness which makes folks know that the task assigned will be accomplished, that the promise made will be kept, a golden qualityâ€“but to be effective it must be accompanied by at least a moderate amount of something to give and a pleasant manner of giving.
quotes.author: Clarissa A. Beesley

quotes.quote: The willingness to accept responsibility for one's own life is the source from which self-respect springs.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: Power is actualized only when word and deed have not parted company.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: It is easier to do a job right than to explain why you didn't.
quotes.author: Martin Van Buren

quotes.quote: Trustful people are the pure at heart, as they are moved by the zeal of their own trustworthiness.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Without dependability one's ability may be a liability instead of an asset.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: In adults, dependability is the fruit of maturity; in a child, it is the seed.
quotes.author: Richard M. Eyre

quotes.quote: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Dependability is built over time. When people see that you keep your word, make careful promises, and work to correct mistakes their trust and ability to depend on you will grow.
quotes.author: Character First Education

quotes.quote: Sometimes it is not a very big price; other times being dependable means giving up something you want to do in order to fulfill your promise.
quotes.author: Character First Education

quotes.quote: Independence? That's middle-class blasphemy. We are all dependent on one another, every soul of us on earth.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: It is worth everything to be dependable.
quotes.author: Todd W. Van Beck

quotes.quote: The world of service professionals pays its biggest rewards to dependable people, individuals with good judgment and resourcefulness enough to meet situations without unduly leaning on someone.
quotes.author: Todd W. Van Beck

quotes.quote: Today, as always, you will be less heroic and worthy in the mind of your families when you demonstrate dependability even under trying circumstances.
quotes.author: Todd W. Van Beck

quotes.quote: When we successfully demonstrate our dependability, we find that the boss is only too glad not to have to do any bossing.
quotes.author: Todd W. Van Beck

quotes.quote: The more dependable and resourceful we are, the more respect we command and deserve from our superiors and fellow employees alike.
quotes.author: Todd W. Van Beck

quotes.quote: Integrity means that we are trustworthy and dependable and our character is above reproach.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Still water runs the deepest / Like a love complete and through / So peaceful and dependable / I can't say the same about you.
quotes.author: Jesse Ashlock

quotes.quote: True love is faithful / Like spring in April / It is as dependable as time / To hold on and survive / When other loves might say goodbye.
quotes.author: Nicole C. Mullen

quotes.quote: When you want someone, I'll be there for you / And when you need someone, I'm dependable / When your world is falling apart, you can lean on me / And nothing will come between our hearts for all eternity.
quotes.author: Christopher Eugene McDaniels

quotes.quote: I feel so safe when I'm in your arms cause you're all man / You're heaven on earth and so dependable / Together we're a team that's just unbendable / I want the whole wide world to know you're my man.
quotes.author: Billy Arr

quotes.quote: Starting tonight and from now on / I will be yours and yours alone / Dependable and strong / A rock by your side / I'll be beside you through the storm / You'll have a fire to keep you warm.
quotes.author: Fowler

quotes.quote: Not every person with ability is dependable, and not every dependable person has ability.
quotes.author: Billy McConnel

quotes.quote: Dependability is the combination of honesty and commitment.
quotes.author: Billy McConell

quotes.quote: Dependability in the workplace is simply a matter of doing what one says, and, as such, dependability is fundamentally dependent upon personal honesty.
quotes.author: Billy McConell

quotes.quote: To become trustworthy and dependable, one must fulfill his promise.
quotes.author: Sirshree

quotes.quote: If you want to be dependable, never give the excuse that you don't have any time, because you have the same amount of time every day that any successful person has.
quotes.author: Sirshree

quotes.quote: If you recognize every opportunity and learn to take advantage of it, then you will learn the art of taking right decisions and become dependable.
quotes.author: Sirshree

quotes.quote: I learned that 'Mike, you get your first job on your ability and every job after that on your dependability.'
quotes.author: Mike Royer

quotes.quote: Punctuality is closely related to faithfulness and dependability. Being tardy can be linked to uninterest, apathy, slothfulness, and procrastination.
quotes.author: Sterling W. Sill

quotes.quote: For like a rugged tree you are hard and sound at the core.
quotes.author: H. Rider Haggard

quotes.quote: You can't give real responsibilities to the shady shoulders. The weak may learn, but a shady person will always fall flat on face.
quotes.author: Sarvesh Jain

quotes.quote: Do actions agree with words? There's your measure of reliability. Never confine yourself to the words.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: Don't make promises unless you will keep them. Not planning to keep them. Will keep them. Reliability is one of the keys to any good relationship, and good customer service is no exception.
quotes.author: Susan Ward

quotes.quote: Just as the value of a house lies in its location, The value of a mind lies in its depth, The value of giving lies in the presence of a generous spirit, The value of words lies in their reliability.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: For everyone you create to be dependent on you, you are equally dependent on them. Neither relationship is healthy.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: We are dependent on each other. Therefore, replenishing the soil, replenishing society and being part of one continuum - that's the new story.
quotes.author: Satish Kumar

quotes.quote: Relying on another is an expression of attachment, not love, a manifestation of insecurity and suffering, not understanding the true nature of our lives.
quotes.author: Brenda Shoshanna

quotes.quote: We are all dependent on one another, every soul of us on earth.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: We are dependent on God's power through every step of our redemption.
quotes.author: Jonathan Edwards

quotes.quote: Everything is dependent upon energy. Energy is attention. Attention is awareness.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: The more dependent you are, the more ignorant you must be, and that's how they want you.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: You are dependent if you allow the weaknesses of other people to ruin your emotional life!
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: A dependent clause is like a dependent child: incapable of standing on its own but able to cause a lot of trouble.
quotes.author: William Safire

quotes.quote: It's very dependent on your state of mind. And your emotional state as well. And a lot of it comes pouring out, you don't really have that much control with it.
quotes.author: Eric Clapton

quotes.quote: It's humiliating to be dependent, anyway, but it's still a poorer pass to have no one to depend on.
quotes.author: John Wyndham

quotes.quote: It is frightening how dependent on drugs we are all becoming and how easy it is for doctors to prescribe them as the universal panacea for our ills.
quotes.author: Prince Charles

quotes.quote: We are critically dependent on the Internet, and it's ingrained in our way of life.
quotes.author: Amber Rudd

quotes.quote: Stop reliance on human effort. Seek divine power.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: We are so reliant on power and technology for everything.
quotes.author: Billy Burke

quotes.quote: One of the signs of relying on deeds is loss of hope when a misstep occurs.
quotes.author: Ibn Ata Allah

quotes.quote: Relying on God has to begin all over again every day as if nothing had yet been done.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: But relying on one person for your every need is so dangerous. One set of hands isn't enough to keep you from falling.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison Allen

quotes.quote: Stop relying on miracles to get the job done. Start relying on consistency and hard work, it never fails.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Better not think too much. Relying more on the body: it is more trustworthy.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Relying on words to lead you to the truth is like relying on an incomplete formal system to lead you to the truth. A formal system will give you some truths, but as we shall soon see, a formal system, no matter how powerful cannot lead to all truths.
quotes.author: Douglas Hofstadter

quotes.quote: Relying on the face might be human nature - even babies prefer to look at attractive people. But, of course, judging someone based on the geometry of his features is, from a moral and legal standpoint, no better than judging him based on the color of his skin.
quotes.author: Paul Bloom

quotes.quote: Relying on the power of kindness is a sensitive undertaking. The challenge is to inspire people to be kind more often without tainting the selflessness that comes from doing something nice with no ulterior motive.
quotes.author: Daniel Lubetzky

quotes.quote: Relying on someone else to be successful only ties you down and limits you.
quotes.author: Fabrizio Moreira

quotes.quote: Everything is dependent upon your state of mind. That is all there is, states of mind, ten thousand of them. Beyond all states of mind is nirvana.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Relying too much on proof distracts you from the real mission–which is emotional connection.
quotes.author: Seth

quotes.quote: Relying only on logic, on what can be factually established, may inform or intimidate, but it will rarely stir anyone into action or change.
quotes.author: Charlotte Beers

quotes.quote: The way you look is so dependent on the way you take care of yourself.
quotes.author: Martina Mcbride

quotes.quote: Life is tough my darling, but so are you.
quotes.author: Stephanie Bennet Henry

quotes.quote: Worry only about what you control. The rest is war.
quotes.author: Matthew J. Hefti

quotes.quote: When we deployed, in our heads, the towel we left hanging next to the shower to dry, would still be hanging there when we got back. Well, it won’t be. If it is, some important questions need to be asked.
quotes.author: Adam Fenner

quotes.quote: The world he had left was not ready for his return, or rather, he was not ready to return to the world he had left.
quotes.author: Matthew J. Hefti

quotes.quote: And that was my homecoming. It was fine, I guess. Getting back feels like your first breath after nearly drowning. Even if it hurts, it's good.
quotes.author: Phil Klay

quotes.quote: Every gun that is made, every warship launched, every rocket fired signifies in the final sense, a theft from those who hunger and are not fed, those who are cold and are not clothed. This world in arms is not spending money alone. It is spending the sweat of its laborers, the genius of its scientists, the hopes of its children. This is not a way of life at all in any true sense. Under the clouds of war, it is humanity hanging on a cross of iron.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: People sleep peaceably in their beds at night only because rough men stand ready to do violence on their behalf.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: A nation that continues year after year to spend more money on military defense than on programs of social uplift is approaching spiritual doom.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: We sleep safely at night because rough men stand ready to visit violence on those who would harm us.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: Out of every one hundred men, ten shouldn't even be there, eighty are just targets, nine are the real fighters, and we are lucky to have them, for they make the battle. Ah, but the one, one is a warrior, and he will bring the others back.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: Let you sell it for a minute / Take some for your enjoyment / The next thing you know / The troops is rallied for deployment
quotes.author: Ken Jordan

quotes.quote: Words get arranged for maximum deployment / Words mean will / There's a whalebone then there's a tale gone wrong / Young gang on my boat, it's the same song / Same quote, nature stretches it out note by note
quotes.author: Marks Giovanni

quotes.quote: Semblance at auction, the belly of the beast / Target implied from tooth and nail deployment / Institution of youth culture self contained / Strategy of dictation read and refined
quotes.author: John Pettibone

quotes.quote: Black troops trade war stories reminiscent of glory / Walk the walk of those before me since I was a shorty / Seen slugs and drugs and unemployment / Terror town y'all was my first deployment / The life of a soldier ain't nothing to toy with
quotes.author: Lonnie Rashin Lynn

quotes.quote: I am a human rocket on a mission of deployment / I've been cocked and loaded, ready for the culmination / I am a human missile guided by a secret agenda / That commands my every thought and deed and wills me on my way
quotes.author: Mark Allen Mothersbaugh

quotes.quote: Into the void, a plea to make it through the night / My kind of man, always right / Dead on deployment, see, your dog went toward the fight / Licking his wounds, the stars in his eyes
quotes.author: Jake Ewald

quotes.quote: Take no prisoners, show no mercy / Short range deployment / It promotes / Long range unenjoyment
quotes.author: George Clinton

quotes.quote: Deployment refers to the assignment of an individual or a military unit to a location away from the home base for a task or a mission.
quotes.author: Ron Avi Astor

quotes.quote: A military service member can be deployed for a training exercise, peacekeeping mission, or to the middle of a warzone, so each deployment carries a unique set of circumstances that can affect the military member's children in different ways.
quotes.author: Ron Avi Astor

quotes.quote: Some experts have observed that there are several emotional phases that families might also experience in relationship to the deployment cycle.
quotes.author: Ron Avi Astor

quotes.quote: A deployment involves a cycle of events with distinct features, set of experiences, and effects in each of at least 3 periods: pre-deployment, deployment, and post-deployment.
quotes.author: Deborah Harrison

quotes.quote: The commencement of the deployment phase is signified by the physical departure of the serving member from his/her home.
quotes.author: Gideon AJ van Dyk

quotes.quote: During deployment, soldiers receive a taxable 'UN additional compensation' for extra work and inconvenience, as well as a tax-free allowance as compensation for additional expenses during deployment.
quotes.author: Stéphanie Vincent Lyk-Jensen

quotes.quote: Deployment to a war zone has a profound impact on the lives of many of the troops who are deployed to foreign soil and on their family members.
quotes.author: Eisen SA

quotes.quote: Military mobilizations and deployments are an all-too-real part of military life. They are not easy to anyone.
quotes.author: Janet I. Farley

quotes.quote: In the last decade or so, military families have had lots of practice saying goodbye to their uniformed spouses who were being deployed, not just once, but multiple times.
quotes.author: Janet I. Farley

quotes.quote: It's hard enough dealing with one deployment. Dealing with multiple, one right after the other? Let's just say it can take a real toll in the service member.
quotes.author: Janet I. Farley

quotes.quote: When you first learn about the deployment, denial may be your best friend, however, you start to mentally imagine what it will be like to live without your spouse for a long period of time.
quotes.author: Janet I. Farley

quotes.quote: I'm going to be judicious as to how I use the military. It needs to be in our vital interest, the mission needs to be clear, and the exit strategy obvious.
quotes.author: George W.Bush

quotes.quote: Every nation, in every region, now has a decision to make. Either you are with us, or you are with the terrorists.
quotes.author: George W.Bush

quotes.quote: Goodbyes are not forever. Goodbyes are not the end. They simply mean i'll miss you until we meet again!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Military deployments have never been something to enjoy, but the consequence of the actions, the shared nature of the sacrifices, and the nobility of the cause are invigorating. To be clear, I'm not talking about the killing and the death; rather, the sense of purpose that pervades every action, reaction, and outcome.
quotes.author: Pete Hegseth

quotes.quote: Deployment keeps us apart but love keeps us together.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I believe there should be no arbitrary date set for withdrawal and yet no permanent, unending deployment. No cut and run, yet measured progress in helping a people who want to be free without an illusion of overnight success.
quotes.author: Rick Renzi

quotes.quote: Deployment tears your heart in two, only reconnected at homecoming.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There is no way to imagine what it feels like to be shot at. I will never be with him when he is the most scared.
quotes.author: Melissa Seligman

quotes.quote: In depression this faith in deliverance, in ultimate restoration, is absent. The pain is unrelenting, and what makes the condition intolerable is the foreknowledge that no remedy will come — not in a day, an hour, a month, or a minute . . . And this results in a striking experience — one which I have called, borrowing military terminology, the situation of the walking wounded.
quotes.author: William Styron

quotes.quote: Though I am often in the depths of misery, there still calmness, pure harmony, and music inside me.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: There were still the periods of darkness, the spasms of panic; but now he knew they were not real, and because he knew this he overcame them.
quotes.author: V.S. Naipaul

quotes.quote: Depression is when you have lots of love, but no one's taking.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Depression is unfocused self-pity.
quotes.author: Bill Wilson

quotes.quote: Depression is the inability to construct a future.
quotes.author: Dr. Rollo May

quotes.quote: A lot of people don't realize that depression is an illness. I don't wish it on anyone, but if they would know how it feels, I swear they would think twice before they just shrug it.
quotes.author: Jonathan Davis

quotes.quote: That's the thing about depression: A human being can survive almost anything, as long as she sees the end in sight. But depression is so insidious, and it compounds daily, that it's impossible to ever see the end. The fog is like a cage without a key.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quotes.quote: Depression occurs when one looks back with no pride, and looks forward with no hope.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Depression is melancholy minus its charms, the animation, the fits.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: Instead of seeing depression as a dysfunction, it is a functioning phenomenon. It stops you cold, sets you down, makes you damn miserable.
quotes.author: James Hillman

quotes.quote: Depression is something that makes you lose your sight.
quotes.author: Michael Schenker

quotes.quote: Depression scares people off. It makes me laugh that it has that kind of effect.
quotes.author: Siobhan Fahey

quotes.quote: I don’t think anybody's continually happy, uh, except idiots, you know. You know, you have to have little moments of depression.
quotes.author: Rube Goldberg

quotes.quote: If you feel depressed you shouldn't go out on the street because it will show on your face and you'll give it to others. Misery is a communicable disease.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: People with depression have something very valuable to teach us... how to live when it doesn't ever feel good.
quotes.author: Kay Warren

quotes.quote: There are wounds that never show on the body that are deeper and more hurtful than anything that bleeds.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: It's like being in a glass elevator in the middle of a crowded mall; you see everything and would love to join in, but the door won't open so you can't.
quotes.author: Lisa Moore Sherman

quotes.quote: It's not always the tears that measure the pain. Sometimes it's the smile we fake.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Depression is like being in a totally round room and looking for a corner to sit in.
quotes.author: Laura Sloate

quotes.quote: The most terrible poverty is loneliness, and the feeling of being unloved.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Telling a depressed person to be happy is the same as telling a cancer patient to cure themselves.
quotes.author: Dissentient

quotes.quote: Often the people with the strongest hearts carry the heaviest ones.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You sometimes think you want to disappear, but all you really want is to be found.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Depression begins with disappointment. When disappointment festers in our soul, it leads to discouragement.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: You largely constructed your depression. It wasn't given to you. Therefore, you can deconstruct it.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.quote: Depression is like falling so deep down the rabbit hole you forget what the sky looks like.
quotes.author: Robin Brodsky Curtin

quotes.quote: Tears are often the telescope by which men see far into heaven.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The worst kind of pain is when you're smiling just to stop the tears for falling.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: No one is depressed when they're being chased by a bear.
quotes.author: Adam Carolla

quotes.quote: Depression is living in a body that fights to survive, with a mind that tries to die.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you are chronically down, it is a lifelong fight to keep from sinking.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quotes.quote: There is no greater sorrow than to recall in misery the time when we were happy.
quotes.author: Dante

quotes.quote: Having depression is being in an abusive relationship with yourself.
quotes.author: Emily Dotterer

quotes.quote: If we admit our depression openly and freely, those around us get from it an experience of freedom rather than the depression itself.
quotes.author: Dr. Rollo May

quotes.quote: Sometimes It's easier to pretend that you don't care, than to admit it's killing you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Do not be depressed. Do not let your weakness make you impatient. Instead, let the serenity of your spirit shine through your face. Let the joy of your mind burst forth.
quotes.author: Peter Damian

quotes.quote: Being depressed is like being grounded except it's your brain ruining your life instead of your mom.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If depression is creeping up and must be faced, learn something about the nature of the beast: You may escape without a mauling.
quotes.author: Dr. R. W. Shepherd

quotes.quote: A new study found that people who are depressed have a greater risk of stroke. Well that should cheer them up.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: When women are depressed, they eat or go shopping. Men invade another country. It's a whole different way of thinking.
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.quote: The walls we build around us to keep sadness out also keeps out the joy.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: You need self-confidence and determination: feeling depressed and losing hope will never really help to correct any situation.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: It's a bit like walking down a long, dark corridor never knowing when the light will go on.
quotes.author: Neil Lennon

quotes.quote: Depression is feeling like you've lost something but having no clue when or where you last had it. Then one day you realize what you lost is yourself.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I'm tired of trying, sick of crying, I know I've been smiling, but inside I'm dying.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Having depression is like seeing a rainbow in grayscale.
quotes.author: Hazel Strickland

quotes.quote: Depression is a prison where you are both the suffering prisoner and the cruel jailer.
quotes.author: Dorothy Rowe

quotes.quote: You handle depression in much the same way you handle a tiger.
quotes.author: R. W. Shepherd

quotes.quote: You are allowed to feel messed up and inside out. It doesn't mean you're defective - it just means you're human.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not; and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Losing your life is not the worst thing that can happen. The worst thing is to lose your reason for living.
quotes.author: Jo Nesbo

quotes.quote:
Hiding in my room, safe within my womb,
I touch no one and no one touches me.
I am a rock,
I am an island.
And a rock feels no pain;
And an island never cries.
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.quote: Before any great achievement, some measure of depression is very usual.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: The only thing more exhausting than being depressed is pretending that you're not.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote:
When you feel worried and depressed,
consciously form a smile on your face and act upbeat
until the happy feeling becomes genuine.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's heavy like you're carrying an elephant. Sometimes it's dark; you wonder if you'll ever see light. Sometimes it's bleak; you wonder if you'll make it through. And some days there are no words to describe it.
quotes.author: Tonia Funk Brassell

quotes.quote: Having depression is like being trapped in a really bad thunderstorm. You don't know when it's going to hit, you never know how long it's going to last, and when it finally passes, you're left to survey the damages and pick up the pieces.
quotes.author: Tiffany Johnson

quotes.quote: Depression is like a bruise that never goes away. A bruise in your mind.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Eugenides

quotes.quote: Depression is frustrating. It's knowing there's so much to be grateful for and happy about and to enjoy, but you just can't get there.
quotes.author: Allie Griffin

quotes.quote: Depression is like quicksand â€” the more you try to escape on your own, the deeper you sink. Use the supports, tools and resources thrown at you from those on the outside.
quotes.author: Jamie Awtry McClintic

quotes.quote: Depression is nourished by a lifetime of ungrieved and unforgiven hurts.
quotes.author: Penelope Sweet

quotes.quote: There is nothing more depressing, than having everything, and still feeling sad.
quotes.author: Janet Jackson

quotes.quote: Depression is like drowning. Except you can see everyone else around you breathing.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: My unhappiness has become a steady, calm quiet sort of misery. It is always with me and when for a moment something or other stirs me from its immediate ravages (thank God that is still possible) — I wonder at its absence.
quotes.author: Lorraine Hansberry

quotes.quote: I am now so depressed I have not an Idea to put to paper — my hand feels like lead — and yet it is an unpleasant numbness it does not take away the pain of existence.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: I am so angry with myself because I cannot do what I should like to do, and at such a moment one feels as if one were lying bound hand and foot at the bottom of a deep dark well, utterly helpless.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: The gray drizzle of horror induced by depression takes on the quality of physical pain. But it is not an immediately identifiable pain, like that of a broken limb. It may be more accurate to say that despair, owing to some evil trick played upon the sick brain by the inhabiting psyche, comes to resemble the diabolical discomfort of being imprisoned in a fiercely overheated room. And because no breeze stirs this caldron, because there is no escape from this smothering confinement, it is entirely natural that the victim begins to think ceaselessly of oblivion.
quotes.author: William Styron

quotes.quote: Sometimes one has simply to endure a period of depression for what it may hold of illumination if one can live through it, attentive to what it exposes or demands.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: Depression is a disorder of the ‘I,’ failing in your own eyes relative to your goals.
quotes.author: Martin Seligman

quotes.quote: I am now the most miserable man living.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: There are different degrees of feeling when you have a Black Dog in your life. At one end of the scale you may feel sad, flat, teary, or blue, and at the other, you are devoid of feeling altogether and life is overwhelmingly difficult.
quotes.author: Matthew Johnstone

quotes.quote: Everything passes away — suffering, pain, blood, hunger, pestilence. The sword will pass away too, but the stars will still remain when the shadows of our presence and our deeds have vanished from the earth. There is no man who does not know that. Why, then, will we not turn our eyes toward the stars? Why?
quotes.author: Mikhail Bulgakov

quotes.quote: Depression is the flaw in love. To be creatures who love, we must be creatures who can despair at what we lose, and depression is the mechanism of that despair.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: My depression had grown on me as that vine had conquered the oak; it had been a sucking thing that had wrapped itself around me, ugly and more alive than I. It had had a life of its own that bit by bit asphyxiated all of my life out of me. At the worst stage of major depression, I had moods that I knew were not my moods: they belonged to the depression, as surely as the leaves on that tree's high branches belonged to the vine.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: I knew that the sun was rising and setting, but little of its light reached me. I felt myself sagging under what was much stronger than I; first I could not use my ankles, and then I could not control my knees, and then my waist began to break under the strain, and then my shoulders turned in, and in the end I was compacted and fetal, depleted by this thing that was crushing me without holding me. Its tendrils threatened to pulverize my mind and my courage and my stomach, and crack my bones and desiccate my body. It went on glutting itself on me when there seemed nothing left to feed it.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: It wearies me, you say it wearies you; / But how I caught it, found it, or came by it / What stuff 'tis made of, whereof it is born / I am to learn; / And such a want-wit sadness makes of me, / That I have much ado to know myself.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I felt a Funeral, in my Brain, / And Mourners to and fro / Kept treading — treading — till it seemed / That Sense was breaking through —
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Instead of medication, / I want sunshine / & birdsongs / — the kind of laughter / that begins in my chest / & tumbles / out & across / my frame like waves / lapping at the shore of a beach.
quotes.author: M.J. Fievre

quotes.quote: Well, I can usually come our of it when I have the blues, / But now I'm so depressed that I have nothing more to lose.
quotes.author: Bill Granse

quotes.quote: Of course, despair is not your friend / or your enemy, you mustn't blame him! / He is your persistent creditor, and you? / You are the gambler with your soul as the stakes.
quotes.author: Lin Huiyin

quotes.quote: The sickness of desire, that in dark days / Looks on the imagination of despair, / Forgetteth man, and stinteth God his praise; / Nor but in sleep findeth a cure for care.
quotes.author: Robert Seymour Bridges

quotes.quote: It gives, to think that our immortal being / No more shall need such garments; and yet man, / As long as he shall be the child of earth, / Might almost 'weep to have' what he may lose, / Nor be himself extinguished, but survive, / Abject, depressed, forlorn, disconsolate.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Oh, though oft depressed and lonely, / All my fears are laid aside, / If I but remember only / Such as these have lived and died!
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: There was no water in my eyes, but my spirits were depressed / And my heart lay like a sodden, soggy doughnut in my breast.
quotes.author: Eugene Field

quotes.quote: Dispirited became our friend — / Depressed his moral pecker —
quotes.author: William Schwenck Gilbert

quotes.quote: A grief that kept her ever brooding yet / And wholly melancholy and depressed, — / Nor yet could she find sleep by night nor rest / By day, for thinking — thinking — thinking still
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: I sat depressed; till, later, / My Love came; / But something in the chamber / Dimmed our flame, — / An emanation, making our due words fall tame,
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: Exasperated, a drunk that sees things doubled, / I stumbled home, slammed the door, terrified, / sick, depressed, mind feverish and troubled, / wounded by mystery, the absurd, outside! / In vain my reason tried to take command, / its efforts useless in the tempest’s roar, / my soul, a mastless barge, danced, and danced, / over some monstrous sea without a shore!
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: But I'm not crazy, I'm just a little unwell / I know right now you can't tell / But stay awhile and maybe then you'll see / A different side of me / I'm not crazy, I'm just a little impaired / I know right now you don't care / But soon enough you're gonna think of me / And how I used to be, me
quotes.author: Robert Thomas

quotes.quote: I'm holding on / Why is everything so heavy? / Holding on / So much more than I can carry / I keep dragging around what's bringing me down / If I just let go, I'd be set free
quotes.author: Brad Delson; Chester Bennington; Julia Michaels; Justin Tranter; Mike Shinoda; Dave Farrell

quotes.quote: I don't like my mind right now / Stacking up problems that are so unnecessary / Wish that I could slow things down / I wanna let go but there's comfort in the panic
quotes.author: Brad Delson; Chester Bennington; Julia Michaels; Justin Tranter; Mike Shinoda; Dave Farrell

quotes.quote: I never had a place to call my own / I never had a home / Ain't nobody callin' my phone / Where you been? Where you at? What's on your mind? / They say every life precious but nobody care about mine
quotes.author: Alessia Caracciolo; Arjun Ivatury; Khalid Robinson; Sir Robert Bryson Hall II

quotes.quote: There are peaks, there are valleys. But they're all kind of carved and smoothed out, and it feels like a low level of despair you live in. Where you're not getting any answers, but you're living OK. And you can smile at the office. You know? But it's a low level of despair.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: I look inside myself and see my heart is black / I see my red door and must have it painted black / maybe then I’ll fade away and not have to face the facts / it’s not easy facing up when your whole world is black
quotes.author: Keith Richards; Mick Jagger

quotes.quote: I hurt myself today / To see if I still feel / I focus on the pain / The only thing that's real / The needle tears a hole / The old familiar sting / Try to kill it all away / But I remember everything
quotes.author: Trent Reznor

quotes.quote: There's a black crow sitting across from me / His wiry legs are crossed / He's dangling my keys, he even fakes a toss / Whatever could it be / That has brought me to this loss?
quotes.author: Justin Deyarmond Edison Vernon

quotes.quote: In my dark times I've still got some problems I know / Driving too fast but just moving to slow / And I've got something I've been trying to let go / Pulling me back every time
quotes.author: Jason Quenneville; Edward Christopher Sheeran; Abel Tesfaye

quotes.quote: Every night I just want to go out, / Get out of my head / Every day I don't want to get up, / Get out of my bed
quotes.author: Paul McCartney

quotes.quote: Hide my head I want to drown my sorrow / No tomorrow, no tomorrow
quotes.author: Roland Orzabal

quotes.quote: All alone it was always there you see / And even on my own / It was always standing next to me / I can see it coming from the edge of the room / Creeping in the streetlight holding my hand in the pale gloom / Can you see it coming now?
quotes.author: James Ellis Ford; Florence Leontine Mary Welch

quotes.quote: Life can get you down so I just numb the way it feels / I drown it with a drink and out-of-date prescription pills / And all the ones that love me they just left me on the shelf / No farewell / So before I save someone else, I've got to save myself
quotes.author: Amy Victoria Wadge; Edward Christopher Sheeran; Timothy Lee McKenzie

quotes.quote: The worst part of depression is that it dulls every positive feeling but intensifies every negative one. Joy is muted; sorrow is amplified.
quotes.author: Oslo Redgrave via Twitter

quotes.quote: Mom, my depression is a shape shifter / One day it is as small as a firefly in the palm of a bear / The next it's the bear / On those days I play dead until the bear leaves me alone
quotes.author: Sabrina Benaim

quotes.quote: Nothing is really wrong and everything is really wrong.
quotes.author: Ken Willidau

quotes.quote: I suffer from post-everything depression. Particularly after signing off the Internet.
quotes.author: Ken Willidau

quotes.quote: You know you're depressed when you have daymares.
quotes.author: Ken Willidau

quotes.quote: Do I look depressed? People are yelling 'jump' at me, walking through the mall.
quotes.author: Ken Willidau

quotes.quote: What, then, is depression? It is hysteria of the spirit.
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: There is something unexplainable in depression [Tungsind]. A person with a sorrow or a worry knows why he sorrows or worries. If a depressed person is asked what the reason is, what it is that weighs [tynge] on him, he will answer: I do not know; I cannot explain it. Therein lies the limitlessness of depression.
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: [D]epression is something real that one does not delete with the stroke of the pen.
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: To destroy an undesirable rate of mental vibration, concentrate on the opposite vibration to the one to be suppressed... What is the source of sadness but feebleness of the mind? What gives it power but the want of reason? Rouse yourself to the combat, and it quits the field before you strike.
quotes.author: Khemetic Saying

quotes.quote: Depression never brings me what I want; / My virtue will be warped and marred by it. / If there is a remedy when trouble strikes, / What reason is there for despondency? / And if there is no help for it, / What use is there in being sad?
quotes.author: Shantideva

quotes.quote: Despair is a mental state which exaggerates not only our misery but also our weakness.
quotes.author: Marquis De Vauvenargues

quotes.quote: It is despair, and despair alone, that begets heroic hope, absurd hope, mad hope.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.quote: Many an attack of depression is nothing but the expression of regret at having to be virtuous.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Stekel

quotes.quote: Men have been depressed now for many years in their male and resplendent selves, depressed into dejection and almost abjection. Is that not evil?
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Despair is the absolute extreme of self-love. It is reached when a man deliberately turns his back on all help from anyone else in order to taste the rotten luxury of knowing himself to be lost.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Distress tends to make you feel constricted in your personal identity, but if you are thinking of the distress of the whole of humanity, or even just the sadness of people around you in your everyday life, you begin to realize how puny your concern for yourself is.
quotes.author: Vilayat Khan

quotes.quote: Hopelessness can arise, I think, only from an inability to face the present, to live in the present, to live as a responsible being among other beings in this sacred world here and now, which is all we have, and all we need to found our hope upon.
quotes.author: Ursula Le Guin

quotes.quote: Depression can be a signal to reexamine assumptions and change strategies—a slowing down to reorient. If we are to deal effectively with problems, we have to see them realistically. And we have to define our purpose... The best antidepressants are expression and action—engagement in the struggle. That way depression is not an end, but a meaningful beginning.
quotes.author: Marilyn Ferguson

quotes.quote: While I breathe, I hope.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: Never despair but if you do, work on in despair.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Darkness is only driven out with light, not more darkness.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Expect to have hope rekindled. Expect your prayers to be answered in wondrous ways. The dry seasons in life do not last. The spring rains will come again.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: It is both a blessing and a curse to feel everything so very deeply.
quotes.author: David Jones

quotes.quote: You say you're depressed—all I see is resilience.
