quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: What mental health needs is more sunlight, more candor, more unashamed conversation.
quotes.author: Glenn Close

quotes.quote: I am living in a nightmare, from which from time to time I wake in sleep.
quotes.author: Ursula Le Guin

quotes.quote: I am in that temper that if I were under water I would scarcely kick to come to the top.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: It is sometimes an appropriate response to reality to go insane.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: I saw the world from the stars' point of view, and it looked unbearably lonely.
quotes.author: Shaun David Hutchinson

quotes.quote: In addition to my other numerous acquaintances, I have one more intimate confidant... My depression is the most faithful mistress I have known—no wonder, then, that I return the love.
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Into the darkness they go, the wise and the lovely.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: I was so scared to give up depression, fearing that somehow the worst part of me was actually all of me.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quotes.quote: One need not be a chamber to be haunted.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: You are so brave and quiet, I forget you are suffering.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: I became insane with long intervals of horrible sanity.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: One of the hardest things was learning that I was worth recovery.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: A person is, among all else, a material thing, easily torn and not easily mended.
quotes.author: Ian McEwan

quotes.quote: Mental pain is less dramatic than physical pain, but it is more common and also more hard to bear.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Our Generation has had no Great war, no Great Depression. Our war is spiritual. Our depression is our lives.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: It is very hard to explain to people who have never known serious depression or anxiety the sheer continuous intensity of it. There is no off switch.
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: If you are depressed, you are living in the past. If you are anxious, you are living in the future. If you are at peace you are living in the present.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The sun stopped shining for me is all. The whole story is: I am sad. I am sad all the time and the sadness is so heavy that I can’t get away from it. Not ever.
quotes.author: Nina LaCour

quotes.quote: The pupil dilates in darkness and in the end finds light, just as the soul dilates in misfortune and in the end finds God.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Depression on my left, loneliness on my right. They don’t need to show me their badges. I know these guys very well.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: At times, I feel overwhelmed and my depression leads me into darkness.
quotes.author: Dorothy Hamill

quotes.quote: Depression taught me the importance of compassion and hard work, and that you can overcome enormous obstacles.
quotes.author: Rob Delaney

quotes.quote: Perhaps depression is caused by asking oneself too many unanswerable questions.
quotes.author: Miriam Toews

quotes.quote: It’s so difficult to describe depression to someone who’s never been there, because it’s not sadness. I know sadness. Sadness is to cry and to feel. But it’s that cold absence of feeling—that really hollowed-out feeling.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: A depressing and difficult passage has prefaced every page I have turned in life.
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë

quotes.quote: The five stages – denial, anger, bargaining, depression, and acceptance – are a part of the framework that makes up our learning to live with the one we lost. They are tools to help us frame and identify what we may be feeling. But they are not stops on some linear timeline in grief.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: Concern should drive us into action and not into a depression. No man is free who cannot control himself.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is followed by disappointment and even depression, and then by renewed enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Murray Gell-Mann

quotes.quote: It’s recession when your neighbor loses his job; it’s a depression when you lose yours.
quotes.author: Harry Truman

quotes.quote: That terrible mood of depression of whether it’s any good or not is what is known as The Artist’s Reward.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Grief is depression in proportion to circumstance; Depression is grief out of proportion to circumstance.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: Pain is always emotional. Fear and depression keep constant company with chronic hurting.
quotes.author: Siri Hustvedt

quotes.quote: The opposite of play is not work – the opposite of play is depression.
quotes.author: Stuart Brown

quotes.quote: All depression has its roots in self-pity, and all self-pity is rooted in people taking themselves too seriously.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: This is my depressed stance. When you’re depressed, it makes a lot of difference how you stand. The worst thing you can do is straighten up and hold your head high because then you’ll start to feel better. If you’re going to get any joy out of being depressed, you’ve got to stand like this.
quotes.author: Charles Shultz

quotes.quote: Noble deeds and hot baths are the best cures for depression.
quotes.author: Dodie Smith

quotes.quote: There is no normal life that is free of pain. It’s the very wrestling with our problems that can be the impetus for our growth.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: There will always be suffering. But we must not suffer over the suffering.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Some changes look negative on the surface but you will soon realize that space is being created in your life for something new to emerge.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Only stepping out of the old ruts will bring new insights.
quotes.author: Andy Grove

quotes.quote: Before you diagnose yourself with depression or low self-esteem, first make sure that you are not, in fact, just surrounded by assholes.
quotes.author: William Gibson

quotes.quote: When people don’t know exactly what depression is, they can be judgmental.
quotes.author: Marion Cotillard

quotes.quote: When you’re surrounded by all these people, it can be lonelier than when you’re by yourself. You can be in a huge crowd, but if you don’t feel like you can trust anyone or talk to anybody, you feel like you’re really alone.
quotes.author: Fiona Apple

quotes.quote: One swallow does not make a summer, neither does one fine day; similarly one day or brief time of happiness does not make a person entirely happy.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Do not brood over your past mistakes and failures as this will only fill your mind with grief, regret and depression. Do not repeat them in the future.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.quote: If you want to conquer the anxiety of life, live in the moment, live in the breath.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Don’t try to solve serious matters in the middle of the night.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: Life is ten percent what you experience and ninety percent how you respond to it.
quotes.author: Dorothy M. Neddermeyer

quotes.quote: A melancholy-looking man, he had the appearance of one who has searched for the leak in life’s gas-pipe with a lighted candle.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: Crying is one of the highest devotional songs. One who knows crying, knows spiritual practice. If you can cry with a pure heart, nothing else compares to such a prayer. Crying includes all the principles of Yoga.
quotes.author: Kripalvanandji

quotes.quote: I didn’t want my picture taken because I was going to cry. I didn’t know why I was going to cry, but I knew that if anybody spoke to me or looked at me too closely the tears would fly out of my eyes and the sobs would fly out of my throat and I’d cry for a week. I could feel the tears brimming and sloshing in me like water in a glass that is unsteady and too full.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: The optimist proclaims that we live in the best of all possible worlds; and the pessimist fears this is true.
quotes.author: James Branch Cabell

quotes.quote: Tonight, once more, life sinks its teeth into my heart.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Nothing can cure the soul but the senses, just as nothing can cure the senses but the soul.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Being sad and being depressed are two different things. Also, people going through depression don’t look so, while someone sad will look sad. The most common reaction is, ‘How can you be depressed? You have everything going for you. You are the supposed number one heroine and have a plush home, car, movies… What else do you want?
quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

quotes.quote: Recovering from the suicide of a loved one, you need all the help you can get, so I very much recommend a meditation program. The whole picture of how to recover from this has to do with body, mind, and spirit. That’s applicable to any kind of depression.
quotes.author: Judy Collins

quotes.quote: The deepest fear we have, ‘the fear beneath all fears,’ is the fear of not measuring up, the fear of judgment. It’s this fear that creates the stress and depression of everyday life.
quotes.author: Tullian Tchividjian

quotes.quote: There is no point treating a depressed person as though she were just feeling sad, saying, ‘There now, hang on, you’ll get over it.’ Sadness is more or less like a head cold – with patience, it passes. Depression is like cancer.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: I’ve got a bad case of the 3:00 am guilts – you know, when you lie in bed awake and replay all those things you didn’t do right? Because, as we all know, nothing solves insomnia like a nice warm glass of regret, depression and self-loathing.
quotes.author: D.D. Barant

quotes.quote: It’s my experience that people are a lot more sympathetic if they can see you hurting, and for the millionth time in my life I wish for measles or smallpox or some other easily understood disease just to make it easier on me and also on them.
quotes.author: Jennifer Niven

quotes.quote: I don’t want to see anyone. I lie in the bedroom with the curtains drawn and nothingness washing over me like a sluggish wave. Whatever is happening to me is my own fault. I have done something wrong, something so huge I can’t even see it, something that’s drowning me. I am inadequate and stupid, without worth. I might as well be dead.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: A big part of depression is feeling really lonely, even if you’re in a room full of a million people.
quotes.author: Lilly Singh

quotes.quote: Depression, for me, has been a couple of different things – but the first time I felt it, I felt helpless, hopeless, and things I had never felt before. I lost myself and my will to live.
quotes.author: Ginger Zee

quotes.quote: Depression is being colorblind and constantly told how colorful the world is.
quotes.author: Atticus

quotes.quote: Maybe we all have darkness inside of us and some of us are better at dealing with it than others.
quotes.author: Jasmine Warga

quotes.quote: It's a bit like walking down a long, dark corridor, never knowing when the light will go on.
quotes.author: Neil Lennon

quotes.quote: Depression presents itself as a realism regarding the rottenness of the world in general and the rottenness of your life in particular. But the realism is merely a mask for depression's actual essence, which is an overwhelming estrangement from humanity. The more persuaded you are of your unique access to the rottenness, the more afraid you become of engaging with the world; and the less you engage with the world, the more perfidiously happy-faced the rest of humanity seems for continuing to engage with it.
quotes.author: Jonathan Franzen

quotes.quote: To perceive is to suffer.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Wanting to be happy is not the worst thing in the world, but wanting it badly enough to make us depressed is.
quotes.author: John Washington

quotes.quote: Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not; and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The tragedy of life is not that it ends so soon, but that we wait so long to begin it.
quotes.author: W. M. Lewis

quotes.quote: Death has a tendency to encourage a depressing view of war.Â
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.quote: The walls we build around us to keep sadness out also keeps out the joy.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: You are allowed to feel messed up and inside out. It doesn't mean you're defective - it just means you're human.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: Every so often, we all gaze into the abyss. It's a depressing fact of life that eventually the clock expires; eventually the sand in the hourglass runs out. It's the leaving behind of everything that matters to us that hurts the most.Â
quotes.author: Ben Shapiro

quotes.quote: Depression is like a bruise that never goes away. A bruise in your mind. You just got to be careful not to touch it where it hurts. It's always there, though.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Eugenides

quotes.quote: If you board the wrong train, it is no use running along the corridor in the other direction.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: For all sad words of tongue and pen, the saddest are these, 'It might have been.'
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: Sometimes you break your heart in the right way, if you know what I mean.
quotes.author: Gregory David Roberts

quotes.quote: Living with hope is like rubbing up against a cheese grater. It keeps taking slices off you until there's so little left you just crumble.
quotes.author: Catherine Austen

quotes.quote: She can paint a pretty picture but this story has a twist. The paintbrush is a razor and the canvas is her wrist.
quotes.author: Amy Efaw

quotes.quote: You have moved my world when you came, but you made it shake when you left.
quotes.author: Ishael Ryun

quotes.quote: It is a crushing moment when you realize that your life has either been a series of huge mistakes, or worse; it hasn't.
quotes.author: Temperance

quotes.quote: We begin to die from the moment we are born, for birth is the cause of death. The nature of decay is inherent in youth, the nature of sickness is inherent in health, in the midst of life we are verily in death.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: The love that lasts the longest is the love that is never returned.
quotes.author: William Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Anger, resentment and jealousy doen't change the heart of others-it only changes yours.
quotes.author: Shannon Alder

quotes.quote: To love and not be loved; is to die and not be dead
quotes.author: Jerry Darroch

quotes.quote: It's so difficult to describe depression to someone who's never been there, because it's not sadness.
quotes.author: J.K Rowling

quotes.quote: People aren't born sad; we make them that way.
quotes.author: Nikita Gill

quotes.quote: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: And I knew it was bad when I woke up in the mornings and the only thing I looked forward to was going back to bed.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Loneliness and the feeling of being unwanted is the most terrible poverty.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Death comes to us all; we can only choose how to face it when it comes.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: Absence diminishes mediocre passions and increases great ones, as the wind extinguishes candles and fans fires.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: For in all adversity of fortune the worst sort of misery is to have been happy.
quotes.author: Boethius

quotes.quote: There are wounds that never show on the body that are deeper and more hurtful than anything that bleeds.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: I only care to see doctors when I am in perfect health; then they comfort one, but when one is ill they are most depressing.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Indeed, as anyone who has ever worked among the poor knows only too well, the brotherhood of man is no mere poet's dream, it is a most depressing and humiliating reality.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Never give way to melancholy; resist it steadily, for the habit will encroach.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: Talking about death need not be depressing.
quotes.author: Moxie LaBouche

quotes.quote: It's a depressing habit you have of loving to sneeze and of eating apples as if they were juicer for you and being the first one to exclaim how good the movie is. You depress people. We like apples too.
quotes.author: Laonard Cohen

quotes.quote: I don't really want to talk about the Pistols. It's depressing. It's morbid. It happened, and that's all.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.quote: Noble deeds and hot baths are the best cures for depression.
quotes.author: Dodie Smith

quotes.quote: When women are depressed, they eat or go shopping. Men invade another country. It's a whole different way of thinking.
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.quote: I cannot remember the time when I have not longed for death...For years and years, I used to watch for death as no sick man ever watched for the morning.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: There is this difference between depression and sorrow— sorrowful, you are in great trouble because something matters so much; depressed, you are miserable because nothing really matters.
quotes.author: J.E. Buckrose

quotes.quote: Depression is a very sensible reaction to just about everything we live in now.
quotes.author: Chrystos

quotes.quote: Studies show that 80 percent of the population suffers from depression, and the other 20 percent of you cause it.
quotes.author: Dana Eagle

quotes.quote: This might sound depressing, but depression in the face of sickness was precisely what the Buddha was counseling against; depression arises from the expectation that illness won't, or shouldn't, happen
quotes.author: Bodhipaksa

quotes.quote: If any literary work is emotionally 'depressing,' there is something wrong with either the writing or the reader's response.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Half the spiritual difficulties that men and women suffer arise from a morbid state of health.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: More people are destroyed by unhappiness than by drink, drugs, disease, or even failure. There must be something about sadness which attracts or people would not accept it so readily into their lives.
quotes.author: Hubert Van Zeller

quotes.quote: For there is no despair so absolute as that which comes with the first moments of our first great sorrow when we have not yet known what it is to have suffered and be healed, to have despaired and to have recovered hope.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Then black despair, / The shadows of a starless night, was thrown / Over the world in which I moved alone.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: The severely self rejecting adolescent is his own enemy. He has taken unto himself all the unkindness of his heredity and all the harshness of his environment and then has added something more: everything is his fault and he is no good.
quotes.author: Arthur T. Jersild

quotes.quote: Into each life, some rain must fall / Some days must be dark and dreary.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Sometimes, all you can do is lie in bed, and hope to fall asleep before you fall apart.
quotes.author: William C. Hannan

quotes.quote: Maybe it’s a little depressing to think that my vision of a perfect world is actually so messed up, but I think it means that I don't really understand what ‘perfect’ is.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: What I dream of is an art of balance, of purity and serenity devoid of troubling or depressing subject matter – a soothing, calming influence on the mind, rather like a good armchair which provides relaxation from physical fatigue.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: It sounds depressing, but I think when you truly love someone, you’ll never stop loving them.
quotes.author: Sam Smith

quotes.quote: Every so often, we all gaze into the abyss. It’s a depressing fact of life that eventually the clock expires; eventually, the sand in the hourglass runs out. It’s the leaving behind of everything that matters to us that hurts the most.
quotes.author: Ben Shapiro

quotes.quote: To a profound pessimist about life, being in danger is not depressing.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: You can either look at things in a brutal, truthful way that’s depressing, or you can screw around and have fun.
quotes.author: David Spade

quotes.quote: There is no sense in wrapping your mind in the barbwires of depressing or negative thoughts.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: If I do something that depresses, it’s not because I'm depressed, but because political life and history are depressing.
quotes.author: Anselm Kiefer

quotes.quote: I'm just trying to say that it should reassure us that the inevitable traumas of being human do end up producing some good. Otherwise, the human condition is overwhelmingly depressing.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: If you know someone who's depressed, please resolve never to ask them why. Depression isn't a straightforward response to a bad situation; depression just is, like the weather.
quotes.author: Stephen Fry

quotes.quote: Depression is the most unpleasant thing I have ever experienced. . . . It is that absence of being able to envisage that you will ever be cheerful again. The absence of hope. That very deadened feeling, which is so very different from feeling sad. Sad hurts but it's a healthy feeling. It is a necessary thing to feel. Depression is very different.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Depression is anger without enthusiasm
quotes.author: Anon

quotes.quote: Depression is like a bruise that never goes away. A bruise in your mind. You just got to be careful not to touch it where it hurts. It's always there, though.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Eugenides

quotes.quote: All depression has its roots in self-pity, and all self-pity is rooted in people taking themselves too seriously.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Depression is the flaw in love. To be creatures who love, we must be creatures who can despair at what we lose, and depression is the mechanism of that despair.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: Depression is not only an experience in the mind; it is also an affliction of the body. There is a lack of energy, a painful heaviness; sadness and a grief that permeate to our marrow.
quotes.author: Philip Martin

quotes.quote: If depression is creeping up and must be faced, learn something about the nature of the beast: You may escape without a mauling.
quotes.author: Dr. R. W. Shepherd

quotes.quote: Many people think that depression is something you just have to live with when you get older, but it's not.
quotes.author: Tom Bosley

quotes.quote: Depression is boring, I think and I would do better to make some soup and light up the cave.
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: Depression is useful. It signals that you need to make changes in your life, it challenges your tendency to withdraw, it reminds you to take action.
quotes.author: Gloria Anzaldua

quotes.quote: You largely constructed your depression. It wasn't given to you. Therefore, you can deconstruct it.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.quote: Depression is only reached the instant your mind rejects the most basic of instincts - the need to survive at all costs.
quotes.author: Demarcole

quotes.quote: Depression is a prison where you are both the suffering prisoner and the cruel jailer.
quotes.author: Dorothy Rowe

quotes.quote: Depression opens the door to beauty of some kind.
quotes.author: James Hillman

quotes.quote: Living with depression is like trying to keep your balance while you dance with a goat - it is perfectly sane to prefer a partner with a better sense of balance.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: Depression is the inability to construct a future.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: Depression begins with disappointment. When disappointment festers in our soul, it leads to discouragement.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Every time you feel depressed about something, try to identify a corresponding negative thought you had just prior to and during the depression. Because these thoughts have actually created your bad mood, by learning to restructure them, you can change your mood.
quotes.author: David D. Burns

quotes.quote: During depression the world disappears ... because the inner voice is so urgent in its own discourse: How shall I live? How shall I manage the future? Why should I go on?
quotes.author: KATE MILLETT

quotes.quote: My depression is the most faithful mistress I have known -- no wonder, then, that I return the love.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Depression has been labelled the common cold of psychopathology. This comparison is unfortunate, for it conveys the impression of a frequent but mild complaint. In reality ... depression is not only the most frequent mental health problem, but is among the most serious.
quotes.author: PAUL GILBERT

quotes.quote: Depression is a choice.
quotes.author: A.B. Curtiss

quotes.quote: Something crucial about depression ... The smarter you were, the worse it was. The sharper your brain, the more it cut you up.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Eugenides

quotes.quote: Getting better from depression demands a lifelong commitment. I've made that commitment for my life's sake and for the sake of those who love me.
quotes.author: Susan Polis Schutz

quotes.quote: Keep yourself busy if you want to avoid depression. For me, inactivity is the enemy.
quotes.author: Matt Lucas

quotes.quote: Depression is when you have lots of love, but no one's taking.
quotes.author: Doug Coupland

quotes.quote: Depression is not sobbing and crying and giving vent, it is plain and simple reduction of feeling.
quotes.author: Judith Guest

quotes.quote: To some degree depression is a function of unconscious anger. Pay attention to your angry feelings. Don't feel guilty about them.
quotes.author: Steve Hovland

quotes.quote: This is my depressed stance. When you're depressed, it makes a lot of difference how you stand. The worst thing you can do is straighten up and hold your head high because then you'll start to feel better. If you're going to get any joy out of being depressed, you've got to stand like this.
quotes.author: Charles Schulz

quotes.quote: Sharing our depressions felt like having survived a war. The experience bonds you to the other person for life.
quotes.author: Art Buchwald

quotes.quote: The immense desert, empty as a bird's wing, inspired him with promise.
quotes.author: Mike Bond

quotes.quote: The desert surrounds your every step and you walk forever a thirsty man.
quotes.author: Christopher Pike

quotes.quote: In the desert, the line between life and death is sharp and quick.
quotes.author: Brian Herbert

quotes.quote: You should not see the desert simply as some faraway place of little rain. There are many forms of thirst.
quotes.author: William Langewiesche

quotes.quote: The desert shatters the soul's arrogance and leaves body and soul crying out in thirst and hunger. In the desert we trust God or die.
quotes.author: Dan B. Allender

quotes.quote: The desert is a natural extension of the inner silence of the body.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: The desert, when the sun comes up. I couldn't tell where heaven stopped and the Earth began.
quotes.author: Tom Hanks

quotes.quote: If the desert allows the trees to proliferate, the desert shall disappear! Therefore the desert has no choice but to be the enemy of the trees!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: I have this personal affinity for the desert. I am fascinated by the desert. I love it.
quotes.author: Erika Slezak

quotes.quote: Full many a flower is born to blush unseen and waste its sweetness on the desert air.
quotes.author: Paul Hoffman

quotes.quote: What draws us into the desert is the search for something intimate in the remote.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: What makes the desert beautiful is that somewhere it hides a well.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint

quotes.quote: The desert sharpened the sweet ache of his longing, amplified it, gave shape to it in sere geology and clean slant of light.
quotes.author: Jon Krakauer

quotes.quote: Nothing the desert produces expresses it better than the unhappy growth of the tree yuccas.
quotes.author: Mary Hunter Austin

quotes.quote: In the empire of desert, water is the king and shadow is the queen.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Polish comes from the cities; wisdom from the desert.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: The desert is the theater of the human struggle of searching for God.
quotes.author: Jan Majernik

quotes.quote: The vast sage desert undulates with almost imperceptible tides like the oceans.
quotes.author: Frank Waters

quotes.quote: This creed of the desert seemed inexpressible in words, and indeed in thought.
quotes.author: T. E. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Like water in the desert is wisdom to the soul.
quotes.author: Edward Counsel

quotes.quote: The desert does not mean the absence of men, it means the presence of God.
quotes.author: Carlo Carreto

quotes.quote: Use every man after his desert, and who should scape whipping?
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: That undefined and mingled hum, Voice of the desert never dumb!
quotes.author: James Hogg

quotes.quote: A desert is a place without expectation.
quotes.author: Nadine Gordimer

quotes.quote: There is nothing in the desert and no man needs nothing.
quotes.author: David

quotes.quote: Son of the old moon-mountains African! Stream of the pyramid and crocodile! We call thee fruitful, and that very while a desert, fills our seeing's inward span.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Night poured over the desert. It came suddenly, in purple. In the clear air, the stars drilled down out of the sky, reminding any thoughtful watcher that it is in the deserts and high places that religions are generated. When men see nothing but bottomless infinity over their heads they have always had a driving and desperate urge to find someone to put in the way.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: I have always loved the desert. One sits down on a desert sand dune, sees nothing, hears nothing. Yet through the silence something throbs, and gleams...
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Water, water, water....There is no shortage of water in the desert but exactly the right amount , a perfect ratio of water to rock, water to sand, insuring that wide free open, generous spacing among plants and animals, homes and towns and cities, which makes the arid West so different from any other part of the nation. There is no lack of water here unless you try to establish a city where no city should be.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote:
The desert and the ocean are realms of desolation on the surface.
The desert is a place of bones, where the innards are turned out, to desiccate into dust.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: The thing about tears is that they can be as quiet as a cloud floating across the desert sky.
quotes.author: Benjamin Alire Saenz

quotes.quote: They took it for granted that if they went he would go also, but really they scarcely cared. Thus children are ever so ready, when novelty knocks, to desert their dearest ones.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: The desert could not be claimed or owned–it was a piece of cloth carried by winds, never held down by stones, and given a hundred shifting names... Its caravans, those strange rambling feasts and cultures, left nothing behind, not an ember. All of us, even those with European homes and children in the distance, wished to remove the clothing of our countries. It was a place of faith. We disappeared into landscape.
quotes.author: Michael Ondaatje

quotes.quote: Life, deal gently with her ... Love, never desert her
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: The planet’s famous red colour is from iron oxide coating everything. So it’s not just a desert. It’s a desert so old it’s literally rusting.
quotes.author: Andy Weir

quotes.quote: The field of the soul must be watered by the rain with tears of love; otherwise it will become a desert.
quotes.author: Sorin Cerin

quotes.quote: But in the desert, in the pure clean atmosphere, in the silence – there you can find yourself. And unless you begin to know yourself, how can you even begin to search for God?
quotes.author: Father Dioscuros

quotes.quote: The vastness of the desert frightened her. Everything looked too far away, even the cloudless sky. There was nowhere you could hide in such emptiness.
quotes.author: James Carlos Blake

quotes.quote: Madness plants mirrors in the desert. I find the means frightening.
quotes.author: Floriano Martins

quotes.quote: In the desert, the only god is a well.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: The desert was bad, but nothing could compare with the horrors of a tropical rain forest.
quotes.author: Tahir Shah

quotes.quote: The desert sings of loss, always loss, and if you stand quiet with your eyes closed, it will grieve you too.
quotes.author: Nafiza Azad

quotes.quote:
At such moments
felt my mind wake up with the temptation of life
gathering courage for flowering beauty
even in the desert of living.
quotes.author: Suman Pokhrel

quotes.quote: The desert still has a memory of water. And that memory is a living thing. It is infused into the sand. It is part of its essence.
quotes.author: Thomas Lloyd Qualls

quotes.quote: No law. No order. No time or space. Danger was the desert’s breath, and the landscape changed with every wind.
quotes.author: Zita Steele

quotes.quote: Nothing is all bad. There are very beautiful flowers in the desert amidst the spikes and thorns. Just don't let them take over. In the garden of love there is little room for prickly things.
quotes.author: Kate McGahan

quotes.quote: I like to think of the desert as just a big beach without water.
quotes.author: Andy Heyward

quotes.quote: Already I have dropped back into the desert as if it were my own place. Silence and solitude all around me like an impenetrable veil. Sleep more profound that civilization contrives. And then, the roadless desert, again.
quotes.author: Werner Herzog

quotes.quote: Good Springs, in the Nevada desert, where water is life and the desert is death.
quotes.author: Wells Root

quotes.quote: A third of the land on our planet is desert. These great scars on the face of the Earth
quotes.author: David Attenborough

quotes.quote: Cry for the desert / I will tremble and receive His pain / Die for the desert / I will pour my life on this terrain.
quotes.author: Twila Paris

quotes.quote: The sun was rising / The day was saddled up to go / The desert is a lonely night for disappear
quotes.author: Jonathan Wilson

quotes.quote: The rain in flowers through the desert sky / Is wiser then you and me / The birds now go east / But still miss a sleep / And the desert raven he has palm trees
quotes.author: Jonathan Wilson

quotes.quote: If the earth is up above us stars are down below / If there are daisies in the desert roses in the snow
quotes.author: Reeves

quotes.quote: Cactus plants are bloomin', sagebrush every where / Granite spires are standin' all around / I tell you folks it's Heaven, to be ridin' down the trail / When the desert sun goes down
quotes.author: Gene Autry

quotes.quote: Somewhere north of heaven / Where eagles fear to fly / Where the sun burns hot as the devil's gate / The desert meets the sky
quotes.author: Paul Nelson

quotes.quote: Suffers who suffer all / Can swim upon the desert / Where avarice have ravaged all
quotes.author: Chris Scott Wagner

quotes.quote: It was a dry wind / And it swept across the desert / And it curled into the circle of birth / And the dead sand
quotes.author: Forere Motlhoheloa

quotes.quote: Green pastures of plenty from dry desert ground / From the Grand Coulee Dam where the waters run down
quotes.author: Woody Guthrie

quotes.quote: My poor feet have traveled a hot dusty road / Out of your Dust Bowl and westward we rolled / And your deserts were hot and your mountain was cold
quotes.author: Woody Guthrie

quotes.quote: Stars are brighter / In the desert sky / No need to wonder or justify
quotes.author: Amanda Marshall

quotes.quote: Heavenly places we seek to find / Here lies a desert / With spirits running dry
quotes.author: Brennan

quotes.quote: The desert air is hot and dry / Two lanes weaving earth and sky / The stars are all that's keeping time till morning
quotes.author: Litvin Kaplansky

quotes.quote: And the white sand begins / Among the rocks. / The wheeling eagles mocked me high there from the skies, / The red blast of the desert wind
quotes.author: Wilfrid Scawen Blunt

quotes.quote: The coolness of the evening breeze, / caresses her high-boned cheeks, / dreamy, almond eyes stare toward the / parched mountains of the desert, / beyond any highway signs and / sun-baked roads.
quotes.author: Sonia Walker

quotes.quote: The farmer works, the bull cries loud, / For all they want is a rain yielding cloud. / The desert's shrub though green in color, / Will attract scores of rain yet to come, / For mere fulfillment of the empty drum.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: The brown crusty surface of the desert soil, / Can always be ploughed by hard turmoil.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Only a greater stillness in the air, / Save for hot sighs of desert-heated breath, / Only the stars, ceasing their sleepless stare, / Only the east, rose-flushing, fresh from death.
quotes.author: Ernest Favenc

quotes.quote: The desert foxes hide in holes, / The jackal seeks his lair; / The sombre rocks, like reddening coals, / Glow lurid in the glare.
quotes.author: Mathilde Blind

quotes.quote: Deserts occur along western coasts because their climates are influenced by nearly eastern boundary currents.
quotes.author: Michael Allaby

quotes.quote: Sandy deserts certainly exist, but most deserts are not vast oceans of sand. They are rocky, with a hard surface covered with stones and gravel and outcrops of bare rock.
quotes.author: Michael Allaby

quotes.quote: Deserts are windy places and over thousands of years the wind blows away all the dust and sand.
quotes.author: Michael Allaby

quotes.quote: In some deserts there are rocks carved by the wind into fantastic shapes. The sand must go somewhere, of course. It piles up to form dunes, but the dunes are constantly shifting as the restless wind ceaselessly rearranges the landscape.
quotes.author: Michael Allaby

quotes.quote: Nor are all deserts hot. Even those that are hot by day are often cold at night, but some deserts are cold for most of the time.
quotes.author: Michael Allaby

quotes.quote: There are also deserts lying beside coasts, where fog is common but rain is extremely rare.
quotes.author: Michael Allaby

quotes.quote: Other deserts are icy wilderness, no less windy and arid--despite the snow and ice that covers the ground and the screaming blizzards of blown snow that reduce the world to a uniform whiteness.
quotes.author: Michael Allaby

quotes.quote: Deserts, both hot and cold, are also home to people who have found ways to thrive in them.
quotes.author: Michael Allaby

quotes.quote: Deserts are barren, inhospitable places. The very word conjures an image of featureless and dunes stretching beautiful but terrible for as far as the eye can see.
quotes.author: Michael Allaby

quotes.quote: We affect the desert and desert affects us. Deserts are an integral part of the story of humanity and thus are the object of fascination for many of us.
quotes.author: Michael A. Mares

quotes.quote: Until now there has been no single source that addresses all the complex factors that constitute desert ecosystem.
quotes.author: Michael A. Mares

quotes.quote: Among the major challenges facing desert organisms are also water, salt balance, light , and temperature.
quotes.author: Michael A. Mares

quotes.quote: A desert, which might be considered the antithesis of the sea, actually poses similar challenges to the evolution of life.
quotes.author: Michael A. Mares

quotes.quote: Human and deserts have been inextricably linked across the ages, and it is important that we understand these marvelous areas, for they are a major component in the world.
quotes.author: Michael A. Mares

quotes.quote: Deserts have been important throughout human history. The cradle of civilization is located in a dryland situated near the confluence of two great rivers.
quotes.author: Michael A. Mares

quotes.quote: Deserts have been the scene for the development of great religious (Religion in Deserts) and theaters for great wars.
quotes.author: Michael A. Mares

quotes.quote: Deserts make a major contribution to the remarkable nature of our planet and provide a home for innumerable species that are unknown outside the boundaries of arid lands.
quotes.author: Michael A. Mares

quotes.quote: Far from being wastelands, deserts are habitats that are filled with unique forms of life.
quotes.author: Michael A. Mares

quotes.quote: One popular view of a desert is that of a wasteland containing mainly snakes and scorpions and a few sparse plants, but the world's deserts are rich in both animals and plants.
quotes.author: Michael A. Mares

quotes.quote: Deserts and semideserts may support vast fields of dunes, extensive gallery forests, space scrublands, and salt lakes.
quotes.author: Michael A. Mares

quotes.quote: Many desert species bloom in the late winter; others flower in spring or fall.
quotes.author: Michael A. Mares

quotes.quote: Deserts embrace a huge variety of conditions. There are hot deserts and cold deserts, sandy deserts and rocky deserts, foggy deserts and sunny deserts, barren deserts and lush, verdant parts of deserts.
quotes.author: Nick Middleton

quotes.quote: Deserts are found at high altitudes and below sea level, on coastlines and deep inside continental interiors. They are places of romance, and of hardship, of deep spirituality and dazzling natural beauty.
quotes.author: Nick Middleton

quotes.quote: Deserts include vast areas of stark wilderness and large, densely populated cities with every modern amenity.
quotes.author: Nick Middleton

quotes.quote: People has been inextricably linked with deserts since time immemorial. Crucial early developments in agriculture and the rise of the city took place in the deserts of the Middle East, the 'cradle of civilization'.
quotes.author: Nick Middleton

quotes.quote: The world's deserts have been perceived as places of magnificence and mystery, silence and contemplation, inspiring novelists, poets, artists, and film-makers, and acting as the birth place for three of the world's great religions.
quotes.author: Nick Middleton

quotes.quote: The irregular dynamics of desert life can make these environments seem marginal in many respects.
quotes.author: Nick Middleton

quotes.quote: Deserts are among the regions most vulnerable to climate change, but their great global extent also means that an understanding of how deserts respond to change has implications for the planet as a whole and thus for every one of us.
quotes.author: Nick Middleton

quotes.quote: An artist's approach to deserts may be different from the stance taken by a scientist although, broadly, the two usually overlap geographically. It may, or may not, be surprising to learn that no universally accepted definition of the term 'desert' exists.
quotes.author: Nick Middleton

quotes.quote: Deserts are thirsty places. They get less than 10 inches (25 centimetres) of rain a year. Still, these dry places are full of amazing animals.
quotes.author: Alison Auch

quotes.quote: Deserts have long captured our imaginations with their inaccessible and inhospitable nature. Even a casual visit to the desert will expose an individual to feelings of vastness, solitude, and one's own frailty.
quotes.author: Fred Punzo

quotes.quote: Your are struck by the awesome beauty of the desert landscape even as you view it in the relentless glare of the midday sun. It is at once a kaleidoscope of images, a land of contrasts and paradoxes.
quotes.author: Fred Punzo

quotes.quote: The desert landscape appears as if it has been stripped to its bare essentials with no room for frivolous decor.
quotes.author: Fred Punzo

quotes.quote: A desert is a particularly arid region of the planet where the vegetation cover is limited or almost absent and the fauna is scarce.
quotes.author: Marco Stoppato

quotes.quote: What you come to see on the surface is not what you come to know. Emptiness in the desert is the fullness of space, a fullness of space that eliminates time. The desert is time, exposed time, geologic time. One needs time in the desert to see.
quotes.author: Terry Tempest Williams

quotes.quote: Deserts are very dry places, but plants can still grow there. Desert plants collect and use water in special ways.
quotes.author: Julie Penn

quotes.quote: Accept yourself as you are. Otherwise you will never see opportunity. You will not feel free to move toward it; you will feel you are notÂ deserving.
quotes.author: Alan Robert Neal

quotes.quote: You deserve to be happy. You deserve to live a life that lights you up. Don't ever forget that.
quotes.author: Coco Calla

quotes.quote: Man is not, by nature, deserving of all that he wants. When we think that we are automatically entitled to something, that is when we start walking all over others to get it.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The only thing that keeps you from deserving, or loving yourself, or whatever, is someone else's belief or opinion that you have accepted as truth.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: The man who is deserving the name is the one whose thoughts and exertions are for others rather than for himself.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Dignity does not consist in possessing honors, but inÂ deservingÂ them.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: We are all deserving of love.
quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

quotes.quote: No matter how qualified or deserving we are, we will never reach a better life until we can imagine it for ourselves and allow ourselves to have it.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: To a well deserving person God will show favor. To an ill deserving person He will simply be just
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: Accept yourself as you are. Otherwise you will never see opportunity. You will not feel free to move toward it; you will feel you are not deserving.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: The deserving are not always blest. That peculiar attribute known as personality is as potent a factor as genius.
quotes.author: Walter J Phillips

quotes.quote: You often say, "I would give, but only to the deserving." The trees in your orchard say not so, nor the flocks in your pasture. They give that they may live, for to withhold is to perish.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: It is better to deserve without receiving than to receive without deserving.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: ou always feel you are not deserving. People who are successful at what they do know what kind of work goes with it, so they are surprised at the praise.
quotes.author: Virginia Hamilton

quotes.quote: Any man who lets a woman like you take upon a night like this with a man like me...deserves it.
quotes.author: Roland Young

quotes.quote: I'm beautiful and I'm smart and I deserve better.
quotes.author: Diane Keaton

quotes.quote: Whatever induces collapse is thereby deserving of being listened to.
quotes.author: E.M. Cioran

quotes.quote: People are little creatures with big capacities, finite beings with infinite desires, deserving nothing but demanding all.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: True happiness consists of being considered deserving of it.
quotes.author: Pliny the Elder

quotes.quote: He thoroughly deserved his success because he is the hardest trained athlete in the world.
quotes.author: John Landy

quotes.quote: Go on deserving applause, and you will be sure to meet with it, and the way to deserve it is to be good, and to be industrious.
quotes.author: Citizen Jefferson

quotes.quote: A slave who would work during the holidays was considered by our masters as scarcely deserving them.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: The deserving hired man gets his wages increased when he can tell his employer that he can get better wages elsewhere.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: If we men married the women we deserved, we should have a very bad time of it.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The God who would do this to him deserved only silence.
quotes.author: Anne Roiphe

quotes.quote: A relationship is likely to last way longer if each partner convinces or has convinced themselves that they do not deserve their partner, even if that is not true.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Do not always look for gratitude, for, sometimes when you are most deserving, you will get the least.
quotes.author: Ida Scudder

quotes.quote: This is a world of compensations, and he who would be no slave must consent to have no slave. Those who deny freedom to others deserve it not from themselves, and, under a just God, cannot log return it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: If the house be worthy, let your peace come upon it; but if it be not worthy, let your peace return to you.
quotes.author: Matt 10:13

quotes.quote: The labourer is worthy of his hire.
quotes.author: Luke 10:7

quotes.quote: Surely he who is worthy to receive his days and his nights is worthy of all else from you. / And he who has deserved to drink from the ocean of life deserves to fill his cup from your little stream.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: She screams and shouts and sometimes she screeches / She has been known to throw sand at beaches / Is she less deserving of kindness?
quotes.author: Lilah Ainsworth

quotes.quote: Is this like a loyal friend's treatment? / And are you deserving the name? / Say! what do you give those who love you / But poverty, sorrow, and shame?
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: To be loved because of one's merit, because one deserves it, always leaves doubt; maybe I did not please the person whom I want to love me, maybe this, or that - there is always a fear that love could disappear.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Having patience always gives you what you deserve.
quotes.author: Fatma Alfalasi

quotes.quote: You are sweet and smart and definitely not extremely strange. You are lovable and deserving of love--everybody is.
quotes.author: Kimberly King Parsons

quotes.quote: The vision is only limited until you decide what you deserve & staple it to your eyeballs.
quotes.author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quotes.quote: Rewards are meaningless if they're not deserved.
quotes.author: Frank Sonnenberg

quotes.quote: People don't always get what they deserve in this world.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: But if you can't take me at my worst, You don't deserve me at my best.
quotes.author: Machine Gun Kelly

quotes.quote: A good joke doesn't necessarily need appreciation from others. One can freely laugh at one’s own deserving jokes.
quotes.author: Pawan Mishra

quotes.quote: You are worthy of good things, and you are a deserving and beautiful person.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: The wishes of an honest man do not stretch beyond what he undoubtedly deserves.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: He who hides himself amongst the shadows deserves to live inside the dark shadows! Meet with the light to deserve the light!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat Ildan

quotes.quote: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Good design is making something intelligible and memorable. Great design is making something memorable and meaningful.
quotes.author: Dieter Rams

quotes.quote: To design is to communicate clearly by whatever means you can control or master.
quotes.author: Milton Glaser

quotes.quote: Design is a response to social change.
quotes.author: George Nelson

quotes.quote: Design must reflect the practical and aesthetic in business but above all... good design must primarily serve people.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: I don't design clothes, I design dreams.
quotes.author: Ralph Lauren

quotes.quote: Design is directed toward human beings. To design is to solve human problems by identifying them, examining alternate solutions to them, choosing and executing the best solution.
quotes.author: Ivan Chermayeff

quotes.quote: Design can be art. Design can be aesthetics. Design is so simple, that's why it is so complicated.
quotes.author: Paul Rand

quotes.quote: If you can design one thing, you can design everything.
quotes.author: Massimo Vignelli

quotes.quote: Design is body language for inanimate objects.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Good design is obvious. Great design is transparent.
quotes.author: Joe Sparano

quotes.quote: Design is the application of intent - the opposite of happenstance, and an antidote to accident.
quotes.author: Robert L. Peters

quotes.quote: Design is as much an act of spacing as an act of marking.
quotes.author: Ellen Lupton

quotes.quote: The design process, at its best, integrates the aspirations of art, science, and culture.
quotes.author: Jeff Smith

quotes.quote: Design is an opportunity to continue telling the story, not just to sum everything up.
quotes.author: Tate Linden

quotes.quote: Design is not the narrow application of formal skills, it is a way of thinking.
quotes.author: Chris Pullman

quotes.quote: Behavioral design is all about feeling in control. Includes: usability, understanding, but also the feel.
quotes.author: Don Norman

quotes.quote: Design creates culture. Culture shapes values. Values determine the future.
quotes.author: Robert L. Peters

quotes.quote: A design isn't finished until somebody is using it.
quotes.author: Brenda Laurel

quotes.quote: Truly elegant design incorporates top-notch functionality into a simple, uncluttered form.
quotes.author: David Lewis

quotes.quote: The only important thing about design is how it relates to people.
quotes.author: Victor Papanek

quotes.quote: Design is in everything we make, but it's also between those things. It's a mix of craft, science, storytelling, propaganda, and philosophy
quotes.author: Erik Adigard

quotes.quote: Design is a plan for arranging elements in such a way as best to accomplish a particular purpose.
quotes.author: Charles Eames

quotes.quote: Only when the design fails does it draw attention to itself; when it succeeds, it's invisible.
quotes.author: John D. Berry

quotes.quote: Good design begins with honesty, asks tough questions, comes from collaboration and from trusting your intuition.
quotes.author: Freeman Thomas

quotes.quote: Design is the contrast of the core of limitations therefore there are no boundaries. It is simply an interpretation of creativity.
quotes.author: Jenaiha Woods

quotes.quote: Design is intelligence made visible.
quotes.author: Alina Wheeler

quotes.quote: Design is the intermediary between information and understanding.
quotes.author: Richard Gref

quotes.quote: Design is where science and art break even.
quotes.author: Robin Mathew

quotes.quote: Good design begins with honesty, asks tough questions, comes from collaboration and from trusting your intuition.
quotes.author: Freeman Thomas

quotes.quote: Design is more important than technology in most consumer applications.
quotes.author: Dave McClure

quotes.quote: The beauty of design ought to be totally incidental to the enterprise itself.
quotes.author: Stephen Metcalf

quotes.quote: Design is all about learning from doing, that's how we evolve to the best solution.
quotes.author: Tim Brown

quotes.quote: Content precedes design. Design in the absence of content is not design, it's decoration.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Zeldman

quotes.quote: Design is the search for a magical balance between business and art; art and craft; intuition and reason; concept and detail; playfulness and formality; client and designer; designer and printer; and printer and public.
quotes.author: Valerie Pettis

quotes.quote: Design everything on the assumption that people are not heartless or stupid but marvelously capable, given the chance.
quotes.author: John Chris Jones

quotes.quote: Design implies a sense of mapping something out and then you follow the plan.
quotes.author: Andy Goldsworthy

quotes.quote: Design is the fundamental soul of a human-made creation that ends up expressing itself in successive outer layers of the product or service.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Good design is a lot like clear thinking made visual.
quotes.author: Edward Tufte

quotes.quote: The word design is everything and nothing. The design and the product itself are inseparable.
quotes.author: Jonathan Ive

quotes.quote: Design is the beauty of turning constraints into advantages.
quotes.author: Aza Raskin

quotes.quote: Recognizing the need is the primary condition for design.
quotes.author: Charles Eames

quotes.quote: In design as in life, smart can also mean wise, kind, inspiring - and cost-effective. And that has a charm all its own.
quotes.author: Nancy Gibbs

quotes.quote: Design is in everything we make, but it's also between those things. It's a mix of craft, science, storytelling, propaganda, and philosophy.
quotes.author: Erik Adigard

quotes.quote: Styles come and go. Good design is a language, not a style.
quotes.author: Massimo Vignelli

quotes.quote: The design of each element should be thought out in order to be easy to make and easy to repair.
quotes.author: Leo Fender

quotes.quote: Design isn't crafting a beautiful textured button with breathtaking animation. It's figuring out if there's a way to get rid of the button altogether.
quotes.author: Edward Tufte

quotes.quote: Design is a dreadful form of expression.
quotes.author: Philippe Starck

quotes.quote: Design isn't just about making things beautiful; it's also about making things work beautifully.
quotes.author: Roger Martin

quotes.quote: Designs are increasingly winning competitions because they are literally green, and because somewhere they feature a small windmill.
quotes.author: Rem Koolhaas

quotes.quote: Design is so simple. That's why it's so complicated.
quotes.author: Paul Rand

quotes.quote: Good design emphasises the usefulness of a product whilst disregarding anything that could possibly detract from it.
quotes.author: Dieter Rams

quotes.quote: You can design and create, and build the most wonderful place in the world. But it takes people to make the dream a reality.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Good design is long-lasting! It avoids being fashionable and therefore never appears antiquated.
quotes.author: Dieter Rams

quotes.quote: Great design is a multi-layered relationship between human life and its environment.
quotes.author: Naoto Fukasawa

quotes.quote: Design is about making things good (and then better) and right (and fantastic) for the people who use and encounter them.
quotes.author: Matt Beale

quotes.quote: Making good design is easy. It's polishing the half-assed stuff that takes time.
quotes.author: Stefan G. Bucher

quotes.quote: Design is the art of planning, and it is the art of making things possible.
quotes.author: Paula Scher

quotes.quote: I think design covers so much more than the aesthetic. Design is fundamentally more. Design is usability. It is Information Architecture. It is Accessibility. This is all design.
quotes.author: Mark Boulton

quotes.quote: In design, Mother Nature is our best teacher.
quotes.author: Van Day Truex

quotes.quote: Design is the conscious effort to impose a meaningful order.
quotes.author: Victor Papanek

quotes.quote: The design should make the product speak to you.
quotes.author: Dieter Rams

quotes.quote: In design, be logical, search for truth, be clear.
quotes.author: Massimo Vignelli

quotes.quote: Design is a word that's come to mean so much that it's also a word that has come to mean nothing.
quotes.author: Jonathan Ive

quotes.quote: Designs of purely arbitrary nature cannot be expected to last long.
quotes.author: Kenzo Tange

quotes.quote: Design is defined by light and shade, and appropriate lighting is enormously important.
quotes.author: Albert Hadley

quotes.quote: The best design tool is a long eraser with a pencil at one end.
quotes.author: Marty Neumeier

quotes.quote: Great design is not democratic; it comes from great designers. If the standard is lousy, then develop another standard.
quotes.author: Edward Tufte

quotes.quote: Everyone designs who devises courses of action aimed at changing existing situations into preferred ones.
quotes.author: Herbert Simon

quotes.quote: Good design is good business.
quotes.author: Ian Schrager

quotes.quote: Design is an opportunity to continue telling the story, not just to sum everything up.
quotes.author: Tate Linden

quotes.quote: Design is where science and art break even.
quotes.author: Robin Mathews

quotes.quote: Design is people.
quotes.author: Jane Jacobs

quotes.quote: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: A design can excel at one challenge only by compromising at others.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: The goal of a designer is to listen, observe, understand, sympathize, empathize, synthesize, and glean insights that enable him or her to â€˜make the invisible visible.
quotes.author: Hillman Curtis

quotes.quote: Design creates culture. Culture shapes values. Values determine the future.
quotes.author: Robert L. Peters

quotes.quote: There is only one type of designer â€“ the type that cares about type.
quotes.author: Rohan Nanavati

quotes.quote: The urge for good design is the same as the urge to go on living.
quotes.author: Harry Bertoia

quotes.quote: Design must reflect the practical and aesthetic in business but above all... good design must primarily serve people.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: Good design is all about making other designers feel like idiots because that idea wasn't theirs.
quotes.author: Frank Chimero

quotes.quote: The life of a designer is a life of fight: fight against the ugliness.
quotes.author: Massimo Vignelli

quotes.quote: Design is the courage and brilliance to cover an original and make it different.
quotes.author: John Hockenberry

quotes.quote: People ignore design that ignores people.
quotes.author: Frank Chimero

quotes.quote: Bad design shouts at you. Good design is the silent seller.
quotes.author: Shane Meendering

quotes.quote: Designers are meant to be loved, not to be understood.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Design cannot rescue failed content.
quotes.author: Edward R. Tufte

quotes.quote: Good design is thorough, down to the last detail.
quotes.author: Dieter Rams

quotes.quote: If you think good design is expensive, you should look at the cost of bad design.
quotes.author: Ralf Speth

quotes.quote: Good art inspires; Good design motivates.
quotes.author: Otl Aicher

quotes.quote: Everything is designed. Few things are designed well.
quotes.author: Brian Reed

quotes.quote: Content precedes design. Design in the absence of content is not design, it's decoration.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Zeldman

quotes.quote: Every great design begins with an even better story.
quotes.author: Lorinda Mamo

quotes.quote: The function of design is letting design function.
quotes.author: Micha Commeren

quotes.quote: If you can design one thing, you can design everything.
quotes.author: Massimo Vignelli

quotes.quote: You cannot defend your design without knowing what you're designing for.
quotes.author: I.M. Pei

quotes.quote: Good designers copy; great designers steal.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Design is a formal response to a strategic question.
quotes.author: Mariona Lopez

quotes.quote: The alternative to good design is always bad design. There is no such thing as no design.
quotes.author: Adam Judge

quotes.quote: A designer is a planner with an aesthetic sense.
quotes.author: Bruno Munari

quotes.quote: The only important thing about design is how it relates to people.
quotes.author: Victor Papanek

quotes.quote: Design means being good, not just looking good.
quotes.author: Clement Mok

quotes.quote: There is no better designer than nature.
quotes.author: Alexander McQueen

quotes.quote: Design is inteliigence made visible.
quotes.author: Alina Wheeler

quotes.quote: Thinking about design is hard, but not thinking about it can be disastrous.
quotes.author: Ralph Caplan

quotes.quote: Design is a constant challenge to balance comfort with luxe, the practical with the desirable.
quotes.author: Donna Karan

quotes.quote: Everything is design. Everything!
quotes.author: Paul Rand

quotes.quote: Design is not for philosophy, it's for life.
quotes.author: Issey Miyake

quotes.quote: Great design is a multi-layered relationship between human life and its environment.
quotes.author: Naoto Fukasawa

quotes.quote: Bad design is smoke, while good design is a mirror.
quotes.author: Juan-Carlos Fernandez

quotes.quote: Design can be art. Design can be aesthetics. Design is so simple, that's why it is so complicated.
quotes.author: Paul Rand

quotes.quote: Style is a matter of taste, design a matter of principles.
quotes.author: Thomas Church

quotes.quote: Good design is obvious. Great design is transparent.
quotes.author: Joe Sparano

quotes.quote: To create a memorable design you need to start with a thought that's worth remembering.
quotes.author: Thomas Manss

quotes.quote: A designer knows he has achieved perfection not when there is nothing left to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Good design goes to heaven; bad design goes everywhere.
quotes.author: Mieke Gerritzen

quotes.quote: Recognizing the need is the primary condition for design.
quotes.author: Charles Eames

quotes.quote: Designing a product is designing a relationship.
quotes.author: Steve Rogers

quotes.quote: Good design is making something intelligible and memorable. Great design is making something memorable and meaningful.
quotes.author: Dieter Rams

quotes.quote: Desire is the starting point of all achievement, not a hope, not a wish, but a keen pulsating desire which transcends everything.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: The most basic human desire is to feel like you belong. Fitting in is important.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: Always desire to learn something useful.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Burning desire to be or do something gives us staying power - a reason to get up every morning or to pick ourselves up and start in again after a disappointment.
quotes.author: Marsha Sinetar

quotes.quote: What you seek is seeking you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Those who restrain their desire do so because theirs is weak enough to be restrained.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: You can have everything in life you want if you will just help enough other people get what they want.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Be suspicious of what you want.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Desire is the absurdity that holds open the infinity of possibility.
quotes.author: Wendy Farley

quotes.quote: Desire presses ever forward unsubdued.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: To get what he wanted, a man had to give other people what they wanted.
quotes.author: Dashiell Hammett

quotes.quote: Desire, like the atom, is explosive with creative force.
quotes.author: Paul Vernon Buser

quotes.quote: A desire scorned and neglected is an enemy lying in wait with bared dagger.
quotes.author: Abraham Miller

quotes.quote: Desires satisfied are but as seeds sown a second time.
quotes.author: Edward Counsel

quotes.quote: Anything you really want, you can attain, if you really go after it.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: He who desires but acts not, breeds pestilence.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Plant the seed of desire in your mind and it forms a nucleus with power to attract to itself everything needed for its fulfillment.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: Desire is what leads you through life until the time comes when you desire a higher life. So do not be ashamed that you want so much, yet at the same time do not fool yourself into thinking that what you want today will be enough tomorrow.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Almost every desire a poor man has is a punishable offence.
quotes.author: Louis Ferdinand Celine

quotes.quote: So long as there is desire or want, it is a sure sign that there is imperfection. A perfect, free being cannot have any desire.
quotes.author: Vivekananda

quotes.quote: All cravings are the mind seeking salvation or fulfillment in external things and in the future as a substitute for the joy of Being.
quotes.author: Eckhard Tolle

quotes.quote: Weak desires bring weak results, just as a small amount of fire makes a small amount of heat.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Some desire is necessary to keep life in motion, and he whose real wants are supplied must admit those of fancy.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: One must not lose desires. They are mighty stimulants to creativeness, to love, and to long life.
quotes.author: Alexander A. Bogomoletz

quotes.quote: It is the nature of desire not to be satisfied, and most men live only for the gratification of it.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: If you greatly desire something, have the guts to stake everything on obtaining it.
quotes.author: Brendan Francis

quotes.quote: Let your desires be ruled by reason.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: One must desire something to be alive.
quotes.author: Margaret Deland

quotes.quote: Desires are only the lack of something: and those who have the greatest desires are in a worse condition than those who have none, or very slight ones.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: We desire nothing so much as what we ought not to have.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Desire creates the power.
quotes.author: Raymond Holliwell

quotes.quote: A burning desire is the greatest motivator of every human action. The desire for success implants ''success consciousness'' which, in turn, creates a vigorous and ever-increasing ''habit of success.''
quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.quote: A desire to be observed, considered, esteemed, praised, beloved, and admired by his fellows is one of the earliest as well as the keenest dispositions discovered in the heart of man.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: The discipline of desire is the background of character.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: Desire is a powerful force that can be used to make things happen.
quotes.author: Marcia Wieder

quotes.quote: Desire will in due time externalize itself as concrete fact.
quotes.author: Thomas Troward

quotes.quote: If you desire many things, many things will seem few.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The intensity of your desire governs the power with which the force is directed.
quotes.author: John Mcdonald

quotes.quote: Desire, burning desire, is basic to achieving anything beyond the ordinary.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: When desire dies, fear is born.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Desire means the way to go out; desire is the path that leads you out. If your mind is still desiring, you cannot move within.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Desire is poverty. Desire is the greatest impurity of the mind. Desire is the motive force for action. Desire in the mind is the real impurity. Even a spark of desire is a very great evil.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.quote: Every intense desire is perhaps a desire to be different from what we are.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: When your desires are strong enough, you will appear to possess superhuman powers to achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: The desire accomplished is sweet to the soul.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: It is much easier to suppress a first desire than to satisfy those that follow.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Desire is proof of the availability...
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: If you desire to be good, begin by believing that you are wicked.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Desires are insatiable.They keep growing as we try to satisfy them just as the fire becomes more inflamed when oil is poured into it.
quotes.author: Manu Smriti

quotes.quote: We should learn from today, and dream for tomorrow. It is the pursuit of our dreams that gives us the opportunity to expand our knowledge and improve our lives.
quotes.author: G. Donald Jr. Craig

quotes.quote: Your clear vision will instill you desire to move towards achieving your goal. Each day you look to that goal you will be pulled to continue the effort.
quotes.author: G. Donald Jr. Craig

quotes.quote: Desire is powerful. One of the most powerful forces in our lives. Follow your desire! It sounds good.
quotes.author: John Eldredge

quotes.quote: Desire can lead us to the life we were meant to be live. It can shape our hopes and dreams, fill them with passion and determination.
quotes.author: John Eldredge

quotes.quote: Life without love can hardly be called living. The same holds true when we abandon our heart's deep desires.
quotes.author: John Eldredge

quotes.quote: God is not opposed to desire. Far from it. He gave us a heart that desires deeply, and he uses those desires to draw us himself, and to the life he created us to live.
quotes.author: John Eldredge

quotes.quote: How you handle your heart's desire will in great measure determine what becomes of your life.
quotes.author: John Eldredge

quotes.quote: There are two tragedies in life. One is not to get your heart's desire. The other is to get it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Do not impose on others what you yourself do not desire.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Every person who wins in any undertaking must be willing to cut all sources of retreat. Only by doing so can one be sure of maintaining that state of mind known as a burning desire to win-essential to success.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Existence does not listen to your desires, and does not follow you desires, however beautiful and however pious. Existence goes on in its own way.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Freedom from the desire for an answer in essential to the understanding of a problem.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Future is your projection of unfulfilled desires. The more unfulfilled you are, the bigger a future you have. The more unfulfilled is your being, the richer the dreams you have of the future. But it is just in your mind.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day.
quotes.author: EB White

quotes.quote: I see nothing wrong with the human trait to desire. In fact, I consider it integral to our success mechanism. Becoming attached to what we desire is what causes the trouble. If you must have it in order to be happy, then you are denying the happiness of the here and now.
quotes.author: Pter McWilliams

quotes.quote: I used to desire many, many things, but now I have just one desire, and that's to get rid of all my other desires.
quotes.author: John Cleese

quotes.quote: Those who live in the realization of their oneness with the infinite power become magnets to attract to themselves a continual supply of whatever things they desire. Those who are truly wise and who use the forces and powers with which they are endowed--to them the great universe always opens her treasure house.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Trine

quotes.quote: The only real limitation on what you can accomplish is the level of intensity of your desire. If you really want something badly enough, there are no limits on what you can achieve.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: When you really want something deeply and take massive action, you can achieve wonders.
quotes.author: Amey Hedge

quotes.quote: You can have anything you want-if you want it badly enough. You can be anything you want to be, do anything you set out to accomplish if you hold to that desire with singleness of purpose.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: When you find your heart's desire, you'll have the key to unlocking your potential in every other part of your life.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Humans have the remarkable ability to get exactly what they must have. But there is a difference between a 'must' and a 'want.'
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Your are what your deepest desire is. As is your desire, so is your intention. As is your intentions, so is your will. As is your will, so is your deed. As is your deed, so is your destiny.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Our destiny ultimately comes from the deepest level of desire and also from the deepest level of intention. The two are intimately linked to each other.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: From the experience in the past that we create memories, which are the basis of imagination and desire. Desire is the basis of action.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: If you're not willing to do whatever it takes to achieve your outcomes. The goals you desire and set for yourself are just not magically going to happen on their own.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy
