quotes.quote: Where there's a will there's a detective story.
quotes.author: Carolyn Wells

quotes.quote: There is little novelty in the detective who cannot solve himself.
quotes.author: Ben H. Winters

quotes.quote: A detective sees death in all the various forms at least five times a week.
quotes.author: Ed McBain

quotes.quote: Operating in an unlit world, the unconscious mind is a brilliant detective.
quotes.author: Jo Coudert

quotes.quote: To read of a detective's daring finesse or ingenious stratagem is a rare joy.
quotes.author: Rex Stout

quotes.quote: Obviously, it touches detectives and officers in a special way when you're talking about people who cannot fight back, who cannot defend themselves against someone like this.
quotes.author: Debra Brown

quotes.quote: My eyes have been trained to examine faces and not their trimmings. It is the first quality of a criminal investigator that he should see through a disguise.
quotes.author: (Sherlock Holmes) Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: The reason why detectives in detective stories are so preternaturally intelligent is that they're angels. Guardian angels of society; avenging angels for the murder. Everyone is guilty of something, so all the major character are suspects.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Crime isn't a disease, it's a symptom. Cops are like a doctor that gives you aspirin for a brain tumour.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: Detection is, or ought to be, an exact science, and should be treated in the same cold and unemotional manner. You have attempted to tinge it with romanticism, which produces much the same effect as if you worked a love story or an elopement into the fifth proposition of Euclid.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: I had an interest in death from an early age. It fascinated me. When I heard 'Humpty Dumpty sat on a wall,' I thought, 'Did he fall or was he pushed?'
quotes.author: P.D. James

quotes.quote: The detective novel is the art-for-art's-sake of our yawning Philistinism, the classic example of a specialized form of art removed from contact with the life it pretends to build on.
quotes.author: V.S. Pritchett

quotes.quote: Naturally a detective doesn't want to look like a detective, and give the whole thing away right at the start.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: Any spoke will lead an ant to the hub.
quotes.author: Rex Stout

quotes.quote: Armchair detective, what's your synopsis? / Hoping you'll tell us how we can stop this / Nobody wants to look stupid today more so than usual / To say something clever is of such importance, to say something clever is crucial / Ignorance is bliss, folly to be wise / What's the best course of action? Waiting for advice. / Kneejerk reactions are invoked today more so than usual.
quotes.author: Alan Smyth; Alex Turner; Jon McClure

quotes.quote: We are detective / we are select / We are detective / come to collect / Somebody's after me / he left his footprints by the garden tree / Last night when I got home / I got the feeling I was not alone! / Someone is on our tail / we think they're opening up our morning mail / And now each time the telephone rings / we think of frightening things.
quotes.author: Alannah Joy Currie; Joseph Martin Leeway; Tom Bailey

quotes.quote: You're an unusual suspect now and may be right / The kind all men cannot recollect or forget at night / You're the rough detective with the smokey eye / Where the person you are after is the other guy / The apprentice is the master and the cop's a con / You hear me laughing in the background.
quotes.author: Jack White; Alison Mosshart; Dean Fertita

quotes.quote: The name's Detective Chase / I'm working a cold case / The clues have led me / To this empty house near White's Ferry / I can't tell you what's wrong / All I know is something ain't right / Six murders spanning sixty years / All converging here / The front door / Opens of its own accord / I feel threatened / I draw my weapon / They're coiled on the chairs / Crawling down the stairs / Squirming everywhere / The snakes are black / Red diamonds on their backs / A single serpent / Fills the basement / It speaks to me / It knows my name / Detective Chase / Intruder in the House of Snakes.
quotes.author: J. R. Hayes; Scott Hull

quotes.quote: If I am to use an old cliché, as homicide detectives we get to speak for the dead.
quotes.author: Detective Barling

quotes.quote: The big secret of detective work is that you've got to get somebody else to tell you what happened.
quotes.author: Lt. John Cornicello

quotes.quote: My ongoing investigation is far from an obsession, but an excellent opportunity to provide a platform for applying modern science to a very old, highly visible case in the hope that we might learn something that could help solve modern crimes.
quotes.author: Patricia Cornwell

quotes.quote: The Ripper case is not one to be conclusively solved by DNA or fingerprints, and in a way, this is good. Society has come to expect the wizardry of forensic science to solve all crimes, but without the human element of deductive skills, teamwork, very hard investigation, and smart prosecution, evidence means nothing.
quotes.author: Patricia Cornwell

quotes.quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: An invincible determination can accomplish almost anything and in this lies the great distinction between great men and little men.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Are you desperate or determined? With desperation comes frustration. With determination comes purpose, achievement, and peace.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: But you might as well bid a man struggling in the water, rest within arm's length of the shore! I must reach it first, and then I'll rest.
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.quote: Courage is the foundation of determination. Determination and courage are the cornerstones of success.
quotes.author: M. K. Soni

quotes.quote: Determination allows mere mortals to soar to unimaginable, new heights.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Determination becomes obsession and then it becomes all that matters.
quotes.author: Jeremy Irvine

quotes.quote: Determination burns within each one of us. Whether or not it will heat the room or the whole house depends on how much time we spend feeding the fire.
quotes.author: Michelle C. Ustaszeski

quotes.quote: Determination gives you the resolve to keep going in spite of the roadblocks that lay before you.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Determination is like a muscle. If you do not use it regularly, it fades away.
quotes.author: Lynn Jennings

quotes.quote: Determination is the wake-up call to the human will.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbin

quotes.quote: Determine that the thing can and shall be done and then... find the way.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give your best to what seemingly are small jobs. Every time you conquer one it makes you that much stronger. If you do the little jobs well, the big ones will tend to take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Don't wait for your ship to come in, swim out to it
quotes.author: Cathy Hopkins

quotes.quote: Enclose your heart in times of need with the steel of your determination and your strength. In doing this, all things will be bearable
quotes.author: Lora Leigh

quotes.quote: I have willpower and determination. I am very resilient, like rock.
quotes.author: Carnie Wilson

quotes.quote: I just hate losing and that gives you an extra determination to work harder.
quotes.author: Wayne Rooney

quotes.quote: I ran and ran and ran every day, and I acquired this sense of determination, this sense of spirit that I would never, never give up, no matter what else happened.
quotes.author: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.quote: If I were dropped out of a plane into the ocean and told the nearest land was a thousand miles away, I'd still swim. And I'd despise the one who gave up.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: If you try anything, if you try to lose weight, or to improve yourself, or to love, or to make the world a better place, you have already achieved something wonderful, before you even begin. Forget failure. If things don't work out the way you want, hold your head up high and be proud. And try again. And again. And again!
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: If your determination is fixed, I do not counsel you to despair. Few things are impossible to diligence and skill. Great works are performed not by strength, but perseverance.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: It had long since come to my attention that people of accomplishment rarely sat back and let things happen to them. They went out and happened to things.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: It will never rain roses: when we want to have more roses, we must plant more roses.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: It's all about your determination, I think, as much as anything. There are a lot of people with talent, but it's that determination.
quotes.author: Judy Blume

quotes.quote: I've always found that anything worth achieving will always have obstacles in the way and you've got to have that drive and determination to overcome those obstacles on route to whatever it is that you want to accomplish.
quotes.author: Chuck Norris

quotes.quote: Keep on sowing your seed, for you never know which will grow -- perhaps it all will.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Knowing trees, I understand the meaning of patience. Knowing grass, I can appreciate persistence.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.quote: Life is not only merriment,It is desire and determination.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Never go backward. Attempt, and do it with all your might. Determination is power.
quotes.author: Charles Simmons

quotes.quote: Nobody trips over mountains. It is the small pebble that causes you to stumble. Pass all the pebbles in your path and you will find you have crossed the mountain.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible in this world. Firm determination, it is said, can move heaven and earth. Things appear far beyond one's power, because one cannot set his heart on any arduous project due to want of strong will.
quotes.author: Yamamoto Tsunetomo

quotes.quote: Pursue one great decisive aim with force and determination.
quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

quotes.quote: Success means having the courage, the determination, and the will to become the person you believe you were meant to be.
quotes.author: George A. Sheehan

quotes.quote: The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something. Don't wait for good things to happen to you. If you go out and make some good things happen, you will fill the world with hope, you will fill yourself with hope.
quotes.author: President Barack Obama

quotes.quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person's determination.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: The most essential factor is persistence - the determination never to allow your energy or enthusiasm to be dampened by the discouragement that must inevitably come.
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: The truest wisdom is a resolute determination.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: The world's greatest achievers have been those who have always stayed focused on their goals and have been consistent in their efforts.
quotes.author: Roopleen

quotes.quote: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can circumvent or hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Those who don't understand determination call determination stubbornness or too driven. To be determined is to see it through!
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: We must remember that one determined person can make a significant difference, and that a small group of determined people can change the course of history.
quotes.author: Sonia Johnson

quotes.quote: What makes the difference between wishing and realizing our wishes? Lots of things, and it may take months or years for wish to come true, but it's far more likely to happen when you care so much about a wish that you'll do all you can to make it happen.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: When a person really desires something, all the universe conspires to help that person to realize his dream.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Within each of us is a hidden store of determination. Determination to keep us in the race when all seems lost.
quotes.author: Roger Dawson

quotes.quote: You don't have to get it perfect, you just have to get it going. Babies don't walk the first time they try, but eventually they get it right.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: George Horace Lorimer

quotes.quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other one thing.
quotes.author: Lincoln

quotes.quote: Perseverance alone does not assure success. No amount of stalking will lead to a game in a field that has none.
quotes.author: Yi Jing

quotes.quote: Obstacles cannot crush me. Every obstacle yields to stern resolve. He who is fixed to a star does not change his mind.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a great talent without willpower.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try one more time.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Having once decided to achieve a certain task, achieve it all costs of tedium and distaste. The gain in self-confidence of having accomplished a tiresome labor is immense.
quotes.author: Arnold Bennett

quotes.quote: Nothing great will ever be achieved without great men, and men are great only if they are determined to be so.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: When the going gets tough, the tough get going.
quotes.author: Joseph P. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Big shots are only little shots that keep shooting.
quotes.author: Carnegie

quotes.quote: I think and think for months and years. Ninety-nine times, the conclusion is false. The hundredth time I am right.
quotes.author: Einstein

quotes.quote: Lose not courage, lose not faith, go forward.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.quote: Such is life, falling over seven times and getting up eight.
quotes.author: Roland Barthes

quotes.quote: Don't give up. Keep going. There is always a chance that you stumble onto something terrific. I have never heard of anyone stumbling over anything while he was sitting down.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: The 'driven' believe the impossible is possible, and are determined to prove it.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: As long as I can stand it, God, I'll keep on keeping on.
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.quote: When you're determined, life is so much more enjoyable. While desperation feels like despair, determination feels like a goal.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: Determination creates purpose, purpose creates drive, the drive helps you reach your goals, and reaching your goals gives you a sense of achievement.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: Determination in a single instance is an expression of courage; if it becomes characteristic, a mental habit.
quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

quotes.quote: Whatever I engage in, I must push inordinately; therefore should I be careful to choose that life which will be the most elevating in its character.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: It is not whether you get knocked down. It's whether you get up again.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: You must proceed with great determination, which means sticking to practice with true courage.
quotes.author: Soko Morinaga

quotes.quote: Perseverance paves the way for good luck. / Failure will be lurk and dark. / Determination gives success. / Crabs failed to drag your legs.
quotes.author: Dr. Saroj Kumar Khan

quotes.quote: You can become the utmost tyrant / You can break me, even kill me / However, / You can neither buy nor bend me / Since I am a determination.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Determination is the wake-up call to the human will
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: I am not judged by the number of times I fail, but by the number of times I succeed: and the number of times I succeed is in direct proportion to the number of times I fail and keep trying.
quotes.author: Tom Hopkins

quotes.quote: Never consider the possibility of failure; as long as you persist, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: All depends on how determined we are to be successful.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: When obstacles arise, you change your direction to reach your goal, you do not change your decision to get there.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: I determined never to stop until I had come to the end and achieved my purpose.
quotes.author: David Livingstone

quotes.quote: When someone tells me "no," it doesn't mean I can't do it, it simply means I can't do it with them.
quotes.author: Karen E. Quinones

quotes.quote: I have discovered in life that there are ways of getting almost anywhere you want to go if you really want to go.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.quote: Success is a little like wrestling a gorilla. You don't quit when you're tired. You quit when the gorilla is tired.
quotes.author: Robert Strauss

quotes.quote: Our choices determine our destiny.
quotes.author: A. R. Bernard

quotes.quote: It is your thoughts and your thoughts alone that determine what's possible for you now.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Your friends will determine the quality and direction of your life.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: Goals determine what you're going to be.
quotes.author: Julius Erving

quotes.quote: The things you think about determine the quality of your mind. Your soul takes on the color of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: What you fear most will determine whether you merely save for the future or give for the future.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
quotes.author: Nido Qubein

quotes.quote: Meanings are not determined by situations, but we determine ourselves by the meanings we give to situations.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: To mobilize yourself, decide what you want, determine what will get you what you want, then act - do what will get you what you want most to achieve.
quotes.author: Nido R Qubein

quotes.quote: Determine where you are going and how you will get there will become obvious.
quotes.author: Marshall Sylver

quotes.quote: We are not determined by our experiences, but are self-determined by the meaning we give to them; and when we take particular experiences as the basis for our future life, we are almost certain to be misguided to some degree. Meanings are not determined by situations. We determine ourselves by the meanings we ascribe to situations.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: Its very difficult to determine whether this is the fault of the world that has abandoned the Church, or the Church that does not know how to relate to the world.
quotes.author: Angelo Scola

quotes.quote: The kinds of nets we know how to weave determine the kinds of nets we cast. These nets, in turn, determine the kinds of fish we catch.
quotes.author: Elliot W. Eisner

quotes.quote: Other people's opinions do not determine your potential.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Our response to an offense determines our future.
quotes.author: John Bevere

quotes.quote: What we value determines what we do.
quotes.author: Craig Groeschel

quotes.quote: What you do daily determines what you become permanently.
quotes.author: Mike Murdock

quotes.quote: It's hard to determine where lies culpability.
quotes.author: Roger Mahony

quotes.quote: Your initial approach to a person can determine your feelings toward them.
quotes.author: Dorothy Uhnak

quotes.quote: What you choose today will determine who you are tomorrow.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: Determine a single measure that you can use to grade your progress and success in each area of your life. Refer to it daily.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Determine to live life with flair and laughter.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Age is how we determine how valuable you are.
quotes.author: Jane Elliott

quotes.quote: Determine that the thing can and shall be done and then... find the way.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Only you can determine your choice of attitude. Choose wisely, choose carefully, choose confidently!
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Elections determine who is in power, but they do not determine how power is used.
quotes.author: Paul Collier

quotes.quote: Our integrity determines what we really are.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: The past doesn't determine your future unless you carry it with you into the present. Forgiving yourself and others, you free the universe to begin again at any moment.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Your habits will determine your quality of life.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: The leader's attitude helps determine the attitudes of the followers.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Your attitude determines your actions, and your actions determine your accomplishment.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Our deeds determine us, as much as we determine our deeds.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Actions determine what kind of characteristics are developed.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Trying to determine what is going on in the world by reading newspapers is like trying to tell the time by watching the second hand of a clock.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: What you think determines your outlook on life. What you do determines your destiny.
quotes.author: Barry Gallagher

quotes.quote: Your thoughts determine your frequency, and your feelings tell you immediately what frequency you are on.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: If you determine your course With force or speed, You miss the way of the dharma. Quietly consider What is right and what is wrong. Receiving all opinions equally, Without haste, wisely, Observe the dharma.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Determine to do some thinking for yourself. Don't live entirely upon the thoughts of others. Don't be an automaton.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.quote: Leadership ability determines a person's level of effectiveness.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Your attitude is everything, and it determines how you experience every aspect of your life.
quotes.author: Gerald Jampolsky

quotes.quote: Money will determine whether the accused goes to prison or walks out of the courtroom a free man.
quotes.author: Johnnie Cochran

quotes.quote: Personnel determines the potential of the team. Vision determines the direction of the team. Work ethic determines the preparation of the team. Leadership determines the success of the team.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: You too can determine what you want. You can decide on your major objectives, targets, aim and destination.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Stay focused. Your start does not determine how you're going to finish.
quotes.author: Herman Edwards

quotes.quote: Your optimism today will determine your level of success tomorrow.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: The way you treat others determines the way others treat you; the way others treat you determines the way you see yourself; the way you see yourself determines who you are.
quotes.author: Sharon Gannon

quotes.quote: Either you will determine truth by your feelings or truth will determine your feelings. Be careful following feelings alone.
quotes.author: Lecrae

quotes.quote: Detroit's industrial ruins are picturesque, like crumbling Rome in an 18th-century etching.
quotes.author: Manuel Moroun

quotes.quote: Detroit can become a national model for urban revitalization, but to do so, it must break free from past development models.
quotes.author: Rashida Tlaib

quotes.quote: I come from Detroit where it's rough and I'm not a smooth talker.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: There are cities that get by on their good looks, offer climate and scenery, views of mountains or oceans, rockbound or with palm trees. And there are cities like Detroit that have to work for a living.
quotes.author: Elmore Leonard

quotes.quote: The story of Detroit's bankruptcy was simple enough: Allow capitalism to grow the city, campaign against income inequality, tax the job creators until they flee, increase government spending in order to boost employment, promise generous pension plans to keep people voting for failure. Rinse, wash and repeat.
quotes.author: Ben Shapiro

quotes.quote: I think Detroit is where muscle meets brains.
quotes.author: Dan Gilbert

quotes.quote: Detroit turned out to be heaven, but it also turned out to be hell.
quotes.author: Marvin Gaye

quotes.quote: Detroit is a place where we've had it pretty tough. But there is a generosity here and a well of kindness that goes deep.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Planning is for the world's great cities, for Paris, London, and Rome, for cities dedicated, at some level, to culture. Detroit, on the other hand, was an American city and therefore dedicated to money, and so design had given way to expediency.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Eugenides

quotes.quote: Detroit is largely composed, today, of seemingly endless square miles of low-density failure.
quotes.author: Jane Jacobs

quotes.quote: Many of us prefer to live in places abandoned by humans. Less work for us. Detroit is very popular.
quotes.author: G. Willow Wilson

quotes.quote: The only difference between Detroit and the Third World in terms of corruption is Detroit don't have no goats in the streets.
quotes.author: Charlie LeDuff

quotes.quote: Detroit is big enough to matter in the world and small enough for you to matter in it.
quotes.author: Jeanette Pierce

quotes.quote: Detroit is a city that works hard, gets tired, gets dirty, gets defeated, and picks itself up every day and keeps going with a tenacity that amazes anyone who is paying attention.
quotes.author: Aaron Foley

quotes.quote: Detroit is really the most perfectly laid out city one could imagine, and such an enchanting park and lake, - infinitely better than any town I know in Europe. It ought to be a paradise in about fifty years when it has all matured.
quotes.author: Elinor Glyn

quotes.quote: People think that Detroit is this barren wasteland. While there are parts that are not as nice as others, the misconception is not true. It is definitely not a thriving community in Detroit, but it is getting there. There is a lot of heart and love in this city.
quotes.author: Steven Yeun

quotes.quote: Detroit is a metaphor for America, for America's challenges and America's opportunities. It is a hothouse for new innovation, for ingenuity and risk taking. That doesn't happen in a lot of American cities. We need to be in Detroit because of that.
quotes.author: Darren Walker

quotes.quote: When you are already in Detroit, you don't have to take a bus to get there.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Detroit's political leadership is a parasite that has outgrown its host.
quotes.author: Kevin D. Williamson

quotes.quote: Detroit is really a model for how wealthier and whiter Americans escape the costs of public goods they'd otherwise share with poorer and darker Americans.
quotes.author: Robert Reich

quotes.quote: People know Detroit for the cars, but the suburban areas of the city are really beautiful. It's much more inhabitable than people think. Many believe it's like Berlin at the end of World War II.
quotes.author: Leonard Slatkin

quotes.quote: The real story of Detroit [...] can be summed up in seven words. Private enterprise built it, government destroyed it.
quotes.author: Peter Schiff

quotes.quote: Detroit is the first city since antiquity to go above a million in population and then below.
quotes.author: Jay Nordlinger

quotes.quote: Nowhere on earth has more soul than Detroit.
quotes.author: Mayer Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Detroit is not as bad as it used to be, but it's still not where it should be.
quotes.author: Luther Keith

quotes.quote: Detroit was kind of a random thing where it was like a chance to be in a rock 'n' roll movie.
quotes.author: Edward Furlong

quotes.quote: Detroit, the heart of the country... I grew up on 10 Mile, 2 miles better than 8 Mile.
quotes.author: Kristen Bell

quotes.quote: Detroit: Cars and rock 'n' roll. Not a bad combo.
quotes.author: Kid Rock

quotes.quote: Detroit is saying that the hydrogen vehicle is the vehicle of the future. But it's 15 years from now.
quotes.author: Ed Markey

quotes.quote: Cities like Detroit exist because they occupy important sites. In the case of Detroit, it sits on a river between two great lakes - very important and strategic.
quotes.author: James Howard Kunstler

quotes.quote: For me, personally, Detroit is a melting pot for everything. We get the best from the East Coast, West Coast and down South.
quotes.author: Big Sean

quotes.quote: I'm a Detroit kid who grew up with that assembly line mentality: You go to work to make money.
quotes.author: Kevin Nash

quotes.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Only those who risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: All growth depends upon activity. There is no development physically or intellectually without effort, and effort means work.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Absorb what is useful, Discard what is not, Add what is uniquely your own.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Don't fear failure.Â  Not failure, but low aim, is the crime. In great attempts it is glorious even to fail.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Develop success from failures.Â  Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: What holds most people back isn't the quality of their ideas, but their lack of faith in themselves.Â You have to live your life as if you are already where you want to be.
quotes.author: Russell Simmons

quotes.quote: Overcoming all obstacles improves us, develops our natural ability and makes us stronger.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Sustainable development is the pathway to the future we want for all. It offers a framework to generate economic growth, achieve social justice, exercise environmental stewardship and strengthen governance.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.quote: We must never be afraid to go too far, for success lies just beyond.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Don't let the fear of striking out hold you back.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: The greatest development is achieved during the first years of life, and therefore it is then that the greatest care should be taken. If this is done, then the child does not become a burden; he will reveal himself as the greatest marvel of nature.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: To move forward, what's required is a unified space agenda based on exploration, science, development, commerce, and security.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without one.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: A master lives in the world of transformation, not the world of loss and gain.
quotes.author: John Frederick Demartini

quotes.quote: If we do not plant knowledge when young, it will give us no shade when we are old.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: The growth and development of people is the highest calling of leadership.
quotes.author: Harvey S. Firestone

quotes.quote: But until a person can say deeply and honestly, â€œI am what I am today because of the choices I made yesterday,â€ that person cannot say, â€œI choose otherwise.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Development of outlook naturally begins with a respect for God... Reverence to God and reverence for one's neighbor and reverence for oneself as a servant of God.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: Character development is conflict.
quotes.author: David Macinnis Gill

quotes.quote: The development of language is part of the development of the personality, for words are the natural means of expressing thoughts and establishing understanding between people.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: Sustainable development requires human ingenuity. People are the most important resource.
quotes.author: Dan Shechtman

quotes.quote: Never limit oneself based on the limitations of others. If you can not inspire them - leave them to be inspired by your lead.
quotes.author: Tiffany Luard

quotes.quote: All humans change. Development is our life. Transition, in labor, is the most painful time. Without change, there's no growth.
quotes.author: Mimi Kennedy

quotes.quote: Change and growth take place when a person has risked himself and dares to become involved with experimenting with his own life.
quotes.author: Herbert Otto

quotes.quote: If you aren't making any mistakes, it's a sure sign you're playing it too safe.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
quotes.author: Viktor E Frankl

quotes.quote: To build yourself is to add value to your life.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
quotes.author: Dr. Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Every day do something that will inch you closer to a better tomorrow.
quotes.author: Doug Firebaugh

quotes.quote: Let your creative and imaginative mind run freely; it will take you places you never dreamed of and provide breakthroughs that others once thought were impossible.
quotes.author: Idowu Koyenikan

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in getting up every time we do.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Adapting to changes represents an important characteristic of human nature, essential for the development of human society.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: Development is about transforming the lives of people, not just transforming economies.
quotes.author: Joseph E. Stiglitz

quotes.quote: A successful economic development strategy must focus on improving the skills of the area's workforce, reducing the cost of doing business and making available the resources business needs to compete and thrive in today's global economy.
quotes.author: Rod Blagojevich

quotes.quote: If you learn only methods, you'll be tied to your methods, but if you learn principles you can devise your own methods.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: In our development, as we grow throughout our lives, the structure of our beliefs becomes very complicated, and we make it even more complicated because we make the assumption that what we believe is the absolute truth.
quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.quote: Unless you try to do something beyond what you have already mastered, you will never grow.
quotes.author: Ronald Osborn

quotes.quote: Life is a progression of becoming who we are.
quotes.author: J.R. Rim

quotes.quote: Our business in life is not to get ahead of others, but to get ahead of ourselves.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: In order to succeed you must fail so that you know what not to do the next time.
quotes.author: Anthony J. DeAngelo

quotes.quote: If you want to increase your success rate, double your failure rate.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: Development is an endurance exercise with incremental improvements.
quotes.author: Sri Mulyani Indrawati

quotes.quote: Development in general doesn't make you better employee or better manager. Development makes you a better human who is able to invest the best in you to add beauty and meaning to your life and the rest of the world.
quotes.author: Sameh Elsayed

quotes.quote: Be not afraid of growing slowly; be afraid only of standing still.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: So go ahead and make mistakes. Make all you can.Â  Because that's where you will find success. On the far side of failure.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote:
You never change things by fighting the existing reality.
To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: The real voyage of discovery consists of not in seeking new landscapes but in having new eyes.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Development is a lot cheaper than sending soldiers.
quotes.author: Robert M. Gates

quotes.quote: Development of character consists solely in moving toward self-sufficiency.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: Development is only necessary to rectify the ignorance of designers.
quotes.author: Keith Duckworth

quotes.quote: Development comes from within. Nature does not hurry but advances slowly.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: Development cannot really be so centered only on those in power.
quotes.author: Amartya Sen

quotes.quote: Development involves giving up a smaller story in order to wake up to a larger story.
quotes.author: Jean Houston

quotes.quote: Self development is a higher duty than self sacrifice.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.quote: When one has talent, everything contributes to its development.
quotes.author: Peter Kropotkin

quotes.quote: Maturation is the development from environmental support to self support.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Conservation means development as much as it does protection.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The truest success is but the development of self.
quotes.author: Charles Atlas

quotes.quote: The progressive development of man is vitally dependent on invention.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.quote: Leadership development is a lifetime journey, not a quick trip.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: If you would understand anything, observe its beginning and its development.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The free development of each is the condition for the free development of all.
quotes.author: Friedrich Engels

quotes.quote: Never look back unless you are planning to go that way.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: There are no great limits to growth because there are no limits of human intelligence, imagination, and wonder.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: All that is valuable in human society depends upon the opportunity for development accorded the individual.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The falsification of history has done more to impede human development than any one thing known to mankind.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: Only through freedom and environmental experience is it practically possible for human development to occur.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: There is no development of character without resistance, there is no growth of spirituality without overcoming.
quotes.author: David O. McKay

quotes.quote: Hell is the highest reward that the devil can offer you for being a servant of his.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: We are each our own devil, and we make this world our hell.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The devil doesn't come dressed in a red cape and pointy horns. He comes as everything you've ever wished for.
quotes.author: Tucker Max

quotes.quote: Better the devil you know than the angel you don't.
quotes.author: Hama Tuma

quotes.quote: Be careful who you trust, the devil was once an angel.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Neutral men are the devil's allies.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.quote: For where God built a church, there the Devil would also build a chapel.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The devil divides the world between atheism and superstition
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: The devil takes a hand in what is done in haste.
quotes.author: Turkish Proverb

quotes.quote: Sometimes The Devil is a gentleman.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: All the cunning of the devil is exercised in trying to tear us away from the word.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The devil is a better theologian than any of us and is a devil still.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: The Devil's most devilish when respectable.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: Beauty and the devil are the same thing.
quotes.author: Robert Mapplethorpe

quotes.quote: You must never tire fighting Satan.
quotes.author: Abraham Cahan

quotes.quote: If you've got faith and you believe in what you are living for, you can stand your ground when the Devil's at your door.
quotes.author: John Michael Montgomery

quotes.quote: The greatest trick the devil ever pulled was convincing the world he didn't exist.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When you're in hell, only a devil can point the way out.
quotes.author: Joe Abercrombie

quotes.quote: Pride is the master sin of the devil, and the devil is the father of lies.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.quote: If you don't set the tone for the day, the devil will set it for you.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: The devil has put a penalty on all things we enjoy in life. Either we suffer in our health, or we suffer in our soul, or we get fat.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The devil lies brooding in the miser's chest.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: The devil tempts men through their ambition, their cupidity, or their appetite, until he comes to the profane swearer, whom he clutches without any reward.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: The Devil, can sometimes do a very gentlemanly thing.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Devils can be driven out of the heart by the touch of a hand on a hand, or a mouth on a mouth.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Hell is empty and all the devils are here.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The devil hath power To assume a pleasing shape.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Satan's successes are the greatest when he appears with the name of God on his lips.
quotes.author: Mahatma Ghandhi

quotes.quote: The Devil may also make use of morality.
quotes.author: Karl Barth

quotes.quote: A brave man is a man who dares to look the Devil in the face and tell him he is a Devil.
quotes.author: James A. Garfield

quotes.quote: In every man's heart there is a devil, but we do not know the man as bad until the devil is roused.
quotes.author: James Oliver Curwood

quotes.quote: We are our own devils; we drive ourselves out of our Edens.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Man can hardly even recognize the devils of his own creation.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: It was necessary that the Devil should have a representation upon the Earth, as well as God.
quotes.author: Warren Jeffs

quotes.quote: The devil is an optimist if he thinks he can make people worse than they are.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love.
quotes.author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand

quotes.quote: Don't be a fool for the Devil, darling.
quotes.author: Anne Rice

quotes.quote: The devil is more interesting than God.
quotes.author: Christopher Plummer

quotes.quote: If my devils are to leave me, I'm afraid my angels will take flight as well.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: The devil's name is dullness.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: We must live like angels and produce like the devil!
quotes.author: Luis Munoz Marin

quotes.quote: Illusion is the dust the devil throws in the eyes of the foolish.
quotes.author: Minna Antrim

quotes.quote: Fear is the dark room where the Devil develops his negatives.
quotes.author: Gary Busey

quotes.quote: We are not angels. Nor are we the devils you have made us out to be.
quotes.author: Slobodan Milosević

quotes.quote: Perfectionists are their own devils.
quotes.author: Jack Kirby

quotes.quote: Love is familiar. Love is a devil. There is no evil angel but Love.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Better sit still, than rise to meet the devil.
quotes.author: Michael Drayton

quotes.quote: Don't you know there ain't no devil, it's just god when he's drunk.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.quote: The world is the devil's hunting-ground, and children are his choicest game.
quotes.author: Anthony Comstock

quotes.quote: No man means evil but the devil, and we shall know him by his horns.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Thinking about the devil is worse than seeing the devil.
quotes.author: Branch Rickey

quotes.quote: The devil says I'm out, but the Lord says I'm safe.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: The Devil is an Ass , I do acknowledge it.
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: Needs must when the devil drives.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Talk to the devil, and his horns appear.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: I think the devil doesn't exist, but man has created him, he has created him in his own image and likeness.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: With God, what is terrible is that one never knows whether it's not just a trick of the devil.
quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

quotes.quote: In all systems of theology, the devil figures as a male person.
quotes.author: Don Herold

quotes.quote: If the devil could be persuaded to write a bible, he would title it, "You Only Live Once."
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: The quiet conscience is an invention of the devil.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: The devil can cite scripture for his purpose.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I don't really believe in the Devil, but if the Devil is the Father of Lies, then he certainly invented the Internet.
quotes.author: Ken MacLeod

quotes.quote: Somehow our devils are never quite what we expect when we meet them face to face.
quotes.author: Nelson DeMille

quotes.quote: The Devil fears the word of God, He can't bite it, it breaks his teeth.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Gossip is the Devil's radio.
quotes.author: George Harrison

quotes.quote: The meanest thing in the world is the devil.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The so-called pathological liar has learned from an early age that they get punished more often for telling the truth than they do for lying. They get so accustomed to devious behavior that they lie without much thought or emotion.
quotes.author: John Rooney

quotes.quote: When being dishonest, people can still tell the truth. Be mindful of the treacherous that do not lie.
quotes.author: Eric Parslow

quotes.quote: Somewhere between the honest truth and the deceptive lie is the deceptive truth and the honest lie.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Respect is really only a devious route taken by violence.
quotes.author: George Bataille

quotes.quote: When we think how narrow and devious this path of nature is, how dimly we can trace it, for all our lamps of science, and how from the darkness which girds it round great and terrible possibilities loom ever shadowly upwards, it is a bold and a confident man who will put a limit to the strange by-oaths into which the human spirit may wander.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: The most disturbing thing, I think, with people that do very morally devious things more and more often is to see that they completely feel that they had no choice in the matter.
quotes.author: Tamzin Merchant

quotes.quote: Faithful are the wounds of a friend; but the kisses of an enemy are deceitful.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A cunning man overreaches no one half so much as himself.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Every man is dishonest who lives upon the labor of others, no matter if he occupies a throne.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: When a sinister person means to be your enemy, they always start by trying to become your friend.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: The more cunning a man is, the less he suspects that he will be caught in a simple thing. The more cunning a man is, the simpler the trap he must be caught in.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: Cunning grows in deceit at seeing itself discovered, and tries to deceive with truth itself.
quotes.author: Balthasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Simplicity is the most deceitful mistress that ever betrayed man.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: For men are prone to go it blind along the calf-paths of the mind. To do what other men have done. They follow in the beaten track, and out and in, and forth and back, and still their devious course pursue, to keep the path that others do.
quotes.author: Sam Walter Foss

quotes.quote: A complete woman is probably not a very admirable creature. She is manipulative, uses other people to get her own way, and works within whatever system she is in.
quotes.author: Anita Brookner

quotes.quote: Nothing was certain; there were many strange twists and devious turns as one hopped down the overgrown bunnytrail of life.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: True evil is unlikely to receive an invitation from us, so it clothes itself in just enough truth to make itself look appealing and then it looks to unpeel us.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: A cunning mind emphatically delights in its own cunning, and is the ready prey of cunning.
quotes.author: Anna Jameson

quotes.quote: Are you a devious, plotting, unreliable madman? Ah, good, then you can be my most trusted advisor.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Just because something isn't a lie does not mean that it isn't deceptive. A liar knows that he is a liar, but one who speaks mere portions of truth in order to deceive is a craftsman of destruction.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Perhaps some of us have to go through dark and devious ways before we can find the river of peace or the highroad to the soul's destination.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: The terrible immoralities are the cunning ones hiding behind masks of morality, such as exploiting people while pretending to help them.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: Those who have the most cunning affect all their lives to condemn cunning; that they may make use of it on some great occasion, and to some great end.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Whatever I am offered in devotion with a pure heart -- a leaf, a flower, fruit, or water -- I accept with joy.
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: You can hear a song in every word if you listen closely enough.
quotes.author: Christopher M. Milo

quotes.quote: To submit one's self to one's gift is to submit oneself to education and self-development and to devote enough time to improve one's gift
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: We know the battle ahead will be long. But always remember that, no matter what obstacles stand in our way, nothing can stand in the way of the power of millions of voices calling for change.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Everyone has talent. What is rare is the courage to follow the talent to the dark place where it l
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: True devotion is motivated by love alone and devoid of selfish entanglements.
quotes.author: Rick Hocker

quotes.quote: The main measure of your devotion to God is not your devotional life. It is simply your life.
quotes.author: John Ortberg

quotes.quote: True strength lies in submission which permits one to dedicate his life, through devotion, to something beyond himself.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: If you don't drive your business, you will be driven out of business.
quotes.author: B.C Forbes

quotes.quote: Its amazing what you can accomplish when you don't care who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Harry Truman

quotes.quote: Work as if everything depends on you.Â  Pray as if everything depends on God.
quotes.author: St. Ignatius Loyola

quotes.quote: Your devotion to God is illustrated, demonstrated, and authenticated by your love for others.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: Don't do anything by half. If you love someone, love them with all your soul. When you go to work, work your ass off. When you hate someone, hate them until it hurts.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: You have to plan it [your devotion to God] every day. And, the best time to plan it is before your day begins. If you don't plan it, your day will plan you. And so, I make a disciplined life of the study of the scriptures, reading the word every day.
quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.quote: Even when I'm dead, I'll swim through the Earth, like a mermaid of the soil, just to be next to your bones.
quotes.author: Jeffrey McDaniel

quotes.quote: Devotion, as it relates to the title of my memoir, means fidelity - as in fidelity to a person or a practice. I think it's certainly possible to feel devotion without having faith, at least in the religious sense of the word.
quotes.author: Dani Shapiro

quotes.quote: With devotion's visage and pious action we do sugar o'er the devil himself.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Hide yourself in God, so when a man wants to find you he will have to go there first.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Everybody wants their own little place in the world and maybe mine is hereâ€¦ Loving you from a distance.
quotes.author: Ranata Suzuki

quotes.quote: The limitless loving devotion to God, and the gift God makes of Himself to you, are the highest elevation of which the heart is capable; it is the highest degree of prayer. The souls that have reached this point are truly the heart of the Church.
quotes.author: Edith Stein

quotes.quote: Devotion is the realization that wealth, education and power are God given gifts and not the endowments of fate.
quotes.author: Rev. Pandurang Shashtri Athavale

quotes.quote: Children do not give up their innate imagination, curiosity, dreaminess easily. You have to love them to get them to do that.
quotes.author: R. D. Laing

quotes.quote: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows the song in your heart, and can sing it back to you when you have forgotten the words.
quotes.author: Donna Roberts

quotes.quote: Perpetual devotion to what a man calls his business is only to be sustained by perpetual neglect of many other things.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: To achieve progress and development it is necessary to bring about co-ordination between liberty and security through Devotion.
quotes.author: Pandurang Shashtri Athavale

quotes.quote: True teachers are those who use themselves as bridges over which they invite their students to cross; then, having facilitated their crossing, joyfully collapse, encouraging them to create their own.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: People, even more than things, have to be restored, renewed, revived, reclaimed, and redeemed; never throw out anyone.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: The man who removes a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: I don't need a certain number of friends, just a number of friends I can be certain of.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Only he who can see the invisible can do the impossible.
quotes.author: Frank Gaines

quotes.quote: Don't pray when you feel like it. Have an appointment with the Lord and keep it.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: Devotion begins at home, inside your own awareness.
quotes.author: Debbie Ford

quotes.quote: To the world you may be one person but to one person you may be the world.
quotes.author: Bill Wilson

quotes.quote: Devotion is diligence without assurance.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: What an enthusiastic devotion is that which sends a man from the attractions of home, the ties of neighbourhood, the bonds of country, to range plains, valleys, hills, mountains, for a new flower.
quotes.author: Dorothea Dix

quotes.quote: With devotion at the center of your awareness, you don't have to refer to your past in order to make a choice of how to respond or react in any given situation.
quotes.author: Debbie Ford

quotes.quote: Experience shows that success is due less to ability than to zeal. The winner is he who gives himself to his work, body and soul.
quotes.author: Charles Buxton

quotes.quote: There's nothing in the world like the devotion of a married woman. It's a thing no married man knows anything about.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Devotion does not mean only Chanting praise and singing glory of God, nor fasting and offerings made to God. Devotion is a specific attitude towards life and existence.
quotes.author: Rev. Pandurang Shashtri Athavale

quotes.quote: Many who have spent a lifetime in it can tell us less of love than the child that lost a dog yesterday.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: It is by undivided devotion that I can be known in such a form, truly seen, and entered into.
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: Keep behind, and you shall be put in front; keep out, and you shall be kept in.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Giving the best to others are giving the best to us. The value of life is not based on how long we live. But, how much can we contribute to others in our society.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Often devotion to virtue arises from sated desire.
quotes.author: Adela Florence Nicolson

quotes.quote: There is always the danger that we may just do the work for the sake of the work. This is where the respect and the love and the devotion come in - that we do it to God, to Christ, and that's why we try to do it as beautifully as possible.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: You don't discipline yourself to attain the feeling of love. You attain the feeling of love and then you want to discipline yourself because you love the discipline, because it brings more love.
quotes.author: Sivaya Subramuniyaswami

quotes.quote: Our ultimate devotion is to be a reflection of a divine work that is continuously unfolding in our hearts.
quotes.author: Andrena Sawyer

quotes.quote: Love at first sight is easy to understand; it's when two people have been looking at each other for a lifetime that it becomes a miracle.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: One who has devotion recognizes God to be present everywhere and in everyone, including in images.
quotes.author: B.R. Suhas

quotes.quote: A devotee perceives the presence of God in images through devotion.
quotes.author: B.R. Suhas

quotes.quote: God is not present in wood, or stone, or an idol made of clay. God is present in devotion. Therefore, devotion is very important.
quotes.author: Suktimala

quotes.quote: All is holy where devotion kneels.
quotes.author: O.W. Holmes

quotes.quote: The secret heart is devotion's temple; there the saint lights the flame of purest sacrifice, which burns unseen but not accepted.
quotes.author: Hannah More

quotes.quote: The inward signs of humble penitence rise to the ear of heaven, when peeled hymns are scattered to the common air.
quotes.author: Joanna Baillie

quotes.quote: Solid devotions resemble the rivers which run under the earth— they steal from the eyes of the world to seek the eyes of God, and it often happens that those of whom we speak least on earth are best known in heaven.
quotes.author: Caussin

quotes.quote: The best and sweetest flowers in paradise, God gives to is people when they are on their knees in the closet.
quotes.author: T. Brooks

quotes.quote: Prayer without devotion is not a prayer. If a man prays without devotion, he should repeat his prayer with devotion.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: Blessed are those who have devotion in their hearts. It is the only reality in this world, other things are false.
quotes.author: Swami Paramananda

quotes.quote: True devotion has wonderful power. Through it, a devotee can bring out divinity even from a stone.
quotes.author: Swami Paramananda

quotes.quote: The goal can be attained very easily through the power of faith and devotion, and never through the power of reasoning.
quotes.author: Sri Ramakrishna

quotes.quote: If you want to be a true devotee, you must be above all worldly thoughts and deeds. No earthly condition should ever disturb your peace.
quotes.author: Swami Paramananda

quotes.quote: True devotion brings you to a state where you live with your Ideal in every moment of your life.
quotes.author: Swami Paramananda

quotes.quote: Not lost from my young years / Is silent devotion to a sound of bells, / To all churches' dusking altars / And their blue domes heaven-wide.
quotes.author: Georg Trakl

quotes.quote: The heart can think of no devotion / Greater than being shore to ocean - / Holding the curve of one position, / Counting an endless repetition.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: To succeed in your mission, you must have single-minded devotion to your goal.
quotes.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: I'm gonna fight for you until your heart stops beating.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: Your memory feels like home to me. So whenever my mind wanders, it always finds its way back to you.
quotes.author: Ranata Suzuki

quotes.quote: Devotion is a place where you do not exist; life just flows through you as a certain sweetness and beauty.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: No matter where your interest lies, you will not be able to accomplish anything unless you bring your deepest devotion to it.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: Your depth of commitment, / your quality of service, / the product of your devotion -- / these are the things that count in life.
quotes.author: Scott O'Grady

quotes.quote: Real devotion is an unbroken receptivity to the truth.
quotes.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

quotes.quote: In order to excel, you must be completely dedicated.
quotes.author: Willie Mays

quotes.quote: You, too, can be carved anew by the details of your devotion.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: In the uttermost meaning of the words, thought is devout, and devotion is thought. Deep calls unto deep.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Devotion, when it does not lie under the check of reason, is apt to degenerate into enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: One single day of devotion is worth more than a thousand years of worldly life.
quotes.author: Saint Francis De Sales

quotes.quote: Devotion means your involvement with life is no more conditional.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: Devotion, like fire, goeth upward.
quotes.author: Zoroaster

quotes.quote: Inside the treasury of the dharma eye a single grain of dust.
quotes.author: Dōgen

quotes.quote: You are dharma. You are a wheel. And the wheel of dharma spins.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Dharma is another name for existence. It is existence in its purest form.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: By the dharma is meant the heart, for there is no dharma apart from the heart.
quotes.author: Huangbo Xiyun

quotes.quote: Practicing Dharma is the supreme method for improving the quality of our human life.
quotes.author: Geshe Kelsang Gyatso

quotes.quote: The Buddha's dharma didn't teach peace and relaxation; it taught awakening - often rude awakening.
quotes.author: Jay Michaelson

quotes.quote: Dharma is not upheld by talking about it. Dharma is upheld by living in harmony with it.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: The Dharma Path is to keep walking forward. But the true Dharma has no going forward, no going backward, and no standing still.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.quote: Hindu Dharma is like a boundless ocean teeming with priceless gems. The deeper you dive the more treasures you find.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Dharma is that which is enjoined by the holy books, followed by the sages, interpreted by the learned and which appeals to the heart.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Hindu Dharma is the quintessence of our national life, hold fast to it if you want your country to survive, or else you would be wiped out in three generations.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Sathya, Dharma, Shanghai and prema are the hall-marks of a purified heart, a heart where God is enshrined and is manifest.
quotes.author: Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.quote: Obviously the dharma is every breath we take, every thought we think, every word we speak, if we do it with awareness and an open, caring heart.
quotes.author: Tenzin Palmo

quotes.quote: When you understand dharma, when you see its perfect perfection, shining both in and beyond all things, you will be freed from all misunderstandings.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Where there is Dharma there is no karma. So we have to lean on Dharmic values and we have to build a Dharmic family, we have to relate to that family and we have to relate to it deeply.
quotes.author: Harbhajan Singh Yogi

quotes.quote: Dharma is in your mind, not in the forest. Don't believe others, just listen to your mind. You don't have to go anywhere else. Wisdom is in yourself, just like a sweet ripe mango is already in a young green one.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.quote: The dharma is the most precious thing in the world and we should put it at the center of our hearts and transform our whole lives into dharma practice. Otherwise, at the time of death, we will look back and say, now what was all that about? If we truly want to benefit others and ourselves, we have to do it. No excuses.
quotes.author: Tenzin Palmo

quotes.quote: Dharma gives you the balance. It gives you the establishment into proper behavior, proper understanding, proper living, but it doesn't give you the completion of your journey. It doesn't give you the satisfaction of reaching the destination and your personality is still incomplete. So one has to have the experience of the spirit.
quotes.author: Nirmala Srivastava

quotes.quote: Everyone has a dharma or purpose in life.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The Dharma is the truth that all natures are pure.
quotes.author: Bodhidharma

quotes.quote: Even a little of dharma saves one from many a pitfall.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: If you are following the dharma no matter what you do it is moral.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: In Dharma practice, the most important thing is to be very sincere.
quotes.author: Tenzin Palmo

quotes.quote: Dharma simply means the right thing in the right place, in the right space.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: The dharma is a universal medicine.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: Dharma is the study of what is, and the only way you can find out what is true is through studying yourself.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: The purpose of dharma is to help your mind to expand, to grow, to clarify. It should uphold us and create an inner sense of peace, joy, and clarity.
quotes.author: Tenzin Palmo

quotes.quote: The essence of the Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha) is about identifying the cause of our suffering & alleviating it.
quotes.author: Allan Lokos

quotes.quote: Our ultimate dharma is self-realization. Thoughts and actions that support our spiritual evolution are real dharma.
quotes.author: Mata Amritanandamayi

quotes.quote: Know that the true dharma emerges of itself [during the practice of zazen], clearing away hindrances and distractions.
quotes.author: Dōgen

quotes.quote: There is a dharma for yourself, for someone else, for a family, for a nation, for a universe. There are collective and individual dharmas.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: Dharma is the truth that all of existence is. It does not disagree with anything. It is the perception of existence in its purest formlessness.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Dharma doesn't necessarily mean following a mundane and boring life. It means a life of high adventure, not a life of endless, boring repetition.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Following dharma puts you in a proper field of attention. In a proper field of attention, regardless of what your outer circumstances are, happiness will flow.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: If you lose interest in the dharma, then you might be reborn in a place where you are unlikely to meet with the dharma. And then you're completely off the path.
quotes.author: Tenzin Palmo

quotes.quote: What can be the dharma at one point in your life can totally reverse itself, and suddenly you might be doing something the opposite or something very new, something you never considered.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: A way of spreading the dharma is just telling people, sharing with them your experiences. Never push it, never be a missionary. Be completely selfless; realize you're only an instrument of eternity.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Your dharma is what kind of work you should be doing, what kind of people you should associate with, whether you should have a teacher or not. Dharma encompasses all things and it is specific to the individual.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Dharma practice means physical hardship; it means that you shouldn't be pansies about it. You should exert yourselves wholeheartedly to engage in the practice, so that it will affect your body, speech, and mind.
quotes.author: Ngagpa Yeshe Dorje

quotes.quote: There is no dharma greater than a word uttered by a man of conscience; there is no karma greater than a man listening to himself! Since an intention precedes action, it should be the reference point for any action.
quotes.author: Thiruman Archunan

quotes.quote: Each time the dharma moved into a different civilization or historical period, it faced a twofold challenge: to maintain its integrity as an internally coherent tradition, and to express its vision in a way that responded to the needs of the new situation.
quotes.author: Stephen Batchelor

quotes.quote: Naturally, to follow dharma, we have to find out what it is. You have to struggle with it. The answer will not come easily. You will be swayed by your desires, conditioning, and those around you who have ideas about what you should do, what is proper, what is improper.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: If you perform your work viewing it as your dharma, your actions become sacred.
quotes.author: Mata Amritanandamayi

quotes.quote: Many people are benefiting beings, but from a dharma point of view, if you are a dharma practitioner, then the first priority is to get yourself together.
quotes.author: Tenzin Palmo

quotes.quote: Those who see worldly life as an obstacle to Dharma see no Dharma in everyday actions. They have not yet discovered that there are no everyday actions outside of Dharma.
quotes.author: Dōgen

quotes.quote: Have your life properly aligned with dharma. The technicalities of the movement of the kundalini are easy to master. Dharma is much more complex.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Dharma is an ancient word for truth.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Not to follow the dharma leads to disaster. Life will be unhappy.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Dharma is a sanskrit word. It simply means that which is right, that which is correct, that which is the divine law.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: Dharma is precisely this 'discipline of ordered existence', a 'belief system that restrains and gives coherence to desires.
quotes.author: Gurcharan Das

quotes.quote: A reader's emotions can be sparked with few words. That's the power of dialogue.
quotes.author: Sol Stein

quotes.quote: Dialogue works the least well when it's telling you what's going on.
quotes.author: Tom Rickman

quotes.quote: A healthy dialogue is always good.
quotes.author: Michael Hersch

quotes.quote: Dialogue is easy. It's what you've been doing almost every day, most of your life.
quotes.author: Josip Novakovich

quotes.quote: Dialogue is a lean language in which every word counts.
quotes.author: Sol Stein

quotes.quote: Control your inner dialogue. Talk to yourself positively all the time.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Dialogue should simply be a sound among other sounds, just something that comes out of the mouths of people whose eyes tell the story in visual terms.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Dialogue is a non-confrontational communication, where both partners are willing to learn from the other and therefore leads much farther into finding new grounds together
quotes.author: Scilla Elworthy

quotes.quote: All the information you need can be given in dialogue.
quotes.author: Elmore Leonard

quotes.quote: Good dialogue is very important.
quotes.author: Clive Owen

quotes.quote: Dialogue cannot exist without humility.
quotes.author: Paulo Freire

quotes.quote: A dialogue among civilizations can be seen as a dialogue between the individual and the universal.
quotes.author: Abdelaziz Bouteflika

quotes.quote: Dialogue in fiction is always written to be read in silence. The page is the limit. Dialogue on stage and on the screen is meant to be spoken. The voice is the limit.
quotes.author: Guillermo Cabrera Infante

quotes.quote: Dialogue in fiction is what characters do to one another.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: The dialogue of architecture has been centered too long around the idea of truth.
quotes.author: Michael Graves

quotes.quote: Dialogue should show the relationships among people.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: A book is always a dialogue with other readers and other books.
quotes.author: Tim O'Reilly

quotes.quote: Reading great dialogue as an actor is such a rare privilege.
quotes.author: Max Casella

quotes.quote: Genuine dialogue, not rhetorical bomb-throwing, leads to progress.
quotes.author: Mark Udall

quotes.quote: In true dialogue, both sides are willing to change.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: In dialogue, individuals gain insights that simply could not be achieved individually.
quotes.author: Peter Senge

quotes.quote: All good dialogue perhaps deals with something unprecedented.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: Dialogue cannot exist, however, in the absence of a profound love for the world and its people.
quotes.author: Paulo Freire

quotes.quote: Dialogue means debates and everyone's point of view.
quotes.author: Kevin Hart

quotes.quote: Dialogue does not happen when we are adversaries.
quotes.author: Zalman Schachter-Shalomi

quotes.quote: Dialogue should convey a sense of spontaneity but eliminate the repetitiveness of real talk.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: It's dialogue that gives your cast their voices, and is crucial in defining their characters.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: A dialogue leads to connection, which leads to trust which leads to engagement.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Dialogue is character and character is plot.
quotes.author: George V

quotes.quote: Dialogue, contrary to popular view, is not a recording of actual speech; it is a semblance of speech, an invented language of exchanges that build in tempo or content toward climaxes.
quotes.author: Sol Stein

quotes.quote: Good dialogue is not real speech-it's the illusion of real speech.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Writing good dialogue is art as well as craft.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The capacity for inner dialogue is a touchstone for outer objectivity.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Dialogue is the fundamental unfolding of a gift of oneself to another.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: The best, most natural dialogue is usually written as if the writer is listening to dictation. You might get stuck on any particular point and have to question yourself; but normally, dialogue writes itself.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Dialogue is used to reveal not what we want to say, but what we are trying to hide.
quotes.author: William Monahan

quotes.quote: Good dialogue illuminates what people are not saying.
quotes.author: Robert Towne

quotes.quote: God's dialogue with us becomes truly human, since God conducts his part as man.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: Every diamond has the ability to shine when there is someone to recognize its good facets and inhibit its flaws.
quotes.author: Wes Fesler

quotes.quote: Diamonds are intrinsically worthless, except for the deep psychological need they fill.
quotes.author: Nicky Oppenheimer

quotes.quote: Diamonds are to be found only in the darkness of the earth, and truth in the darkness of the mind.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The more the diamond is cut the brighter it sparkles; and in what seems hard dealing, there God has no end in view but to perfect His people.
quotes.author: Thomas Guthrie

quotes.quote: Invest in the human soul. Who knows, it might be a diamond in the rough.
quotes.author: Daniel Defoe

quotes.quote: Rough diamonds may sometimes be mistaken for worthless pebbles.
quotes.author: Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: He sparked on his body that reflect like mini mirrors of diamond
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer
