quotes.quote: Diamonds are a girl's best friend.
quotes.author: Leo Robin

quotes.quote: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A diamond doesn't start out polished and shining. It once was nothing special, but with enough pressure and time, becomes spectacular. I'm that diamond.
quotes.author: Solange nicole

quotes.quote: The soul is placed in the body like a rough diamond, and must be polished, or the luster of it will never appear.
quotes.author: Daniel Defoe

quotes.quote: Diamonds are nothing more than chunks of coal that stuck to their jobs.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: My teachers treated me as a diamond in the rough, someone who needed smoothing.
quotes.author: Mother Jones

quotes.quote: A diamond, which is the hardest of stones, not yielding unto steel, emery or any other thing, is yet made soft by the blood of a goat.
quotes.author: Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: Adversity is the diamond dust Heaven polishes its jewels with.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Diamonds are the tears of the poor.
quotes.author: Helen McCloy

quotes.quote: All is beautiful and unceasing, all is music and reason , and all, like diamond, is carbon first, then light .
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.quote: A diamond is just a lump of coal that stuck to its job.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: The diamond which shines in the Saviour's crown shall burn in unquenched beauty at last on the forehead of every human soul.
quotes.author: Theodore Parker

quotes.quote: This diamond has so many carats it's almost a turnip.
quotes.author: Richard Burton

quotes.quote: The fire of the diamond of true Identity is always there; it just needs the Master's crafting to reveal it.
quotes.author: Kenneth G. Mills

quotes.quote: The diamond has been always esteemed the rarest stone, and the most precious of all: among the ancients it was called the stone of reconciliation.
quotes.author: Lewis Vertoman

quotes.quote: Diamonds are forever, my youth is not.
quotes.author: Jill St. John

quotes.quote: The more you get past pain, the more it goes from coal to diamond.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Diamond being the toughest thing on the face of earth is still the most prettiest object; pretty is not always being honeyed.
quotes.author: Priyansh Shah

quotes.quote: I'm fascinated by diamonds. When I put diamonds on, my hands start to shake.
quotes.author: Debra Messing

quotes.quote: Through darkness diamonds spread their richest light.
quotes.author: John Webster

quotes.quote: A diamond, though set in horns, is still a diamond, and sparkles in purest gold.
quotes.author: Philip Massinger

quotes.quote: Whether we fall by ambition, blood, or lust, like diamonds we are cut with our own dust.
quotes.author: John Webster

quotes.quote: Some people value sentiments over diamonds.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: A diamond was laying in the street covered with dirt. Many fools passed by. Someone who knew diamonds picked it up.
quotes.author: Kabir

quotes.quote: Big girls need big diamonds.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: Diamonds never leave you... men do!
quotes.author: Shirley Bassey

quotes.quote: I never hated a man enough to give him diamonds back.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: Let us not be too particular; it is better to have old secondhand diamonds than none at all.
quotes.author: Bob Phillips

quotes.quote: The diamond is the hardest stone to get.
quotes.author: Bob Phillips

quotes.quote: Diamonds are hard not brittle guard against bitterness.
quotes.author: Bob Phillips

quotes.quote: Diamonds have an image of purity and light. They are given as a pledge of love and worn as a symbol of commitment.
quotes.author: Peter Singer

quotes.quote: You were never born with a silver spoon in your mouth. Don't think that way. You were born with a diamond spoon in your palm. Carry it by your own hand. Now, feed yourself.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Allow God to use the difficulties and disappointments in life as polish to transform your faith into a glistening diamond that takes in and reflects His love.
quotes.author: Elizabeth George

quotes.quote: A diamond, is a woman's last resort to love.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Perhaps I should just bury myself and become a diamond after thousands of years of intense pressure.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: A diamond’s creation requires immense pressure and intense temperatures to reach its highest potential. Without enduring the adversity and pressure of its environment, the diamond would never become the treasure it was meant to be.
quotes.author: Susan C. Young

quotes.quote: You’ll finally realize the importance of the spark of that diamond once you lost it.
quotes.author: RSCruz

quotes.quote: People who bury their hopes and crave for someone’s success never know that their diamond is hidden as they envy other’s silver!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Diamond is the hardest substance, but the Irony, it is also brittle.
quotes.author: Pushkar Saraf

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of diamonds in this world: The diamond itself and the eyes full of love!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: When we have graciously endured every adversity, we become like a shining diamond.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The heart of woman is like a diamond, who need a good skilled hunter.
quotes.author: Eyden I.

quotes.quote: I see a diamond that someone try to turn back into coal.
quotes.author: Clotilde Martinez

quotes.quote: Just because it looks and shines like a diamond, doesn't necessarily make it one.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Perhaps time’s definition of coal is the diamond.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: There comes a moment when the silence between two people can have the purity of a diamond.
quotes.author: Philippe Djian

quotes.quote: What did a diamond bring you? A momentary flash of brilliance. A diamond scintillated for second; a book could scintillate forever.
quotes.author: Veronica Henry

quotes.quote: There are only diamonds in the whole world, diamonds and perhaps the shabby gift of disillusion.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Remember diamonds are created under pressure so hold on, it will be your time to shine soon.
quotes.author: Sope Agbelusi

quotes.quote: No one knows how precious you are. You are a diamond in the rough and with a little polishing, you will shine.
quotes.author: Loung Ung

quotes.quote: Life tries to crush her, but only succeeded in making a diamond.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: A diamond’s luster is dull before revealing brilliant magnificent breathtaking shine.
quotes.author: Melody Lee

quotes.quote: Your rebel soul shines like a diamond pulled from dust: bright, clear and flawless.
quotes.author: Jay Long

quotes.quote: Life tried to crush her, but only succeeded in creating a diamond.
quotes.author: John Mark Green

quotes.quote: Time makes the carbon a diamond.
quotes.author: Khalid Masood

quotes.quote: The diamond cannot love the flower, for the flower lives only a day, then fades and dies. You are a diamond now.
quotes.author: Barbara Hambly

quotes.quote: You are as like a diamond, unbreakable if it is breakable, and broken in any way, remains still the diamond.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: To say the diamond of others like the stone, and own stone like the diamond is the easiest task, but to prove that, is hard.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Wherever diamond exists, it carries, its worth and value with it; similarly, a visionary-figure also stays as like as that.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: As only diamond can cut diamond; similarly, the liar's lies can ineffective only by lies, keeping in the mind that proverb: Tit for Tat.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Diamond is but frozen time.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Interns are like not-cut diamonds.
quotes.author: Barney Baszuro

quotes.quote: Its hard to be a diamond in a rhinestone world.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Diamonds cut diamonds; they who will prove. To thrive in cunning, must cure love with love.
quotes.author: John Ford

quotes.quote: Diamonds only can cut diamonds; and no such comments on Scripture as the Scripture.
quotes.author: Fuller

quotes.quote: Diamonds are the hardest natural substance known to humanity.
quotes.author: Cozette R. Garrett

quotes.quote: Diamonds can be imitated but not duplicated.
quotes.author: Cozette R. Garrett

quotes.quote: The brilliant sparkle of the diamond ring wooed the whim of a charming your thing.
quotes.author: W.H. Shuttleworth

quotes.quote: Diamond is the hardest substance, but the Irony, it is also brittle.
quotes.author: Pushkar Saraf

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of diamonds in this world: The diamond itself and the eyes full of love!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Diamond being the toughest thing on the face of earth is still the most prettiest object; pretty is not always being honeyed.
quotes.author: Priyansh Shah

quotes.quote: Our dreams are our precious diamonds; without them, we are endlessly poor. Let us perpetually dream to be overly wealthy!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A diamond is a piece of coal that stuck to the job.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: The soul is placed in the body like a rough diamond, and must be polished, or the luster of it will never appear.
quotes.author: Daniel Defoe

quotes.quote: The diamond has been always esteemed the rarest stone, and the most precious of all: among the ancients it was called the stone of reconciliation.
quotes.author: Lewis Vertoman

quotes.quote: It is no more easy to make a good picture than it is to find a diamond or a pearl. It means trouble and you risk your life for it.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Angels are like diamonds. They can't be made, you have to find them. Each one is unique.
quotes.author: Jaclyn Smith

quotes.quote: Diamonds are found only in the dark places of the earth, truths are found only in the depths of thought.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Easy-to know that diamonds-are precious, Good-to learn that rubies-have depth, But more-to see that pebbles-are miraculous.
quotes.author: Josef Albers

quotes.quote: A diamond with a flaw is worth more than a pebble without imperfections.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: One beautiful diamond is worth more than a mountain of stones, and one virtuous act of acquiescence and submission is better than an abundance of good works done for others.
quotes.author: Vincent de Paul

quotes.quote: The diamond which shines in the Saviour's crown shall burn in unquenched beauty at last on the forehead of every human soul.
quotes.author: Theodore Parker

quotes.quote: Diamonds are a key component in the campaign to make poverty history.
quotes.author: Nicky Oppenheimer

quotes.quote: The diamond is the hardest stone -- to get.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A diamond is just a piece of charcoal that handled stress exceptionally well.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Diamonds are intrinsically worthless, except for the deep psychological need they fill.
quotes.author: Nicky Oppenheimer

quotes.quote: A diamond, incarcerated in its subterraneous prison, rough and unpolished, differs not from a common stone.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Every diamond has the ability to shine when there is someone to recognize its good facets and inhibit its flaws.
quotes.author: Wes Fesler

quotes.quote: A diamond on a dunghill is a precious diamond still.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: A diamond, though set in horns, is still a diamond, and sparkles in purest gold.
quotes.author: Philip Massinger

quotes.quote: Diamonds are nothing more than chunks of coal that stuck to their jobs.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: Just as a diamond can only be polished by another diamond, it is only through genuine, all-out engagement with others that people can polish their character, and help each other to reach greater heights.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.quote: Diamonds are trumps in the game of hearts.
quotes.author: ROBERT ELLIOTT GONZALES

quotes.quote: A big diamond necklace is nouveau riche, really. People who have wealth a long time don't wear such things.
quotes.author: Elsa Peretti

quotes.quote: If you sell diamonds, you cannot expect to have many customers. But a diamond is a diamond even if there are no customers.
quotes.author: A. C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quotes.quote: Diamonds have an image of purity and light. They are given as a pledge of love and worn as a symbol of commitment.
quotes.author: Peter Singer

quotes.quote: That something so small could be so beautiful. Worth so much. Only the strongest people can turn away from feelings like that.
quotes.author: Anthony Doerr

quotes.quote: A diamond, which is the hardest of stones, not yielding unto steel, emery or any other thing, is yet made soft by the blood of a goat.
quotes.author: Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: Remember diamonds are created under pressure so hold on, it will be your time to shine soon.
quotes.author: Sope Agbelusi

quotes.quote: A diamond, is a woman's last resort to love.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: The life of every person is like a diary in which he means to write one story, and writes another.
quotes.author: James Matthew Barrie

quotes.quote: When all is said and done, leading a good life is more important than keeping a good diary.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A diary is the last place to go if you wish to seek the truth about a person. Nobody dares to make the final confession to themselves on paper: or at least, not about love.
quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.quote: History is the diary of humankind; to forget it is to try to navigate the future with no memory of the past.
quotes.author: T.L. Rese

quotes.quote: Making records should be fun.
quotes.author: Noel Gallagher

quotes.quote: Keep a diary, and someday it'll keep you.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Write a diary, imagining that you are trying to make an old person jealous.
quotes.author: Joe Dunthorne

quotes.quote: To write a diary every day is like returning to one's own vomit.
quotes.author: Enoch Powell

quotes.quote: Writing is a socially acceptable form of schizophrenia.
quotes.author: E.L. Doctorow

quotes.quote: A journal should be neither an echo nor a pander.
quotes.author: George William Curtis

quotes.quote: Keeping a journal implies hope.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: You may be keeping a diary of your thoughts but know that, in every religion, the God you believe is keeping a diary of your actions.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Memory is the diary that we all carry about with us.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Each new day is a blank page in the diary of your life.
quotes.author: Douglas Pagels

quotes.quote: One advantage in keeping a diary is that you become aware with reassuring clarity of the changes which you constantly suffer.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: Some of what you write may be humdrum dates and places, but there will also be rich passages that will be quoted by your posterity.
quotes.author: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.quote: A diary is an assassin's cloak which we wear when we stab a comrade in the back with a pen.
quotes.author: William Soutar

quotes.quote: Everyone should have a form of a diary, it's a great release.
quotes.author: Stanley Victor Paskavich

quotes.quote: A diary is more or less the work of a man of clay whose hands are clumsy and in whose eyes there is no light.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: All records are made to be broken.
quotes.author: Red Auerbach

quotes.quote: Keeping a diary is like closing your bedroom door and refusing to come out until dinnertime: it is a declaration of self.
quotes.author: Caitlin Flanagan

quotes.quote: A great library contains the diary of the human race.
quotes.author: Rev. George Dawson

quotes.quote: A proper family diary with everyone's events and parties in it really helps organise the household.
quotes.author: Anthea Turner

quotes.quote: Oh, this is a dear diary moment.
quotes.author: Matthew Perry

quotes.quote: Painting is just another way of keeping a diary.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Writing is not necessarily something to be ashamed of, but do it in private and wash your hands afterward.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Nothing matters but the writing. There has been nothing else worthwhile a stain upon the silence.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: The diary will really try and tell people who you are and what you were. The alternative is writing nothing, or creating a totally lifeless, as it is leafless, garden.
quotes.author: John Robert Fowles

quotes.quote: A diary need not be a dreary chronicle of one's movements; it should aim rather at giving salient account of some particular episode, a walk, a book, a conversation.
quotes.author: A. C. Benson

quotes.quote: As we live longer and healthier for longer, we need to keep ourselves busy the diary is pretty full.
quotes.author: Evelyn Glennie

quotes.quote: It's the good girls who keep diaries; the bad girls never have the time.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.quote: I never travel without my diary; one should always have something sensational to read in the train.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: She is so sure of getting her own way, she could even write her diary in advance.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The evolution of a new diary: double entry, single entry, blank.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Wars take longer nowadays because generals spend most of their time keeping diaries for future books.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Some people are such liars, they cannot even tell the truth in a diary.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: One always forgets the most important things, it's the things one can't remember that stay with you.
quotes.author: Alan Bennett

quotes.quote: Life is all memory, except for the one present moment that goes by you so quickly you hardly catch it going.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: I'm not good at future planning. I don't plan at all. I don't know what I'm doing tomorrow. I don't have a day planner and I don't have a diary. I completely live in the now, not in the past, not in the future.
quotes.author: Heath Ledger

quotes.quote: Writing in a diary is a really strange experience for someone like me. Not only because I've never written anything before, but also because it seems to me that later on neither I nor anyone else will be interested in the musings of a thirteen-year-old schoolgirl.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Paper has more patience than people.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Although diaries have often been dismissed as simplistic or artless of more 'highbrow' literary dgenres, in fact, dairies posses their own complexities.
quotes.author: Desirée Henderson

quotes.quote: Great. All I need is for some jerk to catch me carrying this book around and get the wrong idea.
quotes.author: Jeff Kinney

quotes.quote: A journal is a record of experiences and growth, not a preserve of things well done or said.
quotes.author: Desirée Henderson

quotes.quote: The charm of the journal must consist in a certain greeness, though fresh, and not in maturity.
quotes.author: Desirée Henderson

quotes.quote: Diaries are so multifaceted that every broad claim made about the genre within these pages should be understood to be provisional and will not apply to all diaries.
quotes.author: Desirée Henderson

quotes.quote: The diary is considered to be one of the the most significant literary expressions of this new, modern individual.
quotes.author: Desirée Henderson

quotes.quote: Diary is of a basically private nature and that it should not be published.
quotes.author: Bronislaw Malinowski

quotes.quote: For such a diary to have meaning and impact, literary skill may be less effective than vanity, and a kind of brutal frankness is essential.
quotes.author: Bronislaw Malinowski

quotes.quote: A diary is the ordinary sense can be a simple chronological record of day-to-day events.
quotes.author: Bronislaw Malinowski

quotes.quote: A diary is a book. You write down how you felt or what you thought about the things that happened.
quotes.author: Anita Ganeri

quotes.quote: People keep diaries to help them remember what happened.
quotes.author: Anita Ganeri

quotes.quote: The diary exists at the margin of literature, and most diarists would label themselves as authors.
quotes.author: Philippe Lejeune

quotes.quote: Although the diary is often taken to be a spontaneous expression of individuality, it is in fact a cultural practice that has a history.
quotes.author: Philippe Lejeune

quotes.quote: Diary writing is necessarily discontinuous, a matter of stringing together disconnected entries. nd yet they are related to each other by rhythms of repetition and variation that may not be obvious.
quotes.author: Philippe Lejeune

quotes.quote: The diary is a wager on the future. It bases the individual.. on ipseity, a sort of abstract commitment to remain faithful to oneself.
quotes.author: Philippe Lejeune

quotes.quote: Dairies are records of a life process rather than finished narratives about a life, and as such they are only part of the practice of narrating and understanding what a life means.
quotes.author: Philippe Lejeune

quotes.quote: Diaries remain a means of expressing oneself in writing, and its creation is based on the culture or the community at that historical moment.
quotes.author: Angela R. Hooks

quotes.quote: The diary has become a dialogue with history and that history has been reconstructed within the pages of the journal written.
quotes.author: Angela R. Hooks

quotes.quote: Whatever your life, it is urging you to record it--to embrace the crumbs with the cake. It's why so many of us want to write memoir.
quotes.author: Natalie Goldberg

quotes.quote: We have turned so fulllheartedly to the memoir form. We have an intuition that it can save us. Writing is the act of reaching across the abyss of isolation to share and reflect.
quotes.author: Natalie Goldberg

quotes.quote: Not only does God play dice, but... he sometimes throws them where they cannot be seen.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Life is fair. We all get the same nine-month shake in the box, and then the dice roll. Some people get a run of sevens. Some people, unfortunately, get snake-eyes. Its just how the world is.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: I see in the act of throwing the dice and of risking the affirmation of some intuitively felt truth, however uncertain, my whole reason for living.
quotes.author: Antonin Artaud

quotes.quote: And once, or twice, to throw the dice is a gentlemanly game, But he does not win who plays with Sin in the secret house of shame
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Not only does God play dice with the world, He does not let us see what He has rolled.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Lem

quotes.quote: Our life is like to dice, which ever fall In varying combinations; no one form Has man's existence, but 'tis full of change.
quotes.author: Stobaeus

quotes.quote: It's like gambling somehow. You go out for a night of drinking and you don't know where your going to end up the next day. It could work out good or it could be disastrous. It's like the throw of the dice.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: Plan strategically and strike it once to win. You can achieve maximum dues with minimum dice if only you are willing to clearly calculate and throw your efforts with optimism!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Appeal. In law, to put the dice into the box for another throw.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Fortune confounds the wise, And when they least expect it turns the dice.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: You can prepare all you want, but if you never roll the dice you'll never be successful.
quotes.author: Shia LaBeouf

quotes.quote: Maybe the thing to do after you roll the dice-and lose-is simply pick them up and roll them again.
quotes.author: Emily Giffin

quotes.quote: The life of man is like a game with dice; if you don't get the throw you want, you must show your skill in making the best of the throw you get.
quotes.author: Terence

quotes.quote: The loser, when a game of dice is done, remains behind reviewing every roll sadly, and sadly wiser, and alone.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: It is lost at dice, what ancient honor won.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: One who doesn't throw the dice can never expect to score a six.
quotes.author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quotes.quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone. You won't find glory at the center of safety, but at its edge. You won't find love at a place where you are covered, but in the space where you are exposed. You gotta take some risks. You have to not only pick up the dice, but roll'em. So go ahead, take the gamble. You have nothing to lose except the chance to win. Life is not long enough to spend it on the sidelines.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: Life is like the dice that, falling, still show a different face. So life, though it remains the same, is always presenting different aspects.
quotes.author: Alexis

quotes.quote: You can blow on the dice all you want, but whether they come up seven is still a function of random luck.
quotes.author: Barry Ritholtz

quotes.quote: If you roll dice, you know that the odds are one in six that the dice will come up on a particular side. So you can calculate the risk. But, in the stock market, such computations are bull - you don't even know how many sides the dice have!
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: The devotion of the greatest is to encounter risk and danger, and play dice for death.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The best throw of the dice is to throw them away.
quotes.author: English Proverbs

quotes.quote: The world is the house of the strong. I shall not know until the end what I have lost or won in this place, in this vast gambling den where I have spent more than sixty years, dicebox in hand, shaking the dice.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: Don't roll the dice if you can't pay the price.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: Reputations were made quickly over the green felt tables ― with the roll of the dice or a turn of a card.
quotes.author: Robert Ludlum

quotes.quote: In racing, I wanted to be a winner and to be a winner, you have to be willing to roll the dice.
quotes.author: Bobby Rahal

quotes.quote: Life is like a dice game; one roll could land you in jail, or cuttin' cake, blowin' kisses in the rice game.
quotes.author: Jay Electronica

quotes.quote: If God has made the world a perfect mechanism, He has at least conceded so much to our imperfect intellect that in order to predict little parts of it, we need not solve innumerable differential equations, but can use dice with fair success.
quotes.author: Max Born

quotes.quote: As the gambler said of his dice, to love and win is the best thing, to love and lose is the next best.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurs are risk takers, willing to roll the dice with their money or reputations on the line in support of an idea or enterprise.
quotes.author: Victoria Claflin Woodhull

quotes.quote: Give me today, for once, the worst throw of your dice, destiny. Today I transmute everything into gold.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Life's a gamble. Courage is to roll the dice and go for the gusto when all odds and bets are against you!
quotes.author: Bobby Compton

quotes.quote: Dictatorship naturally arises out of democracy, and the most aggravated form of tyranny and slavery out of the most extreme liberty.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The revolution is a dictatorship of the exploited against the exploiters.
quotes.author: Fidel Castro

quotes.quote: Dictators can fix up their entire families in good jobs, in or around government, and often do. In democracies, such a practice is frowned upon. Privileged access to the corridors of power through family connections and a kind of old boys' network, is also deemed an abuse of power, and so it is.
quotes.author: Jimmy Reid

quotes.quote: It is a paradox that every dictator has climbed to power on the ladder of free speech. Immediately on attaining power each dictator has suppressed all free speech except his own.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: The true essence of a dictatorship is in fact not its regularity but its unpredictability and caprice; those who live under it must never be able to relax, must never be quite sure if they have followed the rules correctly or not.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: The hearts of the people are good, but it's the hearts of the dictators that are small.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Open confession of dictatorship is far less dangerous than sham democracy. One can defend oneself against the former; the latter is like a creeper attached to the body of a drowning man.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Reich

quotes.quote: Dictators long ago found that it is easier to unite people in common hatred than in common love.
quotes.author: Dagobert D. Runes

quotes.quote: In every society some men are born to rule, and some to advise.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Any excuse will serve a tyrant.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: All dictators are hypnotized and they all crawl out of the same ditch.
quotes.author: Stephen Kyeyune

quotes.quote: Maintain democracy or go to dictatorship: that is what is at stake in these elections.
quotes.author: Mario Vargas Llosa

quotes.quote: The best weapon of a dictatorship is secrecy; the best weapon of a democracy is openness.
quotes.author: Edward Teller

quotes.quote: The only way out of international dictatorship is to place international law above governments, which means that there must be a parliament for making it, and that parliament must be constituted by means of worldwide elections in which all nations will take part.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Ours is a people's democratic dictatorship, led by the working class and based on the worker-peasant alliance.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Dictators never invent their own opportunities.
quotes.author: Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: When dictatorship is a fact, revolution becomes a right.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: A dictatorship would be a heck of a lot easier, there's no question about it.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: Dictatorships start wars because they need external enemies to exert internal control over their own people.
quotes.author: Richard Perle

quotes.quote: Dictators must have enemies. They must have internal enemies to justify their secret police and external enemies to justify their military forces.
quotes.author: Richard Perle

quotes.quote: Dictators are rulers who always look good until the last ten minutes.
quotes.author: Jan Masaryk

quotes.quote: They have been talking about a dictatorship and they were right because there's a dictatorship and there's a government that has been fighting that dictatorship, the dictatorship of the media.
quotes.author: Rafael Correa

quotes.quote: Most of the nations around the world are led by tyrants and dictators and thugs who are leading their countries for one reason.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: Every one of the world's dictatorships can and does claim to be acting in the name of the people.
quotes.author: Harold H. Greene

quotes.quote: A dictatorship is a country where they have taken the politics out of the politics.
quotes.author: Samuel Himmel

quotes.quote: Dictatorship is like a giant beech-tree very magnificent to look at in its prime, but nothing grows underneath it.
quotes.author: Stanley Baldwin

quotes.quote: Every dictatorship has ultimately strangled in the web of repression it wove for its people, making mistakes that could not be corrected because criticism was prohibited.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The essence of modern dictatorship is the combination of one-dimensional, flat thinking with power and terror.
quotes.author: Theodor Haecker

quotes.quote: Military dictatorship is born from the power of the gun, and so it undermines the concept of the rule of law and gives birth to a culture of might, a culture of weapons, violence and intolerance.
quotes.author: Benazir Bhutto

quotes.quote: Every despot must have one disloyal subject to keep him sane.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: All dictators are alike: they have control of everything - except their feelings.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Under dictatorship, the people in prison are always superior to the people who put them there.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The country that has only one man who can save it, is not worth saving.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: In a democracy, you believe it or not; in a dictatorship, you believe it or else.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Under a dictatorship the people have to follow their leader when they should be chasing him instead.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A smart dictator will look ahead and work out that he is better off liberalizing now than risk being, jailed, or killed later.
quotes.author: Bruce Bueno de Mesquita

quotes.quote: Once most revolutionaries come to power, their inclination if they can get away with it is to be petty dictators.
quotes.author: Bruce Bueno de Mesquita

quotes.quote: A prudent dictator nips rebellion in the bud.
quotes.author: Bruce Bueno de Mesquita

quotes.quote: Being a dictator can be a terrific job, but iit also can be terribly stressful, especially if money is in short supply.
quotes.author: Bruce Bueno de Mesquita

quotes.quote: Just as democrats have no need of being civic visionaries, dictators likewise aren't bound to make life miserable.
quotes.author: Bruce Bueno de Mesquita

quotes.quote: Economic progress is supposed to make dictatorship less necessary.
quotes.author: Stein Ringen

quotes.quote: All modern states, democratic or dictatorial, even the vilest communist and fascist ones, have prided themselves on delivering social protection to their populations.
quotes.author: Stein Ringen

quotes.quote: I believe in benevolent dictatorships, provided I am the dictator.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Television made dictatorship impossible, but democracy unbearable.
quotes.author: Shimon Peres

quotes.quote: One does not establish a dictatorship in order to safeguard a revolution; one makes the revolution in order to establish the dictatorship.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Ignorance is an evil weed, which dictators may cultivate among their dupes, but which no democracy can afford among its citizens.
quotes.author: William Beveridge

quotes.quote: Democracy consists of choosing your dictators, after they've told you what you think it is you want to hear.
quotes.author: Alan Coren

quotes.quote: The liberty of the individual is a necessary postulate of human progress.
quotes.author: Ernest Renan

quotes.quote: Even tyrants and dictators make a point of being fond of children. But the affection and care for the old, the incurable, the helpless are the true gold mines of a culture.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: A balanced diet is a cookie in each hand.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: A diet should be named after what you do eat, not what you don't eat.
quotes.author: Robert Atkins

quotes.quote: The second day of a diet is always easier than the first. By the second day you're off it.
quotes.author: Jackie Gleason

quotes.quote: Dieting is the only game where you win when you lose!
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: The best diet is the one that you don't know you are on.
quotes.author: Chris Powell

quotes.quote: At the end of every diet, the path curves back to the trough.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: The first thing you lose on a diet is brain mass.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: Probably nothing in the world arouses more false hopes than the first four hours of a diet.
quotes.author: Dan Bennett

quotes.quote: The vegan diet is obviously lacking whatever essential nutrient it is that makes people likeable.
quotes.author: Jim Goad

quotes.quote: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.
quotes.author: Bethenny Frankel

quotes.quote: The resolve to diet is most easily summoned on a full stomach.
quotes.author: Terry Rossio

quotes.quote: Dieting is our last tie with asceticism.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Diets are for those who are thick and tired of it.
quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.quote: Dieting fooled you into thinking you could control your life.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Eugenides

quotes.quote: The only time to eat diet food is while you're waiting for the steak to cook.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: Diets are essentially training courses in how to feel fat and feel like a failure.
quotes.author: Paul McKenna

quotes.quote: A diet is when you watch what you eat and wish you could eat what you watch.
quotes.author: Hermione Gingold

quotes.quote: The people who are scared of going on a diet are the people who could benefit the most from one.
quotes.author: Robert Cheeke

quotes.quote: It's one thing to lose weight, but it's another thing to eat healthy.
quotes.author: Jennifer Hudson

quotes.quote: Start your diet during a period of optimism and happiness.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Diet is the essential key to all successful healing. Without a proper balanced diet, the effectiveness of herbal treatment is very limited.
quotes.author: Michael Tierra

quotes.quote: Diet food is for lazy people.
quotes.author: Ice T

quotes.quote: Sometimes you need to go on a low-information diet.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: Diets are a temporary solution to a permanent problem.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: The most ethical diet just so happens to be the most environmentally sound diet and just so happens to be the healthiest.
quotes.author: Michael Greger

quotes.quote: A man is known by the company he keeps.
quotes.author: M. Coverdale

quotes.quote: Ain't no pot so crooked, you can't find a lid to fit.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: All cats are grey in the dark.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Different strokes for different folks.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: Each bay, its own wind.
quotes.author: Fijian (on differences)

quotes.quote: Each person has his strong point.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Even a sheet of paper has two sides.
quotes.author: Japanese (on differences)

quotes.quote: Even children of the same mother, look different.
quotes.author: Korean (on differences)

quotes.quote: Every burro has his own saddle.
quotes.author: Equadoran

quotes.quote: Every head is a world.
quotes.author: Cuban (on differences)

quotes.quote: Every herring must hang by his own gill.
quotes.author: S. Harwood

quotes.quote: Every land has its own law.
quotes.author: J. Carmichael

quotes.quote: Every man for himself.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Like breeds like.
quotes.author: R. Edgeworth

quotes.quote: No one is easy to live with all of the time.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One person can burn water, while another can't even burn oil.
quotes.author: Kashmiri (on differences)

quotes.quote: Sun is good for cucumbers, rain for rice.
quotes.author: Vietnamese (on appropriateness)

quotes.quote: The lion believes that everyone shares his state of mind.
quotes.author: Mexican (on differences)

quotes.quote: Variety is the spice of life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you can do the common things in life in an uncommon way, you will command the attention of the world.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: You can't tell a book by its cover.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: It is not our differences that divide us. It is our inability to recognize, accept, and celebrate those differences.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: We focus so much on our differences, and that is creating, I think, a lot of chaos and negativity and bullying in the world. And I think if everybody focused on what we all have in common - which is - we all want to be happy.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: If we cannot now end our differences, at least we can help make the world safe for diversity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: All differences in this world are of degree, and not of kind, because oneness is the secret of everything.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Our differences are policies; our agreements, principles.
quotes.author: William McKinley

quotes.quote: Differences challenge assumptions.
quotes.author: Anne Wilson Schaef

quotes.quote: I refuse to allow any man-made differences to separate me from any other human beings.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: We are enriched by our reciprocate differences.
quotes.author: Paul Valery

quotes.quote: Being different is ... interesting; there's nothing implicitly inferior or superior about it. Great difference, of course, produces natural caution; and if the differences are too extreme ... well, then, reality tends to fade away.
quotes.author: Edward Albee

quotes.quote: You don't get harmony when everybody sings the same note.
quotes.author: Doug Floyd

quotes.quote: It seemed ... such nonsense -- inventing differences, when people, heaven knows, were different enough without that.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: If you hate difference, you'll be bored to death.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: To think is to differ.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: But every little difference may become a big one if it is insisted on.
quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.quote: Differences don't just threaten and divide us. They also inform, enrich, and enliven us.
quotes.author: Harriet Lerner

quotes.quote: Honest differences are often a healthy sign of progress.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: We are all different, which is great because we are all unique. Without diversity life would be very boring.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: We have become not a melting pot but a beautiful mosaic. Different people, different beliefs, different yearnings, different hopes, different dreams.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: Diversity is not about how we differ. Diversity is about embracing one another's uniqueness.
quotes.author: Ola Joseph

quotes.quote: As long as the differences and diversities of mankind exist, democracy must allow for compromise, for accommodation, and for the recognition of differences.
quotes.author: Eugene McCarthy

quotes.quote: We may have different religions, different languages, different colored skin, but we all belong to one human race.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: Differences are not intended to separate, to alienate. We are different precisely in order to relaize our need of one another.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: A fruit salad is delicious precisely because each fruit maintains its own flavor.
quotes.author: Sean Covey

quotes.quote: No two persons can learn something and experience it in the same way.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Differences were meant by God not to divide but to enrich.
quotes.author: J.H. Oldham

quotes.quote: The fact that we're all different is the one thing we all have in common.
quotes.author: Justin Young

quotes.quote: You're different. And I'm different too. Different is good. But different is hard. Believe me, I know.
quotes.author: Matthew Quick

quotes.quote: Our greatest strength as a human race is our ability to acknowledge our differences, our greatest weakness is our failure to embrace them.
quotes.author: Judith Henderson

quotes.quote: There's always a b side in every story.
quotes.author: Devin Christianto

quotes.quote: I learned very early the difference between knowing the name of something and knowing something.
quotes.author: Richard Feynmann

quotes.quote: The difference between genius and stupidity is that genius has its limits.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Every difference of opinion is not a difference of principle—error of opinion may be tolerated where reason is left free to combat it.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: In every country where man is free to think & to speak, differences of opinion will arise from difference of perception, & the imperfection of reason.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Even if we differ in principle more than I believe we do, you and I know too well the texture of the human mind, and the slipperiness of human reason, to consider differences of opinion otherwise than differences of form or feature.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: You've got to love what's loveable, and hate what's hateable. It takes brains to see the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Between the act and the deed lies a world of difference.
quotes.author: Fred Clark (A Place in the Sun)

quotes.quote: People do have reasonable differences. Human ignorance, pride, and selfishness would always be with us, prompting inevitable divisions and conflicting ambitions.
quotes.author: Albert Gore

quotes.quote: In the realm of the spirit, all worldly differences, talents, and bank accounts will have no purchase.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Everyone's an athlete. The only difference is that some of us are in training, and some are not.
quotes.author: George Sheehan

quotes.quote: Training is different from just plain running. It's the difference between tossing the football around every other day and trying out for the team.
quotes.author: Marc Bloom

quotes.quote: Aside from all the differences that separate us, the magic we share will be the same.
quotes.author: Grete Waitz and Gloria Averbuch

quotes.quote: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: There is little difference in people, but that little difference makes the big difference. That little difference is attitude. The big difference is whether it is positive or negative.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: My neighbor thinks me a fool, / 'The same to yourself,' say I; / 'Why take your books and take your prayers, / Give me the open sky;' / My neighbor thinks me a fool, / 'The same to yourself,' say I.
quotes.author: Paul Laurence Dunbar

quotes.quote: Sometimes, I make myself the worry / I talk to myself / Again and again / About the consequences of differences / Between you and me, because, / You are like a fresh flower / And I am like a dry leaf.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: The differences in life —live within the questions you've asked.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: Looking beyond our differences, / the transformation deepened / Speaking without words, / the conversation spiked / Touching without holding on, / all feelings turned to ecstasy / Loving while letting go / —the caterpillar's delight.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: A world where we can no longer point out the differences between you and me, / it's a world of equality.
quotes.author: Leeza Y.

quotes.quote: I believe that we are here for each other, not against each other. Everything comes from an understanding that you are a gift in my life - whoever you are, whatever our differences.
quotes.author: John Denver

quotes.quote: Strength lies in differences, not in similarities.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: I know there is strength in the differences between us. I know there is comfort where we overlap.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: Embrace your differences and the qualities about you that you think is weird. Eventually, they're going to be the only things separating you from everyone else.
quotes.author: Sebastian Stan

quotes.quote: We come in many different shapes and sizes, and we need to support each other and our differences. Our beauty is in our differences.
quotes.author: Carrre Otis

quotes.quote: People are pretty much alike. It's only that our differences are more susceptible to definition than our similarities.
quotes.author: Linda Ellerbee

quotes.quote: You know, we have our differences, everybody does, honest, real differences, but I do believe strongly that we as neighbors are drawn together far more than we're driven apart.
quotes.author: Dan Miller

quotes.quote: We must not, in trying to think about how we can make a big difference, ignore the small daily differences we can make which, over time, add up to big differences that we often cannot foresee.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.quote: We go on and on about our differences. But, you know, our differences are less important than our similarities. People have a lot in common with one another, whether they see that or not.
quotes.author: William Hall

quotes.quote: I've found that small wins, small projects, small differences often make huge differences.
quotes.author: Rosabeth Moss Kanter

quotes.quote: Too many of us still believe our differences define us.
quotes.author: John Lewis

quotes.quote: The path to our destination is not always a straight one. We go down the wrong road, we get lost, we turn back. Maybe it doesn't matter which road we embark on. Maybe what matters is that we embark.
quotes.author: Barbara Hall

quotes.quote: Sometimes you climb the mountain, and you fall and fail. Maybe there is a different path that will take you up. Sometimes a different mountain.
quotes.author: Caterina Fake

quotes.quote: We all have friends and family who see one path for us, and we go a different path, and it's not necessarily what they would have wanted.
quotes.author: Colin Donnell

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to tread the path alone. Know which is your path and follow it wherever it may lead you; do not feel you have to follow in someone else's footsteps.
quotes.author: Eileen Caddy

quotes.quote: The world's a forest, in which all lose their way; though by a different path each goes astray.
quotes.author: George Villiers

quotes.quote: Just because my path is different doesn’t mean I’m lost.
quotes.author: Gerard Abrams

quotes.quote: If the path before you is clear, you're probably on someone else's.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: In a forest of a hundred thousand trees, no two leaves are alike. And no two journeys along the same path are alike.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The path of least resistance is the path of the loser.
quotes.author: H.G. Wells

quotes.quote: If you’re not excited about it, it’s not the right path
quotes.author: Abraham Hicks

quotes.quote: Everything you want to be, you already are. You're simply on the path to discovering it.
quotes.author: Alicia Keys

quotes.quote: Choose your own path, not the one others may want you to.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Just because someone stumbles and loses their path, doesn't mean they're lost forever.
quotes.author: Charles Xavier

quotes.quote: Happiness, success, excellence: They are not something you get for knowing the path; they are something you experience by walking it.
quotes.author: Dr. Steve Mataboli

quotes.quote: If you find a path with no obstacles, it probably doesn't lead anywhere.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: Does the walker choose the path, or the path the walker?
quotes.author: Garth Nix

quotes.quote: There are no wrong turnings. Only paths we had not known we were meant to walk.
quotes.author: Guy Gavriel Kay

quotes.quote: Pursue some path, however narrow and crooked, in which you can walk with love and reverence.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: To learn something new, take the path that you took yesterday.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: When you find your path, you must ignore fear. You need to have the courage to risk mistakes. But once you are on that road... run, run, run, and don't stop til you've reached its end.
quotes.author: Jose N. Harris

quotes.quote: Follow your own path, no matter what people say.
quotes.author: Karl Max

quotes.quote: Water is the most perfect traveller because when it travels it becomes the path itself!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Sometimes we can choose the paths we follow. Sometimes our choices are made for us. And sometimes we have no choice at all.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Sometimes the right path is not the easiest one.
quotes.author: Pocahontas

quotes.quote: Don’t compare your path with anybody else’s. Your path is unique to you.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Surrender to your path, forget about time or speed, and most importantly walk in joy.
quotes.author: Roxana Jones

quotes.quote: If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading.
quotes.author: Siddhartha Gautama

quotes.quote: Take the path where no one else dares to.
quotes.author: Tina Panossian

quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. Watch your step.
quotes.author: Thomas S Monson

quotes.quote: We keep moving forward, opening up new doors and doing new things, because we're curious... and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: How others treat me is their path; how I react is mine.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: You have to do what is right for you. No one walks in your shoes.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There is no path to Happiness. Happiness is the path. There is no path to Love. Love is the path. There is no path to Peace. Peace is the path.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: There are plenty of difficult obstacles in your path. Don't allow yourself to become one of them.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Build a better mousetrap and the world will beat a path to your door.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: On this path let the heart be your guide.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The obstacle in the path becomes the path. Never forget, within every obstacle is an opportunity to improve our condition.
quotes.author: Ryan Holiday

quotes.quote: Each relationship nurtures a strength or weakness within you.
quotes.author: Mike Murdock

quotes.quote: Being alone is scary, but not as scary as feeling alone in a relationship.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Ask anyone who has been in a love relationship for a while: nothing is perfect.
quotes.author: Tracy McMillan

quotes.quote: Nothing is perfect. Life is messy. Relationships are complex. Outcomes are uncertain. People are irrational.
quotes.author: Pietro Aretino

quotes.quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it is letting go.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: A real relationship is like a river; the deeper it gets the less noise it makes.
quotes.author: Tony Gaskins

quotes.quote: You don't develop courage by being happy in your relationships everyday. You develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: Looking back and wondering if it could have worked eventually hurts more than trying and failing.
quotes.author: Dominic Riccitello

quotes.quote: Some birds are not meant to be caged, that's all. Their feathers are too bright, their songs too sweet and wild. So you let them go, or when you open the cage to feed them they somehow fly out past you. And the part of you that knows it was wrong to imprison them in the first place rejoices, but still, the place where you live is that much more drab and empty for their departure.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Either, you are in love with someone or you're not. Fear is complicated, not love.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: It is very difficult to live among people you love and hold back from offering them advice.
quotes.author: Anne Tyler

quotes.quote: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: What you perceive as a failure today may actually be a crucial step towards the success you seek. Never give up
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: A relationship with lots of pain, it's not a relationship that will last long.
quotes.author: Jang In-hwan

quotes.quote: Assumptions are the termites of relationships.
quotes.author: Henry Winkler

quotes.quote: Relationship is an art. The dream that two people create is more difficult to master than one.
quotes.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.quote: Anyone who reads my work will see that there are often difficult relationships between fathers and sons.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: When you struggle with your partner, you are struggling with yourself. Every fault you see in them touches a denied weakness in yourself.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: It's always difficult to really sum up exactly why a relationship works.
quotes.author: Charlie Hunnam

quotes.quote: Difficult relationships come into our lives for a reason. No one would choose them, certainly. But if we let them, they can teach us how to be flexible with others and more forgiving.
quotes.author: Joan Bauer

quotes.quote: All conflict can be traced back to someone's feelings getting hurt, don't you think?
quotes.author: Liane Moriarty

quotes.quote: Whenever you're in conflict with someone, there is one factor that can make the difference between damaging your relationship and deepening it. That factor is attitude.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: The most functional way to regulate difficult emotions in love relationships is to share them.
quotes.author: Sue Johnson

quotes.quote: Courage means to keep working a relationship, to continue seeking solutions to difficult problems, and to stay focused during stressful periods.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: If you can't be happy and content by yourself then you shouldn't be in a relationship.
quotes.author: Evan Sutter

quotes.quote: Every relationship is different. Everyone loves differently.
quotes.author: Richelle Mead

quotes.quote: It will be a difficult couple of days. It's difficult now and it will be difficult tomorrow.
quotes.author: Gary Neville

quotes.quote: Never marry at all, Dorian. Men marry because they are tired, women, because they are curious: both are disappointed.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: When you have an author and an auteur, it's a difficult and challenging relationship.
quotes.author: Sam Taylor-Johnson

quotes.quote: Be honest, brutally honest. That is what's going to maintain relationships.
quotes.author: Lauryn Hill

quotes.quote: A life with difficult relationships, filled with obstacles and losses, presents the most opportunity for the soul's growth.
quotes.author: Brian Weiss

quotes.quote: Pain will leave you, when you let go.
quotes.author: Jeremy Aldana

quotes.quote: There are times when two people need to step apart from one another, but there is no rule that says they have to turn and fire.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: It's hard to communicate anything exactly and that's why perfect relationships between people are difficult to find.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: Strong relationships withstand the tests of time and brave the hardships encountered as though they are the necessities for survival.
quotes.author: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.quote: Single and in a relationship are just titles. Your heart determines your true relationship status.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sorrow comes in great wavesâ€¦but rolls over us, and though it may almost smother us, it leaves us. And we know that if it is strong, we are stronger, inasmuch as it passes and we remain.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: Without communication there is no relationship. Without respect there is no love. Without trust there is no reason to continue.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: With relationship comes access, and with intimacy comes influence.
quotes.author: Tommy Tenney

quotes.quote: Marriage is an extremely difficult relationship.
quotes.author: Lee Radziwil

quotes.quote: When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history, but not a part of your destiny.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Couples need to rebuild their relationship. Retired men still tend to act like the lord and master.
quotes.author: Sayoko Nishida

quotes.quote: There are so many different kinds of relationships, so it's sort of difficult to define what is considered normal.
quotes.author: Annette Bening

quotes.quote: A relationship with secrets can never work.
quotes.author: Jerrry Siegel

quotes.quote: I have to warn you about tonight's show. Tonight's show will fix your relationship or destroy it. And either way, you're welcome.
quotes.author: Christopher Titus

quotes.quote: Relationships are built on trust, Hope. And I want our relationship to have a strong foundation.
quotes.author: Chris McKenna

quotes.quote: I don't think I've ever felt this good about the end of a relationship.
quotes.author: Gene Rodenberry

quotes.quote: I pushed James away because if he found out about us working together, it would destroy our relationship.
quotes.author: Jerry Siegel

quotes.quote: A wise man once said "Relationships based on intense experiences never work.
quotes.author: Jerry Siegel

quotes.quote: You take someone to the airport, it's clearly the beginning of the relationship. That's why I have never taken anyone to the airport at the beginning of a relationship.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: You kept your relationship a secret and neither of you are willing to make a real commitment
quotes.author: David Baldacci

quotes.quote: The truth is, neither one of us has the slightest idea where this relationship is going. We can't predict the future.
quotes.author: Wes Anderson

quotes.quote: Would you now? Is this what our relationship will be like, you ordering me around?
quotes.author: Kelly Marcel

quotes.quote: We promised to keep it casual / But at times it can be so difficult / This relationship, so untypical / And I can't understand / Tell me why, tell me why
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: First you love ma and then you leave me / And then I'm falling back in your arms / There's no conclusion, it's so deceiving / Cause I get taken in by your charms / Even though I try not to bend
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: Goes through a couple of these relationships / and still stays strong / Too young and dumb to call it quits / Its still a love song
quotes.author: Stephen Schwartz

quotes.quote: Now a relationship is something we won't ever have / Why do I feel like I lost something that I never had / You should have been there when I graduated / Told me you love me and congratulations / Instead you left us at the window waiting
quotes.author: Nathan Feuerstein

quotes.quote: The single most potent perpetrator of depression is a stable bad relationship.
quotes.author: Jon G. Allen

quotes.quote: One good relationship can mitigate the effect of other bad relationships.
quotes.author: Leonora M. Cohen

quotes.quote: There is a real need for interpersonal skills to understand and resolve the differences between partners
quotes.author: Michael Crowe

quotes.quote: No relationship is totally without conflict.
quotes.author: H. Norman DMin Wright

quotes.quote: In healthy relationships, the partners are determined to resolve conflicts.
quotes.author: H. Norman DMin Wright

quotes.quote: Unhealthy relationships often develop into love-hate relationships.
quotes.author: H. Norman DMin Wright

quotes.quote: Some relationships just move from one unresolved conflict to another.
quotes.author: H. Norman DMin Wright

quotes.quote: We all have been in a bad relationship, the type of relationship that leaves is saying that we have had all we can stand and that we are done with being in the situation we are in.
quotes.author: Decarlos Stewart

quotes.quote: Making those simple but powerful acts of love a priority in you relationships, and you'll be writing a happy ending to your own love stories.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: One of the biggest emergencies in our modern relationship crisis is a widespread disregard for the law of love.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: Many people treat their relationships like possessions that can be upgraded or traded in for newer models.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: Our modern culture has grown more impatient, and impatience is a massive barrier to commitment
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: The collective lack of commitment stems from a sense of entitlement for 'On Demand' intimacy.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: You do not get into a relationship just because you are in need of love.
quotes.author: Bimbo Odukoya

quotes.quote: You get into a relationship because you are whole and fulfilled, and out of the abundance of love in you heart, you want to give it to someone else.
quotes.author: Bimbo Odukoya

quotes.quote: The point is not being in a relationship; it is about you being in the right relationship.
quotes.author: Bimbo Odukoya

quotes.quote: Love? It's kind of complicated, but I'll tell you this.. the second you're willing to make yourself miserable to make someone else happy, that's love.
quotes.author: Perry Ritthaler

quotes.quote: Never make a person fall for you when you have no intention of catching them.
quotes.author: Perry Ritthaler

quotes.quote: It's easy to fall in love. The hard part is finding someone to catch you.
quotes.author: Perry Ritthaler

quotes.quote: To fall in love is awfully simple, but to fall out of love is simply awful.
quotes.author: Perry Ritthaler

quotes.quote: Love is 3/4 dream and 1/4 reality. Problems arise when you fall in love with the dream and not the reality. True love happens when you in love with both.
quotes.author: Perry Ritthaler

quotes.quote: Without love in a relationship there is no momentum and without momentum there's no belief, and without belief there is no progress, and without progress there's no success.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: An adult-like commitment carries more significance than a childlike commitment.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: If there's no commitment between two people whether in thought, word or action love's forced to sit on the fence.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Everyone wants to be appreciated, accepted and affirmed.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Humility in action puts the relationship on a higher level.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Sometimes we run from a situation or relationship that awakens fear within us.
quotes.author: Kasi Kaye Iliopoulos

quotes.quote: Consider that great love relationships and life are risky: if you lose, cherish the lesson anyway.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Do not let a small disagreement ruin a great relationship.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: When you disagree with the ones you love, stick to the current issue. Don't bring back old arguments.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Remember that the best relationship is that in which mutual love is bigger than mutual necessity
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Difficulty creates the opportunity for self-reflection and compassion.
quotes.author: Suzanolori Parks

quotes.quote: Every difficulty slurred over will be a ghost to disturb your repose later on.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Every great and deep difficulty bears in itself its own solution. It forces us to change our thinking in order to find it.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: The difficulty we have in accepting responsibility for our behavior lies in the desire to avoid the pain of the consequences of that behavior.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: Surmounting difficulty is the crucible that forms character.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Difficulty is the nurse of greatness.
quotes.author: William C. Bryant

quotes.quote: A difficulty is a light. An insurmountable difficulty is a sun.
quotes.author: Paul Valery

quotes.quote: Every difficulty draws us toward a higher power than ourselves.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The difficulty lies not so much in developing new ideas as in escaping from old ones.
quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.quote: The greatest difficulty with the world is not its ability to produce, but the unwillingness to share.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.quote: The greatest difficulty always comes right before the birth of a dream.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Difficulty is what wakes up the genius.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Difficulty comes not only because of your mistakes, but once you try to make an excuse or accuse someone else, your mind stops thinking.
quotes.author: Masayoshi Son

quotes.quote: The difficulty with any sort of esteem is that more is expected of you.
quotes.author: Judi Dench

quotes.quote: Have the courage to face a difficulty lest it kick you harder than you bargain for.
quotes.author: Stanisław I Leszczyński

quotes.quote: Difficulty is one of the prices that we pay for our blessings.
quotes.author: Sterling W Sill

quotes.quote: Life must pass through difficulty in order to achieve any modicum of beauty.
quotes.author: Colum Mccann

quotes.quote: The difficulty for most of us in the modern world is that the old-fashioned idea of God has become incredible or implausible.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: The difficulty is not so great to die for a friend, as to find a friend worth dying for.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: The apprenticeship of difficulty is one which the greatest of men have had to serve.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: The difficulty is not making a decision, it's living with the consequences.
quotes.author: Micah Baldwin

quotes.quote: Difficulty shows what men are.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Difficulty is the excuse history never accepts.
quotes.author: Edward R. Murrow

quotes.quote: When you are face to face with a difficulty, you are up against a discovery.
quotes.author: Lord Kelvin

quotes.quote: Every difficulty requires new strategy to overcome it.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Difficulty is inevitable. Drama is a choice.
quotes.author: Anita Renfroe

quotes.quote: Divide each difficulty into as many parts as is feasible and necessary to resolve it.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: The greater the difficulty, the more the glory in surmounting it.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: Difficulty attracts the man of character because it is in embracing it that he realizes himself.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: The best way out of a difficulty is through it.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Facing a difficulty requires a willingness of heart.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: There is no difficulty that enough love will not conquer.
quotes.author: Emmet Fox

quotes.quote: You gain strength with every difficulty, which you boldly overcome.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Difficulty is our most reliable narrative engine.
quotes.author: Leslie Jamison

quotes.quote: The difficulty is to try and teach the multitude that something can be true and untrue at the same time.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: The difficulty is that we try to perfect others before we perfect ourselves.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: It is only when a person gets into difficulty that one can truly see his heart.
quotes.author: Matthew Polly

quotes.quote: You have to push through every difficulty to achieve the goal.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: People seem to sometimes have a difficulty drawing that line between the character and the person.
quotes.author: Clark Duke

quotes.quote: The difficulty is not to write, but to write what you mean.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: It is not the path which is the difficulty; rather, it is the difficulty which is the path.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: The real difficulty is to overcome how you think about yourself. If we don't have that we never grow, we never learn, and sure as hell we should never teach.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Almost any difficulty will move in the face of honesty. When I am honest I never feel stupid. And when I am honest I am automatically humble.
quotes.author: Hugh Prather

quotes.quote: A difficulty journey is more revealing of character than any discussion or analysis.
quotes.author: Michael Treanor

quotes.quote: Every difficulty is an opportunity for personal growth.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Conquering any difficulty always gives one a secret joy, for it means pushing back a boundary-line and adding to one's liberty.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Where there is no difficulty there is no praise.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The difficulty is to know conscience from self-interest.
quotes.author: William Dean Howells

quotes.quote: If most people are not willing to see the difficulty, this is mainly because, consciously or unconsciously, they assume that it will be they who will settle these questions for the others, and because they are convinced of their own capacity to do this.
quotes.author: Friedrich August von Hayek

quotes.quote: There is dignity in your being even if there's indignity in what you're doing.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: Dignity is the reward of obeying your heart.
quotes.author: Wes Fesler

quotes.quote: Overcoming poverty is not a gesture of charity. It is an act of justice. It is the protection of a fundamental human right, the right to dignity and a decent life.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The friendships which last are those wherein each friend respects the other's dignity to the point of not really wanting anything from him.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: The dignity of truth is lost with much protesting.
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: I believe in the dignity of labor, whether with head or hand; that the world owes no man a living but that it owes every man an opportunity to make a living.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: The dignity of the individual demands that he be not reduced to vassalage by the largesse of others.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Humility is the ability to give up your pride and still retain your dignity.
quotes.author: Vanna Bonta

quotes.quote: Dignity of human nature requires that we must face the storms of life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: What should move us to action is human dignity: the inalienable dignity of the oppressed, but also the dignity of each of us. We lose dignity if we tolerate the intolerable.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Our dignity is not in what we do, but what we understand.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Human rights rest on human dignity. The dignity of man is an ideal worth fighting for and worth dying for.
quotes.author: Robert Maynard

quotes.quote: Dignities are like faces; no two are the same.
quotes.author: Rex Stout

quotes.quote: Dignity is not negotiable. Dignity is the honor of the family.
quotes.author: Vartan Gregorian

quotes.quote: Without dignity, identity is erased. In its absence, men are defined not by themselves, but by their captors and the circumstances in which they are forced to live.
quotes.author: Laura Hillenbrand

quotes.quote: We must build a new world, a far better world one in which the eternal dignity of man is respected.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: Human dignity is better served by embracing knowledge.
quotes.author: John Charles Polanyi

quotes.quote: Be strong. Live honorably and with dignity. When you don't think you can, hold on.
quotes.author: James J. Frey

quotes.quote: Dignity is as essential to human life as water, food, and oxygen. The stubborn retention of it, even in the face of extreme physical hardship, can hold a man's soul in his body long past the point at which the body should have surrendered it.
quotes.author: Laura Hillenbrand

quotes.quote: There is a lot of dignity in having the ability to confront the inconsequence of reality.
quotes.author: Martin Esslin

quotes.quote: There is a healthful hardiness about real dignity that never dreads contact and communion with others however humble.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Dignity and pride are not only two different feelings, but, in some ways, opposites. You can step on your pride to preserve your dignity. You can destroy your dignity because of your pride.
quotes.author: Luigina Sgarro

quotes.quote: Self-respect is the fruit of discipline; the sense of dignity grows with the ability to say no to oneself.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: Dignity has no price, when someone starts making small concessions, in the end, life loses all meaning.
quotes.author: Jose Saramago

quotes.quote: When an individual is protesting society's refusal to acknowledge his dignity as a human being, his very act of protest confers dignity on him.
quotes.author: Bayard Rustin

quotes.quote: Each of us, face to face with other men, is clothed with some sort of dignity, but we know only too well all the unspeakable things that go on in the heart.
quotes.author: Luigi Pirandello

quotes.quote: When we make mistakes, we simply say sorry. And saying the words would cost us our pride most of the time.
quotes.author: RSCruz

quotes.quote: Dignity is like a perfume; those who use it are scarcely conscious of it.
quotes.author: Christina of Sweden

quotes.quote: Dignity will only happen when you realize that having someone in your life doesn't validate your worth.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: There's a dignity in consequences.
quotes.author: James S.A. Corey

quotes.quote: Losing your honor in a person's eye is tantamount losing it for entire humanity.
quotes.author: Anum Sattar
