quotes.quote: Dignity is never silent. It has a voice, heart and soul. Truth and courage is its foundation. It will stand against the masses and speak the truth. Because every great person has always done what others found fear in doing.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Dignity is as essential to human life as water, food, and oxygen.
quotes.author: Laura Hillenbrand

quotes.quote: Love is proved the moment you let go of someone because they need you to.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Dignity does not consist in possessing honors, but in the consciousness that we deserve them.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Personal dignity is to be measured with the yardstick of one's conscience, not with that of other people's judgement.
quotes.author: Fausto Cercignani

quotes.quote: ignity is the only one thing I have chosen over rules and benefits of slavery. I am not perfect because I chose to be myself; a human and this is the simplest form of dignity.
quotes.author: Rola Mahmoud

quotes.quote: True dignity is never gained by place, and never lost when honors are withdrawn.
quotes.author: Philip Massinger

quotes.quote: Dignity is an affectation, cute but eccentric, like learning french or collecting scarves.
quotes.author: Dave Eggers

quotes.quote: One's dignity may be assaulted, vandalized and cruelly mocked, but cannot be taken away unless it is surrendered.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: The only kind of dignity which is genuine is that which is not diminished by the indifference of others.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: Human dignity is the same for all human beings: when I trample on the dignity of another, I am trampling on my own.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Dignity is to have a dream, a strong one, which gives you a vision, a world where you have a place, where whatever it is you have to contribute makes a difference.
quotes.author: Fatema Mernissi

quotes.quote: A wise man has dignity without pride; a fool has pride without dignity.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: To possess dignity is to be worthy of respect. Worthy of high esteem. Absorb this: you are worthy of respect.
quotes.author: Beth Moore

quotes.quote: Humor is an affirmation of dignity, a declaration of man's superiority to all that befalls him.
quotes.author: Romain Gary

quotes.quote: The dignity of labor depends not on what you do, but how you do it.
quotes.author: Edwin Osgood Grover

quotes.quote: Dignity is often a veil between us and the real truth of things.
quotes.author: Edwin Percy Whipple

quotes.quote: Dignity is a mask we wear to hide our ignorance.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: It is impossible to make your own luck without the ingredient of hard work.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: What we hope ever to do with ease, we must learn first to do with diligence.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Hard work is rewarding. Taking credit for other people's hard work is rewarding and faster.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Hard work pays off - hard work beats talent any day, but if you're talented and work hard, it's hard to be beat.
quotes.author: Robert Griffin III

quotes.quote: For dreams to come true, it requires diligence. Believing is the most important thing!
quotes.author: Yunho

quotes.quote: Diligence overcomes difficulties; sloth makes them.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A diligent effort was made to eliminate matters that did not have evidentiary value.
quotes.author: Canady

quotes.quote: Busy hands achieve more than idle tongues.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success.
quotes.author: Virat Kohli

quotes.quote: Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: Leisure is time for doing something useful; this leisure the diligent man will obtain, but the lazy man never.
quotes.author: Franklin

quotes.quote: Ordinary people who faithfully, diligently, and consistently do simple things that are right before God will bring forth extraordinary results.
quotes.author: David A. Bednar

quotes.quote: The reward of a work is to have produced it; the reward of effort is to have grown by it.
quotes.author: Antonin Sertillanges

quotes.quote: For every great success, diligence is desirable from the beginning to the very end.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: To be diligent means to be serious and devoted to the work of God.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: You can do as much diligence as possible before you go somewhere to try to protect yourself and the people around you.
quotes.author: Jeremy Scahill

quotes.quote: Diligence which, as it avails in all things, is also of the utmost moment in pleading causes. Diligence is to be particularly cultivated by us; it is to be constantly exerted; it is capable of effecting almost everything.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Focused, hard work is the real key to success. Keep your eyes on the goal, and just keep taking the next step towards completing it. If you aren't sure which way to do something, do it both ways and see which works better.
quotes.author: John Carmack

quotes.quote: Diligence in employments of less consequence is the most successful introduction to greater enterprises.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Few things are impossible to diligence and skill.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and diligence.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: If you work hard, make good choices and excellent decisions, and do what you can do best, you are likely to be rewarded with a lucky future.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: The expectations of life depend upon diligence; the mechanic that would perfect his work must first sharpen his tools.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Work hard,and you will earn good rewards.Work smart,and you will earn great rewards.Work hard and work smart,and you will earn extraordinary rewards.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Prefer diligence before idleness, unless you esteem rust above brightness.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Focus means being diligent. Diligence always leads to wealth.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: If hard work were such a wonderful thing, surely the rich would have kept it all to themselves.
quotes.author: Lane Kirkland

quotes.quote: Diligence, hard work, perseverance, excellence are the values that cause things to happen.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: With diligence it is possible to make anything run slowly.
quotes.author: Tom Duff

quotes.quote: There is simply no substitute for hard work when it comes to achieving success.
quotes.author: Heather Bresch

quotes.quote: Due diligence is still under way there, so we're not prepared to comment on that.
quotes.author: Gettelfinger

quotes.quote: Being forced to work, and forced to do your best, will breed in you temperance and self-control, diligence and strength of will, cheerfulness and content, and a hundred virtues which the idle will never know.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams.
quotes.author: Ben Carson

quotes.quote: Diligence is a very great help even to a mediocre intelligence. Diligentia maximum etiam mediocris ingeni subsidium
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Diligence is a good thing, but taking things easy is much more restful.
quotes.author: Twain

quotes.quote: Without hard work and discipline it is difficult to be a top professional.
quotes.author: Jahangir Khan

quotes.quote: Diligence and hard work sensitize you to recognize opportunity.
quotes.author: David P. Ingerson

quotes.quote: A plodding diligence brings us sooner to our journey's end than a fluttering way of advancing by starts.
quotes.author: Roger L'Estrange

quotes.quote: Diligence without intelligence is tragedy, not success.
quotes.author: Kevin Keenoo

quotes.quote: Diligence is not easy, but we can't reach our goals without it.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: Hard work and diligence are essential to success, but they require an internal motivation. That internal motivation is Vision
quotes.author: Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: Diligence is the mother of good fortune, and idleness, its opposite, never brought a man to the goal of any of his best wishes.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Be diligent daily,be efficient weekly,be proficient monthly,and you will be productive annually.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Work is doing it. Discipline is doing it every day. Diligence is doing it well every day.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: The harder you work, the luckier you are is not a law, but people who work extraordinary hard always keep bad luck away.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Confidence and hard work is the best medicine to kill the disease called failure. It will make you successful person.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: He who labors diligently need never despair; for all things are accomplished by diligence and labor.
quotes.author: Menander

quotes.quote: Diligence is the mother of good luck.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, work hard, work smart and passionately present your best self to the world.
quotes.author: Hill Harper

quotes.quote: It is diligence that is supposed to be your greatest possession.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The leading rule for the lawyer, as for the man of every calling is diligence. Leave nothing for tomorrow which can be done today.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: A diligent man ever finds that something remains to be done.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: The diligent farmer plants trees, of which he himself will never see the fruit.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: Diligence is a very great help even to a mediocre intelligence.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: A slack hand brings poverty, but the hand of the diligent brings forth wealth.
quotes.author: Proverb 10:4

quotes.quote: In doing what we ought, we deserve no praise.
quotes.author: St. Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: Patience and diligence, like faith, remove mountains.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: I know no such thing as genius; it is nothing but labor and diligence
quotes.author: Hogarth

quotes.quote: Be diligent as long as you live, always doing more than is commanded of you.
quotes.author: Khemetic Wisdom

quotes.quote: Be industrious, let thine eyes be open, lest thou become a beggar, for the man that is idle cometh not to honor.
quotes.author: Khemetic Wisdom

quotes.quote: Nothing is so difficult that diligence cannot conquer it.
quotes.author: Malagasy Wisdom

quotes.quote: Do what is required of you and remain a slave. Do more than is required and become free.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.quote: If you want to be the best, Baby, you've got to work harder than anybody else.
quotes.author: Sammy Davis Jr.

quotes.quote: There is no obstacle in the path of young people who are poor or members of minority groups that hard work and preparation cannot cure.
quotes.author: Barbara Jordan

quotes.quote: When a job is once begun, never stop until it's done. / Be the job large or small, / do it right or not at all.
quotes.author: Carol Moseley Braun

quotes.quote: My philosophy is that not only are you responsible for your life but doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Do not speak falsely for you are great; do not act lightly for you have weight; be not untrue for you are the balance and do not swerve, for you are the standard.
quotes.author: Book of Khun-Anup

quotes.quote: He that tilleth his land shall have plenty of bread.
quotes.author: Proverb 28:19

quotes.quote: The ants are a people not strong, yet they prepare their meat in the summer.
quotes.author: Proverb 30:25

quotes.quote: By diligence and patience, the mouse bit in two the cable.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Few things are impossible to diligence and skill. Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
quotes.author: Johnson

quotes.quote: If you thought you had three months to do, due to diligence a year ago, you now have three weeks.
quotes.author: Greeley

quotes.quote: Care and diligence bring luck.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: I never could have done what I have done without the habits of punctuality, order, and diligence, without the determination to concentrate myself on one subject at a time.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: I observe the physician with the same diligence as the disease.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: I believe in fate, but I also believe that hard work and diligence play a very important role in our lives.
quotes.author: Chanda Kochhar

quotes.quote: Artists know that diligence counts as much, if not more, as inspiration; in art, as in politics, patience counts as much as revolution.
quotes.author: Tony Kushner

quotes.quote: The reward of work is to have produced it; the reward of effort is to have grown by it.
quotes.author: Antonin Sertillanges

quotes.quote: Common man's patience will bring him more happiness than common man's power.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Even if you feel like you're giving it your all, but still not seeing the desired results; keep going. Sometimes the key to your breakthrough is to persevere and to not give up.
quotes.author: Jeanette Coron

quotes.quote: Dimples should come with a warning: Dangerous! Could knock your world off its axis, categorized as a weapon, proceed with caution.
quotes.author: Adriana Law

quotes.quote: A woman could do a lot of crazy things for a pair of fine-looking dimples.
quotes.author: Amy Andrews

quotes.quote: People with dimple have a divine role in this universe: smile!
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: A dimple on the chin, a devil within.
quotes.author: Pope Paul VI

quotes.quote: Dimples on the face of a girl are more sweeter than sugar.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Then she smiles, and it turns out she has dimples, and it's all over.
quotes.author: Amie Kaufman

quotes.quote: The merry green eyes and a roguish dimple in one cheek.
quotes.author: C.S. Harris

quotes.quote: Dimples crinkle up the skin near his lips. I will not look at his lips. How can he never have used those? That’s a crime against humanity right there.
quotes.author: Carrie Jones

quotes.quote: Because of my dimples. Dimples are a get out of jail free card.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Oh, sweet is thy current by town and by tower, the green Sunnyvale and the dark linden bower. Thy waves as they dimple smile back on the plain, And Rhine, ancient river, thou’rt German again!
quotes.author: Horace Binney Wallace

quotes.quote: If there is love, smallpox scars are as pretty as dimples.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: The dimple appeared. I like staring at you. My brows rose. He chuckled. That kind of sounded creepy, didn't it? What I meant is that well, yeah, I like staring at you. So it is as creepy as it sounds.
quotes.author: Jennifer L. Armentrout

quotes.quote: He had the kind of smile that inhabited every part of his face his eyes, his cheeks, there was even a dimple.
quotes.author: Kristin Hannah

quotes.quote: I feel about mothers the way I feel about dimples. Because I do not have one myself, I notice everyone who does.
quotes.author: Letty Cottin Pogrebin

quotes.quote: God, there’s nothing sexier than a nice strong jawline and a movie star quality chin dimple. It’s my own personal kryptonite.
quotes.author: Lisa Daily

quotes.quote: I don't care if we only have a few days together, I want to spend every second by your side. I want to memorize every curve of your face, and I want to see you smile and kiss that dimple in your cheek.
quotes.author: Lisa Kessler

quotes.quote: Lovely dimples, like little dents in cream. I have given up all hope of dimples. My dimple dream will never come true; but so many of my dreams have that I mustn't complain. Am I all ready now?
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: He’s trying not to laugh, but the telltale dimple gives it away.
quotes.author: Nicola Yoon

quotes.quote: The attachment of the human skin to muscles is what causes dimples.
quotes.author: Noel Botham

quotes.quote: There are a good many real miseries in life that we cannot help smiling at, but they are the smiles that make wrinkles and not dimples.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Low gurgling laughter, as sweet as the swallow's song I the South, And a ripple of dimples that, dancing, meet By the curves of a perfect mouth.
quotes.author: Paul Hamilton Hayne

quotes.quote: Wherever there is power, there is age. Don't be deceived by dimples and curls. I tell you that babe is a thousand years old.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Her color was high, and there were deep dimples at the corners of her mouth. She looked nine miles out of place, but he had never loved her more. This was Willa on the edge of a smile.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: If there is love, smallpox scars are as pretty as dimples. I'll love your face no matter what it looks like. Because it's yours.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Many a man in love with a dimple makes the mistake of marrying the whole girl.
quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

quotes.quote: A successful dinner is one that lasts a while and one where everyone leaves happy. It's a meal where we didn't just wolf food down, rather something else happened at the table. That is the goal.
quotes.author: Laurie David

quotes.quote: Dinner is the principal act of the day that can only be carried out in a worthy manner by people of wit and humor; for it is not sufficient just to eat at dinner. One has to talk with a calm and discreet gaiety. The conversation must sparkle like the rubies in the entremets wines, it must be delightfully suave with the sweetmeats of the dessert, and become very profound with the coffee.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: After a good dinner one can forgive anybody, even one's own relations.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: At the dinner table, if you can't think of anything to say, sit quietly. Don't throw rolls, or chew on your napkin.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: This was a good dinner enough, to be sure, but it was not a dinner to ask a man to.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The dinner hour is a sacred, happy time when everyone should be together and relaxed.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: Dinner is a great first date. Don't believe that stuff about girls not wanting to eat on a first date sharing a romantic meal is so sexy.
quotes.author: Carmen Electra

quotes.quote: Strange to see how a good dinner and feasting reconciles everybody.
quotes.author: Samuel Pepys

quotes.quote: But dinner is dinner, a meal at which not so much to eat it becomes difficult to eat much at it as you grow older as to drink, to talk, to flirt, to discuss, to rejoice at the closing of the day. I do not think anything serious should be done after it, as nothing should before breakfast.
quotes.author: George Saintsbury

quotes.quote: Dinners are given mostly in the middle classes by way of revenge.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: Americans are just beginning to regard food the way the French always have. Dinner is not what you do in the evening before something else. Dinner is the evening.
quotes.author: Art Buchwald

quotes.quote: The dinner table is the center for the teaching and practicing not just of table manners but of conversation, consideration, tolerance, family feeling, and just about all the other accomplishments of polite society except the minuet.
quotes.author: Judith Martin

quotes.quote: A great dinner must include not only yummy food, but good conversation.
quotes.author: Laurie David

quotes.quote: Dinners are defined as the ultimate act of communion; men that can have communion in nothing else, can sympathetically eat together, can still rise into some glow of brotherhood over food and wine.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: At dinner time he would sit in a corner, concentrating; and suddenly they would say, time to feed the cat, as if it were their idea.
quotes.author: Lilian Jackson Braun

quotes.quote: Dinner is where the magic happens in the kitchen.
quotes.author: Kris Carr

quotes.quote: Dinner alone is one of life's pleasures.
quotes.author: Laurie Colwin

quotes.quote: At a dinner party one should eat wisely but not too well, and talk well but not too wisely.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Everything on our dinner table-the meat, cheese, salad, bread, and soft drink-requires carbon dioxide to be there. For those of you who believe that carbon dioxide is a pollutant, we have a special diet: water and salt!
quotes.author: Joanne Nova

quotes.quote: Dinner is often a stew of beans or legumes, which are awesome for dieting; they give you that meaty satisfaction and both are excellent with whole grain rice or bread.
quotes.author: Nadia Giosia

quotes.quote: Dinner is to a day what dessert is to dinner.
quotes.author: Michael Dorris

quotes.quote: Drinks are for strangers, acquaintances, workmen, and family. Meals are for family, close friends, honored guests. Thegrand operator of the system is the line between intimacy and distance.
quotes.author: Mary Douglas

quotes.quote: Having a regular dinner routine also helps build family unity laurie David
quotes.author: Laurie David

quotes.quote: Joint meals won't end all domestic squabbles, but sitting together--even the night after a fight--gives kids practice talking through disagreements, forgiving and forgetting, and seeing the world as a bit more complex than right and wrong.
quotes.author: Laurie David

quotes.quote: It can be tough for busy families to organize dinners together but it takes intention and attention and thousands of intimate moments that you share together.
quotes.author: Laurie David

quotes.quote: The family dinner is like a declaration of dependence, poised to lead a mealtime revolution! By leading us away from faster food and meals alone, the ancient custom it is reviving will help you create some of your family's most precious memories!
quotes.author: Laurie Davidson

quotes.quote: The power of nightly dinners comes from more than the food. It's an excuse to bring your family together.
quotes.author: Anne Fishel

quotes.quote: The real power of dinners comes from the particular quality of conversation around the dinner table.
quotes.author: Anne Fishel

quotes.quote: Dinner conversation, rich in nutrients, is a place to seed important values.
quotes.author: Anne Fishel

quotes.quote: Families need to make a commitment to setting aside time for dinners. You get to nourish your family, prevent a host of problems and provide pleasure and delight that they can build on for the rest of their lives.
quotes.author: Anne Fishel

quotes.quote: You can use dinner as a time for your children to explore their connections to families from different cultures, and to their place in the web of living things.
quotes.author: Anne Fishel

quotes.quote: Families tell us that they come to the table for the food, but they linger and keep coming back if they have fun and good conversation during their time together.
quotes.author: Lynn Barendsen

quotes.quote: Dinners with the family have been found to be a more powerful deterrent against high-risk adolescent behaviors than church attendance or getting good grades.
quotes.author: Lynn Barendsen

quotes.quote: The real power of family dinner is that it provides a reliable time for parents and kids to connect with one another.
quotes.author: Lynn Barendsen

quotes.quote: To eat dinner together is to convene, to talk and learn about one another.
quotes.author: Lynn Barendsen

quotes.quote: Remember that the food is secondary, the human interaction and connection are paramount. That's family dinner.
quotes.author: Lynn Barendsen

quotes.quote: The family dinner table is a place of communication and fellowship, and a means of reconnecting with those we care about the most.
quotes.author: Leanne Ely

quotes.quote: One day, you will look back wistfully, actually missing the chaos of trying to get everyone to the table for dinner while the meal was still hot!
quotes.author: Leanne Ely

quotes.quote: The time you invest in eating dinner together around the table each night lasts a lifetime.
quotes.author: Norah Pritchard

quotes.quote: Family dinner doesn't have to be home-cooked, and it doesn't haver to be the last meal of the day--it just has to happen together.
quotes.author: Laurie David

quotes.quote: I don't think there is one thing more important you can do for your kids than have family dinner.
quotes.author: Ruth Reichi

quotes.quote: The feelings that arose from our meals together filled my life with a sense of love and comfort that are still felt around my own dinner table today.
quotes.author: Norah Pritchard

quotes.quote: The conversations around the dinner table are what linger in your mind more than anything else.
quotes.author: Norah Pritchard

quotes.quote: At our core we all know family dinners are a good idea. Maybe it's the memory of a meal decades ago. Strong memories and emotions are good reason to eat together.
quotes.author: Sarah Waldman

quotes.quote: Winter dinners do so much. They warm us up physically, from the snow and wind, and mentally, from the idea of five months of snow and wind.
quotes.author: Sarah Waldman

quotes.quote: I think feeding that deeper hunger and serving the world start with what your serve for dinner.
quotes.author: Ellen Kanner

quotes.quote: Whatever happened during the day, you could always count on the dinner table to be a place to share experiences, dream about the future, talk over memories, and connect with people you love.
quotes.author: Curtis Stone

quotes.quote: The sad part is that somehow in the evolution of today's modern society, dinner has become a choice, not a priority.
quotes.author: Sandi Richard

quotes.quote: I'm telling you, 'Dinner' is bigger than food!
quotes.author: Sandi Richard

quotes.quote: What you do when you walk in the door at dinner time does matter.
quotes.author: Sandi Richard

quotes.quote: Not only food were delicious, dinner table time also stimulated meaningful memories. Enjoy and treasure family time during meals. Everyone will be happy and share how it feels.
quotes.author: The Epelbaum Sisters

quotes.quote: The dinosaurs became extinct because they didn't have a space program.
quotes.author: Larry Niven

quotes.quote: Dinosaurs are extinct today because they lacked opposable thumbs and the brainpower to build a space program.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: It's when you walk with dinosaurs that you start thinking about lunch.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: It's very simple why kids are crazy about dinosaurs -- dinosaurs are nature's Special Effects. They are the only real dragons. Kids love dragons. It's not just being weirdly shaped and being able to eat Buicks. It's that they are real.
quotes.author: Robert T. Bakker

quotes.quote: The public image of dinosaurs is tainted by extinction. It's hard to accept dinosaurs as a success when they are all dead. But the fact of ultimate extinction should not make us overlook the absolutely unsurpassed role dinosaurs played in the history of life.
quotes.author: Robert T. Bakker

quotes.quote: Dinosaurs did not walk with humans. The evolutionary record says different. They gambled.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: A dinosaur out of context is like a character without a story. Worse than that, the character suffers from amnesia.
quotes.author: Jack Horner

quotes.quote: If we measured success by longevity, then dinosaurs must rank as the number one success story in the history of land life.
quotes.author: Robert T. Bakker

quotes.quote: Dinosaurs are the jumper cables to the human mind. Kids can't curb their enthusiasm when they're in a hall of dinosaurs and mammoths and mammoth hunters and trilobites and giant fish that could chomp up a shark. These natural objects in motion and context make kids want to read; you can't stop them from reading and thinking.
quotes.author: Robert T. Bakker

quotes.quote: The dinosaurs disappeared because they could not adapt to their changing environment. We shall disappear if we cannot adapt to an environment that now contains spaceships, computers — and thermonuclear weapons.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: Dinosaurs may be extinct from the face of the planet, but they are alive and well in our imaginations.
quotes.author: Steve Miller

quotes.quote: In the age of dinosaurs, you don't need brains, you only need muscle.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Dinosaurs have a bad public image as symbols of obsolescence and hulking inefficiency; in political cartoons they are know-nothing conservatives that plod through miasmic swamps to inevitable extinction.
quotes.author: Robert T. Bakker

quotes.quote: The dinosaurs are remembered only by their bones. What will we be remembered for with humanity?
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.quote: We all have a dinosaur deep within us just trying to get out.
quotes.author: Colin Mochrie

quotes.quote: The dinosaurs's eloquent lesson is that if some bigness is good, an overabundance of bigness is not necessarily better.
quotes.author: Eric Johnston

quotes.quote: It is a principle of diplomacy that one must know something of the truth in order to lie convincingly.
quotes.author: Tom Clancy

quotes.quote: Diplomacy in general does not resolve conflicts. Wars end not due to peace processes, but due to one side giving up.
quotes.author: Daniel Pipes

quotes.quote: Sincere diplomacy is no more possible than dry water or wooden iron.
quotes.author: Josef Stalin

quotes.quote: Diplomacy is fundamentally working with people, bringing people together to deal with difficult issues.
quotes.author: John Roos

quotes.quote: Diplomacy is a game of chess in which the nations are checkmated.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: Diplomacy is listening to what the other guy needs. Preserving your own position, but listening to the other guy. You have to develop relationships with other people so when the tough times come, you can work together.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Diplomacy is a disguised war, in which states seek to gain by barter and intrigue, by the cleverness of arts, the objectives which they would have to gain more clumsily by means of war.
quotes.author: Randolph Bourne

quotes.quote: The art of diplomacy is to take an opportunity and turn it into something.
quotes.author: Brent Scowcroft

quotes.quote: Quiet diplomacy is far more effective than public posturing.
quotes.author: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quotes.quote: DIPLOMACY, n. Lying in state, or the patriotic art of lying for one's country.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The best diplomacy starts with getting to know each other.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: Diplomacy is like jazz: endless variations on a theme.
quotes.author: Richard Holbrooke

quotes.quote: Diplomacy is not merely talking somebody into something; it's talking to somebody from a position of strength. You put your power on the table to open up the conversation; that's diplomacy.
quotes.author: Daniel Fried

quotes.quote: In the world of diplomacy, some things are better left unsaid.
quotes.author: Lincoln Chafee

quotes.quote: Diplomacy, if properly practiced, is not just talking for the sake of talking.
quotes.author: Condoleezza Rice

quotes.quote: Diplomacy is to do and say the nastiest things in the nicest way.
quotes.author: Isaac Goldberg

quotes.quote: Diplomacy without arms is like music without instruments.
quotes.author: Frederick The Great

quotes.quote: In diplomacy, like in great many other things, the rules of engagement survive only until one remarkable person decides to break them.
quotes.author: Ilona Andrews

quotes.quote: You can do a lot with diplomacy, but with diplomacy backed up by force you can get a lot more done.
quotes.author: Kofi Atta Annan

quotes.quote: Diplomacy means the art of nearly deceiving all your friends, but not quite deceiving all your enemies.
quotes.author: Kofi Abrefa Busia

quotes.quote: Diplomacy is the art of letting someone else have your way.
quotes.author: Daniele VarÃ¨

quotes.quote: Diplomacy is the velvet glove that cloaks the fist of power.
quotes.author: Robin Hobb

quotes.quote: All diplomacy is a continuation of war by other means.
quotes.author: Zhou Enlai

quotes.quote: Diplomacy: the art of restraining power.
quotes.author: Henry Kissinger

quotes.quote: Diplomacy is thinking twice before saying nothing.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Successful diplomacy is an alignment of objectives and means.
quotes.author: Dennis Ross

quotes.quote: Diplomacy is more than saying or doing the right things at the right time, it is avoiding saying or doing the wrong things at any time.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Diplomacy is much more than just talking to your friends. You've got to talk to people who aren't our friends, and even people you dislike.
quotes.author: Richard Armitage

quotes.quote: Diplomacy is the lowest form of politeness because it misquotes the greatest number of people. A nation, like an individual, if it has anything to say, should simply say it.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: Part of diplomacy is to open different definitions of self-interest.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: To say nothing, especially when speaking, is half the art of diplomacy.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: The principle of give and take is the principle of diplomacy give one and take ten.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A real diplomat is one who can cut his neighbor's throat without having his neighbor notice it.
quotes.author: Trygve Lie

quotes.quote: A diplomat is a fellow that lets you do all the talking while gets what he wants.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: In order to be a diplomat, one must speak a number of languages, including doubletalk.
quotes.author: Carey Williams

quotes.quote: Frank and explicit is the right line to take when you wish to conceal your own mind and confuse the minds of others.
quotes.author: Disraeli

quotes.quote: Diplomacy: the patriotic art of lying for one's country.
quotes.author: Bierce

quotes.quote: A diplomatic language has a hundred ways of saying nothing but no way of saying something.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Diplomacy is the art of diving into trouble without making a splash.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A good diplomat is one who can always make himself misunderstood.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Diplomacy is the art of handling a porcupine without disturbing the quills.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A diplomat is one who can put his foot down without stepping on someone else's toes.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A diplomat is a man who uses his head without anyone suspecting it.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: All war represents a failure of diplomacy.
quotes.author: Tony Benn

quotes.quote: Euphemisms are unpleasant truths wearing diplomatic cologne.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: Diplomacy is the better part of valor.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Mieder

quotes.quote: Diplomacy is the art of letting someone else have your way.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Mieder

quotes.quote: Quiet diplomacy is far more effective than public posturing.
quotes.author: Claude Arpi

quotes.quote: Diplomacy in the classic sense, the adjustment of differences through negotiation.
quotes.author: Henry Kissinger

quotes.quote: Humor, humility, and, of course, honesty, all are qualities that work in public and cultural diplomacy.
quotes.author: Cynthia P. Schneider

quotes.quote: Goals give us direction. They put a powerful force into play on a universal, conscious, and subconscious level. Goals give our life direction.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: We are not retreating we are advancing in another direction.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's the journey that teaches you a lot about your destination.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: For all the compasses in the world, there's only one direction, and time is its only measure.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: The wisest men follow their own direction.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: It is the set of the sails, not the direction of the wind that determines which way we will go.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: A little push at the right direction, can make a big difference.
quotes.author: Sandip Karmakar

quotes.quote: The great thing in this world is not so much where we stand, as in what direction we are moving.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: The best path through life is the highway.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Directions are instructions given to explain how. Direction is a vision offered to explain why.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: Direction determines destination.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Your direction is more important than your speed.
quotes.author: Richard L. Evans

quotes.quote: Any intelligent fool can make things bigger and more complex. It takes a touch of genius and a lot of courage to move in the opposite direction.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: A lack of direction and meaning can leave you empty.
quotes.author: Benjamin Stone

quotes.quote: It is the direction and not the magnitude which is to be taken into consideration.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you've imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: No matter how long you have travelled in the wrong direction, you can always turn around.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The direction in which education starts a man will determine his future life.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Life is a journey, not a destination, we determine our destiny by the direction we take.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You cannot expect to stay on the right path if you are walking with the wrong people.
quotes.author: Anas Hossain

quotes.quote: You can choose a direction that will take you into something that isn't going to take you where you want to go, or you can choose another direction which is down the right pathway.
quotes.author: Kerry Stokes

quotes.quote: You can never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.quote: If the things behind you are tripping you, you're moving in the wrong direction.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: If you lose direction, go to a higher ground.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: The good life is a process, not a state of being. It is a direction not a destination.
quotes.author: Carl Rogers

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Each step in the right direction allows you to see further in that direction.
quotes.author: Tom Ziglar

quotes.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself in any direction you choose. You're on your own, and you know what you know. And you are the guy who'll decide where to go.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: It is better to walk alone than with a crowd going in the wrong direction.
quotes.author: Diane Grant

quotes.quote: Read the directions and directly you will be directed in the right direction.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: Direction is only necessary when your destination is certain but the path to get there isn't clear to you.
quotes.author: Fela Durotoye

quotes.quote: If we are facing in the right direction, all we have to do is keep on walking.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Often times we cannot change the entire direction of a route already set in motion. But we can do our small part to shift the path one degree at a time.
quotes.author: Jody Hedlund

quotes.quote: Any direction you walked was forward, and that was as must be.
quotes.author: Rachel Hartman

quotes.quote: There’s no shame in changing direction.
quotes.author: Lynn Austin

quotes.quote: The only person to influence the direction and purpose of your life is the one who gave it. God!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Your decisions today, both big and small, determine the direction your life will take tomorrow.
quotes.author: Craig Groeschel

quotes.quote: Stopping to consider whether our choices will take us in the right direction is important. But sometimes we head in a direction we know is the wrong one, moving farther away from the story we want to tell.
quotes.author: Craig Groeschel

quotes.quote: Direction, not intention, determines destination.
quotes.author: Craig Groeschel

quotes.quote: Each decision should move closer to becoming all that God made you to be, to turn your life in the direction of a story you'll be happy to share.
quotes.author: Craig Groeschel

quotes.quote: If there's a goal you want to achieve, you have to make decisions that will move you in the direction you want to go.
quotes.author: Craig Groeschel

quotes.quote: Just like most of us, had to hit rock bottom before he woke up and obeyed the call of God on his life. At times God has to send a storm to get us to go in the right direction.
quotes.author: Robin Bertram

quotes.quote: God will bring about direction, conviction, clarification, inspiration, and revelation, and He will give you wisdom to make decisions that will help you live the best life you can live.
quotes.author: Robin Bertram

quotes.quote: Sometimes gut instinct is what determines the direction we should take.
quotes.author: Brenda Novak

quotes.quote: Sharing a clear and concise vision spawns a sense of purpose and direction. It attracts success toward you and helps you build an expanding team.
quotes.author: Farshad Asl

quotes.quote: It is not where one is, but in what direction he is going.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: Not knowing what I needed to do or where I needed to go, I knew all the same that I was going in the right direction.
quotes.author: J.D. Jordan

quotes.quote: Everything has a vibration that spirals inward or outward — and everything turns together in the same direction at the same time.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: If you miss the way to a great destination, just look for those going to that direction.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: In the world as it is, torn with agonies and dissensions, we need some direction for our souls which is never away from us; which, without enslaving us or narrowing our vision, enters into every detail of our life.
quotes.author: Caryll Houselander

quotes.quote: "Seek and ye shall find"; that seems to be the quintessence of all spiritual direction for everyone.
quotes.author: Caryll Houselander

quotes.quote: Our choices decide our direction and carve a path for our personal lives and our careers.
quotes.author: Michael Thomas Sunnarborg

quotes.quote: People at any stage will profit by taking the wheel and getting pointed in the right direction.
quotes.author: Michael Hyatt

quotes.quote: When you're a light instead of a dim switch, your brightness radiates in every direction.
quotes.author: T. F. Hodge

quotes.quote: Without sense of purpose and clear direction of your life, you will only be building a fake brand of you.
quotes.author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quotes.quote: In the spring, at the end of the day, you should smell like dirt.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Of all the paths you take in life, make sure a few of them are dirt.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: It is not dirt but the fear of dirt which is the sign of man's degeneration, and it is dangerous to judge a man's physical and moral sanity by outside standards.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: It is almost impossible to throw dirt on someone without getting a little on yourself.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: It is when we notice the dirt that God is most present in us; it is the very sign of His presence.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: People are like dirt. They can either nourish you and help you grow as a person or they can stunt your growth and make you wilt and die.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Dirt used to be a badge of honor. Dirt used to look like work. But we've scrubbed the dirt off the face of work, and consequently we've created this suspicion of anything that's too dirty.
quotes.author: Mike Rowe

quotes.quote: It is the dirt within men’s hearts that is most offensive; the filth you cannot see.
quotes.author: Jocelyn Murray

quotes.quote: Every day is one day closer to the dirt, so you got to go hard.
quotes.author: Greg Jackson

quotes.quote: If dirt were trumps, what hands you would hold!
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: When you mix dirt with water, the dirt doesn't get clean. The water just gets dirty.
quotes.author: Amanda Hocking

quotes.quote: Dirt makes a man look masculine. Let your hair blow in the wind, and all that. It's OK. All you have to do is look neat when you have to look neat.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: Have a little faith, kick a little dirt.
quotes.author: Diane Ladd

quotes.quote: Dirt is not dirty, but only something in the wrong place.
quotes.author: Henry John Temple

quotes.quote: If you want to make something dirt cheap, make it out of dirt–preferably dirt that is locally sourced.
quotes.author: Donald Sadoway

quotes.quote: As soon as the dirt is hitting the casket, it'll all be forgotten.
quotes.author: Eric Bogosian

quotes.quote: Nothing would give up life: Even the dirt keeps breathing a small breath.
quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

quotes.quote: Who touches money touches dirt; and the less religion has to do with it, the better.
quotes.author: Philip Schaff

quotes.quote: Money is a necessity; so is dirt.
quotes.author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quotes.quote: There's nothing like a shovel full of dirt to encourage literacy.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Never mind a little dirt, if the goal is splendid!
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: Turn down a chance to feel magic for fear of a little dirt?
quotes.author: Wendelin Van Draanen

quotes.quote: Revenge leads to an empty fullness, like eating dirt.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Hence money may be dirt, although dirt is not money.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Running like Naruto and needing N9na to throw batons / Baton like Rouge and kill everything like Rittz while foes are on / See you people are slowin' on, we be speedin' like motocross
quotes.author: Anthony Saunders

quotes.quote: Mud enduros and motocross / Dish washing money to buy my gas / Late at night in the cold garage / Building the engine that moved my past / Sliding out of the perfect turn
quotes.author: David Patrick Wilcox

quotes.quote: If everything seems under control, you're not going fast enough.
quotes.author: Mario Andretti

quotes.quote: Ride your bike, ride your bike, ride your bike.
quotes.author: Fausto Coppi

quotes.quote: Speed has never killed anyone. Suddenly becoming stationary, that's what gets you.
quotes.author: Jeremy Clarkson

quotes.quote: Faster, Faster, until the thrill of speed overcomes the fear of death.
quotes.author: Hunter S Thompson

quotes.quote: Anyone who rides a bike is a friend of mine.
quotes.author: Gary Fisher

quotes.quote: Then I do a triple jump! YEAH! / When I was a kid, I never bothered with what my friends / Did. / I just wanted to be / A dirt bike rider, / A dirt bike rider!
quotes.author: Brian Neary

quotes.quote: Brain washing dirt bike / Ground shaking dirt bike / Mind bending dirt bike / In control
quotes.author: John Flansburgh

quotes.quote: Soul crushing dirt bike / Self propelled dirt bike / You see I never thought I'd understand / 'Til that bike took me by the hand / Now I ride
quotes.author: John Flansburgh

quotes.quote: Daydreaming of dirt bikes and four wheeler / Shopping sprees at the diamond dealer / Hats and jackets, shirts, pants and sneakers / That brand new car smell
quotes.author: Chad Dexster Burnette

quotes.quote: Dirt bike, four wheeling / Come up in the street I'm peeling
quotes.author: Nosakhere Jabili Andrews

quotes.quote: Bank account eruptin' (Yeah) / I need me a safe or something (Yeah) / I'm a dirt bike riding junkie (C'mon) / I don't need that Wraith for nothing (Let's go) / But it's a Wraith on my wrist or something (Skrrt)
quotes.author: Bryan Yepes

quotes.quote: Hugging a thot, boy, giving 'em top where they brain is / I'm a rock star lifestyle living, dirt bike riding, toting stainless, I aim big
quotes.author: Bryan Yepes

quotes.quote: Stripes getting dirty like mud fights and dirt bikes / Turning these draw's black that's used to be white
quotes.author: Allan Pineda

quotes.quote: Freestyle motocross riders take dirt bike riding to the extreme. Not long ago, the bikes that sail through the air were used mainly for racing.
quotes.author: Terri Sievert

quotes.quote: In the 1950's, motorcycle companies began to design and build motorcycles for riding on rough, bumpy off-road courses. People called these motorcycles 'dirt bikes.'
quotes.author: Terri Sievert

quotes.quote: Dirt bike riders also compete in other races. They still race on dirt tracks.
quotes.author: Terri Sievert

quotes.quote: Discover the world of dirt bikes, where riders speed over muddy, hilly courses and soar high into the air.
quotes.author: Terri Sievert

quotes.quote: The bike and the rider sail through the air.
quotes.author: Danny Parr

quotes.quote: Dirt bikes handle well in dirt, mud, sand, and grass. Riders enjoy riding dirt bikes away from roads and highways.
quotes.author: Danny Parr

quotes.quote: Dirt bikes are lighter than street motorcycles. Their light weight makes them fast and quick. Dirt bikes can make sharp turns that street motorcycles cannot make.
quotes.author: Danny Parr

quotes.quote: Most people ride dirt bikes for fun. They can explore areas in dirt bikes that cars and street motorcycles cannot explore.
quotes.author: Danny Parr

quotes.quote: From coast to coast, kids are burning up the track and the trail on dirt bikes.
quotes.author: James Holter

quotes.quote: They do tricks while their powerful dirt bikes soar through the air. Judges score each trick based on difficulty, style, originality, and landing.
quotes.author: Matt Scheff

quotes.quote: Dirt bike racing is fast and dirty. Riders speed over jumps. They soar through the air and slam back to earth.
quotes.author: M. Weber

quotes.quote: This makes dirt bike racing one of the most physically demanding and dangerous Motorsports.
quotes.author: M. Weber

quotes.quote: Dirt bike races are also held on challenging outdoors courses. No two courses are the same.
quotes.author: M. Weber

quotes.quote: Imagine you are riding on a dirt bike. Warm air blows past you as you speed along hilly trails. You may even do special stunts, such as jumps or spins.
quotes.author: Sarah Tieck

quotes.quote: Many parts work together to make it move. A dirt bike is an amazing vehicle.
quotes.author: Sarah Tieck

quotes.quote: Some people ride dirt bikes for recreation, such as outdoor adventures.
quotes.author: Sarah Tieck

quotes.quote: People loved to race cross-country motorcycles in dirt races called scrambles.
quotes.author: Jack David

quotes.quote: Dirt bikes kept growing in popularity. It soon seemed as if dirt bikes were everywhere.
quotes.author: Jack David

quotes.quote: Dirt bikes make it possible to travel areas where other vehicles would get stuck.
quotes.author: S.L. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Many dirt bikes owners also love to test their riding skill in motocross competitions.
quotes.author: S.L. Hamilton

quotes.quote: If there is one thing that the vast majority of great motor cycle races and champions have in common, it's that they started riding in the dirt.
quotes.author: Gary LaPlante

quotes.quote: To the uninitiated, riding an off-road motorcycle may look as easy as sitting down, putting your feet on the pegs, and twisting the throttle. But for any of us who have ever tried to tackle an off-road trail on a dirt bike, we know that there is so much more to the activity than that.
quotes.author: Gary LaPlante

quotes.quote: The deafening sound and the smell of the engines at a dirt-bike race is like nothing else.
quotes.author: Paul Mason

quotes.quote: Not everyone rides dirt bikes in races. Some bikers prefer to ride through the woods with a few friends. But the best courses are almost all used for races.
quotes.author: Paul Mason

quotes.quote: It is a good idea to bring plenty of water. Dirt biking is thirsty work!
quotes.author: Paul Mason

quotes.quote: If it's dirty, it's not funny, but if it's funny, it's not dirty
quotes.author: Buddy Hackett

quotes.quote: A dirty exterior is a great enemy to beauty of all descriptions.
quotes.author: Mary Martha Sherwood

quotes.quote: Of all the paths you take in life, make sure a few of them are dirt.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Even dirt glitters when the sun is shining upon it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Under the pavement the dirt is dreaming of grass.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: Dirt makes a man look masculine. Let your hair blow in the wind, and all that. It's OK. All you have to do is look neat when you have to look neat.
quotes.author: Heddy Lamarr

quotes.quote: We have the same dirt under our shoes as they do.
quotes.author: Stacey Lee

quotes.quote: Dirt has been shrewdly termed "misplaced material".
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Grow from the dirt that they left you in.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Gold's father is dirt, yet it regards itself as noble.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: Six feet of dirt make all men equal.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Delay and dirt are the realities of the most rewarding travel.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: Airing one's dirty linen never makes for a masterpiece.
quotes.author: Francois Truffaut

quotes.quote: Dirt is not dirt, but only something in the wrong place.
quotes.author: Henry Temple 3rd Viscount Palmerston

quotes.quote: No matter how dirty your past is, your future is still spotless.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: Play in the dirt because life is too short to always have a clean fingernails.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: People are like dirt. They can either nourish you and help you grow as a person or they can stunt your growth and make you wilt and die.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: When you mix dirt with water, the dirt doesn't get clean. The water just gets dirty.
quotes.author: Amanda Hocking

quotes.quote: Where there is dirt there is system. Dirt is the byproduct of a systematic ordering and classification of matter.
quotes.author: Mary Douglas

quotes.quote: It is when we notice the dirt that God is most present in us; it is the very sign of His presence.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Dirt used to be a badge of honor. Dirt used to look like work. But we've scrubbed the dirt off the face of work and consequently we've created this suspicion of anything that's too dirty.
quotes.author: Mike Rowe

quotes.quote: Don't call the world dirty because you forgot to clean your glasses.
quotes.author: Aaron Hill

quotes.quote: Money is a necessity; so is dirt.
quotes.author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quotes.quote: Even the most beautiful rose has been the through dirt.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It is the dirt within men's hearts that is most offensive; the filth you cannot see.
quotes.author: Jocelyn Murray

quotes.quote: When you throw dirt, you lose ground.
quotes.author: Texan Proverb

quotes.quote: It is almost impossible to throw dirt on someone without getting a little on yourself
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: Dirt is only matter out of place; and what is a blot on the escutcheon of the Common Law may be a jewel in the crown of the Social Republic.
quotes.author: John Chipman Gray

quotes.quote: It is not dirt but the fear of dirt which is the sign of man's degeneration, and it is dangerous to judge a man's physical and moral sanity by outside standards.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: I learned long ago never to wrestle with a pig. You get dirty, and besides, the pig likes it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Whatever is funny is subversive, every joke is ultimately a custard pie...a dirty joke is a sort of mental rebellion.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: I don't like baths. I don't enjoy them in the slightest end, if I could, I'd prefer to go around dirty.
quotes.author: J.B. Priestley

quotes.quote: There's no one so clean that somebody doesn't think they're dirty.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: You can't play in the dirt without getting dirty.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: Despite paying $10,000 for a coffin, it's the way we're all going to end up, down and dirty. No other way to make it.
quotes.author: Lawrence Dorfman

quotes.quote: If you write about yourself the slightest deviation makes you realize instantly that there may be honor among thieves but you are just a dirty liar.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Any woman who chooses to behave like a full human being should be warned that the armies of the status quo will treat her as something of a dirty joke. That's their natural and first weapon.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: A clean wall provokes a mudslinger more than a dirty wall.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: Skill is not thought of as intelligence, especially if it gets its hands dirty.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: It's ignoring the dirty looks of the other driver you've just cut-off
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: If it is worth fighting for, it is worth fighting dirty for.
quotes.author: Bert Bulwark

quotes.quote: You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of an ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty.
quotes.author: Mohandas K. Gandhi

quotes.quote: To survive you often have to fight and to fight you have to dirty yourself.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Wherever a man goes, men will pursue him and paw him with their dirty institutions, and if they can, constrain him to belong to their desperate oddfellow society.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Cleaning anything involves making something else dirty, but anything can get dirty without something else getting clean.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: She felt dirty, ugly, and tired. She felt like a marshmallow heading into a house fire armed with chocolate and graham crackers.
quotes.author: Benjamin R. Smith

quotes.quote: If you're dirty, what in this world isn't?!
quotes.author: Fuyumi Soryo

quotes.quote: Sometimes to defeat somebody that plays dirty, you have to play dirty yourself.
quotes.author: K. Weikel

quotes.quote: Don't worry to do dirty jobs. Dirt your body. Don’t dirt your soul.
quotes.author: Sijin Bt

quotes.quote: Everything is so chaotic and messy in the world, and I have always felt kind of dirty.
quotes.author: Mitski

quotes.quote: I don't mind getting my hands dirty, and I don't mind getting to the truth of a situation and saying, 'You're right, you're wrong next case.'
quotes.author: Judy Sheindlin

quotes.quote: There are no dirty words, only dirty minds.
quotes.author: Lenny Bruce

quotes.quote: It is not when the truth is dirty, but when it is shallow, that the lover of knowledge is reluctant to step into its waters.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: An evil person is like a dirty window, they never let the light shine through.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: The permissive society has been allowed to become a dirty phrase. A better phrase is the civilized society
quotes.author: Roy Jenkins

quotes.quote: The activist is not the man who says the river is dirty. The activist is the man who cleans up the river.
quotes.author: Ross Perot

quotes.quote: Organized crime is the dirty side of the sharp dollar.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: I was taught that the most hardworking nurse is found in the dirtiest part of the clinical ward.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: In taking a bath one is admitting he is dirty. In humility, he strips off all dignity and returns as-was-born for natural cleaning.
quotes.author: Vincent Okay Nwachukwu

quotes.quote: I have had this desire my whole life to prove people wrong, to show them I could do things they didn't think I could do.
quotes.author: David A. Paterson

quotes.quote: Try not to associate bodily defect with mental, my good friend, except for a solid reason.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: One always overcompensates for disabilities. I'm thinking of having my entire body surgically removed.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: My disability has opened my eyes to see my true abilities.
quotes.author: Robert M. Hensel

quotes.quote: My ability is greater than my disability.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: We know that equality of individual ability has never existed and never will, but we do insist that equality of opportunity still must be sought.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: No pessimist ever discovered the secret of the stars, or sailed to an uncharted land, or opened a new doorway for the human spirit.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: We think we know what it's all about; we think that disability is a really simple thing, and we don't expect to see disabled people in our daily lives.
quotes.author: Stella Young

quotes.quote: I think that everyone has something about themselves that they feel is their weakness their disability. And I'm certain we all have one, because I think of a disability as being anything which undermines our belief and confidence in our own abilities.
quotes.author: Aimee Mullins

quotes.quote: Disability doesn't make you exceptional, but questioning what you think you know about it does.
quotes.author: Stella Young

quotes.quote: There is a plan and a purpose, a value to every life, no matter what its location, age, gender or disability.
quotes.author: Sharron Angle

quotes.quote: People presume my disability has to do with being an amputee, but that's not the case; our insecurities are our disabilities, and I struggle with those as does everyone.
quotes.author: Aimee Mullins

quotes.quote: Disability is natural. We must stop believing that disabilities keep a person from doing something. Because that's not true. Having a disability doesn't stop me from doing anything.
quotes.author: Benjamin Snow

quotes.quote: Every person with a disability is an individual.
quotes.author: Itzhak Perlman

quotes.quote: Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The world worries about disability more than disabled people do.
quotes.author: Warwick Davis

quotes.quote: Each handicap is like a hurdle in a steeplechase, and when you ride up to it, if you throw your heart over, the horse will go along, too.
quotes.author: Lawrence Bixby

quotes.quote: I have not been handicapped by my condition. I am physically challenged and differently able.
quotes.author: Janet Barnes

quotes.quote: Dancing with a spinal cord injury is a challenge like no other, but I aspired to prove to myself that I could still be phenomenal dancer even with an SCI.
quotes.author: Sarah Todd Hammer

quotes.quote: If we are to achieve a richer culture, we must weave one in which each diverse human gift will find a fitting place.
quotes.author: Margaret Meade

quotes.quote: Enable the disabled; Translate disability into ability; Capability, a winning opportunity indeed a reality.
quotes.author: Dr. Veena Kumari

quotes.quote: The strong, ferocious wind just made the chill worse, and as it blew around me, electric bursts of pain shot through my body.
quotes.author: Jennifer Starzec

quotes.quote: For me, disability is a way of getting some extremity, some kind of very difficult situation, that throws an interesting light on people.
quotes.author: Mark Haddon

quotes.quote: I was diagnosed with a severe temporal spatial deficit, a learning disability that means I have zero spatial relations skills. It was official: I was a genius trapped in an idiot's body.
quotes.author: Sloane Crosley

quotes.quote: Know me for my abilities, not my disability.
quotes.author: Robert M. Hensel

quotes.quote: Being disabled should not mean being disqualified from having access to every aspect of life.
quotes.author: Emma Thompson

quotes.quote: Life is all about balance. Since I have only one leg, I understand that well.
quotes.author: Sandy Fussell

quotes.quote: My advice to other disabled people would be, concentrate on things your disability doesn't prevent you doing well, and don't regret the things it interferes with. Don't be disabled in spirit as well as physically.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: It is a waste of time to be angry about my disability. One has to get on with life and I haven't done badly. People won't have time for you if you are always angry or complaining.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: I have a Disability yes that's true, but all that really means is I may have to take a slightly different path than you.
quotes.author: Robert M. Hensel

quotes.quote: Abled does not mean enabled. Disabled does not mean less abled.
quotes.author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.quote: I choose not to place DIS, in my ability.
quotes.author: Robert M. Hensel

quotes.quote: Some disabled people spend a significant amount of their energy on trying to come across as abled or as not that disabled.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Being disabled does not mean Un-abled, just Different Abled.
quotes.author: Noel Helm

quotes.quote: When you have a disability, knowing that you are not defined by it is the sweetest feeling.
quotes.author: Anne Wafula Strike

quotes.quote: Just because a man lacks the use of his eyes doesn't mean he lacks vision.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of disabled persons: Those who dwell on what they have lost and those who concentrate on what they have left.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.quote: Being unconscious is the ultimate disability.
quotes.author: Jessa Gamble

quotes.quote: I'm officially disabled, but I'm truly enabled because of my lack of limbs. My unique challenges have opened up unique opportunities to reach so many in need.
quotes.author: Nick Vujicic

quotes.quote: A child is only as disabled as their environment and the beliefs of the people around them.
quotes.author: Bala Pillai

quotes.quote: Disability has become a form of permanent welfare for a lot of folks. It's not that hard to prove a mental illness or mental issues or pain issues.
quotes.author: Nina Easton

quotes.quote: What I learned was that these athletes were not disabled, they were superabled. The Olympics is where heroes are made. The Paralympics is where heroes come.
quotes.author: Joey Reiman

quotes.quote: Disability is a matter of perception. If you can do just one thing well, you're needed by someone.
quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

quotes.quote: A hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeves

quotes.quote: Disability is often framed, in medical terms, as the ultimate disaster and certainly as a deficit.
quotes.author: Stella Young

quotes.quote: For me, the wheelchair symbolizes disability in a way a cane does not.
quotes.author: Annette Funicello

quotes.quote: Disagreement is not necessarily a reason to head for Splitsville. In fact, a relationship without disagreement is probably too brittle to last. Some of the best human bonds are forged in the fire of disagreement.
quotes.author: Jerry Spinelli

quotes.quote: In some ways, we will always be different. In other ways, we will always be the same. There is always room to disagree and blame, just as there is always room to take a new perspective and empathize. Understanding is a choice.
quotes.author: Vironika Tugaleva

quotes.quote: A conversation in which the two parties have different beliefs should never begin with the intention of converting the other party to your own beliefs. Every worthwhile conversation's goal should be to understand the other person's opinions and help them understand your own.
quotes.author: Emily Eskowich

quotes.quote: We can disagree and still love each other unless your disagreement is rooted in my oppression and denial of my humanity and right to exist.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Instead of seeing how much pain I can dish out towards those I disagree with, or who I believe have done me wrong, I seek to follow the golden rule and use my words and behavior to create more of what the world needs – love, compassion, and connection.
quotes.author: Aspen Baker

quotes.quote: I am totally down with disagreement. I don't like Haterade, but disagreement is wonderful. When someone disagrees, we try to reach common ground. That's good.
quotes.author: Roxane Gay

quotes.quote: You need people who have their own views, whose views you respect, whom you can have a productive disagreement with, and work out ideas which you might not have come up with, or who improve on ideas you had.
quotes.author: Lee Hsien Loong

quotes.quote: He who has learned to disagree without being disagreeable has discovered the most valuable secret of a diplomat.
quotes.author: Robert Estabrook

quotes.quote: The people to fear are not those who disagree with you, but those who disagree with you and are too cowardly to let you know.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Disagreements don't cause disunity, a lack of forgiveness does.
quotes.author: Loren Cunningham

quotes.quote: If you listen to two people who are arguing about something, and they each of them have passionate faith that they're right, but they believe different things—they belong to different religions, different faiths, there is nothing they can do to settle their disagreement short of shooting each other, which is what they very often actually do.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Harmony is a symphony, and symphony is an agreement; but an agreement of disagreements while they disagree there cannot be; you cannot harmonize that which disagrees.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Raise your words, not your voice. It is rain that grows flowers not thunders.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Managing dissent is about recognizing the value of disagreement, discord and difference.
quotes.author: Noreena Hertz

quotes.quote: In case of dissension, never dare to judge till you've heard the other side.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: The statement at the core of all disagreements: I’m right, you’re wrong.
quotes.author: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.quote: It's okay to disagree with the thoughts or opinions expressed by other people. That doesn't give you the right to deny any sense they might make. Nor does it give you a right to accuse someone of poorly expressing their beliefs just because you don't like what they are saying. Learn to recognize good writing when you read it, even if it means overcoming your pride and opening your mind beyond what is comfortable.
quotes.author: Ashly Lorenzana

quotes.quote: Staying relevant and speaking in kind tones is by far, the best way to make your point. The moment you lose track, throwing out a negative comment you’ve lost your way, and get the terrible task of carrying your own negative, regretful baggage around with you. It’s senseless to create your own heavy heart.
quotes.author: Ron Baratono

quotes.quote: When in disagreement, do not employ a vulgar, defaming or callow response; in the absence of logic, respond in a refined manner; word choice and tone always matter.
quotes.author: RJ Intindola

quotes.quote: Just because you have a disagreement with your friends or family members does not mean there are not plenty of other areas on which you see eye to eye. It just means you have a difference of opinion.
quotes.author: Victoria Osteen

quotes.quote: I like disagreement because it forces both sides to question their own opinions and why they feel that way.
quotes.author: Sam Hunt

quotes.quote: No matter what, everyone will go through a disagreement - that's what makes us all different.
quotes.author: Tionne Watkins

quotes.quote: If and when they have a disagreement or argument, and if they can't resolve it, happy couples default to trusting and forgiving rather than distrusting and begrudging.
quotes.author: Mark Goulston

quotes.quote: Managing dissent is about recognizing the value of disagreement, discord and difference.
quotes.author: Noreena Hertz

quotes.quote: Always be willing to look at both sides of the argument. Understanding the other side is the best way to strengthen your own.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: When you voice your disagreement, begin by talking about what you have in common with the person you are arguing with. Too often we rush to judgment, race to argue, and overlook all the common ground we share.
quotes.author: Matthew Kelly

quotes.quote: The proud think that their opinion alone is right. They cannot see the good points of others, as the humble do, and appreciate their opinions. That is why there is such disagreement, strife and quarrelling and even irrreconciliation in families and in other groups.
quotes.author: Basilea Schlink

quotes.quote: Agreement is made more precious by disagreement.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Most disagreements are the result of faulty assumptions.
quotes.author: Geoff Tate

quotes.quote: I remain convinced that most human conflicts can be solved through genuine dialogue conducted with a spirit of openness and reconciliation.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: It is not surprising that honest and well-informed experts can disagree about facts. But beyond the disagreement about facts, there is another deeper disagreement about values.
quotes.author: Freeman Dyson

quotes.quote: In art, religion, and politics the respect must be mutual, no matter how violent the disagreement.
quotes.author: Vincent Price

quotes.quote: Never speak from a place of hate, jealousy, anger, or insecurity. Evaluate your words before you let them leave your lips. Sometimes it's best to be quiet.
quotes.author: Tony A. Gaskins Jr.

quotes.quote: My father used to say,'Dont raise your voice. Improve your argument.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The volume of your voice does not increase the validity of your argument.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Disagreement produces debate but dissent produces dissension.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.quote: The best words for resolving a disagreement are, I could be wrong; I often am.' It's true.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: It is only through dialogue, deep listening, and passionate disagreement that we find our way to something larger than a singular and isolated point of view.
quotes.author: Henry Kimsey-House

quotes.quote: Honest disagreement is often a good sign of progress.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Respect your fellow human being, treat them fairly, disagree with them honestly, enjoy their friendship, explore your thoughts about one another candidly, work together for a common goal and help one another achieve it. No destructive lies. No ridiculous fears. No debilitating anger.
quotes.author: Bill Bradley

quotes.quote: You should have disagreements with your leaders and your colleagues, but if it becomes immediately a question of questioning people's motives, and if immediately you decide that somebody who sees a whole new situation differently than you must be a bad person and somehow twisted inside, we are not going to get very far in forming a more perfect union.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: Most disagreements are caused by different perceptions that created different realities.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You don't have to be invisible to disappear.
quotes.author: Rebecca McNutt

quotes.quote: If you don’t know the art of disappearance, learn it because you will need it every time you get bored of the society you are living in!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The darkness might hide things really well, but it doesn’t have the power to make them disappear. And when it comes to our dreams, we might want to remember that.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: You sometimes think you want to disappear, but all you really want is to be found.
quotes.author: Kid Cudi

quotes.quote: Disappear for a while! Let the people miss you! And this is what the sun does with the sunset! When you reappear, you are much loved!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Only someone wishing to disappear would ever strive to 'fit in'.
quotes.author: Shaun Hick

quotes.quote: If all mankind were to disappear, the world would regenerate back to the rich state of equilibrium that existed ten thousand years ago. If insects were to vanish, the environment would collapse into chaos.
quotes.author: E. O. Wilson

quotes.quote: Magic trick: to make people disappear, ask them to fulfill their promises.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Snow and adolescence are the only problems that disappear if you ignore them long enough.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: Problems will disappear as darkness disappears with the onset of light.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.quote: If we go on the way we have, the fault is our greed and if we are not willing to change, we will disappear from the face of the globe, to be replaced by the insect.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau
