quotes.quote: A universe that came from nothing in the big bang will disappear into nothing at the big crunch. Its glorious few zillion years of existence not even a memory
quotes.author: Paul Davies

quotes.quote: Anger will never disappear so long as thoughts of resentment are cherished in the mind. Anger will disappear just as soon as thoughts of resentment are forgotten.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Nothing is made, nothing disappears. The same changes, at the same places, never stopping.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Folks do not want to see a body disappear before their very eyes. Not me at least.
quotes.author: Kaye Gibbons

quotes.quote: Disappear in books. Come back as something better.
quotes.author: Nitya Prakash

quotes.quote: Sometimes we all want to disappear in the depths of an infinite path and the reason of this is obvious: We all come from the depths of infinity!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: When history disappears, you disappear.
quotes.author: Justin Barricks

quotes.quote: The moment you think that there is no path before you, path disappears! The moment you think the opposite, path appears! All paths need people who see them!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Keep your problems to yourself, if its too much for you, kill it slowly till it disappears from your life.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Patience and perseverance have a magical effect before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.quote: When we remember we are all mad, the mysteries disappear and life stands explained.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Empires dissolve and peoples disappear, song passes not away.
quotes.author: William Watson

quotes.quote: Sin brought death, and death will disappear with the disappearance of sin.
quotes.author: Mary Baker Eddy

quotes.quote: Four-fifths of all our troubles would disappear, if we would only sit down and keep still.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: It doesn't take a language long to disappear once the spirit to continue with it leaves its community. In fact, the speed of the decline has been one of the main findings of recent linguistic research.
quotes.author: David Crystal

quotes.quote: It is the dissimilarities and inequalities among men which give rise to the notion of honor; as such differences become less, it grows feeble; and when they disappear, it will vanish too.
quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.quote: Live to revel in just another twilight. Life may sink and disappear along with the sunset never to rise again
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: If the world you created on your own is stronger than the real world, then the real world disappears and you stay alone with your own created world!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Disappointment to a noble soul is what cold water is to burning metal; it strengthens, tempers, intensifies, but never destroys it.
quotes.author: Eliza Tabor

quotes.quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: If I am to meet with a disappointment, the sooner I know it, the more of life I shall have to wear it off.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Disappointment, when it involves neither shame nor loss, is as good as success; for it supplies as many images to the mind, and as many topics to the tongue.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: One's best success comes after their greatest disappointments.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Disappointments are to the soul what a thunderstorm is to the air.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: Disappointment is a good sign of basic intelligence. It cannot be compared to anything else: it is so sharp, precise, obvious, and direct. If we can open, then we suddenly begin to see that our expectations are irrelevant compared with the reality of the situations we are facing.
quotes.author: Chogyam Trungpa

quotes.quote: What do you do when disappointment comes? When it weighs on you like a rock, you can either let it press you down until you become discouraged, even devastated, or you can use it as a stepping-stone to better things.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire; the size of your dream; and how you handle disappointment along the way.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: But you know that disappointment is just the action of your brain readjusting itself to reality after discovering things are not the way you thought they were.
quotes.author: Brad Warner

quotes.quote: God makes the life fertile by disappointments, as he makes the ground fertile by frosts.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Let's face it: None of us are ever going to get to the place in life where we have no more disappointments. We can't expect to be sheltered from every little thing. Disappointment is a fact of life--one that must be dealt with.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Disappointment is a sort of bankruptcy - the bankruptcy of a soul that expends too much in hope and expectation.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Life is not always a celebration; so be ready to courageously face disappointments when they come, and be sure to grow stronger and wiser from them.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Disappointments are a result of failed expectations. To have less disappointments, either expect less from other people or demand more from yourself.
quotes.author: Kevin Ngo

quotes.quote: Disappointment is nothing but an eye-opening learning process for your future endeavors.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: See your disappointments as good fortune. One plan's deflation is another's inflation.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: Disappointment or misfortune don't last long among us, the poor; we can't live if we brood on them the whole time.
quotes.author: Viramma Racine

quotes.quote: In the midst of my disappointment I am never defeated. Only given the opportunity to rise again willing to take on new challenges.
quotes.author: Eleesha

quotes.quote: Disappointments are just God's way of saying I've got something better Be Patient.. Live Life.. Have Faith..
quotes.author: Lanette Sem

quotes.quote: Anytime you suffer a setback or disappointment, put your head down and plow ahead.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Disappointment is really just a term for our refusal to look on the bright side.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: The simple solution for disappointment depression: Get up and get moving. Physically move. Do. Act. Get going.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: Don't let today's disappointments cast a shadow on tomorrow's dreams.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Use disappointments as material for patience.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Every disappointment gives you opportunity to make another appointment.
quotes.author: B. A. Fajimi

quotes.quote: It is through disappointment that I must learn to never accept defeat, but to always come up with a brand new plan and find a solution.
quotes.author: Eleesha

quotes.quote: High expectations lead to higher disappointments.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Nobody likes being alone that much. I don't go out of my way to make friends, that's all. It just leads to disappointment.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: When you find your path, you must not be afraid. You need to have sufficient courage to make mistakes. Disappointment, defeat, and despair are the tools God uses to show us the way.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Longed for him. Got him. Shit.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: There are some things in this world you rely on, like a sure bet. And when they let you down, shifting from where you've carefully placed them, it shakes your faith, right where you stand.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: It was one of those times you feel a sense of loss, even though you didn't have something in the first place. I guess that's what disappointment is- a sense of loss for something you never had.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: Dreaming about being an actress, is more exciting then being one.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Dreaming about being an actress, is more exciting then being one.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: She wanted none of those days to end, and it was always with disappointment that she watched the darkness stride forward.
quotes.author: Markus Zusak

quotes.quote: Life is a long preparation for something that never happens.
quotes.author: W.B. Yeats

quotes.quote: If we will be quiet and ready enough, we shall find compensation in every disappointment.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: He had the look of one who had drunk the cup of life and found a dead beetle at the bottom.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: Never touch your idols: the gilding will stick to your fingers.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: I aimed at the public's heart, and by accident I hit it in the stomach.
quotes.author: Upton Sinclair

quotes.quote: Life is so constructed, that the event does not, cannot, will not, match the expectation.
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë

quotes.quote: Disappointments in love, even betrayals and losses, serve the soul at the very moment they seem in life to be tragedies. The soul is partly in time and partly in eternity. We might remember the part that resides in eternity when we feel despair over the part that is in life.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: But there were worse things than disappointment, and I'd lived through several of them already.
quotes.author: R.J. Anderson

quotes.quote: I embraced a cloud, but when I soared it rained.
quotes.author: Frank O'Hara

quotes.quote: People who don't expect justice don't have to suffer disappointment.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: You can devise all the plans in the world, but if you don’t welcome spontaneity; you will just disappoint yourself.
quotes.author: Abigail Biddinger

quotes.quote: Hope isn't destiny. Left passive its nothing more than disappointment deferred.
quotes.author: Bill Willingham

quotes.quote: Expectation has brought me disappointment. Disappointment has brought me wisdom. Acceptance, gratitude and appreciation have brought me joy and fulfillment.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: Disappointment is the nurse of wisdom.
quotes.author: Sir Boyle Roche

quotes.quote: We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret or disappointment.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Disenchantment, whether it is a minor disappointment or a major shock, is the signal that things are moving into transition in our lives.
quotes.author: William Throsby Bridges

quotes.quote: Maturity is a bitter disappointment for which no remedy exists, unless laughter could be said to remedy anything.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Depression begins with disappointment. When disappointment festers in our soul, it leads to discouragement.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don’t try.
quotes.author: Beverly Sills

quotes.quote: The sudden disappointment of a hope leaves a scar which the ultimate fulfillment of that hope never entirely removes.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: If you think one day you will get it all done, and then you can relax, you are bound to be disappointed.
quotes.author: Christina Winsey-Rudd

quotes.quote: Men marry because they are tired, women, because they are curious: both are disappointed.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Perfectionism rarely begets perfection, or satisfaction – only disappointment.
quotes.author: Ryan Holiday

quotes.quote: The beauty is that through disappointment you can gain clarity, and with clarity comes conviction and true originality.
quotes.author: Conan O’Brien

quotes.quote: Hope is tomorrow’s veneer over today’s disappointment.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Blessed is he that expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The principles of living greatly include the capacity to face trouble with courage, disappointment with cheerfulness, and trial with humility.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: There’s always failure. And there’s always disappointment. And there’s always loss. But the secret is learning from the loss, and realizing that none of those holes are vacuums.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is followed by disappointment and even depression, and then by renewed enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Murray Gell-Mann

quotes.quote: Sometimes Good Things Fall Apart So Better Things Can Fall Together.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: To courageously straighten up again after our heads have been bowed by defeat, disappointment and suffering is a supreme test of character.
quotes.author: Wilferd Peterson

quotes.quote: When we focus on our gratitude, the tide of disappointment goes out and the tide of love rushes in.
quotes.author: Kristin Armstrong

quotes.quote: A scheme of which every part promises delight, can never be successful; and general disappointment is only warded off by the defense of some little peculiar vexation.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: The price of excellence is discipline; the cost of mediocrity is disappointment.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Our role as leaders is to turn away from our disappointment and abandonment, and give ourselves to those with whom we still have influence.
quotes.author: Costa Mitchell

quotes.quote: Nothing in life has happened to you. It's happened for you. Every disappointment. Every wrong. Even every closed door has helped make you into who you are.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: God is the only source of hope that'll never disappoint. When we place our faith in him, he provides joy, peace, and hope that overflows.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: There is space within sisterhood for likeness and differences, for the subtle differences that challenge and delight; there is space for disappointment - and surprise.
quotes.author: Christine Downing

quotes.quote: It is cruel, you know, that music should be so beautiful. It has the beauty of loneliness of pain: of strength and freedom. The beauty of disappointment and never-satisfied love. The cruel beauty of nature and everlasting beauty of monotony.
quotes.author: Benjamin Britten

quotes.quote: My dad encouraged us to fail. Growing up, he would ask us what we failed at that week. If we didn't have something, he would be disappointed. It changed my mindset at an early age that failure is not the outcome, failure is not trying. Don't be afraid to fail.
quotes.author: Sara Blakely

quotes.quote: If you don’t encounter setbacks in your career, if you don’t have doubts and disappointments , let me tell you, you’re not dreaming big enough.
quotes.author: Michael Bloomberg

quotes.quote: Reality is the name we give to our disappointments.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Man alone is born crying, lives complaining, and dies disappointed.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: We are born crying, live complaining, and die disappointed.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: If you expect nothing from anybody, you’re never disappointed.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Never despair, but if you do, work on in despair.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Vote for the man who promises least; he’ll be the least disappointing.
quotes.author: Bernard M. Baruch

quotes.quote: I’d rather be pleasantly surprised than fatally disappointed.
quotes.author: Julia Glass

quotes.quote: It is not defeat that destroys you,it is being demoralized by defeat that destroy you.
quotes.author: Imran Khan

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is ego’s ultimate disappointment.
quotes.author: Chogyam Trungpa

quotes.quote: The disappointment of manhood succeeds the delusion of youth.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: One minute of sincere gratitude can wash away a lifetime’s disappointments.
quotes.author: Silvia Hartmann

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you get disappointment it makes you stronger.
quotes.author: Daid Rudisha

quotes.quote: Blessed is he who expects no gratitude, for he shall not be disappointed.
quotes.author: W.C. Bennett

quotes.quote: One of the best protections against disappointment is to have a lot going on.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: Opportunity is a favorable occasion for grasping a disappointment.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The prompter the refusal, the less the disappointment.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Mean spirits under disappointment, like small beer in a thunder- storm, always turn sour.
quotes.author: Randolph

quotes.quote: Only disaster can follow divided counsels and opposing wills.
quotes.author: Thomas John Barnardo

quotes.quote: To permit irresponsible authority is to sell disaster.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: A disaster where marble has been substituted for imagination.
quotes.author: Ada Louise Huxtable

quotes.quote: All natural disasters are comforting because they reaffirm our impotence, in which, otherwise, we might stop believing. At times it is strangely sedative to know the extent of your own powerlessness.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Disaster comes only because of ignorance.
quotes.author: Judah the Prince

quotes.quote: There is one thing we must appreciate about the disasters: They are perfectly just when they do their jobs!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Any disaster is a learning process.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: There's nothing like a jolly good disaster to get people to start doing something.
quotes.author: Prince Charles

quotes.quote: All Earthquakes and Disasters are warnings; there's too much corruption in the world.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: You have no control over natural disaster. That's what's scary about it. You're helpless. That feeling of helplessness is really scary.
quotes.author: R. L. Stine

quotes.quote: The disaster is not the money, although the money will be missed. The disaster is the disrespect â€“ this belief that the arts are dispensable, that they're not critical to a culture's existence.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: The minute you think you've got it made, disaster is just around the corner.
quotes.author: Joe Paterno

quotes.quote: Live disasters are wonderful attractions when you're safe on the other side of them.
quotes.author: Sara Paretsky

quotes.quote: Only after disaster can we be resurrected. It's only after you've lost everything that you're free to do anything. Nothing is static, everything is evolving, everything is falling apart.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Dread of disaster makes everybody act in the very way that increases the disaster.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Disasters are usually a good time to re-examine what we've done so far, what mistakes we've made, and what improvements should come next.
quotes.author: Dan Ariely

quotes.quote: Being frustrated is disagreeable, but the real disasters of life begin when you get what you want.
quotes.author: Irving Kristol

quotes.quote: A great disaster is a symbol to us to remember all the big things of life and forget the small things, of which we have thought too much.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: Disaster is rarely as pervasive as it seems from recorded accounts. The fact of being on the record makes it appear continuous and ubiquitous whereas it is more likely to have been sporadic both in time and place.
quotes.author: Barbara Tuchman

quotes.quote: Disaster is a natural part of my evolution toward tragedy and dissolution.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: If you worry about disaster all the time, that's what you're going to get.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Sometimes the biggest disasters aren't noticed at all â€“ no one's around to write horror stories.
quotes.author: Vernor Vinge

quotes.quote: It is not a disaster to be unable to capture your ideal, but it is a disaster to have no ideal to capture.
quotes.author: Benjamin E. Mays

quotes.quote: Even disasters, there are always disasters when you travel, can be turned into adventures.
quotes.author: Marilyn French

quotes.quote: There's no disaster that can't become a blessing, and no blessing that can't become a disaster.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: You have to jump into disaster with both feet.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: People are trying to decide whether the man-made disaster is worse than Mother Nature's disaster.
quotes.author: Larry Sabato

quotes.quote: Disasters teach us humility.
quotes.author: Anselm of Canterbury

quotes.quote: When faced with disaster, learn to laugh faster.
quotes.author: Robert G. Allen

quotes.quote: Any disaster you can survive is an improvement in your character, your stature, and your life.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: The credit of success is claimed by all, while a disaster is attributed to one alone.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The further we are from the last disaster, the closer we are to the next.
quotes.author: Daniel Silva

quotes.quote: Each disaster became a steppingstone for growth.
quotes.author: Erin Brockovich

quotes.quote: Famine and disaster, right there in front of you, and the more you watch, the less you do.
quotes.author: Jackson Browne

quotes.quote: If you put yourself in a group of people you cannot work with it's obviously going to be a disaster.
quotes.author: David Cronenberg

quotes.quote: Civilisation, the orderly world in which we live, is frail. We are skating on thin ice. There is a fear of a collective disaster. Terrorism, genocide, flu, tsunamis.
quotes.author: Zygmunt Bauman

quotes.quote: This is what happens when you fall in love. You're looking at a natural disaster.
quotes.author: Janet Fitch

quotes.quote: Our disasters have been some of the best things that ever happened to us. And what we swore were blessings have been some of the worst.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The disaster ruins everything, all the while leaving everything intact.
quotes.author: Maurice Blanchot

quotes.quote: Disaster and chaos are always good.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Sometimes it takes a natural disaster to reveal a social disaster.
quotes.author: Jim Wallis

quotes.quote: You can never be too far away from a disaster, because there is no disaster-free zone in this entire universe!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: To every life there are challenges and some happenings, which may come up as one continues the journey of making life worth it and achieving said tasks and goals.
quotes.author: Edward Kwarteng

quotes.quote: Being mindful of your state gives you the power to prove something against the challenges in your life.
quotes.author: Edward Kwarteng

quotes.quote: Challenges are less if we hold on to the power to resist the frustrations of our life.
quotes.author: Edward Kwarteng

quotes.quote: One way or the other, one can also overcome life and its challenges by aspiring to use the power, knowledge and wisdom given them from above.
quotes.author: Edward Kwarteng

quotes.quote: Every experience you have experienced were necessary to enable you see-through the responsibility in maturity.
quotes.author: Anyaele Sam Chiyson

quotes.quote: No matter the challenges you are going through, great people went through it and came out of it. You are coming out a success; you are a success.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: Those who do not have worthy struggles in their lives neve enjoy the pleasure of celebrating a hard-won victory.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: You need resilience not just for the hard times. You need resilience if you're going to be happy.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: When things get really hard, people pray.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: You are more powerful than your circumstances. They don't define you. You do.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: The story you tell yourself defines the life you live and the actions you take. It's important to tell yourself a positive story.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: While fear and worry can weaken or harden you, love transforms you and the people and situations around you.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: You don't have to wait to feel positive enough for a smile to happen. You can generate a positive feeling by smiling. Your smile can be the source of your positivity, not the result of it. Smile more today.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Challenges will come your way. But you must not lose faith or get discouraged by the temporary setbacks and roadblocks.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: Nothing is this world is impossible to accomplish if you are determined to pursue it. You have within you immense power, strength, and potential.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: Difficulties only make you aware of your strengths and bring out the best in you. They have made you who you are and have helped you reach where you are today.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: So come what may, never give up and never lose hope. No matter how big the troubles are, they cannot keep you down if your determination to get back on your feet is strong enough.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: When the chips are down and you are feeling worn out, give yourself a boost to get yourself back on track.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: Life has a beautiful way of teaching lessons through the challenges you face.
quotes.author: Jennifer Pullara

quotes.quote: Challenges are part of life and can redefine who you are.
quotes.author: Jennifer Pullara

quotes.quote: No one searches of adversity. Bad experiences is simply part of life.
quotes.author: Eileen S. Lenson

quotes.quote: Support is the secret sauce that helps us find forgiveness, courage, perspective, perseverance, and hope. Support helps us make changes in our thoughts, feelings, and behaviors, and increases the sense of control over our lives.
quotes.author: Eileen S. Lenson

quotes.quote: Gain strength through adversity simply means, what doesn't kill you, makes you stronger.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: When you face the adversity of challenging experiences head on you, you develop the skills, abilities, and strength, to face other adversities in the future.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: An action is always better than no action, and the right action will create more certainty and faith in your ability to take bigger risks.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: As tides of life rise and fall, life is constant, like the waves crashing upon the shore. Persistence is the key in high and low times.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: These 'problems' serve the purpose of giving students practice using computational skills in a context or situation.
quotes.author: Gojak

quotes.quote: In solving routine problems, the problem based on past experiences.
quotes.author: Gojak

quotes.quote: In solving routine problems, the learner reproduces and applies a known procedure. Problem solved!
quotes.author: Gojak

quotes.quote: Routine problems, or traditional 'story problems' involve situations in which the learner knows how to solve the problem based on past experiences.
quotes.author: Gojak

quotes.quote: Challenges and obstacles exist because we are called to learn something new to achieve goals.
quotes.author: Tony Fahkry

quotes.quote: But if we understand the underlying reason of our challenges, we can move through them with less discomfort.
quotes.author: Tony Fahkry

quotes.quote: Accepting your challenges opens the door to major breakthroughs, and the hidden opportunities surrounding them.
quotes.author: Tony Fahkry

quotes.quote: Success is due to our stretching to the challenges of life. Failure comes when we shrink from them.
quotes.author: John C Maxwell

quotes.quote: The key to accepting challenges lies in engaging your inner resolve and personal fortitude.
quotes.author: Tony Fahkry

quotes.quote: Acknowledging your challenges means to welcome what is taking place in your life, instead of pushing it away hoping it will resolve itself; it seldom does.
quotes.author: Tony Fahkry

quotes.quote: Those who are unprepared to handle challenges and adversity will become frustrated, discouraged, and are likely to give up long before their goals are achieved.
quotes.author: Donna Daisy

quotes.quote: When adversity occurs, you always have a choice. You can become helpless and give up, believing that nothing you do will make a difference. Or, you can choose to become empowered by acquiring the mindset, the lifestyle, and the skills.
quotes.author: Donna Daisy

quotes.quote: One of the biggest challenges we all face in our lives is continuing to work toward our goals when life throws obstacles in our paths, or when we just get discouraged.
quotes.author: Donna Daisy

quotes.quote: We also need a strong belief in our ability to respond effectively to life's challenges.
quotes.author: Donna Daisy

quotes.quote: Sometimes life is hard. How do you hang on when things seem hopeless? You can tackle your problems as you would climb a mountain.
quotes.author: Andrew Matthews

quotes.quote: Through hard times. It puts your life into perspective. It will get you back on track.
quotes.author: Andrew Matthews

quotes.quote: Some people fear the darkness of night when they should fear the darkness of the human heart.
quotes.author: P.W. Imel

quotes.quote: Tis not the darkness of the night one should fear but the darkness of our minds that should terrify us.
quotes.author: P.W. Imel

quotes.quote: When the darkness of death closes in, then you'll see the light.
quotes.author: P.W. Imel

quotes.quote: Life is full of setbacks. You cannot avoid them, no matter what you do, no matter who you are. The challenge is knowing how you an overcome your setback.
quotes.author: Rick McDaniel

quotes.quote: Though comeback are absolutely possible, it is important to understand and identify the reasons for you setback. You must begin with the setback before you can get to the comeback.
quotes.author: Rick McDaniel

quotes.quote: The setback doesn't mean we have to take a step back, nor does it mean we have to stay in the setback position.
quotes.author: Rick McDaniel

quotes.quote: The setback is so that you might sharpen your ax and be smarter the next time.
quotes.author: Rick McDaniel

quotes.quote: An important benefit to learning survival skills is it increases your self-confidence.
quotes.author: Jim Cobb

quotes.quote: Having the ability to not just think but know you have what it takes to survive can make the difference between a news story featuring your survival over incredible odds vs becoming just another tragic statistic.
quotes.author: Jim Cobb

quotes.quote: What does it mean to improvise in a survival scenario? Simply put, it is using what you have to get what you need.
quotes.author: Jim Cobb

quotes.quote: No matter how hard you prep, how much money you spend, and how many hours you invest, the disaster always calls the shots.
quotes.author: Jim Cobb

quotes.quote: With a little resourcefulness and an 'outside of the survival box' mentality, you can oftentimes use what you do have to get what you need.
quotes.author: Jim Cobb

quotes.quote: In survival terms we might say that comfort only gets in the way.
quotes.author: Larry Dean Olsen

quotes.quote: The most important part of discernment is pinpointing the forces to be reckoned with, both the constructive and destructive.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: There are things you have to hear but you would never hear it from the person whom you would like to hear it from, but don't be deaf to hear it from the person who says it with his heart!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You are only as strong as your purpose, therefore let us choose reasons to act that are big, bold, righteous and eternal.
quotes.author: Barry Munro

quotes.quote: When a person goes into a relationship emotionally needy, they are not going to have discernment in choosing people.
quotes.author: Jennifer O'Neill

quotes.quote: It has always seemed that a fear of judgment is the mark of guilt and the burden of insecurity.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Intelligence is not discernment and judgment or critical evaluation.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: We need discernment in what we see and what we hear and what we believe.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: We should not fret for what is past, nor should we be anxious about the future; men of discernment deal only with the present moment.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: Whoever believes in the good in people, draws forth the good in people.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: Discernment is a power of the understanding in which few excel. Is not that owing to its connection with impartiality and truth? For are not prejudice and partiality blind?
quotes.author: Fulke Greville 1st Baron Brooke

quotes.quote: Judgment is discernment on a bad hair day.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: Yet you must not cling to the words of the old sages either; they, too, may not be right. Even if you believe them, you should be alert so that, in the event that something superior comes along, you may follow that.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.quote: Distrust your judgment the moment you can discern the shadow of a personal motive in it.
quotes.author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: Need to be smart by existing. Need to be wise by living.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Discernment is the son of good judgment and the father of self-control. When mixed with an already clear conscience, the ability to read the true motives of a critic keeps one's conscience both clear and at ease.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Even though, No one is infallible. However, spend much effort in making yourself better. Stand out! Don't follow the masses. It produces results
quotes.author: Samuel Asumadu-Sarkodie

quotes.quote: Let discernment in matters of fashion and entertainment determine who should get the vote, and half the country would be disenfranchised.
quotes.author: Howard Jacobson

quotes.quote: Sound judgement, with discernment is the best of seers.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: There seems to be no part of knowledge in fewer hands than that of discerning when to have done.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Don't try to win over the haters. You're not the jackass whisperer.
quotes.author: Scott Stratten

quotes.quote: No matter your Knowledge, Power, Fame or Wealth, Tommorrow is always a Mystery
quotes.author: Samuel Asumadu-Sarkodie

quotes.quote: The discernment of a vocation is above all the fruit of an intimate dialogue between the Lord and his disciples. Young people, if they know how to pray, can be trusted to know what to do with God's call.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: True discernment means not only distinguishing the right from the wrong; it means distinguishing the primary from the secondary, the essential from the indifferent, and the permanent from the transient. And, yes, it means distinguishing between the good and the better, and even between the better and the best.
quotes.author: Sinclair B. Ferguson

quotes.quote: It's not at all hard to understand a person; it's only hard to listen without bias.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Her great merit is finding out mine; there is nothing so amiable as discernment.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Everywhere we look, ideology slouches along the freeways and autoroutes, sometimes carrying a cross, sometimes a sickle, sometimes a crescent, but always busy doing somebody in somewhere, somehow.
quotes.author: Robert Carroll

quotes.quote: Discernment is trust put into practice.
quotes.author: Peter Santos

quotes.quote: Discernment is not a matter of telling the difference between right and wrong; rather it is telling the difference between right and almost right.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Where there is not discernment, the behavior even of the purest soul may in effect amount to coarseness.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The practice of discernment is part of higher consciousness. Discernment is not just a step up from judgment. In life's curriculum, it is the opposite of judgment. Through judgment a man reveals what he needs to confront and learn. Through discernment, one reveals what he has mastered.
quotes.author: Glenda Green

quotes.quote: Seeing reality for what it is is what we call discernment. The work of discernment is very hard.
quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.quote: Discernment is God's call to intercession, never to faultfinding.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Discipline is the soul of an army. It makes small numbers formidable; procures success to the weak, and esteem to all.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: A disciplined mind leads to happiness, and an undisciplined mind leads to suffering.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: Discipline imposed from the outside eventually defeats when it is not matched by desire from within.
quotes.author: Dawson Trotman

quotes.quote: My father liked me, when I wasna being an idiot. And he loved me, too -- enough to beat the daylights out of me when I was being an idiot. Jamie Fraser
quotes.author: Diana Gabaldon

quotes.quote: Discipline is the difference between what you want now and what you want most.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: If we don't discipline ourselves, the world will do it for us.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: Discipline is the soul of an army. It makes small numbers formidable; procures success to the weak and esteem to all.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: The only discipline that lasts is self-discipline.
quotes.author: Bum Philips

quotes.quote: You can never conquer the mountain. You can only conquer yourself.
quotes.author: Jim Whittaker

quotes.quote: Discipline is the refining fire by which talent becomes ability.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Discipline is remembering what you want.
quotes.author: David Campbell

quotes.quote: For every disciplined effort there is a multiple reward.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: With self-discipline most anything is possible.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Lack of discipline leads to frustration and self-loathing.
quotes.author: Marie Chapian

quotes.quote: If I want to be great I have to win the victory over myself... self-discipline.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.quote: Discipline must come through liberty. . . . We do not consider an individual disciplined only when he has been rendered as artificially silent as a mute and as immovable as a paralytic. He is an individual annihilated, not disciplined.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: Without discipline, there's no life at all.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: Right discipline consists, not in external compulsion, but in the habits of mind which lead spontaneously to desirable rather than undesirable activities.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Discipline is wisdom and vice versa.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: Discipline is simply the art of making the soldiers fear their officers more than the enemy
quotes.author: Claude Adrien Helvetius

quotes.quote: Discipline is based on pride, on meticulous attention to details, and on mutual respect and confidence. Discipline must be a habit so ingrained that it is stronger than the excitement of the goal or the fear of failure.
quotes.author: Gary Ryan Blair

quotes.quote: Discipline and concentration are a matter of being interested.
quotes.author: Tom Kite

quotes.quote: Discipline in art is a fundamental struggle to understand oneself, as much as to understand what one is drawing.
quotes.author: Henry Moore

quotes.quote: A discipline I have observed is an attitude of love and reverence to people.
quotes.author: Bessie Head

quotes.quote: No man is fit to command another that cannot command himself.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: One discipline always leads to another discipline.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Some people regard discipline as a chore. For me, it is a kind of order that sets me free to fly.
quotes.author: Julie Andrews

quotes.quote: If you will discipline yourself to make your mind self-sufficient you will thereby be least vulnerable to injury from the outside.
quotes.author: Critias Of Athens

quotes.quote: No man is such a conqueror, as the one that has defeated himself.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Loving discipline encourages a child to respect other people and live as a responsible, constructive citizen.
quotes.author: Dr. James Dobson

quotes.quote: Self-command is the main discipline.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Self discipline is when your conscience tells you to do something and you don't talk back.
quotes.author: W. K. Hope

quotes.quote: Discipline yourself to do the things you need to do when you need to do them, and the day will come when you will be able to do the things you want to do when you want to do them!
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: When you discipline yourself to do what is hard, you gain access to a realm of results that are denied everyone else. The willingness to do what is difficult is like having a key to a special private treasure room.
quotes.author: Steve Pavlina

quotes.quote: He who lives without discipline dies without honor.
quotes.author: Icelandic Proverb

quotes.quote: Discipline and commitment is pathway to reach goals and dreams.
quotes.author: Dr Anil Kr Sinha

quotes.quote: Discipline is not a virtue, but the solicitor of virtuous character.
quotes.author: Colby Tatem

quotes.quote: The discipline that is needed in our lives is the discipline that comes from within.
quotes.author: Gordon Hinkley

quotes.quote: Discipline trains you to put up with disappointments, every rose has a thorn.
quotes.author: Sri Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.quote: Discipline is just choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
quotes.author: Augusta F. Kantra

quotes.quote: Discipline is doing what needs to be done even though you don't want to.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Discipline is the foundation of a successful and happy life.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: When grandparents enter the door, discipline flies out the window.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Without discipline the Army would just be a bunch of guys wearing the same color clothing.
quotes.author: Frank Burns

quotes.quote: Discipline doesn't break a child's spirit half as often as the lack of it breaks a parent's heart.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Discipline and constant work are the whetstones upon which the dull knife of talent is honed until it becomes sharp enough, hopefully, to cut through even the toughest meat and gristle.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: My left hand is my bad hand. I spank it with my right hand. You might call it clapping, but I call it discipline.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Discipline imposed from the outside eventually defeats when it is not matched by desire from within.
quotes.author: Dawson Earle Trotman

quotes.quote: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Discipline is choosing between what you want now, and what you want most.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Discipline is the foundation upon which all success is built. Lack of discipline inevitably leads to failure.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The ability to discipline yourself to delay gratification in the short term in order to enjoy greater rewards in the long term, is the indispensable prerequisite for success.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: One can have no smaller or greater mastery than mastery of oneself.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: It was character that got us out of bed, commitment that moved us into action, and discipline that enabled us to follow through.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Rule your mind or it will rule you.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Discipline must be a habit so ingrained that it is stronger than the excitement of battle.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: The best time to set up a new discipline is when the idea is strong.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret or disappointment.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Self-mastery and self-discipline are the foundation of good relationships with others.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: You cannot be disciplined in great things and undisciplined in small things.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: Disciplining yourself to do what you know is right and important, although difficult, is the highroad to pride, self-esteem, and personal satisfaction.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Respect your efforts, respect yourself. Self-respect leads to self-discipline. When you have both firmly under your belt, that's real power.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: The great end of education is, to discipline rather than to furnish the mind; to train it to the use of its own powers, rather than fill it with the accumulation of others.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: The price of excellence is discipline. The cost of mediocrity is disappointment.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Self-respect is the fruit of discipline; the sense of dignity grows with the ability to say no to oneself.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: Self-disciplined begins with the mastery of your thoughts. If you don't control what you think, you can't control what you do. Simply, self-discipline enables you to think first and act afterward.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: All excellence involves discipline and tenacity of purpose.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: Talent without discipline is like an octopus on roller skates.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: But the discipline you have in your life should be one determined by your own desires and your own needs, not put upon you by society or authority.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Effective leadership is putting first things first. Effective management is discipline, carrying it out.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: The discipline of writing something down is the first step toward making it happen.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: If we are to have such a discipline we must have standards, and to get our standards under existing conditions we must have criticism.
quotes.author: Irving Babbitt

quotes.quote: No evil propensity of the human heart is so powerful that it may not be subdued by discipline.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The secret of discipline is motivation. When a man is sufficiently motivated, discipline will take care of itself.
quotes.author: Alexander Paterson

quotes.quote: I think of discipline as the continual everyday process of helping a child learn self-discipline.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter what you're trying to accomplish. It's all a matter of discipline. I was determined to discover what life held for me beyond the inner-city streets.
quotes.author: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.quote: The steady discipline of intimate friendship with Jesus results in men becoming like Him.
quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.quote: Endurance is one of the most difficult disciplines but it is to the one who endures that the final victory comes.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Self-discipline is the ability to make yourself do what you should do, when you should do it, whether you feel like it or not.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Success isn't measured by money or power or social rank. Success is measured by your discipline and inner peace.
quotes.author: Mike Ditka

quotes.quote: Disco existed before we were all born and will exist afterwards. It is a ritual - it is a celebration - and it is the same kind of music that we call disco or rock'n'roll or a whole list of names that we can call it. Call it what you will, nothing will change the fact that certain kinds of music will make you want to celebrate or party.
quotes.author: Grace Jones

quotes.quote: Disco music in the '70s was just a call to go wild and party and dance with no thought or conscience or regard for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Martha Reeves

quotes.quote: Disco was like the celebration of music through dance and my God! When you heard the music sometimes it was like, if you don't get up and dance, you aren't human!
quotes.author: Grace Jones

quotes.quote: I like mindless disco... they say the lyrics are stupid and repetitious. So what's wrong with that? So is lying in the sun. Not everything has to be serious.
quotes.author: Lou Reed

quotes.quote: Disco deserved a better name, a beautiful name because it was a beautiful art form. It made the consumer beautiful. The consumer was the star.
quotes.author: Barry White

quotes.quote: I could be religious, if they sang the hymns to disco.
quotes.author: Adam Ant

quotes.quote: Disco is the best floor show in town. It's very democratic, boys with boys, girls with girls, girls with boys, blacks and whites, capitalists and Marxists, Chinese and everything else, all in one big mix.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: Disco is a major influence in the world of fashion. It is a dynamic factor in contemporary advertising. It is a message from every consumer that there has been a rediscovery of America's greatest by-product: fun.
quotes.author: Neil Bogart

quotes.quote: I was stranded in Disco. I went to dozens of darkened places with enough flashing lights to drive the average person mad. I felt lost in the pulse of sheer panic.
quotes.author: Martha Reeves

quotes.quote: A glittering disco ball spins from the ceiling, but the music is something I've never heard, discordant and haunting and insistent, the kind of music that demands you dance.
quotes.author: Candace Bushnell

quotes.quote: Disco is music for dancing, and people will always want to dance.
quotes.author: Giorgio Moroder

quotes.quote: God had to create disco music so I could be born and be successful.
quotes.author: Donna Summer

quotes.quote: So, have you heard about the oyster who went to a disco and pulled a mussel?
quotes.author: Billy Connolly

quotes.quote: I hate labels because it should be just music. I don't see anything wrong with disco. Call it anything. It's music.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: I'm from the disco era where everybody thought they were John Travolta... What song is going to get me on the dance floor? Anything from 'Saturday Night Fever,' and you're up there like a demon.
quotes.author: Ian Mcshane

quotes.quote: A wise man once said, never discuss philosophy or politics in a disco environment.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: I feel the same way about disco as I do about herpes.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: I was thinking the other day that there will never be another form of music that everybody has to respond to - like disco.
quotes.author: Daniel Clowes

quotes.quote: Disco will never be over. It will always live in our minds and hearts. Something like this that was this big, and this important, and this great, will never die. Oh for a few years, maybe many years it will be considered passe and ridiculous. It will be misrepresented, caricatured and sneered at, or worse, completely ignored. People will laugh about John Travolta, Olivia Newton John, white polyester suits and platform shoes and going like this! [Mimics Saturday Night Fever pose] But we had nothing to do with those things and still loved disco. Those who didn't understand will never understand. Disco was much more, and much better than all that. Disco was too great and too much fun to be gone forever. It has got to come back someday. I just hope it will be in our own lifetimes.
quotes.author: Matt Keeslar as Josh Neff in The Last Days of Disco

quotes.quote: Disco's are tricky. You look a total wally if you dance too early but after one crucial song tips the disco over, you look a sad saddo if you don't.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: We enjoy change and freshness, and disco was only one area we've delved into.
quotes.author: Barry Gibb

quotes.quote: Disco dancing is just the steady thump of a giant moron knocking in an endless nail.
quotes.author: Clive James

quotes.quote: Disco satisfied social as well as musical needs. Disco people got to dress up all the time and go to places ... where everybody sort of 'looked good' - and later, after an evening of chemical alteration, everybody looked even better, and the next thing they knew, they were getting The Blox Job.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Too many of these writers in the music papers, they are misunderstanding everything. The disco sound is not art or anything so serious.
quotes.author: Giorgio Moroder

quotes.quote: I've always gravitated towards the beats, obviously. And when I was growing up, I always loved funk music or even - dare I say it - disco.
quotes.author: Tommy Lee

quotes.quote: Disco is just pop music you can dance to.
quotes.author: Sheena Easton

quotes.quote: We had been reminded once too often that we were just not with it. Where they had long hair and Woodstock, we had nothing to clearly call our own. We needed a kind of shared activity, scorned by our elders, which would bring us together as a group. At the disco, we have forged a generational banner. It's great to feel special at last.
quotes.author: Bruce Pollack

quotes.quote: At an incredibly divisive point in pop history, Donna Summer managed to create an undeniable across-the-board experience of mass pleasure - after 'Bad Girls,' nobody ever tried claiming disco sucked again. It set the template for what Michael Jackson would do a few months later with 'Off The Wall.'
quotes.author: Rob Sheffield

quotes.quote: When we made “Love to Love You Baby,” we knew it was somewhat innovative, but nobody knew people would jump on that bandwagon and all of a sudden the whole world would be going disco.
quotes.author: Donna Summer

quotes.quote: I want to give [my records] all away before some fool plays disco at my funeral, and then the record gets stuck, and nobody can tell, and the service goes on forever!
quotes.author: Robert Patrick

quotes.quote: When I went to high school, in the late 1970s, disco was in full swing and anyone who was into it dressed the part. I know I did.
quotes.author: Paul Feig

quotes.quote: Disco is funky when you take one record at a time. It's just that they narrowed it down to one beat to try to corner the market on a particular music. And when you do that with rhythm - talk about something that will get on your nerves. Try to make love with one stroke. Somebody will tell you to fax it in.
quotes.author: George Clinton

quotes.quote: The worst part of being gay in the twentieth century is all that damn disco music to which one has to listen.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: I've been in every disco in the world. I saw a picture of my wife Shakira and I dancing in Studio 54; I didn't even know someone had taken that picture.
quotes.author: Michael Caine

quotes.quote: (On disco) I don't consider that a genre as much as a level of hell.
quotes.author: J.M. Hushour

quotes.quote: La Flavour's 'Mandolay' is a disco classic - I dare you to sit still while listening to it.
quotes.author: RuPaul

quotes.quote: In pop or rock you can make a fast song or a slow one, but in disco there is really just the one rhythm.
quotes.author: Giorgio Moroder

quotes.quote: Disco music is funk with a bow tie.
quotes.author: Fred Wesley

quotes.quote: Disco is from hell, okay? And not the cool part of hell with all the murderers, but the lame ass part where the really bad accountants live.
quotes.author: Danny Masterson as Hyde in That '70s Show

quotes.quote: Disco is the first technology music. And what I mean is that 'disco' music is named after discs, because when technology grew to where they didn't need a band in the clubs, the DJ played it on a disc.
quotes.author: Will.I.Am

quotes.quote: White kids in Philadelphia could dance, they danced on American Bandstand, but disco changed the business of music. There’s a big difference between people dancing at parties, or in clubs, to becoming an international explosion.
quotes.author: Bethann Hardison

quotes.quote: The thing which really killed partner dancing was Saturday Night Fever. Disco was originally an underground dance, done mainly by Hispanics, blacks and gays, who could really do partner dancing. They were incredible, but that was an underground thing. Then when Saturday Night Fever came out, the masses flocked to the clubs to experience what they saw in the movie. But what they thought the Hustle was was freestyle, because that's what John Travolta did.
quotes.author: Maria Torres

quotes.quote: Disco is just jitterbug.
quotes.author: Fred Astaire

quotes.quote: I was out in the clubs in New York City in 1971, ‘72, feeling the pulse, knowing what was going on. I saw them setting up D.J. booths in closets—taking the top half of the door off, putting in a plank of wood, and that’s what [the D.J.] put his turntable on.
quotes.author: Gloria Gaynor

quotes.quote: Disco sucks? You never heard that from me.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.quote: After Saturday Night Fever, we wanted to do a poster, with the three of us in Rambo’s bodies, with machine guns, and in the background there’d be a body in a white suit, bullet-ridden, and the mirror ball all shot to pieces.
quotes.author: Maurice Gibb

quotes.quote: I love to dance in the disco, but that's about it.
quotes.author: Heather Mills

quotes.quote: The disco beat was created so that white people could dance.
quotes.author: Bethann Hardison

quotes.quote: Disco was brand new then and there were a few jocks that had monstrous sound systems but they wouldn't dare play this kind of music. They would never play a record where only two minutes of the song was all it was worth. They wouldn't buy those types of records.
quotes.author: Grandmaster Flash

quotes.quote: I love Donna Summer, and I love ABBA. I love late '70s disco. I love the Bee Gees. I just love that period of recording.
quotes.author: Taylor Hawkins

quotes.quote: People are embarrassed by disco, but I love it.
quotes.author: Ty Segall

quotes.quote: I'm a sucker for sad disco pop.
quotes.author: Sophie Ellis Bextor

quotes.quote: I love a lot of old disco because it's aerodynamic, smooth, and very seductive.
quotes.author: Jens Lekman

quotes.quote: I grew up in the seventies and disco was big. That influenced me the most.
quotes.author: Ice Cube

quotes.quote: Never be discouraged because good things get on so slowly here; and never fail daily to do that good which lies next to your hand.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: We've all got both light and dark inside us. What matters is the part we choose to act on. That's who we really are.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Don't let life discourage you; everyone who got where he is had to begin where he was.
quotes.author: Richard L. Evans

quotes.quote: Thousands of successful people did not achieve success on their first try, but they were not discouraged. They picked themselves up and went back at it with an even stronger, single minded tenacity to achieve their goal.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Do not be discouraged if your plans do not succeed the first time. No one learns to walk by taking only one step.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: Discouragement is root of distress.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Every wrong attempt discarded is another step forward.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: When things are a disappointment, try not to be so discouraged.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.quote: Don't get discouraged, and think positive all the time. Don't get down on yourself if you lose out a couple of times. It's just a lot of hard work.
quotes.author: Larisa Oleynik

quotes.quote: Discouragement comes when things are going great, and it comes when we are already down, but no matter when it comes, it hurts
quotes.author: Jennifer Waddle

quotes.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Don't worry about failures, worry about the chances you miss when you don't even try.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: You can be discouraged by failure, or you can learn from it. So go ahead and make mistakes, make all you can. Because, remember that's where you'll find success - on the far side of failure.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: Don't let people discourage you from living your dreams.
quotes.author: David DeNotaris

quotes.quote: You measure the size of the accomplishment by the obstacles you had to overcome to reach your goals.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: Discouragement is not the absence of adequacy but the absence of courage.
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: People who accomplish big things in life must face naysayers who try to discourage them.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
quotes.author: Kyle Chandler

quotes.quote: Negative people can only infest you with discouragements when they find you around. Just get lost and get saved!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: If you feel discouraged by seeing progress in others and are tempted to give up, stop. Forget comparing yourself to others or pre-set ideals.
quotes.author: M. Ahlers

quotes.quote: Disappointment is really just a term for our refusal to look on the bright side.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Don't be discouraged by a failure. It can be a positive experience. Failure is, in a sense, the highway to success, inasmuch as every discovery of what is false leads us to seek earnestly after what is true, and every fresh experience points out some.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: What is important is to believe in something so strongly that you're never discouraged.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.quote: When you get discouraged or depressed, try changing your attitude from negative to positive and see how life can change for you.
quotes.author: Franco Harris

quotes.quote: Don't accept discouragement, keep going! Less stress will result by not allowing discouragement to be your attitude!
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.quote: Everybody is going to have their critics. It's easy to get discouraged in life.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Being discouraged can cause you to lose hope, you need to pick yourself up, focus on the positive and find success by taking action - you may then find your discouragement fading.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: A problem is a chance for your to do your best.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: Living in the present moment, we feel encouraged and motivated in our lives; we sit on solid ground and are not easily knocked off our balance into discouragement and negativity.
quotes.author: James Adler

quotes.quote: Do not be discouraged if someone copies you. Copying is a compliment - you are doing it right. It also gives you the opportunity to grow and move beyond what is now being copied. Keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Lose of hope leads to discouragement.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: If you fall sometimes, you must not be discouraged.
quotes.author: Teresa of Avila

quotes.quote: One of the main effects of war, after all, is that people are discouraged from being characters.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Don't get discouraged; it is often the last key in the bunch that opens the lock.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you are discouraged it is a sign of pride, because it shows you trust in your own powers.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Every child comes with the message that God is not yet discouraged of man.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Suffering, failure, loneliness, sorrow, discouragement, and death will be part of your journey, but the Kingdom of God will conquer all these horrors. No evil can resist grace forever.
quotes.author: Brennan Manning

quotes.quote: In spite of discouragement and adversity, those who are happiest seem to have a way of learning from difficult times, becoming stronger, wiser and happier as a result.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Discouragement is simply the despair of wounded self-love.
quotes.author: Francois Fenelon

quotes.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Discouragement seizes us only when we can no longer count on chance.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: I think a big test we all face in life on a regular basis is that discouragement test. Life's not always fair, but I believe if you keep doing the right thing, God will get you to where you are.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Discouragement is a negative emotion with more than one trick up its dark sleeve. It tricks you into mentally or emotionally dwelling in the very place you want to leave. Drop all such sorrow permanently by daring to see through this deception of the unconscious mind. You have a destination far beyond where you find yourself standing today
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: Discouragement Can be temporary-or it can destroy our life. The choice is ours. If we refuse to deal with discouragement head-on, we are opening the door for it to completely dominate our life.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: Stones of judgment, discouragement or doubt may be thrown at you. You can't stop them, but you can make the choice to keep your walls up and not let them affect you.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Discouragement is contagious and is easily transmitted to others.
quotes.author: Max Anders

quotes.quote: The greatest source of discouragement is the conviction that one is unable to do something.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: When we yield to discouragement it is usually because we give too much thought to the past and to the future.
quotes.author: Therese of Lisieux

quotes.quote: If you are going through a time of discouragement, there is a time or great personal growth ahead.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: Disappointments will come and go, but discouragement is a choice that you make.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: Nobody else can make us discouraged; it is a choice that we alone make when facing disappointments.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: For every discouragement has been allowed to come to us in order that through it we may be cast in utter helplessness at the Saviour's feet.
quotes.author: Alan Redpath

quotes.quote: Stay the course. keep believing. You may be tired discouraged and tempted tobe frustrated but don't give up on your future.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Let no feeling of discouragement prey upon you, and in the end you are sure to succeed.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: A feeling of discouragement when you slip up is a sure sign that you put your faith in deeds.
quotes.author: Ahmad ibn Ajiba

quotes.quote: Disappointments are inevitable; discouragement is a choice.
quotes.author: Therese of Lisieux

quotes.quote: Don't get discouraged, and think positive all the time. Don't get down on yourself if you lose out a couple of times. It's just a lot of hard work.
quotes.author: Larisa Oleynik

quotes.quote: If you are discouraged it is a sign of pride, because it shows you trust in your own powers.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Discouragement is the cancer of great things.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Do not be discouraged if your plans do not succeed the first time. No one learns to walk by taking only one step.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Don't accept discouragement, keep going! Less stress will result by not allowing discouragement to be your attitude!
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Is encouragement what the poet needs? Open question. Maybe he needs discouragement. In fact, quite a few of them need more discouragement, the most discouragement possible.
quotes.author: Robert Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: An obstacle is not a discouragement. It may become one, but only with our own consent. So long as we refuse to be discouraged, we cannot be discouraged.
quotes.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quotes.quote: Frustration, discouragement, and depression mean you are working against yourself.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: When discouragement comes, don't stop. Dig deep and fight it through!
quotes.author: T. B. Joshua

quotes.quote: You can be whatever you want to be. Don't let discouragement take you down.
quotes.author: Fawad Afzal Khan

quotes.quote: Disappointment, discouragement, and despair are nothing but the bitter fruit of an unfulfilled expectation allowed to live beyond its time.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: Disappointment is inevitable. But to become discouraged, there's a choice I make. God would never discourage me. He would always point me to himself to trust him. Therefore, my discouragement is from Satan. As you go through the emotions that we have, hostility is not from God, bitterness, unforgiveness, all of these are attacks from Satan.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: Trouble has no necessary connection with discouragement. Discouragement has a germ of its own, as different from trouble as arthritis is different from a stiff joint.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Discouragement is not the absence of adequacy but the absence of courage.
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Discouragement, fear, doubt, lack of self-confidence, are the germs which have killed the prosperity and happiness of tens of thousands of people.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: The remedy for discouragement is the Word of God. When you feed your heart and mind with its truth, you regain your perspective and find renewed strength.
quotes.author: Warren Wiersbe

quotes.quote: Discouragement is of all ages: In youth it is a presentiment, in old age a remembrance.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Don't be discouraged by a failure. It can be a positive experience. Failure is, in a sense, the highway to success, inasmuch as every discovery of what is false leads us to seek earnestly after what is true, and every fresh experience points out some form of error which we shall afterwards carefully avoid.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Negative people can only infest you with discouragements when they find you around... Just get lost and get saved!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Never be discouraged. The fact that you will be a winner at the first attempt is unclear. You don't get master's degree after attending school on the first day. You got to endure till you get there.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: In a sense, discouragement does not have to exist. Allow it to be rather the encouragement to honestly reconsider all the options, then, as necessary, shine on.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: If you fear doing something, don't discourage others who are doing it.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quotes.quote: Never try to discourage thinking, for you are sure to succeed.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Discouragement is the illegitimate child of false expectations! Loyd Ogilive.
quotes.author: Lane Adams

quotes.quote: Discouragement is like a scorpion in your shoe; it takes courage to toss it out so you can move on.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Don't be discouraged by life's difficulties. With hope and determination, you can triumph over any difficulties.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: If you're feeling discouraged and defeatedâ€”don't quit. Play on, hope on, and move forward. The music you playâ€”even in the midst of incredible darknessâ€”can and will turn the tide of your own battles.
quotes.author: Seth Adam Smith

quotes.quote: Never let the words of discouragement from others sway you away from reaching far with your dreams.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Discouragement tricks you into mentally or emotionally dwelling in the very place you want to leave.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: Pay little attention to discouragement as possible. Plough ahead as a steamer does, rough or smooth - rain or shine. To carry your cargo and make your port is the point.
quotes.author: Maltbie Davenport Babcock

quotes.quote: Some people become fully discouraged in life because of their series of mistakes and failures; while others succeed by consistently learning from theirs.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: It is discouraging how many people are shocked by honesty and how few by deceit.
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.quote: Disappointment focuses on â€˜what is not,' and completely misses the far greater reality of â€˜what now is.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Discouragement is root of distress.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Lose of hope leads to discouragement.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Discouragement is the cancer of great things.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: If you're trying to invent something new, you're going to reach a lot of discouraging points, and most people give up.
quotes.author: Steve Lacy

quotes.quote: Never discourage anyone who continually makes progress, no matter how slow even if that someone is yourself!
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Many discouraging hours will arise before the rainbow of accomplished goals will appear on the horizon.
quotes.author: Haile Selassie

quotes.quote: Discouragement comes when things are going great, and it comes when we are already down, but no matter when it comes, it hurts.
quotes.author: Jennifer Waddle

quotes.quote: To be discouraged is to view that which is current as a condition that will always be. The process of turning discouragement into renewal and a vision of accomplishment is to utilize aspects of what didn't yield results into a refined attempt to begin afresh. It is not the world's problem that discouragement is experienced; it is more that one chooses to allow circumstances to dictate one's future.
quotes.author: Theodore W. Higgingsworth

quotes.quote: Do not be discouraged if your plans do not succeed the first time. No one learns to walk by taking only one step.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: A discouring teacher is more dangerous than a brainless ignorant.
quotes.author: Jhilik Chakraborty

quotes.quote: No matter how discouraged we get, God has not asked us to do the impossible.
quotes.author: George Grace

quotes.quote: Don't be discouraged by a failure. It can be a positive experience. Failure is, in a sense, the highway to success, inasmuch as every discovery of what is false leads us to seek earnestly after what is true, and every fresh experience points out some.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Being discouraged is natural but giving up is not an option.
quotes.author: Court Young

quotes.quote: Don't be discouraged if the answer to your prayer does not come immediately. Study, ponder, and pray, sincerely having faith, and live the commandments.
quotes.author: Joseph B Withrlin

quotes.quote: Within the soil of a discouraging season can often be the seeds of incredible blessing, miracles and breakthrough!
quotes.author: Brian Houston

quotes.quote: Don't get discouraged from all the rejection.
quotes.author: Joey King

quotes.quote: Many feel discouraged because they have not measured up to their potential.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: It's discouraging to make a mistake, but it's humiliating when you find out you're so unimportant that nobody noticed it.
quotes.author: Chuck Daly

quotes.quote: Nothing is more discouraging than unappreciated sarcasm.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A man can get discouraged many times but he is not a failure until he begins to blame somebody else and stops trying.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: Don't be discouraged. It's often the last key in the bunch that opens the lock.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Don't be discouraged by your incapacity to dispel darkness from the world. Light your little candle and step forward.
quotes.author: Mata Amritanandamayi

quotes.quote: Seeds of discouragement will not grow in the thankful heart.
quotes.author: Anonymous
