quotes.quote: Disobedience to authority is one of the most natural and healthy acts.
quotes.author: Antonio Negri

quotes.quote: If obedience invariably leads to cruelty, disobedience is our moral duty.
quotes.author: Martin Firrell

quotes.quote: Mass civil disobedience can use rage as a constructive and creative force.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Civil disobedience is a viable political tactic, and a non-violent tactic.
quotes.author: William Kunstler

quotes.quote: Civil disobedience can never be in general terms, such as for independence.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Disobedience is the true foundation of liberty. The obedient must be slaves.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Civil disobedience becomes a sacred duty when the state becomes lawless or corrupt.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Civil disobedience is a lever which can move the world by using peace as a fulcrum.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Disobedience happens not when we think too much grace but when we think too little of it.
quotes.author: Tullian Tchividjian

quotes.quote: Civil disobedience is the only nonviolent escape from the soul-destroying heat of violence.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You only find yourself when you disobey. Disobedience is the beginning of responsibility, I think.
quotes.author: Guillermo Del Toro

quotes.quote: Disobedience to conscience is voluntary; bad poetry, on the other hand, is usually not made on purpose.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Complete civil disobedience is a state of peaceful rebellion, a refusal to obey every single state-made law.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Individual civil disobedience was everybody's inherent right, like the right of self-defence in normal life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You must disobey an order, if the order is unfair, or inhuman. Disobedience is not something we are being taught.
quotes.author: Roselyne Bosch

quotes.quote: God is responsible for the consequences of our obedience, WE are responsible for the consequences of our disobedience.
quotes.author: Charles F. Stanley

quotes.quote: Human history began with an act of disobedience and it is not unlikely that it will be terminated by an act of obedience.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: A good person will resist an evil system with his whole soul. Disobedience of the laws of an evil state is therefore a duty.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Civil disobedience presupposes willing obedience of our self-imposed rules, and without it civil disobedience would be a cruel joke.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Disobedience, the rarest and most courageous of the virtues, is seldom distinguished from neglect, the laziest and commonest of the vices.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Civil disobedience is not something outside the realm of democracy. Democracy requires civil disobedience. Without civil disobedience democracy does not exist.
quotes.author: Howard Zinn

quotes.quote: The act of civil disobedience is the act of taking our anger and turning it into sacred rage. It is a personal and collective gesture of resistance and insistance.
quotes.author: Terry Tempest Williams

quotes.quote: Civil disobedience becomes a sacred duty when the state has become lawless or corrupt. And a citizen who barters with such a state shares in its corruption and lawlessness.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Disobedience, in the eyes of any one who has read history, is human's original virtue. It is through disobedience that progress has been made, through disobedience and through rebellion.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Civil disobedience is not only the natural right of a people, especially when they have no effective voice in their own Government, but that it is also a substitute for violence or armed rebellion.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Civil disobedience has an honourable history, and when the urgency and moral clarity cross a certain threshold, then I think that civil disobedience is quite understandable, and it has a role to play.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: Disobedience is essentially a prideful power struggle against someone in authority over us. It can be a parent, a priesthood leader, a teacher, or ultimately God. A proud person hates the fact that someone is above him. He thinks this lowers his position.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: Ignoring a child's disrespect is the surest guarantee that it will continue.
quotes.author: Fred G. Gosman

quotes.quote: If they disrespect you to your face imagine what they're doing behind your back.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: The only cure for contempt is counter-contempt.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Contempt for happiness is usually contempt for other people's happiness, and is an elegant disguise for hatred of the human race.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Contempt is the weapon of the weak and a defense against one's own despised and unwanted feelings.
quotes.author: Alice Miller

quotes.quote: Only the contemptible fear contempt.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Contempt mates well with pity.
quotes.author: Gloria Naylor

quotes.quote: Contempt is the only way to triumph over calumny.
quotes.author: Madame De Maintenon

quotes.quote: Our contempt for others proves nothing but the illiberality and narrowness of our own views.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: No matter what the reason, if you start to scream and shout, you look a fool, and you feel a fool, and you earn the disrespect of everyone.
quotes.author: Michael Caine

quotes.quote: Disrespect cannot be commanded, it must be earned.
quotes.author: Matthew Taberner

quotes.quote: Never make excuses for someone who disrespects you-who they are or what they do isn't a pass to treat you like trash!
quotes.author: Trent Shelton

quotes.quote: You don't have permission to disrespect yourself.
quotes.author: Martin De Maat

quotes.quote: You don't have to disrespect and insult others simply to hold your own ground. If you do, that shows how shaky your own position is.
quotes.author: Red Haircrow

quotes.quote: Of all afflictions, the worst is self-contempt.
quotes.author: Berthold Auerbach

quotes.quote: There is no respect for others without humility in one's self.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: If we have no respect for our viewers, then how can we have any respect for ourselves and what we do?
quotes.author: Christiane Amanpour

quotes.quote: When people don't respect one another seldom is there honesty.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: An excess of courtesy is discourtesy.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: Discourtesy does not spring merely from one bad quality, but from several--from foolish vanity, from ignorance of what is due to others, from indolence, from stupidity, from distraction of thought, from contempt of others, from jealousy.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: A little rudeness and disrespect can elevate a meaningless interaction to a battle of wills and add drama to an otherwise dull day.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Impudence is the worst of all human diseases.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: The way to avoid the imputation of impudence is not to be ashamed of what we do, but never to do what we aught to be ashamed of.
quotes.author: Tully

quotes.quote: There is nothing more imprudent than excessive prudence.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: I completely scorn the falsifying, the sanctimonious, the cheap and the shoddy.
quotes.author: Ralph Thomas Walker

quotes.quote: There cannot be greater rudeness than to interrupt another in the current of his discourse.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: Rudeness is the weak man's imitation of strength.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Straightforwardness, without the rules of propriety, becomes rudeness.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A true and genuine impudence is ever the effect of ignorance, without the least sense of it.
quotes.author: Richard Steele

quotes.quote: The way to avoid the imputation of impudence is not to be ashamed of what we do, but never to do what we ought to be ashamed of.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: The insolence of time is like a blow in the face from an unseen enemy.
quotes.author: Margaret Deland

quotes.quote: The insolence of the vulgar is in proportion to their ignorance. They treat everything with contempt which they do not understand.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: There is an insolence which none but those who themselves deserve contempt can bestow, and those only who deserve no contempt can bear.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: Mistaking insolence for freedom has always been the hallmark of the slave.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Reich

quotes.quote: The insolence of authority is endeavoring to substitute money for ideas.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Surfeit begets insolence, when prosperity comes to a bad man.
quotes.author: Theognis Of Megara

quotes.quote: Incivility is the extreme of pride; it is built on the contempt of mankind.
quotes.author: John Zimmerman

quotes.quote: If the disagreement was strong enough, we could end up pretty close to the borderline of incivility.
quotes.author: David Rockefeller

quotes.quote: The insolence of wealth will creep out.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Only once in my life was I on the edge of incivility. I do not like to be unkind.
quotes.author: David Rockefeller

quotes.quote: In many people it is already an impertinence to say 'I'.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: Impertinence will intermeddle in things in which it has no concern, showing a want of breeding, or, more commonly, a spirit of sheer impudence.
quotes.author: George Crabbe

quotes.quote: No one is more insufferable than he who lacks basic courtesy.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: That bad manners are so prevalent in the world is the fault of good manners.
quotes.author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: Bad manners make a journalist.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: There is no excuse for bad manners, except fast reflexes.
quotes.author: Steven Brust

quotes.quote: There is no nobility with bad manners.
quotes.author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib

quotes.quote: If you can't ignore an insult, top it; if you can't top it, laugh it off; and if you can't laugh it off, it's probably deserved.
quotes.author: Russell Lynes

quotes.quote: Where there is no respect for life, there you will find evil.
quotes.author: O.R. Melling

quotes.quote: Never insult anyone by accident.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: To injure, ignore, disrespect, and violate the innocence of a child are among the greatest evils known to man.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Rudeness in old men is considered a sign of vitality. In fact, it is quite the opposite. It springs from shrunken sympathies.
quotes.author: Colin Thubren

quotes.quote: Don't talk of rudeness. We have done with civility. We are to be as rude as we please.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: I intend discourtesy to no one.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Contempt is the only way to triumph over calumny.
quotes.author: Mad. de Maintenon

quotes.quote: It is often more necessary to conceal contempt than resentment. The former being never forgiven, but the latter sometimes forgot. Wrongs are often forgiven; contempt never.
quotes.author: Chesterfield

quotes.quote: And every man hath a sting, which he may if provoked too far, dart out at one time or another.
quotes.author: Burton

quotes.quote: I have unlearned contempt.— It is a sin that is engendered earliest in the soul, and doth beseth it like a poison-worm, feeding on all its beauty.
quotes.author: N.P. Willis

quotes.quote: The basest and meanest of all human beings are generally the most forward to despise others.— So that the most contemptible are generally the most contemptuous.
quotes.author: Fielding

quotes.quote: Christ saw much in this world to weep over, and much to pray over; but he saw nothing in it to look upon with contempt.
quotes.author: E.U. Chapin

quotes.quote: Speak with contempt of in man.—Everyone hath a tender sense of reputation.
quotes.author: Burton

quotes.quote: Contempt—like malice is the gauntlet thrown down by the female. Unlike menace, however, it shames rather than arouses the bad boy in a guy.
quotes.author: Steven Carter

quotes.quote: There is nothing which a person will not sooner forgive, than contempt.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: Who is hardy enough to brave contempt?
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: It is a philosophic observation, that he who deserves an affront has no right to resent it, and he who is base enough to affront another without cause is unworthy of anything but contempt.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: Don't let people disrespect you. My mom says don't open the door to the devil. Surround yourself with positive people.
quotes.author: Cuba Gooding Jr

quotes.quote: Preservation of one's own culture does not require contempt or disrespect for other cultures.
quotes.author: Cesar Chavez

quotes.quote: If you do not respect your own wishes, no one else will. You will simply attract people who disrespect you as much as you do.
quotes.author: Vironika Tugaleva

quotes.quote: Those who disrespect you with their mouth don't deserve your ear.
quotes.author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quotes.quote: Never care about people’s feelings towards you.
quotes.author: Jordan Hoechlin

quotes.quote: Disagreement is one thing; disrespect is quite another.
quotes.author: Richard V. Reeves

quotes.quote: Disrespect for life is a direct reflection of violating the laws of the kingdom of love.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Treat people like people. Beware of pity and patronization because in them, you can't see when you're unashamedly looking down on someone.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Disrespect adheres to the ignorant; like wet leaves, breathed, on cold skin.
quotes.author: Sir Kristian Goldmund Aumann

quotes.quote: If I say ‘there is no God’, I disrespect your belief; how when you say ‘there is a God’ you do not disrespect mine?
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: Above all, don't lie to yourself. The man who lies to himself and listens to his own lie comes to a point that he cannot distinguish the truth within him, or around him, and so loses all respect for himself and for others. And having no respect he ceases to love.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: I would never disrespect any man, woman, chick, or child out there. We're all the same. What goes around comes around, and karma kicks us all in the butt at the end of the day.
quotes.author: Angie Stone

quotes.quote: Abusive language and swearing are a legacy of slavery, humiliation, and disrespect for human dignity, one’s own, and that of other people.
quotes.author: Leon Trotsky

quotes.quote: You have very little morally persuasive power with people who can feel your underlying contempt.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Nothing in the history of humankind has been disrespected as much as nature.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: The scariest thing about distance is that you don't know whether they'll miss you or forget you.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Love knows not distance; it hath no continent; its eyes are for the stars.
quotes.author: Gilbert Parker

quotes.quote: Two possibilities exist: either we are alone in the Universe or we are not. Both are equally terrifying.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: The shortest distance between two points is a straight line.
quotes.author: Archimedes

quotes.quote: Distance is a bad excuse for not having a good relationship with somebody. It's the determination to keep it going or let it fall by the wayside; that's the real reason that the relationships continue.
quotes.author: James McAvoy

quotes.quote: For time is the longest distance between two places.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: No distance of place or lapse of time can lessen the friendship of those who are thoroughly persuaded of each other's worth.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: We should not judge people by their peak of excellence; but by the distance they have traveled from the point where they started.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Distance gives us a reason to love harder.
quotes.author: Anon

quotes.quote: Absence makes the heart grow fonder, but it sure makes the rest of you lonely.
quotes.author: Charlie Brown

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to be apart from the people you love, but that doesn't make you love them any less. Sometimes you love them more.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: The pain of parting is nothing to the joy of meeting again.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: I fell in love with her when we were together, then fell deeper in love with in the years we were apart.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Distance sometimes let you know who's worth keeping and who's worth letting go.
quotes.author: Lana del Ray

quotes.quote: Distance is not for the fearful, it is for the bold. It's for those who are willing to spend a lot of time alone in exchange for a little time with the one they love. It's for those who know a good thing when they see it, even if they don't see it nearly enough.
quotes.author: Megahn Daum

quotes.quote: Distance means so little when someone means so much.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I don't cry because we've been separated by distance, and for a matter of years. Why? Because for as long as we share the same sky and breathe the same air, we're still together.
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: Distance does not break off the friendship absolutely, but only the activity of it.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Do more than is required. What is the distance between someone who achieves their goals consistently and those who spend their lives and careers merely following? The extra mile.
quotes.author: Gary Ryan Blair

quotes.quote: Every living being is an engine geared to the wheelwork of the universe. Though seemingly affected only by its immediate surrounding, the sphere of external influence extends to infinite distance.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.quote: No distance of place or lapse of time can lessen the friendship of those who are thoroughly persuaded of each other's worth.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: We should not judge people by their peak of excellence; but by the distance they have traveled from the point where they started.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Somewhere we know that without silence words lose their meaning, that without listening speaking no longer heals, that without distance closeness cannot cure.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: Distance doesn't exist, in fact, and neither does time. Vibrations from love or music can be felt everywhere, at all times.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: I once tried standing up on my toes to see far out in the distance, but I found that I could see much farther by climbing to a high place.
quotes.author: Xun Zi

quotes.quote: Nothing makes the earth seem so spacious as to have friends at a distance; they make the latitudes and longitudes.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Distance not only gives nostalgia, but perspective, and maybe objectivity.
quotes.author: Robert Morgan

quotes.quote: The big picture doesn't just come from distance; it also comes from time.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: We talk about heaven being so far away. It is within speaking distance to those who belong there. Heaven is a prepared place for a prepared people.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: To be consistently effective, you must put a certain distance between yourself and what happens to you on the golf course. This is not indifference, it's detachment.
quotes.author: Sam Snead

quotes.quote: It is easy to be brave from a safe distance.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: The very least you can do in your life is to figure out what you hope for. And the most you can do is live inside that hope. Not admire it from a distance but live right in it, under its roof.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: Good things come slow, especially in distance running.
quotes.author: Bill Dellinger

quotes.quote: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.
quotes.author: Bruce Feirstein

quotes.quote: The shortest distance between two points is often unbearable.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Life is like a landscape. You live in the midst of it but can describe it only from the vantage point of distance.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.quote: No daughter and mother ever live apart, no matter what the distance between them.
quotes.author: Christie Watson

quotes.quote: That farewell kiss which resembles greeting, that last glance of love which becomes the sharpest pang of sorrow.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: People who live at a distance are naturally less faulty than those immediately under our own eyes.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Envy not greatness: for thou mak'st thereby Thyself the worse, and so the distance greater.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: No distance can keep anxious lovers long asunder.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: True friends never apart maybe in distance but never in heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: There is no greater distance than that between a man in prayer and God.
quotes.author: Ivan Illich

quotes.quote: The closer the look one takes at a word, the greater distance from which it looks back.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: And ever has it been known that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Every now and then go away, have a little relaxation, for when you come back to your work your judgment will be surer. Go some distance away because then the work appears smaller and more of it can be taken in at a glance and a lack of harmony and proportion is more readily seen.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: The human voice can never reach the distance that is covered by the still small voice of conscience.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Distance lends enchantment to the view.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Each conquest of distance reveals greater distance.
quotes.author: Martin E. Marty

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who allows you distance but is never far away.
quotes.author: Noah

quotes.quote: The distance between yourself and another person is the same as the distance between yourself and yourself.
quotes.author: Richard Moss

quotes.quote: Remember how far you've come, not just how far you have to go.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Distance has the same effect on the mind as on the eye.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Distance either of time or place is sufficient to reconcile weak minds to wonderful relations.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The ability to laugh at life is right at the top, with love and communication, in the hierarchy of our needs. Humour has much to do with pain; it exaggerates the anxieties and absurdities we feel, so that we gain distance and through laughter, relief.
quotes.author: Sara Davidson

quotes.quote: Distance makes the heart grow fonder.
quotes.author: Simone Elkeles

quotes.quote: Everywhere is within walking distance if you have the time.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: All of us are experts at practicing virtue at a distance.
quotes.author: Theodore Hesburgh

quotes.quote: In true love the smallest distance is too great, and the greatest distance can be bridged.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A thing is mighty big when time and distance cannot shrink it.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: There are no goodbyes for us. Wherever you are, you will always be in my heart.
quotes.author: Gandhi

quotes.quote: The tough part of having a long distance relationship is the fight. Normal people can fight and make up by talking face to face. That gets a lot more difficult in a long distance relationship.
quotes.author: Darren Klee

quotes.quote: Some people can be so close to you even if physically far, they walk with you and stay near in every moment of your life.
quotes.author: Senora Roy

quotes.quote: The distance maybe far and wide but my heart can cover them all. The space between us is so much more but you should know that I love you so!
quotes.author: Linda Roy

quotes.quote: The simple lack of her is more to me than others presence.
quotes.author: Edward Thomas

quotes.quote: Forget the miles, forget them. You'll be there and I'll be here, and it'll just be long distance. And that'll be okay, because quite frankly I'm crazy about you.
quotes.author: Going the Distance

quotes.quote: I fell in love with her when we were together, then fell deeper in love with in the years we were apart.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: In true love the smallest distance is too great, and the greatest distance can be bridged.
quotes.author: Hands Nouwens

quotes.quote: We were together even when we were apart.
quotes.author: Shannon A. Thompson

quotes.quote: You're too far for my hands to hold you, but too near for my heart to love you.
quotes.author: Heraline

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to be apart from the people you love, but that doesn't make you love them any less. Sometimes you love them more.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Your absence has not taught me how to be alone, it merely has shown that when together we cast a single shadow on the wall.
quotes.author: Doug Fetherling

quotes.quote: I found that I missed him the more he was absent from my life, and the more I missed him, the more I loved him.
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: I close my eyes, thinking that there is nothing like an embrace after an absence, nothing like fitting my face into the curve of his shoulder and filling my lungs with the scent of him.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Distance does not break off the friendship absolutely, but only the activity of it.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The very least you can do in your life is to figure out what you hope for. And the most you can do is live inside that hope. Not admire it from a distance, but live right in it, under its roof.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: Missing someone gets easier every day because even though you get one day further from the last time you saw them, you are one day closer to the next time you will see them.
quotes.author: Mark Ebert

quotes.quote: Long distance relationship is like a dream,It can be sweet,It can be sad and it can also be a nightmare.
quotes.author: Bradley B. Dalina

quotes.quote: Distance is temporary, but our love is permanent. This may be the last time I see you, but if you keep me in your heart, together we shall be eternal; if you believe, we shall never part.
quotes.author: Ben Harper

quotes.quote: Every relationship I've been in becomes long distance because of work. It's never worked out. It puts an intense strain on the relationship, and at a certain point, it becomes too difficult.
quotes.author: Anton Yelchin

quotes.quote: The value of love is slowly lost when we have way too much. There is just no time to appreciate it. It is in times of separation and distance that you truly understand the meaning of love.
quotes.author: Tiffany Health

quotes.quote: No matter how far you manage to go, distance will never be able to erase those beautiful memories. There is so much goodness that we shared together.
quotes.author: Lucy Aims

quotes.quote: The scariest thing about distance is that you don't know whether they'll miss you or forget you.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Being close is the first and last desire of lovers, but being far and loving each other without an inch's difference is the characteristic of real love.
quotes.author: Senora Ray

quotes.quote: Distance simply means separation in place but never in connections. Heart remains inseparable.
quotes.author: DhelChen

quotes.quote: If you listen to the wind very carefully, you'll be able to hear me whisper my love for you.
quotes.author: Andrew Davidson

quotes.quote: I believe in the immeasurable power of love; that true love can endure any circumstance and reach across any distance.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: I know we loved each other, but distance can do strange things to people and before I was willing to tell you about it, I wanted to be certain that it would last.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Obviously, a long distance relationship is hard. But, like anything worth having, you make it work.
quotes.author: Leona Lewis

quotes.quote: Waiting does not bother me, nor does the distance that is cropping up between us. All I want is a true commitment and to know that your heat will never change.
quotes.author: Ting Stores

quotes.quote: Long-distance relationships are hard no matter what. When you don't have face-to-face time, it's just different.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.quote: Some of the toughest things in this world are to really want someone and not have them around you. Those are the times when you don't know what to do. All you can do for is wait.
quotes.author: Tamara Louis

quotes.quote: Be the success story you're looking for. Be the ones to survive your long distance relationship. Be the inspiration for others to follow.
quotes.author: Dee King

quotes.quote: Long distance relationships are hard no matter what. When you don't have face to face time, it's just different.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.quote: I don't cry because we've been separated by distance, and for a matter of years. Why? Because for as long as we share the same sky and breathe the same air, we're still together.
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: Love is missing someone whenever you're apart, but somehow feeling warm inside because you're close in heart.
quotes.author: Kay Knudsen

quotes.quote: The second principle of magic: things which have once been in contact with each other continue to act on each other at a distance after the physical contact has been severed.
quotes.author: James G. Frazer

quotes.quote: This is the sad bed of chosen chastity because you are miles and mountains away.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Maybe, it's not the distance that's the problem, but how you handle it.
quotes.author: David leviathan

quotes.quote: You're my Nemo. If you get lost in the great big ocean, I will find you.
quotes.author: Anon

quotes.quote: Love will travel as far as you let it. It has no limits.
quotes.author: Dee King

quotes.quote: If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart i'll always be with you.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: If you found that one person who is really worth the sacrifices, pain, and hardships then your efforts will not go to waste.
quotes.author: Anna Agoncillo

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Distraction leaches the authenticity out of our communications. When we are not emotionally present, we are gliding over the surface of our interactions and we never tangle in the depths where the nuances of our skills are tested and refined.
quotes.author: Marian Deegan

quotes.quote: Never let anyone or anything distract you from noticing how amazing you are.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Distraction wastes our energy, concentration restores it.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: Anything you believe you have to do or become before you can be free is a denial and distraction from the truth that you are already free.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: If you have never had any distractions you don't know how to pray.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Your results are the product of either personal focus or personal distractions. The choice is yours.
quotes.author: John Di Lemme

quotes.quote: If destruction fails to entangle us, distraction will do it's best.
quotes.author: Beth Moore

quotes.quote: Nothing distracts one from one's true purpose in life more than following the crowd mentality.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: You can always find a distraction if you're looking for one.
quotes.author: Tom Kite

quotes.quote: If we let ourselves, we shall always be waiting for some distraction or other to end before we can really get down to our work.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Immersing oneself in the problems of a book is a good way to keep from thinking of love.
quotes.author: Orhan Pamuk

quotes.quote: An addiction to distraction is the death of creative production.
quotes.author: Robin S Sharma

quotes.quote: Our normal human tendencies are distraction and dissipation. We begin one task, then get seduced by some other option, and lose our focus. We drift away from what is difficult and we know to be true, to what is comfortable and socially condoned.
quotes.author: Daniel Pinchbeck

quotes.quote: When there are thoughts, it is distraction: when there are no thoughts, it is meditation.
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: When distractions are manifold, it's best to remember what you are supposed to be doing.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: We wander for distraction, but we travel for fulfilment.
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.quote: Distraction is a killer of dreams, visions and goals.
quotes.author: Topsy Gift

quotes.quote: Even worthwhile endeavors need evaluation in order to determine if they have become distractions from the best goals.
quotes.author: Quentin L. Cook

quotes.quote: Art has to do with the arrest of attention in the midst of distraction.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: Eliminate all distractions and focus on things that add value to your life
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: There is never a time when new distraction will not show up; we sow them, so several will grow from the same seed.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: One man's distraction is another man's refuge.
quotes.author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.quote: The biggest distraction in life to one's focus is often near locus standing people saying all hocus-pocus.
quotes.author: Anuj

quotes.quote: Goals for the future distract from worry and anger about the past and redirect your focus to the direction you're travelling in.
quotes.author: Sam Owen

quotes.quote: Distraction serves evil more than any other mental state.
quotes.author: Stefan Molyneux

quotes.quote: The mind gets distracted in all sorts of ways. The heart is its own exclusive concern and diversion.
quotes.author: Malcolm De Chazal

quotes.quote: Distraction is the only thing that consoles us for miseries and yet it is itself the greatest of our miseries.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Distraction is the most corrosive disease of the 20th century.
quotes.author: James Victore

quotes.quote: Ignorance is one of the best defense available. Distraction is a remedy.
quotes.author: Maulik Doshi

quotes.quote: Most of our distractions are designed to invite us away from this recognition, which is a good idea.
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: There are always distractions, if you allow them.
quotes.author: Tony La Russa

quotes.quote: Starve your distractions, feed your focus.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: One of the points about distractions is that everything that they do is destabilizing.
quotes.author: Bruce Sterling

quotes.quote: We wander for distraction, but we travel for fulfillment.
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.quote: If thou rememberest that thou art going to heaven, thou wilt not sleep on the road. If thou thinkest that hell is behind thee, and the devil pursuing thee, thou wilt not loiter.
quotes.author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Work is hard. Distractions are plentiful. And time is short.
quotes.author: Adam Hochschild

quotes.quote: Distraction is nine-tenths of consciousness.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: By preserving over all obstacles and distractions, one may unfailingly arrive at his chosen goal or destination.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.quote: By prevailing over all obstacles and distractions, one may unfailingly arrive at his chosen goal or destination.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.quote: All profound distraction opens certain doors. You have to allow yourself to be distracted when you are unable to concentrate.
quotes.author: Julio Cortazar

quotes.quote: You must mind and not lower the Church in people's eyes by seeming to be frightened about it for such a little thing.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Serious people are not easily distracted!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: It's easy to forgo distractions and to not accumulate things when you have a larger goal on the horizon.
quotes.author: Hugh Howey

quotes.quote: No fear. No distractions. The ability to let that which does not matter truly slide.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Distracted from distraction by distraction.
quotes.author: TS Eliot

quotes.quote: All the while thou livest ill, thou hast the trouble, distraction, inconveniences of life, but not the sweets and true use of it.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Any distraction tends to get in the way of being an effective gangster.
quotes.author: Terence Winter

quotes.quote: In the midst of overwhelming noise and distraction, the voice of story is calling us to remember our true selves.
quotes.author: Christina Baldwin

quotes.quote: Let the person who is talking know that you are listening by making eye contact and focusing on the sound of their voice rather than the distractions around you.
quotes.author: Brenda Knight

quotes.quote: When someone else is speaking, it is easy to become distracted by thoughts and external sounds, such as a car horn or other nearby conversations—and by giving in to these distractions you can miss crucial details from the speaker.
quotes.author: Brenda Knight

quotes.quote: Remember the clock is ticking, and if you allow the distraction to waste your time the referee will blow the whistle ending the match before you score your goal. So run to your goal and do not look to the left or right. r bt5
quotes.author: Nadia McInnis

quotes.quote: Looking at small advantages prevents great affairs from being accomplished.
quotes.author: Kongfuzi

quotes.quote: If you direct your whole thought to work itself, none of the things which invade eyes or ears will reach the mind.
quotes.author: Quintillian

quotes.quote: If your mind races, return to the place you were before the thought. Return to the site of oneness.
quotes.author: Kabbalah

quotes.quote: Don't search for truth with your intellect. Don't search at all. The nature of the mind is intrinsically pure...If you don't run after sounds and sights or let appearances give rise to conceptual thinking, you will become men unattached to all things.
quotes.author: Huijai Dazhu

quotes.quote: If the mind tends to run off, then unify it by means of the breath; if the breath tends to become rough, then use the mind to make it fine. If you do this, how can the mind fail to stabilize?
quotes.author: Lu Dong Bin

quotes.quote: All this talk and turmoil and noise and movement and desire are outside the veil; Inside the veil is silence and calm and peace.
quotes.author: Abu Yazid Al-Bistami

quotes.quote: Don't think. Don't get lost in your thoughts. Your thoughts are a veil on the face of the moon. That moon is your heart, and those thoughts cover your heart. So let them go, just let them fall into the water
quotes.author: Jalaluddin Rumi

quotes.quote: Often I am not where I am, but where my thoughts lead me.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: No mind is much employed upon the present; recollection and anticipation fill up all our moments.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Sit in reverie and watch the changing colors / Of the waves that break upon the idle seashore of the mind.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Our minds are like crows. They pick up everything that glitters, no matter how uncomfortable our nests get with all that metal in them.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: I never learned to stop at the skin. If I looked at a man or a woman, I wanted to see inside. Being distracted by shading or coloring is stupid. It gets in the way. It's something I just can't see.
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.quote: Not to be able to stop thinking is a dreadful affliction, but we don't realize this because almost everybody is suffering from it, so it is considered normal. This incessant mental noise prevents you from finding that realm of inner stillness that is inseparable from Being.
quotes.author: Eckhard Tolle

quotes.quote: The mind that is not always caught up in detail is your only treasure. Stop chasing details and become still to feel it. The mind that sees details clearly but is not caught by them is like a vast borderless mirror. That mind does not oppose itself.
quotes.author: G. Bluestone

quotes.quote: You try to distract yourself from the pain, but only death will end it.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: To busy oneself with what is futile when one can do something useful, to attend to what is simple when one has the mettle to attempt what is difficult, is to strip talent of its dignity. It is a sin not to do what one is capable of doing.
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.quote: I never enlighten anyone who has not been driven to distraction by trying to understand a difficulty or who has not gotten into a frenzy trying to put his ideas into words.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: It is very difficult to be learned; it seems as if people were worn out on the way to great thoughts, and can never enjoy them because they are too tired.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: However entrancing it is to wander unchecked through a garden of bright images, are we not enticing your mind from another subject of almost equal importance?
quotes.author: Ernest Bramah

quotes.quote: Sand was dribbling out of the bag of her attention, faster and faster.
quotes.author: Sarah Blake

quotes.quote: The most dangerous distractions are the ones you love, but that doesn't love you back.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: A little distraction we need, to destroy what we believe.
quotes.author: Priyanshu

quotes.quote: Thinking is good for your mind, but too much thinking leads to distraction.
quotes.author: Ehabib

quotes.quote: The result of information overload is usually distraction, and it dilutes your focus and takes you off your game.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: People allow themselves to get distracted; I think ultimately, probably the biggest thing that gets in the way of people doing it at any point in time is a distraction.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.quote: Be aware when distractions come your way. You'll know it’s a distraction when you stop doing what you're supposed to be doing and find yourself pondering things that have no value.
quotes.author: Beverly R. Imes

quotes.quote: Less distraction, more focus. Less gossip, more encouragement. Less past, more future. Less toxicity, more positivity.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself, but to your estimate of it; and this you have the power to revoke at any moment.
quotes.author: Marcus Aelius Aurelius

quotes.quote: Let your heart feel for the afflictions and distress of everyone, and let your hand give in proportion to your purse.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: You pray in your distress and in your need; would that you might also pray in the fullness of your joy and in your days of abundance.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: The world is quickly bored by the recital of misfortune, and willing avoids the sight of distress.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Let him who expects one class of society to prosper in the highest degree, while the other is in distress, try whether one side; of the face can smile while the other is pinched.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: To pity distress is but human; to relieve it is Godlike.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: If we want to make a statement about a man's nature on the basis of his physiognomy, we must take everything into account; it is in his distress that a man is tested, for then his nature is revealed.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: Without realizing it, the individual composes his life according to the laws of beauty even in times of greatest distress.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: The more you practice tolerating uncomfortable emotions, the more confident you'll become in your ability to tolerate the distress that may be necessary to reach your full potential.
quotes.author: Amy Morin

quotes.quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: By adversity are wrought the greatest works of admiration, and all the fair examples of renown, out of distress and misery are grown.
quotes.author: Samuel Daniel

quotes.quote: Inflicting emotional distress has typically been treated as a civil action. How 'substantial' does the distress have to be for it to turn criminal?
quotes.author: Nancy Gibbs

quotes.quote: To live in the midst of suffering, which we do, we do, amid distress, and to keep some equilibrium in the midst of that - that would be happiness enough.
quotes.author: Michael Luinig

quotes.quote: Today continuing poverty and distress are a deeper and more important cause of international tensions, of the conditions that can produce war, than previously.
quotes.author: Lester B. Pearson

quotes.quote: People in distress behave in a stressful way. They aren't all sweetness and light. They don't behave well when they are unhappy. That's just what observed.
quotes.author: Penelope Wilton

quotes.quote: Recognizing chronic sadness may encourage someone to reach out to a friend, family member, or counselor rather than concealing the distress.
quotes.author: Mary Pilon

quotes.quote: Suffering by nature or chance never seems so painful as suffering inflicted on us by the arbitrary will of another.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Suffering becomes beautiful when anyone bears great calamities with cheerfulness, not through insensibility but through greatness of mind.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: People have a hard time letting go of their suffering. Out of a fear of the unknown, they prefer suffering that is familiar.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: If there is a meaning in life at all, then there must be a meaning in suffering. Suffering is an ineradicable part of life, even as fate and death. Without suffering and death, human life cannot be complete.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: Tell your heart that the fear of suffering is worse than the suffering itself. And no heart has ever suffered when it goes in search of its dream.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Every damsel in distress deserves a hero.
quotes.author: Tracy Anne Warren

quotes.quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Waiting is painful. Forgetting is painful. But not knowing which to do is the worse kind of suffering.
quotes.author: Paul Coelho

quotes.quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.
quotes.author: Hellen Keller

quotes.quote: It is by suffering that human beings become angels.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: In times of distress strengthen your heart.
quotes.author: Samuel ibn Naghrillah

quotes.quote: People in distress never think that you feel enough.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Much dearer be the things which come through hard distress.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: When you see a man in distress, recognize him as a fellow man.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: When people fall in deep distress, their native sense departs.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: It is not our failures that distress us so much as our idiocies.
quotes.author: Anna Robertson Brown Lindsay

quotes.quote: Distress is virtue's opportunity: we only live to teach us how to die.
quotes.author: Thomas Southerne

quotes.quote: Distress: A disease incurred by exposure to the prosperity of a friend.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The man who is forever disturbed about the condition of humanity either has no problems of his own or has refused to face them.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: People are not disturbed by things, but by the view they take of them.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: That man has reached immortality who is disturbed by nothing material.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: When you tire of living, change itself seems evil, does it not? For then any change at all disturbs the deathlike peace of the life-weary.
quotes.author: Walter M. Miller Jr.

quotes.quote: You can’t be disturbed by anything. There’s no emotion involved. You can’t feel sorrow, you can’t feel pity, there’s nothing you feel. The job has to be done.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.quote: For the mind disturbed, the still beauty of dawn is nature’s finest balm.
quotes.author: Edwin Way Teale

quotes.quote: No passion disturbs the soundness of our judgement as anger does.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: The mind is so rarely disturbed, but that the company of friend will restore it to some degree of tranquility and sedateness.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.quote: I have made a pact with my tongue, not to speak when my heart is disturbed.
quotes.author: Saint Francis De Sales

quotes.quote: Keep your heart clear And transparent, And you will Never be bound. A single disturbed thought Creates ten thousand distractions.
quotes.author: Ryokan

quotes.quote: Don't allow yourself to be upset and disturbed. Hold your peace because without it you have no power.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: A great rock is not disturbed by the wind; the mind of a wise man is not disturbed by either honor or abuse.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Life is but a sleep disturbed by dreaming, prompted by the will; the saddened soul with sadness hides it's secrets, and the gay, with thrill.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: What a curious creature is man! With what a variety of powers and faculties is he endued! Yet how easily is he disturbed and put out of order!
quotes.author: James Boswell

quotes.quote: We are more disturbed by a calamity which threatens us than by one which has befallen us.
quotes.author: John Lancaster Spalding

quotes.quote: If you really want to examine your strength, see how many times a day you are disturbed.
quotes.author: Rama Swami

quotes.quote: Be not disturbed at trifles, or at accidents common or unavoidable.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If I am no longer disturbed myself, I will deal less with disturbed people, but I don't regret having concerned myself with them because I think most of us are disturbed.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Only nut cases want to be president. This was true even in high school. Only clearly disturbed people ran for class president.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: When the heart is still disturbed by the relics of a passion it is proner to take up a new one than when wholly cured.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: It is not worth the while to let our imperfections disturb us always.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: No one is so brave that he is not disturbed by something unexpected.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.quote: When family ties are disturbed, devoted children arise.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Anyone who is disturbed by the idea of newts in a nightclub is potentially dangerous.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Before anything great is really achieved, your comfort zone must be disturbed.
quotes.author: Ray Lewis

quotes.quote: A believer, a mind whose faith is consciousness, is never disturbed because other persons do not yet see the fact which he sees.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Some people just shouldn't be disturbed in their inclinations, whether large or small. A reminder can instantly turn enthusiasm into aversion and spoil everything.
quotes.author: Tove Jansson

quotes.quote: Nature is under control but not disturbed.
quotes.author: Beatrix of the Netherlands

quotes.quote: We must always be disturbed by the truth.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.quote: Sometimes you just have to throw on a crown and remind them who they're dealing with.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I'll try anything once, twice if I like it, three times to make sure.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: I may be high maintenance but I can afford to maintain myself.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If I ever let my head down, it will be just to admire my shoes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I'll not be any man's half-time, down-time, spare time or sometimes. So don't waste my time.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Eat diamonds for breakfast and shine all day.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A true diva is graceful and talented and strong and fearless and brave and someone with humility.
quotes.author: Beyonce

quotes.quote: I love to see a young girl go out and grab the world by the lapels. Life's a bitch. You've got to go out and kick ass.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Diva's aren't made, they're born.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Big girls need big diamonds.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: Maybe some women aren't meant to be tamed. Maybe they just need to run free until they find someone just as wild to run with them.
quotes.author: Carrie Bradshaw

quotes.quote: When Im good, I'm very good, but when I'm bad, I'm better.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Alpha females don't run in packs.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I believe that it's better to be looked over than it is to be overlooked.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Diva's don't do drama, we do business.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A diva is a female version of a hustler.
quotes.author: Beyonce

quotes.quote: Success can make you go one of two ways. It can make you a prima donna, or it can smooth the edges, take away the insecurities, let the nice things come out.
quotes.author: Barbara Walters

quotes.quote: There's something so special about a woman who dominates a man’s world. It takes a certain grace, strength, intelligence, fearlessness, and the nerve to never take no for an answer.
quotes.author: Rihanna

quotes.quote: A true diva knows there’s more to life than glue-on lashes and red lips. You already know—or at least you know you’re supposed to know—that beauty comes from the inside, but to be a diva, you’ve got to get to the point where you actually unquestioningly believe that. You can spend hours and a ton of money perfecting your flawless face and sick body, but if you don't have the personality or the sense of humor to back it up, then you’re focusing on the wrong damn things. An ugly personality always trumps a beautiful face. Always. And anyone who doesn’t know that isn’t a diva. She’s just an asshole with an attitude.
quotes.author: Michelle Visage

quotes.quote: Bitches and divas are not the same thing. . . . Bitchiness comes from a place of insecurity, but being a diva comes from a place of strength and love.
quotes.author: Michelle Visage

quotes.quote: Being the kind of diva I’m talking about isn’t about demanding all the green M&M’s be plucked from your snack bowl in your dressing room. It’s about staying late, trying harder, and working whatever you’ve got. My divas get shit done while staying true to who they are.
quotes.author: Michelle Visage

quotes.quote: Don't worry! When I'm furious, I'm at my best.
quotes.author: Maria Callas

quotes.quote: I am a diva, but if you look at the Italian definition of the word in a dictionary it is actually something very beautiful.
quotes.author: Diana Ross

quotes.quote: It takes a long time to get to be a diva. I mean, you got to work it.
quotes.author: Diana Ross

quotes.quote: You are a diva. And you have been a nightmare, but you're not a diva because you're a nightmare. You're a diva because you're talented, and ambitious, and because no one else in the world can do what you . . . can do. That's what being a diva's all about. Being an original. One of a kind. So hold the nightmare, but bring the diva.
quotes.author: Kurt Hummel

quotes.quote: A strong woman understands that gifts such as logic, decisiveness and strength are just as feminine as intuition and emotional connection. She values and uses all of her gifts.
quotes.author: Nancy Rathburn

quotes.quote: Every woman should have four pets in her life. A mink in her closet, a jaguar in her garage, a tiger in her bed, and a jackass who pays for everything.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.quote: To have character is to be big enough to take life on.
quotes.author: Mary Caroline Richards

quotes.quote: I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Eventually you just have to realize that you're living for an audience of one. I'm not here for anyone else's approval.
quotes.author: Pamela Anderson

quotes.quote: There are some women who seem to be born without fear, just as there are people who are born without the ability to feel pain.... Providence appears to protect such women, maybe out of astonishment.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: I think the key is for women not to set any limits.
quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

quotes.quote: My recipe for life is not being afraid of myself, afraid of what I think or of my opinions.
quotes.author: Eartha Kitt

quotes.quote: I'm a real rebel with a cause.
quotes.author: Nina Simone

quotes.quote: I don’t do things for the response or the controversy. I just live my life.
quotes.author: Rihanna

quotes.quote: I was a bigger-than-life persona before I was anyone in my own mind.
quotes.author: Raquel Welch

quotes.quote: If I had any talent that God could give me, I would be a great diva.
quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quotes.quote: Being the Queen is not all about singing, and being a diva is not all about singing. It has much to do with your service to people. And your social contributions to your community and your civic contributions as well.
quotes.author: Aretha Franklin

quotes.quote: A diva is someone who is a perfectionist, who does her best in her craft.
quotes.author: Patti LaBelle

quotes.quote: The word diva to me means doing something supernatural with something natural.
quotes.author: Patti LuPone

quotes.quote: So if diva means giving your best, then yes, I guess I am a diva.
quotes.author: Patti LaBelle

quotes.quote: The mere fact that I exist means that I deserve to be here and to express myself any damn why I please.
quotes.author: Euphoria Godsent

quotes.quote: To be good is to be forgotten. I'm going to be so bad I'll always be remembered.
quotes.author: Theda Bara

quotes.quote: Just because I don't act like a Diva doesn't mean you shouldn't treat me like a Diva.
quotes.author: Karen E. Quinones Miller

quotes.quote: I stayed on my own path and did not follow the herd. I made a way for myself.
quotes.author: Eartha Kitt

quotes.quote: If you see me as just the princess then you misunderstand who I am and what I have been through.
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: I know I can be diva-ish sometimes, but I have to be in control. The nature of my life, the nature of what I do, is divadom, it really is.
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: In this world, I call the shots and I think I know best.
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: Am I bossy? Absolutely. I don't like to lose, and if I'm told 'no', then I find another way to get my 'yes'.
quotes.author: Naomi Campbell

quotes.quote: Age cannot wither her, no custom stale Her infinite variety.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Sameness is the mother of disgust, variety the cure.
quotes.author: Petrarch

quotes.quote: Variety is the soul of pleasure.
quotes.author: Aphra Behn

quotes.quote: The body loves variety. The body is the same as the seasons: It likes change.
quotes.author: Priscilla Welch

quotes.quote: others cherish the existence of things / an impulse to be in the moment / against the wind of strong diversity / we may want to cry on the shoulder of our lover / but why even bother, search for truth in all things.
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: Traipsing effortlessly through diversity / Incredulous, indifferent, me / Offered all, but nothing at all / Unlike anything conceivable
quotes.author: Joseph Mark Ippolito

quotes.quote: However exquisite we beuty find / It satiates sense, and palls upon the mind / Brown bread as well as white must be for me / My motto ever is--variety.
quotes.author: La Fontaine

quotes.quote: I have thought it thoroughly over / State of hermit, state of lover / We must have society / We cannot spare variety.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: All the diversity, all the charm, and all the beauty of life are made up of light and shade.”
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Our ability to reach unity in diversity will be the beauty and the test of our civilisation.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There's so many different worlds, so many different suns. And we have just one world, but we live in different ones.
quotes.author: Mark Knopfler

quotes.quote: Diversity creates dimension in the world.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Ann Lawless

quotes.quote: You don't have true freedom until you allow a diversity of opinion and a diversity of voices.
quotes.author: Don Lemon

quotes.quote: I can tell you, without diversity, creativity remains stagnant.
quotes.author: Edward Enninful

quotes.quote: We all should know that diversity makes for a rich tapestry, and we must understand that all the threads of the tapestry are equal in value no matter what their color.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: If we cannot now end our differences, at least we can help make the world safe for diversity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Diversity: the art of thinking independently together.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: Diversity is about all of us, and about us having to figure out how to walk through this world together.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Woodson

quotes.quote: I know there is strength in the differences between us. I know there is comfort, where we overlap.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: We are all different, which is great because we are all unique. Without diversity life would be very boring.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: I have a self-made quote: Celebrate diversity, practice acceptance and may we all choose peaceful options to conflict.
quotes.author: Donzella Michele Malone

quotes.quote: Isn't it amazing that we are all made in God's image, and yet there is so much diversity among his people?
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: An individual has not started living until he can rise above the narrow confines of his individualistic concerns to the broader concerns of all humanity.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Diversity in the world is a basic characteristic of human society, and also the key condition for a lively and dynamic world as we see today.
quotes.author: Jinato Hu

quotes.quote: Strength lies in differences, not in similarities.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: It is never too late to give up your prejudices.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The wise man belongs to all countries, for the home of a great soul is the whole world.
quotes.author: Democritus

quotes.quote: Diversity is the magic. It is the first manifestation, the first beginning of the differentiation of a thing and of simple identity. The greater the diversity, the greater the perfection.
quotes.author: Thomas Berry

quotes.quote: There are no nations! There is only humanity. And if we don't come to understand that right soon, there will be no nations, because there will be no humanity.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: It were not best that we should all think alike; it is difference of opinion that makes horse races.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: We have become not a melting pot but a beautiful mosaic. Different people, different beliefs, different yearnings, different hopes, different dreams.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: It is time for parents to teach young people early on that in diversity there is beauty and there is strength.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Diversity is not about how we differ. Diversity is about embracing one another's uniqueness.
quotes.author: Ola Joseph

quotes.quote: Honest difference of views and honest debate are not disunity. They are the vital process of policy among free men.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: There never were in the world two opinions alike, no more than two hairs or two grains; the most universal quality is diversity.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: In our work and in our living, we must recognize that difference is a reason for celebration and growth, rather than a reason for destruction.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: We all live with the objective of being happy; our lives are all different and yet the same.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Religions are many and diverse, but reason and goodness are one.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Infinite diversity in infinite combinations...symbolizing the elements that create truth and beauty.
quotes.author: Commander Spock

quotes.quote: Our task must be to free ourselves... by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature and its beauty.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Wit lies in recognizing the resemblance among things which differ and the difference between things which are alike.
quotes.author: Madame De Stael

quotes.quote: Peace is not unity in similarity but unity in diversity, in the comparison and conciliation of differences
quotes.author: Mikhail Gorbachev

quotes.quote: The minute we become an integrated whole, we look through the same eyes and we see a whole different world together.
quotes.author: Azizah Al-Hibri

quotes.quote: I feel my heart break to see a nation ripped apart by it's own greatest strength--it's diversity.
quotes.author: Melissa Etheridge

quotes.quote: (People) may be said to resemble not the bricks of which a house is build, but the pieces of a picture puzzle, each differing in shape, but matching the rest, and thus bringing out the picture.
quotes.author: Felix Adler

quotes.quote: Human diversity makes tolerance more than a virtue; it makes it a requirement for survival.
quotes.author: Rene Dubos

quotes.quote: Through the strain / To the plane they're born to be / Harmony of Diversity / Sing responsibility
quotes.author: Earth Wind and Fire

quotes.quote: Society is unity in diversity.
quotes.author: George Herbert Mead

quotes.quote: Different roads sometimes lead to the same castle.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: A lot of different flowers make a bouquet.
quotes.author: Muslim Origin

quotes.quote: The peoples of the earth are one family.
quotes.author: Ruth Fulton Benedict

quotes.quote: What the world needs most is openness: Open hearts, open doors, open eyes, open minds, open ears, open souls.
quotes.author: Robert Muller

quotes.quote: No culture can live, if it attempts to be exclusive.
quotes.author: Mohandas K. Gandhi

quotes.quote: The biggest mistake is believing there is one right way to listen, to talk, to have a conversation -- or a relationship.
quotes.author: Deborah Tannen

quotes.quote: Differences challenge assumptions.
quotes.author: Anne Wilson Schaef

quotes.quote: There is the sky, which is all men's together...
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Diversity is the one true thing we all have in common. Celebrate it every day.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Everyone is kneaded out of the same dough but not baked in the same oven.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: Creating and managing a diverse workforce is a process, not a destination.
quotes.author: R. Roosevelt Thomas

quotes.quote: What we have to do... is to find a way to celebrate our diversity and debate our differences without fracturing our communities.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: In each human heart are a tiger, a pig, an ass and a nightingale. Diversity of character is due to their unequal activity.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Variety is the soul of pleasure.
quotes.author: Aphra Behn

quotes.quote: Variety is the spice of life.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: There's no diversity because we're burning in the melting pot / So when the devil wants to dance with you, you better say never / Because the dance with the devil might last you forever.
quotes.author: Felipe Andres Coronel

quotes.quote: It is the law that hand intends / Which framed diversity of sex / The man the woman still defends / The manly boy the girl protects.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Divine is all Love in its essential nature, and Love is all Divine in its truthful expression.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.quote: No one is good but God alone. What is good is therefore divine, what is divine is therefore good.
quotes.author: Saint Anbrose

quotes.quote: Divine right of kings means the divine right of anyone who can get uppermost.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: There is a divine purpose behind everything - and therefore a divine presence in everything.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: To err is human; to forgive, divine.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Because you're a creation of God, you reflect the Divine qualities of creativity, wisdom, and love.
quotes.author: Doreen Virtue

quotes.quote: We are divine enough to ask and we are important enough to receive.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Divine presence gives meaning to what seems to have no meaning.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Divine is Love and scorneth worldly pelf, And can be bought with nothing but with self.
quotes.author: Walter Raleigh

quotes.quote: The true work of art is but a shadow of the divine perfection.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: Your divine design dictates your future direction.
quotes.author: Aubrey Malphurs

quotes.quote: Divine love is limitless and the source of miracles.
quotes.author: Leta B.

quotes.quote: The divine essence itself is love and wisdom.
quotes.author: Emanuel Swedenborg

quotes.quote: Divine love always has been, and always will be, the answer that you seek.
quotes.author: Doreen Virtue

quotes.quote: The greatest teaching is restoration of mankind to divine love of God.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: With our divine connection we are always in touch with the solutions we are seeking.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Every day is divine. If you seek the sacred treasure you will find it.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: A sense of humour is the only divine quality of man.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Every divine action begins from the Father, proceeds through the Son, and is completed in the Holy Spirit.
quotes.author: Saint Basil

quotes.quote: This Divine truth flows into heaven from the Lord from His Divine love.
quotes.author: Emanuel Swedenborg

quotes.quote: A divine great spirit put awe-words on my mind; my sacred-duty is the writing.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Divine self exist in love, in faith and in purity.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The divine force within you is mightier than any mountain.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The divinity you seek is born with you.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: You are a Divine creation, a Being of Light who showed up here as a human being at the exact moment you were supposed to. You are the Beloved, a miracle, a part of the eternal perfection.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: If you see with innocent eyes, everything is divine.
quotes.author: Federico Fellini

quotes.quote: Study the past, if you would divine the future.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: In one word, this ideal is that you are divine.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Divine sound is the cause of all manifestation. The knower of the mystery of sound knows the mystery of the whole universe.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: The Divine does not come from somewhere above, it exists beyond time and space, and informs all life.
quotes.author: Alberto Villoldo

quotes.quote: Nothing is divine but what is agreeable to reason.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: The soul in sleep gives proof of its divine nature.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: The divine is not something high above us. It is in heaven, it is in earth, it is inside us.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: The divine process of change manifests itself to our human understanding . . . as punishment, torment, death, and transfiguration.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Only divine love bestows the keys of knowledge.
quotes.author: Arthur Rimbaud

quotes.quote: We can see the Divine in each speck of dust, but that doesn't stop us from wiping it away with a wet sponge. The Divine doesn't disappear; it's transformed into the clean surface.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Divine love always has met and always will meet every human need.
quotes.author: Mary Baker Eddy

quotes.quote: Unless we perform divine service with every willing act of our life, we never perform it at all.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Divine does not tempt us to see what's in our hearts, it tempts us so we could see what's in our hearts.
quotes.author: Aleksandra Ninkovic

quotes.quote: God is not merely good, but goodness; goodness is not merely divine, but God.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The spark of divinity is sacred spirit with divine soul.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: A divine person is the prophecy of the mind; a friend is the hope of the heart.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The Divine is constantly waiting at your doorstep to move in if only you allow the necessary space.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: Divine is the task to relieve pain.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Divine direction begins with unconditional submission.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: We have the divinity of our great misery. And our solitude, with its toilsome ideas, tears and laughter, is fatally divine.
quotes.author: Henri Barbusse

quotes.quote: It is well to think well; it is divine to act well.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: The spark divine dwells in thee: let it grow.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: The divine power moves with difficulty, but at the same time surely.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Great grief is a divine and terrible radiance which transfigures the wretched.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Give quality time to the divine, it will be rewarded.
quotes.author: Ravi Valluri

quotes.quote: The aim of life is to live, and to live means to be aware, joyously, drunkenly, serenely, divinely aware.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Come down, O love divine, / Seek thou this soul of mine, / And visit it with thine own ardour glowing; / O comforter, draw near, / Within my heart appear, / And kindle it, thy holy flame bestowing. / O let it freely burn, / Till earthly passion turn / To dust and ashes in its heat consuming.
quotes.author: Richard Littledale

quotes.quote: Unite yourself to the cosmos, and the thought of transcendence will disappear. Transcendence belongs to the profane world. When all trace of transcendence vanishes, the true person - the Divine Being - is manifest. Empty yourself and let the Divine function.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: The ascent to the bright peaks of true being is always preceded by a direct descent into the dark depths. Only if we venture repeatedly through zones of annihilation can our contact with Divine Being, which is beyond annihilation, becomes form and stable.
quotes.author: Karlfried Durckheim

quotes.quote: How long will you move backward? Come forward; do not stray in unbelief; come dancing to Divine Knowledge.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The bodily food we take is changed into us, but the spiritual food we receive changes us into itself; therefore divine love is not taken into us, for that would make two things. But divine love takes us into itself, and we are one with it.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: The mystery of a Person, indeed, is ever divine, to him that has a sense for the Godlike.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: There's a divinity that shapes our ends, / Rough-hew them how we will.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The essential truth... is that man is under an absolute mandate to express divinity in his own nature and in his whole life.
quotes.author: F. Ernest Johnson

quotes.quote: The seeds of godlike power are in us still; Gods we are, bards, saints, heroes, if we will!
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: He is divinely favoured who may trace a silver vein in all the affairs of life, see sparkles of light in the gloomiest scenes, and absolute radiance in those which are bright.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher
