quotes.quote: Were I indeed to define divinity, I should rather call it a divine life, rather than a divine science; it being something rather to be understood by a spiritual sensation, than by any verbal description.
quotes.author: John Smith the Platonist

quotes.quote: That only which we have within, can we see without. If we meet no gods, it is because we harbour none. If there is grandeur in you, you will find grandeur in porters and sweeps. He only is rightly immortal, to whom all things are immortal.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Divinity is essentially the first of the professions, because it is necessary for all at all times; law and physics are only necessary for some at some times. I speak of them, of course, not in their abstract existence, but in their applicability to man.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: All divinity is love, or wonder.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: Cutting across the differences in doctrines between the great world religions - of Moses and Jesus, of Lao-tzu and Buddha, of Confucius and Mohammed - there remains the truth that God is what man finds that is divine in himself. God is the best way man can behave in the ordinary occasions of life, and the farthest point to which man can stretch himself.
quotes.author: Max Lerner

quotes.quote: If Jesus is the Son of God, his teachings are more than just good ideas from a wise teacher; they are divine insights on which I can confidently build my life.
quotes.author: Lee Strobel

quotes.quote: To err is human—but it feels divine.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: No one was ever great without some portion of divine inspiration.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: We need to stop anticipating the worst that could happen and start anticipating His divine presence in our circumstances.
quotes.author: Ranal Currie

quotes.quote: When you revere the feminine, you worship the divine.
quotes.author: Vishwas Chavan

quotes.quote: The aim of meditation or spiritual practice is to discover and touch the divine spark by going deep within.
quotes.author: Sri M

quotes.quote: To iterate is human, to recurse divine.
quotes.author: L. Peter Deutsch

quotes.quote: Ask for divine guidance only if you are willing to act on it.
quotes.author: Ronda Del Boccio

quotes.quote: Divine help comes to us sometimes in the most roundabout way.
quotes.author: Susan Trexel

quotes.quote: Dignity has nothing to do with divinity.
quotes.author: Jack Arnold Alexander Tancred Gurney

quotes.quote: The Divine loves us best at our broken times.
quotes.author: Rev Bem

quotes.quote: Cruelty has a human heart, / And Jealousy a human face; / Terror the human form divine, / And Secresy the human dress. / The human dress is forged iron, / The human form a fiery forge, / The human face a furnace sealed, / The human heart its hungry gorge.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: I do and don’t believe in God, / at exactly the same time / A paradox like the Trinity, / an unwritten verse that rhymes / I feel him inside me with every step, / while knowing he’s not there / I carry his joy within my heart, / though reason not to share / A metaphysical oxymoron, / incomprehensibly proclaimed / And while science tears him limb from limb / —I still call out his name.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: Divorce isn't such a tragedy. A tragedy's staying in an unhappy marriage, teaching your children the wrong things about love. Nobody ever died of divorce.
quotes.author: Jennifer Weiner

quotes.quote: In every marriage more than a week old there are grounds for divorce. The trick is to find and continue to find grounds for marriage.
quotes.author: Robert Anderson

quotes.quote: A divorce is like an amputation:You survive it, but there's less of you.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: I've gone through a really hard divorce, and anyone who has gone through a divorce will speak about how hard the journey is from start to finish. It's a life-uprooting time.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.quote: When two people decide to get a divorce, it isn't a sign that they don't understand one another, but a sign that they have, at last, begun to.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: People do not get married planning to divorce. Divorce is the result of a lack of preparation for marriage and the failure to learn the skills of working together as teammates in an intimate relationship.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: There would be fewer divorces if men gave as much loving attention to their wives as they do their cars and jobs.
quotes.author: Vikrant Parsai

quotes.quote: Divorce is a fire exit.When a house is burning,it doesn't matter who set the fire.If there is no fire exit,everyone in the house will be burned!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Being divorced is like being hit by a Mack truck. If you live through it, you start looking very carefully to the right and to the left.
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.quote: Every divorce is the result of selfishness on the part of one or the other or both parties to a marriage contract. Someone is thinking of self comforts, conveniences, freedoms, luxuries, or ease. Sometimes the ceaseless pin pricking of an unhappy, discontented, and selfish spouse can finally add up to serious physical violence. Sometimes people are goaded to the point where they erringly feel justified in doing the things that are so wrong. Nothing of course justifies sin.
quotes.author: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.quote: Getting divorced just because you don't love a man is almost as silly as getting married just because you do.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: The remedy for most marital stress is not in divorce. It is in repentance and forgiveness, in sincere expressions of charity and service. It is not in separation. It is in simple integrity that leads a man and a woman to square up their shoulders and meet their obligations. It is found in the Golden Rule, a time-honored principle that should first and foremost find expression in marriage.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckle

quotes.quote: Divorce is a failed challenge, which leads to a broken life. It is a socially transmittable disease that can transfer from one generation to another, and it is spreading fast.
quotes.author: Sia F. Dean

quotes.quote: People get divorced for one reason and one reason only: One or both of them get selfish.
quotes.author: Pastor Mark Gungor

quotes.quote: Each divorce is the death of a small civilization.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: To get divorced because love has died, is like selling your car because it's run out of gas.
quotes.author: Diane Sollee

quotes.quote: Divorce is like an amputation. Sometimes it's necessary but it should be avoided if at all possible because it brings about a permanent disability.
quotes.author: Bill Doherty

quotes.quote: It takes two to destroy a marriage.
quotes.author: Margaret Trudeau

quotes.quote: Divorce is one of the most financially traumatic things you can go through. Money spent on getting mad or getting even is money wasted.
quotes.author: Richard Wagner

quotes.quote: Divorce is a declaration of independence with only two signers.
quotes.author: Gerald F. Lieberman

quotes.quote: For some reason, we see divorce as a signal of failure, despite the fact that each of us has a right, and an obligation, to rectify any other mistake we make in life.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: Divorce should be the last possible option, rather than something we should be smoothing the passage to.
quotes.author: Brian Adam

quotes.quote: Divorce is the one human tragedy that reduces everything to cash.
quotes.author: Rita Brown

quotes.quote: Divorce looks like one of the fastest ways to destroy your wealth.
quotes.author: Jay Zagorsky

quotes.quote: Divorce is the psychological equivalent of a triple coronary bypass.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Blakely

quotes.quote: Love is grand; divorce is a hundred grand.
quotes.author: Shinichi Suzuki

quotes.quote: Divorce is a game played by lawyers.
quotes.author: Cary Grant

quotes.quote: If you have been divorced, you know it hurts -especially if your marriage had lasted many years.Whatever the circumstances of your relationship,and whatever the nature of its ending,there is always grief and regret -perhaps regret over the ending,or perhaps regret over not ending the relationship sooner -or perhaps both.Nonetheless, move past the grief and regret.No matter how painful, divorce, like all endings,opens the door to new beginnings.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: When people divorce, it's always such a tragedy. At the same time, if people stay together it can be even worse.
quotes.author: Monica Bellucci

quotes.quote: Divorce is the sacrament of adultery.
quotes.author: French Proverbs

quotes.quote: Divorce is one of the most stressful life events anyone goes through.
quotes.author: Emily Doskow

quotes.quote: Divorce is an embarrassing public admission of defeat.
quotes.author: Tracy Letts

quotes.quote: Divorce is like cutting off a gangrened arm to save the rest of the body.
quotes.author: David Knox and Caroline Schacht

quotes.quote: Divorce is like death without a burial.
quotes.author: Dane Cunningham

quotes.quote: Divorce is probably as painful as death.
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.quote: Divorce is the key that opens the strongbox where the bonds of matrimony are kept under wedlock.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: So many persons think divorce a panacea for every ill, who find out, when they try it, that the remedy is worse than the disease.
quotes.author: DOROTHY DIX

quotes.quote: Going through a divorce is like having every aspect of your life played back. Anything you have mishandled or regretted is talked about by everyone as they try to figure out who was right and who the innocent party really is. The comfort you once experienced is gone completely. There are many choices for new comfort, but most of them have no value except introducing new addictions or pounds of fat or guilt.
quotes.author: Kandace Cooper

quotes.quote: Divorce isn't the child's fault. Don't say anything unkind about your ex to the child, because you're really just hurting the child.
quotes.author: Valerie Bertinelli

quotes.quote: Marriages come and go, but divorces are forever.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: Divorce is the price people play for playing with matches.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Divorce can sometimes be for the better. You may end up with happier parents, and you will definitely learn a lot about yourself! And that's the whole point of growing up. So if you think about it, there are reasons to be happy about this experience, if you can learn and grow from it.
quotes.author: Zoe Stern

quotes.quote: People that go through what I went through and people going through divorce, it's really a difficulty process; it's heartbreaking and it hurts really bad. It can really mess with your head.
quotes.author: David Arquette

quotes.quote: Divorce: a resumption of diplomatic relations and rectification of boundaries.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Losing a mate to death is devastating but it's not a personal attack like divorce. When somebody you love stops loving you and walks away, it's an insult beyond comparison.
quotes.author: Sue Merrell

quotes.quote: I don't see divorce as a failure. I see it as the end to a story. In a story, everything has an end and a beginning.
quotes.author: Olga Kurylenko

quotes.quote: I used to think that divorce meant failure, but now I see it more as a step along the path of self-realization and growth
quotes.author: Alana Stewart

quotes.quote: Divorce = Rebirth: forget the past, replan your life, improve your appearance & REJUVENATE!
quotes.author: Rossana Condoleo

quotes.quote: Divorce in a young-adult novel means what being orphaned meant in a fairy tale: vulnerability, danger, unwanted independence.
quotes.author: Caitlin Flanagan

quotes.quote: Divorce is open-heart surgery, emotionally. Some people are not willing to give it enough time, and their expectations for recovery are too fast. When you get up and go faster than you're supposed to and you push your healing cycle too quickly, you have to do it over again and you get a relapse.
quotes.author: Steve Grissom and Kathy Leonard

quotes.quote: Some people believe holding on and hanging in there are signs of great strength. However, there are times when it takes much more strength to know when to let go and then do it.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Freeing yourself was one thing, claiming ownership of that freed self was another.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: You never really know a man until you have divorced him.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: Do not look for healing at the feet of those who broke you.
quotes.author: Rupi Kaur

quotes.quote: If you spend your time hoping someone will suffer the consequences for what they did to your heart, then you’re allowing them to hurt you a second time in your mind.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Heartbreak is a loss. Divorce is a piece of paper.
quotes.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid

quotes.quote: Letting go doesn’t mean that you don’t care about someone anymore. It’s just realizing that the only person you really have control over is yourself.
quotes.author: Deborah Reber

quotes.quote: Taking a thing apart is always faster than putting something together. This is true of everything except marriage.
quotes.author: Joe Hill

quotes.quote: Divorce shreds the muscles of our hearts so that they will hardly beat without a struggle.
quotes.author: E. Lockhart

quotes.quote: The arrangements that couples make in order to maintain civility in the midst of their journey to divorce are often most elaborate when the professed top priority is to protect a child.
quotes.author: John Irving

quotes.quote: Divorce is never a pleasant experience. You look upon it as a failure. But I learned to be a different person once we broke up. Sometimes you learn more from failure than you do from success.
quotes.author: Michael Crawford

quotes.quote: Divorce is not the end of the world. It’s worse to stay in an unhealthy marriage. That’s a worse example for the children.
quotes.author: Jerry Hall

quotes.quote: Divorce is an expensive punishment love gets when it fails.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Imagine spreading everything you care about on a blanket and then tossing the whole thing up in the air. The process of divorce is about loading that blanket, throwing it up, watching it all spin, and worrying what stuff will break when it lands.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: Don’t be afraid. Be focused. Be determined. Be hopeful. Be empowered.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: The snag about marriage is, it isn’t worth the divorce.
quotes.author: Suzanne Finnamore

quotes.quote: Staying married may have long-term benefits. You can elicit much more sympathy from friends over a bad marriage than you ever can from a good divorce.
quotes.author: P. J. O’Rourke

quotes.quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
quotes.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes.quote: Every woman that finally figured out her worth, has picked up her suitcases of pride and boarded a flight to freedom, which landed in the valley of change.
quotes.author: Shannon L Alder

quotes.quote: Divorce is something that I never dreamed would happen to me. But it did.
quotes.author: Dick Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Divorce is never a nice thing, but it’s very easy to take family for granted, and when there’s a divorce, you don’t take things for granted so much.
quotes.author: Ivanka Trump

quotes.quote: You know why divorces are so expensive? Because they're worth it.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: Divorce is a process, not an event.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: To be alive is to be dizzy and not to know exactly where to go.
quotes.author: Ander Monson

quotes.quote: Education has become a prisoner of contemporaneity. It is the past, not the dizzy present, that is the best door to the future.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: Nobody can make a putt that breaks to the right. It's unnatural. Unless you're left-handed, of course. Standing over a putt that breaks to the right can actually make you dizzy. I've long thought that right-breaking putts are a major contributor to mental and physical ill health.
quotes.author: Dan Jenkins

quotes.quote: Once you start losing reality, when you start losing reality with yourself, sometimes people just get dizzy.
quotes.author: DJ Khaled

quotes.quote: Love is hope and expectation. If many want to pencil it in, some don’t dare to ink it in, because love also means mystery and enigma. ( " Love as dizzy as a cathedral")
quotes.author: Erik Pevernagie

quotes.quote: Dizzy used to tell me that I am playing too hard. He used to say to not give everything. Miles used to tell me that too.
quotes.author: Freddie Hubbard

quotes.quote: I loved him in a way that you can really only do the first time around. It's the kind of love that doesn't know better and doesn't want to-it's dizzy and foolish and fierce. That kind of love is really a one-time-only thing.
quotes.author: Jenny Han

quotes.quote: This is love, I think. A place where people who have been alone may lock together like hawks and spin in the air, dizzy with surprise at the connection. A place you go willingly, and with wonder.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: With you, I'm always on the verge - feeling dizzy like looking at waves - and you, my Love, make me tipsy...
quotes.author: John Geddes

quotes.quote: I am sailing with thee through the dizzy sky! How beautiful thou art!
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: If youre serious about what youre doing, youve got to keep your head and follow your instinct. Maybe you wont reach the same dizzy heights as others, but you will get something back.
quotes.author: Jonny Lee Miller

quotes.quote: I love the idea of being without an identity, it gives me a lot of room to play around; but it makes me dizzy, having nowhere to hang my hat.
quotes.author: Kate Bornstein

quotes.quote: They were tower stairs, a tight corkscrew down. The spiraling descent made Karou dizzy: down, around, down, around, hypnotic, until it seemed as if she were caught in a purgatory of stairs and would go down like this forever.
quotes.author: Laini Taylor

quotes.quote: I am trying so hard to live in the moment and enjoy it while it's happening, because it feels like a moving freight train that I just got on, and I'm trying not to look back and get dizzy!
quotes.author: Laura Bell Bundy

quotes.quote: The butterflies are working their way up from my stomach into my head, making me feel dizzy, and I try to calm myself by imagining the ocean outside, its ragged breathing, the seagulls turning pinwheels in the sky. It will be over soon, I tell myself. It will be over soon and then you’ll go home, and you’ll never have to think about the evaluation again.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: When you get quick fame and success and exposure, it makes you feel dizzy, and I didn't want to lose my balance 'cause that's something I've been struggling with for so many years. I'm not fond of the idea of making it in Hollywood. That's not my aim; otherwise, I would have settled down in Los Angeles.
quotes.author: Ludivine Sagnier

quotes.quote: Know what to do if you feel faint or dizzy, especially if you might fall and hit your head.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: A man never reaches that dizzy height of wisdom when he can no longer be led by the nose.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you have a beautiful view, you don't need a good wine to feel dizzy.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Mystery is the wine of this universe. It makes us dizzy and makes us feel happy! Man needs enigma so that he can get rid of the dullness of the reality!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: As long as the world is turning and spinning, we're gonna be dizzy and we're gonna make mistakes.
quotes.author: Mel Brooks

quotes.quote: If someone says that he can think or talk about quantum physics without becoming dizzy, that shows only that he has not understood anything whatever about it.
quotes.author: Murray Gell-Mann

quotes.quote: With ideas it is like with dizzy heights you climb: At first they cause you discomfort and you are anxious to get down, distrustful of your own powers; but soon the remoteness of the turmoil of life and the inspiring influence of the altitude calm your blood; your step gets firm and sure and you begin to look - for dizzier heights.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.quote: You get very tired, and there was a certain amount of pain and you slow up. Your legs are so tired that you are in fact slowing. If you don't keep running, keep your blood circulating, the muscles stop pumping the blood back and you get dizzy.
quotes.author: Roger Bannister

quotes.quote: I think diseases have no eyes. They pick with a dizzy finger anyone, just anyone.
quotes.author: Sandra Cisneros

quotes.quote: Anxiety is the dizziness of freedom.
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Dizzy with excitement is no mere phrase.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: I am wondering; an alcoholic and a 'craziholic' who is the greatest 'holic'? In other words, the dizziness of drunkenness and the dazedness of madness, which is the greatest 'ness'?
quotes.author: Vincent Okay Nwachukwu

quotes.quote: If God could be the DJ, then Life is the dance floor; Love is the rhythm and You are the music.
quotes.author: Pink

quotes.quote: Don't put off things till it's too late. You are the DJ of your fate.
quotes.author: Vikram Seth

quotes.quote: They gonna try to close the door on you. Just open it.
quotes.author: DJ Khaled

quotes.quote: There's a lot of creativity in the industry, but I don't necessarily think that the most creative DJs or producers are always the biggest ones.
quotes.author: Flume

quotes.quote: A lot of DJs don't realize they're here today and gone tomorrow. They're literally taking jets to every show. It's crazy how much money they're spending.
quotes.author: Diplo

quotes.quote: I'm a DJ. I get the party started.
quotes.author: Avicii

quotes.quote: Saying you only want to hear a DJ play one genre of music is like going to a restaurant saying you only want to eat cheese.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: DJs are in incredible competition, musically. And they are the most musically creative and sensitive people in all the music charts. I am amazed how they are.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: People like me, DJs and producers, have a bigger say and a bigger voice than we've ever had before.
quotes.author: Thomas Wesley Pentz

quotes.quote: DJs are the new rock stars.
quotes.author: Tiesto

quotes.quote: Bands perform songs. DJs perform records.
quotes.author: Greil Marcus

quotes.quote: The job of feets is walking, but their hobby is dancing.
quotes.author: Sakshi Thakare

quotes.quote: DNA is like a computer program but far, far more advanced than any software ever created.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: All of today's DNA, strung through all the cells of the earth, is simply an extension and elaboration of [the] first molecule.
quotes.author: Lewis Thomas

quotes.quote: DNAÂ has been aptly described as the first three-dimensional Xerox machine.
quotes.author: Kenneth Boulding

quotes.quote: Would a DNA test for love take a sample from the heart or the mind?
quotes.author: Dean Cavanagh

quotes.quote: DNAÂ is ROM. It can be read millions of times over, but only written to once - when it is first assembled the birth of the cell in which it resides.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: DNAÂ has nothing to do with success. Turn your genes into overalls and get to work.
quotes.author: Darren Hardy

quotes.quote: DNAÂ is a quantum computer that localizes a non local omnipresent consciousness or spirit into space time energy information and matter.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The information inÂ DNAÂ could no more be reduced to the chemical than could the ideas in a book be reduced to the ink and paper: something beyond physics and chemistry encodedÂ DNA.
quotes.author: Michael Polanyi

quotes.quote: OnceÂ DNAÂ acquires the ability to persist forever, the carriers become disposable. Essentially, our bodies are designed to last long enough to reproduce.
quotes.author: S. Jay Olshansky

quotes.quote: DNAÂ ties us all together; we share ancestry with barracuda and bacteria and mushrooms, if you go far enough back.
quotes.author: Spencer Wells

quotes.quote: NaturalÂ DNAÂ is a tractless coil, like an unwound and tangled audiotape on the floor of the car in the dark.
quotes.author: Kary Mullis

quotes.quote: DNAÂ is like Midas's gold, everyone who touches it goes mad.
quotes.author: Maurice Wilkins

quotes.quote: DNAÂ doesn't make a family. Love does.
quotes.author: Sherri Saum

quotes.quote: There is in theÂ DNAÂ of the Italians a bit of madness, which in the overwhelming majority of cases is positive. It is genius. It is talent. It's the masterpieces of art. It's the food, fashion, everything that makes Italy great in the world.
quotes.author: Matteo Renzi

quotes.quote: Understanding howÂ DNAÂ transmits all it knows about cancer, physics, dreaming and love will keep man searching for some time.
quotes.author: David R. Brower

quotes.quote: It is in ourÂ DNAÂ to create space, to open up safe places, and to change the atmosphere where we live.
quotes.author: Graham Cooke

quotes.quote: DNA neither cares nor knows. DNA just is. And we dance to its music.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: We all have spiritualÂ DNA; wisdom and truth are part of our genetic structure even if we don't always access it.
quotes.author: Surya Das

quotes.quote: If you can write DNA, you're no longer limited to 'what is' but to what you could make.
quotes.author: Drew Endy

quotes.quote: Trying to read our DNA is like trying to understand software code - with only 90% of the code riddled with errors. It's very difficult in that case to understand and predict what that software code is going to do.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: It's in your DNA to be a Filipino; how can you just turn your back on it?
quotes.author: Lea Salonga

quotes.quote: DNAÂ is the messenger which illuminates that connection,handed down from generation to generation,carried,literally,in the bodies of my ancestors.
quotes.author: Bryan Sykes

quotes.quote: Do what you love. Know your own bone; gnaw at it, bury it, unearth it, and gnaw it still.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Do what you love, and do it well - that's much more meaningful than any metric.
quotes.author: Kevin Systrom

quotes.quote: You only have one life and if you're not doing what you love, what's the point?
quotes.author: Hillary Swank

quotes.quote: Find a way to get paid for doing what you love. Then every paycheck will be a bonus.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: You might not make it to the top, but if you are doing what you love, there is much more happiness there than being rich or famous.
quotes.author: Tony Hawk

quotes.quote: It's not just a question of doing what you love for a living. It's about doing what you love with love. Then your life and all be transformed.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: Ultimately, if you're not doing what you love, you're not going to be fulfilled. Sure, to make money, you have to be tough, you have to have some smarts and a little luck would help, but the bottom line is: You have to love what you do.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: It's important to be successful enough to be able to keep doing what you love.
quotes.author: Lyle Lovett

quotes.quote: Doing what you love isn't a priviledge; it's an obligation.
quotes.author: Barbara Sher

quotes.quote: When you are doing what you love to do, you become resilient.
quotes.author: Dick Costolo

quotes.quote: To be 'on purpose' means you're doing what you love to do, doing what you're good at, and accomplishing what's important to you.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: Never give up searching for the job that you’re passionate about. Try to find the job you’d have if you were independently rich. Forget about the pay. When you’re associating with the people that you love, doing what you love, it doesn’t get any better than that.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: It is highly impossible for you to be successful at what you don’t love. Do what you love and love what you do.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: If you are going to devote your time to do something you claim you love, take this thought; "Do I love it? Can I have peace within if I refuse to have it done?" This is passion.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: You can fail at what you don't want, so you might as well take a chance on doing what you love.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Do what you love and the necessary resources will follow.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: Do what you love to do and give it your very best. Whether it's business or baseball, or the theater, or any field. If you don't love what you're doing and you can't give it your best, get out of it. Life is too short. You'll be an old man before you know it.
quotes.author: Al Lopez

quotes.quote: Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.
quotes.author: David Frost

quotes.quote: The ultimate dream in life is to be able to do what you love and learn something from it.
quotes.author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quotes.quote: The way to stay inspired and motivated is by doing what you like, doing what you love.
quotes.author: Raphael Saadiq

quotes.quote: Do what you love, and you will find the way to get it out to the world.
quotes.author: Judy Collins

quotes.quote: Do what you love and the money will follow.
quotes.author: Marsha Sinetar

quotes.quote: You must learn to enjoy life and have fun doing what you love.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: To be a success, love what you do and what you love.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: The life of a wild animal always has a tragic end.
quotes.author: Ernest Thompson Seton

quotes.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: Always do your best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment; it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best.
quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.quote: Perfection is impossible; just strive to do your best.
quotes.author: Angela Watson

quotes.quote: If you try to do your best there is no failure.
quotes.author: Mike Farrell

quotes.quote: It is not enough to do your best; you must know what to do, and then do your best.
quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.quote: Do your best when no one is looking. If you do that, then you can be successful in anything that you put your mind to.
quotes.author: Bob Cousy

quotes.quote: You can only do your best. That's all you can do. And if it isn't good enough, it isn't good enough.
quotes.author: Imelda Staunton

quotes.quote: You always feel pressure to do your best, and when you know that the story revolves around you, it become very overwhelming.
quotes.author: Lauren Ashley Carter

quotes.quote: You have to love what you do, to give your best.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: You have to first do your best before you expect God to do the rest for you.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Don't beat up yourself up for what you couldn't do, or didn't do. Just do the best you can now, and now.
quotes.author: Akiroq Brost

quotes.quote: Doing your best is more important than being the best.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Like what you do, and then you will do your best.
quotes.author: Katherine Johnson

quotes.quote: Do your best, one shot at a time and then move on. Remember that golf is just a game.
quotes.author: Nancy Lopez

quotes.quote: When you are entrusted with an assignment, you do your best.
quotes.author: Tu Youyou

quotes.quote: You do your best with the realization that nothing gets you in ring-shape better than being in the ring.
quotes.author: Shawn Michaels

quotes.quote: Nerves can be useful, as they sharpen you up, make you determined to try you hardest and do your best.
quotes.author: Stephen Cole

quotes.quote: Our profession is the only one which works unceasingly to annihilate itself.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: The best doctor is the one you run to and can't find.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: My doctor is wonderful. Once when I couldn't afford an operation, he touched up the X-rays.
quotes.author: Joey Bishop

quotes.quote: Doctors are men who prescribe medicines of which they know little, to cure diseases of which they know less, in human beings of whom they know nothing.
quotes.author: Francois Marie Arouet Voltaire

quotes.quote: My doctor is nice; every time I see him, I'm ashamed of what I think of doctors in general.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: The doctor of the future will give no medicine but will interest his patients in the care of the human frame, in diet and in the cause and prevention of disease.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: We are in the age of M.D., medical darkness, which seeks legislative protection from the light.
quotes.author: James Lendall Basford

quotes.quote: The man who doctors himself with the aid of medical books, runs the risk of dying of a typographical error.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Doctors think a lot of patients are cured who have simply quit in disgust.
quotes.author: Don Herold

quotes.quote: Disease increases in proportion to the increase in the number of doctors in a place.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You may not be able to read a doctor's handwriting and prescription, but you'll notice his bills are neatly typewritten.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: An ignorant doctor is the aide de camp of death.
quotes.author: Avicenna

quotes.quote: You need a good bedside manner with doctors or you will get nowhere.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Doctors always think anybody doing something they aren't is a quack; also they think all patients are idiots.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: You can't judge the ability of a doctor by the amount of praise the undertakers give him.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: My doctor told me I shouldn't work out until I'm in better shape. I told him, All right; don't send me a bill until I pay you.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: A great doctor kills more people than a great general.
quotes.author: G.W. Leibniz

quotes.quote: Surgeons must be very careful when they take the knife! Underneath their fine incisions. Stirs the Culprit Life!
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Though the doctors treated him, let his blood, and gave him medications to drink, he nevertheless recovered.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Doctors don't seem to realize that most of us are perfectly content not having to visualize ourselves as animated bags of skin filled with obscene glop.
quotes.author: Joe Haldeman

quotes.quote: A doctor whose breath smells has no right to medical opinion.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: Though fancy may be the patient's complaint, necessity is often the doctor's.
quotes.author: Zimmermann

quotes.quote: My intent was to carry out my duty as a doctor, to end their suffering. Unfortunately, that entailed, in their cases, ending of the life.
quotes.author: Jack Kevorkian

quotes.quote: The doctor is not unfrequently death's pilot fish.
quotes.author: G. D. Prentice

quotes.quote: It is not much trouble to doctor sick folks, but to doctor healthy ones is troublesome.
quotes.author: H. W. SHAW

quotes.quote: The best doctors in the world are Doctor Diet, Doctor Quiet, and Doctor Merryman.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: I know of nothing more laughable than a doctor who does not die of old age.
quotes.author: Francois Marie Arouet Voltaire

quotes.quote: People pay the doctor for his trouble; for his kindness they still remain in his debt.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: A wealthy doctor who can help a poor man, and will not without a fee, has less sense of humanity than a poor ruffian, who kills a rich man to supply his necessities.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: I wondher why ye can always read a doctor's bill an' ye niver can read his purscription.
quotes.author: Finley Peter Dunne

quotes.quote: Doctors are the same as lawyers, the sole difference being that lawyers only rob you, but doctors rob you and kill you too.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: The most exquisite pleasure in the practice of medicine comes from nudging a layman in the direction of terror, then bringing him back to safety again.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Doctors are great as long as you don't need them.
quotes.author: Edward E. Rosenbaum

quotes.quote: Never go to a doctor whose office plants have died.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: I got the bill for my surgery. Now I know what those doctors were wearing masks for.
quotes.author: James H. Boren

quotes.quote: You cannot be a good doctor without pity.
quotes.author: Axel Munthe

quotes.quote: Most doctors are prisoners of their education and shackled by their profession.
quotes.author: Richard Diaz

quotes.quote: God heals and the doctor takes the fees.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Doctors put a wall up between themselves and their patients; nurses broke it down.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Medicines cure diseases, but only doctors can cure patients.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: I told the doctor I broke my leg in two places. He told me to quit going to those places.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: A doctor gave a man six months to live. The man couldn't pay his bill, so he gave him another six months.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: You know what they call the fellow who finishes last in his medical school graduating class? They call him Doctor.
quotes.author: Abe Lemons

quotes.quote: A doctor is a man who writes prescriptions, till the patient either dies or is cured by nature.
quotes.author: John Taylor

quotes.quote: Where there's a doctor it's always a bad sign. Even when they are not doing the killing themselves it means a death is close, and in that way they are like ravens or crows.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as an infallible doctor.
quotes.author: Edward E. Rosenbaum

quotes.quote: I mean some doctor told me I had six months to live and I went to their funeral.
quotes.author: Keith Richard

quotes.quote: Each patient carries his own doctor inside him.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: For each illness that doctors cure with medicine, they provoke ten in healthy people by inoculating them with the virus that is a thousand times more powerful than any microbe: the idea that one is ill.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: There is more to be feared from the doctor than the disease.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: Better to hunt in fields, for health unbought, / Than fee the doctor for a nauseous draught, / The wise, for cure, on exercise depend; / God never made his work, for man to mend.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: The only difference between lawyers and doctors is that lawyers simply rob you, whereas doctors both rob you and kill you too.
quotes.author: Anton Chekov

quotes.quote: Sometimes even doctors need to be reminded that laughter is the best medicine.
quotes.author: Martha Bolton

quotes.quote: Crime isn't a disease, it's a symptom. Cops are like a doctor that gives you aspirin for a brain tumor.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: Personally I have always felt that the best doctor in the world is the veterinarian. He can't ask his patients what's the matter—He's got to just know.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The doctor must act as agent of the sick man's will to live and as supporter of his right to live.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: The busy, capable doctor, well aware of all the burdens he must carry, and not in the least inclined to shirk his duties, may stumble badly in those small moral moments that constantly press upon him or her— the nature of a hello or good-bye, the tone of voice as a question is asked or answered, the private thoughts one has and the effect they have on our face, our hands as they do their work, our posture, our gait.
quotes.author: Robert Coles

quotes.quote: He wrote a doctor's hand— the hand which from the beginning of time has been so disastrous to the pharmacist and so profitable to the undertaker.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It is a poor doctor who cannot prescribe an expensive cure for rich patient.
quotes.author: Sydney Tremayne

quotes.quote: Our doctor would never really operate unless it was absolutely necessary. He was just that way. If he didn't need the money, he wouldn't lay a hand on you.
quotes.author: Herb Shriner

quotes.quote: Doctors prescribe medicines of which they know little, to cure diseases of which they know less, in human beings of which they know nothing.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: A smart mother makes often a better diagnosis than a poor doctor.
quotes.author: August Bier

quotes.quote: God and the doctor we alike adore / But only when in danger, not before; / The danger o'er, both are alike requited, / God is forgotten, and the Doctor slighted.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.quote: And for my nimbly penurious and diminutively groping persona; / an unfathomably enlightening poem a day; / keeps the doctor forever away.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Count the mossy marbles in the graveyard! / Our old doctor and his patients, there they lie. / All regardless of the weather, / They are waiting there together, / For that long-sought 'better by-and-by.'
quotes.author: Henry Clay Work

quotes.quote: After you find out all the things that can go wrong, your life becomes less about living and more about waiting.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Doctors and nurses are among the most irradiated professions.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: There's never been a doctor who served many patients who, despite their best efforts, did not lose some of them to death. But they understood that was part of life itself.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Joy, temperance, and repose, slam the door on the doctor's nose.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: A doctor can bury his mistakes but an architect can only advise his clients to plant vines.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: It is not the healthy who need a doctor, but the sick. I have not come to call the righteous, but sinners to repentance.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.quote: Cowards die many times before their death......and the valiant doctors save them from dying...
quotes.author: Ankala Subbarao

quotes.quote: Your doctors have the ability to legally kill you with a cocktail of potent prescription drugs.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: When I told my doctor I couldn't afford an operation, he offered to touch-up my X-rays.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: Illness is the doctor to whom we pay most heed; to kindness, to knowledge, we make promise only; pain we obey.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: When a doctor does go wrong he is the first of criminals. He has nerve and he has knowledge.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Whenever a doctor cannot do good, he must be kept from doing harm.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Dodgeball is a sport of violence, exclusion, and degradation.
quotes.author: Rawson Marshall Thurber

quotes.quote: And he won't be allowed to play dodgeball because it's exclusionary, and it promotes aggression. Standing around is still okay.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: The day I stop caring about dodgeball is the day the Earth starts spinning around the sun.
quotes.author: Andrew Lawrence

quotes.quote: Of my life. But I love sports. Dodgeball was the best. I was the fastest one out there. Course, I was the ball.
quotes.author: Pete Docter

quotes.quote: I think it's like a game of dodgeball. There's a lot of chaos and screaming
quotes.author: Bill Lawrence

quotes.quote: I've got my telescope head in the haystack / I'm getting tired of your dodgeball circus act / Put pepper in my coffee, I forgot to bark on command
quotes.author: Bill Berry

quotes.quote: The old heads told me life wasn't a game / But mine steady feeling like pinball, dodgeball / Chasing freedom, establish a kingdom
quotes.author: Damon Dash

quotes.quote: I’m at the park playing dodgeball / Drinking San Pellegrino like it’s Cristal / No school, alcohol / Living no rules—Calvinball
quotes.author: George Watsky

quotes.quote: Memories / Going back and forth / Like dodgeball / Babylove / Whatta ball / License to ill
quotes.author: Rob Regis

quotes.quote: As you're trying to shield your glass / Newborn from the dodgeballs / And aching for children / That you have never seen / It's still a tragedy
quotes.author: Kristin Hersh

quotes.quote: Also, dodgeball is a great way to relieve stress.
quotes.author: Michele Jakubowski

quotes.quote: Yes! Of all the fun things we do in gym, dodgeball is my favorite!
quotes.author: Michele Jakubowski

quotes.quote: Dodgeball is not only a favored recreational activity for young people, it has also become an often-used team-building exercise in the business world.
quotes.author: Robyn Waters

quotes.quote: Turns out all that dodging, ducking, and running provides a real aerobic workout.
quotes.author: Robyn Waters

quotes.quote: Dodgeball cardio classes have proliferated, as have official dodgeball societies.
quotes.author: Robyn Waters

quotes.quote: While dodgeball and double Dutch are examples of actual games being reinvented, there are instances where a redesign of a game's accouterments can lead to revitalized sales and a boost for the sport itself.
quotes.author: Robyn Waters

quotes.quote: As the number of players on each team began to decrease, the quality of Dodgeball on the court began to increase.
quotes.author: N.C. Yeutter

quotes.quote: Naysayers classify dodgeball as mere game. They have a point: dodgeball is a popular recess activity in many elementary schools.
quotes.author: Scott McNeely

quotes.quote: Don't be fooled. Modern dodgeball is played by serious-minded adults in competitive leagues both in the USA and internationally.
quotes.author: Scott McNeely

quotes.quote: Most young dodgeball players think that throwing hard is how to win, but I've learned that's not the best way to play the game. Use accuracy, bounce throws and other tricks to fool the player in the middle. If you throw hard, you lose accuracy.
quotes.author: Matthew E. Alleyne

quotes.quote: Dodgeball isn't much fun because Dead Kids like to come right up to you and throw the ball as hard as they can at the top of your head or your stomach.
quotes.author: Andrew Wedderburn

quotes.quote: I think that Dodgeball detailed an entire generation of Americans. It's the true red menace.
quotes.author: Stuart Kantor

quotes.quote: Dodgeball is as harmful to America's children as water is to fish.
quotes.author: Stuart Kantor

quotes.quote: Dodgeball is one of the first opportunities in life to figure out which one you are and how you're going to deal with it.
quotes.author: Christina Hoff Sommers

quotes.quote: When you encounter a Dodgeball team, it is fairly easy to tell which players are the least skilled. The flatness if a player's face is a direct correlation to their ability.
quotes.author: Peter Nuttall

quotes.quote: All these games are based on a form of dodgeball which is popular and fun to play, uses very little equipment and is ideal for playing both indoors and out.
quotes.author: Mary Alianson

quotes.quote: The only children who like dodgeball are the ones who don't get hit, who don't get eliminated, who don't get whaled on.
quotes.author: Ayelet Waldman

quotes.quote: Dodgeball had been eliminated from grade school gym classes years ago because the already violent games only got worse when kids with superpowers were added to the mix.
quotes.author: William Boniface

quotes.quote: Playing around offers plenty of challenges--such as figuring out how to dominate in TicTac Toe or the best way to bean your buddy with a dodgeball.
quotes.author: Ben Applebaum

quotes.quote: For many kids, dodgeball isn't a game: It's revenge. It's their chance to settle a score in a legitimate fashion.
quotes.author: Julia Scheeres

quotes.quote: Take care of your balls and they'll take care of you.
quotes.author: Patches O'Houlihan

quotes.quote: I found that if you have a goal, that you might not reach it. But if you don't have one, then you are never disappointed. And I gotta tell ya it feels phenomenal.
quotes.author: Vince Vaughn

quotes.quote: If you can dodge a wrench, you can dodge a ball.
quotes.author: Patches O'Houlihan

quotes.quote: our True Nature Is Love. There's Nothing You Can Do About It.
quotes.author: Byron Katie

quotes.quote: Forget about where you want to be and go out and build stuff. Dodgeball came from being bored at work... things happen because you make them happen. Stop sketching, and start building.
quotes.author: Dennis Crowley

quotes.quote: Nobody makes me bleed my own blood. Nobody!
quotes.author: Ben Stiller

quotes.quote: Well I guess if a person never quit when the going got tough they wouldn't have anything to regret for the rest of their life.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Remember the 5 D's of dodgeball: Dodge, duck, dip, dive and dodge.
quotes.author: Patches O'Houlihan

quotes.quote: If you can dodge traffic, you can dodge a ball.
quotes.author: Patches O'Houlihan

quotes.quote: I'm not sure who invented dodgeball, but I can almost guarantee you that it wasn't the shortest kid in the class.
quotes.author: John Bingham

quotes.quote: The greatest pleasure of a dog is that you may make a fool of yourself with him and not only will he not scold you, but he will make a fool of himself too.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: If dogs could talk, perhaps we would find it as hard to get along with them as we do with people.
quotes.author: Capek

quotes.quote: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than he loves himself.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: If there are no dogs in Heaven, then when I die I want to go where they went.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: No one appreciates the very special genius of your conversation as much as the dog does.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: Man is a dog's idea of what God should be.
quotes.author: Holbrook Jackson

quotes.quote: A dog is one of the remaining reasons why some people can be persuaded to go for a walk.
quotes.author: O.A.

quotes.quote: If your dog doesn't like someone you probably shouldn't either.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Dogs are our link to paradise. They don't know evil or jealousy or discontent. To sit with a dog on a hillside on a glorious afternoon is to be back in Eden, where doing nothing was not boring--it was peace.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: I think we are drawn to dogs because they are the uninhibited creatures we might be if we weren't certain we knew better. They fight for honor at the first challenge, make love with no moral restraint, and they do not for all their marvelous instincts appear to know about death. Being such wonderfully uncomplicated beings, they need us to do their worrying.
quotes.author: George Bird Evans

quotes.quote: I've seen a look in dogs' eyes, a quickly vanishing look of amazed contempt, and I am convinced that basically dogs think humans are nuts.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Dogs have given us their absolute all. We are the center of their universe. We are the focus of their love and faith and trust. They serve us in return for scraps. It is without a doubt the best deal man has ever made.
quotes.author: Roger Caras

quotes.quote: If you think dogs can't count, try putting three dog biscuits in your pocket and then giving Fido only two of them.
quotes.author: Phil Pastoret

quotes.quote: Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole.
quotes.author: Roger Caras

quotes.quote: I have found that when you are deeply troubled, there are things you get from the silent devoted companionship of a dog that you can get from no other source.
quotes.author: Doris Gray

quotes.quote: Dogs never bite me. Just humans.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: If you pick up a starving dog and make him prosperous he will not bite you. This is the principal difference between a dog and man.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Petting, scratching, and cuddling a dog could be as soothing to the mind and heart as deep meditation and almost as good for the soul as prayer.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: A dog teaches a boy fidelity, perseverance, and to turn around three times before lying down.
quotes.author: Robert Benchley

quotes.quote: Dogs are wise. They crawl away into a quiet corner and lick their wounds and do not rejoin the world until they are whole once more.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: The world would be a nicer place if everyone had the ability to love as unconditionally as a dog.
quotes.author: M.K. Clinton

quotes.quote: Dogs love their friends and bite their enemies, quite unlike people, who are incapable of pure love and always have to mix love and hate.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Once you have had a wonderful dog, a life without one, is a life diminished.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Dogs don't rationalize. They don't hold anything against a person. They don't see the outside of a human but the inside of a human.
quotes.author: Cesar Millan

quotes.quote: You think dogs will not be in heaven? I tell you, they will be there long before any of us.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: A dog will teach you unconditional love. If you can have that in your life, things won't be too bad.
quotes.author: Robert Wagner

quotes.quote: Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail.
quotes.author: Kinky Friedman

quotes.quote: A bone to the dog is not charity. Charity is the bone shared with the dog, when you are just as hungry as the dog.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: The average dog is a nicer person than the average person.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: I love dogs. They live in the moment and don't care about anything except affection and food. They're loyal and happy. Humans are just too damn complicated.
quotes.author: David Duchovny

quotes.quote: Across cold, moon-bright distant stillness, a dog barks, and then another.
quotes.author: Harry Behn

quotes.quote: It is probably true, then, that dogs don't think about art, the origin of the universe, or geopolitics.
quotes.author: Roger A. Caras

quotes.quote: Dog owners spend a great deal of time looking down. That is because the production, cleanup, and analysis of stools are a very important component of maintaining a healthy dog.
quotes.author: Connie Vanacore

quotes.quote: Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog, it's too dark to read.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Why, a dog, when he sees a stranger, is angry; when an acquaintance he welcomes him, although the one has never done him any harm, not the other any good.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: ...there was nothing he enjoyed more...than a good book. He'd wander into the study, take down some leather-bound volume, and eat it.
quotes.author: Terence Brady

quotes.quote: If a dog will not come to you after he has looked you in the face, you ought to go home and examine your conscience.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Dog wisdom is inside the blood and bones.
quotes.author: Donald McCaig

quotes.quote: Let dogs delight to bark and bite, / For God hath made them so.
quotes.author: Isaac Watts

quotes.quote: We expect our dogs to listen to us when we speak to them and our dogs, no less than we, do expect us to listen to them.
quotes.author: Roger A. Caras

quotes.quote: Dogs are wolves, although they sometimes look like they are in sheep's clothing.
quotes.author: Bruce Fogle

quotes.quote: A dog is not 'almost human' and I know of no greater insult to the canine race than to describe it as such.
quotes.author: John Holmes

quotes.quote: The dog was created especially for children. He is the god of frolic.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Man himself cannot express love and humility by external signs so plainly as does a dog when with drooping ears, hanging lips, flexuous body, and wagging tail, he meets his beloved master.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: The dog can do many things which man cannot do, never could do, and never will do.
quotes.author: John Holmes

quotes.quote: Ever consider what dogs must think of us? I mean here we come back from the grocery store with the most amazing haul—chicken, pork, half a cow. They must think we're the greatest hunters on earth.
quotes.author: Anne Tyler

quotes.quote: Dogs go with the flow of life. If they have to go live in a new home or with new people, they accept it, adapt easily, and become happy in their new environment.
quotes.author: June Cotner

quotes.quote: The better I get to know men, the more I find myself loving dogs.
quotes.author: Gallic

quotes.quote: Dogs are simply the best at unconditional love. When you have the companionship of a canine, you experience love at the highest level.
quotes.author: Becca Anderson

quotes.quote: A puppy is but a dog, plus high spirits, and minus common sense.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: Dog's lives are too short. Their only fault, really.
quotes.author: Agnes Sligh Turnbull

quotes.quote: Dogs act exactly the way we would act if we had no shame.
quotes.author: Cynthia Heimel

quotes.quote: I think dogs are the most amazing creatures; they give unconditional love. For me, .they are the role model for being alive.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.quote: Did you ever walk into a room and forget why you walked in? I think that is how dogs spend their lives.
quotes.author: Sue Murphy

quotes.quote: We long for an affection altogether ignorant of our faults. Heaven has accorded this to us in the uncritical canine attachment.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Acquiring a dog may be the only opportunity a human ever has to choose a relative.
quotes.author: Mordecai Siegal

quotes.quote: She was such a beautiful and sweet creature...and so full of tricks.
quotes.author: Queen Victoria

quotes.quote: The most affectionate creature in the world is a wet dog.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: There are three faithful friends—an old wife, an old dog, and ready money.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Who does not feed the dog, feeds the thief.
quotes.author: Estonian Saying

quotes.quote: Grief is so painfully real, regardless of its origin. The love of, and attachment to, an animal friend can equal that of human relationships. Likewise, the loss of an animal can be just as devastating.
quotes.author: Rev. Joel L. Morgan

quotes.quote: The dog is a gentleman; I hope to go to his heaven, not man's.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A pet is never truly forgotten until it is no longer remembered.
quotes.author: Lacie Petitto

quotes.quote: A good dog never dies. He always stays. He walks besides you on crisp autumn days when frost is on the fields and winter's drawing near. His head is within our hand in his old way.
quotes.author: Mary Carolyn Davies

quotes.quote: The best way to get over a dog's death is to get another soon.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Heaven goes by favor. If it went by merit, you would stay out and your dog would go in.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Dogs do not ruin their sleep worrying about how to keep the objects they have, and to obtain the objects they have not. There is nothing of value they have to bequeath except their love and their faith.
quotes.author: Eugene O'Neill

quotes.quote: Time and again, the Faith has to all appearances gone to the dogs. But each time, it was the dog that died.
quotes.author: Gilbert K Chesterton

quotes.quote: I'm a great dog fanatic. My own dog died a little while ago and I take it very personally when things die-it's a major offence.
quotes.author: Clive Barker

quotes.quote: If I have any beliefs about immortality it is that certain dogs I know will go to heaven, and very very few people.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: A dead dog is more quiet than a house on the steppes, a chair in a empty room.
quotes.author: Per Petterson

quotes.quote: Dogs will eat till they die. Cats will leave food in the dish, incomprehensible to a dog.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.quote: Death ends a life, not a relationship.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Life is pleasant. Death is peaceful. It's the transition that's troublesome.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: I think God will have prepared everything for our perfect happiness. If it takes my dog being there in Heaven, I believe he'll be there.
quotes.author: Rev. Billy Graham

quotes.quote: A comrade who deserts a comrade is a cowardly dog, and all such dogs should die a dog's death, comrade.
quotes.author: Robert Harris

quotes.quote: Sometimes losing a pet is more painful than losing a human because in the case of the pet, you were not pretending to love it.
quotes.author: Amy Sedaris

quotes.quote: If there are no dogs in Heaven, then when I die I want to go where they went.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The interment and commemoration of her dog identify Mamie as one of those Victorians who sought 'to signify the value of an animal through our species' practices our mourning and memorialization.
quotes.author: Georgina Hogarth

quotes.quote: Who does not glory in the death of a fine stag? on the spot— when in truth he ought to be ashamed of the assassination.
quotes.author: Sir Edwin Landseer

quotes.quote: My dog was put to death. For the first time since the invasion, the presence of the enemy was expressed in a death very close to him, a death which was nothing other, in Yve's eyes, than a death caused by war.
quotes.author: Yves Congar

quotes.quote: A total loss of appetite, generally early; though I have seen dogs eat and lap water the day before their death, which generally happens between seven and ten days after the first symptom has appeared.
quotes.author: Mr. Meynell

quotes.quote: When a person hath been bit by a dog that is apprehended to be mad, it commonly happens that the dog is killed before one is assured of his condition.
quotes.author: M. Petit

quotes.quote: Even in death you are the most important person in the world to your pets.
quotes.author: Karen A. Anderson

quotes.quote: No, I'm actually very sad that they are gone. Losing a pet I love after so many years hurts.
quotes.author: Karen A. Anderson

quotes.quote: Your eternal connection with your pet endures physical death, and they continue to guide you and watch over you from the Other side.
quotes.author: Karen A. Anderson

quotes.quote: Children understand that living things eventually die, but some may have difficulty accepting that death is permanent. They may express anger or guilt at losing their pet, or become curious about death.
quotes.author: Arden Moore

quotes.quote: When grieving, be honest and avoid using euphemisms. Use the word died rather than put to sleep, particularly with children younger than 12.
quotes.author: Arden Moore

quotes.quote: A dog howling with his nose to the ground represents mourning and indicates a death.
quotes.author: Cora Linn Daniels

quotes.quote: When a dog master dies, the dog will soon die.
quotes.author: Cora Linn Daniels

quotes.quote: In ancient Egypt, to put a dog to death was as if you murdered your grandfather.
quotes.author: Cora Linn Daniels

quotes.quote: The death of a pet is often the first significant loss a child faces in his/her life.
quotes.author: David K. Meagher

quotes.quote: Helpline workers report that people can be so heartbroken at their dog's death that some of them feel suicidal.
quotes.author: Martin Scott

quotes.quote: Humans and dogs are equally affected by the death of a companion.
quotes.author: Martin Scott

quotes.quote: But even if all dogs lived for twenty years or more, it would still mean that nearly every dog owner would experience the death of a loved pet dog at some stage.
quotes.author: Martin Scott

quotes.quote: Until one has loved an animal, a part of one’s soul remains unawakened.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: If having a soul means being able to feel love and loyalty and gratitude, then animals are better off than a lot of humans.
quotes.author: James Herriott

quotes.quote: God’s finger touched him, and he slept.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: The dog is a gentleman; I hope to go to his heaven, not man’s.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The misery of keeping a dog is his dying so soon. But, to be sure, if he lived for fifty years and then died, what would become of me?
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: I guess you don't really own a dog, you rent them, and you have to be thankful that you had a long lease.
quotes.author: Joe Garagiola

quotes.quote: If there is a heaven, it’s certain our animals are to be there. Their lives become so interwoven with our own, it would take more than an archangel to detangle them.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: Dogs come into our lives to teach us about love, they depart to teach us about loss. A new dog never replaces an old dog, it merely expands the heart. If you have loved many dogs your heart is very big.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: The death of dogma is the birth of morality.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: ...when dogma enters the brain, all intellectual activity ceases.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: The dogmas of the quiet past are inadequate to the stormy present.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Dogma does not mean the absence of thought, but the end of thought.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Dogma, whatever form it takes, is the ultimate enemy of human freedom.
quotes.author: Saul D. Alinsky

quotes.quote: In the world of dogma, you become free the day you decide to go to hell.
quotes.author: Aniekee Tochukwu

quotes.quote: Religious dogma creates a perfect fertilizer for the weeds of hypocrisy.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Dogma not only blinds its protagonist, but it muzzles all other opposition.
quotes.author: Maajid Nawaz

quotes.quote: The power of religious dogma, when inculcated early, is such as to stifle conscience, compassion, and finally every feeling of humanity.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Old religious dogma attempts to convince you that you are on a journey to God, then makes you pay tolls along that roadway.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Dogma gives a charter to mistake, but the very breath of science is a contest with mistake, and must keep the conscience alive.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: To 'choose' dogma and faith over doubt and experience is to throw out the ripening vintage and to reach greedily for the Kool-Aid.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: Dogma in power does have a unique chilling ingredient not exhibited by power, however ghastly, wielded for its own traditional sake.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: Dogmas are the toys that amuse and can satisfy but unreasoning children. They are the offspring of human speculation and prejudiced fancy.
quotes.author: H. P. Blavatsky

quotes.quote: Dogmas of every kind put assertion in the place of reason and give rise to more contention, bitterness, and want of charity than any other influence in human affairs.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Now any dogma, based primarily on faith and emotionalism, is a dangerous weapon to use on others, since it is almost impossible to guarantee that the weapon will never be turned on the user.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Dogmas are collective conceptual prisons. And the strange thing is that people love their prison cells because they give them a sense of security and a false sense of 'I know.' Nothing has inflicted more suffering on humanity than its dogmas.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Dogma demands authority, rather than intelligent thought, as the source of opinion; it requires persecution of heretics and hostility to unbelievers; it asks of its disciples that they should inhibit natural kindliness in favor of systematic hatred.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Philosophical dogma doesn't interest me.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: The modern dogma is comfort at any cost.
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.quote: Dogma can in no way limit a limitless God.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: The dogma is that, that dogma is a mistake.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Every dogma embodies some shade of truth to give it seeming currency.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: Don't let the Dogma of men to interfere with your Destiny.
quotes.author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quotes.quote: There is no dogma that the organ or harmonium can be used in church, but not the drum.
quotes.author: Francis Arinze

quotes.quote: It's only a dogma that hells exists; it isn't a dogma that there's anybody in it.
quotes.author: Antonia White

quotes.quote: Dogma is the convictions of one man imposed authoritatively upon others.
quotes.author: Felix Adler

quotes.quote: Dogma is invariably wrong, as knowledge is always in a state of transition.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: Religious dogma is akin to an appetizer with no garnish.
quotes.author: John C Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote: You don't have to believe anything, adopt a dogma in order to learn how to meditate.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: I tend to believe that religious dogma is a consequence of evolution.
quotes.author: E. O. Wilson

quotes.quote: Dogma is the guardian of mystery. The doctrines are spiritually significant in ways that we cannot fathom.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: Dogma is a defensive reaction against doubt in the mind of the theorist, but doubt of which he is unaware.
quotes.author: Harold Lasswell

quotes.quote: The dogma of the infallibility of the Bible is no more self-evident than is that of the infallibility of the popes.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: Dogma, static positions, consonance - all these are obstacles to catching the disease of art, at least in its more complex forms.
quotes.author: Yevgeny Zamyatin

quotes.quote: The dogma of woman's complete historical subjection to men must be rated as one of the most fantastic myths ever created by the human mind.
quotes.author: Mary Ritter Beard

quotes.quote: Every dogma, every philosophic or theological creed, was at its inception a statement in terms of the intellect of a certain inner experience.
quotes.author: Felix Adler

quotes.quote: Dogma and shrinking from the external world are at one limit of the range of belief. At the other are science and poetry and, indeed, reality.
quotes.author: Muriel Rukeyser

quotes.quote: Dogma is a lie reiterated and authoritatively injected into the mind of one or more persons who believe that they believe what someone else believes.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Dogma in science really is humiliating when it is recognized as dogma.
quotes.author: Sam Harris

quotes.quote: Dogma is no substitute for an inner religious experience.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Ann Robinson

quotes.quote: The dogma of the Incarnation is the most dramatic thing about Christianity, and indeed, the most dramatic thing that ever entered the mind of man; but if you tell people so, they stare at you in bewilderment.
quotes.author: Dorothy L. Sayers

quotes.quote: Every dogma has its day.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: Please clean up after your dogma.
quotes.author: Dan Barker

quotes.quote: You can't teach an old dogma new tricks.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: A dog teaches a boy fidelity, perseverance, and to turn around three times before lying down.
quotes.author: Robert Benchly

quotes.quote: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than he loves himself.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Dogs are wise. They crawl away into a quiet corner and lick their wounds and do not rejoin the world until they are whole once more.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Dogs never bite me. Just humans.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Dogs are our link to paradise. They don't know evil or jealousy or discontent. To sit with a dog on a hillside on a glorious afternoon is to be back in Eden, where doing nothing was not boring--it was peace.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: A dog reflects the family life. Whoever saw a frisky dog in a gloomy family, or a sad dog in a happy one? Snarling people have snarling dogs, dangerous people have dangerous ones.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole.
quotes.author: Roger Caras

quotes.quote: Dogs don't rationalize. They don't hold anything against a person. They don't see the outside of a human but the inside of a human.
quotes.author: Cesar Millan

quotes.quote: Dogs feel very strongly that they should always go with you in the car, in case the need should arise for them to bark violently at nothing right in your ear.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Dogs are miracles with paws.
quotes.author: Susan Ariel Rainbow Kennedy

quotes.quote: Dogs' lives are too short. Their only fault, really
quotes.author: Agnes Sligh Turnbull

quotes.quote: Properly trained, a man can be dog's best friend.
quotes.author: Corey Ford

quotes.quote: If dogs could talk, perhaps we would find it as hard to get along with them as we do with people.
quotes.author: Capek

quotes.quote: The dog who meets with a good master is the happier of the two.
quotes.author: Maeterlinck

quotes.quote: The average dog is a nicer person than the average person.
quotes.author: Andrew A.

quotes.quote: Dogs laugh, but they laugh with their tails.
quotes.author: Max Eastman

quotes.quote: When a dog bites a man, that is not news, because it happens so often. But if a man bites a dog, that is news.
quotes.author: John B. Bogart

quotes.quote: The dog was created especially for children. He is the God of frolic.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: You can say any fool thing to a dog, and the dog will give you this look that says, `My God, you're RIGHT! I NEVER would've thought of that!'
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: He is my other eyes that can see above the clouds; my other ears that hear above the winds. He is the part of me that can reach out into the sea. He has told me a thousand times over that I am his reason for being; by the way he rests against my leg; by the way he thumps his tail at my smallest smile; by the way he shows his hurt when I leave without taking him. (I think it makes him sick with worry when he is not along to care for me.) When I am wrong, he is delighted to forgive. When I am angry, he clowns to make me smile. When I am happy, he is joy unbounded. When I am a fool, he ignores it. When I succeed, he brags. Without him, I am only another man. With him, I am all-powerful. He is loyalty itself. He has taught me the meaning of devotion. With him, I know a secret comfort and a private peace. He has brought me understanding where before I was ignorant. His head on my knee can heal my human hurts. His presence by my side is protection against my fears of dark and unknown things. He has promised to wait for me... whenever... wherever - in case I need him. And I expect I will - as I always have. He is just my dog.
quotes.author: Gene Hill

quotes.quote: A really companionable and indispensable dog is an accident of nature. You can't get it by breeding for it, and you can't buy it with money. It just happens along.
quotes.author: E B White

quotes.quote: Dogs love company. They place it first in their short list of needs.
quotes.author: J.R. Ackerley

quotes.quote: His ears were often the first thing to catch my tears.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: You think dogs will not be in heaven? I tell you, they will be there long before any of us.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: I think dogs are the most amazing creatures; they give unconditional love. For me they are the role model for being alive.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.quote: Dogs love their friends and bite their enemies, quite unlike people, who are incapable of pure love and always have to mix love and hate in their object-relations.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: When a dog runs at you, whistle for him.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: There is no psychiatrist in the world like a puppy licking your face.
quotes.author: Ben Williams

quotes.quote: A dog has one aim in life... to bestow his heart.
quotes.author: J. R. Ackerley

quotes.quote: Dogs wait for us faithfully.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: We know dogs need people because they evolved to live with people.
quotes.author: Temple Grandin

quotes.quote: The first dogs might have had some type of 'owner' or human family, but they wouldn't have lived in homes with fences.
quotes.author: Temple Grandin

quotes.quote: All good trainers, behaviorists, and ethologist will tell you how important it is to maintain control of your own emotions when you're dealing with dogs.
quotes.author: Cesar Millan

quotes.quote: Dogs that bark at a distance bite not at hand.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb
