quotes.quote: Timid dogs bark the loudest.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: Two dogs and a bone, never agree in one.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: Dogs need exercise to live a healthy life. Getting their energy out also helps them behave.
quotes.author: Gideon Kidd

quotes.quote: Some dogs can actually turn aggressive once brought into a fast paced city.
quotes.author: Josh Schermer

quotes.quote: Socialization for a dog, especially from a young age, is so important it can actually affect a dog's personality.
quotes.author: Josh Schermer

quotes.quote: A dog that is not socialized can be more timid, have less confidence and even turn aggressive.
quotes.author: Josh Schermer

quotes.quote: A dog can express more with his tail in minutes than his owner can express with his tongue in hours.
quotes.author: Amy Morford

quotes.quote: A dog doesn't care if you're rich or poor, educated or illiterate, clever or dull. Give him your heart and he will give you his.
quotes.author: Amy Morford

quotes.quote: A dog is one of the remaining reasons why some people can be persuaded to go for a walk.
quotes.author: Amy Morford

quotes.quote: A watchdog is a dog kept to guard your home, usually by sleeping where a burglar would awaken the household by falling over him.
quotes.author: Amy Morford

quotes.quote: Cat's Motto: No matter what you've done wrong, always try to make it look like the dog did it.
quotes.author: Amy Morford

quotes.quote: We long for an affection altogether ignorant of our faults. Heaven has accorded this to us in the uncritical canine attachment.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: There is one other reason for dressing well, namely that dogs respect it, and will not attack you in good clothes.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A dog that runs after two bones catches neither.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: The greatness of a nation and its moral progress can be judged by the way its animals are treated.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You really have to be some kind of creep for a dog to reject you.
quotes.author: Joe Garagiola

quotes.quote: The better I get to know men, the more I find myself loving dogs.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: One can live happily without a dog. But one can live more happily with a dog.
quotes.author: Boze Hadleigh

quotes.quote: Like children, dogs and other pets are at the mercy of their owners.
quotes.author: Boze Hadleigh

quotes.quote: Modern society has a higher regard and concern for animals than our ancestors did.
quotes.author: Boze Hadleigh

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy for seven years, get married. If you want to be happy for fifteen years, get a dog. If you want to be happy for a lifetime, take up gardening.
quotes.author: Martha Stewart

quotes.quote: Allow yourself the luxury of letting happiness be whatever it is to you. And for some of us, a puppy or a dog we love is pure joy. May that special joy find its way into your heart and keep you warm.
quotes.author: Danielle Steele

quotes.quote: The phrase 'man's best friend' is an understatement. More like a devoted platonic lover.
quotes.author: Melissa McCarthy

quotes.quote: God, or Mother Nature, made a big mistake by letting people live so much longer than dogs and cats. Or should I say, by making dogs and cats live so much shorter than the people who love them.
quotes.author: Brad Pitt

quotes.quote: Such short little lives our pets have to spend with us, and they spend most of it waiting for us to come home each day.
quotes.author: John Grogan

quotes.quote: One hears repeatedly about man's best friend. We place the dog on a pedestal because it's friendly and loyal to us. I'm more interested in being my dog's best friend.
quotes.author: Adele

quotes.quote: Once you have a wonderful dog, a life without one is a life diminished.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Your dog belongs to you, But sometimes stop and think that you belong to your dog.
quotes.author: Jennifer Beals

quotes.quote: There are three faithful friends: an old wife, an old dog, and ready money.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Finding exactly the right dog is a lot like falling in love. But almost never as risky or with an I-should-have-known-better ending.
quotes.author: Renee Zellweger

quotes.quote: A lover will tell you how terrific you are with words. But words are so easy. Dogs tell you with their very selves, repeatedly and consistently.
quotes.author: Kate Moss

quotes.quote: Don't accept your dog's admiration as conclusive evidence that you are wonderful.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: To his dog, every man is Napoleon, hence the constant popularity of dogs.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: If you pick up a starving dog and make him prosperous, he will not bit you. That is the principal difference between a dog and a man.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The average dog is a nicer person than the average person.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: Dogs are smarter than lots of people. They wag their tails instead of their tongue.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Doing the right thing has power.
quotes.author: Laura Linney

quotes.quote: Doing the right thing for someone else was like a tonic for me; it was like some magic ointment that made a wound disappear.
quotes.author: Susie Bright

quotes.quote: You cannot make yourself feel something you do not feel, but you can make yourself do right in spite of your feelings.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Try not to become a man of success but rather try to become a man of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: You have to do the right thing... You may never know what results come from your action. But if you do nothing, there will be no result.
quotes.author: Mohandas K. Gandhi

quotes.quote: Remember not only to say the right thing in the right place, but far more difficult still, to leave unsaid the wrong thing at the tempting moment.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: My basic principle is that you don't make decisions because they are easy; you don't make them because they are cheap; you don't make them because they're popular; you make them because they're right.
quotes.author: Heodore Hesburgh

quotes.quote: The time is always right to do what is right.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The right way is not always the popular and easy way. Standing for right when it is unpopular is a true test of moral character.
quotes.author: Margaret Chase Smith

quotes.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right - for you'll be criticized anyway.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
quotes.author: Gandhi

quotes.quote: Next to doing the right thing, the most important thing is to let people know you are doing the right thing.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Happiness and personal fulfillment are the natural consequences of doing the right thing.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Doing the right thing is more important than doing the thing right.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: Doing the right thing for someone else occasionally means doing something that feels wrong to you.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: If you have to do it, then you're doing the right thing.
quotes.author: Kathy Valentine

quotes.quote: Goodness is the only investment that never fails.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: We must not allow ourselves to become like the system we oppose.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Always do right - this will gratify some and astonish the rest.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: There is no wrong time to do the right thing.
quotes.author: Charles M. Blow

quotes.quote: Do what you can with what you have where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Keep your feet on the ground and your thoughts at lofty heights.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: Honestly, if you don't fit in then you're probably doing the right thing.
quotes.author: Lights Poxlietner

quotes.quote: People will always try to stop you from doing the right thing if it is unconventional.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Doing the right thing daily, compounds over time.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: If you are doing the right thing for the earth, she's giving you great company.
quotes.author: Vandana Shiva

quotes.quote: Doing the right thing isn't always easy - in fact, sometimes it's real hard - but just remember that doing the right thing is always right.
quotes.author: David Cottrell

quotes.quote: Pissing people off doesn't mean you're doing the right things, but doing the right things will almost inevitably piss people off.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Doing the Right Thing - Sometimes doing the right thing, is to do nothing at all.
quotes.author: Mike Gafka

quotes.quote: What is right for one soul may not be right for another. It may mean having to stand on your own and do something strange in the eyes of others.
quotes.author: Eileen Caddy

quotes.quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Easily say no when you want to... and feel great instead of guilty while doing so.
quotes.author: Shelley Rachanow

quotes.quote: A duty dodged is like a debt unpaid; it is only deferred, and we must come back and settle the account at last.
quotes.author: Joseph Fort Newton

quotes.quote: Where it is a duty to worship the sun it is pretty sure to be a crime to examine the laws of heat.
quotes.author: John Morley

quotes.quote: Let us resolve to look on the bright side, to make the best of whatever may befall, to maintain faith that doing the right thing will ultimately bring victory.
quotes.author: B.C. Forbes

quotes.quote: Politics is a jungle— torn between doing the right thing and staying in office.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: It takes less time to do a thing right than to explain why you did it wrong.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: It is not only what we do, but also what we do not do, for which we are accountable.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: The world is divided into people who do things and people who get the credit. Try, if you can, to belong to the first class. There's far less competition.
quotes.author: Dwight Morrow

quotes.quote: Thinking well is wise; planning well;, wiser; doing well wisest and best of all.
quotes.author: Persian Proverb

quotes.quote: Doing is the great thing. for if, resolutely, people do what is right, in time they come to like doing it.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Initiative consists of doing the right thing without being told.
quotes.author: Irving Mack

quotes.quote: Motherhood is a choice you make every day, to put someone else's happiness and well-being ahead of your own, to teach the hard lessons, to do the right thing even when you're not sure what the right thing is... and to forgive yourself, over and over again, for doing everything wrong.
quotes.author: Donna Ball

quotes.quote: The best time to do a thing is when it can be done.
quotes.author: William Pickens

quotes.quote: I try to do the right thing at the right time. They may be just little things, but usually they make the difference between winning and losing.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.quote: One must learn by doing the thing. For though you think you know it, you have no certainty until you try.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: The truth of the matter is that you always know the right thing to do. The hard part is doing it.
quotes.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

quotes.quote: We are so busy doing the urgent that we don't have time to do the important.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: You must give some time to your fellow man. Even if it's a little thing, do something for those who have need of help., something for which you get no pay but the privilege of doing it. For remember, you don't live in a world all your own. Your brothers are here, too.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Never let your sense of morals get in the way of doing what's right.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Our confidence in Christ does not make us lazy, negligent, or careless, but on the contrary it awakens us , urges us on, and maks us active in living righteous lives and doing good. There is no self-confidence to compare with this.
quotes.author: Ulrich Zwingli

quotes.quote: When I have a problem of deciding right from wrong, I always give it three tests. First, I give it the common-sense test, and ask if it is reasonable. Then I give it a prayer test. I ask God if it is good and edifying. Then I give it a scripture test. I see if the Bible has anything to say for or against it.
quotes.author: Billy Garaham

quotes.quote: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: With integrity, you have nothing to fear, since you have nothing to hide. With integrity, you will do the right thing, so you will have no guilt.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Character is doing the right thing when nobody's looking. There are too many people who think that the only thing that's right is to get by, and the only thing that's wrong is to get caught.
quotes.author: J.C. Watts

quotes.quote: What one thinks is right is not always the same as what others think is right; no one can be always right.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: It is never wrong to do what is right.
quotes.author: Gift Gugu Mona

quotes.quote: Life is too short to try and please everyone. Take charge and do what’s right -- not what’s popular.
quotes.author: Farshad Asl

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's best to do what feels safe, and sometimes it's better to do what you know is right, even though the cost may be high.
quotes.author: Deborah Wiles

quotes.quote: The extraordinary thing about having absolute conviction that you're doing the right thing is that you’ll do it – whatever that may be, no matter how difficult, dangerous or improbable.
quotes.author: John Golembiewski

quotes.quote: Doing the right thing even when no one is looking is easy if I remember that I am not in this life alone and that my task is to please God... not people.
quotes.author: Sandra C. Bibb

quotes.quote: Dollar bill: people spend their whole life seeking to earn it, but won't spend 10 minutes seeking to learn it.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: Don't underestimate the power of one dollar for somewhere in its generation is million, billion and trillion.
quotes.author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

quotes.quote: For every dollar you give away, you'll get a hundred back. And for every buck you steal, you'll lose a thousand.
quotes.author: Albert R. Broccoli

quotes.quote: The dollar sign is the only sign in which the modern man appears to have any real faith.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: When you have one million dollars, you're a lucky person. When you have 10 million dollars, you've got trouble, a lot of headaches.
quotes.author: Jack Ma

quotes.quote: Whenever the dollar is held supreme and capitalistic interests dominate, a higher value will always be placed upon property rights than upon human rights.
quotes.author: Dick Gregory

quotes.quote: There is nothing more nervous than a million dollars - it moves very fast, and it doesn't speak any language.
quotes.author: Jean Chretien

quotes.quote: A dollar saved is a quarter earned.
quotes.author: John Ciardi

quotes.quote: A dollar won is twice as sweet as a dollar earned.
quotes.author: Paul Newman

quotes.quote: Treat each federal dollar as if it was hard earned; it was - by a taxpayer.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.quote: Dollar bills have absolutely no value except in our collective imagination, but everybody believes in the dollar bill.
quotes.author: Yuval Noah Harari

quotes.quote: Every dollar the government doesn't spend, tax, or borrow is a dollar that businesses and families can spend or invest themselves.
quotes.author: Stephen Moore

quotes.quote: The way to make a million dollars is to start a religion.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Dollars and guns are no substitutes for brains and will power.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Nothing that costs only a dollar is not worth having.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Arden

quotes.quote: No one makes a million dollars with minimal effort unless they win the lottery.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: There are only three things you can do with a dollar: spend, loan, or own.
quotes.author: Venita VanCaspel

quotes.quote: When you have millions of dollars, you have millions of friends.
quotes.author: Floyd Patterson

quotes.quote: Nobody gives twenty-five million dollars to anybody if they're not getting twenty-five million worth out of it. Forget it. It just doesn't happen.
quotes.author: Paul Reed Smith

quotes.quote: Every dollar that is printed should not represent a debt to private bankers. It should represent an investment potential in the common good, in the common needs of our country.
quotes.author: Cynthia McKinney

quotes.quote: The dollars aren't so important... once you have them.
quotes.author: Johnny Miller

quotes.quote: No man can add one dollar to his bank account by worrying.
quotes.author: Vash Young

quotes.quote: It is as easy to manifest one dollar as it is to manifest one million dollars.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: A million dollars isn’t cool. You know what’s cool? A billion dollars.
quotes.author: Sean Parker

quotes.quote: A dollar is not worth as much as you think it is. Your honesty is worth much more.
quotes.author: T. Boone Pickens

quotes.quote: No man should receive a dollar unless that dollar has been fairly earned.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The first dollar is the most you will get if you don't love what you are doing.
quotes.author: Ray Kroc

quotes.quote: The dollar is the reserve currency of the world.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: The value of a dollar is social, as it is created by society.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A strong dollar reflects a strong country and a strong economy, and we need to make sure that we get the - stop the practice of devaluing the dollar.
quotes.author: Tim Pawlenty

quotes.quote: Why pay a dollar for a bookmark? Why not use the dollar for a bookmark?
quotes.author: Fred Stoller

quotes.quote: Every dollar released from taxation that is spared or invested will help create a new job and a new salary.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: If I had to come back in life, I'd come back as a dolphin... they're always smiling; they're always playing.
quotes.author: Nathan Phillips

quotes.quote: The happiness of the bee and the dolphin is to exist. For man it is to know that and to wonder at it.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: When I see a dolphin, I know it's just as smart as I am.
quotes.author: Captain Beefheart

quotes.quote: Never trust a species that grins all the time. It’s up to something.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Cultures have long heard wisdom in non-human voices: Apollo, god of music, medicine and knowledge, came to Delphi in the form of a dolphin. But dolphins, which fill the oceans with blipping and chirping, and whales, which mew and caw in ultramarine jazz – a true rhapsody in blue – are hunted to the edge of silence.
quotes.author: Jay Griffiths

quotes.quote: It is of interest to note that while some dolphins are reported to have learned English — up to 50 words used in correct context — no human being has been reported to have learned dolphinese.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: When the shark laughs with the dolphin, there is a devilish spirit at play.
quotes.author: Tahitian Proverb

quotes.quote: Skeptics, like dolphins, change when dying.
quotes.author: Lady Blessington

quotes.quote: He paints a dolphin in the woods, a boar in the waves.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Imagine a dolphin dancing in the sky. Let it dance with joy. Think of yourself at the bottom of the ocean watching.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: ...To the Dolphin alone, beyond all other, nature has granted what the best philosophers seek: friendship for no advantage.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: A dolphin's smile is the greatest deception. It creates the illusion that they're always happy.
quotes.author: Ric O'Barry

quotes.quote: There’s about as much educational benefit studying dolphins in captivity as there would be studying mankind by only observing prisoners held in solitary.
quotes.author: Jacques Cousteau

quotes.quote: Dolphins are not automatic air-breathers like we are. Every breath is a conscious effort. If life becomes too unbearable, the dolphins just take a breath and they sink to the bottom. They don't take the next breath.
quotes.author: Ric O'Barry

quotes.quote: Sharks are the criminals of the sea. Dolphins are the outlaws.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: We do not exploit our dolphins for profit.
quotes.author: Fidel Castro

quotes.quote: Dolphins are social mammals, capable of enjoying their lives. They form close bonds with other members of their group.
quotes.author: Peter Singer

quotes.quote: There's no question dolphins are smarter than humans as they play more.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: No aquarium, no tank in a marine land, however spacious it may be, can begin to duplicate the conditions of the sea. And no dolphin who inhabits one of those aquariums or one of those marine lands can be considered normal.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: Humans think they are smarter than dolphins because we build cars and buildings and start wars etc., and all that dolphins do is swim in the water, eat fish and play around. Dolphins believe that they are smarter for exactly the same reasons.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Dolphins : Animals that are so intelligent that, within a few weeks of captivity, they can train a man to stand on the edge of their pool and throw them food three times a day.
quotes.author: Hal Roach

quotes.quote: Dolphins may well be carrying information as well as functions critical to the regeneration of life upon our planet.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: Among the sea-fishes many stories are told about the dolphin, indicative of his gentle and kindly nature…. It appears to be the fleetest of all animals, marine and terrestrial, and it can leap over the masts of large vessels.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: I invite you to entertain some new beliefs about dolphins … [that] these Cetacea with huge brains are more intelligent than any man or woman..
quotes.author: John C. Lilly

quotes.quote: The more that we choose not to talk about domestic violence, the more we shy away from the issue, the more we lose.
quotes.author: Russell Wilson

quotes.quote: Women initiate most domestic violence.
quotes.author: Dov Charney

quotes.quote: At the beginning, I wasn't aware of some of the stuff that goes on. Now, I have a heightened awareness of domestic violence and how to spot it.
quotes.author: Danielle Jones

quotes.quote: The time when domestic violence is the most lethal is when the person is trying to leave the situation.
quotes.author: Julie Johnston

quotes.quote: Even child abuse specialists do not routinely screen for domestic violence. This shows how much more education we need to do, even among experts, to understand the known links between violence of the child and the parent.
quotes.author: Jocelyn Brown

quotes.quote: Domestic abuse is wrong, but domestic retribution is okay.
quotes.author: Dov Davidoff

quotes.quote: Nobody believes that domestic violence kills and nobody believes it is detrimental to children. This world has got to wake up. To me, if there is domestic violence, if the children see it or hear it, that to me is detrimental. Batterers should not have rights to children.
quotes.author: Denise Brown

quotes.quote: Domestic violence can be so easy for people to ignore, as it often happens without any witnesses and it is sometimes easier not to get involved. Yet, by publicly speaking out against domestic violence, together we can challenge attitudes towards violence in the home and show that domestic violence is a crime and not merely unacceptable.
quotes.author: Honor Blackman

quotes.quote: An abuser isn't abusive 24/7. They usually demonstrate positive character traits most of the time. That's what makes the abuse so confusing when it happens, and what makes leaving so much more difficult.
quotes.author: Miya Yamanouchi

quotes.quote: If the numbers we see in domestic violence were applied to terrorism or gang violence, the entire country would be up in arms, and it would be the lead story on the news every night.
quotes.author: Rep. Mark Green

quotes.quote: No woman has to be a victim of physical abuse. Women have to feel like they are not alone.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.quote: Nearly one in four women will experience domestic violence during her lifetime. And slightly more than half of female victims of domestic violence live in households with children under age 12.
quotes.author: Lucille Roybal-Allard

quotes.quote: There is a subconscious way of taking violence as a way of expression, as a normality, and it has a lot of effects in the youth in the way they absorb education and what they hope to get out of life.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.quote: A lot of people think that domestic violence is if someone hits, kicks, or punches you.
quotes.author: Robin McGraw

quotes.quote: From what I've been told, the scariest part of being part of a domestic abuse relationship is the idea that you cannot escape and you cannot get help, that feeling of being stuck.
quotes.author: Kerry Washington

quotes.quote: Hairdressers know a lot about the personal lives of their clients. They come in contact on a day-to-day basis with women dealing with domestic violence.
quotes.author: Gordon Miller

quotes.quote: Domestic violence is the front line of the war against women.
quotes.author: Pearl Cleage

quotes.quote: Sexual, racial, gender violence and other forms of discrimination and violence in a culture cannot be eliminated without changing culture.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bunch

quotes.quote: A domestic violence advocate can help you discern your level of risk from your abuser and whether you should get a civil restraining order.
quotes.author: Caroline Abbott

quotes.quote: The main reason they were homeless and in crisis was because of domestic violence.
quotes.author: Connie Phillips

quotes.quote: One in three women may suffer from abuse and violence in her lifetime. This is an appalling human rights violation, yet it remains one of the invisible and under-recognized pandemics of our time.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.quote: Domestic violence does not only happen to adults. Forty percent of girls age 14 to 17 report knowing someone their age who has been hit or beaten by a boyfriend, and approximately one in five female high school students reports being physically and/or sexually abused by a dating partner.
quotes.author: Dianne Feinstein

quotes.quote: All violence consists in some people forcing others, under threat of suffering or death, to do what they do not want to do.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Victims of domestic violence need assistance and deserve justice, I commend the crime unit's efforts to put offenders behind bars and reach out to victims.
quotes.author: Bob Riley

quotes.quote: Society has seldom considered the vicarious effects of domestic violence between partners on the lives of children.
quotes.author: Asa Don Brown

quotes.quote: Emotional abuse is any type of abuse that is not physical in nature. It can include everything from verbal abuse to the silent treatment, domination to subtle manipulation.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: We're number one in domestic violence homicides. We also have a high rate of alcohol abuse and drug abuse and there's a high lethality rate when you get those factors involved, so the shelter has 52 beds, certainly it is never empty.
quotes.author: Diana Burch

quotes.quote: Domestic violence is any behavior involving physical, psychological, emotional, sexual or verbal abuse. It is any form of aggression intended to hurt, damage, or kill an intimate person.
quotes.author: Asa Don Brown

quotes.quote: It's incredibly dangerous to leave an abuser, because the final step in the domestic violence pattern is: kill her.
quotes.author: Leslie Morgan Steiner

quotes.quote: Long term domestic violence: Being abused in this manner is like being kidnapped and tortured for ransom but you will never have enough to pay off the kidnapper.
quotes.author: Rebecca J. Burns

quotes.quote: Domestic violence is a criminal matter and needs to stay in criminal court, Too often, judges see charges of domestic violence as a ploy to get custody and send the case to family court.
quotes.author: Catherine Campbell

quotes.quote: Domestic violence is frequently excused when alcohol and other substances are involved.
quotes.author: Asa Don Brown

quotes.quote: I am living in hell from one day to the next. But there is nothing I can do to escape. I don't know where I would go if I did. I feel utterly powerless, and that feeling is my prision. I entered of my own free will, I locked the door, and I threw away the key.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Women trapped in violent relationships need to know that there's no shame in talking out and walking out on their abusive partners.
quotes.author: Kate Thornton

quotes.quote: Domestic violence causes far more pain than the visible marks of bruises and scars. It is devastating to be abused by someone that you love and think loves you in return. It is estimated that approximately 3 million incidents of domestic violence are reported each year in the United States.
quotes.author: Dianne Feinstein

quotes.quote: Women initiate most domestic violence, yet out of a thousand cases of domestic violence, maybe one is involving a man. And this has made a victim of culture out of women.
quotes.author: Dov Charney

quotes.quote: Few people who are hit once by someone they love respond in the way they might to a singular physical assault by a stranger.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: Domestic violence causes far more pain than the visible marks of bruises and scars. It is devastating to be abused by someone that you love and think loves you in return.
quotes.author: Dianne Feinstein

quotes.quote: Domestic violence occurs because of social power structures where the roles of men and women are predefined, and domestic violence is how that power is played out.
quotes.author: Inhe Choi

quotes.quote: Where is the political prisoner movement for those women who are imprisoned for retaliating against abusive father, unless, lovers, and others? I think the absence of these types of campaigns speaks volumes about our movement's gender politics.
quotes.author: Kai Lumumba Barrow

quotes.quote: We cannot to the police for protection against domestic violence and then rally against them from brutality as if they are two different institutions.
quotes.author: Anannya Bhattacharjee

quotes.quote: If a child is confronted with murder, rape, domestic violence, and other kinds of destructive aggression in daily life, it doesn't surprise me if that child 'turns off' careful looking and listening.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: There is now a wider recognition that domestic violence is about perpetrator's power and control over women and involves not only physical and sexual violence but can include a number of behaviours such as intimidation and threats, isolation and humiliation, behaviour often named as psychological coercion or violence.
quotes.author: Lynne Harne

quotes.quote: Domestic violence can occur in any intimate or familial relationship, irrespective of whether the parties are living together or not, whether they are married or cohabiting or living in three-generational extended families.
quotes.author: Lynne Harne

quotes.quote: Domestic violence is a breach of human rights as well as major public health and clinical problem.
quotes.author: Louise Howard

quotes.quote: Domestic violence and abuse is threatening behaviour, violence or abuse between adults who are relatives, partners or ex-partners. It includes abuse from adult children and from parents of adult children.
quotes.author: Louise Howard

quotes.quote: Domestic violence has been shown to be associated with a range of mental health problems.
quotes.author: Louise Howard

quotes.quote: Domestic violence is not at all unusual. It is a serious and far-reaching social problem.
quotes.author: Michael P. Johnson

quotes.quote: It's violence from someone you know, someone who claims to love you.
quotes.author: Rachel Louise Snyder

quotes.quote: It is most often hidden from even one's closest confidantes, and on many occasions the physical violence is far less damaging than the emotional and verbal violence.
quotes.author: Rachel Louise Snyder

quotes.quote: Domestic violence is a pattern of emotional and/or physical abuse perpetrated by a romantic partner, the term can also include abuse perpetrated by a family member against another family member.
quotes.author: Stacey Freudenberg PsyD

quotes.quote: It is fine to commiserate with a man about his bad experience with a previous partner, but the instant he uses her as an excuse to mistreat you, stop believing anything he tells you about that relationship and instead recognize it as a sign that he has problems with relating to women.
quotes.author: Lundy Bancroft

quotes.quote: Never let a man put his hands on you without your permission.
quotes.author: Melda Beaty

quotes.quote: Domestic abuse is a form of communication fueled by personal insecurities, temperament, economic, educational or lack therein, physical and psychological conditions.
quotes.author: Asa Don Brown

quotes.quote: Domestic violence has often gone unnamed and unblamed in my society. It is the norm for men to teach their wives a lesson, and for the women to bear that beating and teaching with no complaints.
quotes.author: Fatima Mohammed

quotes.quote: The very fact that intimate partner violence is so often addressed in civil court, rather than criminal court, gives insight into how we as a society still view it.
quotes.author: Rachel Louise Snyder

quotes.quote: Leaving an abusive partner is a very difficult thing to do. It frequently feels like you are failing, or destroying your family, or not trying to work things out, or not giving your partner a second chance.
quotes.author: Blaine Nelson

quotes.quote: I realize now I am a survivor. I am a stronger woman for opening my eyes and stepping away from someone who didn't respect themselves and would never respect me.
quotes.author: Lori

quotes.quote: It is not the bruises on the body that hurt. It is the wounds of the heart and the scars on the mind.
quotes.author: Aisha Mirza

quotes.quote: You are not the darkness you endured. You are the light that refused to surrender.
quotes.author: John Mark Green

quotes.quote: I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: A real man wouldn't lay a finger on a woman. He treats his partner with respect, love and support. Men are physically stronger and have no place abusing that power. Everyone has problems, and arguments happen, but that's when a real man uses his intelligence to talk it out.
quotes.author: Matt Lanter

quotes.quote: ... you don't have to wait for someone to treat you bad repeatedly. All it takes is once, and if they get away with it that once, if they know they can treat you like that, then it sets the pattern for the future.
quotes.author: Jane Green

quotes.quote: Please don't drown into his fears, his concrete fists don´t let him again, break the bridge of your nose with his cruel born hits. Then disappear into that mask of misery.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: The dominant expression of a child is gravity.
quotes.author: Bret Harte

quotes.quote: A dominant religion is never ascetic.
quotes.author: Thomas B. Macaulay

quotes.quote: The dominant feeling of the battlefield is loneliness.
quotes.author: William Slim

quotes.quote: Use what is dominant in a culture to change it quickly.
quotes.author: Jenny Holzer

quotes.quote: My dominant feeling every day is one of great ignorance.
quotes.author: Pankaj Mishra

quotes.quote: Your inner-most dominant thoughts become your outer-most tangible reality.
quotes.author: John Frederick Demartini

quotes.quote: The dominant mood of contemporary American culture is the self-celebration of the peasantry.
quotes.author: William A. Henry III

quotes.quote: The dominant characteristic of an authentic spiritual life is the gratitude that flows from trust
quotes.author: Brennan Manning

quotes.quote: Any dominant ideology operates off the assumption that what it has to say is unaccountable and unquestionable.
quotes.author: Henry Giroux

quotes.quote: The extreme nature of dominant-end views is often concealed by the vagueness and ambiguity of the end proposed.
quotes.author: John Rawls

quotes.quote: If you will let your dominant intention be to revise and improve the content of the story you tell every day of your life, it is our absolute promise to you that your life will become that ever-improving story.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.quote: When we each focus on being the dominant force in our own universe rather than invading other universes, we all win.
quotes.author: Emily V. Gordon

quotes.quote: Our dominant values that emphasize competition and scarcity limit continued progress.
quotes.author: Jacque Fresco

quotes.quote: To go against the dominant thinking of your friends, of most of the people you see every day, is perhaps the most difficult act of heroism you can perform.
quotes.author: Theodore H. White

quotes.quote: Dominant negativity cheats reality of its mutual positives.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: My father used to say superior people never make long visits.
quotes.author: Marianne Moore

quotes.quote: The superior man limits his achievements.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Superior strength is a sword that manifests one's will.
quotes.author: Hiroyuki Takei

quotes.quote: The superior man is intelligently, not blindly, faithful.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The superior artist is the one who knows how to be influenced.
quotes.author: Clement Greenberg

quotes.quote: The superior man blames himself. The inferior man blames others.
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.quote: You are not superior just because you see the world in an odious light.
quotes.author: Vicomte de Chateaubriand

quotes.quote: Feeling superior doesn't make one superior. Hubris does not humble others.
quotes.author: Guy R. McPherson

quotes.quote: The way of the superior person is threefold; virtuous, they are free from anxieties; wise they are free from perplexities; and bold they are free from fear.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The dominant party cannot reign forever, and truth and justice will prevail at last.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: The most dominant cultural attributes maintained are the ones that are reinforced by your environment.
quotes.author: Peter Joseph

quotes.quote: The dominant culture in most big companies demands punishment for a mistake, no matter how useful, small, invisible...
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: When the dominant images of a culture are anticipatory, they "lead" social development and provide direction for social change.
quotes.author: Fred Polak

quotes.quote: There are three dominant tendencies in a neoliberal society: financialized, privatized, militarized. And when it comes to black poor people, we get all three.
quotes.author: Cornel West

quotes.quote: The superior man is never in anyone's way.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Superior music is purity itself; it clears the air.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Stuart Phelps Ward

quotes.quote: The superior man is firm in the right way and not merely firm.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The superior man thinks always of virtue; the common man thinks of comfort.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The most Superior amongst the colors in the universe is the color of Devotion.
quotes.author: Pandurang Shastri Athavale

quotes.quote: The superior man is slow in his words and earnest in his conduct.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A superior who works on his own development sets an almost irresistible example.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: The superior man loves his soul; the inferior man loves his property.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Never give up. Have hope. Expect only the best from life and take action to get it.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Success is what happens after you have survived all your mistakes.â€
quotes.author: Anora Lee

quotes.quote: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If you believe it will work out, you'll see opportunities. If you believe it won't, you will see obstacles.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: The reason I never give up hope is because everything is so basically hopeless.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Failure is only a temporary fall. You must rise up any time you fall.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying 'I will try again tomorrow.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: Whatever course you decide upon, there is always someone to tell you that you are wrong. There are always difficulties arising which tempt you to believe that your critics are right. To map out a course of action and follow it to an end requires courage.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Don't give up trying to find your way. But do remember that sometimes it takes bending to avoid breaking.
quotes.author: Katinka Hesselink

quotes.quote: You do what you can for as long as you can, and when you finally can't, you do the next best thing. You back up but you don't give up.
quotes.author: Chuck Yeager

quotes.quote: Don't close the book when bad things happen in your life! Just turn the page and start a new chapter!
quotes.author: LaToya Jackson

quotes.quote: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Never give up. And never, under any circumstances, face the facts.
quotes.author: Ruth Gordon

quotes.quote: No matter how dark and hopeless a situation may seem, always hold on and never give up your dream.
quotes.author: Mouloud Benzadi

quotes.quote: Be strong, little one. There's a reason you are here. Like anyone with a dream, you have a purpose, big or small. Never lose hope that your glowing star will one day join the sky of winners. Never--stop believing.
quotes.author: Charles Lee

quotes.quote: Don't give up. There are too many nay-sayers out there who will try to discourage you. Don't listen to them. The only one who can make you give up is yourself.
quotes.author: Sidney Sheldon

quotes.quote: Don't give up; the beginning is always the hardest.
quotes.author: Kemmy Nola

quotes.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Whatever you dream of doing one day, don't give up on that dream because you never know where it can take you.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: Keep Going Your hardest times often lead to the greatest moments of your life. Keep going. Tough situations build strong people in the end.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: The strength within you, divine soul, can survive any situation.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Make a commitment to your self that today, success is your only options! No matter the obstacles, no matter the sacrifice! you have decided you won't be denied, you won't be defeated!`
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Don't give up at half time. Concentrate on winning the second half.
quotes.author: Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: Some days you're gonna get it right and some days you;re gonna get it wrong. But no matter what, never stop trying to get it!
quotes.author: Eddie Harris Jr.

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of dreams and the influence of the human spirit.
quotes.author: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.quote: No matter how hard the battle gets or no matter how many people DON'T believe in your dream,Never give up!
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Never allow negative words to hinder positive actions.
quotes.author: Troy Gathers

quotes.quote: Don't give up, be positive and if you know someone who knows someone at a record company don't stop beating down their door till you get heard. Don't ever say it'll never happen or it'll never happen.
quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

quotes.quote: Don't let the fear of the time it will take to accomplish something stand in the way of your doing it. The time will pass anyway; we might just as well put that passing time to the best possible use.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Never give up but never forget to grow up.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than one with all the facts
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If you fail an examination, it means you have not yet master the subject. With diligent study and understanding, you will succeed in passing the exams.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Try, try, try, and keep on trying is the rule that must be followed to become an expert in anything.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Don't give up. Listen to others, but follow your own council.
quotes.author: Mike Mayhall

quotes.quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do.
quotes.author: Ella Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Stowe

quotes.quote: Never stop dreaming, never stop believing, never give up, never stop trying, and never stop learning.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter how many times you get knocked down. All that matters is you get up one more time than you were knocked down.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Never give up on something that you can't go a day without thinking about.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Don't give up the search for happiness because you're afraid of getting hurt.
quotes.author: Martha Raye

quotes.quote: Successful men and women keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.quote: You cannot change anyone but yourself. Always hope for the best, but keep living your life no matter what.
quotes.author: Kate Anderson

quotes.quote: No matter how hard the past, you can always begin again.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Continue. Be loving and be strong. Be fierce and be kind. And don't give in and don't give up.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Don't be a fool. Don't give up something important to hold onto someone who can't even say they love you.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it. I never heard of anyone ever stumbling on something sitting down.
quotes.author: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.quote: The real destroyer of the liberties of the people is he who spreads among them bounties, donations and benefits.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: You have not lived today until you have done something for someone who can never repay you.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.quote: It is more difficult to give money away intelligently than to earn it in the first place.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: The value of a man resides in what he gives and not in what he is capable of receiving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Giving frees us from the familiar territory of our own needs by opening our mind to the unexplained worlds occupied by the needs of others.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up.
quotes.author: John Holmes

quotes.quote: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: The proper aim of giving is to put the recipients in a state where they no longer need our gifts.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Where there is charity and wisdom, there is neither fear nor ignorance.
quotes.author: St. Francis

quotes.quote: You're learning to be nourished by the love you give, not by the validation offered in response to your giving.
quotes.author: Matt Kahn

quotes.quote: The life of a man consists not in seeing visions and in dreaming dreams, but in active charity and in willing service.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: No one has ever become poor by giving.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Think of giving not as a duty but as a privilege.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

quotes.quote: The measure of life is not its duration, but its donation.
quotes.author: Peter Marshall

quotes.quote: Every good act is charity. A man's true wealth hereafter is the good that he does in this world to his fellows.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: When we give cheerfully and accept gratefully, everyone is blessed.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: It's good to be blessed. It's better to be a blessing.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: One good thing about donation, once you do it, you get addicted to it because it brings great joy and happiness to you.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Donation for the blind. A fee for falling into their own trap.
quotes.author: Andre Dawson

quotes.quote: Giving is not just about making a donation. It is about making a difference.
quotes.author: Kathy Calvin

quotes.quote: Though our donations are made to please ourselves, we insist, upon those who receive our alms being pleased with them.
quotes.author: John Zimmerman

quotes.quote: Value of life depends not on your possessions, but on your donation.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: To give away money is an easy matter and in any man's power. But to decide to whom to give it, and how large and when, and for what purpose and how, is neither in every man's power nor an easy matter.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Whatever you think the world is withholding from you, you are withholding from the world.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Giving is better than receiving because giving starts the receiving process.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: By donating, you will also be supporting your own community and literally saving lives with every pint donated.
quotes.author: Pam Henry

quotes.quote: When people make donations to non profits, they want to know that their money goes to good use.
quotes.author: Sam Simon

quotes.quote: With regard to donations always expect the most from prudent people, who keep their own accounts.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Every donation received is a potential negative ad. Vetting money is just as important as raising it.
quotes.author: Dick Morris

quotes.quote: Life isn't just about the duration you spend, but by the donation of impact you can pass out before you eventually pass-out
quotes.author: Seyi Ayoola

quotes.quote: I'd rather have a lot of little donations than a couple big ones. That shows that people care and are giving what they can.
quotes.author: Steve Grand

quotes.quote: The value of life is not in its duration, but in its donation. You are not important because of how long you live, you are important because of how effective you live.
quotes.author: Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: Anytime you use your God-given abilities to help others, you are fulfilling your purpose of life. What matters is not the Duration of your life, but the Donation of it.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: I do things - whether it's donations or events for good causes or giving back to my community - for the right reason: because I want to. Because it's the best thing to do. I wanna help someone else out.
quotes.author: LeSean McCoy

quotes.quote: Thus, by every device from the stick to the carrot, the emaciated Austrian donkey is made to pull the Nazi barrow up an ever-steepening hill.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The carrot and the stick are pervasive and persuasive motivators. But if you treat people like donkeys, they will perform like donkeys.
quotes.author: John Whitmore

quotes.quote: Neither an ox nor a donkey is able to stop the progress of socialism.
quotes.author: Erich Honecker

quotes.quote: A man who believes the word of a donkey in preference to my word does not deserve to be lent anything.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: It is now your duty to hone that talent, because a person who wastes his God-given talents is a donkey.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: And just because a talking donkey tells you something doesn't mean it's true.
quotes.author: Matt Mikalatos

quotes.quote: A donkey eats a melon, it remains a donkey
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: When it comes to pinning blame, pin the tail on the donkeys.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.quote: If a donkey bray at you, don't bray at him.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Until the Donkey tried to clear The Fence, he thought himself a Deer.
quotes.author: Arthur Guiterman

quotes.quote: Rationality went down the drain donkey's years ago and hasn't been seen since.
quotes.author: Harold Pinter

quotes.quote: It's hard for the donkeys to win the race if they're going to carry the elephants on their backs.
quotes.author: Jim Hightower

quotes.quote: A donkey appears to me like a horse translated into Dutch.
quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Donkeys live a long time. None of you has ever seen a dead donkey.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: The strength of the donkey mind lies in adopting a course inversely as the arguments urged, which, well considered, requires as great a mental force as the direct sequence.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: There is no glory in outstripping donkeys.
quotes.author: Martial

quotes.quote: Donkeys are the most misunderstood and abused animals around the world.
quotes.author: Bonnie Jo Campbell

quotes.quote: Heaven is the place where the donkey finally catches up with his carrot: hell is the eternity while he waits for it.
quotes.author: Russell Green

quotes.quote: Have you ever seen a donkey smelling a beautiful rose? Donkeys aren't interested in roses, they like thorn bushes or watermelon rinds!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Quitters don't gain what they have started working on; waiters don't start what they could have gained. What is common there is failure.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: I don't give up, and I make sure to keep my standards high.
quotes.author: Lukasz Gottwald

quotes.quote: You're going to find the people that make it work never quit, quitting is not an option.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: Don't give up the search for happiness because you're afraid of getting hurt.
quotes.author: Martha Raye

quotes.quote: Don't give up, what've you do; eyes front, head high to the finish. See it through!
quotes.author: Edgar A. Guest

quotes.quote: If you start a painting and you don't like where it's going, don't give up on it. Just keep going and follow through. You might be surprised how it ends up.
quotes.author: Andrew McDermott

quotes.quote: Resolve never to quit, never to give up, no matter what the situation.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: You don't give up the intention, and you don't give up the desire. You give up your attachment to the results.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: You can dance in the storm. Don't wait for the rain to be over before because it might take too long. You can can do it now. Wherever you are, right now, you can start, right now; this very moment.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Don't quit your day jobs, boys, but always keep your sense of humor.
quotes.author: Kimberly Guilfoyle

quotes.quote: If you don't give up on something you truly believe in, you will find a way.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: If you don't give up your hopes and dreams, then there will always be a good ending.
quotes.author: Choi Minho

quotes.quote: When something really matters, you should never give up or give in.
quotes.author: Gordon Brown

quotes.quote: Never quit believing that you can develop in life. Never give up. Don't deny the inward spirit that provides the drive to accomplish great things in life.
quotes.author: Jon Huntsman, Sr.

quotes.quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than one with all the facts.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Keep believing. You may be tired, discouraged, but don't give up on your future.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: You can actually overcome all the limitations of life and achieve your dreams, if you don't give up too early.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: There are tomorrows on their way worth the struggles of today. Never give up.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter how many times you get knocked down. All that matters is you get up one more time than you were knocked down.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: People think they have to give up things to make a difference to the world, but you don't have to.
quotes.author: Waris Ahluwalia

quotes.quote: Never quit. It is the easiest cop-out in the world. Set a goal and don't quit until you attain it. When you do attain it, set another goal, and don't quit until you reach it. Never quit.
quotes.author: Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: I never quit trying. I never felt that I didn't have a chance to win.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: Don't ever give up. You gotta keep trying, and never give up.
quotes.author: Ryan Sheckler

quotes.quote: Always believe in yourself and never give up because you don't know what success could be right around the corner.
quotes.author: Jamie Hampton

quotes.quote: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: Don't quit. For if you do, you may miss the answer to your prayers.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.quote: Winners never quit and quitters never win.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Never lose hope; until your bones are rotten, never give up. Once the final whistle did not blow up, keep running hard!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
quotes.author: Ella Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Success is a choice; a promise that you make to yourself to keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bourgeret

quotes.quote: Don't give up, be positive and if you know someone who knows someone at a record company don't stop beating down their door till you get heard. Don't ever say it'll never happen or it'll never happen.
quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

quotes.quote: Don't ever give up on something or someone that you can't go a full day without thinking about.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Whatever you hold onto that you want to do, and that other people tell you you are foolish to want to do, don't give up.
quotes.author: Dermot Mulroney

quotes.quote: Don't give up on the people you love. Your patient love and faithfulness may be exactly what they need to make a complete turn around.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Use what you've been through as fuel, believe in yourself and be unstoppable!
quotes.author: Yvonne Pierre

quotes.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Whatever you're going through in your life, don't ever give up.
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: The success gate is far at the end of the long failure corridor. Keep moving no matter how many potholes you step into. You will get there with time!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Don't quit. Never give up trying to build the world you can see, even if others can't see it. Listen to your drum and your drum only. It's the one that makes the sweetest sound.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: Every great journey begins with one step and it begins with moving forward, turning on the engine, and shifting into the right gear at the right time. Remember, going through pain is temporary and it will subside, but quitting on the other hand lasts forever.
quotes.author: Louie Herron

quotes.quote: If you fail, never give up. Keep trying, you will succeed.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: You can't please everybody. I give up. I'm not trying to. I don't care. Leave me alone with that.
quotes.author: Estelle

quotes.quote: Don't give up your power to change things. Negativity and unhappiness are caused by you. You can change your attitude.
quotes.author: Satchidananda Swami

quotes.quote: Don't give up in your goals in life, I'm a perfect example of how dreams can come true.
quotes.author: Paula DeAnda

quotes.quote: If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.
quotes.author: Paul Bryant

quotes.quote: Pain is temporary. It may last a minute, or an hour, or a day, or a year, but eventually it will subside and something else will take its place. If I quit, however, it lasts forever.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Hard times ain't quit and we ain't quit.
quotes.author: Meridel Le Sueur

quotes.quote: You could say that I choked at the Olympics, but I never quit. I don't quit. I'm not going to quit. If you quit and drop out, you're always going to have that moment of doubt.
quotes.author: Alberto Salazar

quotes.quote: I learned, one, you shouldn't ever quit. And I learned, two, you'll never be able to explain it to anybody.
quotes.author: Jim Ryun

quotes.quote: I felt my throat start to close up, and I didn't think I was getting enough oxygen. I was scared, and I thought about quitting. But you don't want to quit when you've trained so hard and long for one race.
quotes.author: Deena Drossin

quotes.quote: I made a vow never to quit in a race, even if I had to walk in.
quotes.author: Alberto Salazar

quotes.quote: Life is a little like wrestling a gorilla. You don't quit when you're tired—you quit when the gorilla is tired.
quotes.author: Robert Strauss

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to quit, but don't quit because you are afraid.
quotes.author: Robin Sacredgire

quotes.quote: Sometimes you will apply for a job and you won't get it and you will think it is the greatest setback, but just remember it isn't losing that is wrong; it is quitting. Don't quit. Don't ever quit. Keep trying, because this country needs the very best that you, the young generation of America, can give to it.
quotes.author: Richard Nixon

quotes.quote: Keep on going and the chances are you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it. I have never heard of anyone stumbling on something sitting down.
quotes.author: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.quote: The greatest accomplishment is not in never falling, but in rising again after you fall.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Never let your head hang down. Never give up and sit down and grieve. Find another way. And don't pray when it rains if you don't pray when the sun shines.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.quote: It matters if you just don't give up.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Regardless of what they say about it, we are going to keep it...I don't believe I ought to quit because I Am not a quitter.
quotes.author: Richard Nixon

quotes.quote: When care is pressing you down a bit, / Rest if you must but don't you quit.
quotes.author: Edgar Albert Guest

quotes.quote: I dwell in possibility.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Obstacles don't have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don't turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: we only have one rule. You can't stop. You can go as slow as you need to go, but you cannot stop. You can never drop out.
quotes.author: Lewis Howes

quotes.quote: Don't give up when you still have something to give up. Nothing is really over until the moment you stop trying.
quotes.author: Brian Dyson

quotes.quote: Don't quit; keep trying. / Don’t stop; keep moving. / Don't despair; keep believing. / There is a way. There is always a way.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: It's hard to beat somebody that doesn't quit. Don't quit. Evolve
quotes.author: Wesam Fawzi

quotes.quote: Never give up. Things may be hard, but if you quit trying they'll never get better. Stop worrying and start trusting God. It will be worth it.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Don’t give up. You have invested a lot of time already.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: It’s not that I'm so smart, it’s just that I stay with problems longer.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriett Stowe

quotes.quote: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Success seems to be largely a matter of hanging on after others have let go.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: When you get to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The best that we can do is to be kindly and helpful toward our friends and fellow passengers who are clinging to the same speck of dirt while we are drifting side by side to our common doom.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: Greater dooms win greater destinies.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: Everything is more beautiful because we're doomed. You will never be lovelier than you are now. We will never be here again.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: A nation that continues year after year to spend more money on military defense than on programs of social uplift is approaching spiritual doom.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: Yesterday we had feared a doom we did not know; today the doom was known by us all, and feared no less.
quotes.author: Robin McKinley

quotes.quote: It can be easy to get swept up into catastrophizing the situation once your thoughts become negative. When you begin predicting doom and gloom, remind yourself that there are many other potential outcomes.
quotes.author: Amy Morin

quotes.quote: The word 'catastrophe' is not permitted as long as there is danger of catastrophe turning to doom.
quotes.author: Christa Wolf

quotes.quote: No evil dooms us hopelessly except the evil we love, and desire to continue in, and make no effort to escape from.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Every human being is doomed to die, which is the greatest of all failures.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: A leader who confines his role to his people's experience dooms himself to stagnation; a leader who outstrips his people's experience runs the risk of not being understood.
quotes.author: Henry A. Kissinger

quotes.quote: The future is uncertain but the end is always near.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: The doom lies in yourself, not in your name.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: I'm not a doom-and-gloom person. But I think there is a difference between transcendence and denial, and much of the Western world is in major denial today.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Modern science says: 'The sun is the past, the earth is the present, the moon is the future.' From an incandescent mass we have originated, and into a frozen mass we shall turn. Merciless is the law of nature, and rapidly and irresistibly we are drawn to our doom.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.quote: Those who fail to learn from the past abate its triumphs.
quotes.author: Rayvern White

quotes.quote: Prophets of doom have always taken risks in terms of ridicule and humiliation. If you stand on a street corner holding up a sign that reads 'The End Is Near,' passersby will laugh and heckle. People will say you're like Chicken Little, running around telling people the sky is falling.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: It is the just doom of laziness and gluttony to be inactive without ease and drowsy without tranquility.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: I like doom and gloom with a sense of humour. Maybe it's a Scottish thing, we like to undercut indulgence with a laugh.
quotes.author: Shirley Henderson

quotes.quote: They trained me for this. It's their own fault. They helped make their own doom.
quotes.author: Victoria Aveyard

quotes.quote: I know people can be awful dooms for each other.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: I did love her in a way, but it was under the sign of doom.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: The doom of destruction is the snare of sin.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Hawks with broken wings; lions with broken paws; men with broken hearts, they all have one thing in common: they're all as sure to die as those unbroken.
quotes.author: Bruce Crown

quotes.quote: The light was everywhere. He would tell me later I looked like an angel... but he just looked like the same devil to me.
quotes.author: Quil Carter

quotes.quote: If we were to hit the level that Metallica or somebody like that hit, we'd have had a hard time dealing with it. I think it would have been our doom. It's hard for anybody at that level.
quotes.author: Gerald Caiafa

quotes.quote: No death, no doom, no anguish can arouse the surpassing despair which flows from a loss of identity.
quotes.author: H.P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: Do you know how sometimes - when you are riding your bike and you start skidding across sand, or when you miss a step and start tumbling down the stairs - you have those long, long seconds to know that you are going to be hurt, and badly?
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: You hear doom and gloom about the Internet ruining young people's command of English - that's nonsense.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: These are clearly the end times, and now we understand why the prophets warned us about the Trump of Doom.
quotes.author: Michael R. Burch

quotes.quote: Some day we hope to liberate every man on earth from the tendency as old as human history to identify our strength and manhood with the ability to control the lives, limit the chances, and doom the dreams of women and girls.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: Those that think that wealth is the proper thing for them cannot give up their revenues; those that seek distinction cannot give up the thought of fame; those that cleave to power cannot give the handle of it to others. While they hold their grasp of those things, they are afraid of losing them. When they let them go, they are grieved and they will not look at a single example, from which they might perceive the folly of their restless pursuits - such men are under the doom of heaven.
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.quote: Life is too short to spend your precious time trying to convince a person who wants to live in gloom and doom otherwise. Give lifting that person your best shot, but don't hang around long enough for his/her bad attitude to pull you down. Instead, surround yourself with optimistic people.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: So, if anatomy is destiny then testosterone is doom.
quotes.author: Al Goldstein

quotes.quote: Time has a doomsday book, upon whose pages he is continually recording illustrious names. But as often as a new name is written there, an old one disappears. Only a few stand in illuminated characters never to be effaced.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Apocalypse is the eye of a needle, through which we pass into a different world.
quotes.author: George Zebrowski

quotes.quote: That doomsday idea is in everybody's subconscious.
quotes.author: Alycia Debnam-Carey

quotes.quote: It is clear that we cannot go up another two orders of magnitude as we have climbed the last five. If we did, we should have two scientists for every man, woman, child, and dog in the population, and we should spend on them twice as much money as we had. Scientific doomsday is therefore less than a century distant.
quotes.author: Derek J. de Solla Price

quotes.quote: If silence of the days and darkness of the nights is the indicator of the doomsday; we are already in it.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: In 5-billion years the Sun will expand & engulf our orbit as the charred ember that was once Earth vaporizes. Have a nice day.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: Armageddon is not around the corner. This is only what the people of violence want us to believe. The complexity and diversity of the world is the hope for the future.
quotes.author: Michael Palin

quotes.quote: Doomsday is near; die all, die merrily.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Don't wait for the last judgment - it takes place every day.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The global economy is a doomsday machine that must be stopped and reprogrammed.
quotes.author: Kalle Lasn

quotes.quote: Apocalypse does not point to a fiery Armageddon but to the fact that our ignorance and our complacency are coming to an end.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: The final judgment is not just an evaluation of a sum total of good and evil acts - what we have done. It is an acknowledgement of the final effect or our acts and thoughts - what we have become.
quotes.author: Dallin H. Oaks

quotes.quote: Due to the lack of experienced trumpeters, the end of the world has been postponed for three weeks.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: The world is full of judgment-days, and into every assembly that a man enters, in every action he attempts, he is gauged and stamped.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Apocalypse has become banal, a set of statistical risk parameters to everyone's existence.
quotes.author: Anthony Giddens

quotes.quote: Apocalypse has come and gone. We're just grubbing in the ashes.
quotes.author: Samuel R. Delany

quotes.quote: Don't wake me for the end of the world unless it has very good special effects.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Apocalypse can mean the unveiling of the deeper self of humanity.
quotes.author: Barbara Marx Hubbard

quotes.quote: One of the things that all religions have is a narrative of doomsday. There has to be some kind of overarching fear of the future. If there wasn't, none of the religions could invoke this important thing - that science has no evidence of, by the way - called free will.
quotes.author: Greg Graffin

quotes.quote: When you expect the world to end at any moment, you know there is no need to hurry. You take your time, you do your work well.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Armageddon was yesterday, today we have a serious problem.
quotes.author: Stieg Larsson

quotes.quote: There's no doomsday scheme made specifically for mankind, only higher agenda and priority than human race preservation.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: As far as love is concerned, possession, power, fusion and disenchantment are the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.
quotes.author: Zygmunt Bauman

quotes.quote: One of the illusions of life is that the present hour is not the critical, decisive hour. Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year. No man has learned anything rightly, until he knows that every day is Doomsday.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Selfishness alone is sufficient to bring apocalypse upon a nation.
quotes.author: Khem Veasna

quotes.quote: We need to get environmentalism out of the sphere of religion. We need to stop the mythic fantasies, and we need to stop the doomsday predictions. We need to start doing hard science instead.
quotes.author: Michael Crichton
