quotes.quote: The apocalypse is not something which is coming. The apocalypse has arrived in major portions of the planet and it's only because we live within a bubble of incredible privilege and social insulation that we still have the luxury of anticipating the apocalypse
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Doomsday is quite within our reach, if we will only stretch for it.
quotes.author: Loudon Wainwright III

quotes.quote: At the crash of economic collapse of which the rumblings can already be heard, the sleeping soldiers of the proletariat will awake as at the fanfare of the Last Judgment and the corpses of the victims of the struggle will arise and demand an accounting from those who are loaded down with curses.
quotes.author: Karl Liebknecht

quotes.quote: You suppose that you are the lock on the door. But you are the key that opens it.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: If you feel you have to open a particular door, open it, otherwise all your life that door will haunt your mind!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A man will be imprisoned in a room with a door that's unlocked and opens inwards; as long as it does not occur to him to pull rather than push.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: Every door is another passage, another boundary we have to go beyond.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Open the doors of opportunity to talent and virtue and they will do themselves justice, and property will not be in bad hands.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: When a door closes you have two choices: give up, or keep going.
quotes.author: Rihanna

quotes.quote: The door on which we have been knocking all our lives will open at last.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Love opens the doors into everything, as far as I can see, including and perhaps most of all, the door into one's own secret, and often terrible and frightening, real self.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: When one door closes, fortune will usually open another.
quotes.author: Fernando De Rojas

quotes.quote: Just because a door appears closed it does not mean that it is locked - nor that it will not open with the right heart, call or touch.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: The doors of opportunity swing on the hinges of opposition!
quotes.author: Adrian Rogers

quotes.quote: Look on every exit as being an entrance somewhere else.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: When one door closes, another opens; but we often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door that we do not see the one which has opened for us.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: The doors will be opened to those who are bold enough to knock.
quotes.author: Tony Gaskins

quotes.quote: Opportunity knocks once at every man's door and then keeps on knocking.
quotes.author: George Ade

quotes.quote: So many people enter and leave your life! Hundreds of thousands of people! You have to keep the door open so they can come in! But it also means you have to let them go!
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: You can't knock on opportunity's door and not be ready.
quotes.author: Bruno Mars

quotes.quote: The door of illumination is open to those for whom other doors are closed.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: A door that seems to stand open must be of a man's size, or it is not the door that providence means for him.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: If the doors of perception were cleansed everything would appear to man as it is, infinite.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Leave the door open for the unknown, the door into the dark. That's where the most important things come from, where you yourself came from, and where you will go.
quotes.author: Rebecca Solnit

quotes.quote: The doors we open and close each day decide the lives we live.
quotes.author: Flora Whittemore

quotes.quote: Traveling is not just seeing the new; it is also leaving behind. Not just opening doors; also closing them behind you, never to return. But the place you have left forever is always there for you to see whenever you shut your eyes.
quotes.author: Jan Myrdal

quotes.quote: When the doors of opportunity swing open, we must make sure that we are not too drunk or too indifferent to walk through.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: Doors are going to open-doors you can't even imagine exist.
quotes.author: Julie Powell

quotes.quote: When one door closes another opens but all too often there is a long hallway in between.
quotes.author: Rick Jarow

quotes.quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
quotes.author: Kyle Chandler

quotes.quote: The door of the human heart, can only be opened from the inside.
quotes.author: William Holman Hunt

quotes.quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Out of doors one becomes abstract and impersonal. One's individuality absolutely leaves one.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If the door is locked, try the window.
quotes.author: Lynn Caine

quotes.quote: The door is closed to prayer unless it is opened with the key of trust.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: The door can never be closed for good to any player.
quotes.author: Zinedine Zidane

quotes.quote: There is no key to happiness; the door is always open.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: That door had a lot to say, people entered and people left but never the same!
quotes.author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

quotes.quote: The door that nobody else will go in at, seems always to swing open widely for me.
quotes.author: Clara Barton

quotes.quote: Every time I close the door on reality it comes in through the windows.
quotes.author: Jennifer Yane

quotes.quote: Behind each door we shake is a reality.
quotes.author: Akiane Kramarik

quotes.quote: One door closes and another one opens.
quotes.author: Boy George

quotes.quote: When one door is closed, don't you know, another is open.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Once the doors close there can be no lie or deception and the lights will tell all!
quotes.author: Walel Watson

quotes.quote: The Doors are perfect paintings; a relief from the picture world I've created for myself.
quotes.author: Gary Hume

quotes.quote: All the doors you ignored or refused to enter represents your uncreated fates!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Hard work opens doors and shows the world that you are serious about being one of those rare and special human beings that uses the fullness of their talents for the highest and the very best.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: Doors open because you're beautiful, but I wouldn't cultivate beauty to the exclusion of brains.
quotes.author: Tia Carrere

quotes.quote: Doors open up for you when you work hard. Doors also open up for you when you walk with a limp and act gimpy.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Closed doors simply means God is protecting us from having not the best.
quotes.author: Bo Sanchez

quotes.quote: Two doors down they're laughing and drinking and having a party / And two doors down they're not aware that I'm around / But here I am crying my heart out, feeling sorry / But they're having a party just two doors down.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: You open the door / To another door, to another door / To another door, to another door / And I'm running through to you.
quotes.author: James Stack

quotes.quote: Open the door to your heart / Open the door to your soul / Get back in the flow / Open the door to your heart.
quotes.author: Carl N Morrison

quotes.quote: Someone's knockin' at the door / Somebody's ringin' the bell / Someone's knockin' at the door / Somebody's ringin' the bell / Do me a favor / Open the door and let 'em in.
quotes.author: Paul McCartney

quotes.quote: What's behind door number one / Could probably get the job done / What's behind door number two / Something special for you / What's behind door number three / Could fulfill your fantasies / All you got to do is chose / Either way you don't lose.
quotes.author: Keith D Sweat

quotes.quote: A creaking door hangs long on its hinges.
quotes.author: Jon R. Stone

quotes.quote: There was only one door in the entire Universe; / Which still had perennially unassailable light; / There was only one door which still harbored one and all irrespective of caste; / Creed and spurious religion alike; / O! yes it was indeed a door; / Which irrefutably led to the Omnisciently sacred feet of Almighty Lord.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: A door just opened on a street-- / I, lost, was passing by-- / An instant's width of warmth disclosed / And wealth, and company.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: All doors open to courtesy.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Some doors are best left closed.
quotes.author: George R R Martin

quotes.quote: Big doors swing on little hinges.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: The doors of wisdom are never shut.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Where one door shuts another opens.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: The door to happiness opens outward.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Doors are for those who lack enemies.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: If there's no door, then I'll make one!
quotes.author: Hiromu Arakawa

quotes.quote: The back door beckons to a prodigal son.
quotes.author: Michael Davidow

quotes.quote: Doors are for people with no imagination.
quotes.author: Derek Landy

quotes.quote: Weird doors open. People fall into things.
quotes.author: David Sedaris

quotes.quote: The door to the invisible must be visible.
quotes.author: Rene Daumal

quotes.quote: You unlock the door with the key of imagination.
quotes.author: Rod Serling

quotes.quote: A good door needs no lock, still it can't be opened.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The doors of heaven and hell are adjacent and identical.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: When the door to love opens, The window to control closes.
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.quote: If you shut the door to all errors, truth will be shut out.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: The getting out of doors is the greatest part of the journey.
quotes.author: Abraham Cowley

quotes.quote: I'm not just a doormat. I'm not just being stepped on all over the place. If you look at the bulk of my material, it's about trying to find some strength through that.
quotes.author: Lucinda Williams

quotes.quote: You're either a goddess ... or a doormat.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: The poor taxpayer may wipe his shoes on a $3 doormat when he goes home, but not the Navy. It is, damn the cost, full feet ahead on a doormat you would be ashamed to get muddy.
quotes.author: William Proxmire

quotes.quote: Doormatitis: door-mat-i-tis noun; low self-worth. A learned behavior where the infected person allows others to walk all over them, blame them, treat them terribly, always giving the boundary crossers the benefit of the doubt. They make excuses for them, They will give in to guilt and intimidation and give the boundary crossers what they want again and again.
quotes.author: P.A. Speers

quotes.quote: The altar cloth of one aeon is the doormat of the next.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I refuse to be a doormat to any man. I will never allow anyone to push me around. I am my own mistress.
quotes.author: Manisha Koirala

quotes.quote: Celebrities are the doormats to power.
quotes.author: Greg Gutfeld

quotes.quote: Not every caring person is a doormat. But if you're wondering if your caring behaviour operates sometimes in a way that causes you hurt or feels like a denial of yourself, perhaps you have recently started to notice your own needs more, which is a good thing.
quotes.author: Sarah Tomley

quotes.quote: [I am] a doormat in a world of boots.
quotes.author: Jean Rhys

quotes.quote: People call me feminist whenever I express sentiments that differentiate me from a doormat or a prostitute.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: He left her upon the black ground. He ruined her completely. In taking away her mat, the poorest article of household furniture, he left her to sit upon the bare floor.
quotes.author: Arabic Proverb

quotes.quote: You can be nice without being a doormat.
quotes.author: Rachelle Disbennett-Lee

quotes.quote: If they aren't treating you right, it's time to stop blaming them. You decide your worth, so if you don't want to be a doormat, get off the floor.
quotes.author: Charles Orlando

quotes.quote: Do not be the doormat to somebody else stomping your dreams! Dream big. The world needs your weirdness!
quotes.author: Rachel Hollis

quotes.quote: I'm no longer a doormat. I'll show you the door!
quotes.author: Fatima Shahnaz Ahmad

quotes.quote: I stand before you as a doormat. Oh, I mean a female entertainer. Thank you for acknowledging my ability to continue my career in the face of blatant misogyny, sexism & relentless abuse.
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: The spiritual warrior is not a doormat, she is a welcome mat. She has a heart of gold, but a soul of steel. Her motto is: 'Love your neighbor, but don't take their sh*t.'
quotes.author: Derek Rydall

quotes.quote: Doormats tell one nothing. Doormats know their place.
quotes.author: Mole

quotes.quote: You treat him like a doormat and he's going to start to wonder what's outside the door.
quotes.author: Alexandra Gelbart

quotes.quote: If your wife wanted a doormat, she'd go to Sears.
quotes.author: Detective Lennie Briscoe

quotes.quote: Excuse me, a doormat is good honest work / Only the bored and the wicked rich don't know that / Excuse me, poor man, let's skip this town / Who me? / Oh man, was that out loud? / Ow, whoa, I'm on my own here / you know, the devil may care / You make this groovy, you make me laugh / You make me woozy, a wet doormat.
quotes.author: Ralph Tresvant

quotes.quote: Don't want to wink at nobody, don't want to be winked at / Don't want to be used by nobody for a doormat / Don't want to confuse nobody, don't want to be confused / Don't want to amuse nobody, don't want to be amused.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: You said you couldn't tell the doormat from my face / You said if I had brains I would pawn them / Could be I've finally gotten up off of my thumbs / Could be that you're the one that was on them.
quotes.author: Levine

quotes.quote: To you I'm blind / Somethin' inside / Say you don't mind / It gets you so bad / That a doormat sees better times / There's time to get back / And think up some better lines / I've been doing some growing / But I'm scared of you going.
quotes.author: Denny Laine

quotes.quote: Oh God! The beauty of the blow / When I will blast his life; / When I will laugh and let him know / My mistress is his wife. / Today a doormat for his feet, / He loves to see me squirm / Tomorrow,--how revenge is sweet! / The turning of the worm.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: Value yourself. The only people who appreciate a doormat are people with dirty shoes.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: No one expects the doormat to stand upright, shake itself off, and amble down the street to seek its own happiness.
quotes.author: Lynn Coady

quotes.quote: If you behave like a doormat, expect to be stepped on and don't complain about it.
quotes.author: Suzette Haden Elgin

quotes.quote: If you want to be a doormat you have to lay yourself down first.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If you allow people to treat you like a doormat, they will expect you to say welcome.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: The people that truly love us in life don't fight for us to remain a doormat for others.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: The trouble is, if you go too far towards being polite, the label that applies is "doormat".
quotes.author: Charles Stross

quotes.quote: God is not a doormat, nor should anyone else be a doormat.
quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.quote: If people keep stepping on you, wear a pointy hat.
quotes.author: Joyce Rachelle

quotes.quote: If you make yourself into a doormat, people will wipe their feet on you.
quotes.author: Belizean Proverb

quotes.quote: Connecting dots is not that rewarding of an experience.
quotes.author: Damon Lindelof

quotes.quote: You have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future.
quotes.author: Thomas L. Friedman

quotes.quote: You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Believe in the reader and they can connect the dots, if you succeed breathe life into the story.
quotes.author: Esther Freud

quotes.quote: The impulse to connect the dots - and to share what you've connected - is the urge that makes you an artist.
quotes.author: Amanda Palmer

quotes.quote: If you can connect all the dots between what you see today and where you want to go, then it's probably not ambitious enough or aspirational enough.
quotes.author: Shantanu Narayen

quotes.quote: Collecting the dots. Then connecting them. And then sharing the connections with those around you. This is how a creative human works. Collecting, connecting, sharing.
quotes.author: Amanda Palmer

quotes.quote: We connect the dots in the drawing with our mind. We give them a meaning, a figurative sense, which is self-reflexive in that it creates us, because we are the experiencer of the moment.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Because believing that the dots will connect down the road will give you the confidence to follow your heart even when it leads you off the well worn path.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: It is just human nature to take time to connect the dots, I know that. But I also know that there can be a day of reckoning when you wish you had connected the dots more quickly.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: We can only connect the dots we collect, which makes everything you write about you... your connections are the thread that you weave into the cloth that becomes the story that only you can tell.
quotes.author: Amanda Palmer

quotes.quote: Connect the dots between individual roles and the goals of the organization. When people see that connection, they get a lot of energy out of work. They feel the importance, dignity, and meaning in their job.
quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

quotes.quote: Everything's intentional. It's just filling in the dots.
quotes.author: David Byrne

quotes.quote: From now on, I'll connect the dots my own way.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Before you can trust your team to make decisions better than you would have, you need to build their capability to connect the dots.
quotes.author: Chris Fussell

quotes.quote: Polka dots can't stay alone. When we obliterate nature and our bodies with polka dots, we become part of the unity of our environments.
quotes.author: Yayoi Kusama

quotes.quote: I'm just the smallest dot in a big map of human history.
quotes.author: Ben Casnocha

quotes.quote: Everything starts from a dot.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: It is double pleasure to deceive the deceiver.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: If you want to increase your success rate, double your failure rate.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: Desire doubled is love and love doubled is madness.
quotes.author: Anne Carson

quotes.quote: The safe way to double your money is to fold it over once and put it in your pocket.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: Friendship doubles your joys, and divides your sorrows.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: A double bind is far worse than a straightforward damned-if-you-do, damned-if-you-don't dilemma. It requires you to obey two mutually exclusive commands: Anything you do to fulfill one violates the other.
quotes.author: Deborah Tannen

quotes.quote: If a man could have half of his wishes, he would double his troubles.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The secret of long life is double careers. One to about age sixty, then another for the next thirty years.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: We are in a double bind. We are expected to feel inferior not only as women, but because we are old.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Janeway

quotes.quote: To double your net worth, double your self-worth. Because you will never exceed the height of your self-image.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: There is a double rhythm in all human beings. We are binary beings - two arms, two legs, two eyes, two ears. Two legs for walking. And the heartbeat thumping in our chest mirrors that.
quotes.author: Paul Auster

quotes.quote: Cut your excuses in half and double your actions around your goals.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Art has a double face, of expression and illusion, just like science has a double face: the reality of error and the phantom of truth.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: This 'double ethical bind' we frequently find ourselves in cannot be solved by any formula. Each of us has to decide what the right balance is between being effective and being honest. I hope that means being both.
quotes.author: Stephen Schneider

quotes.quote: The dual scourge of hunger and malnutrition will be truly vanquished not only when granaries are full, but also when people's basic health needs are met and women are given their rightful role in societies.
quotes.author: Gro Harlem Brundtland

quotes.quote: The double law of attraction and radiation or of sympathy and antipathy, of fixedness and movement, which is the principle of Creation, and the perpetual cause of life.
quotes.author: Albert Pike

quotes.quote: A gift, with a kind countenance, is a double present.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: A gift in season is a double favor to the needy.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: The double chin's not good for the red carpet.
quotes.author: Missy Elliott

quotes.quote: If you want to double your productively, shorten the timeline to by 50%.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: No man pays double or twice for the same thing, forasmuch as nothing can be spent but once.
quotes.author: William Petty

quotes.quote: When you go into the realm of a double role, you have to take it to another level to make it believable.
quotes.author: R. Madhavan

quotes.quote: If you double the number of experiments you do per year you're going to double your inventiveness.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways. Are you unstable about your relationship to Christ?
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The double pleasure of pulling down an opponent, and of raising oneself, is the charm of a politician's life.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: To double your income, triple your investment in self-development.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: There's a double standard between writers and readers. Readers can be unfaithful to writers anytime they like, but writers must never ever be unfaithful to the readers.
quotes.author: Peter Schjeldahl

quotes.quote: The double standard of morality will survive in this world so long as the woman whose husband has been lured away is favoured with the sympathetic tears of other women, and a man whose wife has made off is laughed at by other men.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: I think the dual existence thing is a regular pastime for all human beings, and for that matter anything in this universe.
quotes.author: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

quotes.quote: Anything you lose automatically doubles in value.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: You double your intensity with skill.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: The command to be free is a double bind.
quotes.author: Kim Stanley

quotes.quote: There's a double beauty whenever a swan Swims on a lake with her double thereon.
quotes.author: Thomas Hood

quotes.quote: It doubles your perception, to write from the point of view of someone you're not.
quotes.author: Michael Ondaatje

quotes.quote: Too much apology doubles the offense.
quotes.author: James Richardson

quotes.quote: We are too often double espresso followers of a decaf Sovereign.
quotes.author: John Ortberg

quotes.quote: Single vision produces worse illusions than double vision or many-headed monsters.
quotes.author: Donna J. Haraway

quotes.quote: We always blame the woman when a man falls in love, as though no man had the courage of his inclinations.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor

quotes.quote: Morality is what the queen expects from the hive, not from herself.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: It is forbidden to kill; therefore all murderers are punished unless they kill in large numbers and to the sound of trumpets.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: When I kiss a girl for a part, people think it's sexy. But if two guys kiss, suddenly there's a backlash. It's a double standard.
quotes.author: Olivia Wilde

quotes.quote: People cant handle the truth unless you speak to them with a mirror.
quotes.author: Lakia Echols

quotes.quote: Leaders scan the future so it can be free of doubts and fear. They do so by not living a double standard life in the present.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: In relation to a writer, most readers believe in the Double Standard: they may be unfaithful to him as often as they like, but he must never, never be unfaithful to them.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: We have a double standard, which is to say, a man can show how much he cares by being violent see, he's jealous, he cares a woman shows how much she cares by how much she's willing to be hurt; by how much she will take; how much she will endure; how suicidal she's prepared to be.
quotes.author: Andrea Dworkin

quotes.quote: I think we cannot have a double standard. We cannot see our art as different from the reality. We cannot use two different sets of judgment.
quotes.author: Ai Weiwei

quotes.quote: There's a double standard between writers and readers. Readers can be unfaithful to writers anytime they like, but writers must never ever be unfaithful to the readers.
quotes.author: Peter Schjeldahl

quotes.quote: A politician is a man who will double cross that bridge when he comes to it.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: The double standard of morality will survive in this world so long as the woman whose husband has been lured away is favoured with the sympathetic tears of other women, and a man whose wife has made off is laughed at by other men.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: We cannot use a double standard for measuring our own and other people's policies. Our demands for democratic practices in other lands will be no more effective than the guarantees of those practiced in our own country.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: It's a double standard. They say these management guys are so valuable. They are not. This is typical corporate greed.
quotes.author: Bobby De Pace

quotes.quote: It's true that in Cuba there are double standards, there's opportunism, and there is a lack of freedom in some ways.
quotes.author: Fernando Perez

quotes.quote: Apparently when it's two people, it's quirky and funny, but when it's a person doing the same stuff on her own, it's rebellious and antisocial.
quotes.author: Katie Alender

quotes.quote: I will not calm down! Women are allowed to get angrier than men about double standards.
quotes.author: Liz

quotes.quote: Once you've lived the inside-out world of espionage, you never shed it. It's a mentality, a double standard of existence.
quotes.author: John Le Carre

quotes.quote: There's definitely a whole double standard. I don't understand it. A guy can be sexy and good looking, and it totally just enhances his credibility as an athlete.
quotes.author: Lolo Jones

quotes.quote: There's been a decline in the double standard. That's why you're seeing more of these cases.
quotes.author: David Finkelhor

quotes.quote: It is vain to expect virtue from women till they are in some degree independent of men.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.quote: I think there will always be a double standard between males and females, so I think that an actress is more likely to protect her public persona, so to speak, than an actor would be.
quotes.author: Mila Kunis

quotes.quote: It's very clear that there's a lot of double standards going on. Should there be a 30mph speed limit? Of course there bloody should. And certainly with kids and school food, kids need to be nannied for sure. So give them a bloody good meal at school.
quotes.author: Jamie Oliver

quotes.quote: There is this double standard. The losses are larger in other areas of the tax code, but somehow a different standard gets applied to this.
quotes.author: Robert Greenstein

quotes.quote: I hate to hear you talk about all women as if they were fine ladies instead of rational creatures. None of us want to be in calm waters all our lives.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: History is filled with double standards: a man who uses a woman is colored an ass, yet a woman who uses a man is hailed as resourceful.
quotes.author: Ken Poirot

quotes.quote: Let's not have a double standard. One standard will do just fine.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: There is a double-standard. And quite often if you're from Africa, if you're from a developing country, you'll be executed. There aren't that many people protesting or making a big fuss. But our State Department and the media if you're a Westerner will make a big fuss
quotes.author: Dick Atkins

quotes.quote: Now look, all I'm trying to say is that there are lots of things that a man can do, and in society's eyes it's all hunky-dory. A woman does the same things—the same thing mind you—and she's an outcast...All I'm saying is why let this deplorable system seep into our courts of law where women are supposed to be equal.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: All a woman has to do is to slip once and she's a tramp. A man can kill, lie, cheat...
quotes.author: Joan Crawford

quotes.quote: If a man is unfaithful to his wife, it's like spitting from a house into the street; but if a woman is unfaithful to her husband, it's like spitting from the street into the house.
quotes.author: American Proverbs

quotes.quote: Gentlemen prefer blondes, but marry brunettes.
quotes.author: American Proverbs

quotes.quote: When a lady says no, she means perhaps; when she says perhaps, she means yes; when she says yes, she is no lady.
quotes.author: American Proverbs

quotes.quote: As a man loves gold, in that proportion he hates to be imposed upon by counterfeits; and in proportion,The New Dictionary of Thoughts as a man has regard for that which is above price and better than gold, he abhors that hypocrisy which is but its counterfeit.
quotes.author: Cecil

quotes.quote: He was a man who would say untruths, and be ever double, both in his words and deeds.— He was never, but where he meant to ruin, pitiful.
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The hypocrite was a man, who stole the livery of the court of heaven to serve the devil in.
quotes.author: Pollock

quotes.quote: 'Tis not my talent to conceal my thoughts, or carry smiles and sunshine in my face, / When discontent sits heavy at my heart.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Ye are like unto whited sepulchers, which indeed appear beautiful outward, but are within full of dead men's bones, and of all uncleanness.
quotes.author: St. Matthew

quotes.quote: All I can say is, if you cannot ride two horses, you have no right in the circus.
quotes.author: James Maxton

quotes.quote: Most people sell their souls and live with a good conscience on the proceeds.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: I hope you have not been leading a double life, pretending to be wicked and being really good all the time. That would be hypocrisy.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: When you say that you agree to a thing in principle, you mean that you have not the slightest intention of carrying it out.
quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

quotes.quote: We live behind our faces, while they front for us.
quotes.author: Michael Korda

quotes.quote: When a man gives his opinion, he's a man. When a woman gives her opinion, she's a bitch.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: As long as she thinks of a man, nobody objects to a woman thinking.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: I will never deny that life isn't fair. It seems as though when a woman leaves a man she is strong and independent, but when a man leaves a woman he is a pig and a jerk.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Leaders scan the future so it can be free of doubts and fear. They do so by not living a double standard life in the present.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: If liberals didn't have double standards, they wouldn't have any standards at all.
quotes.author: Burt Prelutsky

quotes.quote: Treat all as your own self. Do not have a double standard.
quotes.author: Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.quote: In relation to a writer, most readers believe in the Double Standard: they may be unfaithful to him as often as they like, but he must never, never be unfaithful to them.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: Women really are not supposed to be imaginative. That creativity of this kind is supposed to belong to men. You know, because women make babies. I find the double standards shocking.
quotes.author: Siri Hustvedt

quotes.quote: Women all live a double standard, but this is actually sort of a beautifully grotesque parody of it. There's a weird kind of joy that I have in seeing [Hillary Clinton] trounce this essence of male bullshit.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: My mother told me, you don't have to put anything in your mouth you don't want to. Then she made me eat broccoli, which felt like double standards.
quotes.author: Sarah Millican

quotes.quote: I spend some of my time brooding about people who seem addicted to double standards - those who take an allegedly principled stand on a Monday, then switch firmly to the opposite principle on Tuesday if it is to their advantage.
quotes.author: John Leonard

quotes.quote: Michelle Pfeiffer hasn't been finding a lot of work recently because she doesn't like what a woman her age is offered. That's a real double standard. You get Sean Connery, who gets older and older, still playing opposite young ladies, but it doesn't work the other way around.
quotes.author: Denzel Washington

quotes.quote: If I knew me as somebody else, I would hate me just as much. Why have a double standard?
quotes.author: David Wong

quotes.quote: Doubt whom you will, but never yourself.
quotes.author: Christine Bovee

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Our doubts are traitors and make us lose the good we oft might win by fearing to attempt.
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The beginning of wisdom is found in doubting; by doubting we come to the question, and by seeking we may come upon the truth.
quotes.author: Pierre Abelard

quotes.quote: A mind troubled by doubt cannot focus on the course to victory.
quotes.author: Arthur Golden

quotes.quote: Doubt grows with knowledge.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: To have doubted one's own first principles is the mark of a civilized man.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Doubt is useful, it keeps faith a living thing. After all, you cannot know the strength of your faith until it has been tested.
quotes.author: David Magee

quotes.quote: To know much is often the cause of doubting more.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: When in doubt, win the trick.
quotes.author: Edmund Hoyle

quotes.quote: Doubt is the father of invention.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: Doubt comes in at the window, when Inquiry is denied at the door.
quotes.author: Benjamin Jowett

quotes.quote: To believe with certainty we must begin with doubting.
quotes.author: Stanis_Aw Leszczy_Ski

quotes.quote: Doubt is a pain too lonely to know that faith is his twin brother.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Doubt is the origin of wisdom.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: It is by doubting that we come to investigate, and by investigating that we recognize the truth.
quotes.author: Peter Abelard

quotes.quote: One must verify or expel his doubts, and convert them into the certainty of Yes or NO.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Doubt is a killer. You just have to know who you are and what you stand for.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.quote: Doubt is what gets you an education.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizne

quotes.quote: Your doubt can become a good quality if you train it. It must become knowing, it must become criticism.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Modest doubt is called the beacon of the wise.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Doubt is not the opposite of faith; it is one element of faith.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: Doubts are death.Doubts are the dry rot of life.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.quote: When in doubt, don't.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Deep doubts, deep wisdom; small doubts, little wisdom.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Doubt is the vestibule through which all must pass before they can enter into the temple of wisdom.
quotes.author: Colton

quotes.quote: If a man will begin with certainties, he shall end in doubts; but if he will be content to begin with doubts, he shall end in certainties.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: If doubt is challenging you and you do not act, doubts will grow. Challenge the doubts with action and you will grow. Doubt and action are incompatible.
quotes.author: John Kanary

quotes.quote: If you doubt you can accomplish something, then you can't accomplish it. You have to have confidence in your ability, and then be tough enough to follow through.
quotes.author: Rosalyn Carter

quotes.quote: Doubt is the beginning, not the end, of wisdom.
quotes.author: George Iles

quotes.quote: Doubt must be no more than vigilance, otherwise it can become dangerous.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Doubt is a virus that attacks our self-esteem, productivity and confidence. Faith that you and your life are perfectly unfolding is the strongest vaccine.
quotes.author: Sean Stephenson

quotes.quote: Never believe what you cannot doubt.
quotes.author: Robin Skelton

quotes.quote: Doubt is the incentive to truth and inquiry leads the way.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: Doubt, of whatever kind, can be ended by action alone.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Doubt is the middle position between knowledge and ignorance. It encompasses cynicism but also genuine questioning.
quotes.author: Vera Farmiga

quotes.quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: There is nothing more dreadful than the habit of doubt. Doubt separates people. It is a poison that disintegrates friendships and breaks up pleasant relations. It is a thorn that irritates and hurts; it is a sword that kills.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Doubt is the thing that'll kill you, the only thing, and it'll kill your friends, too.
quotes.author: Ron Leshem

quotes.quote: Even a wise man knows doubt from time to time, it is the fool who allows it to rule his judgement.
quotes.author: Jennifer Hudock

quotes.quote: Doubt is a creature within the air.It grows when someone hesitates.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Doubt is the ally of hope, not its enemy, and together they made all the blessing he had.
quotes.author: Barry Unsworth

quotes.quote: Doubts are the ants in the pants of faith. They keep it awake and moving.
quotes.author: Frederick Buechner

quotes.quote: Doubt is one of the main paths on the highway to failure.
quotes.author: Rick Pitino & Bill Reynolds

quotes.quote: Doubt ... is an illness that comes from knowledge and leads to madness.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: Doubt is the herald of progress; the genius of reason; the pathway to truth; the advance guard in the contest with intellectual darkness.
quotes.author: Henry M. Taber

quotes.quote: Doubt is a catalyst for owning one's faith and allowing the faith story to continue.
quotes.author: Eric Venable

quotes.quote: Doubt is the stepping-stone to faith.
quotes.author: Harwood Huntingtin

quotes.quote: When you doubt your power, you give power to your doubt.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: When in doubt, tell the truth.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Laugh at yourself, but don't ever aim your doubt at yourself. Be bold. When you embark for strange places, don't leave any of yourself safely on shore. Have the nerve to go into unexplored territory.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: There are two ways to slide easily through life; to believe everything or to doubt everything. Both ways save us from thinking.
quotes.author: Alfred Korzybski

quotes.quote: My mind is clouded with a doubt.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Doubt tempers belief with sanity.
quotes.author: Barbara Kruger

quotes.quote: The whole problem with the world is that fools and fanatics are always so certain of themselves, and wiser people so full of doubts.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The problem with the wise is they are so filled with doubts while the dull are so certain.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: To doubt is a misfortune, but to seek when in doubt is an indispensable duty. So he who doubts and seeks not is at once unfortunate and unfair.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Our toil must be in silence, and our efforts all in secret for this enlightened age, when men believe not even what they see, the doubting of wise men would be his greatest strength.
quotes.author: Bram Stoker

quotes.quote: Just think of the tragedy of teaching children not to doubt.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Willpower is the key to success. Successful people strive no matter what they feel by applying their will to overcome apathy, doubt or fear
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: Four be the things I'd have been better without love, curiosity, freckles, and doubt.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Doubt indulged soon becomes doubt realized.
quotes.author: Frances Ridley Havergal

quotes.quote: Philosophy when superficially studied, excites doubt, when thoroughly explored, it dispels it.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Doubt everything. Find your own light.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: He that knows nothing doubts nothing.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Doubt is part of all religion. All the religious thinkers were doubters.
quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quotes.quote: Doubt can only be removed by action.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Doubt comes to the door in darkness, pretending to be alone and in need of your compassionate ear. But if you let him in, he'll bring his friends.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: Human beings are perhaps never more frightening than when they are convinced beyond doubt that they are right.
quotes.author: Laurens Van Der Post

quotes.quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Doubt yourself and you doubt everything you see. Judge yourself and you see judges everywhere. But if you listen to the sound of your own voice, you can rise above doubt and judgment. And you can see forever.
quotes.author: Nancy Lopez

quotes.quote: Faith doesn't mean you never doubt. It only means you never act upon your doubts.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: Sometimes I think it is my mission to bring faith to the faithless, and doubt to the faithful.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: Beliefs are what divide people. Doubt unites them.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day begin it well and serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Truth is beautiful, without doubt, but so are lies.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If you would be a real seeker after truth, it is necessary that at least once in your life you doubt, as far as possible, all things.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: Fanaticism is overcompensation for doubt.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: Every mental act is composed of doubt and belief, but it is belief that is the positive, it is belief that sustains thought and holds the world together.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Everybody drags its shadow, and every mind its doubt.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Doubt is not a pleasant condition, but certainty is absurd.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Doubts must be resolved alone within the soul. Otherwise one would profane one's own powerful solution.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: Doubt thou the stars are fire. Doubt that the sun doth move; Doubt truth to be a liar; But never doubt I love.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: But now I am cabined, cribbed, confined, bound into saucy doubts and fears.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I respect faith, but doubt is what gets you an education.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: The more bombers the less room for doves of peace.
quotes.author: Nikita Khrushchev

quotes.quote: Expand Thy wings, celestial Dove, brood o'er our nature's night on our disordered spirits move, and let there now be light.
quotes.author: Charles Wesley

quotes.quote: Great ideas come into the world as gently as doves.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: As the hawk is wont to pursue the trembling doves.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Those doves below, the ones utterly cared for, never endangered ones, cannot know tenderness.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: A dove will never nest in a burning tree, nor will love ever reside in unforgiving heart.
quotes.author: Jason Versey

quotes.quote: The dove loves when it quarrels; the wolf hates when it flatters.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: The sacred dove a quill did lend From her high-soaring wing.
quotes.author: F. Nethersole

quotes.quote: When a dove begins to associate with crows its feathers remain white but its heart grows black.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Be wise as a serpent and wary as a dove!
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: We must combine the toughness of the serpent with the softness of the dove, a tough mind and a tender heart.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: The Dove, on silver pinions, winged her peaceful way.
quotes.author: James Montgomery

quotes.quote: The smallest worm will turn being trodden on, and doves will peck in safeguard of their brood.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: No doves come from ravens’ eggs.
quotes.author: Mark Oxbrow

quotes.quote: Seagulls were the souls of dead soldiers. Owls were the souls of women. Doves were the recently departed souls of unmarried girls.
quotes.author: Ruta Sepetys

quotes.quote: It is not in the entrails of doves that the fall of empires can be read, but in the breeding of secrets and the multiplication of lies.
quotes.author: Rod Duncan

quotes.quote: Don't kill doves in the garden. You kill one and the others won't come.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: The humble ones are always learning and improving, and their secret is always that it's a secret.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: To be humble is to be teachable.
quotes.author: Richard G. Scott

quotes.quote: Be humble and grateful for what you have and the universe will reward your gratitude.
quotes.author: Joe Sacco

quotes.quote: People who are humble don't talk too much; they listen.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: It is necessary to be humble in order to learn.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Be humble, if thou would'st attain to wisdom. Be humbler still, when wisdom thou hast mastered.
quotes.author: H Hahn Blavatsky

quotes.quote: The humble man makes room for progress; the proud man believes he is already there.
quotes.author: Ed Parker

quotes.quote: Be humble, believe in yourself, and have the love of the world in your heart.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: Being humble and sweet is the hardest thing you can do.
quotes.author: Jemima Kirke

quotes.quote: The day you become humble is the day you become successful.
quotes.author: Naveen Jain

quotes.quote: Humble living does not diminish. It fills. Going back to a simpler self gives wisdom.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Humble Hearts have humble desires.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Be humble in order to attain enlightenment. Thus, after attaining it, be more humble still.
quotes.author: Samael Aun Weor

quotes.quote: A humble person never stops learning.
quotes.author: Todd Blackledge

quotes.quote: If you want to become humble, the first thing you have to admit is that you are proud.
quotes.author: Michael Catt

quotes.quote: If we become increasingly humble about how little we know, we may be more eager to search.
quotes.author: John Templeton

quotes.quote: Greatness is to stay humble when the whole world calls you great!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: If you're humble and hardworking, opportunities will arise for you.
quotes.author: RACHAEL RAY

quotes.quote: Every challenge makes us to humble our selves. We learn to know and depend on our Creator.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Learn to humble yourself, you are but earth and clay.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: Humble souls are fearful of their own strength.
quotes.author: William Gurnall

quotes.quote: There's a difference to being humble and being humbled.
quotes.author: Fraser Young

quotes.quote: We need to be humble in the face of uncertainty.
quotes.author: Paul DePodesta

quotes.quote: Being humble matters.
quotes.author: Kevin Hart

quotes.quote: Being humble doesn't mean you lose; it means you have won. Give the victory to others.
quotes.author: Tsem Tulku

quotes.quote: Stay humble, stay grounded, remember what got you to that level-and that's hard work.
quotes.author: Tim Howard

quotes.quote: If you are humble enough to admit to your flaws then you are capable of correcting them.
quotes.author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe

quotes.quote: Being humble is cooler than being famous.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Nonchalance is the ability to remain down to earth when everything else is up in the air.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: Be honest and humble enough to learn from everybody.
quotes.author: Ricardo Liborio

quotes.quote: We have to humble ourselves and the way you do that is by serving other people.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.quote: The humble are in danger when those in power disagree.
quotes.author: Phaedrus

quotes.quote: Those who are humble enough to learn anew will succeed in this new age.
quotes.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Humble people ask for help.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: A humble man will always receive the best that others have to offer; for he recognizes the truth
quotes.author: Jeremy Aldana

quotes.quote: I'm so down to earth, I'm bringing gravity back.
quotes.author: Tinie Tempah

quotes.quote: I’m very much down to earth, just not this earth.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Quiet people always know more than they seem. Although very normal, their inner world is by default fronted mysterious and therefore assumed weird. Never underestimate the social awareness and sense of reality in a quiet person; they are some of the most observant, absorbent persons of all.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: I am thankful for the fallen coins, otherwise, being down to earth is so difficult these days.
quotes.author: Shahenshah Hafeez Khan

quotes.quote: The more the tree goes up in the air, the more it goes down into the earth. Remember humility in greatness.
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: A person who keeps always his profile down-to-earth doesn't have to worry with those who surround or who to go around for he is likely to get only those who are of his ilk and the real worth on the ground.
quotes.author: Anuj

quotes.quote: It's really nice to have things to mail to people when they mail you things, or trade to people at shows. Something homemade, it feels... down to earth.
quotes.author: Brian Chippendale

quotes.quote: Faith has to be exercised in the midst of ordinary, down-to-earth living.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Elliot

quotes.quote: What I've noticed about celebrities is, if they are really successful, they're more down-to-earth.
quotes.author: Laura Bell Bundy

quotes.quote: I'm very down-to-earth. I think I'm still ‘street'
quotes.author: Gerard Butler

quotes.quote: Someone once told me that something they really liked about me was that they thought that I was really down to earth and not high-maintenance. I think that was cool. It's important to stay grounded.
quotes.author: Victoria Justice

quotes.quote: Nothing embodies the down-to-earth practicality and old-fashioned work ethic of America quite like the cowboy.
quotes.author: Gerd De Ley

quotes.quote: Insecurity prevents young artists from "flying" and older artists from being "down to earth." Young artists should work on their confidence and the older ones on their humility.
quotes.author: Igor Babailov

quotes.quote: My parents are from Brooklyn, which is the heart of the Old World. They're very stable, down-to-earth people who don't approve of divorce. Their values in life are God and carpeting.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Why, when we know that there's no such thing as perfect, do most of us spend an incredible amount of time and energy trying to be everything to everyone? Is it that we really admire perfection? No - the truth is that we are actually drawn to people who are real and down-to-earth. We love authenticity and we know that life is messy and imperfect.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Possessions, outward success, publicity, luxury — to me these have always been contemptible. I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best both for the body and the mind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: When the conduct of men is designed to be influenced, persuasion, kind unassuming persuasion, should ever be adopted. It is an old and a true maxim, that 'a drop of honey catches more flies than a gallon of gall.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: I enjoy real people, down-to-earth people who are true to themselves and honest to your face - good or bad.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.quote: To be extra ordinary, first accept that you are ordinary.
quotes.author: Kathan Mehta

quotes.quote: I once asked a bird, 'What is your philosophy of life?" The bird looked at the sky and said, "Aim to the sun, fly in the sky but always be down to Earth."
quotes.author: Subhash Ruman

quotes.quote: You wish I wasn't so down to Earth / But the truth is that I'm always getting hurt / Catch me if I fall is another phrase / That gets too much attention when they in a love phase.
quotes.author: Ian Charles; Ian Guthrie; Jacob Christian

quotes.quote: People who are "down to earth" / often come from humble birth / often come from meager mirth / often come from brutal dearth / often come from low self-worth and still rise to the top.
quotes.author: Taleshia G MCcray

quotes.quote: People who are down-to-earth never toot their own horn. They’re not worried about impressing anybody. They are true to themselves and true to the people around them.
quotes.author: Brandon Bell

quotes.quote: Genuine down-to-earth individuals love to listen, it’s something they like to do more than talking. They nod their heads when in conversations with you and they make good eye contact.
quotes.author: Brandon Bell

quotes.quote: By having a more down-to-earth view of yourself, you will be able to relate more to others. An arrogant self-centered person may see others as beneath them, not worth the time or effort. A humble person might see those same people not as those beneath them, but as those in need.
quotes.author: Jason Baluja

quotes.quote: He who prides himself upon wealth and honor hastens his own downfall.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: When your outgo exceeds your income, the upshot may be your downfall.
quotes.author: Paul Harvey

quotes.quote: Conceit may bring about one's own downfall.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: From triumph to downfall is but a step. I have seen a trifle decide the most important issues in the gravest affairs.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Power, safely defied, touches its downfall.
quotes.author: Thomas B. Macaulay

quotes.quote: Those who pray for your downfall are concentrating negative thoughts towards you, without taking cognisance of the slippery ground in which they are standing, which could lead to their downfall.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: National injustice is the surest road to national downfall.
quotes.author: William E. Gladstone

quotes.quote: Pride of opinion has been responsible for the downfall of more men on Wall Street than any other factor.
quotes.author: Charles Dow

quotes.quote: I don't spend my hours plotting for somebody else's downfall.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: It is the downfall of evil, that it never sees far enough ahead.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: Our downfall as a species is that we are arrogant enough to think that we can control Mother Nature and stupid enough to think it is our job.
quotes.author: Greg Peterson

quotes.quote: Displaying riches and titles with pride brings about one's downfall.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Complacency will be the architecture of your downfall.
quotes.author: Jeremy Gutsche

quotes.quote: We may run into many downfalls in life, but with a mighty God on our side those downfalls have already been defeated.
quotes.author: Pauline Seaport

quotes.quote: The downfall of most diets is that they restrict your intake of food.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: The downfall of every civilization comes, not from the moral corruption of the common man, but rather from the moral complacency of common men in high places.
quotes.author: E. Digby Baltzell

quotes.quote: Public downfalls are more painful and humiliating than private ones.
quotes.author: Jane Velez-Mitchell

quotes.quote: A man's pride can be his downfall, and he needs to learn when to turn to others for support and guidance.
quotes.author: Bear Grylls

quotes.quote: Our sins are our downfall. We must repent and return to the Lord. And He will receive and forgive us graciously.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The straight line leads to the downfall of humanity.
quotes.author: Friedensreich Hundertwasser

quotes.quote: The victorious Christian neither exalts nor downgrades himself. His interests have shifted from self to Christ.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: Bias has to be taught. If you hear your parents downgrading women or people of different backgrounds, why, you are going to do that.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: Don't downgrade your dream to match your reality. Upgrade your faith to match your destiny.
quotes.author: Devon Franklin

quotes.quote: A churchless community, a community where men have abandoned and scoffed at or ignored their religious needs, is a community on the rapid downgrade.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: People degrade themselves in order to make machines seem smart all the time.
quotes.author: Jaron Lanier

quotes.quote: As the rich consume more and more, they are clearly not going to want to downgrade their own status.
quotes.author: Susan George

quotes.quote: When men are full of envy they disparage everything, whether it be good or bad.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: Don't downgrade your dream just to fit your reality. Upgrade your conviction to match your destiny.
quotes.author: John Assaraf

quotes.quote: Every so often you have to increase your profile so you can let it lower again, like a balloon.
quotes.author: Robyn Hitchcock

quotes.quote: To downgrade the human mind is bad theology.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Raise your standards and you will rise along with them.
quotes.author: Mastin Kipp

quotes.quote: Resolve never to criticize or downgrade yourself, but instead rejoice that you are fearfully and wonderfully made.
quotes.author: Elizabeth George

quotes.quote: Don't lower your expectations to meet your performance. Raise your level of performance to meet your expectations. Expect the best of yourself, and then do what is necessary to make it a reality.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Don't degrade your soul to the extent of believing in curses. No man can curse you except your maker.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: The lower you fall, the higher you'll fly.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: When you denigrate people, they have two ways to fight back - with their fists and guns, or their mouths. And mouths are seemingly the easiest way to not get hit back. If people are laughing, they're not going to hit you.
quotes.author: Carl Reiner

quotes.quote: They make only progress. Instead of revenge, self progress is more safe to downgrade others including enemy.
quotes.author: M.K. Bhutta

quotes.quote: Sometimes people with low self-esteem will try to punish you for caring about them.
quotes.author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quotes.quote: Everybody needs to lower his ego.
quotes.author: Bhumibol Adulyadej

quotes.quote: I'm the dragonfly rising on the wings of unlocked dreams on the verge of magical things.
quotes.author: Aimee Stewart

quotes.quote: Magic is seeing wonder in nature's every little thing, seeing how wonderful the fireflies are and how magical are the dragonflies.
quotes.author: Ama H.Vanniarachchy

quotes.quote: Anyone can buy a car or a night on the town. Most of us shell our days like peanuts. One in a thousand can look at the world with amazement. I don’t mean gawking at the Chrysler Building. I’m talking about the wing of a dragonfly. The tale of the shoeshine. Walking through an unsullied hour with an unsullied heart.
quotes.author: Amor Towles

quotes.quote: Clouds of insects danced and buzzed in the golden autumn light, and the air was full of the piping of the song birds. Long, glinting dragonflies shot across the path, or hung tremulous with gauzy wings and gleaming bodies.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: I can still only see a dragonfly, its wings as thin and light as silk and its body the color of rainbow. But on the wings of this dragonfly I take off and fly, for my soul carries no weight. It is our bodies these borrowed vehicles of flesh and bone, that weigh us down. Our spirits are eternally free and invincible.
quotes.author: Daniela I. Norris

quotes.quote: Deep in the sun searched growths, the dragonfly hangs like a blue thread loosened from the sky.
quotes.author: Dante Gabriel Rossetti

quotes.quote: Living things tend to change unrecognizably as they grow. Who would deduce the dragonfly from the larva, the iris from the bud, the lawyer from the infant? Flora or Fauna, we are all shapeshifters and magical re-inventors. Life is really a plural noun, a caravan of selves.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.quote: Bees and butterflies, moths and dragonflies, the flowers and the brooks and the clouds.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: As kingfishers catch fire, dragonflies draw flame.
quotes.author: Gerard Manley Hopkins

quotes.quote: The beauteous dragonfly's dancing by the waves of the rivulet glancing. She dances here and she dances there, the glimmering, glittering fluttered fair. Full many a beetle with loud applause admires her dress of azure gauze, admires her body's bright splendor, and also her figure so slender.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: The sun is lowering below the lines of the mountains that encase the town and stars sparkle across the sky like dragonflies.
quotes.author: Jessica Sorensen

quotes.quote: It's very far away, it takes about a half a day to get there. If we travel by my, uh, dragonfly.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: Yesterday a child came out to wonder, caught a dragonfly inside a jar. Fearful when the sky was full of thunder and tearful at the falling of a star.
quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

quotes.quote: Dragonflies didn't imagine they could sense the future. They just flew about, enjoying the sun on their wings.
quotes.author: Kate Morton

quotes.quote: The distant mountain reflected in his eyes dragonfly.
quotes.author: Kobayashi Issa

quotes.quote: Smile, to see the lake lay the still sky and out for an easy make the dragonfly.
quotes.author: Lorine Niedecker

quotes.quote: A barge of mist floated along the water, and dragonflies, iridescent blue ones, darted back and forth like they were stitching up the air.
quotes.author: Sue Monk Kidd

quotes.quote: A dragonfly to remind me even though we are apart. Your spirit is always with me, forever in my heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: May you touch dragonflies and stars, dance with fairies and talk to the moon.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Dragonflies are reminders that we are light/and we can reflect light in powerful ways if we choose to do so.
quotes.author: Robyn Nola

quotes.quote: The dragonfly brings dream to reality and is the messenger of wisdom and enlightenment from other realms.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Time is for dragonflies and angels. The former live too little and the latter live too long.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: Dragonflies symbolize the change in perspective of yourself.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You are drained by foolish actions and others.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: When we feel too drained to move forward, God is right there with us, ready to tenderly revive and restore us.
quotes.author: Teresa Santoski

quotes.quote: You have to be careful that in giving energy, you do not allow yourself to be excessively drained or used.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: An exhausted man easily falls prey to the adversary.
quotes.author: J. Oswald Sanders

quotes.quote: When you are exhausted from trying, try just one more time.
quotes.author: Chrisse Feros

quotes.quote: I'm so exhausted and yet I feel like I'll never sleep again.
quotes.author: Maya Banks

quotes.quote: When exhausted and feeling sorry for yourself, at least change your socks.
quotes.author: Norman Maclean

quotes.quote: I know you are tired, I know you are physically and emotionally drained. But you have to keep going.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: One of the quickest ways to become exhausted is by suppressing your feelings.
quotes.author: William E. Vaughan

quotes.quote: I would be so exhausted by my determination that I had no strength left to do the actual work.
quotes.author: Etty Hillesum

quotes.quote: I am somewhat exhausted; I wonder how a battery feels when it pours electricity into a non-conductor?
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: I want to explain how exhausted I am. Even in my dreams. How I wake up tired. How I'm being drowned by some kind of black wave.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quotes.quote: I’m so tired I never want to wake up again. But I’ve figured out now that it was never them that made me feel that way. It was just me, all along.
quotes.author: Maggie Stiefvater

quotes.quote: Every morning, when I'm really, really tired... when I'm dead tired is when I feel most alive.
quotes.author: Logan Browning

quotes.quote: Of course, you get exhausted. You want to pass out. I came close a couple of times. But you're filled with something, that feedback that comes from the audience.
quotes.author: Clarence Clemons

quotes.quote: Oh, I am very weary, Though tears no longer flow; My eyes are tired of weeping, My heart is sick of woe.
quotes.author: Anne Bronte

quotes.quote: As caretakers, we feel drained when caring for another, and in order to take care of someone else, we need to take care of ourselves at the same time.
quotes.author: Jenna Morasca

quotes.quote: Now I am weary and I can no longer tell good from Evil, and I need someone to show me the way.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: am so tired and weary, So tired of endless fight, So weary of waiting the dawn And finding endless night.
quotes.author: Joseph Seamon Cotter, Jr.

quotes.quote: Rest when you're weary. Refresh and renew yourself, your body, your mind, your spirit. Then get back to work.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: When you're weary, find relief. When you're strong, find delight.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: We all get weary sometimes, and we tend to think that life is what makes us weary.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Are you weary? Catch your breath. Are you strong? Reserve passing judgment on the tired.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: It is far better to be exhausted from success than to be rested from failure.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Being exhausted is all part of the fun. I'm cool with it. I'm not going to wish that it would slow down.
quotes.author: James Bay

quotes.quote: Be exhausted for God, but remember that your supply comes from Him. 'All my fresh springs shall be in thee.'
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: Let us not become weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up.
quotes.author: Paul the Apostle

quotes.quote: When you know yourself well and do not despise yourself utterly, it is because you are too exhausted to indulge in extreme feelings.
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: If you do things when you're burned out, it'll make you bitter.
quotes.author: Juliana Hatfield

quotes.quote: I depleted myself to the point where I had nothing left.
quotes.author: Daniel Day-Lewis

quotes.quote: Too often we become so consumed with how we spend our days that we lose track of how we are spending our lives.
quotes.author: Sally Warner

quotes.quote: When one is consumed by the sorrows of life, three things give him relief: offspring, a wife, and the company of the Lord's devotees.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: Most of us are consumed with our own thoughts and desires and are not always thinking about what other people may want. This is not necessarily being egocentric; it is just being human.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: I know that I've overfed myself trying to prop myself up because I'm exhausted.
quotes.author: Geri Halliwell

quotes.quote: If I'm exhausted, physically and particularly emotionally, I can't tell what's good and I can't tell what's bad and I'm useless.
quotes.author: Guy Pearce

quotes.quote: When I'm tired, I rest. I say, 'I can't be a superwoman today.'
quotes.author: Jada Pinkett Smith

quotes.quote: We can be tired, weary and emotionally distraught, but after spending time alone with God, we find that He injects into our bodies energy, power and strength.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: To say I am not mentally tired in ways and exhausted in ways would be a lie.
quotes.author: Megan Rapinoe

quotes.quote: I am too weary to listen, too angry to hear.
quotes.author: Daniel Bell

quotes.quote: All the world's a stage and most of us are desperately unrehearsed.
quotes.author: Sean O'Casey

quotes.quote: When faced with senseless drama, spiteful criticisms and misguided opinions, walking away is the best way to stand up for yourself. To respond with anger is an endorsement of their attitude.
quotes.author: Dodinksi

quotes.quote: What is drama but life with the dull bits cut out.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Don't waste words on people who deserve your silence. Sometimes the most powerful thing you can say is nothing at all.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: The less seen, the more heard. The eye is the enemy of the ear in real drama.
quotes.author: Thornton Niven Wilder

quotes.quote: Drama is based on the Mistake. I think someone is my friend when he really is my enemy, that I am free to marry a woman when in fact she is my mother, that this person is a chambermaid when it is a young nobleman in disguise, that this well-dressed young man is rich when he is really a penniless adventurer, or that if I do this such and such a result will follow when in fact it results in something very different. All good drama has two movements, first the making of the mistake, then the discovery that it was a mistake.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: So many people prefer to live in drama because it's comfortable. It's like someone staying in a bad marriage or relationship - it's actually easier to stay because they know what to expect every day, versus leaving and not knowing what to expect.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Conflict is drama, and how people deal with conflict shows you the kind of people they are.
quotes.author: Stephen Moyer

quotes.quote: Every third person in the world is a drama queen. And crying 'victim,' especially when you're not really a victim in any real way, feels good. It feels good to cry victim if you're not one.
quotes.author: John McWhorter

quotes.quote: My life is full of drama, and I don't have time to worry about something as petty as what I look like.
quotes.author: Adele

quotes.quote: People love scandal; people love drama. They love stripping away the layers to see what's really in there, and they'll do anything - as well as make it up - to get it.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: The drama of life begins with a wail and ends with a sigh.
quotes.author: Minna Antrim

quotes.quote: Never let somebody's drama determine the outcome of your day.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: If there's not drama and negativity in my life, all my songs will be really wack and boring or something.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: Drama lives on conflict. If you're trying to deal with social issues seriously, there's no way of avoiding violence, which is so present in society.
quotes.author: Michael Haneke

quotes.quote: I need drama in my life to keep making music.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: The drama and the trauma of the relationship you have when you're 16 can mirror the one you have when you're 26. Life repeats itself.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: One of the greatest things drama can do, at it's best, is to redefine the words we use every day such as love, home, family, loyalty and envy. Tragedy need not be a downer.
quotes.author: Ben Kingsley

quotes.quote: With comedy, it's a combination of knowing the comedic beat was good - it made you laugh, it made people on the crew laugh. With drama, you do something deep and if your stuff was really effective, the ultimate result is silence. Silence is not necessarily... that would also be the result if you sucked.
quotes.author: Chris Pratt

quotes.quote: Drama's not safe and it's not pretty and it's not kind. People expect the basic template of television drama where there might be naughty villains, but everyone ends up having a nice cup of tea. You've got to do big moral choices and show the terrible things people do in terrible situations. Drama is failing if it doesn't do that.
quotes.author: Russell T Davies

quotes.quote: Basically, when I hear the words 'family drama,' I run in the opposite direction.
quotes.author: Willem Dafoe

quotes.quote: Drama is very important in life: You have to come on with a bang. You never want to go out with a whimper. Everything can have drama if it's done right. Even a pancake.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: The basis of drama is... the struggle of the hero towards a specific goal at the end of which he realises that what kept him from it was, in the lesser drama, civilisation and, in the great drama, the discovery of something that he did not set out to discover but which can be seen retrospectively as inevitable.
quotes.author: David Mamet

quotes.quote: A good drama critic is one who perceives what is happening in thetheatre of his time. A great drama critic also perceives what is not happening.
quotes.author: Kenneth Tynan

quotes.quote: Drama is hard for me. Crying is much harder for me than laughter.
quotes.author: Emma Stone

quotes.quote: I guess you can tease me about being a drama queen, because that did heighten the drama.
quotes.author: Greg Louganis

quotes.quote: Drama usually has some sort of intense conflict.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: Drama if I sing, drama if I don't sing. What do you do?
quotes.author: Montserrat Caballe

quotes.quote: We respond to a drama to that extent to which it corresponds to our dream life.
quotes.author: David Mamet

quotes.quote: The drama is complete poetry. The ode and the epic contain it only in germ; it contains both of them in a state of high development, and epitomizes both.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The real object of the drama is the exhibition of human character.
quotes.author: Delphi Complete Works of Thomas Babington Macaulay (Illustrated)

quotes.quote: The drama is the book of the people.
quotes.author: Robert Aris Willmott

quotes.quote: Drama assumes an order. If only so that it might have. By disrupting that order. A way of surprising.
quotes.author: Vaclav Havel

quotes.quote: To see your drama clearly is to be liberated from it.
quotes.author: Ken Keyes

quotes.quote: The drama may be called that part of theatrical art which lends itself most readily to intellectual discussion. What is left is theater.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: Everyone sees drama from his own perspective.
quotes.author: Jean-Marie Le Pen

quotes.quote: A mistake in drawing becomes difficult to detect when the eye is familiar with it.
quotes.author: Walter J. Phillips

quotes.quote: Real development is not leaving things behind, as on a road, but drawing life from them, as on a root.
quotes.author: Gilbert K Chesterton

quotes.quote: It is only by drawing often, drawing everything, drawing incessantly, that one fine day you discover, to your surprise, that you have rendered something in its true character.
