quotes.author: Camille Pissarro

quotes.quote: Drawing at its best is not what your eyes see but what our mind understands.
quotes.author: Millard Sheets

quotes.quote: A drawing is simply a line going for a walk.
quotes.author: Paul Klee

quotes.quote: Drawing is the discipline by which I constantly rediscover the world.
quotes.author: Frederick Franck

quotes.quote: How you draw is a reflection of how you feel about the world. You're not capturing it, you're interpreting it.
quotes.author: Juliette Aristides

quotes.quote: If drawing belongs to the world of spirit and color to that of the senses, you must draw first to cultivate the spirit.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: Drawing is a form of probing. And the first generic impulse to draw derives from the human need to search, to plot points, to place things and to place oneself.
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.quote: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: I prefer drawing to talking. Drawing is faster, and leaves less room for lies.
quotes.author: Le Corbusier

quotes.quote: As practice makes perfect, I cannot but make progress; each drawing one makes, each study one paints, is a step forward.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Above and beyond drawing my creations, I try to incorporate some kind of message. I try not to end as merely a question but try to provide a conclusion within the work.
quotes.author: Natsuki Takaya

quotes.quote: By drawing our senses of perception inward, we are able to experience the control, silence, and quietness of the mind.
quotes.author: BKS Iyengar

quotes.quote: Drawing a good picture is like telling a really good lie the key is in the incidental detail.
quotes.author: Shaun Tan

quotes.quote: For me drawing is an attempt to understand what I feel about the world I live in.
quotes.author: Brian Froud

quotes.quote: Drawing things makes them seem more real and makes me feel more alive. It also makes me pin down and remember things landscapes, season, weather, occasions, incidents, people that would otherwise have melted from my memory.
quotes.author: David Gentleman

quotes.quote: Originality depends only on the character of the drawing and the vision peculiar to each artist.
quotes.author: Georges Seurat

quotes.quote: Drawing teaches habits of close observation that will always be useful.
quotes.author: Susanna Clarke

quotes.quote:
Technique should be taught, not as an end in itself, but as something
related to individual expression, as a means toward an end. One cannot separate technique from expression. There is only expression.
quotes.author: Kimon Nicolaides

quotes.quote: Drawing is still basically the same as it has been since prehistoric times. It brings together man and the world. It lives through magic.
quotes.author: Keith Haring

quotes.quote: Drawing is like the first kiss. It carries within it the deepest emotion and the challenge of the first step. It is the first cry after birth.
quotes.author: Ala Bashir

quotes.quote: Drawing is the honesty of the art. There is no possibility of cheating. It is either good or bad.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: Art is not what you see, but what you make others see.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: Drawing is speaking to the eye; talking is painting to the ear.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Drawing is a kind of hypnotism: one looks in such a way at the model, that he comes and takes a seat on the paper.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Drawing general conclusions about your main weaknesses can provide a great stimulus to further growth.
quotes.author: Alexander Kotov

quotes.quote: Drawing is the artist's most direct and spontaneous expression. A species of writing: it reveals, better than does painting, his true personality.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: Drawing is not following a line on the model, it is drawing your sense of the thing.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: Drawing is not the same as form, it is a way of seeing form.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: Writing, like drawing is an art, and whatever conveys the meaning is justified.
quotes.author: Maxwell Perkins

quotes.quote: Drawing makes you see things clearer, and clearer and clearer still, until your eyes ache.
quotes.author: David Hockney

quotes.quote: In drawing, one must look for or suspect that there is more than is casually seen.
quotes.author: George Bridgman

quotes.quote: A drawing should have no unnecessary lines and a machine no unnecessary parts.
quotes.author: William Strunk Jr

quotes.quote: Drawing is the cornerstone of the graphic, plastic arts. Drawing is the coordination of line, tone, and color symbols into formations that express the artist's thought.
quotes.author: John French Sloan

quotes.quote: Drawing is not what one sees but what one can make others see.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: Animation is not the art of drawings that move but the art of movements that are drawn.
quotes.author: Norman McLaren

quotes.quote: Drawing is rather like playing chess: your mind races ahead of the moves that you eventually make.
quotes.author: David Hockney

quotes.quote: Realize that a drawing is not a copy. It is a construction in very different materials. A drawing is an invention.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: Drawing is giving a performance; an artist is an actor who is not limited by the body, only by his ability and, perhaps, experience.
quotes.author: Marc Davis

quotes.quote: Drawing is putting a line around an idea.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: A drawing is always dragged down to the level of its caption.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: Keep a bad drawing until by study you have found out why it is bad.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: Pure drawing is an abstraction. Drawing and colour are not distinct, everything in nature is coloured.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.quote: Drawing is like making an expressive gesture with the advantage of permanence.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: Art begins with resistance at the point where resistance is overcome. No human masterpiece has ever been created without great labor.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: The essence of drawing is the line exploring space
quotes.author: Andy Goldsworthy

quotes.quote: Do not fail, as you go on, to draw something every day, for no matter how little it is, it will be well worthwhile, and it will do you a world of good.
quotes.author: Cennino Cennini

quotes.quote: An artist cannot fail it is a success to be one.
quotes.author: Charles Horton Cooley

quotes.quote: Drawing is rather like playing chess your mind races ahead of the moves that you eventually make.
quotes.author: David Hockney

quotes.quote: The artist is nothing without the gift, but the gift is nothing without work.
quotes.author: Emile Zola

quotes.quote: Photography is an immediate reaction, drawing is a meditation.
quotes.author: Henri Cartier-Bresson

quotes.quote: This world is but a canvas to our imagination.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: You can't do sketches enough. Sketch everything and keep your curiosity fresh.
quotes.author: John Singer Sargent

quotes.quote: The important thing is to keep on drawing when you start to paint. Never graduate from drawing.
quotes.author: John Sloan

quotes.quote: The greatest value of a picture is when it forces us to notice what we never expected to see.
quotes.author: John Tukey

quotes.quote: At its essence, art is an alchemical process. Alchemy is a process of transformation.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: Learning to draw is really a matter of learning to see, to see correctly and that means a good deal more than merely looking with the eye.
quotes.author: Kimon Nicolaides

quotes.quote: Drawing is based upon perspective, which is nothing else than a thorough knowledge of the function of the eye.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Painting is poetry that is seen rather than felt, and poetry is painting that is felt rather than seen.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: The painter draws with his eyes, not with his hands.
quotes.author: Maurice Grosser

quotes.quote: Drawing used to be a civilized thing to do, like reading and writing. It was taught in elementary schools. It was democratic. It was a boon to happiness.
quotes.author: Michael Kimmelman

quotes.quote: An artist must have his measuring tools not in the hand, but in the eye.
quotes.author: Michelangelo Buonarroti

quotes.quote: In drawing, nothing is better than the first attempt.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: To know what you're going to draw, you have to begin drawing.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Drawing is feeling. Color is an act of reason.
quotes.author: Pierre Bonnard

quotes.quote: Every artist was first an amateur.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Drawing on my fine command of the English language, I said nothing.
quotes.author: Robert Benchley

quotes.quote: Realize that a drawing is not a copy. It is a construction in very different materials. A drawing is an invention.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: Life is the art of drawing sufficient conclusions from insufficient premises.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Drawing is an exercise for a restless imagination.
quotes.author: Tim Burton

quotes.quote: DreadÂ is a sympathetic antipathy and an antipathetic sympathy.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: When one has too great aÂ dreadÂ of what is impending, one feels some relief when the trouble has come.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: It is the perpetual dread of fear, the fear of fear, that shapes the face of a brave man.
quotes.author: Georges Bernanos

quotes.quote: If you areÂ dreaded by many then beware of many.
quotes.author: Decimius Magnus Ausonius

quotes.quote: And yet sometimes we become the person we most dread. Or maybe we dread most the person we know we are to become.Â
quotes.author: Reif Larsen

quotes.quote: Â The dread ofÂ lonelinessÂ is greater than the fear of bondage, so we getÂ married.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: There is nothing moreÂ dreadfulÂ than imagination without taste.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The dread of evil is a much more forcible principle of human actions than the prospect of good.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: When you dread getting up in the morning to go somewhere, you are going to the wrong place.
quotes.author: Karen Larson-Reuter

quotes.quote: There is nothing soÂ dreadfulÂ as a great victory â€” except a great defeat.
quotes.author: Duke of Wellington

quotes.quote: TheÂ dreadÂ of futility has been my life-long plague.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: WeÂ dreadÂ old age, which are not sure of being able to attain.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: TheÂ dreadÂ of criticism is the death of genius.
quotes.author: William Gilmore Simms

quotes.quote: There is nothing moreÂ dreadful than the habit of doubt.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: HowÂ dreadfulÂ it is when theÂ rightÂ judge judgesÂ wrong.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: TheÂ dreadÂ of sin can sometimes in effect drive a person into sin throughÂ dread.
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: The greater ourÂ dreadÂ of crosses, the more necessary they are for us.
quotes.author: Francois Fenelon

quotes.quote: In times ofÂ dread, artists must never choose to remain silent.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: DreadÂ of disaster makes everybody act in the very way that increases the disaster.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: He is much to beÂ dreaded who stands inÂ dreadÂ of poverty.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: He whoÂ dreads hostility too much is unfit to rule.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: It is theÂ dreadÂ of something happening, something unknown andÂ dreadful, that makes us do anything to keep the flicker of talk from dying out.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: Do that which youÂ dreadÂ and cherish those victories with pride.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: The dread of loneliness is greater than the fear of bondage, so we get married.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: When people do not dread authorities, then a greater dread descends.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The greater our dread of crosses, the more necessary they are for us.
quotes.author: Francois Fenelon

quotes.quote: A religious ought to dread more being afraid of poverty than experiencing it.
quotes.author: Ignatius of Loyola

quotes.quote: The world dread nothing so much as being convinced of their errors.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Life inspires more dread than death - it is life which is the great unknown.
quotes.author: Emile M. Cioran

quotes.quote: We dread the future only when we are not sure we can kill ourselves when we want to.
quotes.author: E.M. Cioran

quotes.quote: Dread of disaster makes everybody act in the very way that increases the disaster.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Most people dread finding out when they come to die that they have never really lived.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: He that shrinks from the grave with too great a dread, has an invisible fear behind him pushing him into it.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: The changes we dread most may contain our salvation.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: We dread life's termination as the close, not of enjoyment, but of hope.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Fortune dreads the brave, and is only terrible to the coward.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Death happens but once, yet we feel it every moment of our lives; it is worse to dread it than to suffer it.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: Dare to dream big dreams. Believe that you can do great things. Keep going until you achieve. If you can imagine it, you can feel it, if you just believe it, you can do it. Dream bigger, believe with all your heart, face your fears, achieve your dreams.
quotes.author: Aysel Gunar

quotes.quote: Life is too short to think small. Chase your dreams. Make the impossible happen.
quotes.author: Aysel Gunar

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to imagine your biggest dream becoming a reality.
quotes.author: Aysel Gunar

quotes.quote: The amount of work it takes your brain to work on chasing a small dream versus a big dream is the same. You are more likely to be inspired and motivated if the dream is larger and seemingly impossible to achieve.
quotes.author: Aysel Gunar

quotes.quote: Start with a dream. Maybe a dream that is personal and small, but worth doing. Then dream a bigger dream. Keep dreaming until your dreams seem impossible to achieve. Then you'll know you're on the right track. Then you'll know you're ready to conjure up a dream big enough to define your future and perhaps your generation's future.
quotes.author: Vance Coffman

quotes.quote: Dream big and chase your dreams—hold on to optimism—even in failure, amazing things will happen.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: You see things and you say 'Why?' But I dream things that never were; and I say 'Why not?'
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than the one with all the facts.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Far away there in the sunshine are my highest aspirations. I may not reach them, but I can look up and see their beauty, believe in them and try to follow where they lead.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Dream big. Infinity has room for the possibilities of you.
quotes.author: Anne Neil

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The American dream is about equal opportunity for everyone who works hard.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: You have to have a big vision and take very small steps to get there. You have to be humble as you execute but visionary and gigantic in terms of your aspirations.
quotes.author: Jason Calacanis

quotes.quote: A noble man compares and estimates himself by an idea which is higher than himself; and a mean man, by one lower than himself. The one produces aspiration; the other ambition, which is the way in which a vulgar man aspires.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The heart is a small thing, but desireth great matters. It is not sufficient for a kite's dinner, yet the whole world is not sufficient for it
quotes.author: Quarles

quotes.quote: There is not a heart but has its moments of longing, yearning for something better, nobler, holier than it knows now.
quotes.author: H.W. Beecher

quotes.quote: The desires and longings of man are vast as eternity, and they point him to it.
quotes.author: Tyron Edwards

quotes.quote: It is not for a man to rest in absolute contentment.—He is born to hopes and aspirations as the sparks fly upward, unless he has brutified his nature and quenched the spirit of immortality which is portion.
quotes.author: Southey

quotes.quote: This world is a dream within a dream; and as we grow older, each step is an awakening.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: In great attempts, it is glorious even to fail.
quotes.author: Longinus

quotes.quote: Aim at the sun, and you may not reach it; but your arrow will fly far higher than if aimed at an object on a level with yourself.
quotes.author: J. Hawes

quotes.quote: High aims form high characters, and great objects bring out great minds.
quotes.author: Tyron Edwards

quotes.quote: I gotta dream big cause when it happen it's gonna happen real quick (yes I feel it, I gotta) / I gotta move fast cause when it happen I can't let it move past (only get one chance).
quotes.author: Jazmine Sullivan

quotes.quote: Big dreams in a small town / Guess it's time to settle down / Don't ya like the way it sounds / You and me in a small town.
quotes.author: Dave Robbins

quotes.quote: When you got big dreams / don't listen to what nobody say / and don't let nobody turn you away / When you got big dreams / keep your eyes on the prize / don't fall to the waste side.
quotes.author: James Phillips

quotes.quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn’t do than by the ones you did. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: All big things in this world are done by people who are naïve and have an idea that is obviously impossible.
quotes.author: Frank Richards

quotes.quote: All successful people men and women are big dreamers. They imagine what their future could be, ideal in every respect, and then they work every day toward their distant vision, that goal or purpose.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: If your dream is a big dream, and if you want your life to work on the high level that you say you do, there's no way around doing the work it takes to get you there.
quotes.author: Joyce Chapman

quotes.quote: If your thoughts are as tall as the height of your ceiling, you can’t fly above your room.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The world around you may ask you to stop dreaming big, as it could create insecurity in their lives. Dream big anyway, dance to your own music and let them dance to theirs.
quotes.author: Mridula Singh

quotes.quote: I always say, 'To have a big dream requires the same effort as having a small dream. Dream big!'
quotes.author: Jorge Paulo Lemann

quotes.quote: I tell aspiring young skaters to dream big, work hard, have fun, and follow their passion. It's simple to say never give up, but learn from your mistakes to keep growing.
quotes.author: Michelle Kwan

quotes.quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The more you can dream, the more you can do.
quotes.author: Michael Korda

quotes.quote: We will only grow as big as we dream that's why we must dream big.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Williams

quotes.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.quote: Whatever you do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius and power and magic in it.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: If you have a dream, don't just sit there. Gather courage to believe that you can succeed and leave no stone unturned to make it a reality.
quotes.author: Dr Roopleen

quotes.quote: Dare to dream big. Never fear to fail. Take actions with love.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: If a little dreaming is dangerous, the cure for it is not to dream less but to dream more, to dream all the time.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Dream big dreams! Imagine that you have no limitations and then decide what's right before you decide what's possible.
quotes.author: Brian Tracey

quotes.quote: No matter how small you start, always dream and think big. If you start with small thoughts then you will stay with small thoughts.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Always dream big dreams. Big dreams attract big people.
quotes.author: Dave Liniger

quotes.quote: Dream big and your problems become small.
quotes.author: Vishen Lakhiani

quotes.quote: To dream is to have a chest filled with stars, a mind captivated by possibilities and a heart enveloped in imagination.
quotes.author: Anastasia Bolinder

quotes.quote: You can go as far as you dream, think and imagine.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: You must dream big and dream often. Take risks and see what happens.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Dream big for you can't stuff a great life into a small dream.
quotes.author: Barb Rees

quotes.quote: Reach high, for stars lie hidden in your soul. Dream deep, for every dream precedes the goal.
quotes.author: Pamela Vaull Starr

quotes.quote: Dream the impossible. See the invisible. Pursue the intangible. Achieve the incredible.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: There is no need to reach high for the stars. They are already within you just reach deep into yourself!
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Dreams come in a size too big so that we may grow into them.
quotes.author: Josie Bisse

quotes.quote: Keep your head up, because SUCCESS doesn't come from giving up. Just dream big, WORK hard, and BELIEVE that you can do anything you put your mind to.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of the space between your dreams and reality. If you can dream it, you can make it so.
quotes.author: Belva Davis

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, then you can achieve it.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Dreams do come true, if only we wish hard enough. You can have anything in life if you will sacrifice everything else for it.
quotes.author: James Matthew Barrie

quotes.quote: Now is the time for us to dream new dreams, move out into uncharted waters and stay positive
quotes.author: Jane Freeman

quotes.quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: The only place where your dream becomes impossible is in your own thinking.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: If reality can destroy dreams, then dreams can destroy reality.
quotes.author: Conway Stone

quotes.quote: No matter what we do in our life, to be a success we need to be consistent and determined towards our dream.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Don't let go of your dreams. If you have determination and belief in your dreams, you will succeed in spite of your desire to let go
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The bigger the dream, the better the story.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Dream big dreams! Only big dreams have the power to move your mind and spirit.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Every great dream begins with a perspective; change the world with the power and strength within you
quotes.author: Kamal Khanzada

quotes.quote: Dream big, talk big, and turn your faith loose!
quotes.author: Kenneth Copeland

quotes.quote: All men who have achieved great things have been dreamers.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: The important thing is to dare to dream big, then take action to make it come true.
quotes.author: Joe Girard

quotes.quote: In our dreams lies our unfinished work for the world.
quotes.author: Joan Chittister

quotes.quote: Whatever you can do or dream you can, begin it. Begin it now.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Fly without wings; dream with open eyes.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: When the actions becomes frequent than the words, success becomes heavier than the dreams. Do more, say less.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: If you want to reach the highest peak of your dream, think big. You should always remember that there is nothing wrong if you set higher goals, aims or standards in life most especially if you know that you can do it.
quotes.author: Kellie Sullivan

quotes.quote: If you can imagine it, You can achieve it. If you can dream it, you can become it.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: It is their exoticism as material reminders of 'the other' that renders dream catchers desirable as gifts and collectibles. It also appears that they may serve to signift and project--at least to the non-Native audience--the collector's empathy and presumed understanding of Native culture.
quotes.author: Cath Oberholtzer

quotes.quote: The dream catcher reminds us how important the dream world has been to people throughout time. Dreams have provided medicine men, shamans, and prophets a portal to another realm. Even though today most of us tend to focus on the physiology of the dream state, we can still appreciate the power of our nightly visits to that other world.
quotes.author: John Cline

quotes.quote: Dreamcatcher, save me from the darkness in my soul. Dreamcatcher, let me see the future I don't know. Help me hold on tight and don't let go
quotes.author: Caeland Garner

quotes.quote: I am your dreamcatcher, Your shelter in the night. I am your dreamcatcher, protector from the fright. I am your dreamcatcher, as if our minds would be entwined, I catch yours and you catch mine.
quotes.author: Christopher Weule

quotes.quote: Dreamcatcher, I can see you waving in the night alone. Slow winter, and I feel I might get left out in the cold.
quotes.author: Laura Pergolizzi

quotes.quote: I was asleep in a hammock, I was dreaming that I was a web, I was a dream-catcher hanging in the window of a minivan parked along the water's edge.
quotes.author: Arlen Thompson

quotes.quote: Dreamcatcher in the rearview mirror hasn't caught a thing yet. Twenty dollars in souvenirs. Anything's worth trying to stay out of your nightmares.
quotes.author: Julien Rose Baker

quotes.quote: Don't let someone else catch your dreams. You be the dream catcher.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: This net has a wooden frame bearing many feathers and a hole at it's very heart — it was the sacred dreamcatcher.
quotes.author: Philip Nicklin

quotes.quote: In times when the dreamcatcher was full, Running Wolf would come in the deep of night, but in his spiritual form, and replenish its strength by removing those bad dreams trapped inside the web.
quotes.author: Philip Nicklin

quotes.quote: The dream catcher legend is full of rich symbolism. Native Americans believe that the night air is filled with dreams, both good and bad.
quotes.author: Dale Kiser

quotes.quote: The traditional dream catcher was intended to protect the sleeping individual from negative dream, while letting positive dreams come through.
quotes.author: Dale Kiser

quotes.quote: The positive dreams slip through the hole in the center of the dram catcher and glide down the feathers to the sleeping person below. The negative dreams would be caught up in the web and expires when first rays of sunlight hit them.
quotes.author: Dale Kiser

quotes.quote: When hung over or near a bed, swinging freely in the air, it catches the dreams as they flow by.
quotes.author: Dale Kiser

quotes.quote: I have concluded that dreams and emotions are equally dangerous. Both have the capability of causing great agony to a person. They are also the purest way of communication. The catch, however...interpretation.
quotes.author: Kylie R. Trask

quotes.quote: Composed primarily of circular hoops with weblike netting and often decorated with beads and feathers, dreamcatchers are recognized by Natives and non-Natives as a symbol of First Nations and Native American identity and spirituality.
quotes.author: Cath Oberholtzer

quotes.quote: Whatever the size or form of the dream catcher, bad dreams are intended to be caught in the net, while good dreams slip through the dreamer.
quotes.author: Cath Oberholtzer

quotes.quote: Sleep, baby sleep, whispers spirit of the woods as big sister weaves a dream net on a little willow hoop. A dream net for baby like a small spider web, spun of nettle-stalk twine, stained dark red with the bark of wild plum.
quotes.author: Audrey Osofsky

quotes.quote: Dreamcatchers meet all the requirements of the perfect souvenir purchase: they are small, portable, nonperishable, handcrafted, and affordable.
quotes.author: Cath Oberholtzer

quotes.quote: Dreamcatchers cross cultural boundaries and serve to communicate a shared consciousness that unites persons with different backgrounds.
quotes.author: Cath Oberholtzer

quotes.quote: Feathers meant to assist the flight of good dreams are clearly labeled as those of chicken, turkey, pheasant, or other non-endangered birds are dyed and attached to the dream catchers.
quotes.author: Cath Oberholtzer

quotes.quote: A dreamcatcher works, if your dream is to be gay.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: Dreams are necessary. Like the air, without realizing it, I, you, and we all need dreams. The dreams that guide us on what we do today because today is the answer to our dreams the other day.
quotes.author: Alanda Kariza

quotes.quote: Dreaming permits each and everyone of us to be quietly and safely insane every night of our lives.
quotes.author: William Dement

quotes.quote: You're never given a dream without also being given the power to make it true.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: All human beings are dream beings. Dreaming ties all mankind together.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.quote: All men dream, but not equally. Those who dream by night in the dusty recesses of their minds, wake in the day to find that it was vanity: but the dreamers of the day are dangerous men, for they may act on their dreams with open eyes, to make them possible.
quotes.author: T.E. Lawrence

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: When you have a dream that you can't let go of, trust your instincts and pursue it. But remember: Real dreams take work, They take patience, and sometimes they require you to dig down very deep. Be sure you're willing to do that.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: Yes: I am a dreamer. For a dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Dreaming is an act of pure imagination, attesting in all men a creative power, which if it were available in waking, would make every man a Dante or Shakespeare.
quotes.author: H.F. Hedge

quotes.quote: Dreams are illustrations... from the book your soul is writing about you.
quotes.author: Marsha Norman

quotes.quote: Dreams are excursions into the limbo of things, a semi-deliverance from the human prison.
quotes.author: Henri Amiel

quotes.quote: Keep your heart open to dreams. For as long as there's a dream, there is hope, and as long as there is hope, there is joy in living.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: That which the dream shows is the shadow of such wisdom as exists in man, even if during his waking state he may know nothing about it.... We do not know it because we are fooling away our time with outward and perishing things, and are asleep in regard to that which is real within ourself.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: Man, alone, has the power to transform his thoughts into physical reality; man, alone, can dream and make his dreams come true.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: When you stop having dreams and ideals -- well, you might as well stop altogether.
quotes.author: Marian Anderson

quotes.quote: Dreams are renewable. No matter what our age or condition, there are still untapped possibilities within us and new beauty waiting to be born.
quotes.author: Dale Turner

quotes.quote: Be careful what you water your dreams with. Water them with worry and fear and you will produce weeds that choke the life from your dream. Water them with optimism and solutions and you will cultivate success. Always be on the lookout for ways to turn a problem into an opportunity for success. Always be on the lookout for ways to nurture your dream.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: You’ve got to follow your passion. You’ve got to figure out what it is you love, who you really are. And have the courage to do that. I believe that the only courage anybody ever needs is the courage to follow your own dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Often we don’t even realize who we’re meant to be because we’re so busy trying to live out someone else's ideas. But other people and their opinions hold no power in defining our destiny.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Dream lofty dreams, and as you dream, so you shall become. Your vision is the promise of what you shall one day be; your ideal is the prophecy of what you shall at last unveil.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Dreams are today's answers to tomorrow's questions.
quotes.author: Edgar Cayce

quotes.quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Dreaming permits each and every one of us to be quietly and safely insane every night of our lives.
quotes.author: William Dement

quotes.quote: Dreams say what they mean, but they don't say it in daytime language.
quotes.author: Gail Godwin

quotes.quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: It may be that those who do most, dream most.
quotes.author: Stephen Butler Leacock

quotes.quote: Follow your dreams, they know the way.
quotes.author: Kobe Yamada

quotes.quote: Without dreams, there can be no courage. And without courage, there can be no action.
quotes.author: Wim Wenders

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Our dreams may be totally different and yet, we are alike in that no matter what we have achieved, we still have dreams that have eluded us.
quotes.author: Steven Scott

quotes.quote: You can begin to have dreams grander than you have ever had, and see many of them come true. All you have to do is learn and use the same skills that are used by those who do achieve their dreams.
quotes.author: Steven Scott

quotes.quote: Dreams to survive. Dreams make a wish come true, ooh. Keep your dreams alive. Dream, dream on. Your dream will come alive.
quotes.author: 2 Brothers on the 4th Floor

quotes.quote: Great dreams of great dreamers are always transcended.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Young dreams !—old dreams of young days— Shall the new dream vex us as they did ? Or as things worth censure or praise ? Real toil is ours, real trouble, Dim dreams of pleasure and pride ; Let the dreams disperse like a bubble, So the toil like a dream subside.
quotes.author: Adam Lindsay Gordon

quotes.quote: What is a dream ? That transient power that cometh near the midnight hour. To carry me to pastures new and bid my anxious fears adieu.
quotes.author: Alan Parry-Booth

quotes.quote: Dream in a pragmatic way.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Dreams are the most curious asides and soliloquies of the soul. When a man recollects his dream, it is like meeting the ghost of himself. Dreams often surprise us into the strangest self-knowledge. Dreaming is the truest confessional, and often the sharpest penance.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: Dreams are true while they last, and do we not live in dreams?
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Our dreams drench us in sense, and sense steeps us again in dreams.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: Dreams are necessary to life.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Dreams pass into the reality of action. From the actions stems the dream again; and this interdependence produces the highest form of living.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: As long as you pray and believe in your dreams, anything is possible.
quotes.author: Andy Ruiz, Jr.

quotes.quote: Dreams are dreams and reality is reality. We have to make the dreams happen.
quotes.author: Andy Ruiz, Jr.

quotes.quote: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams.
quotes.author: Ben Carson

quotes.quote: Dreams are the guiding words of the soul. Why should I henceforth not love my dreams and not make their riddling images into objects of my daily consideration?
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Dreams in the dusk, only dreams closing the day and with the day’s close going back to the gray things, the dark things, the far, deep things of dreamland.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: AS when from dreams awaking the dim forms float away whose visioned smiles were making our darkness bright as day.
quotes.author: Caroline Elizabeth Sarah Norton

quotes.quote: Dreams of joy return with night, and dwell upon the past- and every grief that clouds our light. Reminds us of the last!
quotes.author: Caroline Elizabeth Sarah Norton

quotes.quote: Living in dreams of yesterday, we find ourselves still dreaming of impossible future conquests.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.quote: So many of our dreams at first seem impossible, then they seem improbable, and then, when we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: Take what you can from your dreams, make them as real as anything.
quotes.author: Dave Matthews

quotes.quote: All people dream, but not equally. Those who dream by night in the dusty recesses of their mind, wake in the morning to find that it was vanity. But the dreamers of the day are dangerous people, For they dream their dreams with open eyes, and make them come true.
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.quote: They who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Dream manfully and nobly, and thy dreams shall be prophets.
quotes.author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: All the things one has forgotten scream for help in dreams.
quotes.author: Elias Canetti

quotes.quote: When we can't dream any longer we die.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: We all dream; we do not understand our dreams, yet we act as if nothing strange goes on in our sleep minds, strange at least by comparison with the logical, purposeful doings of our minds when we are awake.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Dreams have only one owner at a time. That's why dreamers are lonely.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Two dreams came down to earth one night. From the realm of mist and dew; one was a dream of the old, old days, and one was a dream of the new.
quotes.author: Eugene Field

quotes.quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than the one with all the facts.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Dreaming is an act of pure imagination, attesting in all mean a creative power, which if it were available in waking, would make every man a Dante or Shakespeare.
quotes.author: H.F Hedge

quotes.quote: Dreams are the touchstones of our character.
quotes.author: Henry /David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The greatest achievement was at first and for a time a dream. The oak sleeps in the acorn, the bird waits in the egg, and in the highest vision of the soul a waking angel stirs. Dreams are the seedlings of realities.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: Dreams can become a reality when we possess a vision that is characterized by the willingness to work hard, a desire for excellence, and a belief in our right and our responsiblity to be equal members of society.
quotes.author: Janet Jackson

quotes.quote: No one should negotiate their dreams. Dreams must be free to fly high. No government, no legislature, has a right to limit your dreams. You should never agree to surrender your dreams.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: Our dreams must be stronger than our memories. We must be pulled by our dreams, rater than pushed by our memories.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self-discipline, and effort.
quotes.author: Jesse Owens

quotes.quote: Do all you can to make your dreams come true.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Dreams are but interludes which fancy makes.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Where all is but dream, reasoning and arguments are of no use, truth and knowledge nothing.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: Myths are public dreams, dreams are private myths.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Perhaps life is just that... a dream and a fear.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Dream and give yourself permission to envision a you that you choose to be.
quotes.author: Joy Page

quotes.quote: We all keep dreaming, and luckily, dreams come true.
quotes.author: Katie Holmes

quotes.quote: Believe in your dreams. They were given to you for a reason.
quotes.author: Katrina Mayer

quotes.quote: The most pitiful among men is he who turns his dreams into silver and gold.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: In dreams the truth is learned that all good works are done in the absence of a caress.
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: Why does the eye see a thing more clearly in dreams than the imagination when awake?
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Dreaming is a part of life. Everyone dreams, but does it actually happen? Most dreams just fade away and don't come back to mind until you have one foot in the grave or feel some type of remorse for your future.
quotes.author: Lonii

quotes.quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: Chasing dreams a sense following, realizing making dreams of tomorrow today's memories.
quotes.author: Mary Steffen

quotes.quote: You can't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.quote: If our dreams are sincere desires to achieve, not mere pipe-dreams, there is something deep within ourselves which comes out to meet them and helps to make them realities.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Dreams must be heeded and accepted. For a great many of them come true.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: The interpretation of dreams is a great art.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: What dreams we have and how they fly. Like rosy clouds across the sky; Of wealth, of fame, of sure success, Of love that comes to cheer and bless; And how they wither, how they fade, The waning wealth, the jilting jade -The fame that for a moment gleams,Then flies forever, -dreams, ah -dreams!
quotes.author: Paul Laurence Dunbar

quotes.quote: Dreams become reality when we put our minds to it.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.quote: The more closely you get in touch with your dreams, the more able you are to make them real. The more vividly you consider how you want your world to be, the more real and effective tools you will have for making it so.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Dreams are a scientific fact.
quotes.author: Robyn Hitchcock

quotes.quote: The interpretation of dreams is the royal road to a knowledge of the unconscious activities of the mind.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Dreams can still come true; you need a great deal of energy and determination, and a little bit of luck.
quotes.author: Stefano Gabbana

quotes.quote: A heart without dreams is like a bird without feathers.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: A dream which is not interpreted is like a letter which is not read.
quotes.author: Talmud

quotes.quote: Only in our dreams are we free. The rest of the time we need wages.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: If you dream, then you can do anything. If you dream, you're halfway to destiny. If you dream, dream the impossible. If you dream, cause a dream's unstoppable.
quotes.author: Toni Braxton

quotes.quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: It is in our idleness, in our dreams, that the submerged truth sometimes comes to the top.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: In dreams begins responsibility.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Blithe dreams arise to greet us, and life feels clean and new, for the old love comes to meet us in the dawning and the dew.
quotes.author: William Ernest Henley

quotes.quote: We are all of us dreamers of dreams, on visions our childhood is fed.
quotes.author: William Herbert Carruth

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of dreams and the influence of the human spirit. We are all the same in this notion: The potential for greatness lives within each of us.
quotes.author: Wilma Rudolf

quotes.quote: Even the loveliest dream bears like a blemish its difference from reality, the awareness that what it grants is mere illusion.
quotes.author: Theodor W. Adorno

quotes.quote: We are not only less reasonable and less decent in our dreams... we are also more inteligent, wiser and capable of better judgment when we are asleep than when we are awake.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Everything that's lovely is But a brief, dreamy kind of delight.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: The best thing about dreams is that fleeting moment, when you are between asleep and awake, when you don't know the difference between reality and fantasy, when for just that one moment you feel with your entire soul that the dream is reality, and it really happened.
quotes.author: James Arthur Baldwin

quotes.quote: Cherish your visions and you dreams, as they are the children of your soul; the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: When you cease to dream, you cease to live.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: The sailor does not control the sea, nor does the lucid dreamer control the dream. Like a sailor, lucid dreamers manipulate orÂ directÂ themselves in the larger expanse of dreaming; however, they do not control it. Lucid dreaming appears to be a co-created experience.
quotes.author: Robert Waggoner

quotes.quote: No spring nor summer beauty hath such grace as I have seen in one autumnal face.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: For often, when one is asleep, there is something in consciousness which declares that what then presents itself is but a dream.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: Dare to dream! If you did not have the capability to make your wildest wishes come true, your mind would not have the capacity to conjure such ideas in the first place. There is no limitation on what you can potentially achieve, except for the limitation you choose to impose on your own imagination. What you believe to be possible will always come to pass â€“ to the extent that you deem it possible. It really is as simple as that.
quotes.author: Anthon St. Maarten

quotes.quote: Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.quote: Each man should frame life so that at some future hour fact and his dreaming meet.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: All men whilst they are awake are in one common world: but each of them, when he is asleep, is in a world of his own.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: The best reason for having dreams is that in dreams no reasons are necessary.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The Future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of the space between your dreams and reality. If you can dream it, you can make it so.
quotes.author: Belva Davis

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it. Your limits are all within yourself.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Never let your memories be greater than your dreams.
quotes.author: Douglas Ivester

quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Whatever we plant in our subconscious mind and nourish with repetition and emotion will one day become a reality.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.
quotes.author: Gail Devers

quotes.quote: Without leaps of imagination or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities. Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than one with all the facts.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: When we are dreaming alone it is only a dream. When we are dreaming with others, it is the beginning of reality.
quotes.author: Hélder Câmara

quotes.quote: A single dream is more powerful than a thousand realities.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: The greatest achievement was at first and for a time a dream. The oak sleeps in the acorn, the bird waits in the egg, and in the highest vision of the soul a waking angel stirs. Dreams are the seedlings of realities.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self-discipline, and effort.
quotes.author: Jesse Owens

quotes.quote: If you really want to do something, you'll find a way. If you don't, you'll find an excuse.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Dreams require down payments. Dreams are free, but the journey isn't. There is a price to pay. When you find your why you'll find your way. When you develop your will you will embark on your way. Many people start; few people finish. Many people have a dream; few people achieve their dreams.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.quote: Dream and give yourself permission to envision the You that you choose to be.
quotes.author: Joy Page

quotes.quote: Somewhere over the rainbow, skies are blue, and the dreams that you dare to dream really do come true.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: To understand the heart and mind of a person, look not at what he has already achieved, but at what he aspires to.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Always be on the lookout for ways to turn a problem into an opportunity for success. Always be on the lookout for ways to nurture your dream.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Be careful what you water your dreams with. Water them with worry and fear and you will produce weeds that choke the life from your dream. Water them with optimism and solutions and you will cultivate success. Always be on the lookout for ways to turn a problem into an opportunity for success. Always be on the lookout for ways to nurture your dream.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Dreams feel real while we're in them. It's only when we wake up that we realize something was actually strange.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Champions are made from something they have deep inside of them a desire, a dream, a vision.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: If a little dreaming is dangerous, the cure for it is not to dream less but to dream more, to dream all the time.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Focus more on your desire than on your doubt, and the dream will take care of itself.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Dreams are illustrations from the book your soul is writing about you.
quotes.author: Marsha Norman

quotes.quote: Keep some room in your heart for the unimaginable.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: Your life is the manifestation of your dream; it is an art. You can change your life anytime if you aren't enjoying the dream.
quotes.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.quote: The supreme object of life is to live. Few people live. It is true life only to realize one's own perfection, to make one's every dream a reality.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Reach high, for stars lie hidden in you. Dream deep, for every dream precedes the goal.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Don't be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire; the size of your dream; and how you handle disappointment along the way.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Nature, like a kind and smiling mother, lends herself to our dreams and cherishes our fancies.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Laughter is timeless. Imagination has no age. And dreams are forever.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: No matter how your heart is grieving, if you keep on believing, the dreams that you wish will come true.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: The end of wisdom is to dream high enough to lose the dream in the seeking of it.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Put even the plainest woman into a beautiful dress and unconsciously she will try to live up to it.
quotes.author: Lady Duff-Gordon

quotes.quote: Dress shabbily and they remember the dress; dress impeccably and they remember the woman.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: The finest clothing made is a person's skin, but, of course, society demands something more than this..
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: We are all made up of the same skin and bones. What separates us is what we dress over it.
quotes.author: Stefania Yarhi

quotes.quote: When you don't dress like everybody else, you don't have to think like everybody else.
quotes.author: Iris Apfel

quotes.quote: One is never over-dressed or underdressed with a little black dress.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: In a machine age, dressmaking is one of the last refuges of the human, the personal, the inimitable.
quotes.author: Christian Dior

quotes.quote: Don't dress to kill, dress to survive.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Take care of your costume and your confidence will take care of itself.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Fashion is what you're offered four times a year by designers. And style is what you choose.
quotes.author: Lauren Hutton

quotes.quote: Your dresses should be tight enough to show you're a woman and loose enough to show you're a lady.
quotes.author: Edith Head

quotes.quote: The dress must follow the body of a woman, not the body following the shape of the dress.
quotes.author: Hubert de Givenchy

quotes.quote: Dress like you're embracing life, not hiding from it
quotes.author: Peter Morrissey

quotes.quote: Style is a way to say who you are without having to speak.
quotes.author: Rachel Zoe

quotes.quote: Dress changes the manners.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Those who make their dress a principal part of themselves will, in general, become of no more value than their dress.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: No matter how you feel, get up, dress up and show up!
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.quote: Good clothes open all doors.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: A great dress can make you remember what is beautiful about life.
quotes.author: Rachel Roy

quotes.quote: Dress is at all times a frivolous distinction, and excessive solicitude about it often destroys its own aim.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: There is much to support the view that it is clothes that wear us, and not we, them; we may make them take the mould of arm or breast, but they mould our hearts, our brains, our tongues to their liking.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: A woman's dress should be like a barbed-wire fence: serving its purpose without obstructing the view.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: You can have anything you want in life if you dress for it.
quotes.author: Edith Head

quotes.quote: You can never be overdressed or overeducated.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A modest woman, dressed out in all her finery, is the most tremendous object of the whole creation.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Clothes are like a good meal, a good movie, great pieces of music.
quotes.author: Michael Kors

quotes.quote: Clothes mean nothing until someone lives in them.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: What is important in a dress is the woman who is wearing it.
quotes.author: Yves Saint Laurent

quotes.quote: Don't be into trends. Don't make fashion own you, but you decide what you are, what you want to express by the way you dress and the way you live.
quotes.author: Gianni Versace

quotes.quote: A dress is a piece of ephemeral architecture, designed to enhance the proportions of the female body.
quotes.author: Christian Dior

quotes.quote: We act the way we dress. Neglected and untidy clothes reflect a neglected and untidy mind.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The only rule is don't be boring and dress cute wherever you go. Life is too short to blend in.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.quote: It's not about the dress you wear, but it's about the life you lead in the dress.
quotes.author: Diana Vreeland

quotes.quote: Always dress like you are going to see your worst enemy.
quotes.author: Kimora Lee Simmons

quotes.quote: Wearing the correct dress for any occasion is a matter of good manners.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.quote: Dress for success. Image is very important. People judge you by the way you look on the outside.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: It is an interesting question how far men would retain their relative rank if they were divested of their clothes.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Clothing through its meaning that we substantiate our sense of self and our place in society.
quotes.author: Bowling Green State University Popular Press

quotes.quote: Clothing becomes, then, an indicator of our personal worth, values and beliefs as well as those of the culture in which we live.
quotes.author: Bowling Green State University Popular Press

quotes.quote: The associations that we have with dress have the potential to reveal the connections which we make with our culture in a very intimate way.
quotes.author: Bowling Green State University Popular Press

quotes.quote: Dress, in the context of popular culture, includes clothing worn in everyday life by ordinary people, as they go about the daily activities of their lives and carry on the traditions that bring meaning to them.
quotes.author: Bowling Green State University Popular Press

quotes.quote: Dress can reveal how we spend our working hours and leisure time.
quotes.author: Bowling Green State University Popular Press

quotes.quote: The terms 'dress' and - even more so - 'fashion' have many different meanings.
quotes.author: Amy De La Haye

quotes.quote: Dress performs a wide variety of important social functions.
quotes.author: Amy De La Haye

quotes.quote: Dress carries moral and political meanings.
quotes.author: Amy De La Haye

quotes.quote: In the late twentieth century, there are certain Islamic groups who advocate, or require women to wear forms of dress that hide their bodies, in order not to distract men.
quotes.author: Amy De La Haye

quotes.quote: Dress and other kinds of body adornment make the human body culturally visible.
quotes.author: Amy De La Haye

quotes.quote: People wore clothes long ago. They used animal skins too make the first clothes.
quotes.author: Vickey Herold

quotes.quote: Many people used leather to make clothes. Leather is animal skin without the fur. People learned how to make the skins soft.
quotes.author: Vickey Herold

quotes.quote: People in Egypt before used plants to make linen.
quotes.author: Vickey Herold

quotes.quote: Many clothes were not comfortable long ago. Women wore dresses that were long and heavy. Man also wore clothes that were not comfortable.
quotes.author: Vickey Herold

quotes.quote: Clothes for children were different long ago, too. Both young girls and young boys wore dresses.
quotes.author: Vickey Herold

quotes.quote: Dress can be the ultimate signifier of a person's gender, age, class, employment, and religion down to more subtle indications such as aesthetic predilection, political standpoint, and marital status.
quotes.author: Lydia Edwards

quotes.quote: Dress can hold the power to alter perceptions and opinions, to disguise and reinterpret, to heighten or lessen the wearer's very sense of themselves for better or for worse.
quotes.author: Lydia Edwards

quotes.quote: The study of dress is an invaluable methodology when attempting to understand and deconstruct the past.
quotes.author: Lydia Edwards

quotes.quote: With clothing for so long deemed a woman's main interest and occupation.
quotes.author: Lydia Edwards

quotes.quote: Dresses! We love them, we hate them, we gawk at them, we long for them, we disdain them and we buy them. If dresses could talk, what stories might they tell?
quotes.author: Peter Lang

quotes.quote: Ask women to talk or write about dresses, and without much prompting, they will regale you with detailed snippets from their lives, anecdotes that start out ostensibly about clothes, but end up being about so much more.
quotes.author: Peter Lang

quotes.quote: Dress stories reveal so much more than we may realize about who and how we are in the world and what sort of culture we are living in.
quotes.author: Peter Lang

quotes.quote: A male in a dress is likely to prove such an event.
quotes.author: Gregory G. Bolich

quotes.quote: Dress has become almost invincible in the formal discussion of cross dressing even though it is the obvious spark to our attention.
quotes.author: Gregory G. Bolich

quotes.quote: The significance, or meaning, of dress is a proper entry point into the world of crossdressing.
quotes.author: Gregory G. Bolich

quotes.quote: Dress also provides a way to convey ideas about how different genders should act and be perceived.
quotes.author: Gregory G. Bolich

quotes.quote: Dress thus both sets and reinforces cultural ideals.
quotes.author: Gregory G. Bolich

quotes.quote: Beauty in dress can only be achieved by applying the principles of art to clothing.
quotes.author: Linda Przybyszewski

quotes.quote: Knowledge, not money, is the key to beauty in dress.
quotes.author: Linda Przybyszewski

quotes.quote: The most pathetic, as it is the most common, result of vanity is more to be witnessed amongst women than amongst men. It is pitiful to think that many are vain of their dress.
quotes.author: W. Robertson Nicoll

quotes.quote: A woman who dresses well according to her means only does her duty, but beauty when unadorned is adorned the most.
quotes.author: W. Robertson Nicoll

quotes.quote: It has always been my ambition to design clothes that are related to life and related to the body. I have never tried to make a woman look like anything but a woman.
quotes.author: Mainbocher

quotes.quote: Even the simplest dress must not look timid. It should have and give that quite assurance which is just as compelling in fashion as it is in human beings.
quotes.author: Ibid

quotes.quote: Smart women are wary of uncertain fashions which are not sure what they are about, just as they avoid over-aggressive fashions and people. Both are bores.
quotes.author: Ibid

quotes.quote: A woman can be dressed in fashion without necessarily being dressed in taste.
quotes.author: Bettina Ballard

quotes.quote: Best dressed for what, under what circumstances, on what occasions? If you must have a best dressed list, let it be for women who work, who are constantly in view and who do not have unlimited budgets.
quotes.author: Prudence Glynn

quotes.quote: Women's fashions reflect social attitudes, shorter skirts and loose-fitting outlines tend to go with periods when women and society in general see themselves as emancipated, free and prosperous.
quotes.author: Margaret Allen

quotes.quote: The minis have revealed that there are far more pretty legs around than pretty faces, and therefore the short skirt will never be far away in future fashion.
quotes.author: John Carr Doughty

quotes.quote: A woman no longer has to dress to be attractive to a man; she has to be attractive to herself; she has to feel right, And whether or not a man is going to dig the way she looks is entirely up to him; it's not up to her.
quotes.author: Norman Parkinson

quotes.quote: Artistic dress communicates your unique expertise and profession.
quotes.author: Jamie Yasko-Mangum

quotes.quote: Uniform attire has been around as long as classic professional dress. You may not need to concentrate on what to wear, but your attention should be directed to the details of your uniform.
quotes.author: Jamie Yasko-Mangum

quotes.quote: The way I dress needs to communicate my expertise, my knowledge of the audience, and the message I want to communicate.
quotes.author: Jamie Yasko-Mangum

quotes.quote: Understanding and applying calendar dress to your professional life is essential for your professional success.
quotes.author: Jamie Yasko-Mangum

quotes.quote: How you feel and how comfortable you are in the clothes you wear comes from your self-image.
quotes.author: Tracy McWilliams

quotes.quote: Claim your confidence and be lifted up, explores the importance of confidence to expressing your inner beauty through the way you dress.
quotes.author: Tracy McWilliams

quotes.quote: Dressing to let your inner-self shine forth is what makes you dynamic and beautiful as a woman.
quotes.author: Tracy McWilliams

quotes.quote: If you can dress to express your own personal image, your self confidence will shine through.
quotes.author: Tracy McWilliams

quotes.quote: Cloth is a social tissue. By means of its convenient sheathing we move among one another freely, smoothly, and in peace, when without it such association would be impossible.
quotes.author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman

quotes.quote: Our clothing is as literally evolved to meet our needs as the scales of a fish or the feathers of a bird. It grows on us, socially, as theirs grow on them individually.
quotes.author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman

quotes.quote: The next great governing influence in dress is symbolism. We do not commonly realize how strong is this influence in modifying our attire.
quotes.author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman

quotes.quote: Every age has its storytelling form, and video gaming is a huge part of our culture. You can ignore or embrace video games and imbue them with the best artistic quality. People are enthralled with video games in the same way as other people love the cinema or theater.
quotes.author: Andy Serkis

quotes.quote: There are no makers of peace because the making of peace is at least as costly as the making of war at least as exigent.
quotes.author: Daniel Berrigan

quotes.quote: When they're talking about me they're letting someone else rest.
quotes.author: Debra Webb

quotes.quote: Goodness is about character, integrity, honesty, kindness, generosity, moral courage, and the like. More than anything else, it is about how we treat other people.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.quote: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: To reach a port, we must sail, sail, not tie at anchor, sail, not drift.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: But sorrow is unreliable in that way. When people don't share it there’s a good chance that it will drive them apart instead.
quotes.author: Fredrik Backman

quotes.quote: One does not establish a dictatorship in order to safeguard a revolution, one makes the revolution in order to establish the dictatorship.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Great companies that build an enduring brand have an emotional relationship with customers that has no barrier. And that emotional relationship is on the most important characteristic, which is trust.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: Continents drift, and so do hearts.
quotes.author: John Mark Green

quotes.quote: This bed yawns beneath the weight of our absent selves.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: To reach the port of heaven, we must sail sometimes with the wind, and sometimes against it. But we must not drift nor lie at anchor.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Opportunity is a parade. Even as one chance passes, the next is a fife and drum echoing in the distance.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: I close my eyes, then I drift away, into the magic night I softly say. A silent prayer, like dreamers do, then I fall asleep to dream my dreams of you.
quotes.author: Roy Orbison

quotes.quote: A week goes by and I don’t call Lucy or Dylan. I want to drift away from them more than anything, I want to drift away. I sometimes imagine myself totally alone and I enjoy the feeling.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It’s better to hang out with people better than you. Pick out associates whose behavior is better than yours and you'll drift in that direction.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: All loose things seem to drift down to the sea, and so did I.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Once the intimacy has gone, however well you may get on, however friendly you may become, it is hard to believe it was ever there.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: She rattled around that huge house, growing more and more used to being on her own, resenting his presence more and more when he was back for the weekends, feeling like he was invading her space.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We've got this gift of love, but love is like a precious plant. You can't just accept it and leave it in the cupboard or just think it’s going to get on by itself. You've got to keep watering it. You've got to really look after it and nurture it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Every day you spend drifting away from your goals is a waste not only of that day, but also of the additional day it takes to regain lost ground.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Once more unto the breach, dear friends, once more; Or close the wall up with our English dead! In peace there's nothing so becomes a man As modest stillness and humility: But when the blast of war blows in our ears, then imitate the action of the tiger.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Cooking is like painting or writing a song. Just as there are only so many notes or colors, there are only so many flavors it’s how you combine them that sets you apart.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Puck

quotes.quote: A small world where people know each other, and still so deep, able to get lost.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Though we drifted apart in distance I still think of you as being right here. And although we have many new friends, it is our friendship that means the most to me.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If one day you realize that we're drifting apart, it's because you've pushed me away.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Drifting apart from someone you never used to go a day without speaking to.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sometimes its about starting over and creating something better. Sometimes growing up means growing apart.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Drinking makes uninteresting people matter less and late at night, matter not at all.
quotes.author: Lillian Hellman

quotes.quote: If drinking is interfering with your work, you're probably a heavy drinker. If work is interfering with your drinking, you're probably an alcoholic.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: What's drinking? A mere pause from thinking!
quotes.author: George Gordon

quotes.quote: Drinking makes such fools of people, and people are such fools to begin with, that it's compounding a felony.
quotes.author: Robert Benchley

quotes.quote: I feel bad for people who don't drink. When they wake up in the morning, that's as good as they're going to feel all day.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: When you stop drinking, you have to deal with this marvelous personality that started you drinking in the first place.
quotes.author: Jimmy Breslin

quotes.quote: Drinking makes the mind go sober.
quotes.author: Heruba

quotes.quote: It's like gambling somehow. You go out for a night of drinking and you don't know where you're going to end up the next day. It could work out good or it could be disastrous. It's like the throw of the dice.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: I drink to make other people interesting.
quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

quotes.quote: Drinking is a way of ending the day.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: It's solitary drinking that makes drunkards.
