quotes.author: Nathanael West

quotes.quote: I've never understood people who just go out for one drink. Once I have one drink, I want all the drinks.
quotes.author: Vicki Lesage

quotes.quote: Drinking coffee is like drinking an inverse yawn. I prefer mine with two spoonfuls of ?I?m listening.?
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Drinking intensifies all your pressures and your needs.
quotes.author: Desi Arnaz

quotes.quote: You can't drink all day if you don't start in the morning.
quotes.author: Celia Rivenbark

quotes.quote: There cannot be good living where there is no good drinking.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The water was not fit to drink. To make it palatable, we had to add whisky. By diligent effort, I learned to like it.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The point of drinking in moderation is that sometimes you don't drink in moderation.
quotes.author: Artie Lange

quotes.quote: It's not the drinking to be blamed, but the excess.
quotes.author: John Selden

quotes.quote: Drinking habits were very prevalent among men, and were not in any way disgraceful, unless excessive.
quotes.author: Catherine Helen Spence

quotes.quote: I envy people who drink. At least they have something to blame everything on.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: Drinking is an emotional thing. It joggles you out of the standardism of everyday life, out of everything being the same. It yanks you out of your body and your mind and throws you against the wall. I have the feeling that drinking is a form of suicide where you're allowed to return to life and begin all over the next day.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: In wine there is wisdom, in beer there is freedom, in water there is bacteria.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: After the first glass, you see things as you wish they were. After the second, you see things as they are not. Finally, you see things as they really are, and that is the most horrible thing in the world.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: For art to exist, for any sort of aesthetic activity or perception to exist, a certain physiological precondition is indispensable: intoxication.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Responsible Drinking? Now that's an Oxymoron.
quotes.author: Aaron Howard

quotes.quote: Drink moderately, for drunkenness neither keeps a secret, nor observes a promise.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra

quotes.quote: I must entreat you to be scrupulous in the use of strong liquors. One night's drunkenness may defeat the labours of forty days well employed.
quotes.author: Johnson

quotes.quote: One of the disadvantages of wine is that it makes a man mistake words for thoughts.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: A drunk man's words are a sober man's thoughts.
quotes.author: Steve Fergosi

quotes.quote: First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: What's drinking? A mere pause from thinking!
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: A bottle of wine contains more philosophy than all the books in the world.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.quote: The problem with some people is that when they aren't drunk, they're sober.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Is the glass half full or half empty? It depends on whether you're pouring or drinking.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: They speak of my drinking, but never think of my thirst.
quotes.author: Scottish Proverb

quotes.quote: The chief reason for drinking is the desire to behave in a certain way, and to be able to blame it on alcohol.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: I drink to make other people more interesting.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: It is well to remember that there are five reasons for drinking: the arrival of a friend, one's present or future thirst, the excellence of the wine, or any other reason.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: Drink the first. Sip the second slowly. Skip the third.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.quote: Drink today, and drown all sorrow; You shall perhaps not do it tomorrow; Best, while you have it, use your breath; There is no drinking after death.
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: The hard part about being a bartender is figuring out who is drunk and who is just stupid.
quotes.author: Richard Braunstein

quotes.quote: I know I should give up drinking; but I am not a quitter.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Drunkenness is nothing but voluntary madness.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Drink washes off the daub and discovers the man.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Pouring out liquor is like burning books.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: I distrust camels, and anyone else who can go a week without a drink.
quotes.author: Joe E Ellis

quotes.quote: An intelligent man is sometimes forced to be drunk to spend time with his fools.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: People who drink to drown their sorrow should be told that sorrow knows how to swim.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: A man's true character comes out when he's drunk.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: Show me how you drink and I will tell you who you are.
quotes.author: Emile Peynaud

quotes.quote: It's just that I'd rather die of drink than of thirst.
quotes.author: Ian Fleming

quotes.quote: Drinking makes such fools of people, and people are such fools to begin with that it's compounding a felony.
quotes.author: Robert Benchley

quotes.quote: Beer, if drank with moderation, softens the temper, cheers the spirit, and promotes health.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: That is the remarkable thing about drinking: it brings people together so quickly, but between night and morning it sets an interval again of years.
quotes.author: Erich Maria Remarque

quotes.quote: He that drinks fast, pays slow.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If something bad happens you drink in an attempt to forget; if something good happens you drink in order to celebrate; and if nothing happens you drink to make something happen.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: When the wine is in, the wit is out.
quotes.author: Thomas Becon

quotes.quote: I don't drink anymore, on the other hand I don't drink any less either.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: When I drink, I think; and when I think, I drink.
quotes.author: Frantois Rabelais

quotes.quote: You cant buy HAPPINESS, but you can buy BEER. And that's pretty much the same thing!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: BEER doesn't make you fat, It makes you leanâ€¦ against bars, tables, chairs, wallsâ€¦
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Drink because you are happy, but never because you are miserable.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The worse you are at thinking, the better you are at drinking.
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: When I read about the evils of drinking, I gave up reading.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: Good people drink good beer.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: There comes a time in every woman's life when the only thing that helps is a glass of champagne.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: My doctor told me to watch my drinking. Now I drink in front of a mirror.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: To good eating belongs good drinking.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Water is the only drink for a wise man.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I would not put a thief in my mouth to steal my brains.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Don't drink to get drunk. Drink to enjoy life.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Sometimes too much to drink is barely enough.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A lady came up to me one day and said â€˜Sir! You are drunk', to which I replied â€˜I am drunk today madam, and tomorrow I shall be sober but you will still be ugly.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: Reality is an illusion that occurs due to the lack of alcohol.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Beer is proof that God loves us and wants us to be happy.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: When we drink we get drunk. When we get drunk we fall asleep. When we fall asleep we commit no sin. When we commit no sin we go to heaven. So, let's all get drunk and go to heaven!
quotes.author: Brian O'Rourke

quotes.quote: When you quit drinking, you stop waiting.
quotes.author: Caroline Knapp

quotes.quote: Time is never wasted when you’re wasted all the time.
quotes.author: Catherine Zandonella

quotes.quote: Love makes the world go round? Not at all. Whiskey makes it go round twice as fast.
quotes.author: Compton Mackenzie

quotes.quote: Not all chemicals are bad. Without chemicals such as hydrogen and oxygen, for example, there would be no way to make water, a vital ingredient in beer.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: If God had intended us to drink beer, he would have given us stomachs.
quotes.author: David Daye

quotes.quote: You're not drunk if you can lie on the floor without holding on.
quotes.author: Dean Martin

quotes.quote: If you drink, don’t drive. Don’t even putt.
quotes.author: Dean Martin

quotes.quote: Alcohol removes inhibitions, like that scared little mouse who got drunk and shook his whiskers and shouted. Now bring on that damn cat!
quotes.author: Eleanor Early

quotes.quote: Alcohol is necessary for a man so that he can have a good opinion of himself, undisturbed be the facts.
quotes.author: Finley Peter Dunne

quotes.quote: Alcohol may be man’s worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Wine is sunlight, held together by water.
quotes.author: Galilei Galileo

quotes.quote: Alcohol is the anaesthesia by which we endure the operation of life.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Whisky is liquid sunshine.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: It takes only one drink to get me drunk the trouble is, I can't remember if it's the thirteenth or the fourteenth.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: One tequila, two tequila, three tequila, floor.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: 24 hours in a day. 24 beers in a case. Coincidence? I think not.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: The problem with the world is that everyone is a few drinks behind.
quotes.author: Humphrey Bogart

quotes.quote: Reality is an illusion that occurs due to the lack of alcohol.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Beer is proof that God loves us and wants us to be happy.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: When we drink we get drunk. When we get drunk we fall asleep. When we fall asleep we commit no sin. When we commit no sin we go to heaven. Sooooo, let's all get drunk and go to heaven!
quotes.author: Brian O'Rourke

quotes.quote: When you quit drinking, you stop waiting.
quotes.author: Caroline Knapp

quotes.quote: Time is never wasted when you’re wasted all the time.
quotes.author: Catherine Zandonella

quotes.quote: Love makes the world go round? Not at all. Whiskey makes it go round twice as fast.
quotes.author: Compton Mackenzie

quotes.quote: Not all chemicals are bad. Without chemicals such as hydrogen and oxygen, for example, there would be no way to make water, a vital ingredient in beer.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: If God had intended us to drink beer, he would have given us stomachs.
quotes.author: David Daye

quotes.quote: You're not drunk if you can lie on the floor without holding on.
quotes.author: Dean Martin

quotes.quote: If you drink, don’t drive. Don’t even putt.
quotes.author: Dean Martin

quotes.quote: Alcohol removes inhibitions, like that scared little mouse who got drunk and shook his whiskers and shouted. "Now bring on that damn cat!"
quotes.author: Eleanor Early

quotes.quote: Alcohol is necessary for a man so that he can have a good opinion of himself, undisturbed be the facts.
quotes.author: Finley Peter Dunne

quotes.quote: Alcohol may be man’s worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Wine is sunlight, held together by water.
quotes.author: Galilei Galileo

quotes.quote: Alcohol is the anesthesia by which we endure the operation of life.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Whisky is liquid sunshine.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: It takes only one drink to get me drunk the trouble is, I can't remember if it's the thirteenth or the fourteenth.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: One tequila, two tequila, three tequila, floor.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: 24 hours in a day. 24 beers in a case. Coincidence? I think not.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: The problem with the world is that everyone is a few drinks behind.
quotes.author: Humphrey Bogart

quotes.quote: I'm very serious about no alcohol, no drugs. Life is too beautiful.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: The day I became free of alcohol was the day that I fully understood and embraced the truth that I would not be giving anything up by not drinking.
quotes.author: Liz Hemingway

quotes.quote: Wine is the most healthful and most hygienic of beverages.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.quote: Too much of anything is bad, but too much good whiskey is barely enough.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I drink too much. The last time I gave a urine sample it had an olive in it.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: Writer’s block is a fancy term made up by whiners so they can have an excuse to drink alcohol.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: In a study, scientists report that drinking beer can be good for the liver. I’m sorry, did I say ‘scientists’? I meant Irish people.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: I don't have a drinking problem, except when I can't get a drink.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.quote: I’m on a whisky diet. I’ve lost three days already.
quotes.author: Tommy Cooper

quotes.quote: What contemptible scoundrel has stolen the cork to my lunch?
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: I never drink water because of the disgusting things that fish do in it.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: A woman drove me to drink and I didn't even have the decency to thank her.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: Drinking is fun! It makes me feel horrible and sexy!
quotes.author: Warren Ellis

quotes.quote: Always remember that I have taken more out of alcohol than alcohol has taken out of me.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I pray you, do not fall in love with me, for I am falser than vows made in wine.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: It is far better to put away fear than to be driven by it.
quotes.author: Alison Croggon

quotes.quote: Be driven, be focused, but enjoy every moment, because it only happens once.
quotes.author: Alicia Keys

quotes.quote: You have to be driven. You have to be focused. You have to be aware.
quotes.author: Thomas Keller

quotes.quote: Conceit is vanity driven from all other shifts, and forced to appeal to itself for admiration.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Every driven person comes from a mountain of pain they wish to keep hidden.
quotes.author: Chris Colfer

quotes.quote: Be a leader who is driven by purpose but not by position or power.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Remembrance is the only paradise out of which we cannot be driven away.
quotes.author: Charles Francis Richter

quotes.quote: Status-driven, conspicuous consumption thrives from the language of novelty.
quotes.author: Tim Jackson

quotes.quote: Either we are running â€˜from' what we fear, or running â€˜to' what we fear. The former is a choice driven by fear, the latter is an action inspired by it.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Productivity is driven at the enterprise level. Better wages, better performing workplaces, are driven at the workplace level.
quotes.author: Bill Shorten

quotes.quote: Men are driven by two principal impulses, either by love or by fear.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: We were driven off like rats in five minutes.
quotes.author: Roger Sherman

quotes.quote: Through a policy driven approach we have wage a war against poverty and we are confident we will win this war.
quotes.author: Narendra Modi

quotes.quote: To be honest, once you've driven around for about five, 10 laps, you don't notice a difference.
quotes.author: Danica Patrick

quotes.quote: If you're really driven and you want something deep, hard enough in life, you're going to get it.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: Man has been driven out of the paradise in which he could trust his instincts.
quotes.author: Konrad Lorenz

quotes.quote: Better to be driven out from among men than to be disliked of children.
quotes.author: Richard Henry Dana, Sr.

quotes.quote: Be driven with purpose. Be relentless in your alignment with excellence. Pay no mind to the disimpassioned impotent haters.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: We try to be driven by what's a good story, what's truthful, and the drama of what happens next.
quotes.author: Laura Innes

quotes.quote: Humans are driven by a perpetual and restless desire of power.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: One thought driven home is better than three left on base.
quotes.author: James Liter

quotes.quote: We will not be driven by fear into an age of unreason.
quotes.author: Edward R. Murrow

quotes.quote: Human progress has always been driven by a sense of adventure and unconventional thinking.
quotes.author: Andre Geim

quotes.quote: We are driven by the usual insatiable curiosity of the scientist, and our work is a delightful game.
quotes.author: Murray Gell-Mann

quotes.quote: If someone tells you it can't be done. Smile and humbly agree. Then go back and work so hard that you can prove them wrong equally as fast.
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: The virtuous man is driven by responsibility, the non-virtuous man is driven by profit.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: If you don't drive your business, you will be driven out of business.
quotes.author: B C Forbes

quotes.quote: The stuff that works best is driven by passion rather than dollars.
quotes.author: Craig Newmark

quotes.quote: Nobody is driven by abstractions like 'seeking truth.
quotes.author: ichael Crichton

quotes.quote: We are finally driven to monogamy not by morality but by exhaustion.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: We are driven by five genetic needs: survival, love and belonging, power, freedom, and fun.
quotes.author: William Glasser

quotes.quote: Driven by the forces of love, the fragments of the world seek each other so that the world may come to being.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.quote: Imagination is what has driven human progress since very early times.
quotes.author: Barbara Hambly

quotes.quote: Human life is driven forward by its dim apprehension of notions too general for its existing language.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: A business like an automobile, has to be driven, in order to get results.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.quote: We sail within a vast sphere, ever drifting in uncertainty, driven from end to end.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Because of impatience we were driven out [of Paradise]; because of impatience we cannot return.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: Good ideas are not adopted automatically. They must be driven into practice with courageous impatience.
quotes.author: Hyman Rickover

quotes.quote: As memory may be a paradise from which we cannot be driven, it may also be a hell from which we cannot escape.
quotes.author: John Lancaster Spalding

quotes.quote: And yet is not mankind itself, pushing on its blind way, driven by a dream of its greatness and its power upon the dark paths of excessive cruelty and of excessive devotion. And what is the pursuit of truth, after all?
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Great champions have an enormous sense of pride. The people who excel are those who are driven to show the world and prove to themselves just how good they are.
quotes.author: Nancy Lopez

quotes.quote: Procrastination can be driven from your personality through the simple technique of constantly commanding yourself to get into action and then obeying that command immediately.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Don't be confused that my interest in religion, faith, and spirituality is driven by any sense of faith or spirituality of my own.
quotes.author: Peter Jennings

quotes.quote: I have always been driven to buck the system, to innovate, to take things beyond where they've been.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.quote: Freedom of thought and the right of private judgment, in matters of conscience, driven from every other corner of the earth, direct their course to this happy country as their last asylum.
quotes.author: Samuel Adams

quotes.quote: Devils can be driven out of the heart by the touch of a hand on a hand, or a mouth on a mouth.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Clouds on clouds, in volumes driven, Curtain round the vault of heaven.
quotes.author: Thomas Love Peacock

quotes.quote: This wretched brain gave way, and I became a wreck at random driven, without one glimpse of reason or heaven.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: A man must drive his energy, not be driven by it.
quotes.author: William Frederick Book

quotes.quote: Driving with a blood alcohol level of 0.08 and above is illegal in every state.
quotes.author: Chuck Taylor

quotes.quote: Driving a race car is like dancing with a chain saw.
quotes.author: Cale Yarborough

quotes.quote: It's meant driving fewer miles, staying closer to home and spending more time at the campground.
quotes.author: Ken Sommer

quotes.quote: He was driving at a safe speed for the conditions, doing approximately 10 mph below the posted speed limit. He wasn't under the influence or anything like that. It appears that the driver didn't do anything wrong.
quotes.author: Larry Starkey

quotes.quote: I used to think that driving, sleepless, ambitious labor was what you needed to succeed.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: Everything you need to get that relaxed driving that brings consistency only comes with practice.
quotes.author: John Surtees

quotes.quote: You just have to keep driving down the road. It's going to bend and curve and you'll speed up and slow down, but the road keeps going.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Love may be the best driving wheel, but anger is a pretty good second.
quotes.author: Steven Tyler

quotes.quote: I'm the one that's been driving this thing, man.
quotes.author: John Conyers

quotes.quote: When I'm driving the highway by myself is when I write best.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: The feeling of freedom, driving into scenery as green and lush as a postcard of Ireland was close to bliss.
quotes.author: Diane Meier

quotes.quote: Driving your car through deep pools of flood water is a great way of making your car unreliable. Smart people turn around and avoid it.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Driving is a spectacular form of amnesia. Everything is to be discovered, everything to be obliterated.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: Reckless driving is operating a vehicle in a speed or manner likely to endanger other drivers.
quotes.author: Dave Jones

quotes.quote: Driving at the speed limit--hideous thought.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: We will be driving three meters forward on the surface of Mars and leaving our lander for good.
quotes.author: Kevin Burke

quotes.quote: When we were driving, a semi was honking its horn at us.
quotes.author: Dalton Sumner

quotes.quote: I especially love driving down a hill directly at a tree and swerving to one side at the last moment. That's my way to relax.
quotes.author: Boris Yeltsin

quotes.quote: Driving in your world seems a bit dangerous.
quotes.author: Missy Lyons

quotes.quote: Driving race cars was an avenue for me to learn how to build my own car, and that was my ambition all along.
quotes.author: Carroll Shelby

quotes.quote: It's like driving a car at night. You never see further than your headlights, but you can make the whole trip that way.
quotes.author: E. L. Doctorow

quotes.quote: A driver reaches a destination by driving on that road, not by laying back to enjoy the view.
quotes.author: Nabil N. Jamal

quotes.quote: Don't feel guilty about driving somewhere nice to run. If people can drive to a park to eat hot dogs, you can drive there to run.
quotes.author: Bill Rodgers

quotes.quote: Driving home, I'll be thinking about them.
quotes.author: Juwan Howard

quotes.quote: To the everyday driver, we'd like to say that, anytime you're engaging in something else while driving, that really does increase your crash risk by two to three times.
quotes.author: Charlie Klauer

quotes.quote: They're getting people with high speed coming up from behind. They're also seeing lane change violations. Aggressive driving in general, in terms of cutting people off, flashing their lights and things of that nature.
quotes.author: John Burke

quotes.quote: The road makes a noise all its own. It's a single note that stretches in all directions, low and nearly inaudible, only I could hear it loud and persistent.
quotes.author: Gregory Galloway

quotes.quote: Your purpose when driving is not to arrive at your destination safely or quickly. Your purpose when driving is...to impress your personality on the road.
quotes.author: Martin Amis

quotes.quote: The driver that you have to sell on safety shouldn't be driving.
quotes.author: Kyle Petty

quotes.quote: I was lonely driving here tonight so I hugged the road.
quotes.author: Jay London

quotes.quote: Driving with one foot on the accelerator and the other on the brake is likely to get you nowhere, but certainly will burn out vital parts of your car. Similarly, cutting taxes on the middle class, but increasing them on the 'rich' is likely to result in an economic burnout.
quotes.author: Terry Savage

quotes.quote: Driving a brand new car feels like riding around in an open billfold with the dollars flapping by your ears as they fly out the window.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: In driving, one assumes the danger of destroying life, beginning with one's own.
quotes.author: Richard T. Kelly

quotes.quote: Patience is something you admire in the driver behind you and scorn in the one ahead.
quotes.author: Mac McCleary

quotes.quote: Everything in life is somewhere else, and you get there in a car.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: If you don’t know where you are going, any road will get you there.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: Adventure is worthwhile in itself.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: People don’t take trips, trips take people.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: The one thing that unites all human beings, regardless of age, gender, religion, economic status, or ethnic background, is that, deep down inside, we all believe that we are above-average drivers.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Some beautiful paths can't be discovered without getting lost.
quotes.author: Erol Ozan

quotes.quote: I think a lot of psychopaths are just geniuses who drove so fast that they lost control.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Always focus on the front windshield and not the review mirror.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Americans will put up with anything provided it doesn't block traffic.
quotes.author: Dan Rather

quotes.quote: You know, somebody actually complimented me on my driving today. They left a little note on the windscreen, it said 'Parking Fine.
quotes.author: Tommy Cooper

quotes.quote: No one you have been and no place you have gone ever leaves you. The new parts of you simply jump in the car and go along for the rest of the ride. The success of your journey and your destination all depend on who's driving.
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: Driving is boring," Rabbit pontificates, "but it's what we do. Most of American life is driving somewhere and then driving back wondering why the hell you went.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Natives who beat drums to drive off evil spirits are objects of scorn to smart Americans who blow horns to break up traffic jams.
quotes.author: Mary Ellen Kelly

quotes.quote: The longest journey begins with a single step, not with a turn of the ignition key.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Restore human legs as a means of travel. Pedestrians rely on food for fuel and need no special parking facilities.
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.quote: A business like an automobile, has to be driven, in order to get results.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.quote: My driving abilities from Mexico have helped me get through Hollywood.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.quote: Here's the thing, you just have to drive a lot faster, and if you don't get there, we're both fired.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: No matter what you do, do it to your utmost. I always attribute my success to always requiring myself to do my level best, if only in driving a tack in straight.
quotes.author: Russell H. Conwell

quotes.quote: The way I drive, the way I handle a car, is an expression of my inner feelings.
quotes.author: Lewis Hamilton

quotes.quote: Never lend your car to anyone to whom you have given birth.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: The man who can drive himself further once the effort gets painful is the man who will win.
quotes.author: Roger Bannister

quotes.quote: The road to success is not easy to navigate, but with hard work, drive and passion, it's possible to achieve the American dream.
quotes.author: Tommy Hilfiger

quotes.quote: Have you ever noticed that anybody driving slower than you is an idiot, and anyone going faster than you is a maniac?
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Until you’ve learned to drive, you’ve never really learned how to swear.
quotes.author: Robert Paul

quotes.quote: Take it easy driving, the life you save may be mine.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: Straight roads are for fast cars, turns are for fast drivers.
quotes.author: Colin Mcrae

quotes.quote: The best car safety device is a rear-view mirror with a cop in it.
quotes.author: Dudley Moore

quotes.quote: A city that outdistances man’s walking powers is a trap for man.
quotes.author: Arnold Toynbee

quotes.quote: Any man who can drive safely while kissing a pretty girl is simply not giving the kiss the attention it deserves.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Driving fast on the track does not scare me. What scares me is when I drive on the highway I get passed by some idiot who thinks he is Fangio.
quotes.author: Juan Manuel Fangio

quotes.quote: Drugs and alcohol are the cruel engine of many an artists' creativity.
quotes.author: Nathan Hartzenberg

quotes.quote: I love drugs, but I hate hangovers, and the hatred of the hangover wins by a landslide every time.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: The drug culture has shaped at least one major change since the Sixties; It became the basis for overloading our prisons.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: I never took hallucinogenic drugs because I never wanted my consciousness expanded one unnecessary iota.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Everything is a drug. Family, art, causes, new shoes... We're all just tweaking our chem to avoid the void.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: Drugs are a waste of time. They destroy your memory and your self-respect and everything that goes along with your self esteem.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: I don't do drugs. I am drugs.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: Don't waste good drugs on killing yourself. Share them with friends and have a party. Or send them to me.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Drugs are not always necessary. Belief in recovery always is.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: I was more addicted to self destruction then to the drugs themselves ... something very romantic about it
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: Drug misuse is not a disease, it is a decision, like the decision to step out in front of a moving car. You would call that not a disease but an error of judgment.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: Reality is a crutch for people who can't cope with drugs.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: I hate to advocate drugs, alcohol, violence or insanity to anyone, but they've always worked for me.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: I learned why they're called wonder drugs -- you wonder what they'll do to you.
quotes.author: Harlan Miller

quotes.quote: You can turn back on a person, but you can never turn your back on a drug, especially when it's waving a razor sharp hunting knife in your eye.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: It's not a war on drugs, it's a war on personal freedom.
quotes.author: Bill Hicks

quotes.quote: There is only one reason why men become addicted to drugs—they are weak men. Only strong men are cured, and they cure themselves.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: The person who takes medicine must recover twice, once from the disease and once from the medicine.
quotes.author: William Osler, M.D.

quotes.quote: Drugs are a bet with the mind.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: Drugs are reality's legal loopholes.
quotes.author: Jeremy P. Johnson

quotes.quote: Marijuana is self-punishing. It makes you acutely sensitive, and in this world, what worse punishment could there be?
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Addiction begins with the hope that something 'out there' can instantly fill up the emptiness inside.
quotes.author: Jean Kilbourne

quotes.quote: I don't need drugs to make my life tragic.
quotes.author: Eddie Vedder

quotes.quote: The experiences which drugs induce are as far removed from Reality as is a mirage, from water. No matter how much you pursue the mirage, you will never quench your thirst, and the search for Truth through drugs must end in disillusionment.
quotes.author: Meher Baba

quotes.quote: Experimenting with drugs is like target practice where your head is the bull.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: You should just say no to drugs. That will drive the prices down.
quotes.author: Geechy Guy

quotes.quote: Don't do drugs because if you do drugs you'll go to prison, and drugs are really expensive in prison.
quotes.author: John Hardwick

quotes.quote: Drugs have taught an entire generation of American kids the metric system.
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: I don't use drugs, my dreams are frightening enough.
quotes.author: M C Escher

quotes.quote: If every drug in the world were abolished a physician would still be a useful member of society.
quotes.author: Sir William Withey Gull

quotes.quote: But I will say that the drugs are much more ferocious then they used to be. There are people wrecking their lives with addiction, which seems much more severe.
quotes.author: Armistead Maupin

quotes.quote: A miracle drug is any drug that will do what the label says it will do.
quotes.author: Eric Hodgins

quotes.quote: We broke up mostly because we didn't have a manager and everyone was on different drugs. I don't take them so it was a bit weird for me.
quotes.author: Ian Brown

quotes.quote: All drugs of any interest to any moderately intelligent person in America are now illegal.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.quote: Penalties against possession of a drug should not be more damaging to an individual than the use of the drug itself; and where they are, they should be changed.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: Drugs are merely the most obvious form of addiction in our society. Drug addiction is one of the things that undermines traditional values.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.quote: A drug is a substance which, if injected into a rabbit, produces a paper.
quotes.author: Otto Loewi

quotes.quote: I'm not an addictive personality, I just like getting high, that's all.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: I used to have a drug problem, now I make enough money.
quotes.author: David Lee Roth

quotes.quote: I've never had a problem with drugs. I've had problems with the police.
quotes.author: Keith Richards

quotes.quote: I don't like people who take drugs... customs men for example.
quotes.author: Mick Miller

quotes.quote: This whole drug thing: It's not a black thing. It's not a white thing. It's a death thing.
quotes.author: Judd Nelson ( New Jack City)

quotes.quote: In a world like this one, people are going to naturally want to get high.
quotes.author: Nick Nolte (Who'll Stop the Rain)

quotes.quote: Most people don't know how they're going to feel from one minute to the next. But a dope friend has a pretty good idea. All you gotta do is look at the labels on the little bottles.
quotes.author: Matt Dillon (Drugstore Cowboy)

quotes.quote: Finally, heroin seems to have become a loser drug, with its attractiveness fading for young people.
quotes.author: Carlos Nordt

quotes.quote: If even a small fraction of the money we now spend on trying to enforce drug prohibition were devoted to treatment and drug rehabilitation, in an atmosphere of compassion, not punishment, the reduction in drug usage and in the harm done to users could be dramatic.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: The drug is really quite a remarkably safe one for humans, although it is really quite a dangerous one for mice and they should not use it.
quotes.author: J.W.D. Henderson

quotes.quote: Every form of addiction is bad, no matter whether the narcotic be alcohol or morphine or idealism.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Don't do drugs because if you do drugs, you'll go to prison, and drugs are really expensive in prison.
quotes.author: John Hardwick

quotes.quote: I don't use drugs; my dreams are frightening enough.
quotes.author: M.C. Escher

quotes.quote: If we can get them to understand that saying no to drugs is rebelling against their parents and the generations of the past, we'd make it an enormous success.
quotes.author: John Van De Kamp

quotes.quote: Volumes could be written on the problem of drug addiction. Millions of barbiturates are swallowed every night to help the nation sleep. Millions of tranquilizers keep us calm during the day. Millions of pep pills wake us up every morning. The Bible warns that these flights from reality bring no lasting satisfaction.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: A drug is neither moral or immoral—it's a chemical compound. The compound itself is not a menace to society until a human being treats it as if consumption bestowed a temporary license to act like an a**hole.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: One of the characteristics of some drugs is that they make a person feel strong and alert—when in fact the opposite is the case. Don't allow yourself to be deceived.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Many people are trying to steady themselves by taking tranquilizers. Jesus is the greatest tranquilizer of all. He can straighten out your life and put you back on center.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Some young people are taking pills called 'heaven or hell' drugs, because you're liable to experience either one.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Cocaine habit-forming? Of course not. I ought to know. I've been using it for years.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.quote: You find out so many interesting things when you're not on drugs.
quotes.author: Boy George

quotes.quote: Drugs don't cause today's alarming crime rates, but drug prohibition does.
quotes.author: Judge James C. Pain

quotes.quote: There is no life in doing drugs; I learned the reason that day / When they took my home, took my kids, took my freedom away / Prison has helped change my life to get my head on straight / I still have an outlook on life when I thought it was too late.
quotes.author: Sheila King

quotes.quote: It's only in drugs or death we'll see anything new, and death is just too controlling.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: There’s not a drug on Earth that can make life meaningful.
quotes.author: Sarah Kane

quotes.quote: Drugs take you to hell, disguised as heaven.
quotes.author: Donald Lyn Frost

quotes.quote: Drugs are the enemies of ambition and hope, and when we fight against drugs we are fighting for the future.
quotes.author: Bob Riley

quotes.quote: Sometimes becoming drug-free has less to do with addiction and more to do with sanity.
quotes.author: Shane Koyczan

quotes.quote: I'm very serious about no alcohol, no drugs. Life is too beautiful.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: People try drugs out of curiosity, to have a good time, to improve athletic performance, or to escape from stress, anxiety, or depression, but all drug addicts are willful victims themselves.
quotes.author: Dr. T.P. Chia

quotes.quote: The drug-induced paradise of ecstasy and hallucination has enslaved the humankind since time immemorial, and more and more people are falling victim to the psychedelic pills.
quotes.author: Dr. T.P. Chia

quotes.quote: Drugs suck more than anything else I have ever liked so much.
quotes.author: Ashley Lorenzana

quotes.quote: Here is the solution to the American drug problem suggested a couple years back by the wife of our President: 'Just say no.'
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: One of ecstasy's main ingredients is finding happiness in the tedious.
quotes.author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quotes.quote: You should just say no to drugs. That will drive the prices down.
quotes.author: Geechy Guy

quotes.quote: Alcoholism and drug addiction are killer of mental and physical health. Alcoholic and drug addicts are killing themselves slowly.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Psychedelic drugs are the false friend of the human mind, and a hidden killer of the drug addicts.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Drug addiction reduces a man to a mindless and ridiculous thing, and creates social parasites and criminals.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: The drug addict loses the sense of dignity, responsibility, self- esteem and self- respect, and he forgets how to live like a human being.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Reality is just a crutch for people who can't handle drugs.
quotes.author: Robin McLaurin Williams

quotes.quote: I was, I am and I always will be a drug addict. A person who gets involved in drugs has to fight it everyday.
quotes.author: Diego Maradona

quotes.quote: The greatest mistake in life is to get addicted to drugs becoming a prisoner of ecstasy and hallucination, and less of a man.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Drugs are a waste of time. They destroy your memory and your self-respect and everything that goes along with with your self esteem.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: Drug addiction is a self- punishing disease that ruins mental, psychological and physical health.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Drugs have taught an entire generation of American kids the metric system.
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: The drug addict does not care about what is important or worthwhile in life, such as family, career, finance, and social relationship.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: People try drugs out of curiosity, to have a good time, to improve athletic performance, or to escape from stress, anxiety or depression, but all drug addicts are willful victims themselves.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Sometimes becoming drug free has less to do with addiction and more to do with sanity.
quotes.author: Shane Koyczan

quotes.quote: But I will say that the drugs are much more ferocious then they used to be. There are people wrecking their lives with addiction, which seems much more severe.
quotes.author: Armistead Maupin

quotes.quote: Human beings would be better and more respectable if drug addicts had not been born.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: I much prefer to be high on life than in it.
quotes.author: Joshua Michael Levinson

quotes.quote: The drug addict is his own enemy slowly killing himself using drugs as a weapon.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Drugs are merely the most obvious form of addiction in our society. Drug addiction is one of the things that undermines traditional values.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.quote: Don't do drugs because if you do drugs you'll go to prison, and drugs are really expensive in prison.
quotes.author: John Hardwick

quotes.quote: With horns and a full rhythm section, the drums always looked like the best seat in the house.
quotes.author: Levon Helm

quotes.quote: He is as melancholy as an unbraced drum.
quotes.author: Susannah Centlivre

quotes.quote: Don't quit. Never give up trying to build the world you can see, even if others can't see it. Listen to your drum and your drum only. It's the one that makes the sweetest sound.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: As soon as war is declared it will be impossible to hold the poets back. Rhyme is still the most effective drum.
quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

quotes.quote: How can you not love a man banging on the drums? He knows how to keep a rhythm.
quotes.author: Malin Akerman

quotes.quote: The most persistent sound which reverberates through man's history is the beating of war drums.
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.quote: The big drum only sounds well from afar.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: There was a saying in Umuofia that as a man danced so the drums were beaten for him.
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.quote: What's really good is African drum music.
quotes.author: Fiona Apple

quotes.quote: I'm inspired by anyone who's honest in their own expression, people who truly beat to the rhythm of their own drum.
quotes.author: Gillian Zinser

quotes.quote: The heart jungle drum beat finds its voice in love and matchsticks.
quotes.author: Isabel Yosito

quotes.quote: Music is the beat of a drum that keeps time with our emotions.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: A drummer is never late nor is he early he hits his count precisely when he means to.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Music is like a conversation. One person says one thing that speaks with a harmonica, with a bass, with a drum. They're all conversating, and we're just trying to find a way to make conversation rather than blah, blah, blah. But it's not really so hard a thing to do if you know the way to approach it.
quotes.author: Stephen Marley

quotes.quote: When Mr. Ludwig invented the bass-drum pedal, that's what made the drum set possible.
quotes.author: Neil Peart

quotes.quote: My version of a stress dream is, really, showing up on a concert stage with a drum set and not knowing the chart.
quotes.author: Damien Chazelle

quotes.quote: To the solemn graves, near a lonely cemetery, my heart like a muffled drum is beating funeral marches.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: The quad toms are a completely different animal than the standard drum set/trap kit. Playing wise and stylistically, they are two different beasts.
quotes.author: Tommy Lee

quotes.quote: Secrets stolen from deep inside....the drum beats out of time.
quotes.author: Cyndi Lauper

quotes.quote: The golden rule of drums is hands clapping and feet tapping, and when you are in and out of consciousness, you can't do that to best of your ability.
quotes.author: Steven Adler

quotes.quote: When you write, it's making a certain kind of music in your head. There's a rhythm to it, a pulse, and on the whole, I'm writing to that drum rather than the psychological process.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: Drums all have their own particulars - each drum has a place where they sound the best - where they ring out and resonate the best, and the head surface isn't too loose or too tight, mainly so you get a good rebound off of the head.
quotes.author: Chad Smith

quotes.quote: In rap music, even though the element of poetry is very strong, so is the element of the drum, the implication of the dance. Without the beat, its commercial value would certainly be more tenuous.
quotes.author: Archie Shepp

quotes.quote: The harder they hit us, the louder we become, kind of like the skin on a drum.
quotes.author: Michael Franti

quotes.quote: Drums usually seem to tune themselves.
quotes.author: Levon Helm

quotes.quote: Some records with drum machines on them sound phony and plastic. It all depends on how you use the tools.
quotes.author: Don Henley

quotes.quote: There is no dogma that the organ or harmonium can be used in church, but not the drum.
quotes.author: Francis Arinze

quotes.quote: He who marches out of line hears another drum.
quotes.author: Ken Kesey

quotes.quote: Less glory is more liberty. When the drum is silent, reason sometimes speaks.
quotes.author: Albert Pike

quotes.quote: It's the things that you notice when you're not actually with your instrument that, in fact, become so interesting, and that you - you want to explore, through this tiny tiny surface of a drum.
quotes.author: Evelyn Glennie

quotes.quote: The insignificant, the empty, is usually the loud; and after the manner of a drum, is louder even because of its emptiness.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Anything that broadens your musicality always moves the way you write drum or guitar parts.
quotes.author: Philip Selway

quotes.quote: There are methods to creating a mayhem that sounds different from your usual mayhem. Because mayhem and a heavy drum backbeat end up sounding like Green Day or something. But if you put a different beat within it to create some air and lightness, the chaos comes through better.
quotes.author: Nick Cave

quotes.quote: Black holes can bang against space-time as mallets on a drum and have a very characteristic song.
quotes.author: Janna Levin

quotes.quote: Like a drum my heart was beating, And your kiss was sweet as wine, But the joys of love are fleeting For Pierrot and Columbine.
quotes.author: Tom Springfield

quotes.quote: If you've got a problem, take it out on a drum.
quotes.author: Neil Peart

quotes.quote: The drums tell me everything. Everything else registers a millisecond later.
quotes.author: Adam Clayton

quotes.quote: The drums are about gravity. Your hand naturally falls down on the drums as you hit them.
quotes.author: Tommy Lee

quotes.quote: Alber Elbaz is just a genius. He'll be in a dinner jacket and he doesn't care what time of day it is: I love that about him. He just marches to the beat of his own drum.
quotes.author: Pharrell Williams

quotes.quote: Not a drum was heard, not a funeral note, As his corse to the rampart we hurried.
quotes.author: Charles Wolfe

quotes.quote: You know the drum was the first instrument besides the human voice.
quotes.author: Billy Higgins

quotes.quote: When you're going for a joke, you're stuck out there if it doesn't work. There's nowhere to go. You've done the drum role and the cymbal clash and you're out on the end of the plank.
quotes.author: Bob Newhart

quotes.quote: In a world become blind, I beat the drum of the Deathless.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Part of Steve's job was to drum into us how important what we were doing actually would be to the world.
quotes.author: Andy Hertzfeld

quotes.quote: The sound of the drum drives out thought; for that very reason it is the most military of instruments.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: My favorite instrument is the snare drum. In Scotland, the snare drum is very prominent in Highland bands. The Scottish style of playing is in my blood. It's a very powerful instrument, but it can also be soothing, like velvet. It's a real challenge for composers.
quotes.author: Evelyn Glennie

quotes.quote: Strike up the drum and march courageously.
quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

quotes.quote: Life follows a rhythm and we hold the drum.
quotes.author: Tom Althouse

quotes.quote: The drum is surely the lord of music, is it not?
quotes.author: Xun Zi

quotes.quote: To get your playing more forceful, hit the drums harder.
quotes.author: Keith Moon

quotes.quote: There is no music unless the drum and the drummer are one.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: But, I don't think any arranger should ever write a drum part for a drummer because if a drummer can't create his own Interpretation of the chart and he plays everything that's written, he becomes mechanical; he has no freedom.
quotes.author: Buddy Rich

quotes.quote: It takes a pretty good drummer to be better than no drummer at all.
quotes.author: Chet Baker

quotes.quote: A big drum makes a big sound.
quotes.author: Korean Proverb

quotes.quote: A good drum does not require hard beating.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Beat your drum inside the house to spare the neighbors.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Untouched drums are silent.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: See, the conquering hero comes! / Sound the trumpets, beat the drums!
quotes.author: Thomas Morell

quotes.quote: Over there, over there, / Send the word, send the word over there / That the Yanks are coming, the Yanks are coming, / The drums rum-tumming everywhere. / So prepare, say a prayer, / Send the word, send the word to beware. / We'll be over, we're coming over / And we won't come back till it's over, over there.
quotes.author: George M. Cohan

quotes.quote: If thine enemy offends thee, give his child a drum.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: The day the drum begins to beat the drummer is the day he should seek another employment.
quotes.author: Yoruga Proverb

quotes.quote: If a man does not keep pace with his companions, perhaps it is because he hears a different drummer. Let him step to the music which he hears, however measured or far away.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: You can muffle the drum, and you can loosen the strings of the lyre, but who shall command the skylark not to sing.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: He that beats the drum for the mad man to dance is no better than the mad man himself.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: Whatever music you beat on your drum there is somebody who can dance to it.
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.quote: I enjoy playing the band as the band. I be the whole band and I'm playing the drums, I'm playing the guitar, I'm playing the saxophone. To me, the most wonderful thing about playing music is that.
quotes.author: Chick Corea

quotes.quote: In the jungle, drums are newspapers, radio, telephone and Western Union all wrapped up in one.
quotes.author: Jungle Jim

quotes.quote: Drum is the most seductive musical instrument. Its rhythm reminds us of our beating heart. Its sound clears our mind. We let go of our rational self. Drumstick up - the heart flutters. Drumstick down - the mind awakens.
quotes.author: Sid

quotes.quote: O the drum! / There is some / Intonation in thy grum / Monotony of utterance that strikes the spirit dumb, / As we hear / Through the clear / And unclouded atmosphere, / Thy palpitating syllables roll in upon the ear!
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: With big tin trumpet and little red drum, / Marching like soldiers, the children come! / It 's this way and that way they circle and file--- / My! but that music of theirs is fine! / This way and that way, and after a while / They march straight into this heart of mine!
quotes.author: Eugene Field

quotes.quote: But primarily, the drummer's supposed to sit back there and swing the band.
quotes.author: Buddy Rich

quotes.quote: That's what the drummer is supposed to do. Keep the time. If you can do something else besides that, fine. But the time is essential and non-negotiable.
quotes.author: Elvin Jones

quotes.quote: Average band with a great drummer sounds great, great band with an average.
quotes.author: Buddy Rich

quotes.quote: To be a drummer you also have to be a musician.
quotes.author: Ian Paice

quotes.quote: Drummers shouldn't just think of themselves as drummers. If you're going to be a musician, you should expand your horizons, compose things, and work with other instruments.
quotes.author: Stewart Copeland

quotes.quote: Do you know why they call a drummer's seat a throne? Because drummers are kings and queens.
quotes.author: Ed Thigpen

quotes.quote: There is no roles. No one is keeping any roles. The drummer is also answering everybody and everything. So it is a constant conversation and communication between musicians on an extremely high level with extremely valuable material, motifs, and melodies.
quotes.author: Miroslav Vitous

quotes.quote: If a man does not keep pace with his companions, perhaps it is because he hears a different drummer. Let him step to the music which he hears, owever measured or far away.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Historically, musicians know what it is like to be outside the norm - walking the high wire without a safety net. Our experience is not so different from those who march to the beat of different drummers.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.quote: Drummers haven't managed to develop their individuality quite as well as guitarists have. We can be so focused on the nuts and bolts that we overlook the importance of individuality - the broader picture, if you will.
quotes.author: Bill Bruford

quotes.quote: If you drum open handed, you automatically look like a better/cooler drummer than every other drummer.
quotes.author: Christopher Mintz

quotes.quote: March to the beat of your own drummer.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Before you can follow your own drummer, you have to hear the drummer.
quotes.author: Srikumar Rao

quotes.quote: It takes a pretty good drummer to be better than no drummer at all.
quotes.author: Chet Baker

quotes.quote: Drummers are conductors, we set the pace for the music so if you're not relaxed and feeling right, the whole thing goes out the window.
quotes.author: Steven Adler

quotes.quote: A drummer is usually like the backbone.
quotes.author: Brody Dalle

quotes.quote: Average band with a great drummer sounds great, great band with an average drummer sounds average.
quotes.author: Buddy Rich

quotes.quote: Every man must walk to the beat of his own drummer.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Music is the beat of a drum that keeps time with our emotions.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: The drum is the heart of music. The saxophone can play and then rest, as can all of them except the drums; the drummer keeps going - he can't afford to stop.
quotes.author: Jo Jones

quotes.quote: Drummers - sometimes they play and they listen. And that little listen takes a speck away from the right tempo.
quotes.author: Miles Davis

quotes.quote: There is no music unless the drum and the drummer are one.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: Music shouldn't be just a tune, it should be a touch.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: As a drummer, you're always fighting for a level that you never quite attain.
quotes.author: Damien Chazelle

quotes.quote: The drummer's always going to be there. They're the floor of the whole deal and everyone can stand up on you.
quotes.author: Ringo Starr

quotes.quote: Maybe Ringo Starr wasn't the best drummer in the world. All right, maybe he wasn't the best drummer in the Beatles.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Perkins

quotes.quote: I'm a drummer who likes to sing...In fact, what I like to do the most is to sing and to play drums at the same time.
quotes.author: T.S. Monk

quotes.quote: He doesn't have to march to the same drummer as long as he's in the same band.
quotes.author: Dusty Baker

quotes.quote: The best drummers are the ones who imprint the music with their own personal mark while still supplying the vital elements of time, feel, and emotion.
quotes.author: Chad Smith

quotes.quote: Let me paraphrase Lenny bruce: If the drums are swingin', the band's swingin' —even if it's not. If the drums ain't swingin', the band ain't swingin'—even if it is.
quotes.author: Paul Shaffer

quotes.quote: The drummer is the center of gravity for any group, no matter what kind of music they play. In the studio or on stage, the drums are the first instrument the engineer focuses on because everything else is built around them.
quotes.author: Tommy James

quotes.quote: The drummer is the most important musician in any band. He makes it happen by the feel he brings to the ensemble. A great drummer drives the bus, makes the stops, picks up the solos, and orchestrates the vocals. He or she can make or break a great band.
quotes.author: Peter Frampton

quotes.quote: We're all drummers. When I'm working the strings with my right hand, I'm playing a drum part. Rhythm is involved with everything. It's just different perspectives on the same thing. We're trying to make these machines laugh and cry.
quotes.author: Mike Watt

quotes.quote: A drummer certainly needs to be something of a shaman. he also needs the power of a ringmaster, as well as total self-confidence unspoiled by something like reading books. Only exceptional master drummers like Jaki Liebezeit can afford such an exquisite occupation as studying Sanskrit without getting confused.
quotes.author: Irmin Schmidt

quotes.quote: The drums are the heart, guts and soul, the driving force behind the music.
quotes.author: Billy Idol

quotes.quote: It's tough being 'the drummer'. It's up to you to lay down the groove, then hold everybody else together. And as if that's not enough, all the other guys in the band think you're difficult or crazy. And then they start with the jokes:'What has three legs and a prick? A drum stool'. It ain't easy being the drummer.
quotes.author: Mark Hudson

quotes.quote: Real drums played by real drummers; an art of sound that I've been attempting to capture for thirty-five years. Even getting close to the reality and humanity is beyond measure.
quotes.author: Jack Douglas

quotes.quote: A band without a drummer is like a rocking chair that somebody has cruelly bolted to the floor: while it may appear to rock, it actually doesn't.
quotes.author: Tony Barrell

quotes.quote: Drummers play the most wonderful, exciting, and complex rhythms.
quotes.author: Tony Barrell

quotes.quote: I think drummers have an unfair reputation because, let's face it, first of all, you have to be MAD to play the drums! I mean nobody sane is going to spend their life hitting various objects with two pieces of wood.
quotes.author: Cozy Powell

quotes.quote: Drummers have so much to think about that they unconsciously make a variety of ridiculous facial expressions as they play.
quotes.author: Richard Jupp

quotes.quote: To be a drummer is to be misunderstood. That old joke about a band consisting of three musicians and a drummer reflects the uninformed view of many people who still see the drummer as a barbarian with a haircut, making indiscriminate noise.
quotes.author: Jon Cohan

quotes.quote: I think every band is a little cautious when the drummer starts to write tunes.
quotes.author: Matt Cameron

quotes.quote: The drummer is the backbone of the band and is the real underrated one.
quotes.author: Bernard Sumner

quotes.quote: I definitely move to the beat of my own drummer and man, he's not playing something anyone has heard before. It's pretty cool, though. Pretty cool.
quotes.author: Q. Tip

quotes.quote: My soul is that of a drummer... I didn't do it to become rich and famous. I did it because it was the love of my life.
quotes.author: Ringo Starr

quotes.quote: The drummer is stereotypically the dumb guy. Maybe that's why I always respect drummers who do more than the drum.
quotes.author: Taylor Hawkins

quotes.quote: I would like to think that the singer is the butterfly, and the drummer was just the little grub in the ground, working to become a caterpillar
quotes.author: Robert Wyatt

quotes.quote: When I speak of natural drummers I'm talking about guys that are playing with the talent God gave 'em.
quotes.author: Gene Krupa

quotes.quote: I play weird. I'm always just behind. We drummers only have so much room. We're not guitarists.
quotes.author: Ringo Starr

quotes.quote: Before you can follow your own drummer, you have to hear the drummer.
quotes.author: Srikumar Rao

quotes.quote: I'm a drummer. I can count to four and repeat.
quotes.author: Tre Cool

quotes.quote: I realized that you can achieve so much at the front of a stage, releasing the music yourself and being something more selfish than just the drummer.
quotes.author: Rex Orange County

quotes.quote: I think the drummer should sit back there and play some drums, and never mind about the tunes. Just get up there and wail behind whoever is sitting up there playing the solo. And this is what is lacking, definitely lacking in music today.
quotes.author: Buddy Rich

quotes.quote: Do you know why they call a drummer's seat a throne? Because drummers are kings and queens.
quotes.author: Ed Thigpen

quotes.quote: First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you.
quotes.author: Francis Scott Key Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: He that is a drunkard is qualified for all vice.
quotes.author: Wellins Calcott

quotes.quote: Being half drunk is just another way of saying â€˜your almost there.
quotes.author: Jarrod Conway

quotes.quote: Drunkenness is temporary suicide.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: That which hath made them drunk hath made me bold.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I may be drunk, but in the morning iâ€˜ll be sober and youâ€˜ll still be ugly.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: They who drink beer will think beer.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: I think a man ought to get drunk at least twice a year just on principle, so he won't let himself get snotty about it.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: The best audience is intelligent, well-educated, and a little drunk
quotes.author: Alben William Barkley

quotes.quote: You're not drunk if you can lie on the floor without holding on.
quotes.author: Dean Martin

quotes.quote: Drunk forever dreaming you with or without you
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: Man, being reasonable, must get drunk; the best of life is but intoxication.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Everybody's got to believe in something. I believe I'll have another beer.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: A man who exposes himself when he is intoxicated, has not the art of getting drunk.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: It takes only one drink to get me drunk. The trouble is, I can't remember if it's the thirteenth or the fourteenth.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: A drunkard is like a whiskey-bottle, all neck and belly and no head.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: I liked you better when you were drunk .
quotes.author: Tom Hardy

quotes.quote: Being sober on a bus is, like, totally different than being drunk on a bus.
quotes.author: Ozzy Osbourne

quotes.quote: Nothing makes you forget everything as getting drunk of red wine.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: To dispute with a drunkard is to debate with an empty house.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: No nation is drunken where wine is cheap.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: As long as I could pitch a little, no one cared that I was getting drunk.
quotes.author: Don Newcombe

quotes.quote: Not every man remembers the name of the cow which supplied him with each drop of milk he has drunk.
quotes.author: Shmuel Yosef Agnon

quotes.quote: Hit the bottom and get back up; or hit the bottle and stay down.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: He is a drunkard who takes more than three glasses though he be not drunk.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: He that drinks fast, pays slow.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The problem with the world is that everyone is a few drinks behind.
quotes.author: Humphrey Bogart

quotes.quote: Drunkenness is nothing but voluntary madness.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: I was always playing the hard-bitten drunk.
quotes.author: Sally Kellerman

quotes.quote: A drunk man's words are a sober man's thoughts.
quotes.author: Steve Fergosi

quotes.quote: If you want to get drunk, get drunk with love.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: The worst thing about some men is that when they are not drunk they are sober.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Now don't say you can't swear off drinking; it's easy, I've done it a thousand times.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: I love to drink martinis. Two at the very most. Three I'm under the table. Four I'm under my host.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: It's okay saying sorry, but when you are drunk you say what you really feel.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: A man's true character comes out when he's drunk.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: An alcoholic has been lightly defined as a man who drinks more than his own doctor.
quotes.author: Dr. Alvan L. Barach

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you're drunk you can see better.
quotes.author: Damien Hirst

quotes.quote: If you drink, don't drive. Don't even putt.
quotes.author: Dean Martin

quotes.quote: Because of the high altitude, you get drunk really fast. So everyone's drunk all the time.
quotes.author: Clea Duvall

quotes.quote: You don't quite know how drunk you are until all of a sudden you're on the floor.
quotes.author: Gina Gershon

quotes.quote: An American monkey, after getting drunk on brandy, would never touch it again, and thus is much wiser than most men.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: When you drink alcohol you are just borrowing happiness from tomorrow.
quotes.author: Jessica Nigri

quotes.quote: I drink to forget I drink.
quotes.author: Joe E. Lewis

quotes.quote: Being sober a long time is a gift, but watching it touch lives around us is even sweeter.
quotes.author: Gene O

quotes.quote: I know I should give up drinking; but I am not a quitter
quotes.author: Anon

quotes.quote: I have taken more out of alcohol than alcohol has taken out of me.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I feel bad for people who don't drink. When they wake up in the morning, that's as good as they're going to feel all day.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: When I read about the evils of drinking, I gave up reading.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: Alcohol use by young people is dangerous, not only because of the risks associated with acute impairment, but also because of the threat to their long-term development and well-being.
quotes.author: Institute of Medicine

quotes.quote: Traffic crashes are perhaps the most visible of these dangers, with alcohol being implicated in nearly one-third of youth traffic fatalities.
quotes.author: Institute of Medicine

quotes.quote: Underage alcohol use is also associated with violence, suicide, educational failure, and other problem behaviors.
quotes.author: Institute of Medicine

quotes.quote: What every drunk needs is to get more blood into his alcohol.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Drink should be given to stream the man who is given to drink.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The difference between a drunk and an alcoholic is that the drunk doesn't have to attend all those meetings.
quotes.author: Arthur Lewis

quotes.quote: Among young people. Drinking is for getting drunk. And many go on to become alcoholics.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Drunkenness is not a new vice, Its ravages have always been a scourge on the human race.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Thousands are killed and injured every year by teenagers driving too fast or under the influence of drugs and drink.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Do not seek solace in alcohol. Alcohol obscures good judgement and leaves you unable to think clearly.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: It is useless to hold a person to anything he says while he's in love, drunk, or running for office.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: What began as an apparently harmless pastime has ended up as a frightening, overpowering addiction or obsession.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Going to the opera, like getting drunk, is a sin that carries its own punishment with it.
quotes.author: Hannah More

quotes.quote: Children cry and adults drink.
quotes.author: Joseph Julius Bonkowski

quotes.quote: Sobriety, I'll drink to that.
quotes.author: Joseph Julius Bonkowski

quotes.quote: When gin turns to sin, you will need bail for jail.
quotes.author: Joseph Julius Bonkowski

quotes.quote: Friendship in a bar won't go very far.
quotes.author: Joseph Julius Bonkowski

quotes.quote: Beer in and belly out.
quotes.author: Joseph Julius Bonkowski

quotes.quote: Drink because you are happy, but never because you are miserable.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Always remember that I have taken more out of alcohol than alcohol has taken out of me.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: My rule of life prescribed as an absolutely sacred rite smoking cigars and also the drinking of alcohol before, after and, if need be, during all meals and in the intervals between them.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The water was not fit toi drink. To make it palatable, we had to add whisky. By diligent effort, I learnt to like it.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I have a theory that the secret of marital happiness is simple: drink in different pubs to your other half.
quotes.author: Jilly Cooper

quotes.quote: Not all chemicals are bad. Without chemicals such as hydrogen and oxygen, for example, there would be no way to make water, a vital ingredient for beer.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Without a question, the greatest invention in the history of mankind is beer. Oh, I grant you that the wheel was also a fine invention, but the wheel does not go nearly as well with pizza.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: I never turned to drink; it seemed to turn to me.
quotes.author: Brendan Behan

quotes.quote: Alcohol is the most commonly abused drug.
quotes.author: Charles Agyin-Asare

quotes.quote: Alcoholism is that burning desire like being addicted to nicotine.
quotes.author: Charles Agyin-Asare

quotes.quote: Alcohol is made very tempting by the powerful advertising and media hype. These are tools used for recruiting novices and sustaining the habits in veterans.
quotes.author: Charles Agyin-Asare

quotes.quote: Others also use alcohol/drugs to fill the emptiness they feel inside or to get 'high'.
quotes.author: Charles Agyin-Asare

quotes.quote: Alcohol is what is served at most functions, weddings, birthdays, anniversaries, traditional festivities, sporting events.
quotes.author: Charles Agyin-Asare

quotes.quote: Alcohol is a simple chemical, but its effects on the body are extraordinarily complex and highly individual.
quotes.author: Katherine Ketcham

quotes.quote: The stronger a drink is--that is, the more alcohol it contains--the greater the amount of alcohol that will get into your bloodstream.
quotes.author: Katherine Ketcham

quotes.quote: Alcohol is a legal drug and therefore afforded special status.
quotes.author: Katherine Ketcham

quotes.quote: Alcohol isn't really a drug, the thinking goes, because it won't hurt you unless you overindulge.
quotes.author: Katherine Ketcham

quotes.quote: Alcohol can cause or mask emotional problems, such as anxiety or depression.
quotes.author: Fred F. Ferri

quotes.quote: The younger people are when they start drinking, the more likely they'll have an alcohol problem. Drinking can also increase the risk of using other drugs.
quotes.author: Fred F. Ferri

quotes.quote: Teens use alcohol because they're curious and want to feel good, lower stress, fit in, and feel older. Some teens have trouble managing impluses, emotions, and thrill-seeking behaviors.
quotes.author: Fred F. Ferri

quotes.quote: Alcohol is a depressant, meaning it slows down the brain. Teens can feel more relaxed or less anxious, but they may also stagger, lose coordination, slur speech, and be confused and disoriented.
quotes.author: Fred F. Ferri

quotes.quote: The oldest and most widely used drug in the world, alcohol is also the drug most frequently used by teens.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Califano

quotes.quote: Alcohol is a liquid that people drink. Adolescents who want to get drunk will often drink 'shots,' which are small glasses of straight liquor, because the body absorbs the alcohol much faster that way.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Califano

quotes.quote: Signs of teenage drinking include the smell of alcohol on your child's breath, slurred speech, lack of coordination, nausea, vomiting, and hangovers.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Califano

quotes.quote: Teenage drinking can physically damage the developing brains of teenagers in ways that impair learning, memory, abstract thinking, problem solving, and perceptual-motor skills.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Califano

quotes.quote: Alcohol can cause many types of accidents. It may also at times lead to violent behavior or contribute to the risk of suicide.
quotes.author: Griffith Edwards

quotes.quote: Alcohol is also a drug addiction - a fact which multiplies the significance of its inherently negative potential.
quotes.author: Griffith Edwards

quotes.quote: Alcohol is a stupid molecule which is clever in its ability to play mood music on complex brain systems, but it is an addictive drug with a far from innocent profile.
quotes.author: Griffith Edwards

quotes.quote: Alcohol is fun, the wine of the Eucharist, a profitable and taxable commodity, but a drug among drugs and highly ambiguous in its costs and benefits.
quotes.author: Griffith Edwards

quotes.quote: Ever since humans began to consume alcohol, they have had a difficult relationship with it.
quotes.author: Rod Phillips

quotes.quote: Alcohol has historically played a role at marriages and funerals, and it has commonly marked commercial, political, and other events.
quotes.author: Rod Phillips

quotes.quote: Alcohol helps people relax and sometimes to forget their cares.
quotes.author: Rod Phillips

quotes.quote: Drunk driving is a killer disease.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you drink don't drive. Don't even putt.
quotes.author: Dean Martin
