quotes.quote: A drunk driver is very dangerous. So is a drunk backseat driver if he's persuasive.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: Better To Arrive Sober And Late Than Never.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's as if people used the invention of seat belts as an opportunity to take up drunk driving.
quotes.author: John Lanchester

quotes.quote: Their alcohol consumption levels haven't dropped much, but their drunk driving has.
quotes.author: James Lange

quotes.quote: Drunk driving contains a far greater risk of violent death than the use or sale of illegal drugs, the societal response to drunk drivers has generally emphasized keeping the person functional and in society, while attempting to respond to the dangerous behavior through treatment and counseling.
quotes.author: Michelle Alexander

quotes.quote: When people are really drunk they have a propensity to harm themselves and others they fall off buildings, they drive into other cars.
quotes.author: Emily Yoffe

quotes.quote: Drinking and driving: there are stupider things, but it's a very short list.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: People that insist upon drinking and driving, are putting the quart before the hearse.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: If you're going to drive a Hummer and buy carbon offsets, that's like getting drunk every night and getting into an AA meeting, throwing money in the basket, and leaving.
quotes.author: Ed Begley, Jr.

quotes.quote: This is interesting. Researchers have found that people who drive drunk are more dangerous on the road than drivers who are high on marijuana. Don't get too excited. It's mostly because the drivers using marijuana are just sitting in the Taco Bell drive-through.
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.quote: More people die on a per mile basis from drunk walking than from drunk driving.
quotes.author: A. J. Jacobs

quotes.quote: The problem with drinking and driving is the mourning after.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sober Driving Today. Alive Tomorrow.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Driving under the influence of alcohol, or 'drunk driving,' is by far the most commonly encountered offense in the courts today.
quotes.author: Lawrence Taylor

quotes.quote: Drunk driving is a deceptively difficult type of case to deal with, and the risks to the client are much higher than are generally appreciated.
quotes.author: Lawrence Taylor

quotes.quote: The consequences and cots of youthful alcohol use are enormous. Many of these harmful consequences are immediate and all too evident--injuries due to impaired driving or violence.
quotes.author: Institute of Medicine

quotes.quote: Alcohol use by you people is dangerous, not only because of the risks associated with acute impairment, but also because of the threat to their long-term development ad well-being. Traffic crashes are perhaps the most visible of these dangers with alcohol being implicated in nearly one third of youth traffic fatalities.
quotes.author: Institute of Medicine

quotes.quote: The changing of attitudes and norms is the best hope for reducing drunk driving over the long run. If more people regarded drunk driving as irresponsible and dangerous, there would be less drunk driving, more informal control mechanisms, and more support for normal encounter measures.
quotes.author: James B. Jacobs

quotes.quote: Drink and drive. Combining the two makes for a tragic mix of poor decision making, car crashes, injuries, legal problems, and potential life-changing situations.
quotes.author: Valerie Mendralla

quotes.quote: Teens talking to other teens about safe driving and having fun without alcohol can be very effective in changing attitudes and perceptions and, in turn, behaviors.
quotes.author: Valerie Mendralla

quotes.quote: Drinking and driving can destroy lives and families.
quotes.author: Valerie Mendralla

quotes.quote: Drinking and driving has devastating effects on the entire nation. At the very least, people who drink and drive can lose their privileges to drive. At worst, they can lose their loved ones or even their lives.
quotes.author: Valerie Mendralla

quotes.quote: Teens who get behind the wheel after drinking may also hurt innocent bystanders or other drivers.
quotes.author: Valerie Mendralla

quotes.quote: Drinking and driving threatens the lives of all Americans. Whether we are drivers, passengers, or pedestrians--whether or not we drink alcohol--each of us is at risk of being involved in an alcohol-related crash at some time during our lives.
quotes.author: Ross J Homel

quotes.quote: If you drink and drive, sooner or later, you're gonna meet the Undertaker.
quotes.author: Vince McMahon

quotes.quote: Many a man who is drunk prefers to drive because he feels he is in no condition to walk.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: People who insist on drinking before driving are putting the quart before the hearse.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Most of those who are driven to drink, make the trip in the driver's seat.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The one for the road may be two for the cemetery.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: There's only one thing worse than being driven to drink, and that's driving yourself home from it.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A tree never hits an automobile except in self defense.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: A woman drove me to drink and I didn't even have the decency to thank her.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: If you drink don't drive, don't even putt.
quotes.author: Dean Martin

quotes.quote: First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you.
quotes.author: Francis Scott Key Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Drink the first. Sip the second slowly. Skip the third.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.quote: I know some people are against drunk driving, but you know, sometimes you've got no choice. Those kids got to get to school.
quotes.author: Dave Attell

quotes.quote: An intoxicated person might become angry if other suggest that he or she should not drive.
quotes.author: Valerie Mendrala

quotes.quote: Mind cannot think without duality. Duality is the way of thinking. In silence, all dualities disappear.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Duality is always secretly unity.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Every explicit duality is an implicit unity.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Love is the recognition of oneness in the world of duality.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: The cords of passion and desire weave a binding net around you. Worldly confrontation makes you stiff and inflexible. The trap of duality is tenacious. Bound, rigid, and trapped, you cannot experience liberation.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: All duality is a mind creation, all duality is created by the clinging and attached mind. When there is no attachment there is no duality.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Duality is a part of reality, and there is definitely winning and losing. If you don't think so talk to someone who has beaten cancer, talk to somebody who hasn't.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: If you don't have the background awareness of oneness, duality becomes real.
quotes.author: Alan Finger

quotes.quote: There are two choices available in duality - one side or the other side. Everyting is formed from that.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Thus it is necessary to commence from an inescapable duality: the finite is not the infinite.
quotes.author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quotes.quote: Duality is not a story. Duality is just a complexity.
quotes.author: Edward Norton

quotes.quote: People use ideas of non-duality as an escape from reality. It is very easy to say there is no winning and losing and justify the fact that you didn't do a very good job.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Past and Future are a duality of which Present is the reality. The now-moment alone is eternal and real.
quotes.author: Wei Wu Wei

quotes.quote: The duality of positive and negative becomes subsumed in Oneness. There are no opposites in the totality and absolute perfection of the Oneness that we know as Divine.
quotes.author: Peter Santos

quotes.quote: To define oneself, is to suffer duality. One must avoid defining existence and identity.
quotes.author: Mark Mandemaker

quotes.quote: The sense of duality, which is a barrier to true love, must prevail so long as the apperception of Truth has not occurred. Once individuality is surrendered, there is only total Love.
quotes.author: Ramesh S Balsekar

quotes.quote: Just as we have two eyes and two feet, duality is part of life.
quotes.author: Carlos Santana

quotes.quote: There's a duality in every man and every woman.
quotes.author: Raquel Welch

quotes.quote: All that we do is governed by the law of opposites in which every so-called positive act is exactly and equally balanced by its opposite.
quotes.author: Tony Parsons

quotes.quote: We, all who live, have A life that is lived And another life that is thought, And the only life we have It's the one that is divided In right or wrong.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: Transcendence means going beyond duality. Attachment means remaining within duality.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The binding of reason and intuition is the fundamental crisis of the era we call humanity. Transcedence of duality is the key.
quotes.author: Phil Collins

quotes.quote: Through transcendence of duality, we foster greater unity in our lives, which brings about inner peace and the sprouting of unconditional LOVE.
quotes.author: Alaric Hutchinson

quotes.quote: Duality is the real root of our suffering and of all our conflicts.
quotes.author: Namkhai Norbu

quotes.quote: In presence, there is no right or wrong, because there is no duality. There is no judgment.
quotes.author: Leonard Jacobson

quotes.quote: There is both joy and suffering on planet Earth because this beautiful world is a world of duality - a world of opposites. There is an opposite side to everything.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: In the universe, there is darkness and light. We call this duality. When you seek knowledge and power, there are forces and people that will oppose you.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: We cut up time and space and mind and place and being and non-being. We create a world of ideas. This is duality, pairs of apparent opposites.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Confused by thoughts, we experience duality in life. Unencumbered by ideas, the enlightened see the one Reality.
quotes.author: Hui Neng

quotes.quote: You have two kinds of secrets. The ones only you know. The ones only you don't.
quotes.author: James Richardson

quotes.quote: Great repressions create dualities.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: The direction of life is from duality to unity.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Music is indivisible. The dualism of feeling and thinking must be resolved to a state of unity in which one thinks with the heart and feels with the brain.
quotes.author: George Szell

quotes.quote: The dualism itself becomes a sort of presupposition or datum its terms condition the further problem.
quotes.author: James Mark Baldwin

quotes.quote: To accept duality is to earn identity.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: Absurdity and anti absurdity are the two poles of creative energy.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Power is of two kinds one is obtained by the fear of punishment and the other by acts of love.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The divorce of our so-called spiritual life from our daily activities is a fatal dualism.
quotes.author: Mary Parker Follett

quotes.quote: Beauty saves. Beauty heals. Beauty motivates. Beauty unites. Beauty returns us to our origins, and here lies the ultimate act of saving, of healing, of overcoming dualism.
quotes.author: Matthew Fox

quotes.quote: Never permit a dichotomy to rule your life, a dichotomy in which you hate what you do so you can have pleasure in your spare time. Look for a situation in which your work will give you as much happiness as your spare time
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: The dichotomy between personal liberties and property rights is a false one. Property does not have rights. People have rights.
quotes.author: Potter Stewart

quotes.quote: Only in love are unity and duality not in conflict.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Experience life in all possible ways good-bad, bitter-sweet, dark-light, summer-winter. Experience all the dualities. Don't be afraid of experience, because the more experience you have, the more mature you become.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: In this universe, and this existence, where we live with this duality of whether we exist or not and who are we, the stories we tell ourselves are the stories that define the potentialities of our existence. We are the stories we tell ourselves.
quotes.author: Shekhar Kapur

quotes.quote: All you do is think. Because all you do is think, you've constructed two separate worlds one inside your head and one outside. Just the fact that you tolerate this enormous dissonance why that's a great intangible failure already.
quotes.author: Sōseki Natsume

quotes.quote: The great apparent dichotomy is that the more we give, the more we get.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Dublin has given me a new definition for home: Home is a place you don’t want to leave. To be completely honest, I think I’ll leave a part of my heart here in Ireland.
quotes.author: Lily Liberman

quotes.quote: For myself, I always write about Dublin, because if I can get to the heart of Dublin I can get to the heart of all the cities of the world. In the particular is contained the universal.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: The truth is that I am in love with Dublin. I think it is the most beautiful town that I have ever seen, mountains at the back and the sea in front, and long roads winding through decaying suburbs and beautiful woods.
quotes.author: George A. Moore

quotes.quote: Night fell clean and cold in Dublin, and wind moaned beyond my room as if a million pipes played the air.
quotes.author: Patricia Cornwell

quotes.quote: I live in Dublin, God knows why. There are greatly more congenial places I could have settled in - Italy, France, Manhattan - but I like the climate here, and Irish light seems to be essential for me and for my writing.
quotes.author: John Banville

quotes.quote: Dublin is more than I could ever expect. The people are beyond considerate and humble, the amount of cafes and small pubs is extraordinary, the stores are easily accessible, and the food (so far) is actually tasty.
quotes.author: Nicole Taylor

quotes.quote: Dublin university contains the cream of Ireland: Rich and thick.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: Dublin dwindles so beautifully; there is no harsh separation between it and the country. It fades away, whereas London seems to devour the country; an army of buildings come and take away a beautiful park, and you never seem to get quite out of sight of a row of houses.
quotes.author: George A. Moore

quotes.quote: Fabulous place, Dublin is. The trouble is, you work hard and in Dublin you play hard as well.
quotes.author: Bonnie Tyler

quotes.quote: Dublin was hardly worried by the war; her old preoccupations were still preoccupations. The intelligentsia continued their parties; their mutual malice was as effervescent as ever.
quotes.author: Louis MacNeice

quotes.quote: Food in Dublin has gotten immeasurably better than it was. When I was a kid, there weren't a lot of options. Now you're overwhelmed with options.
quotes.author: James Vincent McMorrow

quotes.quote: I was born and raised in Dublin, Ireland and it is still home to me. My writing has taken me all over the world, but this is the place I come back to and the place where I find it easiest to write.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: Dublin people think they are the center of the world and the center of Ireland. And they don't realize that people have to leave Ireland to get work, and they look down on people who do.
quotes.author: Martin McDonagh

quotes.quote: Dublin was turning into Disneyland with super-pubs, a Purgatory open till five in the morning.
quotes.author: Joseph O'Connor

quotes.quote: Solitude is good in the evening. Dublin is a quiet city when you get to a certain age, when your friends settle down and have kids. Nothing much happens here.
quotes.author: Colm Toibin

quotes.quote: Dublin is now a truly cosmopolitan capital, with an influx of people, energy and ideas infusing the ever-beguiling, multi-layered city with fresh flavors and kaleidoscopic colors.
quotes.author: Lonely Planet

quotes.quote: Paris is cafe culture, Dublin is pub culture, and that's the best place to solve all the world's problems: over a pint! One of the great joys of living, I think. The problems of the world seem to disappear.
quotes.author: Liam Cunningham

quotes.quote: When I came back to Dublin I was courtmartialed in my absence and sentenced to death in my absence, so I said they could shoot me in my absence.
quotes.author: Brendan Behan

quotes.quote: I've only been to Dublin once, and I had a great time. I got completely soaked because it was rainy.
quotes.author: Jodie Foster

quotes.quote: With webbed toes and shorter legs than land fowl, ducks are not exceptionally fast on land but they are highly skilled swimmers, preferring to escape danger by way of water.
quotes.author: Dave Holderread

quotes.quote: Some birds avoid water, the duck searches for it.
quotes.author: Hausan Proverb

quotes.quote: A duck will not always dabble in the same gutter.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: Eat vegetables and fear no creditors, rather than eat duck and hide.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: The egg laid by the duck is sometimes hatched by the hen.
quotes.author: Malaysian Proverb

quotes.quote: When the ducks are walking, you know it's too windy to play golf.
quotes.author: Dave Stockton

quotes.quote: I am of the belief that it costs the same to feed a mongrel duck as a good one, and at the end of the day, the good one is still worth more to you than the mongrel. So, if you are going to breed a duck, breed a good one.
quotes.author: Nyiri Murtagh

quotes.quote: Ducks are strong, fast flyers. They fly between 35 and 50 miles per hour as they migrate.
quotes.author: Randy Frahm

quotes.quote: Ducks are one of the smallest types of waterfowl, but they are often the most colorful.
quotes.author: Stephen Savage

quotes.quote: A duck tastes the same whether they're shot sitting or flying.
quotes.author: Jase Robertson

quotes.quote: Be like a duck. Calm on the surface, but always paddling like the dickens underneath.
quotes.author: Michael Caine

quotes.quote: If it looks like a duck, quacks like a duck, it's a duck!
quotes.author: Robin Cook

quotes.quote: Be like a duck, paddling and working very hard inside the water, but what everyone sees is a smiling and calm face.
quotes.author: Manoj Arora

quotes.quote: Like a duck on the pond. On the surface everything looks calm, but beneath the water those little feet are churning a mile a minute.
quotes.author: Gene Hackman

quotes.quote: If it looks like a duck and sounds like a duck, it could be a really ugly swan.
quotes.author: Timmothy Radman

quotes.quote: If it looks like a duck, and quacks like a duck, we have at least to consider the possibility that we have a small aquatic bird of the family anatidae on our hands.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Always behave like a duck, keep calm and unruffled on the surface but paddle like the devil underneath.
quotes.author: Jacob Braude

quotes.quote: Duck love is recognizable in any language.
quotes.author: Edmond Manning

quotes.quote: You can't aim a duck to death.
quotes.author: Beverly Sills

quotes.quote: Paintings, mosaics, and other archaeological evidence, including duck bones excavated from middens at many locations in the Roman Empire, indicate that duck was eaten, probably on feast days and festivals.
quotes.author: Peter Cherry

quotes.quote: During the Ming dynasty, the Pekin duck was already known as an outstanding breed with stable genetic characters.
quotes.author: Peter Cherry

quotes.quote: A healthy duck will be bright and will try to get away from people. This is especially true when it arrives in its new environment.
quotes.author: Nyiri Murtagh

quotes.quote: A new duck may be dirty because it soiled itself on the way home, which of course should not be interpreted as a sign of illness.
quotes.author: Nyiri Murtagh

quotes.quote: A duck can see nearly all the way around without even turning its head and yes they see in complete color.
quotes.author: Heather Carver

quotes.quote: Unlike a deer, a duck can see you in color and from a very long way off. The chances are good if you can see a duck, it can see you.
quotes.author: Heather Carver

quotes.quote: The popularity of ducks— often described as the happiest animals in the barnyard— is increasing in many areas of the world.
quotes.author: Dave Holderread

quotes.quote: Ducks can make a highly effective pest patrol in the garden, as long as you take care to keep them from tender plants and low-growing fruit.
quotes.author: Dave Holderread

quotes.quote: Ducks are masterfully designed, down to the smallest detail, for both aquatic and terrestrial life.
quotes.author: Dave Holderread

quotes.quote: Where duty is plain delay is both foolish and hazardous; where it is not, delay may be both wisdom and safety.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: A man's duty is to find out where the truth is, or if he cannot, at least to take the best possible human doctrine and the hardest to disprove, and to ride on this like a raft over the waters of life.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Your duty is to treat everybody with love as a manifestation of the Lord.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.quote: Happiness is the natural flower of duty.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: Who escapes a duty, avoids a gain.
quotes.author: Theodore W. Parker

quotes.quote: The reward of one duty done is the power to fulfill another.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The reward of doing one duty is the power to do another.
quotes.author: Rabbi Ben Azai

quotes.quote: Only aim to do your duty, and mankind will give you credit where you fail.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The first duty of a man is the seeking after and the investigation of truth.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: No duty is more urgent than that of returning thanks.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Every duty that is bidden to wait comes back with seven fresh duties at its back.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: Duty is one and invariable; it requires no impossibilities, nor can it ever be disregarded with impunity.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: A sense of duty is useful in work, but offensive in personal relations.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Duty is what one expects from others.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The duty of youth is to challenge corruption.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: Duty is the sublimest word in the language; you can never do more than your duty; you shall never wish to do less.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: A man who neglects his duty as a citizen is not entitled to his rights as a citizen.
quotes.author: Tiorio

quotes.quote: Do your duty and a little more and the future will take care of itself.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Every one regards his duty as a troublesome master from whom he would like to be free.
quotes.author: Mazo de la Roche

quotes.quote: People tend to forget their duties but remember their rights.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.quote: If you lay duties upon people and give them no rights, you must pay them well.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: We never fail when we try to do our duty, we always fail when we neglect to do it.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: Every right implies a responsibility; Every opportunity, an obligation, Every possession, a duty.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: It is our duty to be faithful, not with eye service as men pleasers.
quotes.author: Jupiter Hammon

quotes.quote: Do your duty as you see it, and damn the consequences.
quotes.author: George S. Patton Jr.

quotes.quote: It's an artist's duty to reflect the times in which we live.
quotes.author: John Legend

quotes.quote: Do your duty and leave the rest to the gods.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: n action, to have moral worth, must be done from duty.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Every duty is a charge, but the charge of oneself is the root of all others.
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.quote: Honor is no phantom. Duty doesn't melt away, no matter how much we might wish it to.
quotes.author: Claudia J. Edwards

quotes.quote: It is our duty as men and women to proceed as though the limits of our abilities do not exist.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.quote: Duty is that mode of action on the part of the individual which constitutes the best possible application of his capacity to the general benefit.
quotes.author: William Godwin

quotes.quote: The duty of man is not a wilderness of turnpike gates, through which he is to pass by tickets from one to the other. It is plain and simple, and consists but of two points--his duty God, which every man must feel; and, with respect to his neighbor, to do as he would be done by.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: There is no duty we so much underrate as the duty of being happy.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Do something every day that you don't want to do; this is the golden rule for acquiring the habit of doing your duty without pain.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: We all have the duty to do good.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: With faith, discipline and selfless devotion to duty, there is nothing worthwhile that you cannot achieve.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quotes.quote: When a stupid man is doing something he is ashamed of, he always declares that it is his duty.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Our duty is to be useful, not according to our desires but according to our powers.
quotes.author: Henri FrÃ©dÃ©ric Amiel

quotes.quote: It is the first responsibility of every citizen to question authority.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The primary function of the state is to muster the necessary power needed to adequately perform its duty.
quotes.author: Georges Bakaly

quotes.quote: Duty is the most sublime word in our language. Do your duty in all things.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: Do your duty in all things. You cannot do more. You should never wish to do less.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: A servant would view such orders from their masters as their duty and would do what their master told them to do.
quotes.author: R. Luke Thompson

quotes.quote: Duty - that which sternly impels us in the direction of profit, along the line of desire.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: It is seldom very hard to do one's duty when one knows what is is, but it is often exceedingly difficult to find this out.
quotes.author: Steven Mason

quotes.quote: The rule of joy and the law of duty seem to me all one.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell

quotes.quote: It is easier to do one's duty to others than to one's self. If you do your duty to others, you are considered reliable.
quotes.author: T.Szasz

quotes.quote: The first duty of society is to give each of its members the possibility of fulfilling his destiny.
quotes.author: Alexis Carrel

quotes.quote: Rights that do not flow from duty well performed are not worth having.
quotes.author: Mohandas Gandhi

quotes.quote: The modern state no longer has anything but rights; it does not recognize duties anymore.
quotes.author: Georges Bernanos

quotes.quote: Life is made up, not of great sacrifices or duties, but of little things, in which smile and kindness, and small obligations given habitually, are what win and preserve the heart and secure comfort.
quotes.author: Humphrey Davy

quotes.quote: We live in a world which is full of misery and ignorance, and the plain duty of each of us is to try to make the little corner he can influence somewhat less miserable and somewhat less ignorant than it was before he entered it.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: Duties are not performed for duty's sake, but because their neglect would make the man uncomfortable.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A man performs but one duty - the duty of contenting his spirit, the duty of making himself agreeable to himself.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If each one sweeps before his own door, the whole street is clean.
quotes.author: Yiddish saying

quotes.quote: It is the duty of man to raise up man. One is guilty of all abjection that one does not help to relieve. Only those who spread treachery, fire, and death out of hatred for the prosperity of others are undeserving of pity.
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.quote: Stand up and be responsible for yourself. Be aware of your mind, and take responsibility for yourself.
quotes.author: Suzuki Shosan

quotes.quote: It is not only for what we do that we are held responsible, but also for what we do not do.
quotes.author: Jean-Baptiste Moliere

quotes.quote: Few things help an individual more than to place responsibility upon him, and to let him, and to let him know that you trust him.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: Nothing strengthens the judgement and quickens the conscience like individual responsibility.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Standon

quotes.quote: Liberty means responsibility. That is why most men dread it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I believe that every right implies a responsibility; every opportunity, an obligation; every possession, a duty.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

quotes.quote: To let oneself be bound by a duty from the moment you see it approaching is part of the integrity that alone justifies responsibility.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: We need to restore the full meaning of that old word, duty. It is the other side of rights.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Duty without enthusiasm becomes laborious; duty with enthusiasm becomes glorious.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: The present means our duty at the moment. If we put all our strength into doing our duty, as we know it at this moment, we shall have made the highest human effort.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Sorrow springs from dreaming of the future and from lamenting the past. Hence one who concerns himself with the present and does his duty has neither birth nor death.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The duty to be alive is the same as the duty to become oneself, to develop into the individual one potentially is.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Work of your own free will, not from duty. We have duty. The world is just a gymnasium in which we play: our life is an eternal holiday.
quotes.author: Vivekananda

quotes.quote: There are no snares more dangerous than those which lurk under the guise of duty or the name of relationship.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Non-cooperation with evil is as much a duty as is cooperation with good.
quotes.author: Mahatmi Gandhi

quotes.quote: This is the sum of duty; Do naught unto others which would cause you pain if done to you.
quotes.author: Mahabharata

quotes.quote: Life is action, the use of one's powers. As to use them to their is our joy and duty, so it is the one end that justifies itself.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Jr.

quotes.quote: We live in a world which is full of misery and ignorance, and the plain duty of each of us is to try to make the little corner he can influence somewhat less miserable and somewhat less ignorant than it was before he entered it.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: The world belongs to the cheerful. The soul's highest duty is to be of good cheer.
quotes.author: Emerson

quotes.quote: Self-development is a higher duty than self-sacrifice.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.quote: It is our duty as men and women to proceed as though limits to our abilities do not exist.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.quote: The first duty of man is that of subduing fear. We must get rid of fear; we cannot act at all till then.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Fear is never a good counsellor and victory over fear is the first spiritual duty of man.
quotes.author: Nikolai Berdyaev

quotes.quote: The greatest thing in life is to die young but delay it as long as possible.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: It's not the good that die young, it's the lucky.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Grieve not that I die young. Is it not well To pass away ere life hath lost its brightness?
quotes.author: Lady Flora Hastings

quotes.quote: I guess that's one good thing about dying young: you're remembered for your purity, vigor and spontaneity. Dying young you're remembered for your youth.
quotes.author: Ryan Smithson

quotes.quote: There's no tragedy in life like the death of a child. Things never get back to the way they were.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Life, to be sure, is nothing much to lose. But young men think it is, and we were young.
quotes.author: A. E. Housman

quotes.quote: The death of a child is the single most traumatic event in medicine. To lose a child is to lose a piece of yourself.
quotes.author: Dr. Burton Grebin

quotes.quote: Some are bound to die young,By dying young a person stays young in people's memory.If he burns brightly before he dies, his brightness shines for all time
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: The idea is to die young as late as possible.
quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

quotes.quote: Death is a distant rumor to the young.
quotes.author: Andrew A. Rooney

quotes.quote: Live fast, die young, and leave a good looking corpse.
quotes.author: John Derek

quotes.quote: I want to die young at a ripe old age.
quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

quotes.quote: Those who love deeply never grow old; they may die of old age, but they die young.
quotes.author: Arthur Wing Pinero

quotes.quote: Never give up, never slow down, never grow old and never ever die young.
quotes.author: James Taylor

quotes.quote: The good die young - because they see it's no use living if you've got to be good.
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.quote: A person starts dying when they stop dreaming.
quotes.author: Brian Williams

quotes.quote: I needed to know that death was here, in the room, and that I was too fast, too young, and too smart for him.
quotes.author: Tony O'Neill

quotes.quote: The death of a young person for no reason is an apocalypse.
quotes.author: Dave Eggers

quotes.quote: Death is as near to the young as to the old; here is all the difference: death stands behind the young man's back, before the old man's face.
quotes.author: Thomas Adams

quotes.quote: Only the young die good.
quotes.author: Oliver Herford

quotes.quote: I may die young, but at least I'll die smart.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: So many people die young. I'm hoping that's unintended.
quotes.author: James Dye

quotes.quote: Live life to it's fullest or it may seem like you died young.
quotes.author: James Wattersmith

quotes.quote: Each man carries within him the soul of a poet who died young.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: A flower bloomed already wilting. Beginning its life with an early ending.
quotes.author: R.J. Gonzales

quotes.quote: At fourteen you don't need sickness or death for tragedy.
quotes.author: Jessamyn West

quotes.quote: I'd be interested in finding out if there is a light you walk into, and if you do meet people from your life and walk hand in hand with Jesus. I would hate for my death to be tragic: I'd like to be old when it happens. But hopefully a young death is unlikely.
quotes.author: Brian Molko

quotes.quote: Healthy children will not fear life if their elders have integrity enough not to fear death.
quotes.author: Dr. Erik Erikson

quotes.quote: Living fast and dying young is crap if you have a chance to get better. I say good for you.
quotes.author: David Shore

quotes.quote: They say the Lord gives; the Lord takes away / Takes more than I'll ever have / To understand the world today / Death and the dear of dying young
quotes.author: Michael Nieward

quotes.quote: Holes in his sweater, fluid in his lungs / The experts say there's things / He should've done better / But instead he is just dying young
quotes.author: Vic Chesnut

quotes.quote: Yeah, he wished he was a lawyer / Maybe like Perry Mason / He would sue them 'til they are scrawny / Instead of lying there dying young
quotes.author: Vic Chesnut

quotes.quote: And tired of disbelieving, sick of struggling / The experts busy / Their gloved hands are relieving / The symptoms of dying young
quotes.author: Vic Chesnut

quotes.quote: So if tomorrow never comes / From living fast and dying young / I hope the best is yet to come / In the time that remains for you
quotes.author: Chris Wallin

quotes.quote: Cause you can't unlive the pain / You can't rewind to yesterday / You might never find your place / In the time that remains / So if tomorrow never comes / From living fast and dying young
quotes.author: Chris Wallin

quotes.quote: This time, it was so unexpected / Last time, it was the drugs he was lacing / All legends fall in the making / Sorry truth, dying young, demon youth
quotes.author: David Biral

quotes.quote: So this is what it means to be alive / He'll dance like no one's watching, laugh until he cries / He holds on tight and loves without regret, he takes the good and leaves the rest / And when all is said and done, he's gonna leave here dying young
quotes.author: Chad Brownlee

quotes.quote: You only get one time around / Time's always counting down / And what you do with this life's always up to you / I'm gonna leave here / Dying young
quotes.author: Chad Brownlee

quotes.quote: I know you are somewhere... / Inside this open wound / Dying young is fashion / I knew you were somewhere / Dying young is fashion
quotes.author: Razorz Epileptics

quotes.quote: Living fast and dying young / Yeah that's the way things they used to be done / And now there's no one out there left to have some fun
quotes.author: Joseph Poole

quotes.quote: You showed me the way but now you're gone / Quicker than the trigger of an outlaw's gun / Living fast and dying young / A victim of this road you left me on
quotes.author: Emmylou Harris

quotes.quote: The sun fades on me now and I miss you like words can't know / And I missed my shot at dying young a long time ago / It's just a lesson learned in love, it's not angry it's not sad / Some time you have to lose something to know what you have
quotes.author: Zachry Alexander Brown

quotes.quote: All the pain you left in your life you still feeling me / Everybody living must have thought it would change / But living fast and dying young's a part of the game
quotes.author: Mike Dean

quotes.quote: I could lie I don’t care about what’s missing / But sometimes it’s just roses dying too young / Your train of thoughts is always passing here / With its falling paint, and its broken gears
quotes.author: Kristian Matsson

quotes.quote: Living fast and dying young a like an endless poetry. / My motorcycle nightmare freak out inside of me. / My soul salvation, liberation, on the drive.
quotes.author: Ivan Peter De Prume

quotes.quote: You wanna go to heaven, but you sold your soul / Dying young / I'm growing cold / Cut yourself apart, so you don't grow old
quotes.author: Jorel Decker

quotes.quote: The hard rock God, he never had a chance you know / Incurable romantics never do / He held a flame I wasn't born to carry / I'll leave the dying young stuff up to you
quotes.author: Amy E Millan

quotes.quote: You're living fast and dying young is where you're going / Don't fall victim to the trap door that ain't showing / It's bigger than the block they would stand for
quotes.author: La'Reonte Wright

quotes.quote: Everybody's doing cocaine and starting up fights / And I'm living fast and hard / And dying young with my fists upright
quotes.author: Shelton (Hank III) Williams

quotes.quote: Voices crying, young people dying / Lost, nowhere to run / So I'm asking, takes sacrificing / Time for us to come and / Hold up the light
quotes.author: Bebe Winans

quotes.quote: Gotta live stronger since I went vegetarian / I hope I live longer, dying young is scary
quotes.author: Lloyd Polite

quotes.quote: Any sense of life's fairness must therefore account for the seeming unfairness of painful deaths, of sudden deaths, of good people dying and dying young; it must account for the unfairness of everyone dying eventually.
quotes.author: Nick Luxmoore

quotes.quote: If we commit to loving, we will inevitably know loss and grief.
quotes.author: Megan Devine

quotes.quote: If we try to avoid loss and grief, we will never truly love.
quotes.author: Megan Devine

quotes.quote: Most people and many professionals think of grief and loss as aberrations, detours from a normal, happy life.
quotes.author: Megan Devine

quotes.quote: There is nothing wrong with grief. It;s a natural extension of love. It's a healthy and sane response to loss.
quotes.author: Megan Devine

quotes.quote: Powerfully and mysteriously, knowing both love and loss is what brings us fully and deeply alive.
quotes.author: Megan Devine

quotes.quote: Losing a child happens in many different ways. There is the loss in the womb. There are cot deaths, accidents, epidemics, malignant diseases.
quotes.author: Elaine Storkey

quotes.quote: Behind each loss there is grief. Sometimes it is grief mingled with guilt. Nearly always it is grief mingled with heartbreak.
quotes.author: Elaine Storkey

quotes.quote: Each lost child is precious. We feel each loss acutely, however we have suffered it.
quotes.author: Elaine Storkey

quotes.quote: Parents who have just lost a child cannot believe any words of hope, They do not want to hear them yet.
quotes.author: Elaine Storkey

quotes.quote: A woman who has lost her baby through miscarriage may feel a very deep loss which few others seem to understand.
quotes.author: Elaine Storkey

quotes.quote: There are many helps to surviving, but only one key. The key is acceptance!-not acceptance of you loss. Rather acceptance of the grief process.
quotes.author: Elizabeth B. Brown

quotes.quote: You will not accept your child's death until you have completed the healing. Hurt, anguish, tears, yearning, pining are part of the healing.
quotes.author: Elizabeth B. Brown

quotes.quote: No one sleeps well after a child's death, especially those who are burdened with guilt and the 'if only,' and those who are paralyzed by the violent act that took their child's life.
quotes.author: Elizabeth B. Brown

quotes.quote: You can never forget! You just learn to live with the loss.
quotes.author: Elizabeth B. Brown

quotes.quote: Many times it is harder because your time and energy have wrapped around the deceased.
quotes.author: Elizabeth B. Brown

quotes.quote: Unlike the complexities of unexpected loss of life, there are times when death brings more relief than grief.
quotes.author: Ron Johnson

quotes.quote: Sometimes death is excruciatingly painful and difficult to live with, but death can and should always result in some kind of value for the person who has grieved through it.
quotes.author: Ron Johnson

quotes.quote: Death can also be a relief for family, friends, and caretakers who have been part of an individual's prolonged and deteriorating illness.
quotes.author: Ron Johnson

quotes.quote: Like daily sads, major grief does end. It takes time to grieve. Ninety-nine percent of the time grief is finished in minutes or hours if we allow it.
quotes.author: Ron Johnson

quotes.quote: With deeper attachment, we usually have deeper grieving, and usually longer grieving.
quotes.author: Ron Johnson

quotes.quote: You know death is final, that there us no returning from the grave, that you cannot go up to heaven to visit, and that all of us will die someday.
quotes.author: Phyllis R. Silverman

quotes.quote: Dyslexia is a neurological issue, not a character flaw.
quotes.author: James Redford

quotes.quote: If children can't learn the way we teach, then we have to teach the way they learn.
quotes.author: Robert Buck

quotes.quote: When a child knows that he or she is dyslexic, that it's the way their brain is programmed, and it's not their fault, that makes all the difference in the world.
quotes.author: Philip Schultz

quotes.quote: If you are dyslexic, your eyes work fine, your brain works fine, but there is a little short circuit in the wire that goes between the eye and the brain. Reading is not a fluid process.
quotes.author: Caitlyn Jenner

quotes.quote: The one advantage of being dyslexic is that you are never tempted to look back and idealise your childhood.
quotes.author: Richard Rogers

quotes.quote: Dyslexia isn't a disease. It's a Community.
quotes.author: Ben Foss

quotes.quote: If you have kids who are struggling with dyslexia, the greatest gift you can give them is the sense that nothing is unattainable. With dyslexia comes a very great gift, which is the way that your mind can think creatively.
quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

quotes.quote: Dyslexia is not a pigeonhole to say you can't do anything. It is an opportunity and a possibility to learn differently. You have magical brains, they just process differently. Don't feel like you should be held back by it.
quotes.author: Beatrice

quotes.quote: The biggest problem with dyslexic kids is not the perceptual problem, it is their perception of themselves.That was my biggest problem.
quotes.author: Bruce Jenner

quotes.quote: Science has moved forward at a rapid pace so that we now possess the data to reliably define dyslexia â€¦ For the student, the knowledge that he is dyslexic is empowering â€¦ [It provides him] with self-understanding and self-awareness of what he has and what he needs to do in order to succeed.
quotes.author: Sally Shaywitz

quotes.quote: Dyslexia is not due to a lack of intelligence, it's a lack of access. It's like, if you're dyslexic, you have all the information you need, but find it harder to process.
quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

quotes.quote: When someone helping you gets frustrated, don't let them. Take a step back, because you can't learn anything under pressure. And don't worry about the label [dyslexia]!
quotes.author: Erin Brockovich

quotes.quote: Dyslexia is the affliction of a frozen genius.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: An incredibly high percentage of successful entrepreneurs are dyslexic. That's one of the little-known facts.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: Understanding our children's frustrations with dyslexia and giving them the tools to blossom will give them the confidence to reach their true potential. We can help our children channel their interests and talents and ignite the passion within.
quotes.author: Carolina Frohlich

quotes.quote: Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by it's ability to climb a tree, it will live it's whole life thinking it's stupid.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The advantage of dyslexia is that my brain puts information in my head in a different way.
quotes.author: Whoopi Goldberg

quotes.quote: Dyslexia is not a pigeonhole to say you can't do anything. It is an opportunity and a possibility to learn differently. You have magical brains, they just process differently. Don't feel like you should be held back by it.
quotes.author: Princess Beatrice

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I’ve learned that if you make your primary goal teaching your child to read or spell just like every other child, you’re going to decrease your child’s chances of achieving success. It’s like telling a person in a wheelchair that she needs to put in more time to learn how to walk.
quotes.author: Ben Foss

quotes.quote: Whenever people talk about dyslexia, it's important to know that some of the smartest people in the world, major owners of companies, are dyslexic. We just see things differently, so that's an advantage. I just learn a different way; there's nothing bad about it.
quotes.author: Charlotte McKinney

quotes.quote: For me, in my life, dyslexia has been a little bit of a blessing. It helped me find my strength and directed me towards what I really wanted to do.
quotes.author: DARCEY BUSSELL

quotes.quote: Dyslexia is a different brain organization that needs different teaching methods. It is never the fault of the child, but rather the responsibility of us who teach to find methods that work for that child.
quotes.author: Dr. Maryanne Wolf

quotes.quote: I don’t ‘suffer’ from dyslexia. I live with it and work with it. I suffer from the ignorance of people who think they know what I can and cannot do.
quotes.author: Erica Cook

quotes.quote: Discrepancies in educational performances. This is often one of the most obvious indicators of dyslexia.
quotes.author: Gavin Reid

quotes.quote: If my mind can conceive it, and my heart can believe it then I can achieve it.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: Childhood is not a race to see how quickly a child can read, write, and count. It is a small window of time to learn and develop at the pace that is right for each individual child. Earlier is not better.
quotes.author: Magda Gerber

quotes.quote: The looks, the stares, the giggles I wanted to show everybody that I could do better and also that I could read.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.quote: We were never born to read. Human beings invented reading only a few thousand years ago. And with this invention, we rearranged the very organization of our brain, which in turn expanded the ways we were able to think.
quotes.author: Maryann Wolf

quotes.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, ‘Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
quotes.author: Mohamed Ali Prizefighter

quotes.quote: Impossible is just an opinion.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Being dyslexic can actually help in the outside world. I see some things clearer than other people do because I have to simplify things to help me and that has helped others.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Perhaps my early problems with dyslexia made me more intuitive when someone sends me a written proposal, rather than dwelling on detailed facts and figures I find that my imagination grasps and expands on what I read.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: I was dyslexic before anybody knew what dyslexia was. I was called 'slow'. It's an awful feeling to think of yourself as 'slow' it's horrible.
quotes.author: Robert Benton

quotes.quote: Dyslexics think differently. They are intuitive and excel at problem-solving, seeing the big picture, and simplifying. They are poor rote reciters but inspired visionaries.
quotes.author: Sally Shaywitz

quotes.quote: Dyslexia, for me, is rather like being a six-fingered typist on LSD
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Don’t be trapped by dogma which is living with the results of other people’s thinking. Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: It is more common than you can imagine. You are not alone. And while you will have this the rest of your life, you can dart between the raindrops to get where you want to go and it will not hold you back.
quotes.author: Steven Spielberg

quotes.quote: Dyslexia is more common than you can imagine. You are not alone. And while you will have this the rest of your life, you can dart between the raindrops to get where you want to go and it will not hold you back.
quotes.author: Steven Spielberg

quotes.quote: We are the visionaries, inventors, and artists. We think differently, see the world differently, and solve problems differently. It is from this difference that the dyslexic brain derives its brilliance.
quotes.author: Tiffany Sunday

quotes.quote: I had to train myself to focus my attention. I became very visual and learned how to create mental images in order to comprehend what I read.
quotes.author: Tom Cruise

quotes.quote: It was a bright cold day in April, and the clocks were striking thirteen.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Human reason can excuse any evil; that is why it's so important that we don't rely on it.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: It isn't just brave that she died for me; it is brave that she did it without announcing it, without hesitation, and without appearing to consider another option.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: Everything - our houses, our clothes, our hairstyles - is meant to help us forget ourselves and to protect us from vanity, greed and envy, which are just forms of selfishness. If we have little, and want for little, and we are all equal, we envy no one.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: I wanted to punch him and understand him at the same time.
quotes.author: Shannon A. Thompson

quotes.quote: Tell freedom I said hello.
quotes.author: Lauren DeStefano

quotes.quote: Resisting is worth doing.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: Why did we become blind, I don't know, perhaps one day we'll find out, Do you want me to tell you what I think, Yes, do, I don't think we did go blind, I think we are blind, Blind but seeing, Blind people who can see, but do not see.
quotes.author: Jose Saramago

quotes.quote: It's taken me all this time, all this loss, to realize what really matters is now.
quotes.author: Suzanne Young

quotes.quote: And what would they be scared of? There's nothing to fear in a perfect world, is there?
quotes.author: Catherine Fisher

quotes.quote: They were like her rocks. Imperfect and surprising and maybe better in the long run than certainties. Chances, she thought, were life.
quotes.author: Veronica Rossi

quotes.quote: The most important thing you can ever know, is that whatever your purpose is, that's not your only choice.
quotes.author: Dan Wells

quotes.quote: All utopias are dystopias. The term "dystopia" was coined by fools that believed a "utopia" can be functional.
quotes.author: A.E. Samaan

quotes.quote: You have to pull the feet to break the neck. They let the loved ones do it.
quotes.author: Pierce Brown

quotes.quote: I'm a huge fan of dystopian films. I collect them in my brain.
quotes.author: Brittany Howard

quotes.quote: It's a dystopian world where things aren't connected. But life feels light when we can communicate, joke or laugh on ourselves.
quotes.author: Ashish Vidyarthi

quotes.quote: I think it's fascinating to look at a world that an author has created that has sort of stemmed from the world now, and usually dystopian books point out something about our current world and exaggerates a tendency or a belief.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: It's a heartening fact about the human race that utopian fiction precedes dystopian fiction in the evolution of literature.
quotes.author: Paul Di Filippo

quotes.quote: I think dystopian futures are also a reflection of current fears.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: Dystopian,' by definition, promises a darker story.
quotes.author: Lauren DeStefano

quotes.quote: Within the realm of fiction, it is always tempting to set one's stories in a dystopian future, where all our misgivings about state power can be shown in full force.
quotes.author: Anne Fortier

quotes.quote: The dystopian future of a society bereft of reason.
quotes.author: J. S. Ellis

quotes.quote: Why fight everything? Not what you expected? Your dystopian epic Of memories are a lie.
quotes.author: Anthrax

quotes.quote: This time could be the last Maybe the only time to get it right In this dystopian generation Damnable situation.
quotes.author: The Damned

quotes.quote: Dystopian ruthless hope movements seasonal and festive the butchery looking good.
quotes.author: EI-P

quotes.quote: Life is tough, you'll get snuffed in the buff, so dystopian, ruff, ruff, hear the call of the copper mutts on the hunt.
quotes.author: Killer Mike

quotes.quote: It's the apocalypse a dystopian dream the internet would be the one to kill you and too busy kissing mirrors and those cell phone.
quotes.author: Johnny Raincloud

quotes.quote: Dystopian utopia, utopian dystopia
quotes.author: Necrosis

quotes.quote: To cityscapes of past demise, magenta skies The human race deprived, may not survive Dystopian times, paths defined, thoughts maligned
quotes.author: Ray Gun Hero

quotes.quote: My life story's like a dystopian tragedy my mentality is money-orientated
quotes.author: Mr. Muthafuckin' eXquire

quotes.quote: I feel like lonely soldier In a dystopian world always fighting to survive another day.
quotes.author: Blutengel

quotes.quote: I'll climb through the window again But right now it feels good not to stand Then I'll leave it wide open Let the dystopian morning light pour in.
quotes.author: Phoebe Bridgers

quotes.quote: the dark mirror of dystopian fiction functions as a deterrent, a warning that we should not allow the still curable illness of our present world to turn into the abhorrent pathologies of the world of the future.
quotes.author: Erika Gottlieb

quotes.quote: Dystopian, by definition, promises a darker story.
quotes.author: Lauren DeStefano

quotes.quote: Dystopian novels help people process their fears about what the future might look like; further, they usually show that there is always hope, even in the bleakest future.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: Live every day as if you've come back in time from a dystopian future to try and prevent everything from breaking.
quotes.author: Charlie Jane Anders

quotes.quote: Most dystopian, classic and contemporary, paints a future world that puts a twist on present society - a future world that could plausibly happen.
quotes.author: Lauren DeStefano

quotes.quote: A fictional Dystopia is better than a fake Utopia.
quotes.author: Robert Friedrich

quotes.quote: Once you get into the world of dystopia, it's hard to avoid plagiarism, because other people have had such powerful visions
quotes.author: Anthony Horowitz

quotes.quote: The beauty of dystopia is that it lets us vicariously experience future worlds - but we still have the power to change our own.
quotes.author: Ally Condie

quotes.quote: Its a heartening fact about the human race that utopian fiction precedes dystopian fiction in the evolution of literature.
quotes.author: Paul Di Filippo

quotes.quote: Once you get into the world of dystopia, it's hard to avoid plagiarism, because other people have had such powerful visions.
quotes.author: Anthony Horowitz

quotes.quote: People in the know say The Giver was the first young adult dystopian novel.
quotes.author: Lois Lowry
